SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c112:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

After I had eliminated the tickets scalper, the cafe was operated in peace and mid-December arrived to our door.
The streets were completely soaked in Christmas mood. I am also excited by the unique atmosphere of the end of the year.
Should I play carols as store background music in Cafe Rieul? It would be nice to order decorations and decorate the cafe interior for Christmas.
At the end of the day, I was looking at the Christmas goods sales page on my phone with such thoughts.
Suddenly, the door opened.
“Hohohoho, merry Christmas!”

Santa appeared.
“Huh … uncle?”
To be precise, it was my uncle dressed as Santa.
“Dang, to find out the identity of this Santa right away like that. My niece has a very sharp eye.”
“That … it’s usual to find out about it.”
The cotton beard was on the verge of falling off his face. My uncle cleared his throat and fixed his beard.
Red Santa suit and hat. In his hand, he was carrying a gift pouch and a large fir tree. He only has a simple makeup on, but it gave off a pretty plausible atmosphere.
“How have you been, niece? This is your Christmas present.”
My uncle gave me a fir tree just the right size to use as a decoration tree.
However, there was one problem with this tree. It’s not artificial, it’s a real tree.
“Uncle, it’s illegal to bring coniferous trees from the mountains!”
“Hohoho! Don’t worry, niece! I bought it at the market.”
“Then I’m glad.”
I thought it would be a good idea to decorate this fir tree to create a Christmas atmosphere. I accepted the tree after thanking him.
Would it be okay if I put it next to the counter? While contemplating where to put the fir tree, my uncle added with a serious expression.
“My nephew, make sure to remember what your Uncle said. It’s best to pay for everything.”
“Ahaha, yes….”
I know he left the Hunter World to enjoy his life as a natural person, but….
He seems to have suffered a lot during this time. My uncle had become an ardent follower of the modern consumer society.
I sincerely agree that it is better to pay for a living.
From growing coffee to making sugar, now even milking the milk on my own … I didn’t practice it much because I’m running an extreme DIY cafe.
My uncle took out three gift boxes from his gift pouch. Mieum, Lime, and Ash each had one share.
“Then this Santa Claus should give presents to the good children.”’
“Waeoooong (You know the greatness of this body and pay tribute to it)!”
“Kkyuu, kkyu!”
“Santa Claus … the one who originated from Saint Nicholas and distributes gifts on the eve of Christmas. “
“Hohoho! Yes, you know it well. It’s as if it’s just been scratched from the wiki.”
Mieum and Lime’s gift was a new rice bowl, and Ash’s gift was a do-it-yourself architectural miniature.
Aside from the animals who were already excitedly running around the new bowl, would something like a miniature suit Ash’s taste? I glanced at Ash’s expression.
“Cut this part and apply glue … hmm.”
He was already reading the assembly manual. He seems to like it.
“Ah, I’ll make you something to drink. What would you like?”
“Then, I’ll have Irish coffee.”
“Okay, please sit down for a moment.”
I headed in front of the espresso machine to make coffee. My uncle’s request was heard again behind my back.
“Niece, I’d like my Irish coffee with lots of whiskey and no coffee.”
Then isn’t it just whiskey, not coffee?
I didn’t follow my uncle’s instructions and handed him an Irish coffee with exactly the right amount of whiskey.
“How have you been?”
“Keuh, haaa! After all, the taste of civilization is good!”
He took a sip of coffee and put on a thrilled expression. Hmm, it looks like he’s been through a lot.
My uncle told me his story.
It’s not unusual to start a natural life without preparation, but there were many hardships. It is said that it was a time to realize the importance of electricity, water, heating, and other civilizations.
His YouTube channel, which he started to open the second act of life, has 11 subscribers and the highest number of views 53 times. Sadly, he had no choice but to give up his dream of becoming a YouTube star and go down the mountain.
“Dang … my friends, I even sent them a link on Kakaotalk! The ‘1‘ mark disappeared, but why isn’t the number of YouTube views going up?”
“I don’t know….”
Actually, I didn’t watch Uncle’s YouTube either. I’m sorry.
After emptying the coffee, my uncle took off his Santa’s top because it’s hot and hung it on a chair.  After that, he put his hand on his chin and asked me a question.
“So, what is the thing that made my niece curious that she wanted to see this big Uncle?”
“I want to know about my grandmother.”
His face, which was more than half covered by the made-of-cotton beard, had a serious expression. He looked as if he had been reminiscing the memories from a long time ago.
“Did Grandmother ever live in a cabin in the woods?”
“Hmm, and?”
“Also, I wonder if you know about the abilities that Grandmother had. Cthugha said that she could read the stream of stars.”
“The streams of stars. Well, for a crazy rice cooker, he used the exact expression.”
What a crazy rice cooker … it was a nickname that made me feel a little sorry for Cthugha.
My uncle lifted himself from the chair. He recited low, looking out of the window.
“Stars. Yeah, it’s the stars.”
It was the time when the day has passed and darkness has fallen. The starlight was exceptionally clear today. As I raised my head following my uncle’s gaze, I saw countless stars.
It must be because of my mood, but it felt like the stars were looking this way.
“There are Gods who want to manipulate this world as they please. They are called by different names. Voices, Stars, The Constellations, Gods of Another World … the system calls them The Great Ones.”
The uncle stopped talking for a moment and burst into laughter.
“Isn’t that funny, niece? There is a degree of self-consciousness to claim greatness with their own mouths.”
“Hahaha … uh, yes.”
“The system is a tool for those self-conscious transcendents to intervene in the life of humans without defying the causality.”
The smiling eyes turned to me.
“Isn’t it strange? The system window that resembles a game gives us power.”
“…..”
“Transcendents try to manipulate us through the system.”
My uncle spoke very cynically about the system.
Maybe that’s the reason. My uncle, who was a Hunter, seemed more comfortable now that he had lost his awakening ability.
“…waeoong.”
As if wanting to refute my uncle’s words, Mi-eum let out a small cry. However, she just rolled her eyes didn’t say anything more. She seemed to be lost in her own mind.
“My mother … her eyes were special.”
A beat later, I realized that those words answered my question.
“Her eyes?”
“Yes. An eye that can read the Causality. It is also called The Fairy Eyes.”
“…….”
Even before dungeons were created in the world and the Awakeneds appeared, my grandmother was said to have seen things others could not see.
My uncle chuckled, telling me that if she had acted as a fortune teller, she would have made a lot of money.
“And when her children grew up to a certain extent, she left behind a letter saying that she will solve the tangled casuality.”
He said he wasn’t surprised. In in the eyes of my uncle, Grandmother seemed like someone who would leave at any moment.
“It must have been then that the crazy rice cooker met mother. She said lived somewhere quiet.”
“The tangled casuality … is it resolved?”
My uncle shook his head. That’s something only my grandmother knows.
I remembered my grandmother who was strong and kind. I wish I had known more about my grandmother before she passed away. The grandmother in my uncle’s story feels like a stranger.
After we finished the conversation, my uncle prepared to go back.
“You’re going to see Oppa, right? I’ll call him in advance.”
“No, not yet. I have job to do.”
“Huh? Can’t you just contact Oppa first? What are you going to do?”
My uncle put on the top of Santa’s clothes again, which he had taken off, and carefully checked to see if any part of his beard had fallen off when he was undressed.
“Hohoho! Santa Claus has only one job to do. It is to give presents to the good children.”
“…what?”
I’m afraid he’s serious. I could already see Kwon Jiwoon grabbing his throbbing forehead.
“Wait, hold on! Uncle, just one. Tell me one more thing please!”
My uncle was about to leave after saying he was busy delivering gifts before Christmas. I grabbed my uncle’s sleeve in a hurry and poured out the question.
“Cthugha told me that Grandmother suddenly disappeared from the cabin without a word. When and why did Grandmother, who had left like that, return?”
“…….”
“….Uncle?”
Frozen as if he was recollecting old memories, he was silent for a moment.
“My mother returned….”
The trembling breath filled with unspeakable emotions.
“My younger brother and his wife, that … niece, she returned after she heard that your parents had died.”
***
It’s late.
I had to prepare for tomorrow’s business and get ready to sleep.
Long after my uncle left, I got up from sitting in a daze.
“Ash, you must be tired, so get some rest.”
“…….”
“….Ash?”
There was no answer. When I looked at Ash, he was already immersed in making miniatures. With a serious expression on his face, he cut and sanded the parts.
How did he pick such a perfect gift for Ash’s taste? Did Uncle and Ash become really close at the camping?
Anyway, I’ll leave him alone because it looks like he’s having fun.
I was going to leave Ash alone and go into the space for a while, but this time, Mieum blocked my way.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c111:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“What?”
“Umh, don’t be so surprised … I’d like to get an advance payment…..”
Instead of constantly receiving the payment when he’s selling the numbered ticket, he asked for 100 rubies of the sale price first. 
“Haha, there’s an item that I want to buy, but I have to pay the balance by today … If you’re unable to do it, I’ll find someone else.”
“Huh, wait, wait. You’re so impatient!”
Jinwoo did the calculating again. 

100 rubies was a quite big expenditure for his pocket. However, it is a waste to miss such a pushover. If he went to another merchant while Jinwoo was busy hesitating, he might realize that he got scammed.
Furthermore, Jinwoo has to be careful for a while because the cafe owner remembered his face. He can’t do this business for the time being.
“Hmm….”
Yeah, damnit. If he sells the numbered ticket, he can get the 100 rubies back in no time.
“Well, let’s do that! I’ve used my generosity.”
Of course, Jinwoo is not a pushover. Therefore, he carefully checked not only the opponent’s contact information but also his Hunter ID Card. The advance payment was paid only after writing a simple contract with personal information.
Jinwoo, who took the numbered tickets, hurriedly left.
The remaining trading partner smiled and held his phone in his hand. A short dialing sound went on before the call is connected. His expression no longer bears any awkwardness.
“Hello. I took care of it as you told me. It’s useless to keep this money, so I’ll donate it to an appropriate place.”
— Okay.
“You owe me a debt, right?”
— ……..
The other person cut off the call without giving an answer. He’s such a heartless man.
The man used his index finger to sweep the Hunter ID Card he just showed to Jinwoo. As the illusion spell was erased, the original letter, the name of the illusionist Oh Seoho, appeared. 
A Hunter who occupied the 18th place in the ranking, but now he was more widely known as an entertainer.
Still, his ability to manipulate illusions was real.
‘What on earth is that cafe that making even the No. 1 ranker cares about a fly?’
His curiosity arises. Let’s find out on his own sometime soon.
***
“What’s going on here….?”
As soon as Jinwoo returned home, he posted  a numbered ticket of Cafe Rieul sales post on the Hunter Channel.
However, it was weird. Usually, messages would have poured out before 10 minutes went by, but he received none this time.
Did he get blocked because he posted a sales post?
There’s no way. He changed his nickname several times so that he wouldn’t get caught easily. 
“Hmm……”
Looking at the clock, there is not much time left until the cafe opens. He’ll have to deal with all these numbered tickets before then.
He felt nervous. Jinwoo made up his mind and wrote another sales post by drastically lowering the price. However, this time, let alone message, the number of views of the post hardly increased.
This is a completely different reaction than before.
‘Is it out of fashion?’
Jinwoo put a search term related to <Cafe Rieul> on the Hunter Channel and then clicked on the latest post.

[Chatting] My heart is racing,, (4)
Upvotes: 38 / Downvotes: 0

Writer: Sweet Sugar
ㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠ
There was a dungeon that I couldn’t get through because of the damage caused by the frozen attributeI was on the verge of being frozen myself because I ran out of the non-freezing potions.I cleared it because they gave me coffee through that strange door.Thank youIt was an emergency, but they only received the payment in regular price;ㅜㅜ

— OO: God R— Consignment Shop No. 2: The light that descended to the desolate Hunter World T_T— red***: To be honest, it seems like the price of the drink is too cheap. Does she get any profits after selling it so cheaply?
└ MM: LOL The pharmacist bastards who asked a sick person in front of them to pay express fees are animals


They still filled with all kinds of plagues with coffee, which was not a big deal. So it doesn’t seem to have gone out of fashion, but the numbered tickets still doesn’t get sold.
Damn, it looks like he’s just wasting money.
Jinwoo, who was in conflict while looking at the clock, got up. He was going to buy coffee with this numbered ticket himself and sell it. It’s tight because there’s a time limit on maintaining the coffee’s condition, but it could also be sold at a high price if he caught a good pushover.
But….
“Hmm….?”
The cafe owner, who received the numbered ticket, tilted her head as if it were strange. Then, she returned the ticket to Jinwoo.
“I’m sorry, but you can’t buy coffee with this.”
“What? I have a numbered ticket, so why can’t I buy it?”
“You didn’t get this yourself, did you?”
The cafe owner pointed to a small mark on the corner of the numbered ticket.
“This numbered ticket has the binding effect to the first owner. If you were the first owner, it would glow, but there is no response.”
The binding effect is usually given only to high-end equipment or items. It’s astounding to use such a thing for a piece of paper. Still, the money already invested had to be recovered. Jinwoo lied with a calm face.
“I got it from a friend. It’s not like friends can accept it for each other.”
“Still, we have a rule that you should come to buy it on your own.”
“My friend told me to try the coffee here. Are you asking me to throw away his sincerity to the ground?!”
Jinwoo’s stubborn attitude made the cafe owner take a step back.
“If that’s the case, I can only accept it this time….”
However, Jinwoo hardened his face when he heard the cafe owner’s next words.
“The drink also has a bind effect, so the effect only works when the original owner drinks it. Is that okay with you?”
“……!”
Crush. Jinwoo crumpled the numbered ticket in his hand.
“What do you mean by binding?! What about my money!”
“Money? This cafe doesn’t charge a reservation fee, right?”
He was beaten.
His gut instinct told him that this isn’t accident. He was tricked. The stupid man, who took the advance payment with a lame excuse, hit him in the back of his head. He must have taken the money knowing about the binding effect.
He was enraged at the thought that he had been caught by a pushover.
“You! You conspired with that nerd and took my money!”
“What? What are you talking about?”
If he thinks about it a little bit, he’ll realise that it’s a ridiculous speculation. However, the fact that he got caught by someone that he thought was a pushover made him lose his reasoning.
All eyes are on him. He heard whispers behind his back.
He was furious, but he couldn’t make a fuss because the Hunter, who stood in line behind him and stared at him, looked strong.
“Keuheum, no, whatever. I’ll end this for now….”
In the end, Jinwoo faltered and stepped back. It was an excellent display of the strong and the weak.
But.
“Customer-nim, wait a minute. Take this with you.”
The cafe owner held out something. It was a cup of drink.
“Are you trying to drug me?”
Tak, he knocked the cup off and tried to pour it onto the floor.
Chill.
Again, he felt a sharp gaze behind his back. It seemed like they wouldn’t let him go if he refused the favor or spilled this drink.
‘These pushover guys….’
Although he muttered those swear words on his mind, he had no confidence to confront them. Jinwoo, who had long embodied the attitude of ‘strong-to-the-weak and weak-to-the-strong’, grumbled and received the cup.
A system notification immediately popped up.
[You are identified as the original owner.][Item: Lemonade has a binding effect.]
***
I held the binding sign-pen in my hand.
Then, without hesitation, I carefully marked the numbered tickets I had prepared in advance.
I was able to effectively block the tickets scalpers with this pen. There was confusion among the customers for about a day after I announced that the numbered tickets and drinks will have a binding effect, but it was quickly sorted out. Most of the customers were happy to drive out the resellers.
“Hmm, that’s weird….”
“What’s wrong?”
I must have said it out loud without even realizing it. Ash poked his head from the side. I shook my head and told him it was nothing, then Iwent back to work.
“As expected, it’s strange….”
Why doesn’t the quest completion notification appear?
No more traders are in sight. I searched the Hunter Channel just in case, but there was no post about tranding numbered ticket or coffee.
Then isn’t it done? It’s done, right? Is it because I complained that they’re stingy with the rewards before?
[This is the reward we have prepared with our utmost effort. Let’s cherish it. ٩(ㅇㅅㅇ)ง]
They’re sulking….
Yeah, I’m sorry for calling you stingy. I’ll treasure it.
I said that, but the quest completion notification still didn’t ring.
I opened the quest window and checked the completion conditions again.
[Drive out the merchant who takes unfair advantage: (Incomplete)]
No other conditions are written. So, what else do I have to do to clear this quest?
The question was soon resolved.

“What about my money!”
This is because a merchant who seemed to have been drawn by the big picture appeared.
‘Ash, calm down. It’s fine.’
I calmed Ash, who was about to jump out immediately.
The merchant was angry, but he couldn’t do anything more because he was concerned about the eyes around him. He looked around and then slowly stepped back.
By the way, does anyone feel a sense of deja vu in this situation?
It reminded me of the time when a journalist came to our cafe before. It was nice to see the journalist’s name on the main page of the portal site from time to time. He seemed to be walking on the path of a true journalist.
And what purified the journalist’s heart is….
‘That’s it.’
I handed the lemonade to the merchant with a half-doubt.
“Are you trying to drug me?”
The merchant, who tried to refuse at first, could not overcome the pressures from his surrounding and reluctantly took the lemonade cup.
And he drank it.
“……!”
He made a surprised face and emptied all the remaining lemonade. The merchant looked at me with clear eyes.
“I … I have lived the wrong life.”
As expected, it’s like this again….
It would be boring if I told you everything I’ve already experienced once, so I’ll summarize it briefly.
Anyway, he will live a good life from now on; the story that he told me was something like that.
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Sub Quest: Let’s Eradicate The Black Ticket Trade and Find The Light’.Please collect the rewards.]
[Experience: 10 EXP have been acquired.][You have obtained the Silver Teaspoon.][Fame: 1 / Popularity: 2 have been acquired.][<Cafe Rieul>’s current Grade: D]
[Item: Silver Teaspoon (★★☆☆☆)It’s just a teaspoon. Surprisingly, it can also be used as a weapon.Type: High-Speed Short-Range WeaponAttack: 1Note: It will discolor when it touches poison.]
As soon as the merchant was purified, a notification of the completion of the quest popped up.
I was lost in thought for a moment, skimming through the status window.
So far, there have been many other customers who have ordered and drank this lemonade. However, their impressions were usually in this way.
“I feel refreshed somehow.”“It seems to clear my head, but I’m not sure….”“I think it helps me relax….”
The words were more equivocal than a health supplement promotional phrase. To put it bluntly, this meant that there was no special buff effect.
However, it has had a tremendous effect on some people to reflect on their lives.
Does ‘purifying the mind’ mean purifying small evil?
If so, wouldn’t it be possible to purify something greater by raising the grade of lemonade?
And maybe we can make a world free of misdemeanors by letting a lot of people drink it?
Uhm, seriously, I got a little scared because I thought it would be possible.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c110:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Last evening, Choi Yichan visited just after the cafe was closed.
“Unyaaah (this human, is he back now?)!”
“Waeong, waeooong (Let’s play! Play with me)!”
The animals in our house circled around Choi Yichan and started crying. In addition, suddenly, Ash began cleaning the store, conscious of Choi Yichan as if he were looking at his competitor.
The cafe has already been closed and the cleanup has been finished. The inside of the cafe, which was cleaned using the skill ‘The Floor is Shiny’, didn’t even have a speck of dust. There is nothing more to do.
In other words, all of them are just being a distraction.

I sealed Ash and the animals in front of the television in the next room with snacks. An occult movie was airing at the moment. They finally became quiet as they focused on the screen.
“Yichan-ah, sit down. Would you like some coffee?”
“Haha, I’d appreciate it if you give me some.”
I made ice cream coffee with plenty of ice cream in a glass. As if it wasn’t cold, Choi Yichan emptied his glass right away. Seeing him drinking it well made me feel better.
“Kuh, haaa, it’s really delicious.”
He tried to put the glass, which had been emptied to the last drop, down on the table. I reached out my hand in bewilderment.
“Yichan-ah, be careful….”
But it didn’t break.
There was a clatter, but there was no crack in the glass. It was a perfect control of power.
The Spartan training of the Dungeon Management Office seems to have worked. Indeed, Korea is a country with a great passion for education. You can achieve anything even with a short-term education.
Choi Yichan looked around the store with his chin resting on his hands. It must have looked like something new for him. I met him in the dungeon where Cthugha resided, but he was so busy that he didn’t have time to look around the store back then.
“A lot has changed.”
“Huh? What? Oh, here?”
The street is now slowly getting soaked in the year-end atmosphere. The period during his absence is not that long in terms of date, but in the meantime, the inside of the store has changed a lot.
As rewards from  the system, the tables have been upgraded to the ‘Comfortable Table’. Now, this place also has a mysterious door, a walk-through counter, and a new part-timer.
“I’m glad you seem to be doing well.”
“…Thank you.”
Choi Yichan touched the pendant hanging around his neck with his fingertips. It was the pendant containing the dark ether that I gave him before.
Not only had he already acquired the skills, but he had become an S-Class Hunter, so he didn’t need to wear that pendant anymore. I briefly explained this before, but he was still wearing it.
“Are you still wearing that pendant?”
“Uh-huh. I like it.”
“You like it? The design?”
The pendant is just a black stone the size of a pinky fingernail hanging from a plain string. It’s a very boring design to be an accessory.
“No, it’s not like that…..”
The slightly drooping eyes closed softly. A bright smile followed.
“It’s a long-awaited gift that Rieul finally gave me.”
“….”
Thank you, but saying that made the atmosphere very awkward. Feeling a tickle on my cheek, I quickly got up. I cleaned up the empty glass, then I asked if he would like another glass.
“Oh, thanks, then!”
There was no shadow in that bright answer.
This time, I decided to make dalgona coffee. Just in time, the newly made dalgona hardened just right. After crushing the dalgona with a spoon, I asked while picking out a large piece and placing it in a glass.
“Yichan-ah, what were you trying to say when we met before?”
“Ung?”
“Before you got dragged away by Jina-ssi and Hunter Kang Hyunwoo, you said you had something to say to me.”
“Ah, that….”
I put the finished dalgona coffee in front of Choi Yichan.
“Just … I was going to say that now that I’m back, I want to drink the coffee you make.”
Choi Yichan picked up a piece of dalgona and chewed it. There was a crunching sound. He wasn’t lying when he claimed that he wanted to drink my coffee, judging from the light bar twinkling above his head.
I noticed that Choi Yichan swallowed what he was originally going to say to me and changed the subject.
Should I ask for more details?
If he’s changing the subject because it’s a difficult words to bring up, wouldn’t it be better to just not ask?
“Eih, I thought something’s happening. I can listen to you as much as you want without having to say something so vague like that.”
I answered lightly and thought about it in my mind.
Putting down the glass after a sip, Choi Yichan talked again. The smile that always hung on his face faded.
“Kwon Ri, the man from before….”
“Before? Who do you mean?”
“The man I saw on the day we returned from the dungeon.”
It was an ambiguous expression, but I immediately understood who he was talking about.
“Ah, Yoohyun-ssi?”
“Yes, that person. What is your relationship with him?”
I was about to answer Choi Yichan’s question, but I felt a strange gaze and turned my head.
Ash and the animals, who were supposed to be watching TV in the next room, poked their heads out through the crack in the door.
“….waeong.”
When our eyes met, they pretended not to see me, but it was already too late. What’s wrong with them? They looked like our conversation was more exciting than watching TV.
I came back after replenishing snacks for my distracted family.
What’s my relationship with Ki Yoohyun?
I know his true identity and his regression. The remaining answer was short, as I could not say that I felt a sense of homogeneity as a fellow regressor.
“Hmm … I’d say we’re close friends. I got a lot of help from him.”
Coincidentally, shortly before Choi Yichan arrived at the store, Ki Yoohyun called.
He informed me that I would not be able to contact him for a few days because he had some business to do. While on the phone, when I mentioned that I had decided to get help from Grandma Kim Deokyi to deal with the ticket scalpers, he said it was a good idea. Later, he added.
— Don’t worry, I’ll do something as well.“Is that … you’re not saying that you’re going to find out what they look like and deal with them, are you?”— Eh. I can’t use such an ignorant method.“Hey, Yoohyun-ssi, I think law-abiding awareness is important.”— Hahaha….
The phone was cut off with a cheerful but uneasy laugh and  goodbye.
As I reflected on my conversation with Ki Yoohyun, Choi Yichan looked at me with a thoughtful expression.
“You got help … from him. Is that all?”
“Yup.”
“Yeah, that’s fine if it’s still like that.”
The grin somehow bothered me.
“Yichan-ah?”
The moment I was about to ask again.
“I’ve decided to join The White Silver Guild.”
“What? Why?”
I remembered a conversation I had with Choi Yichan before. It was not long after he became an S-Class. He had firmly stated that he had no intention of joining a guild.
Why did he suddenly change his mind?
“Don’t tell me Kwon Jiwoon forced you to do so?”
“Ahaha, no. I asked him to join The White Silver Guild.”
“I’m glad if that’s the case … why did you change your mind?”
“Kwon Ri … Rieul-ah.”
“Yes?”
He took a light breath and spoke calmly.
“It’s all thanks to you that I’m still alive like this and become an S-Class.”
“What? No. That’s not what happened. Your humility is too much.”
It’s true that I did various things to obtain the dark etheric item because I did not want to repeat the tragedy of the pre-regression past. However, the achievement is obviously his. In order to save the children, Choi Yichan jumped into the crack by himself and overcame it on his own. All I did was spice things a little.
I heard he raised his level a lot while he was gone. Level 40. Isn’t that effort also done by himself?
Even though I said so, Choi Yichan shook his head.
“Now that I have obtained this power … I want to do what I can in return.”
“…….”
Maybe it’s because of the mood, his eyes seemed to be gleaming sharply.for a moment.
The tip of Choi Yichan’s finger touched my hand that was placed on the table casually. Even though it touched just a little, Choi Yichan was startled and removed his hand.
The atmosphere is strange. Choi Yichan added, scratching the back of his head awkwardly.
“So, I don’t think I can do a part-time job here. I’m here to say I’m sorry.”
“Huh? Well, of course you can’t. You’re officially doing hunter activities. That’s right, if Kwon Jiwoon gives you hard time, let me know.”
“Hahaha….”
Choi Yichan closed his eyes and smiled.
He has an easy-going personality, an unreserved attitude, and even a bright smile. He is the Choi Yichan that I know, and yet now he seems to be somewhat complicated. I felt strange when I realised that I haven’t meet someone who wasn’t like this.
Ki Yoohyun, who said that he is a regressor, is trying to seal the Demon God.
The same goes for Choi Cedric, who seemed to be worried about his sickly younger sister.
Now, it’s Choi Yichan.
There are only people with complicated circumstances around me.
Gee, I couldn’t believe I did a regression, but I’m the only one who is simple?
“Waeooong, waeoolg (End of the story. Play with me)!”
“Kkyuuuu!”
At that time, Mieum and Lime popped out of the next room with a loud noise.
“Hahaha, yes, yes. Come here.”
Choi Yichan held Mieum and Lime in each hand and juggled them. I could hear the cries of our house’s animals, who excitedly spinning in the air.
Thank God. I’m still less simple than them.
Heck, I inadvertently compared myself to a cat.
As a human being, I feel a sense of crisis…..
***
Tiling!
It was one gloomy afternoon when Jinwoo heard the Hunter Channel note notification.
‘Hehe, another one caught.’
Jinwoo recently made a lot of money. It was due to the transaction for the numbered ticket of Cafe Rieul.
It’s none of his business what the cafe is all about and why all Hunters are making fuss about the coffee. The only important thing was the piece of paper that could order a drink was traded for at least 10 rubies and an average of 20 rubies.
A cafe in a remote place in front of the Dungeon Gate suddenly rose to stardom. They rake up money every day. so it wouldn’t be obvious if he stole some money from the stupid Hunters. It’s mutually beneficial.
One thing that bothers him is that the cafe owner recognized him.
She has good eyes. He doesn’t know how she remembered him in that large crowd. Still, it’ll be annoying if he get caught.
‘Hmm, I should save myself for the time being.’
After peeling off and eating the stupid Hunters until today.
However, the note contained something he had not expected.
“He said he would sell me numbered ticket …? This much?”
It was about wanting to sell the numbered ticket of Cafe Rieul at 3 rubies per ticket. It’s a lot cheaper than the market price.
Jinwoo went to meet the person who sent the note with a half-doubt. If it smells fishy, he doesn’t have to make a deal. It was based on the calculation that there was nothing to lose just by meeting him.
The place of the deal that went out like that.
The opponent was a young boy who looked like someone who was ignorant of the world. He held out three numbered tickets to him while paying attention to his surroundings with a clumsy attitude.
The calculator ran quickly in Jinwoo’s head. At least 20 rubies per numbered ticket, and 30 rubies at best. It was a tremendous business.
“You’re going to sell this to me? Three rubies per ticket?”
“Yes … I don’t have time to go get coffee … Looking at the Hunter Channel, it seems like you’re trading the numbered ticket, so I was wondering if you’d get this too….”
Jinwoo spoke in a condescending manner as if he had been generous.
“I’ll give you 10 rubies for three tickets.”
“….! Thank you.”
However, before the other person who received the 10 rubies goes back, he suddenly said this.
“I … I can trade numbered tickets tomorrow as well. The day after tomorrow too.”
“….is that true?”
The other person said that there are numbered tickets that can be obtained through connections, and that he can sell three tickets every day. He was a total pushover. Jinwoo was about to tell him to bring as much as he wanted right away.
“But … instead, there is a condition.”

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c109:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

It occurred to me.
Since the atmosphere has been like this in the Hunter Market, some Hunters may also have a strong and weak tendency.
I, who was treated coldly as an F-class, received a different hospitality than before. It’s a typical cider situation, but I didn’t feel like boasting about how satisfying it is.
I just felt sick of it.
“I only sell coffee to people who get a numbered ticket by standing in the line.”

After saying that, I got up.
Come on, let’s finish our errands and go.
“More than that, I’d like to go to the consignment shop.”
“Yes? Hunter Kwon Rieul-nim, there are many items in our Hunter Market that are better than the lower-class items sold in consignment shops. Originally, it’s not items that anyone can see, but I’ll show them to you right away.”
“No, I have business in the consignment shop area.”
The staff was persistent. After repeating similar recommendations and specifications several times, I was able to escape from that VVIP room or whatever they called it.
“It’s not fun here.”
Ash muttered with a sullen expression. I totally agree with his statement.
I managed to leave thestaff who said they would guide me in person and entered the consignment shop area.
It’s the second time I’ve been here. When I first came, it was empty, but now various stalls have been opened, making it quite crowded. I headed to the shop in the most corner, inconspicuous of all. There were several items for beginners on the shelf, but no other customers were seen.
The shopkeeper greeted me with a bright smile.
“It’s been a while.”
“Grandma, how have you been?”
It was Grandma Kim Deokyi.
“Today you came with a cute little boy. Do you want this Grandmother to give you candy?”
“I’m not a kid….”
Ash didn’t seem to like the expression ‘little boy‘, but he quietly took candy. There was a rolling sound of candy in his mouth.
To find a way to deal with ticket scalpers, the person I consulted with was Grandma Kim Deokyi. Although she is retired now, I guessed that she would know how to do it because she is a Master in the production industry.
My guess was correct. Grandma Kim Deokyi said this after hearing the explanation over the phone.
— Hmm. If that’s the case, you can use that item.“Oh, do you know how to handle it?”— Yes, come visit me sometime“Then, I’ll visit you at the workshop.”— No. Let’s meet somewhere other than the workshop.“All right. Where should I go?”
Grandmother Kim Deokyi called me to this place, the consignment shop area of Hunter Market.
I found out that after retirement, she is hiding her identity and selling items for beginners as a hobby. Indeed, when I first met Grandma Kim Deokyi here, she was hiding her identity….
“But doesn’t anyone recognize your face?”
She is a famous Master Craftsman who is the representative of the 1st generation Hunters. That’s what I asked, but the old lady shook her head.
“Hohoo … surprisingly, people don’t look at other people’s faces very well.”
So far, no one has noticed her identity.
I stared at Grandma Kim Deokyi again.
Even though we were indoors, she wore a sun visor and silly Paisley-patterned pants with a gray arm sleeve on the arm. It was hard to recognize her as a craftsman by usual eyes.
Perhaps Grandma Kim Deokyi is enjoying the real life of a powerful woman.
No, rather … a secret connection who gives mysterious power to the main character seems to be more suitable to describe her.
One day, just one person, Grandma Kim Deokyi will give a rare item to a Hunter who treats her politely.
I’ve heard a lot about this development of, uh, if you know, you know. It’s the first law of the protagonist. Be kind to ordinary-looking old people.
I glanced around. A Hunter, who happened to meet my eyes, quickly approached us.
Hoo, is that him?
I watched him with excitement, but….
“Where is the bathroom here?”
Not at all. It seems that a person who has the main character traits doesn’t appear that easily.
“Oh, here. I brought what you said.”
I handed over the stainless steel thermos from the inventory. Inside, there were several cups of cafe romano.
Item: Cafe Romano (★★★★☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 01:00:00)Effect: Increases enchantment success rate by 200% for 1 time, and prevents item damage in case of enchantment failure.]
The effect of this coffee is as follows.
When I talked about the effect, Grandma said she wanted to try it. Since I came to see her for the first time in a long time, I have made it generously.
“Thank you … huu.”
Kim Deokyi, who was reading the status window of the cafe romano, sighed.
“If I had this coffee, I wouldn’t have had to break items like before….”
It seems that she has been heartbroken when she recalled the items that she had cracked during the enchant process. I hope she can use it usefully.
“This is the item for Miss Rieul.”
On the surface, it was a pen that looked like an ordinary digital pen. Soon after I received it, the status window appeared.
[Item: Sign Pen of Binding (★★☆☆☆)Don’t forget to write your name on things.When used, an item binding effect occurs to the first owner.]
“I made it in a hurry, but the effect will work.”
“….! Thank you!”
Binding refers to a phenomenon in which the item becomes completely the property of the owner. Simply put, it is similar to writing a name on an object. Items with your name on them cannot be sold to others. In other words, it’s non-transferable and non-tradeable.
Great. This is enough to drive out the resellers.
“Hohoho….”
Just by imagining the merchant panicked while holding a numbered ticket with binding effect, I laughed unconsciously. I put the sign pen into the inventory with a wicked smile, then Grandma suddenly spoke.
“Finally, you have regained the true power of the ring.”
Her eyes were on the Cthugha’s Ring.
“Yes? Ah, right.”
When I first received Cthugha’s Ring from Grandma, the status window was like this.
[Cthugha’s RingType: AccessoriesEffect: Unusable.]
However, after meeting Cthugha in the dungeon and signing a contract, the status window of the ring got updated.
[Cthugha’s Ring (★★★★★)A token of a contract with The Eternal Living Flame, CthughaWhen used by the appropriate user, Cthugha can be summoned.]
I haven’t summoned Cthugha because there’s nothing to do yet, but I can feel a different power than before just by wearing it.
The ‘stone containing his power’ that became the material of this ring was handed over to my grandmother by Cthugha. The stone revolved around and ended up in my hand. Could this be a mere coincidence?
Sure, solving the problem of ticket scalpers was an important matter, but the real reason I visited Grandma Kim Deokyi today was because I wanted to ask about the ring.
“Grandma, please tell me.”
“…..”
“How did you come to make this ring?”
***
On my way home from Hunter Market, I was lost in thought. I remembered what Grandma Kim Deokyi said to me a while ago.

“The stone that became the material of the ring was given to me by Park Heesun-ssi as the price of lending her the hand mirror.”
Ah, that hand mirror. I found it inside the cabin in the space at the request of  Grandma Kim Deokyi. We made Choi Yichan’s pendant with the broken mirror.
“I succeeded in making Cthugha’s Ring, but I couldn’t use that power.”“….”“When I asked Park Heesun-ssi, she said the ring was properly completed properly. She just said the right owner hasn’t shown up yet. She asked me to deliver the ring to the appropriate user.”“Don’t tell me … is that me?”
Grandma Kim Deokyi nodded. However, it was vague how she came to know that I was the right user. She told me that it’s like she heard a voice telling her I was the one.
In the end, I asked.
“What was my grandmother like?”“Let me see … she was too far away to be called a friend, so I don’t have much to say. One thing is for sure….”“….”“She was someone who saw things you wouldn’t normally see.”
A dim gaze reached me. The last words were filled with longing.
Hmm. There is something in common between the descriptions of my grandmother by people (and non-person) who remember her.
First, she wasn’t an Awakened. It wasn’t a development of ‘Is My Grandmother The Strongest Hunter of The First Generation?’ or ‘I Became The World’s Strongest Through My Bloodline‘.
Actually, I was looking forward to it, so it’s a pity.
However, it is certain that the grandmother had some mysterious power. Cthugha told me that she could read the stream of the stars. For now, t is unknown what exactly that power is.
Heck, if they’re going to return me to the past, I wish they could have sent me back to when my grandmother was still alive.
‘I miss my grandmother….’
Looking back, the reason I awakened was also because I went to my grandmother’s store.
Now it is just used as a place to grow crops, but the space in the store is also strange. Why there is a space like that in a building?
Maybe I move along the path my grandmother prepared for me?
‘Career planning should have been decided in consultation with the person concerned….’
If so, what is at the end of this? A one-on-one battle with a crazy pseudo-religious man? Saving the world?
Aye, this isn’t the case, though. I can help people clearing the dungeons through my cafe, but I’m only a helper.
Haha, ha…..
Only a helper … right?
Ah. Talking about the crazy pseudo-religious man.
When I decided to officially publicize Cafe Rieul, an unmanned security system was installed around the store. The crime prevention bell Ki Yoohyun gave me is also a valid security tool.
I prepared for the worst, but fortunately, I haven’t seen him yet. I hope he keeps not showing up like this….
“Look over there.”
At that time, Ash pulled my collar slightly. Gosh, I’ve been lost in my own thoughts for too long.
“Sorry. I was thinking about something else for a second. Let’s go. ….? What’s the matter?”
“……that.”
What Ash pointed to was a large electronic display board installed on the building opposite the road. It just so happened that the news was coming out. A news tap explaining road traffic conditions passed by, and Choi Yichan’s face appeared on the screen.
Soon there will be a big caption underneath.
The S-Class Hunter Choi Yichan, 6th in the Ranking …  confirmed to join The White Silver Guild.
Ah. It’s finally been officially announced.
I stood there with Ash and calmly watched the news screen. The news dealt with the information quite heavily, saying that the game of the Domestic Hunter Guild is blah blah blah.
The reason for my indifferent response is simple. I heard about it in advance yesterday.
Choi Yichan, who was finally freed from the Dungeon Management Office, stopped by our store yesterday. It had been almost a week since we returned from the dungeon.
I couldn’t say anything because it’s Choi Yichan’s own business. It is said that he was only released after taking tests on strength control training and related norms ranking, as well as ranking measurement in  his re-registration.
Hunter Registration … I finished it very quickly….
Before visiting the Hunter Market for the first time, I went to the community center to register as a Hunter. When I informed them that I was an F-class, I was handed over to the person in charge right away.
“Miss, please write your personal information here and give me your ID Card. Don’t forget to complete the safety training online within the period. Here’s your pamphlet.”
….that was the end of it.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c108:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Why did the post suddenly get deleted? What was it about? I became more curious because it got deleted.
I’ve come up with a determined spirit. I sat down and started browsing the posts on the Hunter Channel.
It was not an exaggeration to say that all Hunters registered in Korea use Hunchan, so it was not easy to find the information I wanted because it was a large community.
In addition, it was difficult to recognize because there were many cases where the title was written in an usual way to avoid showing up on the search result.

[Chatting] I went to get a numbered ticket today.
I found the most plausible title and clicked it….

[Chatting] I went to get a numbered ticket today.
Upvotes: 16 / Downvotes: 0

Writer: Lick Pink Jelly
(Photo)
I went there today, and the calico cat is so cute.It looked like a baked bread in front of the heater.I also gave it snacks ㅇㅅㅇ)v

— Cherry Dumplings: aw aw cute cat

……………………………………
It was completely unrelated.
No wonder Mieum didn’t eat a lot today. It must have been because she got snacks.
“Wae-waeooong! It’s rude to take a picture of this body without permission!”
Contrary to what she said, her face clearly showed joy.
“Kkyuu….”
Lime seemed to be disappointed because there was no talk about her.
Cheer up, Lime. You already have two ardent followers.
It took a long time to browse the Hunter Channel with the animals that kept interfering. This time, I found the post that I really wanted.
It was a new post that was posted 30 seconds ago.

[Chating] CFR numbers for tomorrow, number n0 (0)
Upvotes: 0 / Downvotes: 0

Writer: YY
NO HIT AND RUN.
Tomorrow’s numbered ticket n0, one for the early phaseThere’s one for the latter half of n0.
Write a note with the offer priceNo reply below 10 rubies


Hey, look at this.
Once I figured out the trick, I was able to find similar posts without difficulty.

 

Writer: YY
Bought today. Good condition.There are two cups left for an hour and a half of state retention time.Price 10 rubies per cup.Direct transfer message.NO HIT AND RUN & NEGO.


“What the…”
It was outrageous and it annoyed me.
I understand if you hand over the numbered ticket because you couldn’t come to the cafe due to a situation. You might want others to be able to taste the coffee instead of making the ticket wasted for nothing.
However, these posts reminded me of the time when I tried to get a concert ticket at the request of Shin Mira. There was only crazy ticket scalpers who wrote down a price that was several times the original price and came out like a trash human.
In other words, these posters are the same kind of guys. A merchant. Just look at the fact that they make a post with a temporary nickname, then deletes it immediately when they gets an offer.
What is transfer! It’s for sale and the price is 10 rubies?
Currently, the menu sold at the cafe is priced between 1 and 5 rubies. The cheapest Americano is 1 ruby. Since the price of whiskey sold at the Dimensional Shop was quite expensive, Irish Coffee was the most expensive at 5 rubies.
I’ve been asked to raise the price quite a bit. Previously, Ki Yoohyun also said that coffee prices were too cheap, but I have no intention of raising the price right now.
It was hard at first because I had to brew everything from coffee beans with my own labor. It’s like a cafe life that starts with zero.
However, now the coffee making is mostly automated. It costs little to make the ingredients, and once the beans are roasted, there is not much to do after that.
So, I think the price is reasonable.
I’m already rich enough to earn rubies one after another anyway. If I only think about money, there is no reason to do this labor. I’m just doing it because I want to run a cafe.
That’s it.
But when I saw them doing business with the coffee I made … I felt unhappy. Ash and I are working hard, but these bad resellers are earning money through our hardships.
Tiling. The system notification sounded just in time.
[A quest has occurred.]
[Sub Quest: Let’s Eradicate The Black Ticket Trade and Find The LightThis is a big deal!Bad reseller has appeared in your cafe.Let’s drive them out and create a healthy cafe culture together.
Drive out the merchant who takes unfair advantage: (Incomplete)Rewards: Experience (10 EXP), Fame (1), Popularity (2), Silver Teaspoon]
As if it was made in haste, the quest reward were small. Still, the compensation was not a problem right now. Even if the quest didn’t appear, I couldn’t leave it like this.
Hmm, what should I do….
“What’s wrong with you?”
As I stared at my phone and put on a hard expression, Ash poked his head. I showed the post I just found and briefly explained the situation to him.
“I can’t believe there are such vicious people….! It is an evil deed that even the primordial chaos would be astonished at.”
As expected, Ash, who works at the cafe with me all day, was furious. Let’s spend some time empathizing with each other using anger as fuel.
“We have to blow up meteor on such humans.”
“Huh … no, no, that’s not it! Ash, stop for a second!”
I hurriedly rushed to catch the part-timer of my house.
It’s very infuriating that the scalpers sold the numbered ticket and earned more money, but that doesn’t mean we can use force. After I explained that, Ash calmed down, but he asked me with a sullen expression.
“….what are you going to do then?”
Right, what should I do? Report it to the Dungeon Management Office or Hunter Channel?
That will only have a temporary effect. There is a limit to sanctions if it is regarded as an individual transaction. At best, they will delete the post, and the merchant will do business more secretly in the future.
This is a problem with black tickets and illegal trading at higher prices. The harm is great, but the grounds for legal punishment are ambiguous.
I can’t use force immediately as my radical part-timer suggested….
Still, I’m too angry to leave it alone.
After much consideration, I decided to ask Ki Yoohyun for his opinion. He’s a veteran Hunter, so he might have some good ideas.
I sent a KakaoTalk message with that in mind, and I received a reply right away.
[Ki Yoohyun]If you tell me the description of that person, I’ll take care of it. ^^
…….
Why are you asking about the description?
I have a hunch that ‘taking care of‘ that Ki Yoohyun mentioned is not a sincere conversation or persuasion. It was clear that this man’s idea was not much different from Ash.
After all, this happened because there was demand. Someone wants to get a numbered ticket comfortably without waiting even if they need to pay 10 rubies.
I wish I could systematically prevent this situation first rather than directly harming the merchant.
Is there any way……
….Ah.
I called one of the contacts on my phone. The dialing went short and soon the call was connected.
“Hello! Yes, it’s been a while since I contacted you. How have you been? I’d like to ask you a favor….”
***
“You can just rest.”
“Heh … a shady place is my path.”
It has become a regular holiday for Cafe Rieul.
It’s been a while, so I wanted to be idle all day long, but as soon as I woke up, I got ready to go out. The purpose, of course, was to find a way to deal with the ticket scalpers.
Ash also decided to go with me. He still has a brusque expression, but he seems excited to wear his new clothes.
It’s our first time going out together since we went shopping in Yongsan last time. Not to mention the trip to Yongsan ended up being a mess.
Maybe I should have taken him around a little more….
“Then, children, stay calm and guard the house.”
After a while, the sounds of ‘waeooong’ and ‘kyuuuu’ were heard from the corner.The animals were already busy playing and didn’t care about it, so I opened the door and left.
After leaving the store, I headed to the Hunter Market.
My steps are heavy. To be honest, I didn’t want to come. The last time I came to that place, the staff was so unkind.
It’s not like I’m hurt by every staff’s attitude that is so strong to the weak. Still, I don’t feel like I want to go get cold treatment….
“Haa….”
“What’s the matter? Aren’t you going in here?”
Since I was standing in front and I didn’t go straight into the entrance, Ash beckoned to me.
“Yeah, it’s useless to keep hesitating….”
There’s a saying that it’s better to get hit first.
“Yeah, I’ll go. Ash, come with me.”
In that way, I made my own determination and entered the entrance on the first floor of Hunter Market.
“Welcome. What can I do for you?”
A kind smile and a friendly tone greeted me, but I know this perfect customer service attitude will melt away like the snow the moment I give out my Hunter ID.
“Uh, I’m looking for something….”
It was the moment I was about to reveal my purpose with a trembling heart.
“Ah! I’m sorry I didn’t recognise you, Hunter-nim!”
“Yes?”
“Thank you for visiting Hunter Market. We will serve you with all our heart and soul to satisfy Hunter-nim today. I’ll take you to the VVIP room, so please come this way with your company.”
“What….?”
I happened to be dragged into the VVIP room and sat down. With its luxurious interior, the sofa was soft enough to fall asleep right there. The staff accepted my bag and coat, and as soon as we sat down, they served expensive refreshments and juices as a welcome food.
I didn’t come to buy anything, this excessive kindness was burdensome.
The question of why they suddenly dud this to me didn’t last long. The staff quiety approached me and talked to me.
“Hunter Kwon RieuI-nim, I have heard the reputation of Cafe Rieul well.”
“Haha … thank you.”
Aha.
I guess I was more famous than I thought I was. The coffee of Cafe Rieul is very popular, so I got this kind of treatment even though I’m an F-class?
The staff spoke again, showing excessive kindness by pouring juice into the empty juice glasses.
“Umh, could you give me the honor of tasting Hunter-nim’s coffee separately….?”
“You can come tomorrow morning and get the numbered ticket.”
However, the staff reacted with disdain.
“It’s not that….”
“……?”
“Our Hunter Market has a close relationship with many VVIPs. We have a long-standing relationship with not only the top rankers, but also the executives of the main office.”
“But….?”
“If you allow me to taste Hunter-nim’s coffee separately, you will be able to build a good relationship with many VVIPs. It will also help you establish your position in the Hunter World.”
As I said before, my coffee is popular, so try serving it to those high-ranking people as a bribe.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c107:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

The camera turned on a red light.
Mieum and Lime, who were bickering and running around the floor until a while ago, suddenly became quiet. They leaned on the cushion and turning their heads slightly, both of them seemed to be conscious of the camera.
On the contrary, Ash ran away to the corner, perhaps not wanting to be seen on the screen.
“Meow, meow.”
Mieum-ah, why are you suddenly crying out ‘meow meow’? Usually it was ‘waeoong’ or ‘waeooolg’.
Still, it wasn’t the right time to have this conversation.
“Yes, this is the menu…….”

The left arm and left leg went out at the same time. I introduced the menu with an awkward gesture.
I’m glad I have the ‘Smile‘ skill. Even though there’s a fault in my posture, my expression showed the perfect business smile.
“So you can look at the menu and order the menu that has the special effect you want.”
It was the first opening day when the formal registration process was completed in an instant and the embargo was lifted.
The Dungeon Management Office proposed filming an introduction broadcast to publicize accurate information about the cafe.
It’s a burden, but….
It’s important to give proper information at first. Think of it as a process you have to go through once you decide to reveal about the cafe. I accepted it with that kind of mind.
‘I had a hard time trying to stop Kwon Jiwoon from appearing on the broadcast….’
Today, reporters and several cameras rushed in to the cafe to film the first visitors.
The first customers to appear on the show was selected by lottery. They were three Hunters who seemed to be friends.
One of the customers who was looking at the menu with an excited expression suddenly asked.
“So what is the effect of this cold brew coffee? There’s nothing written here….”
“Ah. It’s random.”
“……random?”
“Yes. It’s a new menu that I made this time, and the type and amount of buffs applied are all random.”
The customers’ eyes seemed to sparkle and shine.
“Then I’ll have a cold brew.”
“I want a cold brew too.”
“Uh, I was going to have a cold brew too.”
The menu was unified in an instant. A reporter interrupted in a panic, probably because they wanted to film them ordering various menus for the broadcast.
“Wait, everyone…? There are a lot of different menus, are you not interested in this? For example, here, the caramel macchiato looks delicious.”
“No, you’re not a Hunter if you avoid a challenge.”
“Yes…? What does that have to do with the menu?”
“I accept this challenge!”
The reporter was forced to step down because of the stubbornness of the guests. I quickly made three cups of cold brew coffee and handed it to the customers.
“Wow! It’s real. A status window appeared, it said that this coffee gives random buffs.”
“I’m really looking forward to it.”
“Then let’s try it!”
The customers held a coffee cup in one hand and reacted as requested in advance in front of the camera.
It was awkward, but I was awkward enough, so there’s not much difference.
Immediately, customers drank all the cold brew coffee. They’re the prepared cast members so they didn’t forget to show their reactions that the coffee is delicious.
“…..! 80% increase in agility. Is this okay?”
“I have a 5% increase in Luck … It’s ruined, heung….”
Naturally, the gazes poured out to the last one. After drinking all the coffee, he briefly stared into the air to check his status window.
… and he roared.
“Aaaaaaaaaaaaaa! 200% strength!”
“……!”
“Is that true? Wow, that’s awesome!”
The reporter who was watching these various reactions was also interested in cold brew coffee. They asked if they could try a drink, so I made it right away.
“Mmm, it’s rich in scent … it tastes clean even until the end. It’s really delicious … oh.”
“Reporter-nim, what di you get?!”
“Wow. It’s … my intelligence has increased by 800%.”
“……!”
“Wow, awesome…..!”
This was the beginning of the Great Hunter Gacha era.
***
“The person over there, you can’t film YouTube!”
“Ah, wait a minute, the phone … yes, this is Cafe Rieul. No, I won’t be appearing on TV anymore. What? You’re going to promote it as a good restaurant? Don’t say scary things.”
“Next number, please come!”
“Ten cups of cold brew coffee, please.”
“I can only sell up to two drinks per person.”
“Don’t you know that the national rule is to draw 10 consecutive draws? The owner has also tried it, right?!”
I’ve tried it a lot….
“Still, I can only sell up to two cups.”
“Ugh … then I’ll have two cups, please.”
The customer who received the cold brew coffee sat down at an empty table and emptied a cup. They clenched their fists and shouted while looking into the air.
“Please, please, please aaaaah!”
……………………..
It’s someone who’s crazy about gacha….
“Waeooong (I don’t think you have any rights to judge that).”
“Kkyuu!”
After the broadcast filmed on the first day was aired, drawing became a huge boom among the Hunters. Hunters flocked from the next day, and they began to order cold brew coffee one after another.
The popularity spread out of control as a Hunter, who hit a jackpot in the cold brew coffee draw, certified that he had killed the boss monster in a dungeon in one shot.
The challenge is to take out the cold brew coffee from our store and then drink it at the dungeon to test and certify the effect.
Of course, I also like to draw. I once ate only collaboration red bean bread seven days a week to get a free draw ticket.
But no matter how much … why is this so popular?
As a result, such videos and articles have taken over the internet.
━ [Unprecedented] 1000% Agility, Great Cold Brew Effect━ I’m not good at lottery, but I want to catch the boss (edited version)━ Cold Brew Draw | Probability Verification | Dungeon Speedrun Challenge with Draw Effect
I don’t know if I can say it’s peaceful, what to say….
There was also an article saying that the speed of dungeon raids has increased thanks to the popularity of the challenge.
I’m glad to hear that it has a positive effect … I didn’t know there are so many people who like to draw.
It was said that lottery was a bad civilization, but for the time being, there seems to be a long way off from the disappearance of lottery from the world.
Due to the popularity of the Cold Brew Coffee, I was tempted to summon Cthugha for a while and use him as a part-timer. Still, supplementing the labor force is not a fundamental solution to this problem. 
I admitted that the relaxed YOLO life of the 5-day work-week system (※5 days off. This is important), which was my first goal after returning to the past, has already gone away. However, I couldn’t continue to be dragged around by these crazy lottery maniacs.
Here’s my status window at the moment.
[Name: Kwon RieulClass: Cafe Owner (F)(Lv. 17)Stamina 140/140, Energy 140/140Strength: 26 (+10), Intelligence: 21, Agility: 18, Luck: 19]
In the meantime, experience accumulated through cafe sales, and my level became 17.
Still, due to the low maximum energy, there was a limit to the amount that could be made in a day despite continuing to recover with coffee. For this reason, the sales method was changed by distributing numbered tickets to customers in advance.
If you submit a numbered ticket at your turn, you can purchase up to two cups per person. The cold brew coffee is also limited to one cup a day.
Other than that, if a Hunter, who entered through the ‘Connect Anywhere☆Mysterious Door‘ urgently needs recovery or buff, I decided to sell coffee to them regardless of the numbered tickets. The reason I decided to do this in the first place was because I wanted to help an injured Hunter. Urgent people come first.
Today’s last guest was Ju Noeul. She was with a party that seemed to belong to the Royal Guild.
“Oh! It’s finally our turn. Cold brew coffee … is already out of stock. Then I’ll have a cookie set, please. What about the guild leader?”
“I’m fine with Americano … more than that, Rieul-ssi, can I follow you on Instagram?”
“Ahaha, of course. I’ll follow you back.”
In the process of officially promoting the cafe, I unintentionally became quite famous. After the official cafe opening, the number of Instagram followers on my account, where I had posted a few pictures of coffee cups then forgot its existence, increased tremendously.
“Huh….?”
I was surprised when I opened the app to follow Ju Noeul’s Instagram.
There was a DM from Lee Chorok, a former dungeon-farm owner and current fruit store part-timer. The content was, “I will send you a Shine Muscat directly from the production area, so can you promote it on Instagram?”.
‘You’re doing well….’
It was a pity that the dungeon farm was closed, even though it was her fault. At least the fruit shop life seems to suit her aptitude.
After Ju Noeul went back, I checked my watch. It was time to distribute the numbered ticket.
“Ah, time’s up. Eat this and rest.”
After giving Ash the snacks, I headed to the front of the store with the numbered tickets I prepared in advance. There was already a long line of customers waiting to get a numbered ticket. Seeing so many people, I was deeply moved.
“Here’s the ticket. Thank you.”
I was handing out numbered tickets one by one in order.
Suddenly, I found someone I thought I’d seen somewhere. He was a middle-aged man with an ordinary impression, but the scarf pattern around his neck was unusual and drew attention. I saw him somewhere.
Ah, I remembered.
“Oh! You came to get a ticket yesterday too. You must really like coffee!”
It’s a little embarrassing to say with my own mouth, but … the numbered ticket distribution, which is conducted twice a day in the morning and evening, is currently quite competitive. It’s hard for even old regulars to visit every day.
I thought it was amazing to come for two days in a row, so I talked to him lightly.
“Ahem … what….”
Nod. The customer who took the numbered ticket shyly averted his gaze and left.
I looked at his back casually and realized a sense of incongruity a beat later.
Wait. That customer, he never came to buy coffee?
Did I not recognize him when he ordered coffee? It could be, but … it’s a bit uncomfortable.
Something similar happened again. Most of the customers who received the numbered tickets came to buy coffee. However, some people received the tickets for several days in a row, but I don’t remember seeing them at the cafe.
Is it simply that I was too busy to remember?
No. I thought that was not the case. There’s a reason for this.
“Kkyuuu…?”
“What’s wrong, waeeoong!”
“Darkness is encroaching on your side.”
Once I finished distributing the numbered ticket, I returned to the cafe. After finishing the closing and organizing the cafe, I accessed the Hunter Channel and searched for information about our store.
I searched by changing keywords, but what came out was only ordinary small talk, appreciation post, and challenge certification.
“Is it not here….”
“What are you looking at by yourself, waeoong!”
Just as I was trying to avoid Mieum, who interrupted me from the side, a plausible title caught my eye.
[Chatting] Cafe R Ticket number 10 sorry
“Ah. This is it.”
I clicked on the text right away, but I couldn’t read the contents.
(This post has been deleted.)
The post was erased the moment I was about to read it.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c106:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.


The Hunter thought, it’s a boring dungeon.
There’s never been such a boring dungeon like this one. The Hunter waved his hand nonchalantly with a tired expression. The dagger, which flew in a parabolic arch motion, accurately stabbed the monster in the forehead. The monster that was weaker weaker than his level died leaving only the ether ore intact.
With a bored expression, the Hunter retrieved the ether ore and put it in his inventory. This is the hundredth. However, there is still a long way to go before reaching the target.
“Haa….”

The Hunter had no luck with guild. After wandering through several guilds, he was finally able to get accepted in his current guild. 
The problem is that he cannot be promoted to a regular guild member unless he meets the ether ore quota. In addition, if he resigned in the middle, he cannot find items that have been ripped off as a membership deposit.
That’s why for a few days, he’s having a round to get a high-purity ether ore in the already stabilized dungeon. He has already made a few laps around this dungeon. Now, he could memorize the location of the monsters spawn, the terrain, and even the shelter. He’s going crazy. He can see why repetition is driving people crazy.
“Ah … I want to quit.”
The Hunter casually sank on the floor of the safe zone.
As he caught monsters in a row, his stamina was slightly reduced, so he took out a potion and drank it. Since it was not a high-quality potion, he couldn’t even enjoy the taste.
He want to eat something delicious other than this.
He want to lie down and watch TV after having a glass of beer with chicken.
No, that’s not it. More than that….
Come on, let’s not think about it. If you miss what you don’t have, you’ll only feel the tastelessness of the potion.
While he was standing up again to return to the boring work, he noticed a door. It was an ordinary door that was suitable for a family house.
He memorized all the topographical features of this dungeon. He has never seen anything like that before….
After a moment of hesitation, the Hunter decided to surrender to curiosity. Whatever lies beyond, it won’t be as boring as continuing to farm ore in this dungeon.
He approached and opened the door with that kind of mind … and found a cafe. A real cafe.
The door led to a cafe outside the dungeon.
“Ah … where … how did you get here?”
The cafe owner, who seemed to have not expected the appearance of the Hunter, opened her eyes wide. She has a soft impression.
It is not uncommon for indeterminate warp gates to occur in dungeons since the flow of irregular ethers randomly intertwines with ethers in other spaces. It’s the first time he saw a gate in the shape of a normal door, and it leads to a cafe outside the dungeon, but….
The Hunter soon realized that he couldn’t get out of the 1 meter radius of the door. However, the distance was enough to order a coffee. Yes, he just wanted to drink a sweet coffee.
It was when he returned to the tedious farming work, chewing on pieces of dalgona in his coffee, that the strange change strucked him.
“Eh….?”
A monster fell. He felt an incomparable power.
***
Lesson of the Day: Let’s read the description carefully to the end.
“Kiyaong, you realize that so quickly!”
“…..”
“It would have been nice if you had thought of that from the moment you awakaned. Tsk tsk tsk, you skipped all the beautiful phrases written by the great system, and now you’re tasting the price of skipping, waeoong!”
“……….”
I put Mieum in front of the heater and put a lot of cereal in her bowl. Fortunately, Mieum did not talk to me anymore as she was chomping and filling her stomach.
A few days ago, a customer came from the dungeon for the first time through Connect Anywhere☆Mysterious Door. Since then, customers from the dungeon have consistently appeared through the door. The place where they originally came from was different.
“Huh? This is the Dungeon of Banyabong Peak in Jirisan Mountain.”“Hey, you guys! Come here and order coffee. Ah, this place? This is Gimcheon.”“Hello?”
This is what I heard. The door was randomly created in dungeons in various places, and it is said that if you open them, all of them will be connected to the Cafe Rieul.
Just connected, the person beyond the door could not come in more than a meter. It was also impossible to open the door at Cafe Rieul and go out to a random dungeon.
Now, let’s re-read the description of ‘Connect Anywhere☆Mysterious Door’.
(※ The official name is a Personal, Space-Connected One-Way Door, but it is serviced with a familiar name to help you understand.)
It says ‘one-way‘ in ‘connected‘.
It really only connects to one side. Well, there’s nothing wrong with that…….
I was puzzled because it’s working in a completely different way from what I had guessed by looking at the name.
Anyway, a customer is a customer. 
It’s a little unfair that I installed it excitedly because I got a new item, but it only increased my work.
I decided to sell coffee to the hunters who appeared through this door. In fact, isn’t fighting in the dungeon the moment when you need recovery coffee the most?
In order to process the orders quickly, a ‘Comfortable Walk-Through Counter’, which was received as an achievement reward, was installed in front of the door. It was a stronger and cleaner counter than the one I made to sell coffee to the fire spirits.
“Kuu … I can’t get any damage done because of the debuff.”
“Try this Americano.”
“……!”
The Hunter with their eyes wide open exclaimed ‘Tasty!’.
The door opened again and a Hunter appeared.
“The dungeon boss will appear soon, so I want to strengthen my skills.”
“Hmm … how about this vanilla latte?”
“Yaaay! Critical Hit!”
Just before the door closes, I can hear the magnificent roar of the boss who was hit by the skill. There’s a lot of noise between the walls.
“Huu … even if I continue to pour healing skills, but the recovery is still slow.”
This time it was several deeply wounded Hunters. I made several cups of cafe mocha and handed them over.
In this way, I also recommended coffee that has an appropriate effect for Hunters. I was proud to see the actual effects of my coffee and the Hunters that like them.
I’ve worked so hard.
“Euugh … uuh….”
I soon reached my limit.
In addition to the increase in the number of customers, there were many things to pay attention to because the customers came in directly from the dungeon.
There was no way it could go on for a long time in this illegitimate way.
“Is it time to make a decision….”
“Kkyuu….?”
As Ki Yoohyun suggested before, I should officially register <Cafe Rieul>.
I didn’t like it because it made me look too much like a Hunter when I registered it formally and claiming ‘It’s a coffee that has buff effects‘.
“Aren’t you a Hunter, waeoong!”
Pakpakpak. Heavy front paws flew at me.
“It’s a matter of feelings, feelings.”
A secluded cafe that you accidentally stumbled across in front of the dreary Dungeon Gate. A comfortable and cozy time. You feel better after drinking the delicious coffee. All I wanted was something like this.
“Do you know what kind of traditional fairy tale the world you imagined is…..”
I heard a sermon from a cat.
“It seems hopeless already.”
Ash, who finished washing a mountain of dishes, said the same thing.
Unlike the customers I met inside the cafe, it bothered me to see the Hunters fighting in the dungeon through the door. As expected, I want to help what I can help.
Earlier, a Hunter came through the door with a severe wound. They ran out of potions. I recommended cappuccino, which has a ‘40% stamina recovery‘ effect. The Hunter, who quickly recovered after drinking the cappuccino, thanked me.
“Thank you. You saved my life. I will not forget this kindness.”“No. I already got paid for the coffee.”“Even so, the fact that you have been a great help to me doesn’t change.”
The Hunter  bowed then disappeared through the door again. I realized at the same time that I felt proud of this.
I’m already bad at playing the role of an innkeeper in a beginner’s village, at least in this lifetime…..
“Yoohyun-ssi, you made a suggestion before.”
“Ah. You mean the proposal to formally reveal Rieul-ssi’s skill and coffee.”
The No. 1 ranker, who seems to have a hobby of drinking coffee in our store, answered.
“Yes, that one. I made up my mind. I’ll accept it.”
As soon as I finished speaking, I heard a ringing sound of a cheerful notification.
[Congratulations! You finally have the mindset of a Cafe Owner.][The condition has been met.In the future, the status window and effect of coffee can be viewed by others.]
[Achievement: The Mindset of a Cafe OwnerYou were determined to benefit the world with coffee.
Reward: Cold Brew Coffee Recipe]
No, I didn’t make such a grandiose decision….
I was perplexed at the grand expression.
Unless they had a special skill like Ki Yoohyun, I was the only one who could see the accurate status window of the coffee I made. Others just feel the effects with their bodies. But now, if other people can see the coffee status window, more accurate information will be delivered.
Since then, the administrative process has proceeded without major obstacles. Ki Yoohyun also helped a lot.
It was quickly approved as a Hunter-based special business with a piece of paperwork and a due diligence showing the actual coffee making. In consideration of the echo of the birth of the unique potion that has never been seen before, an official announcement date for releasing the embossing was set.
And the day before the official announcement,
I was grinding a lot of coffee beans.
***
Soon, it will be the first day that Cafe Rieul, which has been officially registered as a special business, will take its first step.
It would be nice to have a new menu since it’s been a while. With that in mind, I decided to prepare the most recently obtained recipe, Cold Brew Coffee.
There was also an intention that once the undiluted solution was made, it could be diluted and sold quickly.
If it was a small roaster that I used before,mI would have given up because it was cumbersome to prepare a lot of coffee beans, but now it is worth doing it because there is a fully automatic large roaster for businesses.
I went into the space and moved the beans from the bean storage bag. Then, I put green beans in the roaster and lit them. It was a ‘completely automatic‘ structure that was completed on its own where the result was put into the storage box.
In the meantime, this space has developed a lot.
‘Shoo, shoo, shook, shook.’
I just planted it, but the tooth carrot that grew well on its own was biting hard again today.
Next to it was the place where the suspicious seeds received from Lee Chorok were planted, but they have not sprouted yet.
‘Those carrots don’t suck up all the nutrients, right….?’
I’ve put in a lot of crops and machines in this space.
“Mmmmmeh!”
Yeah, there’s a cow too.
I stroked the snorting cow as if not to leave her out. Perhaps because I wasn’t with Lime, the cow showed an unpleasant reaction.
The cow has yet to be named. I can’t come up with a name that fits perfectly. Let’s think about it more slowly.
Anyway, the coffee beans brought to the store were ground thickly into the size of thick salt. After putting a filter in a large container, I poured the coffee bean powder and cold water, then I mixed it well.
[Item: Cold Brew Coffee extract (★★☆☆☆)Status: ExtractingTime Remaining: 12:00:00]
The next morning, just 12 hours later, the extract was filtered through a filter to be completed.
I tried making cold brew coffee right away by adding water and ice.
[Item: Cold Brew (★★★★☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 01:00:00)Effect: Get a random percentage of one random buff effect.]
Oh. Both types and amounts of buff effects were random. It’s like we’re doing a lucky draw.
This new menu will cause a bigger sensation than I thought.
