SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c105:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

I opened the window.
The cold wind blew in relentlessly. The stone wall of the Great Dungeon Abyss, which always looks dreary, greeted my eyes. It is still the same lonely view where there is no convenience store nearby. The store was well-located in the desolate 16th Street, Dungeon Gate 3.
This is my morning routine these days. Due to the incident where the entire store was taken to the dungeon a few days ago, the immobility of this property has been my concern. 
Sure, I met Cthugha and Pepe, solved the milk problem, and thanks to the fish I received from the spirits, I’ve had plenty of fish for several days…..
I gained a lot, but I didn’t want to go through the same thing again.

“It’s cold.…”
Ash, who just woke up in the morning, opened the door and complained in a sullen voice. I quickly closed the road window and turned up the heater.
“Eh, are you cold? I’m sorry. Right, Ash is weak, so you shouldn’t catch a cold. Sit in front of the heater.”
“….I’m not that weak.”
Although he tried to pretend otherwise, Ash did not avoid the heater. What a dishonest fellow.
“Unyaaa….”
“Kkyuuuu…..”
In the warmest place, Mieum and Lime were already stretched their bodies.
It’s really winter now.
There was also one more thing I got from the dungeon. It is the ‘Connect Anywhere ☆ Mysterious Door‘.
The name is intuitive, it’s easy to understand even for me . It means that I can connect anywhere through this door. I was curious when I received this as the quest reward, but I was busy with camping. I finally managed to bring it up now.
[Item: Connect Anywhere ☆ Mysterious Door (★★★★☆)(※ The official name is a Personal, Space-Connected One-Way Door, but it is serviced with a familiar name to help you understand.)It connects anywhere.It can be installed inside the cafe. Please pay attention to the direction when installing.]
[Choose the location where you want to install the Mysterious Door and select “Install“]
I took out the door from my inventory and selected a suitable blank wall I had previewed. A message soon came up.
[Do you want to install the Mysterious Door?Yes ☜ / No]
[Installing the Mysterious Door. Progress: 0%][Installing the Mysterious Door. Progress: 0.01%]
…….
[Installing the Mysterious Door. Progress: 0.02%]
It was surprisingly slow. I feel like I’m going to explode if I wait for the installation to finish.
I can’t. I’m busy preparing for the opening of the cafe after breakfast, so I’ll check it again after the business is over.
After preparing for sales, I opened the door on time. Soon, customers with faces that lacked caffeine opened the door and rushed in.
“Welcome. Have you decided on your order?”
Thus, the usual day began.
There are still many problems and concerns, but I am planning to spend a day faithful to my main job today. My main job is a Cafe Owner. If I continue caring about dungeon or whatever it is, I might as well lose my job.
“If you feel cold, I recommend this new menu, Irish coffee.”
Mundane life is precious…….
If there was one thing I was wondering about, it was Ash’s behavior.
Ash, he is so….
“Ah, I need to wipe the table … huh?”
The table was already sparkling without a speck of dust.
“Then I have to wash the dishes … huh?”
Ash, who had just finished washing the stacked dishes, wiped the water off his hands.
“Ah, that customer left his phone. I have to catch up and bring it to him … Huh, Kim Ash, where are you going?”
Ash, who hurriedly ran, returned the phone to its owner and came back to the store.
“Ash, let’s get some rest now.”
“I need to do this.”
… he worked too hard.
Originally, he was a genius part-timer, but today he moved quickly as if he were using cloning magic. The order was processed quickly, but I was worried that he might collapse.
“Ash, come here.”
“What’s wrong?”
Taking advantage of the temporary absence of customers, I half-forced Ash to sit in the chair. I put Lime on his lap and gave him snacks and coffee to completely block his action.
However, while eating a the apple jam cookie that I served as a snack, Ash flinched and looked toward the counter.
No way… is our part-time a workaholic?
I can’t let this happen. Workaholic is an incurable disease. To feel joy while jumping into the swamp of labor on his own, I couldn’t let Ash be afflicted with such a terrifying disease.
“Ash, I’m going to work alone today, so would you like to rest? Right, how about contacting Shinwoo and Shinhee? They must have missed you too.”
“….you don’t need me?”
No, why does the conversation end up like that?
Although I explained that it was not the case, Ash still had a serious expression on his face. He poked the apple jam cookies with his fork for a moment before finally opening his mouth again.
“If I do all the work by myself … you’re not going to hire a new part-timer.….”
“Huh? I don’t have plans to find a new part-timer?”
Having Ash here is already enough, and there’s no way I can easily get it just because I want to.
“What about the guy from before?”
“Who? Ah, you mean Yichan?”
“……”
He nodded his head suspiciously. He must have heard that Choi Yichan used to be a temporary part-timer.
Aside from the fact that Choi Yichan was a terrible cafe part-timer, his part-time job was almost dedicated to play with the animals.
Choi Yichan is currently being held by the Dungeon Management Office. The renewal of the Hunter’s rank and the ranking measurement were completed, but there were several procedures left.
Because of that, I haven’t heard what he was going to say yet.
“Hey, Yichan doesn’t work part-time here. There was a special situation before. Why would an S-class Hunter have a part-time job here?”
“….I see.”
“And as long as I have Ash, it’s already enough. Still, let’s take it easy.”
“Keu-ahemm! I can’t help it if you say that.”
Ash ate the apple jam cookie. He pretended not to, but I saw the corners of his mouth rising slowly.
Then the door opened again and a customer came in.
I told Ash that he shouldn’t get up until he ate all the snacks and headed for the counter. Behind my back, I could hear the animals aiming for the cookie crumbs and Ash fighting to defend his plate.
“Welcome.”
The customer was a regular who often came to our store for coffee.
“Hello. I came yesterday too, but it was a pity that the cafe wasn’t open yesterday.”
“Ahaha….”
I was actually a little worried about this.
The business has been going well lately, so there must have been customers who came when I was dragged into the dungeon. Then, they must have seen the whole store gone.
How am I supposed to explain the situation where the entire store disappeared and then reappeared? Am I allowed to say that I was summoned to the Dungeon and then returned?
Should I say that the building was demolished in a day and rebuilt in a day?
It’s unbelievable…..
However, the regular customer said this in a casual tone after completing the order.
“I heard the building was being repaired? Are the repairs finished?”
“What? Ah, yes, yes! It’s done.”
The ensuing customers had similar reactions.
“Old houses always have problems one by one.”“In my house, the boiler always explodes in the winter.”“I heard the water pipe was broken? I know a good repair shop, do you want me to introduce it to you?”
What’s going on here….
While the store disappeared, all the customers knew that the building’s water pipe had burst, so the cafe was temporarily closed.
Someone who has the ability to do this … there is only one person.
Tinkle, the door opened with the sound of a bell, and that one person came inside. It was Ki Yoohyun.
“Hello.”
“Yoohyun-ssi, what did you do while I was away?”
“What are you talking about all of a sudden?”
“The customers thought our water pipe had burst.”
“….Ah. Yes, I thought the problem would get bigger, so I slightly tweaked it.”
According to Ki Yoohyun, this was his reasoning: it was quite rare for a building to disappear without a rift. In order to prevent the repercussion, he used his skill in the empty space where the store disappeared to create a large-scale optical illusion effect.
The effect was to show the illusion of a store with a sign on its door that said, “We take a break due to building maintenance issues” to those who approached the store. 
“It’s just a simple trick. It doesn’t work for a hunter who’s stronger than me.”
But at least in Korea, a Hunter who is stronger than Ki Yoohyun…..
… there is none.
At first glance, it seems quite amazing to be able to say, “I slightly tweaked it“.
Anyway, I’m thankful that I avoided the troublesome things.
As a token of appreciation, I decided to treat him to coffee. Since I turned on the heater, the indoor air was warm, so I wanted to drink a cold drink. I made two iced Americanos and took Ki Yoohyun to a table in the corner.
“I’ve been curious about something for a long time.”
I moistened my throat with cold coffee, then I stared at the regressor and the No. 1 Ranker in front of me. He also took a sip of coffee and made eye contact with me.
“Do you remember when we first met? When Yoohyun-ssi was standing in front of me with a very suspicious appearance.”
“…. did I look suspicious?”
“Yeah? Then, did you think that you’re not suspicious at all until now?”
“…..”
“…..”
We were briefly shocked for our own reasons.
“Ah, anyway, when Yoohyun-ssi came, I was temporarily unable to open the system window.”
Ki Yoohyun rolled his eyes. He took a sip of the iced Americano slowly. It was the reaction of a person who was obviously did something wrong.
“Don’t tell me you really blocked someone else’s system window?!”
“No, no, I didn’t. That’s not it.”
Ki Yoohyun hurriedly waved his hand.
“No matter what, I do not have that ability. The system is a unique area of each hunter and cannot be easily invaded. It’s just….”
“You did something.”
“In order to find out information about Rieul-ssi and this building, I spread the white light net….”
Ki Yoohyun, startled by my expression, blurted out his words. He shrugged his shoulders and let out a helpless laugh.
“Look, please. I told you I’m a regressor. This place was an abandoned house before the regression. I had no choice but to doubt the part that had changed from the past..”
“That … I see. Why has it changed, ahaha….”
I lifted my coffee cup and hid my awkward smile.
“In that case, this is the possibility I can think of. The system may have voluntarily blocked it to keep any information about Rieul-ssi or this store from me.”
“Is it possible for the system to do that … No, it’s possible, yes.”
I thought of the Saintess and immediately agreed.
The Saintess said she created system. It was plausible, considering her mysterious power and her tendency to intervene arbitrarily.
Then, I suddenly thought of my uncle.
As soon as he returned from the dungeon, Kwon Jiwoon investigated the disappearance of Uncle’s ability. The result has not changed. The uncle’s ability disappeared and his system window was completely inaccessible.
However, is it possible for an Awakened to become a normal person completely, not something caused by debuffs or abnormal conditions?
If Ki Yoohyun’s hypothesis is correct….
There is a possibility that the connection between my uncle and the system window was cut off to avoid someone’s surveillance.
In addition, he knew about Cthugha’s ring … what on earth have you been up to, Uncle?
‘Wouldn’t my uncle know more about my grandmother?’
Ever since I met Cthugha, I’ve been thinking about finding out more about my grandmother.
With that thought in mind, I sent my uncle a Kakaotalk message saying that I would like to see him, but….

[Uncle] (MountainLife-Vlog) Healing Life in the Mountains After Retirement: Act 2 of Lifehttps://youtu.be/******
[Me]What is this?
[Uncle]Niece! This Big Uncle started his own YouTubePlease subscribe, like, and turn on the notifications~~

I’m glad that he’s happy…..
It’s going to be a complicated story, so I want to meet him in person and talk to him as soon as possible. Still, I guess I’ll have to wait a little while until he came back.
There were these little things, but anyway, my day went by as usual. The essence of slice-of-life, the daily life of mundane life. It was a satisfying day….
[The installation of the Mysterious Door has been completed.]
“Huh?”
….until the first Hunter opened the door and appeared.
Beyond the open door, I could see the view of an unfamiliar dungeon.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c104:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Page Ten: Cafe Rieul is Always With You

The guild leader’s office located on the top floor of The White Silver Guild.
A few days ago, the guild leader was suddenly replaced, so the place was still untidy. The staff announced the arrival of the visitor with a knock.
Kwon Jiwoon, who headed to the drawing room, leaned deeply on the sofa and looked at the visitor.
“What’s the matter? The friend of my sister, and my friend now.”
“…Hello.”
Choi Yichan bowed his head.

Choi Yichan, who had been held captive by the Dungeon Management Office for a full week, was finally released yesterday, and the ranking was updated.
Ranked 6th on his first registration. It was a phenomenal result.
Kwon Jiwoon slightly frowned as he recalled that his ranking had fallen by a notch thanks to that. He wasn’t obsessed with the Hunter rankings, but it didn’t feel good to lose the ranking he had maintained for a long time.
“I heard you’re recruiting Hunters here.”
“I heard the general story. The reason why Hunter Choi Yichan said he wanted to meet me this early in the morning. Our staff ran out of breath to inform me after you contacted us.”
“Then, could you accept me into the guild?”
Choi Yichan, who immediately brought up the main point, was still in a daze. Kwon Jiwoon lifted the tea cup on the table, moistened his throat, and opened his mouth slowly.
“Before that, I want to ask you something. What is the benefit for Hunter Choi Yichan to join The White Silver Guild?”
“…..”
“We don’t even know each other, so let’s be more honest. Currently, The White Silver Guild has little real power compared to its past fame.”
The words that followed revealed difficulties that could not be hidden.
“My father … haa, he can’t just throw everything at me … he told me that he wanted to appear on ‘I am a Natural Person’.”
“Ha, haha….”
Thinking it was a joke to lighten the mood, Choi Yihan tried to laugh. However, he had no choice but stop laughing when he saw Kwon Jiwoon’s expression.
That troubled look.
He’s serious….
He’s truly glad that his father, who has been missing for years, has returned. However, as a result, Kwon Jiwoon had one more headache.
He urged him to meet Kwon Rieul in a hurry, but when they returned from the dungeon, he disappeared with only the words that he would return to their hometown this time.
It seems like he has a plan based on his meaningful tone.
Does he … is that the case?
“I don’t know what the hell he’s thinking….”
“…….”
Choi Yichan offered silent consolation.
“Ahem, hm. I’m ashamed to say this since it’s an internal affair, but our guild is in a situation where a lot of people are missing and we have to rebuild the guild from scratch. It is difficult to treat Hunter Choi Yichan appropriately for his abilities.”
“That’s all right. That kind of thing….”
Kwon Jiwoon’s words continued even before Choi Yichan could say anything.
“As far as I know, Hunter Ju Noeul contacted you. Although she looks carefree on the outside, she leads her guild with integrity. Won’t you like their terms better?”
“She … I met her yesterday and refused.”
Kwon Jiwoon sighed inwardly.
No wonder ‘Lime Love Team‘ kept writing depressing things on Hunter Channel this morning, so this was the reason.
“What about Cheongna? Coincidentally, I’m close with Hunter Han Yiseong. It’s a high-class guild.”
“I have no intention of going there.”
Hoo. That’s an unexpectedly firm tone.
Kwon Jiwoon rested his chin on his hand. A crooked smile is hidden in the palm of his hand.
Naturally, the sight he saw a few days ago came to mind. The day he returned with his younger sister from the Garden of the Eternal Living Flame, Cthugha.
The man who caught Kwon Rieul, Ki Yoohyun.
When he saw him before, he couldn’t look at it properly because he didn’t have much time, but he looked very close to Rieul.
It also reminds him of Choi Yichan’s expression when he saw them.
‘It’s easy to understand.’
Now, Kwon Jiwoon found his position both funny and unpleasant. He chose the last words to conclude the interview. The displeasure on his face was not completely hidden.
“I think you already know that I care a lot about my younger sister, Rieul, even if I don’t say it.”
“….Yes.”
Choi Yichan nodded slightly.
“But that doesn’t mean that I will meddle in my sister’s relationships. Whatever happens, I won’t do it. If Rieul likes it, then I….”
Kwon Jiwoon swallowed his breath for a moment. That’s what he said, but it was not a good feeling to have someone hanging around his younger sister. With a sigh, he spat out his irritation and continued.
“…..I will accept it no matter who it is.”
“I suppose so.”
“If you’re trying to join this guild because I’m the family of Kwon Rieul, it means you should go home because you offended me, Hunter Choi Yichan.”
Choi Yichan was silent for a moment.
He was wondering if there was anything important to ask for a meeting this early in the morning, but it was a waste of time. He was about to raise his body and tell him to get things sorted out, but then Choi Yichan opened his mouth again.
“Even if the person is Muwon?”
“…….”
Kwon Jiwoon looked at Choi Yichan quietly without even moving.
“Haha, you’re not surprised.”
“No, I was surprised … that Hunter Choi Yichan knows about it.”
Han Yiseong did not directly reveal Muwon’s identity to Kwon Jiwoon. He didn’t even think about digging the information.
However, there are things that you naturally notice when you interact for a long time. For example, things like the identity of the Hunter that Han Yiseong is particularly concerned about.
It was only a vague guess, but he just became convinced.
The reason he pretended not to know the obvious was simple. This is because all Hunters of the current generation feel a sense of debt to Muwon to some extent.
Kwon Jiwoon recalled an incident from long ago. It happened not long after he awakened.
An A-Grade rift broke out in the middle of downtown Changwon. Of course, it’s a contingency.
It was also the day Kwon Jiwoon experienced his first real fight. It was harder than the thought to treat a person who was pouring blood in critical condition. Far from being proud of having fulfilled his mission, he just wanted to run away.
Then, someone shouted, ‘We’re alive now!’. He was going to ask ‘what nonsense are you talking about when the situation is so serious?‘, but when he looked up, he was there.
It was far away, but it was clearly visible. It was the sight of only one person repairing the distorted and twisted space with a net of light and returning it to its original form.
He vividly remembers the emotions he felt that day.
A feeling of inferiority, longing, jealousy, goodwill … there is a sense of indebtedness at the base of the countless emotions toward Muwon.
Therefore, it’s worth showing his loyalty by preventing that person’s identity from being revealed in a form he doesn’t wish for.
It wasn’t difficult for Kwon Jiwoon to read the still intact boundary in the quiet man in front of him. Then, how did this newly awakened S-class learn about Muwon’s identity and become wary of him?
“He, that person, Muwon, will be the one who will resurrect the demon of the Great Dungeon Abyss.”
The conversation jumped into a ridiculous place. The strongest Hunter in existence resurrects the Demon? That sounds unreasonable.
Kwon Jiwoon slightly narrowed his eyes and spoke.
“I don’t think it’s good to speak ill of your rival.”
Abyss is a large dungeon in the form of a tower divided into several floors. The hypothesis that something scary is asleep on the top floor has been around for a long time. However, the current generation of Hunters simply do not have the power to reach the end yet.
How far did the attacking progress go … he was in the middle of estimating it in his head.
“If The White Silver is just a small guild, as the guild leader said, why did C&L aim for The White Silver in the first place?”
“……you know something.”
“More than the guild leader thinks. For example, there must be an old artifact in The White Silver that hasn’t been unsealed yet.”
“….!”
It was unpleasant for an outsider to mention the internal circumstances of the guild.
Kwon Jiwoon rested his hand on chin again. This time, the hardened mouth was hidden in his plan.
“Isn’t Hunter Choi Yichan an S-class Berserker? Detection … no, do you have a prophecy skill?”
“You can meet a prophet.”
His eyes are full of conviction. There must be something.
“I don’t believe in occult. Hunter Choi Yichan, be careful if anyone sells amulets or jars.”
“……Haha.”
Choi Yichan grabbed the pendant around his neck.
The small black stone sparkled exceptionally and stood out on the edge of his neck. He traced the shape of the black stone with his thumb and thought for a moment, as if it was an important object.
“When I was young, I was caught in a rift. The person who saved me was Hunter Kwon Seokmin. I have always thought that if I became a Hunter, I would definitely return the favor.”
“…..”
“You look like you don’t believe me at all.”
“Isn’t it too coincidental to bring the story up now?”
Choi Yichan shyly scratched the back of his head.
“Haha, really. I want to join the guild to repay his kindness, so you can think about it that way.”
“During the week when Hunter Choi Yichan memorizes the new awakening safety rules at the Dungeon Management Office,”
“…..”
Choi Yichan’s face darkened when he recalled the time of hardship.
“I did some research on my father’s condition. The cause is unknown, but it’s true that the ability has disappeared. My father … is really a natural man … No, he wants to retire, so he wouldn’t think that he’s done a favor to Hunter Choi Yichan.”
In other words, don’t try to persuade him and just tell the real reason.
Choi Yichan put down the hand that was touching the pendant. As if the conversation so far had only been an introduction, his expression became even more serious.
“At least I want you to know that I’m saying this in favor of you, guild leader.”
“….”
“At this rate, Kwon Rieul’s life will be in danger.”
Kwon Jiwoon’s face hardened fiercely.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c103:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

I caught hold of the hand in the nick of time. It was a cold, soft hand.
I couldn’t see anything in the dark, but the boy walked with my hand in his hand as if he knew the way. The soft light surrounding the boy’s body leads me.
Is it because of that light? My mind was strangely calm and I wasn’t scared anymore. I felt a slight warmth through my palms.
It’s a lot smaller, but that steady walk….
As expected, they look alike.
“Hey, do you have a brother?”
“….”

“Or a relative. He’s about this tall, don’t you know someone who looks a lot like you?”
“….”
The boy was still silent.
Can I trust and follow this boy? Maybe he’s pretending to help me like this, then he will lock me up here?
It was a situation where such doubt would remain.
“….”
Our eyes met.
It was hard to explain in words, but I felt that I could trust this boy. I held the boy’s hand and silently followed him.
The lost path of light reappeared. The glistening light moved quickly and formed a path. At the end of the path, there was an exit.
“Okay, I can finally get out of here! Boy, you … huh….?”
I was startled when I turned my head. I was definitely holding the boy’s hand tightly until just now, yet the boy’s figure was nowhere to be seen.
A bright light surrounded me, and I felt like my body was being sucked into somewhere.
***
The view became bright in an instant.
The first thing I saw was the high stone wall of the Great Dungeon Abyss. I could feel the cold air. The dry, chilly wind of early winter knocked on my cheeks. My eyes are blinded by the clear morning sun. It was a change that  made the memory of being in a midsummer night’s dungeon a while ago felt like a dream.
Next, as promised, I saw the store building, which arrived first and was well placed in its original place.
Thank God. Everyone except me seems to have arrived safely. In front of the store, I could clearly see the faces of the group looking up at me.
Wait. Why are they looking up at me?
I felt a sense of freedom in my feet. It’s as if I’m floating in the air….
“Whoa, uaaaaah…..!”
Tiling!
[The connection will be reset. 1, 5, 10, 20, 50 … 100. Done.]
[Achievement: Light up the DarknessCongratulations!You were on the verge of getting lost by the bad ´Ï¾Ë¶óÅäÅÜ, but you returned safely.Who was it that guided you?Reward: Comfortable Walk-Through Counter (★★☆☆☆)]
There was no time to carefully read the status window that appeared in front of me.
The point where I appeared was the air a little above the roof of the store. For now, I was floating as if I was not affected by gravity, but my body was about to plummet down.
Don’t you think there’s been a lot of falling incident since I awakened? How many times have I done this already?
“….Uhh!”
I swallowed a scream. I felt my body going down.
Let’s stay calm. Now I’m an expert in falling.
‘The Bond of a Cup of Coffee!’
It was the moment I was about to use Choi Yichan’s defense skills that I copied straight away.
The falling body floated up again. A thin net of light that was barely visible wrapped around my body and held me up so that I wouldn’t plummet to the ground.
I have seen this skill many times already. I called the name of the person who used the skill out loud. Even though it had only been two days since we met, I was extremely happy.
“….Yoohyun-ssi!”
My body, wrapped in the net of light, slowly descended. Just before my feet touched the ground, Ki Yoohyun reached out his arm to hold me.
I stared at Ki Yoohyun for a while in that position. My eyes were still dazzled as I suddenly came out into bright place, but I could clearly see the eyes under the shadowed eyelashes. He looks surprised.
The soft hair blowing in the wind and those white cheeks really suited Ki Yoohyun.
As I was doing it for a long time, Ki Yoohyun secretly avoided my gaze. A soft word followed.
“I was surprised. I received a call, so I came to see what happened, and the building disappeared and appeared again. Rieul-ssi fell from the sky….”
I was very surprised, too. My heart is still pounding.
“You’ve been through a lot of incidents.”
“I didn’t mean to …. more than that, are you really Yoohyun-ssi?”
“Do I even have a fake?”
He looked puzzled.
“Do you have a younger brother with a big age difference…..”
“I don’t have any brothers.”
“Then…..”
It was a time when I went back to my memory to describe in more detail the boy who took me out of the path of stars.
“Ahem, hmm, hmm!”
A coughing sound came from behind. It was Kwon Jiwoon. He was deliberately making exaggerated sounds as if he wanted it to be heard.
It looked awfully awkward. It is fortunate that Kwon Jiwoon’s job is a Hunter. He doesn’t seem to have any talent for acting.
What’s wrong with him?
When I just stared at him, he covered his mouth with his hand and coughed loudly this time.
“……!”
Only then did I realize that I was too close to Ki Yoohyun in front of others.
As Ki Yoohyun caught my falling body, I was half-hugged. Our faces were close. My arm wrapped around Ki Yoohyun’s shoulder, and Ki Yoohyun’s arm supported my back and waist. If I tilted my head a little more, I could hear the sound of breathing.
“That, hey, Yoohyun-ssi, your arm….”
When I panicked, Ki Yoohyun immediately loosened his arm. I dropped my body quickly.
Kwon Jiwoon, who approached with a frown on his forehead, asked.
“What happened?”
According to Kwon Jiwoon, others returned through the path of stars without any problems. The time I disappeared was less than seconds, even though the time felt much longer for me. When they arrived, they noticed that I was invisible, and soon I appeared from the sky.
Umh….
I checked the system window that just popped up again.
Some letters were broken and unreadable, but the nuance that someone interfered with me was clear. That’s all, no more information. Only unanswered questions piled up one after another.
‘Give me some hints and then ask me to guess….’
Could it be the crazy pseudo-religious man from last time? There was no evidence, but the eyes caught up in the madness were enough to make this speculation.
When I thought of him, I felt both uneasy and resentful at the same time.
Why only me?!
I felt like my life is gradually flowing in a different direction from my goal.
Maybe it’s already went to that direction a long time ago, and I only realized it too late?
It seems likely. I shuddered at the frightening possibility.
“….Rieul-ah.”
This time, Choi Yichan came close to me.
“Do you have a second? I have something to say….”
Although he said so, Choi Yichan’s eyes were not on me, but on Ki Yoohyun next to me.
Oh. The two are seeing each other for the first time. Even when Choi Yichan had a temporary part-time job here, the time was different from when Ki Yoohyun visited.
What’s going on? Choi Yichan’s shoulders drooped and his expression remained stiff. I spoke in a bright voice on purpose.
“Ah! Yichan-ah, it’s your first time seeing him, right? This is Ki Yoohyun, he’s a Hunter from Cheongna. Yoohyun-ssi, as you probably know, this is…..”
“Of course I know. Choi Yichan, the S-Class Hunter. Nice to meet you.”
With a smile, Ki Yoohyun held out his hand first.
However, Choi Yichan did not accept the hand. He only looked at Ki Yoohyun with a serious expression.
“…….”
There was a moment of silence followed by a slight tension.
“Yichan-ah?”
“Rieul-ah, wait….”
It was the moment when Choi Yichan was about to say something,
“Team leader! There he is, we found him! Hunter Choi Yichan!”
“I won’t miss him this time. Let’s go together.”
Government officials appeared from somewhere and surrounded Choi Yichan. It was Hunter Kang Hyunwoo and Kim Jina. This time, they were firmly armed with the determination not to miss this wild S-Class Hunter.
It hasn’t been ten minutes since we came back here. How did they get here so fast? They have an amazing information source.
“You came all the way here, how did you know?”
Hunter Kang Hyunwoo answered with shining eyes.
“I heard the news that Choi Yichan Hunter appeared in The White Silver Guild. So, I thought the only place where he would appear next was here, Cafe Rieul.”
Did he go undercover?
“Heugh, I can finally go home and sleep today … I kept crouching down, and my turtle neck came back.”
He really went undercover.….
Looking at them carefully, the public officials were dressed in a sense of hardship. The area under the eyes looked hollow.
“It won’t take long. Please listen to us.”
However, Choi Yichan waved his hand with a troubled expression.
“Uh, wait, I need to talk to her for a moment … I have something to say to Rieul-ah.”
“Yes, as much as you like. I’ll be waiting here, so you can take your time.”
“Yes, we’ve been waiting so far, but we can wait a little longer. Although the deadline for updating the measurement ranking is today … if we’re late, we’ll be called in by the Director again….”
“Ha, haha….”
It’s incredibly burdensome.
It was hard to ignore the eyes of public officials who were watching Choi Yichan just one step away in case they missed him. It would be even more burdening since it was Choi Yichan, who enjoys helping others. In the end, Choi Yichan dropped his shoulders.
“Sorry … I’ll be right back.”
“Yes, go with them. I’ll hear what you want to tell me when you get back.”
The incident of flying the entire store to the dungeon ended with Choi Yichan got arrested by the Dungeon Management Office.
I waved my hand at Choi Yichan’s back as he was helplessly moving away.
***

Translator’s Corner:
Whyrano (wairano): it’s Korean internet (Twitter mostly) slang. It mean what’s going on? / what’s wrong? Celestial Realm (천상계): Hmm … in gaming, it usually used to extreme the people who … you know, the elite players. It’s like pro gamers, the super-advanced players who show outstanding skills as if they are playing in the sky (hence, celestial realm). In this case, the OP was saying the ranking update doesn’t really affect anything other than the top rankers world.Jonbeo: (존버) an abbreviation of “to hold out as fuck”, which means to persevere no matter what difficulties may come and hold out “until the better day comes.” Used to describe mindsets similar to “sticking until the end” or “last man standing”.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c102:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Oh, are you looking for me?”
“Yeah, you’re nowhere to be seen.”
“I was just talking to Cedric for a minute.”
“….Ah.”
Choi Yichan glanced toward the bonfire.

Choi Cedric had already returned. All that’s left is traces of a bonfire that’s completely extinguished.
A sharp light hovered in Choi Yichan’s eyes, barely visible, then it melted in his smile and disappeared.
“Choi Cedric from C&L, he is that person. Are you close to him?”
I know his contact number, but our relationship is not to the extent of exchanging personal contact. We got caught up in the Monster Hell together, but it was a coincidence. I helped him in saving the Blue Celaeno flower, but that’s all.
It’s a bit strange to say that we’re close, but it’s not like we don’t know each other. I gave an ambiguous answer.
“It’s just, well … we know each other. Today, we met here by chance.”
“….I see.”
We walked along the dark beach for a while. This quiet man is unfamiliar.
While looking at the crashing white waves for a while, Choi Yichan suddenly opened his mouth.
“Hey, Kwon Ri, maybe this is excessive solicitude.”
“Huh?”
“You’d better be careful. Uh, that, C&L.”
I stopped walking and looked up at Choi Yichan. He said that with cautious tone, but his expression was serious.
“…Is it because of their involvement with The White Silver?”
The Dungeon Management Office was investigating C&L due to allegations that C&L Corporation tried to merge The White Silver Guild in a hostile manner, as well as the last Long-tailed Phoenix case. I didn’t hear about the situation from Kwon Jiwoon in detail, but I think it will be concluded soon with the confession of the arrogant old man and Park Heeyoung, whom I met in The White Silver Guild.
“Well, there’s that, too.”
In other words, that’s not all.
However, Choi Yichan didn’t say anything more and just smiled.
Although Choi Cedric may not have been directly involved in the circumstances involving C&L and The White Silver Guild, I don’t believe that he is completely unrelated. I wasn’t that optimistic.
The reason why Choi Cedric was being stuck in a corner instead of participating in the improvised camping trip must be because he was uncomfortable with Kwon Jiwoon. Considering that he did something useless like that, he has a better personality compared to his image.
Still, I didn’t have the heart to pretend I didn’t see Choi Cedric, who gave the ‘I’m depressed’ look.
I guess I’m a bit of an mediocre person.
We walked slowly toward the campsite.
“Yichan-ah, I heard you saved my uncle? …. Thank you.”
“Huh? Oh, no! I just happened to … Kwon Ri, I’m glad I was helpful to you.”
Choi Yichan waved his hand in embarrassment. His earlobes are slightly red.
The way he didn’t know what to do even when he heard obvious things was really like the Choi Yichan I know. Seeing that, I felt relieved without even realizing it.
“Well, are you done with your training? You said, ‘I will come back stronger.’”
“Umh….”
Choi Yichan thought for a moment, then he replied in a determined tone.
“Yes, it’s over. Now I have to move on to the next level.”
“Next level?”
“Uh, that’s….”
“Waeooolg!”
At the moment Choi Yichan tried to say something again, Mieum and Lime popped out in front of us. Mieum was holding her toy, the sugarcane leaf, in her mouth.
As a result, the conversation was naturally cut off.
“Waeuung, waeoooong (Big man, I’ll give you the right to play with me)!”
“Kkyuuuuuu!”
“Ahahaha, yes, all right. Wait a minute.”
Following Choi Yichan’s gesture, Mieum and Lime jumped up and down. They looked excited because someone who played well came.
“Don’t bother Yichan too much.”
“Kyayakyakyak!”
“Kkyuuuu!”
They’re not listening at all.
“Where … are you going. Leave me alone….”
As I turned my head to the lackluster voice, I saw Ash taking a commemorative photo between Ju Noeul and my uncle. Ash’s face was full of fatigue.
It seems that the environment was too Inssa-like for our delicate part-timer to endure.
***
The next night.
A twinkling star appeared in the dark night sky. A gate appeared on the white sandy beach sprinkled with starlight.
This is the path of the stars that Cthugha said.
It was time to go back home. Although this beach was very beautiful, a dungeon is a dungeon. Now I desperately missed the outside world.
“I need Wi-Fi….”
Yeah, no phones either.
I looked at the party for the last time. Since Cthugha said he would install a movement magic in the store building, I thought we could just move together inside the building, but….
“I don’t think that’s such a good idea.”
“Why?”
“I’m not confident in moving humans. There’s a possibility that I can clone people into two, or that you’ll go in a half.”
“….I will walk.”
I quickly gave up when I heard Cthugha’s words.
Therefore, adding the humans who enjoyed great camping yesterday and our animals, the group became a considerable number of people.
“Lime-ah, is it okay if you come with me?”
According to Cthugha, Lime is a ‘piece of flame’ that ran away from home. Then this dungeon must be Lime’s original home. It came back at best, but is it okay to leave the house again?
That’s why I asked…….
“Kkyu, kkyuu, kkyuuuuuuu!”
Lime bounced its body and drew a circle.
“Take it. I think that kid like it there.”
Since Cthugha said so, it will be okay.
“Mmmoooo!”
And the golden triangular rhinoceros of my family, which follows Lime closely, was also with us. I had a hard time keeping Lime away from the barrel he was trying to lick.
The back of the cow was loaded with seafood given as a gift by the fire spirits.
I should name this one too. What should I name it? Umh, cow … the name of a cow, um…..
I’ll think about it later.
“Pepe, farewell, sad.”
“Take care, Pepe.”
After saying goodbye to everyone, it’s time to finally leave.
Cthugha added the last words.
“If you follow the path that the stars point to, you will find the way to your original home. You should never look back.”
“Excuse me … could you please not say such an ominous thing…..?”
It sounds like there will be a curse that turns you into stone if you look back.
Together, we set foot on the path of stars.
Light continued long in the dark space reminiscent of the night sky. The name ‘The Path of Stars’ seemed to suit it.
It was around the time I had walked along the path of stars for some time.
“Huh….?”
Suddenly, like being blowed by sandstorm, my vision blurred. I rubbed my eyes and looked again, but the blur does not disappear.
And this message.
[An unauthorized user has just attempted to access the service.][You are not connected ██ ████ ██….]
I was bewildered for a moment.
Soon the blur cleared and the notification window disappeared. I guess I’m fine now.
As I tried to walk again with confidence, I suddenly noticed that I couldn’t see anyone else.
Obviously, we walked closely together until just now, but it’s just darkness on either side. I reached out my hand, but nothing was caught.
“….Oppa? Uncle? Yichan-ah! Kim Ash, where are you?!”
Only my voice echoes in the distant darkness. Lime, who I was holding in my arms, also disappeared.
I looked at my feet and was stunned. There was no path of light that showed the direction to go. The light had gone out and it was dark under my feet, so I couldn’t even know where to go now.
“Everybody, where are you?!”
I was the only one who fell. Anxiety flared up.
Don’t tell me I have to keep wandering in this black space. The mere imagination already gives me goosebumps.
“Whoa, ha….”
Let’s stay calm. I’ve already been through something similar once. Yes, like when the Saintess summoned me to a strange space.
Perhaps the Saintess called me again this time. Otherwise, why would the others disappear?
I shouted in a trembling voice into the air in front of me.
“……If you call me, come out quickly!”
There is no answer. I waited for a while, but the surroundings remained dark, and the blonde woman in fantasy-style clothes did not appear.
If it’s not a call from the Saintess….
‘Status Window.’
I tried to load the system status window. I thought there would be some hints about this situation.
However….. 
[Interruption███ █████ ██……][Warning: Unable to Connect.]
[System Error: Blocking Access][System Error: Blocking Access]
Then, silence.
“Huh…..?”
At the end of the bright red error window, the system stopped responding. The same goes for the Ether-Wiki.
There have been several error windows so far, but this is the first time that such content has appeared.
I could feel a cold sweat running down my forehead.
It’s scary. When the system window stopped, I really felt like I was left alone in this unfamiliar space.
I feel like the deep darkness is going to devour me right away.
“Ugh….”
This is different from the darkness of the time when the Saintess called me. This one is more bleak and endless … it’s a darkness that’s trying to do me harm. I feel scared and nauseous.
‘You need to get a hold of yourself. There must be a way out. You’re not alone.’
…really?
Where they had gone, the others were already invisible. I’m just left alone in this darkness.
While I was on the verge of being eroded by fear and despair,
“……!”
A young human figure appeared from the other side of the void.
That black hair, straight limbs, and black eyes that twinkled even in the dark … no way….
“Yoohyun-ssi?”
No, it’s not him.
I soon realized the difference.
The person, who looked like Ki Yoohyun at first glance, became smaller as he got closer to me. When he reached my front, his height barely came a little below my chest.
“Yo-you … who are you?”
Smile. Only a soft smile, there was no answer.
He looked like a young boy on the surface, but he resembles Ki Yoohyun a lot. If it was about 10 years ago, I thought Ki Yoohyun would look like this.
“Are you trying to help me?”
“…….”
Instead of answering, the boy held out his hand.


PREVIOUS
next



Translator’s Corner:
excessive solicitude (노파심): the state of feeling overly worried and anxious about other’s business. I just took the literal translation because I can’t decide what to do with it, hehe.
AND HELLO, I’M STILL ALIVE. Hope no one got disappointed 😀 
(and like the previous chapters, please be understanding if there’s still a lot of typos ashddlls i’m trying my best to see them all (my vision not as good as before recently ashsdkdsjkdd))

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c101:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Is it true that my uncle is no longer an Awakened? There are cases where the ability becomes stronger or, conversely, weaker, but I have never heard of such a case of someone losing their awakening status.
“Nyaaaah (It’s real).”
Mieum answered my question with a languid cry.
“Then maybe … is it possible to get it back?”
“Meow, waeuuung (It’s impossible. I don’t know what happened … but the etheric affinity has disappeared, and the access to the system is completely lost.)”
‘Unbelievable….’
“When we go back, I will first submit an investigation request to the main office. We’re going to re-investigate the missing dungeon … what are you doing?”

When the large bomb suddenly exploded, only my uncle remained calm. My uncle cut off Kwon Jiwoon’s words and talked to me.
“Niece, do you have a paper and a pen?”
“Ah, yes, I have. Here.”
I found a piece of paper and a pen in the drawer and handed it to my uncle. My uncle scribbled something in a flowy handwriting, stamped it with his thumprint, and handed it out to Kwon Jiwoon.
Letter of AppointmentName: Kwon JiwoonI appoint the above person as the guild leader of The White Silver Guild.Kwon Seokmin 
“….Father!”
“From today on, you are the guild leader. Now, congratulations! Come on, clap.”
I was out of my mind. I don’t know what the hell is happening, but everyone started to clap because we were swept away by the atmosphere. Nothing has been resolved, but when we applauded together, there was an atmosphere of celebration.
“Congratulations…….”
“Haha, congratulations.”
“The darkness will be with you.”
In this way, a new guild leader of the White Silver Guild was appointed in the dungeon.
Kwon Jiwoon still looked like he had a headache, but it didn’t seem to be caused by motion sickness.
***
The night has come even in the dungeon. The hot sun had set, and only the red moon shone on the calm night sea.
I can’t go back until tomorrow night, so I have to spend a day in this beach dungeon. However, the room in the store building was not enough for everyone to stay overnight.
Since I figured out a way back, and Cthugha promised me a safe return, I told the people who came to see me to go home first.
“Father has finally returned, and it’s been a long time since I’ve been this relaxed, so I don’t think I have to hurry.”
“Is this child name Lime? …. haaa, it’s so cute.”
“Uh, I don’t want to go home.”
“Hahaha, I don’t have a home yet.”
Everyone refused for their own reasons.
Then I’m wondering if I should put a blanket on the floor of the store, but my uncle suggested a new opinion.
“It’s camping! If you come to the sea, of course you have to do camping!”
“It’s good … I always wanted to do an Inssa event like this once….”
In the meantime, Ju Noeul, who became close to my uncle, immediately expressed her consent.
All of a sudden, camping was decided with an atmosphere suitable for the ‘Relaxing Episode Summer Vacation’.
As they are all hunters, they have camping equipment for dungeon exploration in their inventory. After setting up a tent on the beach and grilling the seafood given by the fire spirits, the atmosphere was quite good.
It’s safe, but when I think about how I ended up camping in the dungeon, I have mixed feelings….
Well, I don’t know. As long as it’s fun.
However, this thought occurred to me.
‘I wish Yoohyun-ssi was here too.’
I think he will adapt well even among this random combination because he has a friendly personality.
I wonder if he’s surprised because the entire store building has disappeared by now.
I wanted to tell him not to worry because I was safe, but it was frustrating because my phone has no connection. I haven’t been able to tell him that I met a crazy pseudo-religious man yet … I should contact him as soon as I get out of here.
Previously, when revealing his secret, Ki Yoohyun said that he was trying to prevent the resurrection of the Demon.
We have only one thing in common: we are regressors. I don’t know if there’s anything I can contribute to that goal, but I couldn’t help but care about him.
“So I wanted to tell Rieul-ssi. About who I am.”
Ah. I can’t. A memory that was bad for my heart almost came to my mind. It was not a good memory to recall when we were all building friendships like this.
I tried to cut off the branching thoughts and looked around.
“Why is Wi-Fi not working in the dungeon yet when we are an IT powerhouse….”
In the midst of the murmur of Ju Noeul, who is suffering with her disconnected smartphone, is heard as background sound.
Suddenly, I noticed that Choi Cedric was nowhere to be seen.
Where did he go? He was here when we set up the tent.
“Ash, wait a minute.”
“Where are you going?”
As soon as I got up, Ash quickly tried to follow me. However, he was held back by a grab from the other side. It was my uncle.
“Part-time boy, come here and sit down. You’re still young, but you work so hard for a part-time job. You’re admirable. Come and eat more.”
Tak!
Ash spoke, roughly shaking off my uncle’s hand.
“Don’t touch it. The power of the Abyss is asleep in this hand.”
“…….”
The relaxed atmosphere freezes. My uncle, who was eating the grilled fish, looked at Ash quietly, and Kwon Jiwoon quickly intervened in order to fix the atmosphere.
“Father, he’s not a relative on the holiday, what is this? Let the little ones play.”
“Dang, son, just because you got the guild leader appointment letter, you are treating me like an old man in the back room now.”
“Haa … didn’t you just hand it over at your own will?”
I should give Kwon Jiwoon some headache medicine later.
Ignoring Kwon Jiwoon, who rubbed his temple, next to him, my uncle continued to talk to Ash.
“I see, I see. But that hand, in my eyes, it looks like it’s disconnected. The imprint has already disappeared.”
“Hoo … being able to see through that, for a human being, you’re pretty good.”
It worked?!
Ash quietly sat down next to my uncle. My uncle said as he rummaged through his pockets.
“I should give pocket money to such a great child. Um … ah, I don’t have my wallet. Son.”
“….here it is.”
Kwon Jiwoon handed his entire wallet to my uncle, who took out a bunch of money from inside.
“Here, pocket money.”
“…It’s okay, I don’t need such a thing.”
“Oho, if an adult gives it to you, you say yes and receive it. Take it now.”
“…….”
Well, given that atmosphere, it wouldn’t be a big deal to leave it as it is.
During this time, I sneakily left the campsite and headed to the dark beach in search of Choi Cedric.
It didn’t take long to find Choi Cedric. It was because Pepe’s red body shone in a corner of the beach where there was no sign of anyone, and a sad voice was heard.
“Haaa … why am I like this….”
I have a sense of deja vu about this situation.
Choi Cedric was sitting opposite the bonfire and muttering something with a depressed expression to Pepe. Pepe has a bored look on his face.
“What are you doing there?”
“……!”
He guess he was so absorbed in his thoughts that he didn’t even notice my presence. Choi Cedric’s cheeks gradually heated up.
“Yo-you, you! If someone looks serious, you have to pretend not to know!”
“Ah, I was going to, but….”
Pepe kept staring at me as if he’s asking me to do something.
It was strange that he said he didn’t want to go home, but why is he being depressed here alone?
I slumped down next to Choi Cedric to hear what happened. As if it was very boring, Pepe ran away as soon as I came.
“Pepe, boredom, coming home!”
Tap, tap, tap….
Pepe’s footsteps faded away, and only the sound of waves and burning bonfire could be heard on the beach.
Choi Cedric didn’t kick me out, but he didn’t say anything. He just gazed at the burning bonfire and sighed.
“Haa….”
“…..”
I quickly got bored.
However, it was not possible to leave Choi Cedric, who looked like there’s something wrong happened to him. Well, then I’ll ask him first. I had something to say to Choi Cedric.
“What’s going on?”
“…..do you know that Romeo and Juliet ends in tragedy?”
“Huh? I know. They’re both dead in the end. Why all of a sudden?”
“Haa … that’s why I can’t tell you.”
“…..?”
It was an unexpected sound to say with such melancholic eyes. The words have no connection at all.
“It’s just, because of the guild problem … never mind.”
“Okay.”
If it’s a guild, it’s probably related to C&L. I also don’t have good feelings for C&L, and it was too much to ask a lot of questions about a guild’s internal issues.
So I answered with a short answer, but Choi Cedric brought it up again on his own.
“Hey.”
“Why?”
“Why do people suddenly change?”
“What is the matter for that question?”
“Ah, oh, nothing happened! It’s just, what is it, general! Yeah, generally speaking.”
There’s something going on…….
I looked at the bonfire that was gradually losing its flames and thought about the answer to Choi Cedric’s ambiguous question.
“Mmh … memory loss?”
“No, their memory is fine. They remember exactly what happened in the past.”
“Then, isn’t it just a change of heart? ‘You just have to live a good life from today, eat three meals a day, and exercise‘, they might be thinking like this.”
“No. It’s not that kind of change, it feels uncomfortable, and sometimes I feel like they’ve become a different person….”
Choi Cedric frowned, pouring out unorganized thoughts. I put the words that came to my mind into my mouth.
“Then, isn’t it like being possessed?”
“What? You, uh, wha … what nonsense are you talking about?”
“No, it’s a general theory. I’m saying there’s a cliché like that in general.”
“Sheesh … that’s enough.”
As if this topic was really over, Choi Cedric stopped talking. After that, he asked again.
“Didn’t you come because you had something to say? What is it?”
“Ah, that. I want to say thank you.”
“Yeah, thank you … wh-what, what?!”
Is it that surprising? When I saw Choi Cedric leaning backward with his eyes wide open, I laughed.
I could see a camping site in the distance. Kwon Jiwoon was staring at my uncle with a bitter smile. Still, I know that look isn’t really troubling. Even if he looks like that, he’s enjoying himself.
If I had kept avoiding my relationship with Kwon Jiwoon, I wouldn’t have seen him like that.
The decisive trigger for the reconciliation was the incident of the White Silver Guild, but it was Choi Cedric’s words that helped before that.
“That day, when we entered Monster Hell. Cedric, you told me. Since we only have one family, do what you can so you won’t regret it.”
“….”
“That was very helpful. That’s why I wanted to say thank you, and I happened to meet you here.”
“….”
Seriously saying something like this in front of the dying bonfire, it feels so….
…incredibly embarrassing.
“Anyway, so Cedric, you should stop thinking about depressing things…..”
I smiled and talked to change the awkward atmosphere.
Jump. Choi Cedric suddenly rose to his feet.
“Yeah, I should try everything I can.”
“…..?”
“This is not the time for this. You’re right. There’s no end if I’m just avoiding it. I have to do what I can.”
“Uh, huh…?”
Suddenly, he clenched his fist and made an enterprising expression. It looked like it could be used as an enlightenment poster.
Choi Cedric took out a teleport scroll from his inventory. Before tearing the scroll, he glanced at me for the last time.
“I’m sorry, but I’m leaving first. Let’s meet when you get out of this place. I’ll go to your cafe as a guest then.”
The light flashed, and in an instant, Choi Cedric disappeared.
Anyway, I’m glad he got his energy back. It’s a relief…..
“There must be a way for Romeo and Juliet to not end in tragedy.”
I have no idea what this last remark means.
Has he been impressed by the classic masterpiece?
The bonfire was completely extinguished. It was then when I stood up thinking of going back to where other people were.
“Rieul-ah.”
“….huh.”
Was he looking for me? Choi Yichan came closer.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c100:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

In an instant, the Wyverns leapt into the space of the Garden of Cthugha, the Eternal Living Flame.
“There it is!”
On a cliff on a sunny beach, they could see a brick cafe building.
However, as the Wyverns got closer to the cafe, they felt puzzled. An unexpected scene unfolded before their eyes.
Small fireballs lined up in front of the cafe.

“Now, one at a time, do not push!”
“Coffee, coffee, coffee!”
A cheerful answer followed.
***
Time, overflowing.
Ingredient, the stock is sufficient.
Consumer, they’re being curious.
Quest, there’s a reward that looks good.
The conditions were perfect for business trip, but one problem remained.
The fire spirits could not be brought into the cafe. If these fire spirits, whose bodies are made of fire, enter, the inside of the building will burn quickly.
However, if I said that I would not sell coffee to the spirits for that reason, they would be angry. The expectant eyes were directed at me.
“Perfect, gorgeous, wonderful!”
“Number one, fantastic, coffee!”
Pepe’s real-time reviews were also enough to stimulate the spirits. Pepe, you’re good at viral marketing….
After returning to the beach where the cafe was placed with spirits who were not about to back down, I was lost in thought.
There is an option to make coffee inside and bring it outside, but it is cumbersome.
I’d rather do this.
I took out moderately-sized (and also flame-retardant) plate from the warehouse on the first floor of the store. I don’t know why this stuff is in the warehouse. Come to think of it, this warehouse was large for the size of the store and had all kinds of items.
‘Why did Grandmother collect these things….’
Anyway, let’s leave the question behind.
With the help of Choi Cedric and Ash, I was able to quickly create the things I wanted. It is a counter where you can place an order and get a drink while walking outside.
The so-called walk-through counter.
“Now, one at a time, do not push!”
The curious fire spirits quickly lined up at my words. Since everyone ordered Irish coffee, it didn’t take long to process the order.
“Coffee, coffee, coffee!”
The last fire spirit received the coffee with a lot of cream in a porcelain cup. The moment the spirit drank the coffee while emitting a hotter fire, the quest completion notification popped up immediately.
Tiling!
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Sub Quest: Business Trip Never Ends!’.Please collect the rewards.][Experience: 200 EXP have been acquired.][You have acquired Connect Anywhere ☆ Mysterious Door.][Fame: 10 / Popularity: 20.][<Cafe Rieul>’s current Grade: E]
“Oh, look over there!”
“Kyagyakyoo (It’s a Wyvern)!”
When I was about to check the reward sone by one, I turned my head to the sharp cry of Choi Cedric and Mieum … and I got startled.
Uh, that’s … a monster? No, there’s a person riding it?
Four monsters resembling dragons appeared in the middle of the bluish blue sky. If you look closely, you can see that they are flapping their wings with one person on their back.
It was the moment when I rubbed my eyes with my hands and tried to look again.
Wait … those wyverns, are they coming this way?
A brilliant aerobatic flight embroidered the sky. While someone’s screams echoed in the background, the Wyverns landed on the ground.
“Ouch, it hurts….”
Poof. The Wyvern disappeared as if melting in the shadows, and the people who got off the Wyvern’s back got up with the sound of pain.
I was astonished to see their faces.
“Umh … excuse me?”
I knew all of them….
***
“……so I was selling coffee to the spirits.”
It took quite some time to sort things out.
First, it took a while to calm the fire spirits who wanted more coffee and send them back. Also, the visitors who came by riding the Wyverns required some time to overcome motion sickness.
We barely sat down and talked to each other about what had happened. This is the summary of what we talked about.
First, Ju Noeul. She is a regular who often comes to our store to drink coffee.
“I was worried about the sudden disappearance of the store….”
“Ahaha, it happened to be like this. Ah, I’m Kwon Rieul. Please call me Rieul.”
“I am Ju Noeul … I’m the leader of the Royal Guild.”
Huk, she was a famous person. I thought she was YOLO life-seeker like me, so I felt an inner intimacy alone….
Wait, in this case, the heads of two Big Three guilds are regulars at my store.
Aren’t my regulars too strong? Is this the S-Classes That I Fed?
It turned out that she was an S-class Summoner, who summoned the Wyverns and flew here.
The second is Kwon Jiwoon.
“Ugh, Rieul-ah, get me some water, eub….”
“Are you okay? You’re sweating a lot. Hurry, drink this ice water.”
He can’t come to his senses even after emptying all the cups of water. I let Kwon Jiwoon sit comfortably against the chair.
Looks like he had a great flight.
There’s also Choi Yichan.
“Haha … long time no see, Rieul-ah. How have you been doing?”
I was dumbfounded by the nonchalant greeting.
He left behind a strange note and disappeared, what? How have you been doing?
“Long time no see? You’ve worried people, and that’s what you’re going to say?”
I was going to slap ahim on the back, but I gave up immediately. In the meantime, his body has become … stronger. It felt like my hand would hurt more if I hit it.
Not only that, but the atmosphere has changed. There was a slightly sharp look on his face, made him looked like a gentle large dog. He also wore proper armor, not his usual training clothes.
He has become more like a Hunter. It seems that the content of the note “I will come back stronger” was not a lie.
I met him for the first time in a long time, but it felt awkward when the atmosphere changed like this.
Choi Yichan lightly grabbed my hand, which stopped halfway as I was about to throw a smash on his back. The calluses on Choi Yichan’s palm touched my finger.
“…….”
I could feel Ash’s sharp gaze in the back of my head. He must have been nervous because there were a lot of strangers.
As if he was showing that he’s sorry, Choi Yichan scratched the back of his head with one hand.
“Haha … sorry. Well, I tried to contact you right away, but my phone didn’t work in the dungeon.”
“Of course….”
“I came out of the dungeon and tried to call you, but this happened again.”
Choi Yichan took his phone out of his pocket and showed it to me. The screen had been completely smashed somewhere.
“I grabbed it hard and it became like this, haha.”
A shy laugh followed.
This Choi Yichan, who closed his eyes when he smiled, was the Choi Yichan that I knew. Actually, Choi Yichan is Choi Yichan, so things will not be that different from before.
The awkwardness finally disappeared and I lost the tension in my shoulders. Choi Yichan followed me with a smile.
And the last one was my uncle.
My uncle, who has not been heard from since he went missing in the dungeon a long time ago. Choi Yichan is said to have stumbled upon him in the dungeon.
I changed the future and Choi Yichan survived, and Choi Yichan saved my uncle and the future changed again. When I thought about it that way, I was both happy and moved.
“Rieul-ah!”
“Uncle!”
He was nice to me in the past. I was so moved that I hugged my uncle for a while.
“Ah, thank goodness we met. Rieul, aren’t you a high school student right now? How did a student open a cafe?”
“I …  I am twenty-three.”
He thought I was years younger than I actually was. What the hell happened to him?
“Is that so? No wonder my niece seemed a little big. Hi, yes, I’m glad the error rate is only this much. If it had been any further, I would have almost messed up my work.”
“….work?”
My uncle gave me a serious look.
“Niece, listen up. Among the items your grandmother left behind, there is one that contain the power of Cthugha. I don’t know who has it now, but we have to find it.”
“Are you talking about this?”
I showed my uncle the ring on my hand.
“Oh! I can’t believe you got it already. Oh, I’m proud of you, my niece. So now that crazy old man … no, we have to meet a fireball.”
“Fireball … are you talking about Cthugha?”
“Yeah, don’t be surprised and listen. There is a secret island in this field. They say that the road can only be opened by the guidance of the fire spirit.”
“Yes, I have been there.”
“We must meet Cthugha in the his temple on that island and make a contract. It’s embarrassing, but now I believe that this eldest son needs to….”
“The contract … has already been signed…..”
“…….”
“……Uncle?”
My uncle was speechless. It seemed that he’s disappointed. I felt a little sorry because I seemed to have unintentionally intercepted his words.
“Ehem, ahem! My niece, you have become a good child on your own. You’ve grown up so well, hahaha!”
But how does my uncle, who has been missing for a long time, know about the ring and the contract with Cthugha? Did my uncle meet the saintess too?
“More than that, Uncle, what have you been up to?”
“This worldline is tangled with too much work … To stop that …. hmmm … heum…..”
Mumble, unfamiliar words followed. In this way, it was difficult to ask what had happened.
I slowly released the arm that was hugging me with emotion.
Yes, how can I understand my uncle’s feelings? I hoped my uncle would calm down and turned my head toward Kwon Jiwoon, who just took a shot of ice water.
“What happened to Uncle?”
“He was lost in the maze dungeon and when he came out … eugh, eub.”
Kwon Jiwoon vomited again with a pale face.
My uncle was lost in maze dungeon, and he spent a month inside that place. However, when he finally got out, he could barely understand that six years had passed.
If I asked him any more questions, he’d probably spill what’s inside his stomach soon, so I stopped talking.
“….okay, I’ll listen to it later. Just take a rest….”
Then, I remembered one thing.
It has been a long time since Kwon Jiwoon took over the business, but the original guild leader of the White Silver Guild was my uncle. Now that my uncle has returned, Kwon Jiwoon’s burden seems to be reduced.
“Then, Uncle, are you returning to become the guild leader now?”
However, my uncle gave an unexpected answer.
“No, that’s impossible.”
“Huh, really?”
“What? Father, what do you mean?”
As if it had never been heard of before, Kwon Jiwoon also raised his head in surprise.
“I have already lost all of my hunter abilities. Now that I am not an Awakened person, I’m only an ordinary person, so I am going to step down from that position.”
“What … Father, what happened?”
“There was some stuff happened in the dungeon.”
“……!”
Doubts grew even more.
However, my uncle did not elaborate further. He just shook his shoulders as if he was trying to forget the terrible memories.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c99:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“….yes?”
While I was lost in my mind, Cthugha made a wild conclusion.
“Granddaughter, I will delegate all my power to you. You can summon me as the sole contractor.”
“Waeuuung, waeuuung (Cthugha-nim himself…..! Human, you’re pretty good. This is a good opportunity).”
“Kkyuu, kkyuu, kkyuuuuu!”

The animals jumped next to me.
“Hmm, not bad. It’s not as much as the primordial chaos, but I can feel the power of a fairly high purity.”
Even Ash said this.
Tiling! Following Cthugha’s declaration, a system window appeared in front of me.
[Great Old One: The Eternal Living Flame, Cthugha, wants a contract with you.][You can get the Blessing of Cthugha when signing the contract.]
“…….”
Let’s just sit back and look at the system window for a moment.
[You can get the Blessing of Cthugha when signing the contract.][You can get the Blessing of Cthugha when signing the contract.]
The window flickered repeatedly, as if rushing me.
But….
“Do I have to do this?”
I can fully understand that it’s amazing based on the atmosphere.
A living flame with the ability to turn into a human and then turn into a fire again, if that’s not great, that’s even weirder. The name that spelled system window is ‘Great’, so it must be actually great.
However, they said that with great power comes great responsibility.
In other words, with great unwanted power comes great unwanted responsibility.
No matter how great the power was, I wasn’t confident I could make good use of it. There must be someone more suitable than me somewhere. I didn’t readily nod at the thought.
Wouldn’t Choi Cedric be more suitable? He’s strong. I turned around with that thought.
“Eung? Why? Is that burdensome? Heh, really, it suits you well, so accept it. You are the, what is that again, Coffee Tentaku!”
“Please don’t call me that…….”
“Nyaaaah, nyaaaaah (Coffee Tentaku, Coffee Tentaku)!”
“Kkyuuu! Kyuuu!”
The animals of my house are so excited that they’re imitating him….
I can’t believe he still uses that title. In my mind, I prayed earnestly that Choi Cedric would develop the right language habit.
Then, what about Ash, The (self-proclaimed) Demon King of Twilight?
“I hate fire.”
However, even before making eye contact, Ash expressed his refusal.
“Ugh….”
“Don’t worry, granddaughter. It won’t change anything if you don’t want to. Just think of it as a contract to strengthen the power of the ring.”
The hesitation was still there.
Yes, the power of the ring is essential when roasting beans…..
Er, I don’t know. Complex thoughts do not fit me. There is a man around me who has the greatest power with the greatest responsibility in Korea. I wonder what would happen if someone without much determination like me signed such a contract.
I nodded slowly.
At that moment, the ring on my left hand heated up and the system window popped up.
[Great Old One: You have signed a contract with Cthugha, the Eternal Living Flame.][The Eligible: The ability is granted according to Kwon Rieul’s will.]
[Skill: Eternal Flame (S)Details: (Lv.max) You can summon Cthugha.]
Wait, S-grade?
There was a huge difference between feeling vaguely strong and seeing the grade mark in person.
“….Hick.”
I was so startled that I hiccuped.
“Hik, heuck, hick!”
“Oh, hey, don’t die. What did that fireball do to you? You can’t breathe!”
“Nothing, I just gave her skill according to the contract. The skill grade is S-grade….”
“Hik, heuck, i’m dying … hick!”
“Waeooong (You’re such a human being with small liver to be surprised by such a thing).”
“Water, water, water.”
“Here, drink some water.”
I finally stopped hiccuping after emptying the glass of water that Ash gave me. Phew, I thought I was going to die.
She got an S-grade skill in an F-class water body and was so shocked that she hiccuped and died. With this content, I almost became a strong candidate for the ‘Erwin Award‘ given to a Hunter who died unexpectedly.
After barely calming down the disturbance.
The topic suddenly shifted because of the contract with Cthugha, but the most important thing is the return. The property that has become movable must be returned to its original place.
“Then, I can go back, right?  … with my building.”
Cthugha shook his head.
“Not now. The nagging of ██ is enormous that the area where I can intervene is limited. Wait until the stream of stars changes.”
“When is that?”
“Let’s see….”
Cthugha looked up at the sky. I couldn’t see the stars because of the sunlight, but he was lost in thought as if he were reading the stream of the stars.
The longer his silence grew, the more anxious I became.
Cthugha probably has lived a very long time because he said he’s immortal. Earlier, Pepe also said he was 1200 years old.
An immortal with a different concept of time from humans, or a world where the flow of time is different from the outside world is a cliché. Don’t tell me that sort of cliché thing happens.
“By any chance, it’s just … 300 years from now, it’s not like this, is it?”
Cthugha grinned, taking off his gaze toward the sky.
“It’s tomorrow.”
Whew, I’m glad. It’s 299 years and 364 days faster than what I was worried about. I was moved by the K-different world that respects busy modern people.
“Tomorrow night, a day later, the path of the stars opens when the when the starlight of Fomalhaut shines. I will install movement magic in the building, so you can go back through that path.”
“……I can trust you, right?”
“Of course, of course! Will the Flame of Eternity lie to his granddaughter?
It … the smell, no, the trace would be fine….
Leastwise. Anyway, before I go back, I have to spend a day in this midsummer dungeon.
Then, again, there is only one thing to do.
Pepe and the fire spirits approached and surrounded me. Their eyes were filled with curiosity and aspiration. The spirits shouted along Pepe’s lead.
“Coffee, coffee, coffee.”
“Coffee, coffee, coffee.”
As if to match the response of the spirits, a ringing sound rang out.
[Sub Quest: Business Trip Never Ends!Behold, the eyes of the eternal spirits.Listen, the voice of the spirits calling you.The fire spirits are interested in your coffee.Let’s make a big profit from the business trip.
Sell Irish Coffee: 0/20Rewards: EXP (200 exp), Fame (10), Popularity (20), Connect Anywhere ☆ Mysterious Door]
***
Ju Noeul looked at the faces of those who quietly moved ahead.
First, the new S-class hunter, Choi Yichan.
Kwon Seokmin, the guild leader of the White Silver Guild, who has been missing for several years.
And Kwon Jiwoon, the healer of the White Silver Guild.
It’s a unique combination. She’s very curious about why they’re looking for her regular cafe that has disappeared.
“Hey, aren’t you coming?”
Choi Yichan, who was walking ahead, called her.
“Coming, I’m coming….”
As she moved quickly, Ju Noeul glanced at Choi Yichan. He only moves silently with a calm expression on his face.
Among them, Choi Yichan is the person she cares the most.
Because he turned down her offer of recruitment mercilessly.
‘What’s wrong with Royal….’
The Royal Guild, which had many long-distance dealers in its early members, suffered from a chronic shortage of short-distance dealers. A new S-class melee berserker appeared at a time like this! She can’t help but to desire it.
So she squeezed the budget and promised the best treatment in the industry. As a bonus, there is even a welfare system that supports his fan activity up to a certain amount of money per month!
However, the feedback was unheard. In fact, he had just turned off his phone, but Ju Noeul did not know about it.
That Choi Yichan is with the father and son of The White Silver Guild. No way, are they promised to hire him under the water….
‘I can’t leave him like that…….’
This was the reason why Ju Noeul quickly stepped into this party.
Of course, that’s not the only reason. It is true that she was also concerned about the whereabouts of the missing regular cafe. Now, she doesn’t feel like she has a proper day unless she drinks that cafe’s coffee and watches the real red slime every day.
However, the main reason is this.
She can’t miss out on this exciting event. She’ll have to follow along and figure out what’s going on. To find out….
‘I should write a review on Hunchan later….’
The party moved to the seventh floor after passing the Dungeon Gate of the Great Dungeon Abyss. It was Kwon Seokmin who took the lead.
“Son, this way!”
He proceeded through the dungeon without hesitation as if he knew where the cafe owner would be. He rode the warp gate, avoiding the path where annoying monsters appear.
‘Don’t tell me this road is…….’
Ju Noeul stopped walking. She put her question into her mouth.
“Umh, Hunter Kwon Seokmin-nim, are you going to the Garden of Cthugha, the Eternal Living Flame?”
“Yes. It must be there!”
Aside from the question of why the cafe that disappeared as a whole is there.
“That field is difficult to access …when the Hunter enters, the owner of the garden gets angry and sets them on fire … it’s totally well-done….”
“Then, is there no other way? Umh, you…”
Choi Yichan looked back at Ju Noeul and blurred the end of his words.
“My name is Ju Noeul….”
Ju Noeul looked at Choi Yichan’s face, clouded with worry. He looked like a sullen puppy worrying about his owner.
What is his relationship with the cafe owner? While being curious about the relationship between Choi Yichan and the cafe owner, she shuddered at the thought of Choi Yichan’s signing of the contract with the Royal Guild as a token of gratitude after solving the problem.
She doesn’t want to be grilled by Eternal Flame. Still, it’s a game worth playing for the S-Class Melee Berserker.
Wait, guild members of the Royal Guild! This guild leader will take the big fish as a new guild member!
Ju Noeul declared with confidence.
“Just trust me….”
Ju Noeul took a small needle out of her pocket and pricked her finger.
Drip, drip. Four drops of blood fell into the shadow of Ju Noeul. The shadow swirled as if swallowing the blood.
[Skill: Wyvern Summon (S) is used.]
Four winged little dragons emerged from the shadow. Kwon Jiwoon, who recognized this, briefly admired it.
“Wyvern…..!”
It was Ju Noeul’s main skill, Summoning.
The difference from the Taming skill is that it does not tame the subject. 
In exchange for Ju Noeul’s blood, the Wyverns signed a summon contract. The content is to quickly take the group to their destination. It only fulfills the role set according to the contract, and the Wyverns are not obligated to obey her.
In other words….
“Euegh, ug! Son, are you going to throw me, who has become useless, here? Are you succeeding to the throne?”
“Father, since my head is ringing, the loud noise is a little, eub….”
“Eugh, I don’t know what it is, but something is popping up.”
“I’m sorry…..”
As they prioritized speed, the comfort of the ride was extremely poor.

Ki Yoohyun was thinking while looking at his phone. He got a KakaoTalk message from Kwon Rieul.
