Page Nine: The Eternal Flame Who Carries Love

Cthugha, in his human form, stared intently at me. The red eyes were filled with confusion, irritation and longing.

Unable to overcome the pressure, I slowly retreated back, but Cthugha came closer. The heat hit me. Soon enough, the sound of breathing could be heard.
“Answer me. Intruder, why do you smell like Heesun?”
“Yes? Perhaps … are you talking about Park Heesun?”
Cthugha, who stood crookedly with his arms crossed, nodded his head.
“Yeah. I can’t forget this peculiar smell.”
“Why do you smell people!”
I backed away, appalled.
I took a shower in the morning. However, this field is in summer weather and I walked with Pepe for a long time.
When I glanced at him as if I were looking at a strange person, Cthugha looked embarrassed. I opened my mouth cautiously.
“Park Heesun is my grandmother.”
I didn’t know that my grandmother’s name would come out here again. What was the relationship between this Eternal Living Flame and my grandmother?
As soon as I answered, the flames died down, and the atmosphere became calmer.
“Euh-euhem. I see, grandgirl. Granddaughter, I mean. Here, here. Eat as much as you like.”
Cthugha pushed the tuna plate towards me, but it had been a long time since he burned it to charcoal when he was angry.
“…….”
“…….”
“The hospitality here is so poor.”
“Pepe, sincerity, unfair.”
“What did you say?”
“Tuna, tuna, tuna.”
Pepe, who could not go against his master, quickly caught the tuna again.
I picked up fresh sashimi and ate half-cooked tuna. It was delicious because it was cooked well.
“Ash, try this too. It’s delicious.”
“……I ate a lot.”
“Oh? Boy, you have to eat well to grow up like this Hyung. Yeah, I’m in a good mood! If you eat it all, Choi Cedric will sign it for you.”
“Haa….”
“Waeoong, waeooolg (This guys, his eyes said, ‘what’s this annoying human being‘).”
I forgot about the troublesome situation and enjoyed the dinner for a while … until Cthugha spoke to me again.
“All right, well … how is Heesun doing?”
“….she passed away.”
“……!”
Cthugha took a deep breath. He looked shocked.
“I see, that’s right. Has it already been that way?”
Remorse was deeply etched on his face. It felt strange to see this human-shaped fireball mourning the death of my grandmother.
“I had a good time with Heesun. However … it’s sad. Human time is too short. An immortal like me always misses the shadow of the mortal.”
Murmuring. The latter words ruffled into his breath.
Wait, don’t tell me….?
Suddenly, a possibility that I didn’t want to think about ran through my head.
My grandmother had always been alone since I was very young. I thought my grandfather died early, but … now that I think about it, I’ve never heard about him at all. Not only that, there is not a single photo left. As if he didn’t exist in the first place.
In addition, my uncle, Kwon Jiwoon, and I are all awakened. There are three Awakeners in a row in one family. Isn’t that a pretty rare chance?
No way.
Eh, that’s ridiculous.
I stared at Cthugha.
“Umh….”
“What’s wrong?”
Cthugha, with red hair and red eyes, looked just like a human.
What if it’s possible for these godlike creatures, like Cthugha, and humans, to produce offspring, and that’s why their blood flows through me?
What if the reason for the successive awakenings of my family is because of the secret of this birth?
Mieum’s eyes shone as if she had reached the same question as me. Even if she pretended not to, I could still feel her excitement. She’s like a K-drama fan who loves the secret of the main character’s birth.
I carefully raised my doubts.
“Don’t tell me … then, are you my grandfather?”
Spurt.  Choi Cedric spilled the juice he was drinking.
“…….”
“…….”
A still silence where no breath can be heard.
With everyone’s attention focused on us, Cthugha answered with a vague expression on his face.
“No, Heesun and I had a pure relationship.”
“Phew….”
Thank God. I was free from the suspicion that 25% of my blood is non-human.
My precious humanity, my precious genes. I will continue to live like a human being.
“Was my grandmother awakened?”
“No, she was not an Awakeneds, but she could read the stream of the stars.”
Astrology … is it something like that? I asked again.
“Then, how did you meet my grandmother?”
“At that time, Heesun lived in a cabin in the forest. While wandering away from the ethereal world, I happened to meet her, and I was fascinated by her ability.”
The story is likely to be long. The fire spirits attentively brought yellowtail sashimi and alcohol. Cthugha, who ate a piece of the well-cooked yellowtail sashimi and spewed vaporized alcohol, continued his words.
“Heesun was very picky, so she would not eat anything other than freshly cooked rice at every meal.”
“……yes?”
“She only slept at the warmest part of the room. So every morning I cut firewood and fetched water.”
“…….”
I had to work hard not to spit out the words that popped into my head.
However, after hearing about how he made the charcoal himself and cooked rice by setting fire to the furnace for a long time, I couldn’t help but to have this thought.
So this is…….
….rice shuttle? 
It was a memory that didn’t match the sad expression on his face.
“But I am an immortal of the ethereal world. I couldn’t always be by her side because of the limitations of causality. This is a body that can only move according to the stream of the stars.”
“…….”
Cthugha emptied his glass. The smell of alcohol whips through the air.
“Then one day, Heesun called me and made a request. She asked me to put my power on a stone so she can summon me any time.”
Wait, don’t tell me….
I quietly hid my hand under the table. Cthugha continued his story.
Cthugha, who was happy to hear that she would call him anytime, quickly handed over a red stone containing his power.
However, the next day, he said that my grandmother had disappeared.
Cthugha waited for my grandmother in the cabin until the stream of stars changed. Still, my grandmother did not return, and the causality imposed on him reached its limit.
Eventually, Cthugha returned to his garden, this place, and now time has passed. All he heard was that my grandmother had passed away a long time ago.
It was a strange story. At the time she ran her cafe, my grandmother seemed to have no interest in ‘God of Another World‘  or ‘Dungeon‘. I can’t believe such an old lady met Cthugha.
I felt the need to know more about my grandmother during my lifetime.
But that’s for later, and for now…….
I hesitated for a moment and showed him my hand.
“Is this the stone with your power?”
“……!”
Cthugha’s Ring. Since the name contains the name of Cthugha, it must be correct.
This ring was made by Grandma Kim Deokyi, but an item requires raw materials. Moreover, my grandmother and Kim Deokyi were acquaintances.
In other words, it is reasonable to think that the stone was passed away by the order of Cthugha → my grandmother → Grandma Kim Deokyi → me.
“How could you……!”
Hyuur.
Cthugha was again transformed into a great flame. This living flame erupted in rage in all directions and began to burn everything.
“Master, fury, run away.”
The fire spirits retreated, and the flames burned.
“I trusted her and handed her a stone of power. She tricked me! It’s not supposed to be a stone that I gave humans so they can use my power recklessly!”
“Eu, aaaa…..!”
“Hey, hey, it’s dangerous!”
Choi Cedric pulled me back, who almost got caught in the flames.
Cthugha, who was angry to the point that he looked like he would devour everything, quickly extinguished the push-type flames. The drooping red hair looked sullen.
“Haa … I thought it was strange.”
Cthugha murmured desolately.
“I summoned the stone containing my power several times. Originally, she should have been summoned, but no matter what I did, there was no response. I managed to summon it today, but a brick building flew in.”
It’s you! Because of you, the whole store was summoned here.
I found the culprit. In my mind, I wanted to grab his neck and shake him.
“Master, heartbreak, sorrow.”
Pepe said something that I didn’t know whether it was consolation or not.
“That … I have listened to you well, and I understand the situation well. Look, umh … cheer up.”
If the cause is Cthugha, then Cthugha must have the solution as well.
“Is there any way to return to the original state with the building here?”
“It’s none of my business.”
“What?”
“This is my garden. Once in, it is mine, the owner of the garden.”
“What?! Where do you even get that idea? What kind of ‘if you cross over with gold, it’s all mine’ is this?!”
Although I protested, Cthugha’s reaction was cold.
“The smell of Heesun remained in the building.”
“Ah, yes. It’s the building she lived in until she died.”
“If so, the building is a trace of Miss Heesun. Feel free to go back if you want to, but leave the trace of Heesun here.”
He’s crazy….
You said it’s a pure relationship, a pure relationship!
I should have recognized it since he mentioned the smell earlier.
Real estate means a lot to modern people, but he wants me to leave it behind!
Still, Cthugha was stubborn and I had no confidence to fight and win against him, who appeared to be close to God.
At that time when I was stuck in the situation, Lime, who had been quietly silent and held on my lap, bravely stepped forward.
“Kkyuuuu. Kkyuu … kkyuuuuu!”
“Ah, Lime-ah!”
“Kkyuu … kkyuuuu!”
While bouncing its body, Lime approached Cthugha.
“Hoo? Aren’t you the piece of flame that ran away from home a while ago? You’re back.”
As expected, Lime was the piece who ran away from home…….
The conversation between Lime and Cthugha continued.
“Kkyuu, kkyuu, kkyuuuuuu kkyu…..”
“What? The heir to the legitimate power? Is she eligible?”
“Kkyuuuu … kkyu …. kkyuuu.”
“Hmm, hmm, I see. You didn’t run away, but you followed her, hmm.”
“Kkyuu, kkyuuu!”
“That mortal … I see, hmm. The owner of ██ watched by ██, hooo….”
Why are you looking at me in an uneasy way and saying things I don’t understand?
Since I met the saintess not long ago, I want to refuse meaningful conversations for the time being.
After talking to Lime, Cthugha turned his head and looked at me with a warm gaze.
“Granddaughter.”
“Didn’t you say no earlier?”
“To me, the blood ties of the mortal are not significant. However, I guess it’s a fate that we met like this. You are like my granddaughter.”
Cthugha smiled and continued.
“Good. I will make a contract with you.”

Translator’s Corner:
rice shuttle: 밥셔틀 (babsyeoteul). The word shuttle (셔틀) comes from the popular slang bread shuttle (빵셔틀), 빵  means bread and 셔틀 means the english word ‘shuttle’.  It’s means a shuttle (bus) that delivers breads to another person. The term was first used among Korean High School students and refers to a person who is being bullied, and does little errands such as delivering bread to their classmates. In here, Rieul used 밥 (boiled rice) to express that Cthugha is like someone who was builed by her grandmother to deliver rice.
Grandma basically gave false hope to a God….

“Calm down. I’ll try to contact her.”
Yeah, this isn’t the time to be like this. He must have been worried about Kwon Rieul a lot, and he should let her know about the good news right away.

“Ah, I’ll come with you.”

It is not easy to solve the family affair. The three of them went out the back door to avoid the reporters and headed to the cafe run by Kwon Rieul.
…and they were surprised.
“Son, I can’t see the cafe with my eyes. What’s going on?”
No. 16 Dungeon Gate 3 Street, Jung-gu, Seoul.
The whole cafe building disappeared.

And just at that moment.
Another person was surprised to see Cafe Rieul completely disappeared.
“What is this…….”
Ju Noeul lamented.
What kind of Wizard of Oz is this…….
***
“Pepe, swimming, possible!”
A serene summer beach under the cliffs.
When Pepe, the fire spirit, made a big gesture, the fire blazed and the waves split sideways.
……can I call this swimming?
The smell of salt in the air became stronger as the seawater vaporized in Pepe’s heat. Soon the sea floor was completely exposed and the yellow road continued. Seaweed and seashells are trampled on.
“Here, guests, banquet!”
“…… well, let’s go.”
At the end of the road, I could see a small island. The star sign on the map pointed exactly to that place.
I don’t know what it is there, but that place has an event. Is there no other way but to go?
“This guy, why can’t you hold me more carefully, waeolg!”
“………Walk on your own.”
“Hmm, it’s not bad if you do this.”
As for the animals, Ash and I decided to walk with one each. I was with Lime and Ash took Mieum.
Mieum tossed to and fro for a long time as she felt uncomfortable in Ash’ arms before she finally found a pose she liked and made a whining sound.
The Golden Triangular Rhino will be left in the barn. It was a long distance to walk with a cow, and the cow didn’t want to move because it liked the barn.
It’s been a while since the four of us walked behind Pepe.
“Heuk, huuuh….”
I breathed out. My eyes were tingling with sweat.
It was terribly hot…….
Lime’s body was cool, so it felt good to touch it, but there was a limit for that.
The effect of ice cream coffee has already ceased. Furthermore, the more I moved, the stronger the heat became.
“Pepe, hukh … how long do we have left?”
I spoke to Pepe, the only one here who was fine.
“Soon, arrival, relax!”
“Why is it so hot here?”
“Hot? Pepe, cool!”
Yeah, you would … my body is not made of fire, I felt like I’m going to die….
Fortunately, however, as Pepe said, we soon arrived at our destination.
There was a village on a small island that I thought would only take 10 minutes to go around. Pepe led us to the village. Stone houses were sparsely visible, and there was a large temple in the center of the village. It was like an altar to worship the Eternal Living Flame.
And soon, I discovered the identity of this tremendous heat.
“Who, visitor, guest?”
Beyond the stone wall, the fire spirits that looked just like Pepe stuck their heads out. It was so hot because of the heat they radiated.
“Pepe, home, welcome.”
“Guests, welcome, banquet!”
The little spirits surrounded us and chattered. If possible, I would like to inform these spirits that there is a thing called structural prepositions in Korean. The words that were heard in pieces seemed to mean that they welcomed us as guests.
Pepe and the spirits took us to the center of town to hold a welcome party. However, there was an unexpected content among the words that were heard in pieces.
“Huh? There is other visitor besides us?”
“Traveler, distress, visit.”
Almost at the same time, an unfamiliar voice was heard in front of me.
“Ah, hot, it’s hot!”
No, it’s not an unfamiliar voice.
“Ha, I understand that you really want to see it, but it gets hot when you touch it all of  a sudden. Yes, one by one, stand in line and watch one by one.”
There was a man showing his weapon to the crowd of fire spirits. A face with a slightly frivolous atmosphere and upturned eyes caught my attention.
“Oh, you guys, haha. Do you want to shake my hand? We can’t shake hands because my palm will burn, but what about autographs?”
And this unbearable way of speaking.
….No way.
“….Huh!”
Choi Cedric, who turned his head and found me, was startled.
……why are you here?
***
The table was set.
A large stone dining table in the town square. To not overshadow the word banquet, these fire spirits served a fairly generous menu.
Perhaps because it was an island in the middle of the sea, the main menu was seafood. It was fortunate that it wasn’t a fire-baked stone or black charcoal.
“Pepe, common sense, yes. Humans, stones, not eaten.”
“Uh … I’m sorry for the misunderstanding.”
“Food, delicious, eat!”
In particular, the fresh tuna sashimi that I picked up with chopsticks was delicious. The tuna tataki looked appetizing, and the grilled tuna tasted savory.
The heat emitted by the fire spirits cooked the seafood in real time.
“Waeolg, waeooong (The hospitality is quite good)!”
“Kkyuu….”
“………Not bad.”
After confirming that the party ate the food satisfactorily, I turned my head toward Choi Cedric. I never thought I would meet this guy here.
“How did you get here?”
“Huh? Me? I…….”
Choi Cedric, who was about to eat the well-cooked grilled tuna, put down his chopsticks and answered.
“My heart is heavy.”
“……what?”
Choi Cedric said he has a hobby of taking a dungeon walk whenever he feels depressed. 
Is it the problem with the urban sprawl? Is it because there is not enough green space in Seoul? Leaving the decent park and taking a walk in the dungeon isn’t a hobby that I can sympathize with as a human being, but … everyone has different ways to relieve stress, so let’s understand it.
“That’s why I wanted to do one round of the Great Dungeon Abyss.”
“Wait, is this Abyss?”
“Huh, you didn’t know?”
“Of course I didn’t know. I slept and woke up to find the whole store was here.”
“What the … listen.”
Choi Cedric continued his explanation in a pompous voice.
In the Great Dungeon Abyss, there is a floor called the Safe Zone. It is difficult to understand that ‘Dungeon’ and ‘Safe’ can be used in one sentence, but anyway, it is said to be so.
Twenty years have passed since the huge dungeon suddenly appeared in the world. It wasn’t that Hunters hadn’t climbed the Great Dungeon for 20 years. The Safe Zone is where the moving gate was installed after the boss was eliminated.
“Hmm, I understand. You’re saying this is the Safe Zone, right?”
I picked up squid sashimi, which was raw squid sashimi, and asked. However, Choi Cedric shook his head.
“No, I don’t know that.”
“…..what?”
Choi Cedric was originally planning to go back after taking a walk in the Safe Zone. But he didn’t want to go home, so he went a little further and deeper. Then, he was caught up in a sudden etheric wave and fell into this field.
I expected a systematic explanation, but in the end, Choi Cedric is also in distress.
“Haaa, you … I thought you knew how to get out.”
“I can go out?”
“Huh?”
Choi Cedric took out a teleport scroll from the inventory.
“It’s a scroll that teleports to the gate. You can use this.”
“Why don’t you go back when you have something like this….”
“Just because. I don’t want to go home today.”
“Waeooong (Hoo, this guy’s natural flirting is pretty good).
“….Flirting?”
Ash turned his head with a sulky look. I pushed the grilled squid on the plate in front of Mieum. Fortunately, Mieum stopped talking nonsense because she was eating squid.
At that time, a fire spirit called Choi Cedric.
“Human, friend, help.”
“Oh, seriously, I’m in trouble if you keep calling me that. Yes, I’m coming, I’m coming.”
Tuk, a freshly caught fish was placed on the table. 
Shashashak. Choi Cedric took out his sword and sliced the fish in an instant. The fire spirit applauded and cheered.
“Cutting, splendid, flawless.”
“What? Do you want me to do this too? Yeah, I can’t help it then.”
“Perfect, gorgeous, wonderful.”
He’s excited…..
So, he doesn’t know the details, but he doesn’t want to go home and the reactions of the spirits were spectacular. Intoxicated by the response of these spirits, he was spending time here without returning immediately.
Choi Cedric, who returned after slicing a few more fish, handed me his teleport scroll.
“I have an extra, so use this if you need it.”
“Huh, thank you. Thank you so much!”
I accepted it without hesitation. I can go back if I have this scroll. If I can go back, it doesn’t matter whether there’s a star sign on the map or an event.
However, I was devastated by Choi Cedric’s words that followed after that.
“But can you use it?”
“Uh … why?”
Is there any side effect? Or is it an item that cannot be used by F-class Awakeners?
“You said you came with the whole building earlier? If you use the scroll and go back, what will you do with the property?”
…….
…….
Ah, that’s right. My store….
If I go back just with my body like this, I will only have a few family members without a house or a store….
At that moment of frustration, a huge flame suddenly appeared in the sky.
Flames swirled in the air. A haze rose from the intense heat that could not be compared to before.
The fire spirits bowed down on the floor and cheered.
“Master, appear, welcome.”
“Master, hooray, welcome.”
[The Great Old One: The Eternal Living Flame Cthugha has appeared.][Welcome to the Garden of Cthugha, the Eternal Living Flame.]
The flame that floated in the air gradually turned into a human form.
Red hair flutters in the air. 
Tak! The man who set foot on the floor with a bang looked like a human being made from flame. He looked like he was in his fifties. His hair, beard, and eyes were all red.
Pepe ran forward and bowed his head.
“Master, Pepe, come home. Humans, home, help.”
“….Hmm. Yes, you’ve had a hard time.”
Fortunately, the master of the spirits used the prepositions properly.
He looked at me in a crooked posture. Then, his face crumpled.
“Why is there a human here who smells like Heesun?”
What … who?

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c96:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

It was the day of the interview to select new hunters for The White Silver Guild.
Since there has been no new recruitment for a long time, the number of applicants was enormous. After selecting the documents, the interview was conducted.
“….what is this?”
Kwon Jiwoon, who was exhausted of interviewing one after another since morning, picked up the paper on the desk. The applicant in front of him answered quickly with a bright expression.
“This is my heart, please accept it!”
It was a slogan that said, ‘I love you Eunrang‘.

“………Haaa.”
Kwon Jiwoon touched his forehead.
At one time, there was a time when making a Hunter’s name, different from the real name, was popular. It was a time when the public’s attention was different because there were fewer rankers than now. The influence of the No. 1 ranker, Muwon, was also significant. Everyone tried to come up with a cool Hunter name like Muwon.
Now, most of the Hunters just use their real names, so it’s a dead trend.
Kwon Jiwoon also used the name ‘Eunrang‘ immediately after awakening due to the influence of the trend. However as time went by, the name was a little, no, a lot …embarrassing. Is it a little better than the Twitter nickname he made when he was in middle school? Today, the name is the same as his black history.
The idea of ​​daring to pick a name that has become a black history as a slogan and hand it over….
….is she making fun of him?
It was at the moment when Kwon Jiwoon was about to notify the applicant ‘I love you Eunrang’ that she was rejected.
“Guard, call the guard! A homeless man broke into the interview room!”
There was a commotion outside.
“Wait! You are not allowed to enter!”
The noise grew louder and louder. Naturally, the interview was interrupted, and he was distracted by the uproar outside.
“The deputy guild leader here is my son!”
“Do you think there were only one or two people who said that!”
“Oh ho, let me go!”
“How did you get through the security gate? Let’s come over here and talk.”
Bump! The intruder, who shook off the dissuading staff, opened the door without hesitation.
He was a middle-aged man who looked like a scoundrel. He is obscured by his messy hair and beard, but his face is familiar.
For some reason, he was with the new S-class, Hunter Choi Yichan.
The man shouted, avoiding the employee who was about to take him out immediately.
“I’m your father!”
“……what?”
***

“Father … what has happened in the meantime?”
The drawing room of the White Silver Guild.
It took a little longer for the father and son to have a reunion. They had to send back the people who had gathered and silence them.
In the meantime, Kwon Seokmin, who got a haircut and shaved, has a much cleaner appearance. Although he lost some weight, he looked exactly like the father Kwon Jiwoon remembered.
Kwon Jiwoon felt a lump in his throat.
He is the father who disappeared in the maze dungeon shortly after his awakening. At one time, he was worried about whether he should give up the search because he was discouraged. Still, he came back safely. The anguish and anxiety of the past swept his mind like a wave.
“How come the guild guards don’t recognize the guild leader? Son, we almost couldn’t even have a reunion between father and son because I couldn’t come into my guild.”
“Please understand. Over time, almost everyone has changed.”
Kwon Seokmin looked confused at the remark.
“What do you mean? Why did you change all the guards just because I was away for a month? Did you actually try to kick your father out? Are you succeeding to the throne?”
“Wait, a month?”
It was not uncommon for the time flow inside and outside the dungeon to be different. 
However, it has been at least six years. It was surprising when the time difference reached six years.
“No wonder I thought you had grown up a lot. It looks like the building has been remodeled. Gosh, what year is it now?”
“…. Year 20××.”
“What! Damn, I skipped too much time. Still, it’s still okay if the error rate is within 3 years. If we had any further differences, we would have a big problem.”
“………father?”
Mumbling, words that do not make sense followed. This was not the situation to ask what had happened in the past.
“…….”
Kwon Jiwoon slowly lowered his arm that was about to hug his father in emotion.
Yes, how can he understand how his father, who returned after many years, feels? Kwon Jiwoon decided to give his father more time to calm his mind and turned his head to the side.
Choi Yichan, who had followed Kwon Seokmin, bowed his head.
“Hello! You’re Rieul’s cousin, right? I’ve  heard about you a lot.”
“Yeah. What’s your relationship with our Rieul?”
“Haha, I’m her friend from high school … for now.”
Kwon Jiwoon chuckled.
Her friend is the new S-class Hunter that the Dungeon Management Office is currently looking for. It’s like that Hunter from Cheongna and Choi Cedric as well. Somehow there’s a lot of weird guys around his sister.
Be that as it may.
“How did you find my father?”
“That’s … by chance, in the dungeon, I happened to run into him.”
It was the moment when Kwon Jiwoon slightly frowned at the ambiguous answer and was about to ask again.
“Huk, that’s right, Rieul!”
Kwon Seokmin, who was muttering to himself, screamed.
“Son, where is Rieul? Rieul, I have to meet my niece soon!”

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c95:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

The sun is hot and the air is humid. Even though I took out thin clothes right away and put them on, the effect is insignificant. I was sweating profusely just by going out for a while and bringing the Golden Triangular Rhinoceros.
It would have been nice if the the air conditioner had been installed in advance, but now I only could taste the regret.
However, how could I have guessed that the building would suddenly transport over a cliff on the beach in midsummer weather like this?
[Item: Ice Cream Coffee (★★★★☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 01:00:00)Effect: Your body will become very cold.]

What caught my eye at that moment was the effect of ice cream coffee. With the sweet taste, cold energy flowed into my body. It was cool as if it’s the blessed by Willis Carrier (the inventor of modern air conditioner). The heat has cooled down and I’m feeling a bit refreshed.
I murmured, emptying the rest of the coffee.
“This is probably what they called leisure in the midst of business…”
“That Korean-Chinese phrase is accurate, waeoong.”
While tackling, Mieum also drank the ice cream coffee. I thought it must be hotter for her because she was a fur beast.
I did get some milk though. About where on earth is this place or how can we get back, nothing has been resolved.
Still, the fact that the coffee is delicious is comforting.
“….? What is it?”
At that moment, Ash raised his head as if he had sensed something.
Strange. I barely cooled down, but I felt the heat again. Furthermore, the heat grew stronger and stronger, as if a fire had been set nearby.
I got surprised when I turned my head along with Ash’s gaze.
It wasn’t just my feeling.
There was a real fire in front of the store.
“Fire….! Where’s the fire extinguisher? We have to bring the fire extinguisher!”
As I rushed to put out the fire, I was startled.
When I looked closely, the fireball had the shape of a child. It looked like a fire spirit.
And the fire spirit, who was trudging towards this side, began to shed tears.
It sounds strange that a fire sheds tears, but that was the only way I could express it. The tears that flowed from the spirit’s eyes turned into water vapor and disappeared.
“Huhuhu….”
It really sounds like, ‘There’s something wrong with me, so ask me quickly‘.
The mournful weeping continued for a long time. The spirit glanced at this side and then started crying again. It seemed that the spirit in front of the store would not move.
After a moment of contemplation, I approached the fire spirit. I’m worried because the spirit is crying a lot, and it was hard to ignore those eyes that say ‘come and talk to me quickly‘.
It will be difficult when the spirit who’s tired of crying comes into the store. Tables and chairs are all made of wood.
“Hey, why are you crying?”
The fire spirit raised his head, scattering water vapor.
“Cold fire, gnome, bad.”
“Cold fire?”
“They, I, cooled down. Pepe, swimming, impossible. Pepe, home, impossible.”
“Where is your home?”
“Sea, Pepe, Master.”
“Oh, I see….”
I have no idea…….
Perhaps it was because there was no inquiry into the language system, it was difficult to understand the words of the fellow who just laid out words. 
This is what I finally figured out after repeating the question and answer for a long time while sweating in the hot heat.
His name is Pepe. He is a fire elemental spirit, and he serves the master of ‘Eternal Living Flame‘. One day, however, the Master’s family, a piece of flame, ran away from home. It is said that Pepe went on a trip to find the piece that ran away from home under the order of his Master.
“Piece, run away, bad.”
“Kkyuuuu…..”
“Huh, Lime-ah, what’s wrong?”
“Kkyuu….”
Slowly, Lime hid behind me. The slime seemed to be avoiding Pepe.
Lime, don’t tell me you…….
For now, I calmed down Lime, who was clinging to me, and kept listening to the story.
He said that after looking for a runaway piece for a long time, he finally found a piece of flame. He swallowed the piece to take it right away. However, it was actually a piece of cold flame that was different from what Pepe was looking for. The action cooled his body and made him unable to swim in the sea.
“Master, wait, sea.”
He cried because he had to return to his master’s side, but he couldn’t cross the sea.
After much deliberation, I spoke in a cautious tone so as not to hurt this spirit.
“Pepe, look, it’s supposed to be … fire goes out when it touches water.”
But Pepe shook his head firmly.
“Possible, swim, ring.”
“….Ring?”
“Cthugha-nim, ring, fire. Pepe, swim, possible.”
“Are you talking about this?”
He nodded.
What Pepe was pointing to was a ring with a red stone in my hand. Cthuga’s ring. It is an item that I use to roast coffee after buying it from Grandma Kim Deokyi.
“Eternal, flame, fire.”
Is that okay? Pepe’s body is also fire, and this ring is also used to light fire, so it’s okay, right?
I used the power of the ring towards Pepe in doubt.
Hyuur. Pepe’s body caught the fire, and I felt an incomparable heat.\
“Pepe, warmth, joy.”
However, it was only for a short time that the intense flames enveloped his body. Pepe’s body cooled again.
“Pepe, cold, sadness.”
Pepe burst into tears. While I was thinking about how to soothe this spirit that is scattering water vapor….
Tiling! Tiling! A notification window popped up with a cheerful sound that didn’t fit the atmosphere. It was a quest.
[Main Quest: Saving Pepe the Fire SpiritYou have met Pepe, a pitiful spirit who has lost his way.Let’s warm Pepe’s body and send him home.Since ancient times, alcohol has been used to warm the body. Coffee with alcohol will work.When you achieve it, the Eternal Living Flame will honor you.Item Required: Irish CoffeeDeliver Irish Coffee to Pepe: 0/1Reward: Starlight of Fomalhaut, Corresponding Dungeon Map]
There were two things worth noting in this random quest.
So far, the main quest has only appeared in a large number of cases. Therefore, it was highly likely that this quest would not only help Pepe who came across by chance, but also have an answer to the current situation.
Second, a map given as a reward.
Starlight of Fomalhaut … is it an item? I don’t know what it is, so let’s skip it for now.
The important thing is the map. If I have a map, I can see what this place looks like. The exit may be marked, or I may get a hint of how to get out of this unidentified dungeon.
There is no time for hesitation. I checked the recipe and asked Pepe right away.
“Pepe, how old are you?”
“Age, question, boomer.”
“…….”
“Koreans, rank consciousness, bad.”
He was a very intelligent spirit…….
“It’s not that, it’s because it’s the information we need to help Pepe.”
“Pepe, early, 1200 years old.”
It’s a lot more than I expected, but … he’s not a minor, so that’s fine.
I asked Pepe to wait in front of the store for a moment, and then I returned to the store.
Whiskey was needed to make Irish Coffee, the condition of the quest. When I selected whiskey in the dimensional shop, a warning window popped up.
[Excessive drinking is bad for health and causes abnormalities.][Are you 19 years or older?Yes ☜ / No ]
That’s pretty thorough…….
When I selected ‘yes‘, a small glass bottle of whiskey fell into his hands. When I opened the lid, a strong smell came out. The alcohol seemed quite strong.
I added sugar to the whiskey and heated it to the point where it wouldn’t boil. Then, espresso and hot water were added one after another.
Next, I needed whipped cream. The whipped cream was obtained by manipulating the buttons on the milking machine installed on the Golden Triangular Rhino.
When I filled this whipped cream to the end of the glass, it’s done.
[Item: Irish Coffee (★★★★☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 01:00:00)Effect: Your body will become very warm.]
A strong scent emanated from the glass. The harmonious aroma of sugar, coffee, and whiskey made my mind relaxed.
I immediately brought the glass to Pepe, who was waiting in front of the store.
“Pepe, drink this.”
“Smell, good, drink.”
Pepe took the glass. The glass began to melt as soon as Pepe touched it, but fortunately, he was able to drink it all before it completely melted.
And as the last drop of Irish coffee disappeared into his mouth, a powerful flame enveloped Pepe’s body.
“Pepe, hot, joy.”
My sweat dripped down. It was so hot that I had to step back to avoid getting burned.
We have succeeded!
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Main Quest: Saving Pepe the Fire Spirit’.Please collect the rewards.][You have acquired the Starlight of Fomalhaut. You can observe the stars of Fomalhaut star in the space.][You have obtained the Dungeon Map.]
“Pepe, thank you, repay.”
“It’s okay, you don’t have to repay me.”
I did that just to complete the quest and get the map anyway.
“Savior, my home, invitation……!”
However, it seems that the alcohol in the Irish coffee was too strong. Drunken Pepe suddenly began to get excited.
“Invitation, banquet, excitement……!”
Every time Pepe moved, a burning flame spread out in all directions. At this rate, Pepe’s flames would burn our house.
“Oh, calm down, Pepe! Hold on. Calm down.…!”
“Invitation, decline, impossibe…..!”
The flames made scorched marks on the store’s brick walls. Just before the fire spreads to the trees in the yard.
It was Ash who calmed Pepe. He threw a violent glance at the blazing flame.
“Calm down. What rudeness is this to my master!”
“World, Twilight, Demon King….? Why, here, exist?”
“The spirit of fire, be courteous to my master.”
“Hey, Ash, if you say that about your employer, it might be misleading.”
I hope you don’t misunderstand. The only contract between Asj and I is an employment contract that complies with the Labor Standards Act.
Master, it sounds a little … wrong.
“Master, I don’t know, sorry.”
Fush, the flame died down.
Dramatic reconciliation between non-human beings … no, it seemed that the hierarchy has been sorted out.
Pepe, who became much calmer than before, hung his head sadly.
“Pepe, friend, none. Alone, home, lonely. Apology, reflection, goodbye.”
The tears that overflowed from Pepe’s eyes became steam and scattered. He bowed his politely. I hurriedly called Pepe, who was about to leave.
“No, Pepe, I will accept the invitation. Thank you.”
“Really, joy, excitement!”
I glanced at the map I just received as a quest reward.
A small island in the middle of the sea. A large star was drawn where Pepe’s house was. The ‘Event’ mark flickered.
I don’t know exactly what kind of event it is.
Pepe’s invitation could be a solution to this unanswered situation.

Translator’s Corner:
leisure in the midst of business: 망중한 [忙中閑] leisure in intervals of one’s business; a moment of relief (snatched) from pressure of business; a break in the pressure of one’s (official) work. The phrase is taken from Chinese characters, 忙 (busy), 心 (heart),  亡 (perish/die).  It means something like … you are living your life without taking care of your heart because of your busy life. I don’t know much about Chinese though, so I can be wrong. Feel free to correct me~

It still has error sadly T__T I still can’t sleep or shutdown it without making forced shutdown … I will take it back to the service center (they really going to meet me three days in rows– they shouldn’t be complaining because I paid a lot for the service though) so let’s pray they can fix it in a day because there’s no way I spent another two weeks without my dear laptop again T__T

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c94:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Yeah, it’s true that I need milk, and if it’s about favorability, there’s a ‘Smile‘ skill, so let’s give it a try it.
‘Smile.’
My lips moved naturally and drew a perfect commercial smile.
[Activating the ‘Smile‘ skill.][Lv. 1. Effect: Smiling makes you feel better. This improves the mood of the subject.][The cast subject’s favorability increases.]

“Eummoo.”
The golden triangular rhinoceros that was grazing turned its head and looked at me.
Oh, it’s weak reaction, but it’s responsive.
All right, let’s do it again. And then again, again….
[The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros is a bit interested in you.][Favorability: ♥♡♡♡♡]
“Heuh, heuugh…”
The corners of my mouth ached. I don’t know how much I smiled to fill just one heart.
On calculation, it seemed that it would take enough time to make my mouth cramp to fill up to five hearts at this speed.
It must have been quite boring to just watch what I was doing. Ash took a step closer to the cow.
“What the hell are you doing?”
“That’s it, I was trying to tame this cow by increasing the favorability.”
“That’s the way of a weak human being. Predators do not seek the favor of their prey.”
Huh?
Now I know that our genius part-timer is not an ordinary 8th grader boy, but a mysterious unknown entity called the incarnation. I learned about it from the last black mucus incident.
Even so, the dialogue just now greatly seemed like something that was said by a boy in his storm and stress period.
“Isn’t it enough to turn this disobedient monster into steaks?”
“Aaaaah! Kim Ash, calm down! The Golden Triangular Rhino is a milk cow, not beef cow!”
I caught Ash in a hurry.
“Cows are the same when they are roasted over a fire.”
“Mmmoooo!”
Surprised by Ash’s spirit, the Golden Triangular Rhino took a step back.
[The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros is wary of you. The favorability decreases.]
No, how did I raise its favorability!
“Calm down, yes, think of cafe mocha! You need milk to make delicious cafe mocha!”
Stop.
At the word ‘cafe mocha‘, the part-timer of our house stopped moving.
Taking advantage of that opportunity, I quickly opened the Ether-Wiki. It was to find a way to increase the favorability other than using the smile skill.
《Golden Triangular Rhinoceros》Type: Animal Monster>MammalGrade: ADescription: A cow monster that lives only in A-grade clean dungeons. It is characterized by black and white spots, and the main food is pasture. Its milk can be collected.What the Golden Triangular Rhinoceros likes:[Continue Reading]
The information was exactly what I wanted. According to the contents of this wiki, in order to increase the favorability….
“What are you doing outside, leaving me alone waeoong!”
At that time, Mieum and Lime came out of the cafe after hearing the commotion we made.
However, the Golden Triangular Rhino, who saw Lime’s vivid red body, suddenly began to snort.
Every time Lime bounced its body, it got more and more excited.
“…Kkyuuu?”
The Golden Triangular Rhino ran towards Lime. Surprised, Lime refused the cow by bouncing its body.
But each time the vivid red lump glimmered in front its eyes, the cow’s excitement grew more and more.
“Mmmmooo!”
“Kkyu, kkyuuu….”
Cows are actually color-blind, so the myth that they get excited when they see red is not true. For some reason, this Golden Triangular Rhinoceros seems to have suddenly became a fan of Lime.
Lick. The cow licked Lime’s smooth body with its tongue. The cow licked so meticulously, it wasn’t long before Lime’s plump body became soaked with saliva.
“Kkyuuu, kkyu….”
The reaction showed that Lime hates it so much. I could even tell without using the slime language translator.
“Kyagyagyaolg! This red blob is full of saliva!”
Mieum backed away, frightened.
Splosh! Lime, who was dodging around, bounced off its body and stuck to the face of the Golden Triangular Rhinoceros.
It won’t be able to breathe if it continues like this. The moment I was about to separate Lime, who was quickly soaked in saliva, from the Golden Triangular Rhino.
“Mmm, Mmmoooo!”
The cow’s favorability began to rise.
[The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros is interested in the Red Slime.][Favorability: ♥♥♡♡♡][The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros is very interested in the Red Slime.][Favorability: ♥♥♥♡♡][The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros looks at the Red Slime with deep eyes.][Favorability: ♥♥♥♥♡]
The hearts were filled up red at an incredible speed … in the course of time.
[The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros thinks it’s okay to live together with the awesome Red Slime.][Favorability: ♥♥♥♥♥][Taming is complete!Summon: The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros in love obeys you.]
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Sub Quest: Where is The Pounding Heart?’.Please collect the rewards.][Exclusive barn construction is available. Select “Build” in the space.][Advanced Automatic Milking Machine can be installed. Select “Install” after building the barn.]
The quest was cleared on its own.
“Mmmmme.”
The Golden Triangular Rhino walked into the space on its own before I could say anything.
It was said that love is like a spark, and indeed it was as fast as lightning.
***
Choi Yichan swung his sword at the monster.
Shashashak, kwang!
It was as fast as lightning. The sword accurately aimed only at the vital points of the monster. Choi Yichan, who finished the battle with agility that is difficult to imagine with his large body, checked the system window.
[Name: Choi YichanClass: Berserker (S) (Lv.39)※ The Great Old One: In contract with the King in Yellow.]
The level has risen quite a bit. Now, if he catches a few more monsters, the quest will end.
“Haa….”
‘I want to go back soon.’
With that thought in mind, he grabbed his weapon, but he felt a presence behind him. The sound of someone stepping on dry branches.
Is there another monster? He must have killed all the monsters in this area.
The moment Choi Yichan tried to turn to the side where he heard the sound, a voice intervened.
【Don’t go that way.】
“Why?”
【Something bad will happen.】
Hmm.
After hearing those words, Choi Yichan was lost in thought for a moment, then headed to the place where the sound came without hesitation.
【Gosh, there’s no trust.】
It’s been several days since he entered the Great Dungeon Abyss. In the meantime, this King in Yellow has often meddled with him. Some places are dangerous, some have good items, and so on.
The result of naively following that voice was to fall into the high-level monster zone from the beginning.
Even though he’s an S-class, it’s the end of peace and the beginning of suffering for the dirt-spoon Hunter who has no practical experience and no decent items.
The present achievement was a level that was achieved through tears.
Choi Yichan’s action, stained with distrust, was firm. Leaving his giggling voice behind, he checked the identity of the presence. In preparation for the monster’s attack, he prepared to use his skills at any time with a weapon in his hand.
Crumble. The footsteps got a little bigger.
The location where the grass swayed was low. It is not something large in size. Considering the size of the sound, it weighs about 60 kg. There’s no way humans are here….?
“Huh, don’t tell me….”
For a moment, Choi Yichan doubted his eyes. However, his keen sense gave the same answer.
The owner of that presence is….
Shreek. He put the weapon in his hand.
A man appeared from where his gaze was directed.
He was a middle-aged man who lost his weapon and wandered around. He had no visible major wounds, but he seemed to have suffered quite a lot, with a thick beard and only a sheet of rag on his body. His face was thin because he lost weight, but his eyes were gleaming.
If this wasn’t in the dungeon, the awful-looking man would be misunderstood as a homeless person.
However, Choi Yichan approached him and bowed his head.
“Ahjussi, hello!”
“……?”
The middle-aged homeless man turned his head. He looked confused about  where he was.
“I’ve met you once before, do you remember me? I’m a friend of Rieul, Choi Yichan. You’re Rieul’s uncle, right?”
“….Huh?”
Hunter Kwon Seokmin, the father of Kwon Jiwoon and the uncle of Kwon Rieul, who went missing in the maze dungeon a few years ago, looked surprised.
***
“Mmmoooo.”
“Yeah. Go, go.”
It’s on its own. A big cown sat down in the space and cried. In the meantime, the area was expanded as a quest reward.
As I got closer, the notification rang.
[You can build an exclusive barn. Do you want to build it?Yes ☜ / No ]
In an instant, a barn with a roof and a feeder was built.
[Summon: The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros in love likes the special congratulatory address.][Advanced Automatic Milking Machine can be installed. Do you want to install it?Yes ☜ / No ]
A milking machine with a thick tube and a stainless steel barrel was installed on the body of the Golden Triangular Rhino. I immediately pressed the button on the milking machine. For a moment, there was the sound of a machine running.
“……!”
Drip. White milk started pouring into the stainless steel barrel.
[Item: Freshly Squeezed Milk (★★★☆☆)Milk freshly squeezed from from a rare A-class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros.A rich taste different from ordinary milk.It makes the quality of the drink better.]
This milk has one more star than when it was purchased from the Dimensional Shop. It was worthwhile to bring the Golden Triangular Rhinoceros after all the hard work.
“Kkyuu…”
Lime bounced its body as if telling me that it had done all the hard work.
Anyway, since I finally got my hands on the milk, I decided to have a cup of coffee before I looked around more.
At the moment, there is no hint about where this place is, and the freshly squeezed milk with a fragrant smell looked very delicious.
Can’t I drink coffee in the dungeon?
Of course, I can. Sure. Yes, dungeon exploration is also about eating.
I went straight out of the space with milk and prepared to make coffee. I displayed the recipe list that was much longer than the beginning and thought about what to make for a while.
The answer soon came out. That’s the menu I need now.
Ice cream coffee. This is a menu that I hadn’t made since Choi Yichan left with only one note.
To avoid misunderstanding, it’s not that I didn’t make it because of him. There were no customers looking for this menu because it was just winter.
I can’t even contact him through phone, and I don’t know where and what Choi Yichan is doing.
The Dungeon Management Office is looking for him like crazy, but if he has not yet been found in this narrow Korea, is he still inside the dungeon? I hope everything’s all right.
With that thought in mind, I quickly made coffee. I put ice, espresso, milk, and vanilla syrup in a glass. It was done after pouring plenty of ice cream and sprinkling chocolate powder.
This time, I also served the coffee to Mieum and Lime in a small glass. Although they were not usually interested in coffee, they drank the coffee without saying a word.
“Come on, Ash, try it.”
“….Okay.”
First, take a bite of ice cream, then mix it with coffee and take another bite. Naturally, exclamations flowed out.
“I think I’m going to live a little now….”
Ash agreed with a nod.
It’s a sweet coffee with milk that I haven’t tasted in a long time. Of course, the taste is good, but there was another reason why I chose this menu now.
Because it was so hot right here.
It was winter outside, but in one night, I transported over to a cliff on the beach in midsummer.

Translator’s Corner:
Storm and Stress: 질풍노도, a term to describe the emotional and behavioral troubles of adolescence. It’s an english translation of the term Sturm und Drang.
Dirt-spoon: the lowest level spoon in the theory of the low-income class, and in Korea, it refers to the working class or low-income class, and is a representative word that symbolizes poverty.
For people who missed Choi Yichan, here you go.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c93:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“The plan … is done now. Aeon, let’s just quit everything. I can still fix it now. I can fix it, so let’s just….”
“What a foolish human being. You can’t handle one of these things right.”
“What? … uugh.”
There was no time to question the sudden change of tone. Lee Sein was nauseous and hurriedly covered her mouth.

In front of her eyes, the human form of Aeon began to collapse. No, that can’t be human. Such a terrible thing. What the hell is going on…..
The thinking did not continue. Just looking at the collapsing figure, she felt the pain of something rubbing the delicate texture of her mind with sandpaper.
After several seconds, Aeon turned into a half-melted, amorphous black mass.
“……!”
The figure resembled the black mucus that attacked the city a few days ago.
Lee Sein suddenly remembered a name.
….The Faceless One.
Indeed, it’s a suitable name for the object in front of her.
“Ua-aaagh! Go away!”
Snap, the black mass collapsed and attacked Lee Sein.
‘I have to use items for self-defense…..’
Lee Sein’s class is a secondary wizard. He always carried a self-defense item that was simply activated to compensate for his lack of physical power. To compensate for the lack of physical strength, she always carried self-defense items that were simple to activate.
However, before she could use her hands, the item that touched the half-melted Aeon melted away.
“Ugh…!”
Resistance is not enough. Lee Sein, who fell on the floor, threw the vase she caught while reaching out wildly.
Clatter! 
There was a loud bang. The thrown vase was hit head-on by Aeon.
“Heuk, heugh …. heugh … is it done?”
Startle. Aeon stopped moving. She was relieved for a while, then the half-melted face burst into laughter.
“Kehehehe, hehehee, heheehee….”
“Ugh…!”
With a bizarre laughter, Aeon came closer. She thought he should run away, but her body did not move. As she witnessed the unknown horror, it seemed like he was cutting her mind with a carving knife.
Aeon, which melted completely and became a black mass, grabbed Lee Sein. Then, without hesitation, the black mucus was pushed into Lee Sein’s mouth. It’s suffocating.
“Eu-euugh! Uugh!”
‘I have to tell Choi Cedric….’
It was the last thought she had before she lost her mind.
The door opened again when the struggle had stopped completely. A Hunter of C&L Corporation spoke carefully.
“CEO Lee Sein-nim, I heard a loud noise. Is there something wrong?”
Lee Sein slowly rose up. She combed her disheveled hair with her hand, arranged her crumpled suit, and turned back to look at the Hunter.
“It’s fine. I slipped my hand and dropped the vase. Can you call someone to clean it up?”
“Yes, I’ll call them in a minute.”
The Hunter, who was about to close the door and leave, tilted his head slightly and turned his head again.
“Uh, by the way, CEO-nim.”
“What’s wrong?”
“Were you alone? I saw Aeon-ssi coming this way earlier.”
“Well, I’ve been alone the whole time. Maybe he went somewhere else?”
The eyes of Lee Sein, who gave that answer, glowed dull like imitation jewels.
***
It was a normal morning that day.
After turning off the alarm on my phone three times, I reluctantly got up.
I gave food for Mieum and Lime, then I ate breakfast on the first floor with Ash. Originally, I was going to make egg rolls, but I failed to flip it, so it became scrambled eggs. Well, it’s cooked, so that’s enough.
Ash had been sulking for some reason since last night, but he didn’t skip breakfast. I’m glad, you have to eat well before going to work.
After finishing the meal, I checked the stock. I still have enough coffee beans.
This was because I obtained an item after went through 10 consecutive rounds of golden drawing tickets accumulated as rewards for quests or achievements.
[Item: Fully Automatic Large Roaster for Business (★★★☆☆)Roast anything and everything.A fully automatic system that anyone can use easily.It can be installed in the space to save space.It can be used conveniently with the Cthugha’s Ring.※ Free installation]
The large roster that I was eagerly waiting for!
I fell in love as soon as I saw this item. Now, I can easily roast a large amount of coffee beans.
So, shall we make a little more sugar?
Thinking that way, I casually looked out the window and got surprised.
“Huh….?”
Blue sky and warm morning sun. The view is open and refreshing.
Does anyone realise what’s weird here?
The ominous appearance of Abyss, the Great Dungeon that always looked big in the window, was nowhere to be seen.
No, more than that.
I rushed out and checked the outside.
Sshwaa~
I heard the sound of waves. Sunlight poured down over the golden sandy beach, and fantasy-style buildings were sparsely visible in the distance.
“Where am I….?”
The outside of the store had become a strange place.
Tiling, the alarm sounded.
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Sub Quest: A Dungeon Walk’.Please collect the rewards.]
Cafe Rieul was placed on a cliff overlooking the sea. 
The word ‘placed‘ for a building is awkward, but this situation can only be expressed that way.
Did a hurricane happen while I was asleep yesterday? It’s not some sort of Wizard of Oz, how did the whole store building move to a strange place?
I gazed blankly at the blue sea out the window.
Yes, I like the sea, too. A peaceful summer resort is great. A vacation where you lie on a sunbed and do nothing, then eat and do nothing again. It’s fantastic.
However, I did not want the whole store to fly to the sea.
“What’s going on here….”
I decided to calm down and see if there were any other abnormalities.
The inside of the store was as usual. The space was accessible as usual, and the electricity and water supply are fine. However, my phone has no connection.
When I put down my phone that kept failing to connect, I found the quest completion notification blinking.
What kind of quest was this? I checked the detailed explanation of the quest, and soon lamented.
[Sub Quest: A Dungeon WalkYou’re tired of your work, go away.Let’s go around the dungeon, take care of your health, and refresh your mood.
Enter a random dungeon: 1/1Rewards: EXP (500 EXP), 100 rubies, random recipe]
[Experience: 500 EXP have been acquired.][You have reached Level 13.][You have acquired a new recipe ‘Irish Coffee’.]
…….Yeah, I got this quest.
The fact that this quest, which was constantly ignored, was suddenly completed, that is.
This is in the dungeon….
Since I don’t want to go into the dungeon, it throws the whole store into the dungeon while sleeping. It is truly a system of great thinking.
I rubbed my forehead while glaring at the system notification, and Mieum protested next to me.
“Waeoolgh! Not me, it’s not me! I don’t know!”
“I haven’t said anything yet?”
“Didn’t you just look at me suspiciously!”
That’s true. It was this cat that was most closely related to dungeons and the system here.
However, Mieum ran wild, claiming that it was unfair, and eventually drooped her head and muttered.
“Waeoong … I don’t have the authority to do such a big thing. What kind of power does a low position have….”
Next to this cat, who is in a state of wasting time and reciting the sorrow of a subordinate.
“Kkyuuuuu! Kkyuu, kkyuuuu!”
This time, Lime suddenly began to cry with tremendous momentum.
“Lime-ah, what’s wrong? What’s going on?”
Seeing the body bouncing like a rubber ball, it looks like it has something to say. I quickly took out the slime language translator and tried to interpret Lime’s words.
“Kkyuuu .. kkyuu!”
━  I can feel His power up close.
“Who is he? Rather, Lime-ah, do you know where this place is?”
“Kkyuu, kkyuu, kkyuuuuu!”
━  The Eternal Living Flame, His great garden. Worship.
“….what? So who is that?”
“Kkyuuuu, kkyu … kkyuuu….”
━ 3.14159265358979…….
This time, the circumference rate came out. I asked a few more times, but the results were the same. The periodic table of elements, the quadratic formula, etc. Anyway, something irrelevant to what I was curious about came up and and then it ended up being silent.
What a have-no-answer science slime.
Why are all the animals in my house like this….
I gave up getting information from Mieum and Lime and approached the window. I opened the window slightly and looked outside with only my head sticking out. I looked around for a while, but all I could hear was the sound of the wind.
As I was doing it for a long time, Ash came closer and asked.
“What are you doing?”
“Ash, shh!”
Although it is inside the dungeon, there is no sign of a monster.
Instead, there is only a view that would fit a sub-title such as ‘Relaxing Episode Summer Vacation’.
Can I go outside? I don’t think there’s any dangerous monsters.
“Oh, wait a minute, Ash! Don’t go out on your own!”
“Are you going to stay like that? If you’re late, I’ll leave you behind.”
Ash grabbed the doorknob and asked with a sullen look.
Er, I don’t know. It’s not like I can find a solution just by thinking about it here. I went out of the store after Ash.
I searched around with Ash for a moment. However, there was nothing particularly noticeable, and the system window was still quiet.
I was about to say let’s not go too far and go back to the store first.
Rustling.
I heard the sound of something stepping on dry grass right up close. At that moment, my nerves were on edge.
“Ash, stand back. There’s something over there.”
“Don’t be scared. I’ll take care of it if I have to.”
Contrary to Ash’s intention, the way he straightened his shoulders while saying that was very cute.
“So if I protect you, you and I will….”
“Will?”
“Will be…!”
As soon as Ash was about to say something, the presence beyond the bushes grew bigger. I was surprised as I stared over the bushes with the intention of roasting it with the power of the ring on my hand.
It was …. a cow.
A large body, black spotting fur on white background, and a mild-looking face. I rubbed my eyes and stared at it again, but it’s really a cow. The only thing that was unusual was the golden triangular horns on its head.
Soon, a system notification appeared in front of my eyes.
[A Golden Triangular Rhinoceros (A) has appeared.]
Fortunately, the cow did not show aggression.
The cow, who glanced at us and soon lost interest, began to eat grass leisurely. The scenery worthy of the peaceful and idyllic summer vacation episode unfolded before my eyes.
Phew, I’m relieved. It’s not a dangerous situation.
“Ash, let’s go to the other side over there.”
But the sound of Tiling, as if trying to grab my foot, rang again.
[Sub Quest: Where is The Pounding Heart?Don’t you need milk, an important ingredient that enriches the taste of coffee?A Golden Triangular Rhino appeared in front of you.Raise the favorability of the Golden Triangular Rhino to the highest level.If you succeed in taming it, you can get milk.Taming the Golden Triangular Rhinoceros: 0/1Rewards: Exclusive Barn, Advanced Automatic Milking Machine]
Eek…..
Milk is still out of stock at the Dimensional Shop, and as a result, and the range of menus has been greatly reduced.
I need milk, I do need it, but … I don’t want to get it from a cow myself.
I hope this system remembers that I am a person who prefers to buy and spend money rather than DIY.
[The Golden Triangular Rhinoceros is indifferent to you.][Favorability: ♡♡♡♡♡]
The problem is now that the entire store is teleported into an unknown dungeon. There is no other information other than this sub quest.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c92:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“You said that before.”
“What do you mean?”
“Awakening doesn’t mean you become a different being.”
Ah. Was it on the way back from buying the Purifying Tree at Dungeon Plant Farm? I vaguely remember that I said such a thing while talking about the twins, Joo Shinwoo and Joo Shinhee.
“The moment I heard that, I felt relieved. I feel like you’re telling me that I also haven’t become a different person.”

“But that … that’s something anyone can say.”
Indeed, it is. It’s not a big deal to hear what I said again through his mouth. If I randomly asked anyone on the street, they would say the same thing.
“That’s possible.”
Ki Yoohyun readily affirmed what I said. He added straight away.
“But Rieul-ssi is the only one who actually said that to me. So….”
His voice fades into a trembling breath. I turned my head and looked at Ki Yoohyun quietly.
“So I wanted to tell Rieul-ssi. About who I am. At least, I want to be honest with Rieul-ssi.”
“…….”
Blurry? No presence? Why did I think of such a ridiculous idea earlier?
The man who’s staring at me looks so clear. The eyes that shone even in the dark, the warm gaze, the well-shaped chin, and even the softly closed lips.
My heart was beating loudly.
This was different from the reflexive tension of facing a man who looked incredibly beautiful. I felt unfamiliar with this feeling.
Surely, I am not sensible.  I don’t know what’s going on, but….
The problem is that I’m not ignorant enough to mistake this feeling as a sense of debt or concern for a man who sealed the Demon Gate alone.
I hurriedly turned my head and murmured a little.
“That … it’s late, let’s hurry up and go back. Ash asked me to come back quickly.”
“Haha, yes.”
Ki Yoohyun also turned around and straightened his posture. It was only after his eyes had moved away from me that I could barely breathe.
My grandmother told me to run away if I felt sorry for a man because I couldn’t give an answer.
Grandma, I think I’m kind of screwed….
We hardly spoke to each other while driving toward the store. Finally, the car stopped in front of the store in a tense but not uncomfortable silence.
I tried to open the car door quickly, but it didn’t open well, perhaps because I was in a hurry. Ki Yoohyun’s upper body got close to the point he could pull the lock without any problems. I tilted my head back in surprise.
“Rieul-ssi, seat belt.”
“……Ah.”
Click. Ki Yoohyun reached out toward me and unfastened the seat belt that had not been loosened properly. Then, he added with a smile.
“Rieul-ssi, think carefully about my proposal.”
***
“Huh, ah, haaa…..”
When the car that left after dropping me off was completely out of sight, I took a deep breath. As I inhaled the cold air, my mind finally calmed down. My cheeks were so hot that I could tell without having to touch them.
Cafe Rieul was right in front of me, but I couldn’t go in like this. My face right now was obviously looked like someone who had something special happened to them.
It was difficult for me to respond to the overflowing curiosity of the animals in my family. I have to to cool my cheeks for a while before going inside.
It was when I was about to go around the alley in front of the store with that in mind.
“….Huh?”
I felt a strange gaze and turned my head.
There was a stranger standing on the other side of the road.
The first thing that stood out was a very beautiful appearance. Although the gender was not clear, I felt a strong charm that attracted my attention.
However, the eyes that are just staring without any expression are creepy. The eyes that emptied the emotions that human eyes naturally contained seemed empty.
I’ll go into the store and cool my cheeks. At first glance, the stranger didn’t seem like an ordinary person.
I felt reluctant and tried to open the cafe door quickly, but my body didn’t move. It was as if someone had paralyzed my body. 
The strange man narrowed the distance with me in an instant.
His hand touched my cheek. I could feel a creepy coldness on my hot cheek. Before I knew it, a suspicious person’s long finger slightly touched my hair and then moved away again.
“….it’s you.”
What?
“The owner of the key. The one who will reach the Ultimate Gate.”
….pardon?
I want to ask what on earth is he talking about, but my lips don’t move. I had no choice but listen to this strange man’s words.
“Ah, what absurd misunderstanding I have! Ha, hahaha … why did I just find out now! The change has already begun. So, this round has become an independent loop out of the infinite spiral. Yes, since the old human survived, or even earlier, the catastrophe had already begun.”
It’s been a while since I’ve heard someone talking nonsense, without caring whether I listen to it or not, like this.
The eyes that were empty, as if they had been pierced with glass eyes, twinkled, and the feeling of this strange person was clearly felt.
It’s joy. He trembled with joy.
The things that Ki Yoohyun said a while ago flashed my mind. He told me that a crazy religious group will appear.
I knew it right away. It’s this guy. There was a sapidity in his eyes, drunken with his own thoughts.
The strange person mumbled the unknown words for a while, and then smiled brightly.
Hick. It was like crazy pseudo-religion to do missionary work in a place like this. I want to run away, but my body doesn’t move.
“Are you wary of me? Don’t worry. Will I harm the owner of the key that finally appeared?”
Again, his hand brushed my eyes and the pressure eased a little. I managed to utter my words with a barely suppressed breath.
“It’s … what is it?”
Is that it? You’re Messiah or something, so pay for the apocalypse or buying a statue, is this that kind of pattern?
“You don’t have to know now. As long as you reach the Gate, we will naturally meet again.”
“No, I don’t know anything about that!”
I tried to speak as sharply as I could, but the trembling ends of my words were swallowed in my breath. Before I knew it, the sweat went into my eyes and it stung.
I closed my eyes tightly, and when I opened them, the person holding me was gone.
***
Crash!
“Heuh, huuh….”
When I hurriedly opened the cafe door and entered, Ash and the animals turned their heads, as if they were waiting for me.
“What’s wrong with you, waeong!”
When I heard Mieum’s carefree voice, I finally realized that I had returned home. I wiped the cold sweat from my forehead with the back of my hand and pretended to be calm.
“Oh, it’s too cold for run.”
“What? I didn’t see him like that, but he has no manners. I can’t believe he’s not taking you home after a date!”
“Date?”
Ash asked sharply. Mieum added, throwing her front paws at Ash.
“Then what did you think the two went for, waeooong!”
“….Humph.”
It wasn’t a date, and Ki Yoohyun took me to the front of the store.
No, rather than that, since when did Ash understand Mieum’s words?
There was a lot of things to tackle, but I sat on the floor without saying anything. What had just happened was terrifying, and my body lost all strength. I murmured in my mind.
‘What, I’m scared….’
I should seriously consider Ki Yoohyun’s proposal.
On the way back in the car, he made me an offer.
The proposal was to officially reveal <Cafe Rieul> as a cafe selling drinks with special effects. He said that it can be registered as a special business by requesting to the Dungeon Management Office. In return, he would make his guild guard this cafe in case something unpleasant happened.
So far, the cafe has been running without any problems, but it was unexpectedly popular. I don’t know where and how the rumor spread.
The dream of a five-day work-weekend (which means five days of rest) has not been fulfilled, and there is no guarantee that it will be fine in the future even if it has been successful so far.
‘But….’
Seeing my face filled with dislike, Ki Yoohyun added.
“If you don’t like having too many customers, you can only take a set number of people by reservation.”
Ah. I didn’t think of that.
It’s not a damaging proposition for me. Rather, it’s a proposal that doesn’t benefit Ki Yoohyun.
When I asked him that, Ki Yoohyun shook his head.
“No way. If I can stably drink Rieul-ssi’s coffee every day, that’s a benefit.”
Still, I feel like I’m one step further away from a relaxed and comfortable cafe. I put his offer on hold to think about it more and came back home.
Immediately, a crazy pseudo-religious man appeared.
It’s not enough to simply say that I was subjected to unpleasant missionary work, the joyous expression on his face was making me too uncomfortable.
I immediately took out my phone and tried to send a message to Ki Yoohyun. However, the input was not done properly because my hands were shaking.
Huu, let’s calm down. It’s late, so I’ll go to bed first and I’ll call him tomorrow morning to ask about the offer in detail.
I turned off the chat window and stood up.
“I’m going to bed.”
“Kkyuuu!”
But the next morning.
I couldn’t contact Ki Yoohyun right away.
Because something unexpected happened.
“Eh….?”
***
In the same time when Kwon Rieul was in shock, Lee Sein slowly raised her head.
Her mind was clear as if she had woken up from a long dream. The throbbing headache and the strange voice disappeared. In that sense, Lee Sein could look around with a perfectly calm head.
The guild leader’s room in the quiet C&L Corporation.
She could see what she had accomplished so far. Glittering skyscrapers, numerous commendations, strong position, fame, and countless Hunters who follow her words….
….and for her who doesn’t have a family, Choi Cedric and Choi Rona are like her real family members.
How long has it been since she stopped by Choi Rona’s hospital room? Has she ever had a quiet conversation with Choi Cedric?
She has already had enough success, so why was she so restless? Didn’t she miss something precious because she was chasing a mysterious thirst?
“…Let’s stop.”
Lee Sein, who made such a decision, stood up.
In her hand was a request for the attendance as a witness sent by the Dungeon Management Office. The content was about explaining her relationship with the Neo-Crown Party.
It’s better like this. It’s still manageable. Let’s quit the plan, acknowledge what they need to admit, and focus on the operation of the guild.
Click!
Then, the door opened. In front of the door stood Lee Sein’s secretary, who had been missing for a while.
“…Aeon.”
Days have passed since the Otherworld Gate was closed and the power of The Faceless One █████ was deactivated. Lee Sein did not bother to look for her secretary even though she noticed that he had disappeared. He was always a reliable secretary, but from some point on, she felt uneasy.
“Aeon, where have you been?”
Therefore, Lee Sein’s words flowed out somewhat stiffly.
“CEO Lee Sein-nim.”
Aeon entered the room with a silent step.
The secretary in front of her is smiling incredibly brightly. The beautiful eyes that would catch anyone’s attention disappeared under the eyelids and then reappeared.
Startle.
Lee Sein felt goosebumps on her back.
Wait, was Aeon originally look like this? What did he look like? How come … the person in front of her felt so unfamiliar.
No, was he human in the first place?
A cold voice reached her ears.
“You failed. This time, too.”
