SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c83:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Where did all the guild members go? Does anyone else know what’s going on?”
This question was answered by another person.
“That … these all the Hunters belonging to The White Silver Guild.”
“What?”

“There are some Hunters who aren’t present because of the Dungeon duty, but they’re only a few. That … something happened recently, so our Hunters decreased a lot.”
He lowered his gaze as if it was an uncomfortable story. Again, Park Heeyoung recited in a trembling voice.
“Earlier, that bird must have caused the problem! Otherwise, why the deputy guild leader suddenly … heuk.”
A mournful cry broke out. She looked really shocked.
“Hey, calm down. This may be a simple barrier stone malfunction. Let’s try it again.”
The wizard closed his eyes and reached forward. However, the translucent membrane only shook a little, and there’s no change.
“Cough, cough!”
Perhaps due to the rebound of the skill, the wizard stumbled with a rough cough. The wind cut off the skill. When the wizard tried to reach forward again, someone stopped him.
“That’s enough, that’s enough. You don’t have to.”
An old man came forward from the back row of the crowd.
A stumbling gait. Seeing the people around  us taking half a step back with a nervous expression, he seemed to be someone in a high position.
“We don’t have time for this. Everyone knows how important the protective barrier installed in the guild is. As soon as the sun comes up, we will start working on the creation of a new barrier.”
“Wait … what do you mean?”
“Did you not hear it? That’s literally it. The father disappeared and the young hunter took over the barrier, and it seems that he didn’t manage it properly.”
“…….”
At this moment, I really hated this arrogant bastard.
“If a protective barrier is destroyed in one place, it will adversely affect the barrier of the entire city. If we leave it as it is, it will weaken the chain and increase the possibility that a rift will burst. We can’t leave it as it is. I will close this place right now.”
“Close … what about Kwon Jiwoon?”
“When he wakes up, he will break the seal on his own and come out … if he wakes up.”
“You … what are you doing?”
“I’m late to introduce myself. My name is Kim Doochun, the Defense Barrier Response Officer of the Dungeon Management Office.”
Tak! I slapped his outstretched hand that shamelessly asked to shake hands.
My stomach was boiling.
His words just now … this person intends to leave Kwon Jiwoon, who is now in a coma, inside the barrier as it is.
I don’t know how good he is in defense response, but how can he say that about Kwon Jiwoon?
Apart from my personal feelings for Kwon Jiwoon, I know his life. A top-class Healer, a deputy guild leader of famous guild, and a young Hunter with good looks to use.
While praising that Kwon Jiwoon was great, I clearly remember how much burden the Dungeon Management Office put on him since he was a kid.
“Is that what you’re saying now? How could the Management Office do that?”
“Hoo. So you can take responsibility, miss?”
“What?”
“Tsk, I don’t think you know because you’re an ordinary person.”
At this moment, I hated this person so much to the point that I wanted to kill this arrogant idiot.
“Each guild’s protective barriers form a single great barrier, and that plays a role in suppressing the incidence of high-grade rifts. The power of this barrier also helps when closing the rift. However, if this chain is destroyed and there is even an A-Grade crack in the middle of the city, can you take responsibility for it, miss?”
“What, that’s….!”
It was the moment when I was about to scream in anger.
“……That’s strange.”
A low, calm voice cut through the air. It was Ki Yoohyun.
“What do you mean?”
“You don’t know the cause or the details of the situation yet, but you hurriedly said you will close the barrier.”
“Hmmm.”
“As far as I know, the crisis response procedure isn’t like that, but … it seems like you want to deal with the barrier quickly. I wonder if there’s anything about it that would danger you.”
The arrogant old man asked Ki Yoohyun with a disapproving look in his face.
“What are you?”
“I’m just accompanying Rieul-ssi. You don’t need to know the details.”
Smile. Ki Yoohyun, who was staring at the arrogant old man for a while, pulled the corners of his mouth.
“Did you not hear anything from your boss? There seems to be no possibility of promotion.”
“What, wha-what….!”
Perhaps promotion was a red button, the  arrogant old man’s face quickly turned red with anger.
“One more thing. The protective barrier here has not been destroyed.”
“What? Is that true?”
“Yes, it was destroyed once, exactly, but regenerated shortly thereafter.”
“Wh-wha-what nonsense!”
Ignoring the arrogant old man’s protest, Ki Yoohyun continued speaking.
“As you said, this barrier is under the management of Hunter Kwon Jiwoon. Although the barrier is not a living thing, it does protect itself to some extent. It seems that the moment Hunter Kwon Jiwoon was fatally wounded, a barrier was activated to protect him.”
“Fatally wounded?”
A bitter light flashed in his dark eyes for a moment.
“It’s strange. He’s from the Healer class, but Hunter Kwon Jiwoon, an A-class hunter, was fatally wounded in his guild building, not anywhere else.”
Naturally, everyone’s gazes followed Ki Yoohyun’s movement. His feet stopped in front of Hunter Park Heeyoung.
“Hunter Park Heeyoung … do you have anything to tell? Did you not feel anything unusual?”
All of sudden, her shoulders trembled.
“I … I don’t know. Outside, I was looking outside….”
“Okay, you’re outside. Then, you must have seen the Gate that occurred today disappear.”
“Yeah, I saw it. It appeared big in the sky.”
“After that, you discovered and reported the incident, and the response officer came so quickly, I guess you had a connection.”.”
Eyes are intertwined in the air. Park Heeyoung screamed.
“Me, a-are you doubting me?”
“That’s something you’ll find out if you look into it slowly.”
Ki Yoohyun came close to Park Heeyoung. His voice was so low that only Park Heeyoung and I could hear it.
“You’d better not expect the one who approached you to save you….”
I couldn’t hear the last words. I don’t know what he said, but after Ki Yoohyun took a step back, Park Heeyoung’s face turned pale.
The emotion that appeared in eyes that trembled like aspen trees … it was horror.
Then, she vomited the words in a trembling voice.
“That … I didn’t mean to do it. The deputy guild leader, if only he didn’t doubt me….”
When Ki Yoohyun and I left this place, the time when the white bird with its golden tail flew across the sky and scattered light.
Kwon Jiwoon, who was left alone, called Park Heeyoung and asked: was it Park Heeyoung who brought the dying Long-tailed Phoenix?
“You don’t have to tell me who ordered it. I already know.”“Deputy guild leader, I don’t……!”“If you tell me honestly about why you did this, I’ll take care of it on my own.”
Panicked by those words, she attacked him … and Kwon Jiwoon was seriously injured. At that moment, the barrier that was in a state of rest was activated, triggered to protect Kwon Jiwoon’s body.
After that, Park Heeyoung contacted that arrogant troll behind the same background and tried to fix the situation.
“You! Shut that mouth!”
A roar from the arrogant old man sounded far way.
My patience ended there.
“How….”
The reason I’ve been ignoring Park Heeyoung and did not do anything to deal with her, even though she has been very unkind to me, was simple. She was Kwon Jiwoon’s subordinate, so I thought that she would be helpful to Kwon Jiwoon.
However, it’s not enough to betray him, she also tried to hurt Kwon Jiwoon.
Why? What’s the price that made you do something like that?
Unable to hold back my anger, I strode forward, but Ki Yoohyun grabbed my arm.
“Rieul-ssi.”
“Don’t stop me.”
“….I wouldn’t dare.”
A large hand covered my hand. Long, hard fingers dug into my clenched fist. It tickles.
I had a scratch on my palm because I clenched my fist as hard as I could without realizing it. I was so agitated that I didn’t even feel the pain.
Ki Yoohyun slightly stroked the red blood-stained wound with his finger and dropped a few drops of potion. The wound healed quickly. As if that was the only purpose he had, he let go of his hand and took a step back.
“Just, there’s no need for Rieul-ssi to be in pain because of people like this.”
My tears were about to pour down.
***
The situation was all sorted out.
Less than 10 minutes later, a new person from the Dungeon Management Office, and Hunter Park Heeyoung was detained.
“Why … ho-how did the Director come all the way here … aren’t you supposed to be in Jeju right now….!”
“Take him.”
Even the arrogant bastard was dragged somewhere.
Now, we only need to rescue Kwon Jiwoon, who is trapped inside the barrier. The new wizard tried to open the barrier again, but….
“Eheuk, heuk!”
The barrier doesn’t even budge. Drops of blood fell from the wizard’s mouth, who let out a strong cough due to the skill’s reaction.
“Wait.”
Ki Yoohyun, who had been quiet for a while, sighed lighty and stepped forward.
“It will be difficult to forcibly open the barrier from outside. The barrier worked to protect the caster, that is, Hunter Kwon Jiwoon. It recognizes an external approach as an attack and pushes it away.”
The wizard replied in confusion.
“But if we don’t open this, we won’t be able to save the person inside.”
“We shouldn’t force the barrier to open, someone has to go inside the barrier and wake him up.”
“It’s too dangerous. It’s just invisible to the naked eye, but the ether flow is tangled in there.”
“Don’t worry. I….”
“I’ll do it.”
“….wait, Rieul-ssi?”
“I can do it.”
[Main Quest: Into the Silver StormThe barrier seeks to protect the caster.Come into contact with the barrier and rescue the caster.Contact the barrier: 0/1Rewards: Fragment of Memory, The resurrection of the Target]
I glanced at the system window in front of me with dry eyes.
Now, running a quest like this means I can do it. However, I did not say that I would do it because of this system that forced me to do it.
This incident didn’t happen before the regression. Back then, the White Silver Guild was solid, and Kwon Jiwoon was also safe.
That’s why I subconsciously thought that nothing would happen to Kwon Jiwoon again this time.
However, something that’s different from the pre-regression past happened again. As far as I know, the variable is only me who came back from the future.
If the situation is like this…….
What if it happened because I changed the future?
Just as saving Ash turned into a big deal, what if something I didn’t notice led to this?
……what if it’s because of me?
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c82:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

The site of Yongsan was filled with chaos.
“Hunter-nim, be careful!”
Kim Jina shouted at a Hunter who was distracted. The called Hunter quickly turned around and swung his weapon.
Splosh! The monster that appeared from behind was hit with the weapon in the head, but there was no damage. The black mucus limped for a moment, and only took a step back.
‘Monster? No, it can’t be … I’ve never seen a monster like this before.’

An amorphous black mass that constantly changes shape. With slow action, it only showed little aggression. As if looking for something, it tapped the people around it and wandered around.
The strange thing is that attack doesn’t work on it. It’s physically possible to push it slightly, but no attack could defeat that monster. Some people with sensitive constitution were confused when they saw the monster. Just looking at it seemed to shock their mental strength.
Kim Jina has memorized numerous books about dungeons so far, but there was no data on such a thing in any book. She’s not even sure if it’s an actual living thing in the first place.
And there was another surprise.
‘Otherworld Gate….’
Kim Jina looked up at the sky. There was a huge hole in the sky emitting a strange light. So far, it’s still quiet, but the magical light is getting stronger. The sky seems to be looking at her.
It looked similar to a rift, so she tried to measure the mana with a measuring instrument, but the ether-meter only gave an error. It’s different from the usual rifts. No rifts have ever shown this pattern.
‘Then that’s…….’
Suddenly, the data she read recently crossed her mind.
A confidential document found in the Awakening Center, the now-defunct predecessor of the Dungeon Management Office. It was a record of an ‘Otherworld Gate‘ that occurred only once about 10 years ago. It bears a striking resemblance to that.
[Gate of The Faceless One █████Time Remaining until it’s fully open 00:58:32]
The Faceless One.
If Jina’s prediction is correct, what is going to appear through that Otherworld Gate is….
She felt a burning sensation in her stomach. It’s hard to believe, but it’s an incredibly dangerous situation if her predictions are correct. They have to evacuate people quickly.
“Sir, you can’t go that way!”
“Follow the agent to the shelter. It’s safe in the shelter!”
She shouted loudly at themuddled crowd. There was little Jina could do as she was only a civil servant, not an Awakened. She just encourages people so that even one person has less damage.
However, the gate of the sky emitted a stronger light, and the power of the black monsters grew accordingly.
In the moment when discouragement rises like a mist, a white bird appeared from somewhere, cutting through the sky.
A bird with a long golden tail flew from the direction of Namsan Mountain and slowly circled the air. The figure shining yellow in the moonlight looked like lightning.
Jina immediately recognized what that bird was.
It was such a mysterious wonder that even those who were in chaos would inadvertently be distracted.
It’s so noisy, yet so peaceful at the same time. The traces of light embroidering the dark sky erase the anguish.
The next moment, the Long-tailed Phoenix flew into the Otherworld Gate.
“Ah….”
It scattered into pieces of light.
Kukukung━
A heavy thunder rang out, and thunderstorms poured down. The rain began to melt the surrounding black mucus.
The monsters, which had been messing around and attacking people until a while ago, quickly lost its strength, melted down, and absorbed into the earth.
Little by little, the hole in the sky closed.
Beyond the evacuation barricade, someone belatedly cheered. After that, a big round of applause and cheers followed.
“Oh, my God!”
“We survived! We survived!”
Everyone was stunned, but it was the real that they survived.
There are still some remaining questions about why this happened. The investigation, post-processing, restoration, and-so-on … thinking about the rest of the work made her eyes turned dark. Still, even after this moment passed, she sympathized with the cheers.
It’s over now. After everything, she survived.
At that time, she was trying to take care of the remaining civilians and guide those who did not have any injuries home.
Jina, who was passing near the mucus, was startled. It was because a familiar shape emerged from the black mucus that had just melted.
It’s her troublemaker older brother. Her older brother who ran away from home a few years ago after changing his name to Jijon, declaring that he would make a name for himself in this world. She made flyers and inquired about his whereabouts, but there was no news.
Then, all of a sudden he was involved in some kind of injury case. He became an important witness forr the Dungeon Management Office’s investigation team, but he went missing again. Jina was so worried about his brother getting into all sorts of trouble.
After being released from mucus, he looked stunned as if he had not yet grasped the situation. Jina rushed to to him in a fit of emotions.
“Huh? Why am I here … Kim Jina?”
“Eugh, this … this stupid person!”
Bugh! A powerful blow blew through his back. 
Ah, the stupid person who rubbed her back was exactly the image of her brother she remembered.
As she felt the relief, her tears welled up.
The last time she saw her brother was clearly pictured in her memory.
“Kim Jihoon, what is all that baggage? What are you doing this late at night?”“Fufufu, little sister, I forsook that name. From now on, call me Jijon.”“You must be crazy….”“Then, Adios! I’ll see you again when the name of this Jijon rules the Hunter World!”“Wait, Mom, did she know? Where are you going? Hey! That name…….”
Jina is finally able to say things that she couldn’t say to him a few years ago.
“Oppa, Jijon … it’s really a bad name.”
“…….”
So, please come back home.
***
I was relieved to see the system notification that appeared in front of me.
[Congratulations!The power of The Faceless One █████ has been disabled.The Gate disappeared.]
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Stop The Chaos!’.Please collect the reward.]
[Ether-Wiki has been updated.][The Grade of the cafe has become D.][A new area has been opened in the space. You can install new items.]
It’s done.
As I watched the hole in the sky gradually close, I thought so.
There are still questions and things to deal with, but the biggest crisis has been overcome.
Rain started pouring down from the sky that had completely met the night. The heavy rain in early winter is chillingly cold.
Hot coffee is the best on a rainy day.
He must have been surprised because I suddenly pushed him into the space. First, I’ll go back to the store, pick up Ash, and drink coffee together.
I’ve already done so many things that don’t suit a Cafe Owner today, so I need a break.
Yeah, it’s already late, but I’ll have to ask Ki Yoohyun, who has always helped me, to come with me.
For Kwon Jiwoon … let’s call him tomorrow.
After deciding so, I looked for Ki Yoohyun and turned my head.
Then, a red light shone in front of me.
[Warning!Location: The barrier of the White Silver Guild has been destroyed.]
What … do you say?
***
After a short deliberation, I decided to go back to the White Silver Guild.
There is probably nothing I can about the destroyed barrier, but there must be a reason why the system deliberately raised a warning notification.
Well, when Kwon Jiwoon says, ‘It’s fine, so go home‘, I’ll go home and drink some hot coffee.
With that thought, I headed to the White Silver Guild with Ki Yoohyun, but the situation was worse than I expected.
“What happened?”
“Wait, you are not allowed to come in here.”
“I’m the family of Kwon Jiwoon! Please let me pass.”
A person, who appeared to be a public official and was blocking the way, stepped away with a sad expression.
Why? Why are you making that face?
Even though it was almost 1:00 in the morning, there were quite a few people in front of the basement of the White Silver Guild.
However, the strange thing is that most of them were public officials, and the people of the White Silver Guild were nowhere to be seen.
Including Hunter Park Heeyoung, there were only four of them. Even considering the late hours or the absence due to the Dungeon Raids, the amount is too small.
Where did everyone go?
And where is Kwon Jiwoon….
“……Ah.”
At that moment, I saw the inside of the open barrier room through the crowd.
Rift? No, the barrier?
In the middle of the translucent membrane with intricate patterns on it, there was Kwoon Jiwoon.
There was no sign of consciousness. Someone called him out loud, but he didn’t budge. He looked like he was hurting somewhere.
A Hunter, who appears to be a wizard class, forced the barrier to open. However, while muttering for a while, the wizard who used his skill shook his head.
“Keuh … I can’t. It does not respond to any external connection attempts. I don’t think it will be possible to forcibly destroy it at this rate.”
I didn’t understand.
It was less than two hours after I left this place with the Long-tailed Phoenix.
What has happened in the meantime that Kwon Jiwoon is trapped in there alone? Wasn’t that just a barrier maintenance device?
I looked back at Hunter Park Heeyoung.
“Heeyoung-ssi, what happened? You were next to Kwon Jiwoon the whole time, weren’t you?”
“That … it’s….”
Her face was pale and her lips trembled. At other times, she would have said something unpleasant to me, but Park Heeyoung also seemed to be greatly shocked.
“The deputy guild leader … the barrier in the barrier room can only be operated by the current deputy guild leader. Earlier … he said that he would check it by himself to see if there was anything wrong with the barrier. I’ve been watching the situation outside for a while, and in the meantime….”
The Long-tailed Phoenix has been brought back to life, and the contamination of the barrier room must have been handled. Now that the barrier room is safe, she left Kwon Jiwoon to do what he wanted, and she went outside to check out the chaos caused by the monsters.
And when she returned, the situation was like this, so she reported it to the Dungeon Management Office.
She said that the cause or circumstances are unknown.
……there was something suspicious about it, but anyway, that was what she said.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c81:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“I think you just saw something, something that was unreal.”
How far does this man know? He seemed to know for sure that I had just seen something.
The moment his eyes got even closer between the light silence,
“Ssaeek, ssaeeekk…..”

The shrill breath of the bird evoked the surroundings. The bird was still dying on the rock.
Is it the influence of the fantasy scene I just saw? I can clearly felt the feeling of the Long-tailed Phoenix as if its emotion could be grasped. Pain, sorrow, resentment, murderous intent towards the one who made it this way, and even greater despair.
“I saw something … more than that, what is the state of the phoenix?”
“It’s not good. Even if I remove the pollution, it’s only temporary. It’ll be come back quickly because of the fragment it swallowed inside.”
“If there’s any fruit, I’m not sure, but…….”
“Fruit?”
All of sudden, Kwon Jiwoon opened his mouth.
“They said that the Long-tailed Phoenixes purify the body by eating rare fruits. It’s called the fruit of Yggdrasil, the World Tree.”
“Ah, that.”
I know what it is, I have it━I was about to say that.
“Still, the fruit of Yggdrasil has never actually come into the hands of Hunters. Now the way to get it is … there’s probably no way.”
….Huh?
I’m using it to make coffee beans? The coffee beans that I give Lime as a handful with rice?
That … it’s a very precious thing….
Just this morning, I served Lime a bowl full of that fruits….
I quickly opened my inventory.
All coffee beans are being stored in this space at the store, not in the inventory. It is unknown whether this bird, whose time is on the verge of death, will be able to endure if we go back to the store to pick up the fruit first.
However, if the sight I saw earlier wasn’t a dream, I’m sure it’s here….
There is. Dark red colored fruit with soft texture.
‘It’s the fruit that the saintess gave me earlier.’
Park Heeyoung immediately accepted Kwon Jiwoon’s words. Without mercy, she said again that there was no way, so let’s get rid of this phoenix quickly.
I pushed her away and approached the Long-tailed Phoenix.
“Kwon Rieul? What are you….”
And pushed the small fruit through the gap in the open beak.
When I pressed its beak tightly to prevent it from spitting out the fruit, I saw the bird’s neck moving.
Right after swallowing the fruit, the waves of light fluctuated greatly.
Was it an illusion? Even though it was a room with no windows, a clear wind seemed to have blown from somewhere. The wind blew away the damp stench, making it easier to breathe.
Paaash━
Fine particles of light melted the darkness on its wings, the Long-tailed Phoenix reconciled with light and disappeared.
Flutter, a feather fell on the palm of my hand.
The particles of light scattered into the air slowly formed, and a new Long-tailed Phoenix appeared.
“Beautiful…..”
Without realizing, I let out an exclamation.
On the straight white wings, a long golden tail falling from the sky. The silent eyes, that seemed to be able to erase despair, looked around.
I was immediately understood why it was called a Holy Beast.
Flapping its wings, the bird came closer.
Tiling, the alarm sounded just in time. The Long-tailed Phoenix suddenly came to me as if it knew the contents of the notification window.
[3. Fragment Fused with SacrificeDestroy the Last Fragment 0/1: (Completed)]
[4. Stop The ChaosIt’s finally the last step.Fly the bird resurrected from death near the Otherworld Gate.The causality will stop the chaos brought by The Faceless One █████.When the Time Limit (02:27:46) has passed, the quest will fail.
Take the Long-tailed Phoenix to target location: (Incomplete)Note: 37°33’××.6″N 126°59’××.4″E]
All we have to do is solve the last quest. Now it was time to go out to the ground with a bird that was surprisingly light compared to its size.
“I have to release it outside. Oppa, let’s go together.”
It’s a bird found in their guild, so Kwon Jiwoon must be concerned about the whole story. I recommended it with that in mind.
“Go first.”
However, Kwon Jiwoon gently pushed my back forward.
“I’ve got work to do here.”
The barrier installed under a guild protects individual guild, but at the same it’s also part of the barrier that protects the entire city. Restoration is urgently needed, and as it is unknown how the Long-tailed Phoenix, which broke through the seal and swallowed the fragment, was abandoned, there must be a lot of work to be done.
That’s true, but … I thought we’d surely go together. I felt a little hurt.
“Of course, there are a lot of things I want to ask you. Still … I’ll tell you the details after I get back.”
“All right.”
We have been avoiding each other, but now is the time to really talk to Kwon Jiwoon.
“….I will back soon.”
“Hunter Ki Yoohyun, please take good care of Rieul.”
With those words, Kwon Jiwoon left the door first with Park Heeyoung.
The quest, which suddenly began, is now in its final stage. It will be over soon, so was it because of the relief that I could talk to Kwon Jiwoon about what I couldn’t talk about before?
Why did Kwon Jiwoon’s cold, hardened face go unnoticed? Why….
***
The Long-tailed Phoenix was released near Namsan Park, the target location.
“Woah….!”
After flapping its wings a few times, the bird soon found its strength. It looked back at me for a moment and then immediately moved its wings vigorously.
A bird resurrected from death split the air.
***
In front of the base of the target he had been following for a long time, journalist Kim Taewoon’s mind was surprisingly calm.
There was no such thing as a tremor. Just a little excitement and the joy of finally being able to tell the world the truth.
Why had he forgotten this joy until now?
That day, the moment he drank lemonade at the cafe in front of the Dungeon Gate, Kim Taewoon was truly reborn.
And currently.
“Hey, are you crazy? Don’t you know that there’s a big shot behind them?”“Department head, this really works. You know my skill. I will make sure that the number of views will explode.”“Explode? If you ask the wrong question, the company will explode, not the number of views. Don’t pester them, let’s stay quiet.”“Department head, please trust me once.““You said the same thing when you almost shut down the company because you touched Muwon before.”“At that time … I’m sorry. Still, this time it’s different.”“Not to mention, the main article of this issue has been decided. We will announce the MBTI of the Top 50 rankers.”“Who sees stuff like MBTI?”“Why? MBTI is good. Don’t you know it’s popular nowadays? Everyone who reads our article wants to read Rankers’ gossip. Why are you suddenly making a fuss about selling the Neo-Crown Party? Have you become a righteous journalist these days?”“Department head, you said you’re going to make a big hit in Hunter Scope.”“It’s all bullshit I said when I was young. Taewoon-ah, my kids will go to college next year….”“Ah, hyung!”
Bang!
“That bastard….”
As if he had become the main character in a detective movie, he even threw his resignation card so nicely and finally found this place.
The secret hideout of the illegal guild, Neo-Crown Party.
Suspicion of smuggling and various illegal acts, allegations of illegal funds by large guilds, etc. He was going to figure it all out today.
[Paparazzi (E) (In use)(Lv.1) You can follow the target without being detected for a certain period of time. (0:38:13)]
There is still plenty of time to use the skill.
Kim Taewoon carefully examined the surroundings and entered the hideout decorated with an ordinary store.
“……!”
He held his breath and waited for a while, but he couldn’t feel any movement inside.
At first glance, it looks like an ordinary stationery store. On a shelf on one wall, stationery items with large slimes were lined up. On the other side, there is a checkout counter and a poster for a discount event.
However, when the button hidden under the checkout counter was operated, the display case moved and the hidden safe was revealed.
‘The number is … that’s right.’
This is information obtained by feeding the secret informant with a lot of alcohol, money, and food.
For a moment, he felt nervous about what an opportunity this is.
Click, the safe opened with a sound. Inside were two fairly thick notebooks.
Kim Taewoon immediately picked up one book. When he opened it, each page was full of numbers. Is it a slush fund book?
However, Kim Taewoon, who looked through the numbers closely, realized that the content was different from what he expected.
‘You disgusting guys…..’
This is a record of the Long-tailed Phoenix. These people slowly contaminated its body by continuously injecting dark ether. Then, it was used as a sacrifice to summon ‘something’.
Rare monster smuggling, illegal experimentation … even if the illegality is not considered, the horrors of the attached photo have caused physiological discomfort. 
The other notebook contained the flow of funds to acquire dark ether. A huge amount of money was deposited into the account of the Neo-Crown Party. It’s been through the middle bridge many times, but the source is clear … this is an important piece of data.
‘For now, I’ll take pictures of everything.’
Click, click!
If he take the original as it is, there was a risk of being caught breaking in. Kim Taewoon was absorbed in photographing every page of the ledger.
As a result, he was late to notice the signs of an approaching presence.
Kung, thump, kung━
Kim Taewoon was startled by the sound of heavy footsteps.
There should still be plenty of time for the skill to be effective, did someone follow him?
He hurriedly turned the display back and stood in the corner of the wall, covering himself with curtains. It was a poor hiding, but now he had no choice but to hope that he would not be found out.
However, it was neither a pawn of the Neo-Crown Party nor a security guard who entered the hideout.
‘Wha-what, what is that … what is it?’
At first, he thought it was a monster covered in black mucus.
No, it’s not. Trapped in black mucus … was human.
This amorphous black mass had devoured humans and made them a part of itself. Besides, he had seen that face before.
‘The leader of Neo-Crown Party?’
He was a man whom he had been following for a long time, but he disappeared when Kim Taewoon finally caught a clue. At the time, he just thought that he got caught following him….
His thoughts didn’t go any further. His eyes met with the lump of black mucus and, to be exact, the person who was swallowed up in it.
“Uugh….”
His urge to vomit rose sharply. Kim Taewoon covered his mouth with his hand and silenced the sound. He was nauseous.
It feels like it constantly scratches and scrapes his mind with a fine needle. He knew as soon as he saw the lump of black mucus through the gap in the curtain.
There is no way he can stay sane by looking at such a thing. It’s like seeing the chaos crawling from the bottom of the abyss.
Just when Kim Taewoon felt his vision blurred and was about to collapse.
Hwaaak━
A bird with a long golden tail flew into the window.
A particle of light from the bird’s wings fell on him.
“Huk, haa, haa….”
The moment he was surrounded by particles of light, his head became clear again.
The nausea and fear soon subsided. A mass of black mucus that had frightened him was melting by the particles of light.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c80:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Still, my answer was set. I picked number two straight away.
It’s a bird that was called the Holy Beast. No, even if it’s not a Holy Beast, it would make me sad to see anyone suffering like that. So, if there was any way to save it, I wanted to save it.
[Route 2 is not recommended as it is very difficult. Are you sure you want to proceed like this?]
I ignored the following notification window and asked.
“How … is there a way……?”

“Let me see.”
Ki Yoohyun suddenly stepped up. Ignoring Park Heeyoung, who was muttering about whether we had time to pay attention to a bird, I asked him.
“Can you do it?”
“Perhaps.”
Ki Yoohyun casted a skill towards the Long-tailed Phoenix. The white light that emerged from his fingertips gradually grew and became a curtain of light.
The feathers wrapped in light slowly regained their original color. The feathers fluttered in the light of the iridescent color on a white background, and soon it flapped its wings.
“Wow…..!
I burst into a sigh of relief for a moment.
At the same rate as white light particles purifying the feathers, darkness again began to erode the Long-tailed Phoenix. The bird, which had been struggling a few times to get up, lost its balance and fell down, and is swallowed up by the darkness again.
“…… let’s try again.”
A light flashed from within the black eyes.
The unpleasant smell that filled the surroundings disappeared in an instant. The net of light tightly enveloped the bird and removed the pollution.
The long golden tail shone in its original brilliance, but just for a moment.
“Ssaeek, ssaeeekk…..”
The poison brought by the fragment engulfed the bird’s body helplessly.
There is no end to this.
The Long-tailed Phoenix lost its original power because it swallowed the fragment. No matter how much you purify it, the result is the same as long as you don’t destroy the fragment.
‘In order to break down a completely fused fragment…….’
[ 1. Sacrifice: Burn the Long-tailed Phoenix (Difficulty: Easy) ☜ Recommended
The notification window blinked again, as if it’s inviting me to choose that option right now.
The Long-tailed Phoenix lowered its head as if it had sensed its own fate.
Gulp….
One gesture could put an end to this poor bird’s suffering, but I couldn’t do it. I couldn’t do it because there was a clarity in the tear-soaked bird’s eyes.
No, it’s too early to give up.
As long as this system has led me to this point, there must be a way somewhere. Until now, the system had never been able to tell me everything neatly, so if I search thoroughly, there must be a hint somewhere.
There will be. I wanted to believe there was.
I looked at the translucent window in front of me in terrible tension.
‘Ether-Wiki.’
[Checking your eligibilities … Completed.][The Eligible: Verifying Kwon Rieul…..]
‘Skip.’
I skipped the long floating texts and checked the items one by one. I was in the spirit of grasping at straws. There aren’t many open items, but there might be hints hidden somewhere.
Then, an unconfirmed notification flashing in the corner opened at will.
[Do you want to play the clip ‘Ecology of A-Class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros’?Yes / No ]
‘No.’
I didn’t have time to watch cows documentary right now.
But…..
[Do you want to play the clip ‘Ecology of A-Class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros’?Yes / No ]
The system window urged me to choose yes.
This system window can be operated by recognizing the user’s gaze, voice, and accident. I used all of my gaze, voice, and thought to choose “No” with all my might, but it didn’t work at all.
If you’re going to choose whatever you want, why did you ask my opinion in the first place…..?
[The video will be played.]
I felt like my body was being sucked into something.
And the next moment, I was on a lawn.
……what? A lawn?
Wasn’t I inside the building just now?
***
The shining sunlight in the blue sky, the leaves of grass swaying in the wind, and the appearance of cows grazing in the distance…….
It was such an idyllic landscape. I blinked slowly at the peacefulness of the quiet pasture.
Their ‘video‘ also has a VR function?
The breath I inhaled smelled of summer grass.
Bewildered, I looked down. The crushed leaves of grass dyed the soles of my shoes green. When I reached out my hand, I could feel the feeling of the fluttering grass.
…… Where am I?
I had goosebumps. How can there be such a realistic video? It was as if I was suddenly summoned to an unfamiliar place rather than a video.
Let’s look at how to turn off the system again, really….
I was trying to look around slowly.
“……!”
A beautiful tree in the distance. A strange woman appeared under the shade of the tree.
【Finally, we met.】
“Yes? Do you know me?”
It’s definitely the first time I’ve seen that face. I’ve never been abroad, and I have no memory of meeting a woman that looks like a saintess in a fantasy RPG.
However, the voice was familiar. This voice that rings directly in my head, surely somewhere…….
My vision suddenly blurred while I was still trying to recall. The landscape that lost its color looked as if its borders had been crushed.
What’s going on?
【It’s because of the interference with causality.】
【This is not a good situation to have a long talk.】
【Just one. You can ask me anything you’re curious about.】
The words brought me to my senses.
It suffices to follow through on the vague memories later. First of all, there was one thing I wanted to ask this fantasy RPG saintess.
“I want to know how to save that bird, the Long-tailed Phoenix.”
【You will know the answer.】
“Yes?”
I didn’t know, so I asked you?
Just as I was trying to argue, a large bird flew from beyond the blue sky. The bird circled the air and sat on the shoulder of the fantasy RPG saintess.
The bird looked sick. The wings that had lost their original brilliance drooped helplessly. There was no energy in the whining chirping.
The saintess picked a fruit from the tree behind him and gave it to the bird. It’s a dark red fruit that is slightly larger than the thumb.
The bird opened its beak and swallowed the fruit.
Soon, from the tip of its beak, the bird was reconciled to light and disappeared. Only the white feathers fluttering in the wind proved the bird’s existence.
“……!”
I was surprised for a moment.
Soon a new Long-tailed Phoenix appeared in its place.
Flapping! The white feathers sparkled in the sun, and the bird flew back to the far side of the sky. Glittering particles of light poured out in the place where the Long-tailed Phoenix passed by.
“Ah…..”
Here, my senses have become surprisingly sensitive, and things that I would not have known before came to my head naturally. It feels like I am receiving knowledge that does not belong to me directly in my head.
The Long-tailed Phoenix, which purified the pollution accumulated in the body, returned to the ether of light, and a new bird’s body was created from the ether.
This is the meaning of the name ‘Phoenix‘. The ‘ether of light’ that exists in the dungeon is the bird itself. As long as the ether system circulates endlessly, there is no death for this bird. That’s why it’s called the Phoenix.
The saintess called me, who was distracted by the mysterious sight. She picked another fruit and handed it to me.
The moment I put the cold, soft fruit on my palm, the space completely collapsed.
My field of vision turned dark.
Just before it was crushed, only her voice remained, tickling my ears.
【How is it? Your second life?】
“……!”
【We will meet again.】
【I hope you can get the life you wanted until then.】
It’s a completely meaningful words. I’ve seen this a lot in games.
A character who appears in front of a novice villager character in an RPG game, who peacefully runs errands at a grocery store or hunts slime, and speaks incomprehensible words with a vague expression.
A character who only says a lot of meaningful words such as ‘I waited to see you again’ or ‘I need your help’ and doesn’t actually give any help.
When a character like that appears, something troublesome happens. I don’t like that kind of thing.
You said you’d let me run a cafe. Rest! Don’t you know what it means? I’ll take into account that there are more cafe customers than I thought, but I don’t want to get caught up in big things I don’t know.
That saintess, what are you going to raise me for?
“…..ah.”
While complaining inside, a unfamiliar memory flashed through my head.
I remembered. Where I met the saintess.
I’m sure that time….
The thought was there.
A storm of light covered my vision.
***
“Huk, huu….”
My eyes were tingling with sweat. I blinked blankly.
“Rieul-ssi?”
“Kwon Rieul, what’s wrong?”
The room was painted black. This was truly the barrier room I had been before.
I don’t know how much time has passed. I could feel the gazes of Kwon Jiwoon and Ki Yoohyunn looking at me anxiously from the side. I could also see the figure of Hunter Park Heeyoung, who ws agitated, too.
What was that just now?
The scene that had been overly vivid faded away in an instant, so there was no sense of reality yet.
“Are you okay?”
“Uh, huh … I was surprised for a second … I’m surprised.”
The system said that it was a video of A-Class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros, but there were no cows, and it wasn’t even a video in the first place. If there is a Consumer Agency for the system, I would like to file an appeal.
[Thank you for using it.]
A message popped up immediately.
I’m not teasing you.….
Ki Yoohyun reached out his hand and wiped my forehead with a handkerchief. As the distance between me and Ki Yoohyun got closer, I could see Kwon Jiwoon’s expression hardening over his shoulder.
Ki Yoohyun, who bowed his head obliquely, asked in a low voice.
“What did you see?”
“……what?”

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c79:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Teleport, find the fragment, burn it, and repeat.
We ran into a black mucus monster in the middle, but we were able to avoid it easily. At this rate, it seemed that the quest could be cleared smoothly.
Finally, the last coordinates.
Tak!
When I opened my eyes, what I saw was the hallway of a certain building.

It looked like a basement as there were no windows. The walls and floors were cleanly cleaned, but there was no sign of human’s activity.
“Where are we?”
“I don’t know…..”
The strange thing is that the surrounding scenery feels familiar for some reason.
I have no memory of entering a building like this, but the structure and the shape of the walls were not unfamiliar.
Where did I see it? Where….
As I was trying to remember, I heard a voice next to me.
“Rieul-ssi, there is one thing I want to ask you.”
“Didn’t we agree not to ask each other questions?”
“It’s not that question.”
What is that question and what is this question….
“Okay, you can just ask.”
His gaze was not directed at me. The bright light of an incandescent lamp illuminates his profile.
Ki Yoohyun opened his mouth while examining the structure of the hallway.
“Why is Rieul-ssi involved herself directly in this case? Is it because your acquaintance is the family of the Hunter who was swallowed by that monster?”
“It’s the quest….”
I blurted out the end of my words when I tried to answer reflexively. It’s because I realized that the words I was going to say wasn’t the right answer, it was just an excuse I made to myself.
It’s true that I’m bothered by the identity of the person swallowed by the monster. If it wasn’t Jina’s family, I would have felt sorry for him, but I wouldn’t have taken the risk myself.
‘That’s what the system told me, but…….’
No one forced me to follow the will of the system.
The city was thrown into chaos when monsters appeared from a huge gate in the sky. It is different from the future I knew, the things that happened before my regression, and it is not a situation that I, a non-combat F-class Cafe Owner, can solve by myself.
If it wasn’t for the information given by the system with the specific quest, then quietly evacuating with Ash would be the correct action. There are so many strong hunters in Korea, and I am not even an official hunter.
But…..
I remembered the expression on Ash’s face, the boy who was holding my hand gently while lowering his eyes.
He can’t say what’s inside his mind and hides his true feelings with a sulky expression, but even the faint trembling that he can’t hide transmitted through his hand.
I’m not a person of great morality, and I hate dangerous things. However, it’s impossible to pretend that I didn’t know anything when I saw Ash behaving like that.
So the situation is simply like this. I didn’t get forced by the quest, but the quest told me what I wanted to do.
Come to think of it, it was like that from the beginning. It was my own wish to make coffee and open a cafe, and I also wanted to help Choi Cedric at that time.
I was grumbling while following the quest of the system, but I actually wanted to do it in the end.
Suddenly, I remembered what my cat said.
“Meong, waeooong (You always say you don’t want to work, but you’re a human being who likes to increase your own work)!”
Whew, she’s right. I guess I’m the problem….
“That’s it, I just want to do it.”
“What?”
“There’s no reason. It’s just … I just can’t ignore it and acted like I didn’t know what happened.” 
Ki Yoohyun smiled slightly at my rambling words. He resumed his footsteps.
“It’s here.”
Only after seeing the door at the end of the hallway he was pointing to, I knew where this place was.
A vivid guild mark engraved on the iron door.
And….
“……Rieul-ah?! Why are you here?”
My one and only cousin appeared.
Why is Kwon Jiwoon coming out here?
No way. The person closest to me is actually the final villain?
……of course it wouldn’t be such a cliche development.
“Kwon Rieul, how can you be here…..?”
“….Oppa.”
I really want to ask. Why is Kwon Jiwoon here?
Although Korea is small, what is the probability of meeting my older cousin, whose relationship with me became awkward after I moved out of the house, while I tried to kill the enemy according to the coordinate values of the system?
I couldn’t think of it right away, but now I know for sure.
This is the basement of the White Silver Guild. In the past, there was a guild common warehouse here. When my uncle was still here, whenever I came to the guild building, I always looked at the warehouse, so I got used to it. The underground warehouse where various items were stored was a place that stimulated curiosity.
Well, that story is more than a decade old.
“There were some circumstances. I came here with a teleportation scroll.”
“You used a teleportation scroll?”
“……! I can’t believe an outsider enter the guild at will. What do you think you are doing?”
Hunter Park Heeyoung, who was standing next to Kwon Jiwoon, burst into anger. Kwon Jiwoon stopped her, but her firm expression does not unfold.
‘If it wasn’t for the deputy guild leader, really.’
She has that kind of look.
It’s still the same….
Hunter Park Heeyoung, a B-class tanker of the White Silver Guild. I don’t … we’re not on good terms Every time I came to the White Silver Guild, she didn’t like my visit.
Still, her sensitive reaction just now is understandable.
All Hunter Guilds in Seoul are equipped with barriers to protect the buildings from rifts and monsters.  Barrier stones for maintaining the barrier are, of course, very valuable, and are stored in the most secure place.
If I remember it correctly … just beyond this iron gate is the barrier room where the barrier stones of the White Silver Guild are stored.
Not only is the entry of outsiders strictly prohibited, but the door is not opened unless there is a special reason.
Earlier, Ki Yoohyun said that there was the last fragment beyond this door.
I glanced aside. Ki Yoohyun, who made eye contact with me, nodded slightly.
Why on earth is the last fragment in the deep part of The White Silver Guild?
Gulp. I swallowed my dry saliva without realizing it. It definitely smells of something illegal.
So far, I’ve been steadily following the ‘I was a novice village innkeeper, but now I have to face monsters‘ route. When I followed the quest, I refused the development that the villain was actually a close person. It’s been a while since I’ve gotten tired of such a twist.
Furthermore, how will Kwon Jiwoon react if I ask him to open the barrier room where outsiders are not allowed to enter?
“…….”
While I was hesitating, unable to speak directly, Kwon Jiwoon spoke to Ki Yoohyun.
“I’ve seen you before. Aren’t you Hunter Ki Yoohyun?”
“……Long time no see.”
“What is your relationship with Rieul?”
“Haha, I’m close with Rieul-ssi. I’m accompanying her.”
“…….”
Kwon Jiwoon turned his head and looked at me again with a look of disapproval.
I was in a mess after running and rolling in the mall. As if he had guessed something had happened when he saw me, he approached me and quickly poured out words.
“Kwon Rieul, it’s dangerous out there now.”
“Huh? Uh…..”
“Since you said you became an Awakened, I won’t ask you how you showed up here. We’re in an emergency because of the occurrence of an unprecedented Otherworld Gate. I’ll send Hunter Park Heeyoung with you, so go home right away.”
“Wait, wait, Kwon Jiwoon!”
“What’s wrong?”
“Before I go back … I have a favor to ask of you.”
“Say it.”
“Here, we have to open this door.”
“……! Do you realise where we are and what you’re saying? It’s not a place to open out of curiosity.”
Park Heeyoung rushed in.
“Seeing you say that, you must have a reason.”
“…Yes, it’s a long explanation … there might be something wrong inside.”
“All right.”
Unexpectedly, Kwon Jiwoon listened to me without asking any more questions.
“Deputy guild leader! I am against it.”
“Hunter Park Heeyoung, step back.”
The moment Kwon Jiwoon unlocked the seal of the barrier room and pushed the heavy iron door to the side, the wrong was immediately apparent.
The barrier room was a small room with white stones on the floor and walls. It’s not a specific item, but the entire room was a device that maintained the barrier of the White Silver Guild.
The barrier was densely engraved in silver letters on the square rock on the floor. The wall served as a medium to activate the barrier.
The room was all black now. It was black all over, as if paint had been poured on the whole room, and the letters, which was originally silver, was in a rusty color.
“Ugh…..!”
And there is a strong smell that you can still feel even when you pinch your nose. It’s not a mere bad smell.
This was … this was the smell of rotting corpse.
“What the hell happened?”
In a hurry, Kwon Jiwoon was the first to run into the barrier room. He checked the rock on the floor and sighed.
There was a large bird on the rock. The feathers, which was originally beautiful colors, was discolored to black. It wings were broken and it couldn’t move properly.
Every time it flapped, a sound filled with pain was heard, and the bird’s eyes were wet with tears.
The dark red marks scattered around it … it’s the blood of the bird.
I knew right away that death was near.
The smell was coming from this bird. As if foreshadowing the end that was approaching, the bird drooped. The blackened feathers were fluttering before they fell to the floor.
Why is this bird in the sealed barrier room?
“Who did this?”
Kwon Jiwoon shook his head low.
The last time he checked the barrier room was three days ago. At that time, he said, there was nothing wrong. It is a place where no one can easily enter and exit, and there is no sign that the door has been opened by force.
Kwon Jiwoon and Hunter Park Heeyoung, who stood next to him, do not seem to know what is going on.
In panic, I hurriedly approached the rock and tried to take a look, but Ki Yoohyun grabbed my shoulder.
“Rieul-ssi, it’s that bird.”
“….what?”
His voice, which had always been calm, trembled slightly.
“The fragment … that bird, it’s inside the Long-tailed Phoenix.”
Tiling!
As soon as he finished speaking, a quest notification popped up.
2. Find the Fragments of the imitation of ‘Shining Trapezohedron‘.Destroy the Fragments 4/5: (Unachievable)
A notification that told me it cannot be achieved, followed by the next quest that appeared immediately.

3. Fragment Fused with SacrificeBlackened sacrifice: The Long-tailed Phoenix and the last fragment are completely fused, making them impossible to separate.Choose one method to destroy the last fragment.When the Time Limit (03:05:11) has passed, the quest will fail.
Destroy the Last Fragment 0/1: (Incomplete)
I’ve heard the name of the Long-tailed Phoenix.
Certainly … I remembered what the giraegi, no, the journalist, who came to the store said.
“The Long-tailed Phoenix is not an ordinary monster!”“It emits an ether of light, and lives only in special areas among dungeons.”“It’s more than a monster, it’s a Holy Beast.”
 It was said that the phoenix had the power to purify its contaminated body by itself, but…….
It seemed to have lost its power now.
“Grooo…..”
The black bird spat out a painful sound. As I brought my hand closer, I felt a burning sensation. The pain of the dying bird swallowed by the darkness was too vivid.
It was sad.
In addition, if it’s fused with this bird, how are we going to deal with the fragment?
As soon as I thought so, the notification window popped up again.
[ 1. Sacrifice: Burn the Long-tailed Phoenix (Difficulty: Easy) ☜ Recommended2. Sacrifice: Purify the Long-tailed Phoenix (Difficulty: Special Hard)]
“……!”
Again.
The system again forced me to choose.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c78:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Why?
Ash thought.
Why the hell?
His hand was held tightly by a person next to him. He tried to wriggle and pull his arm, but the strenght that was holding his hand only became stronger. A strange warmth was felt through the palm of his hand.
When he sensed an abnormality in the shopping mall at Yongsan Station, the first thing Ash did was checking his mana.

[You are using Mana Saving Mode.][Mana recovery amount: 35%][Due to lack of mana, some spells may be out of control when used.]
He had recovered enough mana to kill a monster like that.
Just as he was about to release his magic, a soft hand stroked his forehead.
“Ash, I’ll be right back after seeing what’s going on. Wait here.”
She gave him a worried look, as if he’s a weak and young human being.
He has always thought it was annoying, but somehow it bothered him.
Once she finds out who he is, this human won’t pat him on the head or smile to him with that stupid face. She will be wary and afraid of him.
Just imagining it is very … he felt bad.
Maybe it’s because he thought about that.
[Magic control is unstable.]
“……!”
At this rate, the person next to him will be caught up in uncontrolled magic. Ash hastily pulled back his magic.
It can’t be helped. The only way left is to die. He made up his mind like that, but Ash couldn’t understand.
Why does this person make such a sad face?
Ash’s current body is not his real body.
Asmodeus, an incarnation formed by gathering magical powers of the primordial chaos, is also a small and fragile imperfect body due to lack of mana.
This dim-faced human seems to think of himself as just a ‘8th Grader Syndrome‘.
Since it was a word that was not in the Human World Knowledge (Basic) that was first downloaded, Ash did not know what the 8th Grader Syndrome. It is probably a rare disease that affects children of a certain age.
Back to the main idea. In fact, even if this body dies, he will return to the original primordial chaos and a new incarnation will be created. It is different from the extinction of real existence.
That’s why Ash himself didn’t feel much of a sense of crisis. He just intuited the expected end.
But why is this stupid-looking human being so desperate?
“Yoohyun-ssi, first … I need to take Ash to the store. It is safe there.”
“There’s a way.”
A man named Ki Yoohyun created a door in the air.
“It’s a door that forcibly breaks down the space. However, the area near the Dungeon Gate is inaccessible, so you have to walk from there.”
As soon as the space is broken, the attack will come, so he added that he will go with them.
“….I see.”
The usage is simple.
Without hesitation, Rieul grabbed Ash’s hand and opened the door. The surrounding black veil faded like a mirage.
The next moment, the stone wall of the Great Dungeon Abyss appeared red in the evening sunset.
Normally, it would have been a very beautiful sight. However, straight away, black monsters poured  down from the Gate in the sky.
The monsters rushed in with a strange cry. Monsters that have crossed over from the Otherworld Gate, brought in by The Faceless One. There is no easy way. They’re wandering endlessly in search of food.
That food is himself. It’s an incarnation created out of primordial chaos. They won’t stop until they have swallowed Ash.
“……!”
Recognizing the existence of Ash, a black monster suddenly began to run fast.
The dark-eyed man quickly used his skill, and a net of light stretched out and caught the monster.
“Run. I’ll take care of these.”
“……I got it! Ash, hold my hand.”
That dark-eyed man probably hated him. 
He smelled of white light. A person who uses the power of the Spinner in Darkness would have quickly seen through his identity.
In fact, this man glanced at his information right away with a cold expression on their first meeting.
And yet why….
The clasped hands did not lose any strength. She still held him tight and pulled him in.
He’s sure that she already knew. At least, the fact that he’s not a young and weak person.
Still, why is she so desperate?
Thud! A monster appeared from the opposite side of the direction they were running.
The arrow that flew in stopped him from rushing towards Ash.
“…… you!”
They were the twins he had met before. One of the twins shouted at Rieul, who turned around.
“Eonni, hurry up and go!”
Rieul, who briefly looked worried, held Ash’s hand again and ran. She opened the door of Cafe Rieul and shouted as she pushed his body in.
“Kwon Mieum, open the door!”
“Waeooong, waeoog (What are you talking about all of a sudden?! Whoa, what are those monsters)!”
“Kkyuu!”
The strange talking cat was startled. Next to her is a slime that always recites strange things. Even these cat and slime have never been afraid to him, an enemy.
“I don’t have time to talk. I granted permission to enter the space to the target, a part-timer at our house, Kim Ash!”
“Nyaaaa!”
A subtle light wrapped around his body, and soon there was a blue door on the wall leading to the space.
Rieul pushed Ash into the door as it was. However, she doesn’t come inside. Her hand that was holding him tightly fell off, and Ash’s hand scratched the air.
“Ash, listen.”
Beyond the door that was dazzled by the light and could not be clearly seen, Rieul grabbed Ash’s shoulder and whispered.
“It’s safe in here. No one will find you.”
A face stained with sweat and dust, but Rieul’s brown eyes, which are infinitely soft, were deeply captured in his eyes.
“You may be bored, but don’t ever come out and hang in there for just one day. I’ll be back soon, so just stay here until I come. Okay?”
“……Yes.”
He ended up not asking anything he wanted to ask, until the door closed and she was completely out of sight.  
━ Why are you trying to save me?
Beneath the huge tree trunk, Ash hugged his knees and sat down. His warm hand is cold.
Somehow, he felt like crying.
It’s only then that he realized.
Even if he was just a piece of Incarnation that came out of chaos, “he” wanted to live.
***
[ 1. Protect the IncarnationHide the Target in a safe place: (Completed)]
As soon as the quest was over, the next quest appeared as if it had been waiting.
2. Find the Fragments of the imitation of ‘Shining Trapezohedron‘.Fragments of the imitation of ‘Shining Trapezohedron‘ are hidden throughout the city.The Gate Opening cannot be prevented unless all fragments are removed.Find the fragments and destroy them completely.When the Time Limit (04:31:22) has passed, the quest will fail.
Destroy the Fragments 0/5: (Incomplete)Note: Coordinates 37°29’xx.4″N 127°00’xx.0″E]
When I safely hid Ash in the space and came back, I saw Ki Yoohyun following me.
First, let’s start by sharing information. I read the contents of the system window that appeared in front of me as it was to Ki Yoohyun.
“The system gives you such detailed instructions? I’ve never heard of that before …. No, I got it for now.”
“Do you have any more questions?”
“There’s a lot, but … I am not going to ask you now.”
It’s the same for me.
“Me too. For now, I’ll pretend I’m not curious.”
Ki Yoohyun suddenly appeared, and his abilities…….
The questions that filled my head were put away into a corner. It was more urgent to deal with this situation than to resolve the questions.
In such a dramatic way, a ‘let’s talk about it later’ alliance was born between Ki Yoohyun and me.
The only way to solve this situation is to destroy the fragments. There must be something called the fragment at the coordinates given by the system.
But how do you move to the coordinates?
While I was busy thinking about it, Ki Yoohyun took out an item that looked like a scroll.
“It’s teleportation scroll.”
It’s originally illegal to use it in the city, but since it is an emergency now, it’s okay’s fine, he added.
“It’s hard to move to a place I’ve never visited just by coordinate values. It could be a dangerous place. If you tell me the coordinates, I’ll use the teleportation magic.”
“Umh, Yoohyun-ssi.”
“Yes?”
“Do you mind if I come with you? I don’t know what will happen.”
“That’s all right. I’m curious about the quest, and I’m also worried about Rieul-ssi.”
“……thank you.”
As soon as I tore the scroll, light wrapped around my body, and I felt as if my spirit was being sucked into something.
We arrived at an ordinary playground.
There was no need to worry about how to find the fragment in this wide place. This is because Ki Yoohyun quickly found it with his white light net. That skill is very convenient.
What came out was a star-shaped ornament. Is this a fragment of the Tra-something?
 [Item: Fragment of the imitation of Shining Trapezohedron (☆☆☆☆☆)It’s an imitation, but the effect is certain.It strengthens the power of The Faceless One.]
As soon as I held the fragment in my hand, a notification window popped up.
I applied force, but it doesn’t break easily.
“Rieul-ssi, use the ring you’re wearing now.”
“Ring? …. Do you mean this?”
Ki Yoohyun pointed to the Cthugha’s ring in my hand.
Was this such a great thing? I used it almost exclusively for coffee roasting. I was skeptical and tried it.
Hyuurr.
As I concentrated my mind, the rising flame burned the fragment. It became completely white ash and the fragment crumbled.
….you were right, this ring is really great.
Immediately, the new coordinates were updated on the quest window. It’s probably the location of the next fragment.
“Then, let’s go to the next location!”
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c77:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

A net of light that is so delicate that it is hard to notice if you don’t look closely.
I’ve seen something like this before.
The monster who was about to attack Ash was startled.
“Geuwoooo…..”
It screamed and twisted its body, but the net of light tightened around the monster’s body more tightly.
Thud! The giant fell to the floor.

The particles of light formed a certain shape, and soon a man appeared in the air.
Slightly long black hair, a coat wrapped around his tall body, white cheeks, and pair of black eyes that were filled with light.
I called out his name with happiness.
“….Yoohyun-ssi!”
Tak! Ki Yoohyun, who landed on the floor with a light gesture, looked around and asked.
“This … what is this situation?”
I’d like to know too…….
Teleportation? Or a summon? He said it was a crime prevention bell, but I didn’t expect that Ki Yoohyun would suddenly appear.
Anyway, thanks to him, I was still alive. I was so glad and grateful to the extent that I wanted to shed tears.
I explained that I came to Yongsan with Ash and was attacked by a monster. After that, I’m trapped in this space all of a sudden.
“And….”
Ash was still calm. He still has the expression that seems to be saying “only this body will be dying” right away. However, I can’t let him say that again. I spoke in a low voice.
“The monster is targeting Ash.”
Ki Yoohyun’s expression turned serious in an instant.
“Ah, that’s why something different from the past happened.”
He murmured those words, it seemed that he has a guess.
“I don’t think it would be a good idea to get out of here and go to the evacuation area.”
I agreed. People in the evacuation area could be in danger, and vice versa … those people might also put Ash in danger.
“Yes, then…….”
At that moment, the fallen monster screamed and rose.
It became even bigger by merging its body with a new monster that rose from the ground. The limbs stretched out in a bizarre direction and were hideous. It tore the net and tried to attack Ash again with incredible blindness.
“….I handled it poorly.”
Ki Yoohyun, who was not at all panicked, immediately beckoned to the monster. The moment the net of light tied the monster stronger and tried to make it stop breathing, something caught my eye.
It was hard to see because it was wrapped in black mucus, but a piece of cloth was wrapped around the monster’s body.
A piece of cloth? No, it’s clothes.
The monster was dressed in a mess of torn clothes.
But I think I’ve seen that gorgeous design that reminds me of a peacock somewhere….
Such unusual clothes, where did I….
I grabbed Ki Yoohyun’s hand in a hurry. The reason of my action was because I found something inside the monster’s translucent body. Something wrapped in mucus that looks like a human being.
Surprised, Ki Yoohyun stopped using his skills. I barely moved my trembling lips.
“Yoohyun-ssi, that’s … have we seen it before.…?”
I remembered. When I went to the tutorial dungeon, I ran into a Hunter named Jijon.
Obviously, he … he was wearing that unusual outfit.
No, that was a long time ago. Maybe I just saw it wrong. That … that monster couldn’t have swallowed a person….
Tiling!
Then, a system window appeared in front of me.
[You’ve acquired the person’s information.]
[Name: Kim Jihoon (Hunter Name: Jijon)Grade: CClass: InspectionDetails: (More)]
The flashing system window in front of me pointed exactly to the fallen monster. Looking closely, a body, which was originally human, was entangled in black mucus.
“Thi-this monster ate human … No, it was merged. How did this happen….”
Without answering, Ki Yoohyun looked at the monster. A silent stare ensues. It seemed like he was reading the information by using a skill or something. After a second, he sighed briefly with a solemn face.
“….Ah.”
I could tell just by that reaction. He obviously saw the same content as me.
I’ve never heard of a monster that swallows people and makes them part of its body.
Besides, why is that monster trying to kill Ash, not anyone else?
What’s that black gate in the sky?
“Ugh…..”
The extreme tension made it difficult to breathe. While I was exhaling a short breath, there was a hand holding my shoulder. It’s Ki Yoohyun.
“Rieul-ssi, calm down.”
“How can I calm down now….!”
“Look this way.”
Tak, Ki Yoohyun caught my attention by snapping his fingers.
Fine particles of light moved in the air, creating a square space. The prison of light wrapped around the monster, it gradually decreased and eventually shrunk to a size that fits the body.
Wriggling, the monster tried to escape the prison of light, but the prison was solid.
“I understand the situation. I know what Rieul-ssi is worried about. Still, you don’t have to decide everything now.”
“…….”
“First, I made a simple barrier. The black monsters are looking for the boy’s presence, but they won’t be able to break through the barrier. There is time before the Gate in the sky is fully opened. So for now, calm down.”
As I looked up at the sky, a system notification popped up. The time decreased in real time.
[Gate of The Faceless One █████Time Remaining until it’s fully open 05:27:10]
Let’s calm down. He’s right.
Yeah, whatever that monster was originally, I can’t know or solve everything. The work that requires force is the domain of a Hunter who is stronger than me.
So let’s just think about what we I do now. What I can do now….
The most important goal is for me and Ash to go back safely. There are several things I don’t understand about this situation. However, rather than understanding the situation, this goal is more imporant.
I finally calmed down when I narrowed down my goal.
When I cooled my head, I could see the situation more calmly. Thanks to Ki Yoohyun, I avoided a life-threatening crisis right away. I might find a way out of this.
Then, I noticed the system window blinking in the corner of my view. I checked the contents by selecting (More).
[Details: Family Relations – Mother, Younger Sister (Kim Jina).]
What? The person who fused with this monster was Jina’s brother?
I had heard that Jina had a troublesome Hunter brother before, but I didn’t know it would be this Hunter.
But why does the system window show this information to me?
This question was resolved as soon as I saw the following notification.

[Warning!Target: If the cursed person dies, it may interfere with the progress of the quest in the future.Please pay special attention.]
 

“……!”
Notification with clear intention. A warning sign that sounded almost like a threat flashed red.
Wait, what this means is … that man is still alive.
And the system doesn’t want that man to die. That’s probably why it stimulates my conscience and compassion by informing me of his family relationship.
‘I know that, but…….’
What do you want me to do?
As if responding to my question, a series of notifications came up.
[Warning!The power of The Faceless One █████ is active.It will be deactivated when the following conditions are met.Would you like to check the quest chain?
Yes / No ]
Of course, I chose [Yes].
[Main Quest: Stop The Chaos!It’s a big problem.The power of The Faceless One █████ has been activated by the imitation of ‘Shining Trapezohedron‘.At this rate, the chaos spreading through the city cannot be stopped.Stop the Gate opening and save the city.Rewards: Gate Extinction. Monsters in the city disappear.Ether-Wiki UpdateCafe Rieul (E) Grade increased???Time Limit: 05:11:10]

[There are two ways to clear this quest. Please select the method you want to proceed.]

The Death of the Incarnation, Asmodeus (Difficulty: Easy) ☜ Recommended
Seal the Gate (Difficulty: Special Hard)]

 
“Crazy….”
The curse popped out of my mouth reflexively. However, when I felt the gaze of the two people standing next to me, I quickly swallowed the back words.
Who the hell is the Incarnation Asmodeus?
I didn’t even have time to think about that question. The explanation was immediately added.
[※Hint: Please note that the Incarnation Asmodeus is currently using the name of Kim Ash (17 years old).]
……what?
Of course it’s number two. I have no intention of choosing number one no matter what.
[Once selected, it cannot be changed. Please choose carefully.Route 2 is not recommended as it is very difficult. Are you sure you want to proceed like this?]
I’m sure!
This system window showed the same content three times before moving on to the next one as if it finally understood my meaning.

1. Protect the IncarnationTarget: When the Incarnation, Asmodeus, dies, the quest will fail.Protect the target in a safe place.
Hide the Target in a safe place: (Incomplete)Note: One additional person can be granted the right to enter the space.]
….hide him in a safe place for now.
“….Yoohyun-ssi.”
“Yes?”
“Is there any way to get back to our store from here?”
[Next]
