SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c76:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Page Seven: The Saintess is Watching

Korea’s No. 1 Hunter Community – Hunter Channel.
Free Forum Board.
— Ranking, The Slave Hunters Guild is banned. Real life player kill in the dungeon.


[Chatting] Is it raining today???? (8)
Upvotes: 0 / Downvotes: 0


Writer: Double Bianco
(Photo)
What’s wrong with the skyㅡㅡThe weather forecast said it would be sunny today, but it’s darkI was planning to go to the dungeon today, but I’ll just open Hunchan now

— I am powerless: ??? You didn’t mean to go in the first place, did you?— MM: unable to go to the dungeon because it’s raining today HAHAHAHA— Lime Love Team: At this point, you’re not a professional Hunter, but a professional Hunchaner LOL
└ Double Bianco: I have fewer days of Hunchan access than you GG
— gotohell: but what’s the black thing in the picture, clean your windows— OO: Heol, there’s something in the corner
└ Double Bianco: there’s nothing, what are you talking about fck don’t scare me
— Jeju Guild No. 1: Look at the disaster texts, everyone. We’re in trouble.

***
Jijon recited to himself somberly.
I can’t do this. I can’t do this anymore. I was also just an ordinary person who couldn’t do anything remarkable. I’ve been clinging to things that don’t suit me for too long.
That was the conclusion that Jijon made.
The scene of the incident where the Long-tailed Phoenix disappeared a few nights ago. Choi Cedric just let Jijon go. He must have thought that he wouldn’t be a threat.
“I don’t see you here today. Don’t touch the dirty work again and just live a normal life.”
Choi Cedric turned around after saying that … to be honest, it was cool.
He didn’t think he could be like that unless he was born again.
‘Let’s turn myself in.’
Even if he is lucky enough to be cleared of the attempted murder charge, Jijon had already been involved in the smuggling of the Neo-Crown Party. Punishment cannot be avoided. It would be difficult to prove the C&L Corporation as the master of the allegations.
‘That secretary…….’
He wouldn’t have left any evidence.
He felt relieved after he decided to turn himself in. Let’s live a normal life after being punished.
He’s ashamed to face his mother and younger sister, but … he’ll have to contact them.
It’s about 30 minutes before Rieul and Ash headed to the shopping mall. 
At first, Jijon was walking the alley to get home and organize himself. Then, there was a quiet movement across the street. Someone’s footsteps are closely followed from behind.
“Are you Kim Jihoon?”
“…….”
A man standing in front took out his ID card from his pocket and showed it. The large mark of the Dungeon Management Office caught his eye.
“I’d like to hear from you for a moment, so let’s go to the main office together.”
A person standing behind his back gently placed his hand on his shoulder.
“Uh, what’s the matter?”
“I’m sure you know. You were at the Cheonggyecheon arson site, right? There is a witness who saw Kim Jihoon.”
“……!”
Jijon soon gave up resistance. He knew this moment would come anyway. It’s an arrest ending, isn’t it perfect for a piece of crap like him? Jijon raised his hands and nodded slightly, revealing that he had no intention of resisting.
After that, there was a stench coming from the wind from somewhere.
“Oh, hot!”
Suddenly, he felt hot inside his body and Jijon searched for his arms wildly. It was as if he was burning himself with hot iron.
The Hunters surrounding Jijon were panicked and when they tried to subdue him, a star-shaped ornament came out of his inner pocket.
‘What’s this? Did I buy something like this?’
The thought did not last long.
“Be careful!”
“Ugh, huaa! What is that?”
The sky turned black. A stinky wind engulfed his body.
Crak.
A huge amorphous mucus that appeared from the sky opened its mouth and swallowed Jijon. The mucus that had already swallowed several humans became a huge lump.
“Keurere….”
An ominous cry was heard.
With the agility unsuitable for a giant, the giant lump monster pushed the surrounding Hunters and ran away.
“It ran away!”
“Ask the main office for backup!”
“….a monster appeared! It’s currently being tracked. Please ask for support from each guild!”
***
“Aaargh! Run away!”
“Ugh, the emergency exit is already blocked! Go the other way!”
“I lowered the disaster prevention shutter and closed the barrier. Come inside!”
The shopping mall was chaotic due to the sudden appearance of a monster.
I don’t know if I can call that a monster.
The black and sticky lumps had no fixed form. It flows down, stands up on both feet again, and runs toward this side.
The monster control shutter was immediately lowered, and the Hunters in charge of safety management helped the shoppers evacuate, but the situation did not calm down.
The monster freely changed its shape and invaded inside. The Hunters attacked the monster, but it took no damage.
In addition to that, a huge hole appeared in the sky. Black lumps were constantly pouring out of the hole.
I was on the way to grab Ash’s hand and head to the evacuation area.
“………Ash! Be careful!”
The monster who ran through the barricade aimed at Ash. I reflexively pushed Ash’s back to avoid the attack, but it was pushed out of the disaster prevention shutter.
“………Uh!”
The space changes.
The black lumps liquefied and wrapped around it, and all its forms began to collapse. The pillars, railings, and floors melted down, losing color and becoming an opaque membrane.
Only darkness that can be seen in all directions. The exit is not visible.
A huge hole rattles overhead.
‘Ash, come here.’
‘…….’
I made eye contact with Ars and held my breath. Somewhere in the dark space, the sound of the monster’s footsteps thumped. If we made even a little noise, I thought the monster would tear us apart right away.
I clasped Ash’s hand tightly to hold back the tension. The tremor calmed down a little when I felt the warmth of his small, soft hand.
Strange. Why did this happen?
I don’t know all the future events that happened before the regression, but I clearly remember the big events.
Monsters have never appeared in Yongsan. Even if a rift broke out in the neighborhood right next to it, Yongsan was still intact. There was even a meme called ‘Yongsan Barrier’. 
The reason why I chose Yongsan as the place to come to buy clothes for Ash was because I unconsciously thought Yongsan was safe.
How come something different from before the regression happened?
Is it because the future has changed?
Still, it’s weird. The sole variable that can change the future is me, who have the memory before the regression, but the changes I have made are only few.
Both the saving of James and the early rift in the Lee Chorok’s farmhouse had a clear cause. However, no matter how much I looked back on my actions, I didn’t do anything that would make a monster appear in Yongsan.
Is it like a butterfly effect?
Still, how can the monster that appeared in Yongsan has any connection with me, who run a cafe in front of the Dungeon Gate?
Tiling! My phone vibrated.
[Safety Guide Notice <Dungeon Management Office>Around 17:00 today, an Otherworld Gate occurred over downtown Seoul and an unidentified monster appeared.We are currently investigating the cause and responding to it. Please be careful.]
Even though it was a very weak vibration, the monster in this space noticed us. The black giant suddenly rose from the floor.
“Ash, get away!”
Even though I was closer, the monster’s fist aimed exactly at Ash. It was as if the monster was being attracted to Ash.
I realised it for sure. This monster is trying to kill Ash.
‘….The Floor is Shiny!’
The monster who was hit by the skill lost its balance and rolled sideways.
“Run!”
Taking advantage of that opportunity, I got up and took Ash’s hand. I just ran blindly. As I crossed the ruined space in search of an exit, I was taken aback.
“……!”
Ah, there’s one more. The future I changed.
It was Ash who was lying in front of the store.
It’s a leap, I was leaping to the conclusion, but….
Before my regression, the store was an empty abandoned house. What if Ash died there the day before my regression, without any help?
What if, since Ash is alive unlike back then, this black monster appeared to kill the surviving Ash?
I looked at Ash quietly.
Even in this urgent situation, he has a cynical expression that seems to be indifferent to the situation, but his hand is holding mine tightly. The warmth, tension, and trembling are transmitted through the hand.
It’s enough to think about it later. At the moment, one way or other.…..
“That’s enough.”
Ash let go of my hand.
“Shh, Ash, you need to get out of here and go to the evacuation area barrier. You will be safe there.”
“I’m nothing more than an incomplete summoned body created with insufficient mana anyway.”
I had an ominous feeling. It’s not the usual setting story, I have a hunch that Ash would say something ridiculous.
“Ash … what are you talking about?”
“Since only this body will be dying, don’t be so surprised by the subject, Human.”
Before I knew it, the black giant followed us to a short distance. Instead of running away, Ash turned his back on the monster. I reached out, but I couldn’t reach him.
No, I have to save him.
“……!”
I used the item in my hand with the feeling of grasping at straws.
It was a crime prevention bell from Ki Yoohyun. In a moment’s time, my hand could barely grasp this item.
Click, the moment I pressed the button that didn’t make a sound.
A net of light descended.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Yongsan Barrier: the world ‘barrier’ used here is actually 결계, a Buddhist term originally referring to the practice of discipline (界), that is, the act of restricting actions by dividing a certain area (結). Well, in story with similiar genre, it usually refers to barrier that divides the human world and the supernatural world (that’s why, it’s called Yongsan Barrier because it seems like Yongsan has a barrier that blocks outside monsters.)
Thank you bad cats robot and Lavs for the coffee!

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c75:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

A large shopping mall connected to the Yongsan Station. This place is lively and crowded with many people who come to enjoy shopping or to watch a movie.
How come there’s such a store here……?
In a dark overall T-shirt, the strong picture drawn on it stands out. The picture looks like it has the ability to summon something.
If it were only that, I would have accepted it as a store that dealed with unique fashion. However, when I saw the huge promotional placard, I hesitated.

‘Demon Cult Twilight Official Sponsor’‘The Best Fashion that Suits Your Missionary Work’‘I Also Like The Black Flame Dragon on The Left Arm.’
Wait, I think I can feel a strange aura in those clothes……
No way. Everything in that clothing store has captured the heart of the 8th Grader boy. I grabbed Ash as if possessed and led him to a casual children’s clothing store on the other side.
“Ash, if you try this and this on, I’ll make you coffee when we go back.”
“….Really? But I’ve already finished my share today?”
As Ash was young, I decided that it would be bad to drink too much caffeine, so I had set it to two cups a day.
Still, sometimes it’s fine to drink a little more. Good thing I still saved some milk.
“It’s okay. Let’s try this on you quickly.”
It was so hard to buy new clothes for Ash.
“Customer-nim, it really looks good on you!”
The clerk brought a bunch of things, said that they were the new recommended products. Shirts, cardigans, coats, and more. I told Ash to try the clothes the clerk gave him once, and then paid for it.
Everything is so cute.
Ash, who finally wore clothes that fit his body, looked different from before.
‘This is the joy of spending money..…!’
“This outfit looks good on you, too. You look like a perfect children’s clothing model!”
Ash was surprised by the clerk’s silly praise.
“…… children’s clothing?”
Oops, he almost found out that this is a children’s clothing store. I quickly finished the bill and went out.
The urgent business is over. However, I took the escalator upstairs instead of heading to the subway station.
“Where are you going?”
“Now that we’re outside, let’s watch a movie together.”
“Never mind, I dont like that kind of thing.”
I knew he’d say that, so I prepared the answer in advance.
“I have a two-person popcorn coupon, but if I watch it alone, I can’t eat both popcorns. It would be nice if Ash is with me.”
“Well, then … it can’t be helped.”
Seriously, he’s such an unfriendly, cute little thing.
“What kind of movie is this?”
“Ah, it’s an occult fantasy movie. It is a story in which the main character investigates the events around him and finds out that it is the devil’s work. It’s a little scary, but in the end, they say that the main character defeats the devil.”
“…….”
“Ash? What’s wrong?”
“What such a sad story…….”
I don’t know where the sad content was in my words, but tears well up in his eyes. Still, he didn’t say he wouldn’t watch it, so we headed upstairs to the movie theater to watch the movie.
I need to buy popcorn first, but where is the popcorn stand….
Bang!
“Huh?”
There was a sudden roar in the direction of the downstairs where we passed. It followed by screams. People are screaming and running somewhere.
What are you screaming about all of a sudden? Don’t tell me … did any rifts occur?
No, there was never a rift in Yongsan in my memory before the regression.
“Ash, I’ll be right back after seeing what’s going on. Wait here.”
“……! Wait!”
Ash tried to grab me in surprise. I told him that it was fine, left him with a large number of shopping bags, and headed in the direction of the sound.
Fortunately, the identity of the roar was not a rift.
But what the hell is that?
There was a shadow coming this way through the screaming and scattering people.
Human? No, a monster?
What … what is that?
***
At first, Lee Sein was not willing to follow the suggestion of her secretary, Aeon.
Create a rift to kill the escaped incarnation. The risk is great. If it founds out that she did it, the punishment will be unavoidable.
Most of all, it was her conscience that stood in the way.
In order to develop the C&L Corporation, several illegal acts have been committed, and she also dealt with the competitors without hesitation. However, as for the general public, Lee Sein was a person with an average morality.
A rift in the city center would inevitably lead to unrelated people being caught up. She didn’t want to go that far.
There’s still time. How long would the incarnation, who just woke up from the seal, have run away? If she calls the Hunters from an affiliated organization and order them to search for it, she’ll find it.
All right, let’s do that.
After clearing her mind, Lee Sein threw the golden box into the deepest part of the drawer.
And from that day on, she suffered from terrible nightmares. Her nightmares were a past she tried to forget about, and there were also times when unidentified monsters popped out in her dreams.
When she was alone, an unfamiliar voice pierced her mind.
【Open the box.】
“Huk, heuaah!”
“CEO-nim? Is something wrong?”
“Ah, no … It’s nothing.”
【Open the box.】
Unable to endure the endless voice ringing in her head, she tried to return the golden box to Aeon.
“CEO-nim, did you call me? You don’t look well.”
However, this time, a strong fear and rejection swept over her body.
The foreboding that something more terrifying would happen if this box was removed from her hand, the fear that came from it, and … the desire to acquire power!
Yes, power! Didn’t she always want power?
Lee Sein wasn’t good in her ability as a Hunter. She borrowed the effects of several items and barely achieved the Grade C. That’s why, rather than moving directly, she raised the guild by recruiting excellent Hunters.
But if only she has the magical power of the incarnation, she….
“……!”
Lee Sein suddenly came to her senses. What was she trying to do? That’s absurd. It’s ridiculous, but…….
In the end, she couldn’t throw away the box.
And today, a meeting of the Guild Leaders attended by the heads of various guilds in Seoul.
As soon as Lee Sein, who arrived a little early, entered the meeting room, the sound of conversations stopped. People who have been chatting for a long time avoid her gaze with awkward smiles.
“What kind of interesting story were you talking about? I’m curious, too.”
“Haha, a rare item came into our guild. I was just about to show you.”
There was a gauntlet on the table. It didn’t seem to be a lie that it was a rare item since it already stood out just by its appearance.
“Really? Is this it?”
She reached out towards the gauntlet, but the man on the other side stopped her.
“Ehem! I’m sorry, but this item only can be applied for a B-class higher, so for CEO Lee Sein-nim, it’s a little….”
Silence. Subsequently, a gentle smile appeared. Eyes mixed with superiority cross in the air.
There was no one in this place as high-ranking as Lee Sein. Didn’t the man who was condescending in front of her also asked Lee Sein to bridge his way to the political world? Nevertheless, it was funny of him to feel superior with one item like this.
Taking back her hand, Lee Sein smiled brightly.
“You look good. I hope you continue to play on this field in the future.”
“Ah, that’s, CEO-nim….”
The man’s face turned white when he understood Lee Sein’s meaning.
“Wouldn’t it be safer for Korea to have someone who can directly operate these rare items?”
It happened when she was on her way back from the conference hall.
She felt dizzy due to the lack of sleep and stumbled. The person who was walking from the opposite side ran and supported her body.
“……Are you all right?”
The falling silver hair is familiar.
It was Kwon Jiwoon.
Unlike her, he was a person of distinct talent.
From the moment he awakened, he attracted public attention for being the first A-class Healer. She remembered the boy with silver hair who calmly answered the interview.
… she also awakened on the same day, but the situation she was in was very different.
And now, even in a situation where C&L puts pressure on Kwon Jiwoon’s guild, he still has that nonchalant look on his face. After all, on the inside, he must be going to laugh at herself like the guys from before.
For that reason, Lee Sein hated Kwon Jiwoon. She just wanted to blow up the Hunters who relied on their talents.
Tak! Lee Sein shook off the hand that supported her and got up.
“……it’s all right.”
She didn’t remember how she came back to her room after that. She heard a voice again, and it seemed that she lost her mind.
Are you sure you’re satisfied with this?
No matter how high she rises, her inferiority complex will not go away.
You already know it. How to fundamentally get rid of this disgusting sense of inferiority. You just have to get your hands on its power.
【Open the box.】
“……!”
Suddenly, by the time she came to her senses, everything was already too late.
Lee Sein moved her trembling hand and picked up the golden box on the floor. 
“Oh …. no……”
It’s already late. The strange-looking pyramid model inside was broken.
‘Calm down. He said it was an item that caused rifts. If it’s a rift … I have enough resources to take care of it.’
She is the representative of the largest guild in Korea. If she moves the affiliated Hunters, she will be able to reduce the damage.
However, it wasn’t a rift that popped out of the box.
Lee Sein rushed to the window.
Is that, huh … a Gate?
There was a big hole in the sky. An amorphous black monster poured down from a hole covered in dark mist.
She thought that there was an unpleasant stench, and a notification window popped up.
[Congratulations!The power of The Faceless One █████ has been activated.Target: Remains until the incarnation Asmodeus is annihilated.This operation cannot be canceled.]
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c74:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Rona is still in a deep sleep. He didn’t want to tell her a dark story, lest he ever get in the way of his lovely sister’s dreams.
The guild’s Hunters are uncomfortable with Choi Cedric. In any case, he had a lot of conversations with the plant otaku, no, the botanist Lee Chorok. However, he couldn’t possibly tell her the secrets of the guild.
And that woman … Kwon Rieul.

Choi Cedric recalled when he was caught up in the dungeon on a farm. 
He remembered the taste of the coffee she made in the dungeon, he even remembered her soft voice. Her soft eyes were quite cute, and unlike her first impression of being emotional and vulnerable, she felt cool because she was bold when she appeared in front of the monster.
Somehow, he even told her stories that he didn’t normally tell others. He promised to visit the cafe she runs, but he hasn’t kept it yet.
He vaguely wanted to talk to her.
He had her contact information in advance. However, Choi Cedric tried to dial her number on his phone several times, but in the end, he couldn’t make the call.
“Haa.”
He couldn’t do it. He didn’t know what to say.
He was a mess, with vague feelings of anxiety, doubt, and isolation all intertwined. He wanted to talk, but he didn’t know what he should say to her.
In front of that person, he was only going to show her the image of him as confident and cool as possible, the appearance that’s worthy of the No. 2 ranker.
Wouldn’t it be surprising to call her out of the blue and talk about depressing things? She would never have noticed that his original personality was timid and gloomy.
Furthermore, she said that she was a relative of Kwon Jiwoon of the White Silver Guild.
C&L is constantly pressuring the White Silver Guild. 
‘So how can I tell her that I might do something that harms her brother…….’
He can’t possibly tell her that….
Did Romeo and Juliet feel like this?
Around the same time that Choi Cedric was troubled by thinking of a somewhat absurd metaphor, in Cafe Rieul, at No. 16, Dungeon Gate 3 in Jung-gu, Seoul.
Kwon Rieul was faced with one difficulty.
***
Eh?
I rubbed my eyes and looked at the system window again. However, the content did not change.
[Fresh Milk: Out of Stock※ We are currently preparing for stock. We’ll send you a notification when it’s in stock.]
Eh?
In the meantime, Cafe Rieul has been running smoothly. With the skill level up, recovery became easier, and customers consistently visited the cafe. I enjoyed the self-employed super easy mode, where there were somewhat unusual customers, but most were just ordinary customers.
I was able to enjoy the dream life of a real cafe tycoon; roasting coffee beans, making sugar, and selling drinks to customers every day.
Above all, the existence of Ash, the all-around part-timer, makes all of this possible.
Thanks to this, sales of the store rose quickly, the sales of the store went up quickly, and through achievements, new recipes were obtained and my level was also raised.
The shop runs like a sail into the wind.
There were times when I felt anxious because it went so smoothly.
‘It’s weird. It’s about time they started to get in my way … why is the system quiet?’
It’s just a baseless feeling, but I thought that the system wouldn’t let this comfortable, trial-free state go unnoticed.
However, I didn’t expect this problem to happen.
Suddenly, milk and whipped cream were sold out in the Dimensional Shop.
‘Did I buy too much because the business is doing well these days?’
I paid ruby and tried to refresh the product list, but it was the same.
Out of stock, out of stock, out of stock……
They only took my rubies and don’t give me the milk I really need.
“Waeooogh, waeooong (Aren’t you thinking too badly of the great system).”
Mieum spoke, secretly took the side of the system. I didn’t know how this circular pattern of disturbance events keep occuring.
This reminded me of a cafe management game in the past.
With indomitable labor and selling personal information, I barely managed to get 1st place in the rankings, but only annoying sabotage quests were launched. I should’ve listen when people called it Man-game.
And there was a guild with a strange name, what was it … ‘Only You Fold the Bitter Server Termination‘, people from that guild kept bothering me.
“What’s wrong?”
“Oh, wait, we ran out of milk.”
Anyway, I can’t help it because I can’t find something I don’t have. I thought I, unfortunately, should use ordinary commercial milk, but…….
“……Ash, how do you like it?”
“…….”
Ash swallowed his words with a mixed expression. The satisfaction bar above his head gradually filled up … but it stopped in the middle. That’s a more definite answer than the words he didn’t say.
I also put down the cafe latte I was drinking.
To clear up any misunderstandings, even the ordinary milk coffee is not at all tasteless. The harmony created by the bittersweet espresso and the fragrant milk definitely matches the taste of caffe latte I know.
The problem is that my taste buds have become accustomed to coffee made with milk from the Dimensional Shop. Furthermore, the Grade that came out when using ordinary milk was only 1 star, and the recovery efficiency was poor.
This can’t be done. Anyone who has tried the coffee I made before will surely feel the difference in taste I didn’t want to hear rumors that the taste changed after gaining popularity.
Eventually, I decided to remove drinks that use milk from the menu until milk was available again.
The problem is that milk and whipped cream are used the most after coffee beans in the cafe menus.
Without milk and whipped cream, the rest of the menu were Americano, iced Americano, and lemonade.
Naturally, complaints arose.
“Give me a cafe latte, please. Huh, you can’t do it now?”“Please … I can’t cheer up if I don’t drink cappuccino from this cafe!”“I want to drink vanilla latte….”“I’ll pay twice as much, so please sell it to me!”“I’ll pay three times, no, five times…….”
I sent back the disappointed customers and looked at the Dimensional Shop sadly, but it was still out of stock.
Where can I get the milk?
According to the explanation of the item window, the milk that has been used so far is the milk of the A-class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros. Where is the A-class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros?
Tiling!
[‘Golden Triangular Rhinoceros‘ has been added to the Ether-Wiki.]
The system notification rang as if it had been waiting, but there was nothing particularly helpful in the Ether-Wiki. The content was just a simple explanation of the ecology of the Golden Triangular Rhinoceros.
[Do you want to play the clip ‘Ecology of A-Class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros’?Yes / No ]
I didn’t know that this wiki also has a video function…..
[You can’t see it anywhere else! Let’s meet the ecology of the Golden Triangular Rhinoceros, who lives only in Grade A clean land. A video to heal the hearts of modern people who are tired of city life, released for free for 3 days.]
There was a long ad phrase.
After thinking for a while, I chose ‘No‘ and got up. It is important to find a way to get milk, but I decided to deal with one of the delayed things first.
Sales have accumulated considerably in the meantime. Since I’ve earned money, now I have to spend it.
“Ash, come here for a second.”
“….Why?”
“I have a place to go.”
***’
An hour later.
“…….”
His eyes sting. Ignoring the silent protest, I lightly pushed Ash’s back.
“Then, I’ll wait here.”
In the end, Ash, who gave up his resistance, sighed and trudged. 
We’re in clothing store in Yongsan’s shopping mall. Of course, I came here to buy Ash’s clothes.
When I first found him collapsed in front of the store, Ash was wearing very old clothes. No, rather than clothes … it’s a double? The shape was difficult to recognize, and it was not even an ordinary modern doubles.
There were all sorts of miscellaneous things in the warehouse, but there were no clothes that a boy the size of Ash could wear.
In a hurry, I made him wear my clothes under the name of a part-time job uniform, but it was too big. The sleeves of the shirt and the pants are folded up, but no matter how you look at it, it’s clear that he borrowed someone else’s clothes.
I thought I should buy some clothes, but I couldn’t find the time to spare. This situation turned out well.
“We ran out of milk, so we’ll close the cafe early today.”
After closing the cafe early, I came here to buy Ash’s clothes. Ah, of course, I’m going to pay for his clothes.
For reference, Ash is properly paid for his part-time work. However, isn’t Ash a runaway teenager with reasons that he can’t say? It would be nice if he can save his part-time job salary and spend it on other things.
It would be best for me if Ash can keep working part-time in the cafe, but … he could go to school or something like that later.
In addition, the store’s sales have also risen a lot. If it continues like this, I can buy a house, no, a building soon.
…… Hmmm, let’s dream about the future of a building owner later.
What should you do when you make money?
You have to use it right away!
The sales are piling up steadily, but I’ve been busy and haven’t had time to spend them.
As a member of the modern consumer society, I cannot let this happen.
Yeah, right now is the moment we need Labour Detox!
Since Ash had only been at the store, I used this opportunity and went out of the Dungeon Gate to shop and eat out after a long time. I brought Ash to Yongsan, which is relatively close and has a lot of clothing stores.….
“Ah! It looks good over there. Let’s go there.”
“……Ugh.”
As soon as he saw the crowds in the shopping mall, he had a tired expression on his face.
“How about this? Try this on.”
“Never mind. I don’t have to wear it.”
“This is pretty, too.”
“It’s not….”
This uncooperative attitude. This must be … it’s like a little kid who doesn’t want to go shopping with his family.
“Ash, is it a lie that you are 17 years old?”
“Huh, I got caught. I’m actually over two thousand years old…….”
He’s still keeping up that setting….
“Whether you’re two thousand or fourteen, I won’t let you go until you choose at least three sets, so give up.”
“….Cih.”
“Is there anything you like? Ash, you can buy whatever you like, okay?”
“Hoo, that’s nice.”
‘Humans are trash’, Ash, who had been following me reluctantly with a grim expression, pointed to a clothing store.
“Really? Then shall we go there … Huh?”
I doubted my eyes.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c73:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Ash remembered what Rieul had said.
“Is it delicious? Do you want one more?”“Wow, Ash is really quick with his hands.”“Okay … It must have been hard …. As long as you’re fine with it, you can stay here.”
She often smiled softly when she saw Ash, even when she was devastated by the work in front of her. There were many times when she patted his head or treated him like a child.

She muttered to herself that it was the 8th Grade syndrome, but he didn’t know what the 8th Grade syndrome was.
In particular, when she looked at him with her affectionate expression and stroked his head, his anger rose.
She treats him like a weak child!
He felt like his heart was filled with unwanted warm and touching things. He knew it instinctively. This warm thing will fall like a drizzle and weaken himself. That’s why he wanted to use his magic to scare her, but on the other hand, he also wanted everything to stay the same.
‘The man with black eyes was unpleasant, but…….’
Today, he also met human children who have quite good senses. They have eyes that could recognize the strong, so they’re pretty good for a human being.
It was fun to make dalgona for the first time. As soon as his dalgona swelled up, it was funny that the woman next to him liked it more than himself.
And he hates to admit it, but…….
He really doesn’t want to admit it, but…….
Working part-time was more fun than he thought. Receiving and delivering orders from the endless customers. Every time he cleaned up the pile of work, the woman widened her big eyes and admired him.
“Ash is definitely a genius!”“……this is not a big deal.”
He said that, but he didn’t feel bad.
He washed the cups and saucers thoroughly and put them back in place. When he looked at the neatly organized counter after finishing all his work, he felt proud.
Ash is an incarnation made with the magical power of a Demon who was originally sleeping in the Abyss. 
To him, the memories and experiences of individual are meaningless. If he disappears someday and returns to his main body, it will all be a memory that will disappear.
There are busy part-time job, children who can communicate well, and a woman who smiles with a sad expression. These are all memories that will disappear when this body dies, but somehow … he loathed it.
That’s all.
Ash laid his body on the futon. Next to his pillow was a large, bright red slime-shaped cushion. The woman with a foolish face left it here because she thought he would feel lonely sleeping alone.
“Now, you wouldn’t be lonely if you have this, right?”
Involuntarily, he touched his forehead again. Even though the warmth has already cooled down, the hand that traces the lost warmth is soft. The bright smile of the woman came to his mind.
“….shit.”
Let’s wait a little longer.
He hasn’t recovered all of his mana yet. Let’s kill her when he completely recovers his mana.
Yeah, it’s because of his mana recovery.
That’s all. Really.
***
“You missed the incarnation?”
The top floor of C&L Corporation, in the CEO office.
After hearing Lee Sein’s words, her secretary, Aeon, frowned slightly. It is a change of expression that is hard to notice if you don’t look closely. However, it was a rare expression for him, who always had a calm and refined smile.
“Yes, the box was empty. The area has been searched, but it hasn’t been found yet.”
Lee Sein looked over her subordinate’s report again and spoke.
There was something strange about the report. The disappearance of the incarnation. A missing body.
Choi Cedric, who was at the scene disguised as a bodyguard, said everyone was dead and no one survived except him.
There’s no way Choi Cedric would lie to her. However, no matter how many times she counted, one corpse was missing.
‘Was there one less person than planned from the start?’
Lee Sein decided to forget about the number of corpses first. Those guys were so arrogant, they might not have reported the change in personnel. Dealing with the survivor, if there’s any, can be done later.
The more important thing is the whereabouts of the incarnation.
“You must find it. You know what it is. For our plan, we really need the incarnation of the Daemon Azathoth.”
“I know, but where did it disappear … I don’t see a clue.”
It was a long-planned plan. First, the Holy Beast, the Long-tailed Phoenix, was captured and used as a vessel to summon the incarnation. Then, the dark ether was poured in little by little until the Holy Beast was completely corrupted.
In order to obtain the dark ether without leaving a trace, they had to take a detour route. It has been several months since they used the Neo-Crown Party to collect the dark ethers.
By sacrificing the completely blackened Holy Beast, they succeeded in summoning the incarnation. They dealt with all the people involved in this work, kept their mouths shut, and the access route was washed clean as well.
The incarnation was not yet complete, but it didn’t matter. Lee Sein’s only purpose was to forcibly seize the incarnation, then extract and use its infinite mana.
‘If only I had that power … I can make Choi Cedric the No. 1 in the Rankings.’
In addition, it is possible to shake off their disgusting competitors and put “C&L Corporation” in the top spot, in name and reality.
It was all a plan presented by the competent secretary in front of her.
Aeon was such a perfect secretary. All the secret measures he suggested were novel and achieved perfect results. Thanks to Aeon’s advice, C&L Corporation was able to grow from a powerless small guild to its current position.
Again, the plan was perfect and the execution went smoothly.
However, the whereabouts of the incarnation are ambiguous.
‘If I can’t find it….’
Lee Sein tapped nervously on the desk. If the incarnation was found by someone else, not only would the efforts so far be in vain, but the guild could also be in danger.
“What’s the way … do you have any idea?”
The secretary Aeon, who had a beautiful smile like a painting, gave her the answer again this time. His eyes, resembling imitation jewels, shone strangely.
“Of course there is a way.”
“Really?”
So far, there has been no problem that has not been resolved just by listening to Aeon. Lee Sein looked at Aeon with trust and expectation.
“This is it.”
Aeon took a small golden box out of his arms and handed it to Lee Sein.
Click.
When she opened it, she found a strange little object that looked like two pyramids joined together.
“What is this……?”
“It’s modeled after a great artifact. It’s an imitation, but it’s definitely effective.”
It’s ominous.
She didn’t know what it was. Nevertheless, she felt a very strange force in the object. When she looked at the center of the object, she felt her head throbbing and there’s also a feeling of nausea.
“It’s an item that causes rifts.”
“……! What?”
“You don’t have to be so surprised, CEO-nim.”
He gave a gentle smile that didn’t match what he just said.
The incarnation is the alter ego of a Demon made with mana. If it has escaped, they will only have to create a new body and summon it.
However, there is only one incarnation that can be summoned at the same time.
In order to summon a new incarnation, the previous incarnation must be handled, in other words, it must be killed.
This item is a rift generator that summons monsters of the Outer World. The summoned monsters will take care of the escaped incarnation after chasing the smell of mana.
“Fufu, it’s simple, isn’t it? There is no need for CEO-nim to get her hands dirty. I will prepare the new incarnation summons. All you have to do is break this, CEO-nim.”
Aeon grabbed Lee Sein’s hand and pulled it up onto the pyramids. With a slight press, this little object already felt like it was about to break.
“……!”
Surprised, Lee Sein pushed the box away. Her hands trembled.
“Ah … no matter what, I can’t do such thing. The damage … the damage will be great.”
“Then, I will entrust this box to CEO-nim, so think about it carefully.”
Aeon added with a smile.
“You’ll soon realize that I’m right. Don’t forget. All you have to do is break it. You need the magic power of the incarnation, don’t you?”
“…….”
Click. Aeon closed the door and went outside.
Lee Sein, who was startled, tried to put the box out of sight right away.
No, she can’t. She can’t do such a thing.
But … But maybe…….
***
“…..CEO-nim?”
Choi Cedric was surprised and stopped walking. Lee Sein, with a blank expression on her face, was walking down the hallway.
Lee Sein did not notice the existence of Choi Cedric standing right in front of her. It’s strange. Choi Cedric came closer and called her louder.
“CEO-nim, where are you going?”
“……! Ah, Cedric.”
Lee Sein is surprised as if she just woke up from a dream. She tried to smile, she needed to tell him that it’s nothing, but her lips were stiff.
“What is this?”
Choi Cedric asked, pointing to a box protruding obliquely from Lee Sein’s suit pocket.
“……!”
Tak!
Before Choi Cedric could reach it, Lee Sein slapped his hand away. Only the sound of the slap echoed loudly in the empty hallway.
“Ah, I’m just curious because it’s something I haven’t seen before…..”
Lee Sein apologized as she hurriedly wrapped the box in her arms.
“I was a little oversensitive because it was an important item. I’m sorry.”
“It’s all right.”
Then, silence. An awkward current flows.
After hesitating, Choi Cedric opened his mouth first.
“I … CEO-nim, I have a question for you, can you spare a moment?”
“I’m sorry. I need to attend the Guild Leaders meeting soon … let’s talk next time.”
Without waiting for Choi Cedric’s reply, Lee Sein left with a busy pace across the hallway.
Choi Cedric, who was left alone, sat on the sofa at the end of the hallway. He took his phone out of his pocket and looked into it. He pressed a number, but he eventually put it back down without pressing the call button.
“Ha…..”
His chest was tight.
CEO Lee Sein has been strange these days. It’s already been a few days, and when he asked her what’s going on, she didn’t give him an answer.
She didn’t say anything about the black monster that escaped from the box. She just asked several times if the number of bodies was correct.
Feeling uncomfortable, Choi Cedric hid the existence of the survivor. It was just a hunch. Somehow, he felt like he should do that.
That survivor, a Hunter with an unusual name, Jijon, said he’d quit his job as a Hunter, so it wouldn’t matter….
‘What the hell are you doing…….’
No, not just this time.
At some point, Lee Sein has more things to hide from him.
At first, he took it for granted that the management of the guild was Lee Sein’s responsibility. He didn’t know much about the complicated stories, so he had to be faithful to his role: raiding the dungeons.
Choi Cedric’s first Grade when his awakening happened was Grade A. Currently, he’s an S-class. It is undeniable that the guild’s full support has greatly helped him to rise to his current position.
So, in order to become a necessary Hunter for the guild, he moved according to Lee Sein’s orders.
However, little by little, more and more things inside the guild that he did not know increased.
It’s a ridiculous imagination, but…….
Sometimes, he even thought he was just a scarecrow who drew the attention of the public.
Since when it started….
In retrospect … it has been since the secretary appeared.
Choi Cedric wanted to vomit this sense of discomfort somewhere.
However, who on earth can he talk to?

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c72:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Lastly, I put a gas burner and a pot for my share. Since I was making dalgona, I was going to make a lot and store it.
“Meong, waeooong (You always say you don’t want to work, but you’re a human being who likes to increase your own work! You say you only want to play, but your behavior is completely the opposite)!”
“Kkyuuu!”
Umh. I’ve recently started to feel the same way.

Maybe I’m the problem……?
Maybe the DNA of the corporate worker from my past life has been exerted. Even if I think I want to play, I will unintentionally look for work to do.
Ugh, let’s stop imagining scary things.
“No, it’s not like that. The cafe would be idle once the hype died down. I’m only busy right now because it’s on the peak level.”
“Nyaaaah (Heummm, I hope it works out the way you want it to)….”
I rubbed Mieum’s belly fat, and then returned to the front of the table.
Anyway, it’s time to make dalgona.
First, I filled the pot with a little water and put plenty of magic sugar on the ladle, then I turned on the gas.
Joo Shinwoo, who followed me, turned on the spirit lamp and raised his ladle, asked in a curious voice.
“Should I do it like this?”
“Yes, don’t stir it.”
At the words, the twins and Ash straightened their posture and grabbed the ladle.
It was important to dissolve the sugar as it is without stirring it. When it was heated for a while, the sugar melted and became transparent, and bubbles began to rise.
“Not yet. We have to wait a little longer.”
The children were excited by the sweet smell that came out. There were some children whose eyes twinkled and blushed in an easy-to-understand manner, and there was also a part-timer at our store who worked hard to pretend that it didn’t bother him.
As the sugar water boiled down, more bubbles came up, and little by little, it turned brown.
“…You can stir it now.”
At my permission, the children added the pre-dipped baking soda and began to stir.
I also added two tablespoons of baking soda to the pot and turned off the burner. If you stir it while it’s on the fire, the temperature will rise too high and there would be a risk of burning.
When stirred quickly with a whisk, the dalgona turned light brown and swelled up.
When it is sufficiently inflated and the inside of the pot becomes thick, pour it on the pre-laid sheet. You have to move your hands quickly because you have to scrape it all off before it hardens.
“Wow……..!”
Watching the golden lumps pouring down, Joo Shinhee exclaimed in admiration. Looking around, the children also poured dalgona on the sheet in front of them. It swelled up without a burn.
“That’s okay! It’s soft.”
“I made it better, eonni.”
“…..Cih.”
When I was young, I used to burn my tongue because I tasted it when it was sticky, before it hardened properly. In the meantime, I burned the ladle to black and ate it…….
“Waeoog?!”
I knew it.
I hugged Mieum, who was still trying to eat a hot dalgona lump, and put her away. You shouldn’t look at me like that. I saved your life.
Since this dalgona is intended to be added to drinks, I decided to harden it without pressing it flat. After letting it swell for a while, it hardened just right.
The dalgona, wrapped in paper, was broken into appropriate sizes using hands and spoons, and then I placed in a container.
The remaining process is simple.
I put ice and milk in a transparent glass cup that shows the inside well. A generous amount of freshly made dalgona slices were placed on top and espresso poured over it. I also didn’t forget to decorate the dalgona pieces made by the children as toppings.
Tiling!
[Item: Dalgona Coffee (★★★★☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 01:00:00)Effect: All stats are increased by 100% for 10 minutes.]
After completing the drinks according to the number of people, a ringing system window appeared.
Dalgona coffee has a pretty good effect. I didn’t expect it would be a 100% increase in status. If the strength is 100, it becomes 200, so it is more efficient than any buff potion.
Another thing to note is the Grade.
Unlike before, a 4 stars Grade came out from the beginning. The status retention time is also more effective.
This was the level-up effect of ‘Cafe in My Hand‘. This is the meaning of “when making drinks in the store, the level of perfection is higher“. As all recipes went up to 4 stars, their effects were strengthened.
In addition, it was good to be able to drink up to five cups of coffee a day without getting the ‘caffeine addiction‘. As I was dealing with the rush of customers, I quickly became groggy.
‘What a relief.’
But why are my eyes getting wet.….
Now it’s time to taste it. Each person took a cup of dalgona coffee and sat down.
“Thank you for the drink.”
“Wow, it smells like sugar!”
“……hmm.”
First, I picked up the dalgona that was used as a topping and took it to my mouth.
Crunch! The soft dalgona with a lot of air bubbles crumbled in the mouth. The sweet taste of sugar mixed with the slightly bitter burnt taste was a taste that I did not get tired of.
I also handed out dalgona slices to Mieum and Lime, who were complaining next to me. The two of them were quiet for a while as they melted and ate the dalgona.
“Nyaaaah (I want to eat more)!”
“Kkyuuuuuuu, kkyuu!”
It would have been nice to have Choi Yichan here, I felt sorry for him. This sweetness is just what Choi Yichan likes the best.
I don’t know what he does for training to get stronge … I wish he could come back soon. I’m going to feed him a ton of dalgona.
After stirring the dalgona powder, which began to melt little by little, to mix well with the drink, I tasted it with a straw immediately. Along with the sweet drink, I chewed a piece of dalgona that came into the mouth.
“……!”
“It’s delicious…..”
“You must be a genius!”
The children who drank the dalgona coffee poured out their appreciation. Everyone’s reaction was different, but I could tell that it was delicious without looking at the bar above their heads.
I glanced at Ki Yoohyun next to me. He, too, was drinking dalgona coffee in front of him with a soft expression.
Come to think of it, I’ve met him several times, but I still don’t know much about this man. According to Mieum, the guess that his sense of taste is greatly weakened is the part that worries me.
It would be very stimulating if you drink a sweet drink after normally not being able to taste well. Wouldn’t it similar to the joy of having a snack after having an upset stomach and eating only unseasoned white porridge for a week?
“Why are you looking at me like that?”
Oh no. I suddenly felt pity, so I must have stared at him too much.
“Have some more of this.”
I scooped up another spoonful of dalgona pieces and poured them into his cup. Eat at lot of dalgona, my action was out of a pitiful heart.
“……?”
Suddenly, it was quiet around me. When I turned my head, the children were staring at me.
Ash frowned, and the twins’ eyes twinkled. Then, when our eyes met, they turned their heads.
Guys, I don’t know what you’re thinking, but don’t be so obvious.
Joo Shinhee suddenly brought up a new topic, apparently trying to cover up the awkward atmosphere.
“We went to a B-Grade dungeon yesterday.”
“I also got the boss. It’s a B-class Venomous Kraken!”
“I’m the one who got the last hit!”
“You idiot! My curse weakened that octopus, that’s why you were able to hit it.”
“If I didn’t hit the headshot, we missed it, you idiot!”
Oh my…..
I was going to do a Dungeon Detox, but the topic went away with the dungeon story.
Surprisingly, Ash showed interest to this story.
“Hoo, that’s pretty cool. The Kraken is a tenacious guy that even I can’t get rid of at once.”
“……! Are you a Hunter, too?”
“It’s not like that.”
At the startled question of Joo Shinwoo, Ash shook his head. The twins made eye contact with each other and looked at Ash again.
“You look pretty strong, though?”
“Right, I think you’re strong?”
“…. Huh, you guys seem pretty strong for humans, too.”
“I’m Joo Shinhee, and he is Joo Shinwoo. I’m an archer and he’s a wizard, but he’s good in using dark curses.”
“That’s a great talent. Call me Ash.”
They suddenly became friends?!
The twins and Ash chattered about other monsters. The dungeon talk continued actively.
Dungeon Detox, heuk….
The original planned Dungeon Detox was completely out of order, but … well, enjoy yourself anyway, that’s fine.
And as time passed, it was time for the guests to return.
“I almost forgot about this.”
Ki Yoohyun, who rose from the chair, took something out of his pocket and held it out to me. When I received it, it was a small object with a single round button.
“What’s this?”
“Umh … should I say it’s like a crime prevention bell? Rieul-ssi seems to be going through a lot of dangerous things.”
“It’s not like that…….”
I was panicked before when I was swallowed by the Monster Hell at the farm, but it ended well.
“Keep it and press it if something dangerous happens. I will come to help you.”
“Can I try pressing it once?”
“Yes.”
Click!
I pressed the button, but it didn’t make a loud sound or flash like a normal security bell. However, Ki Yoohyun smiled and said that it worked properly.
Is there an app notification on his phone?
First of all, I decided to accept it as his way of saying thank you. It’s not a big deal so far,  but the number of customers in the store has increased significantly. I may need Ki Yoohyun’s help when problems arise.
Still, it’s best not to have anything that makes me use it….
***
“Fufu, did you have fun today?”
“……Not really.”
“Shall I ask them to come over next time?”
“Well, whatever.”
“Ash, you did a great job today. Good night.”
The woman with a foolish face said so, then she closed the door and left. He was offended by the way she smiled every time she saw him.
Still, he was able to successfully infiltrate this place as a part-timer.
The coffee she made was very tasty and his mana quickly recovered. What Ash particularly liked was the cafe mocha. The harmony between the bitter coffee taste and the Chocolate Sauce from Hell was fantastic.
Thanks to his steady drinking of the coffee she made, his mana has restored to some extent.
[You are using Mana Saving Mode.][Mana recovery amount: 20%][Some spells may be unusable due to lack of mana.]
Now he can easily kill that one woman as much as he wants to. He could even make her obey his orders through mind control.
But why?
He felt reluctant.
Ash inadvertently put his hand on his forehead. It was the spot that Rieul had just stroked. There was still a subtle warmth.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c71:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

He awakened at the age of 18.
The rare awakening of an A-class Healer, his young age, his status as the son of guild leader of the White Silver Guild, and his splendid appearance … all those factors made his awakening appeared on the headlines.
“Wow, oppa, you’re amazing!”
The admiration of his two-year-old cousin, who often quarreled with him, was enough to excite the young Kwon Jiwoon.

After awakening, because of the training and the interviews, time went by busily. Especially after he entered a dedicated training facility, he had little contact with the outside world.
He thought it didn’t matter. His father trained him to the point where he felt a little impatient, and it was hard to catch up with the progress.
His younger sister was 16 at the time.
Kwon Jiwoon finally realized his position when an incident occured.
Suspicious men attacked the house where they lived at the time, taking advantage of the absence of Kwon Jiwoon and his father, Kwon Seokmin. They were armed with illegal weapons that were not readily available, and they were thoroughly concealed their identities. Further investigations was unable to identify their backgrounds.
It wasn’t a stalker or an accidental offense. It was clear that it was deliberately intended to kidnap Kwon Rieul.
The purpose, surely, is Kwon Jiwoon himself.
That day, Kwon Rieul had gone to their grandmother’s house, probably because she’s bored waiting for her family who rarely returned.
What if Rieul didn’t go to their grandmother’s house and stayed home? Or what if she came home a little earlier?
He felt like he was losing his footing. The day before, he remembered talking about being close to his cousin without much thought.
It may not be directly related, but at that time, Kwon Jiwoon could not escape the idea that Kwon Rieul was almost in danger because of his words.
After that, it wasn’t long before his father went missing.
As he succeeded in his father’s footsteps and took over the guild management, Kwon Jiwoon began to distance himself from Kwon Rieul. He sent his subordinates for security purpose, but just like with any other relatives, there were only a handful of direct contact between them.
“Please take good care of Rieul.”
…. but the idea that they should keep their distance has not changed even now.
Kwon Jiwoon eventually put his phone down from his hand and took a sip of coffee in the cup instead.
“……it’s bitter.”
Since it was left unattended for a long time, lukewarm coffee splashed his mouth.
The coffee that his sister gave him back then was delicious.
Knock knock. The subordinate who came in after knocking handed out some documents.
“Deputy guild leader, these are documents related to next week’s guild leaders meeting.”
“I see … the guild leader of C&L will also come.”
Only the boring stuff continues. Kwon Jiwoon sighed.
***
Beep, beep, beep….
“He’s not answering the phone….”
The signal went on endlessly. I waited a little longer, but there was still no connection, so I put down my phone.
“What’s going on?”
“Huh, it’s nothing.”
I shook my head at Ash’s words and went back to the counter.
The person I just called is Kwon Jiwoon. The last time we met was when the dungeon broke out at the farm, I was concerned that I couldn’t tell the story properly.
However, as expected, the call I made with a big heart was not answered.
Hmm, he must be busy.
‘Well, it’s always been like this…’
There’s nothing to be disappointed about because I didn’t have any expectations.
Anyway, it’s been a few days since Ash started his part-time job at Cafe Rieul. There were still many customers, but the situation has stabilized a lot. At least every night before going to bed, I don’t have to contemplate the meaning of life and work.
He was lying in front of the store when we first met, so I thought he was weak, but Ash did a really good job.
From time to time….
“Why should I, Asmodeus, the Demon King who brings twilight to the world, have to suffer such humiliation?”“Kukh, if I regain my strength, I will wipe out all human beings.”“Chocolate Sauce from Hell? No wonder it tastes good, it’s an elegant and wonderful name.”
I’m embarrassed by this eighth grade syndrome.
Well, at that age, let’s respect his worldview.
I bent my knees, made eye contact with Ash, and smiled. I gently stroked Ash’s hair while the boy was planning to wipe out humans with meteor using the sleeping power in his left arm.
“I see. Ash is awesome.”
“….Cih!”
Even though I said nice things, Ash turned his head away with an angry expression.
“Waeooongg (You were wrong this time).”
Why me?!
“Kkyuu, kkyuuu!”
I interpreted Lime’s words with the slime language translator that I had stuck in the drawer.
‘Right, she’s right.’
No, why me?!
Until yesterday, you guys were attacking and bickering with each other, so why are you taking sides at times like this? Suddenly, I felt lonely….
Well, let’s get back to business.
“The menu you ordered is here.”“Here, next order.”“I’m done organizing.”
The hand moves without stopping. Although there was no smile and the words he said were short, he finished the work with accurate hand movements and quick actions.
Ugh, it’s so dazzling. I can’t look straight ahead.
Perhaps Ash is the Light and Salt of the cafe part-timer world, and the savior of the single self-employed person.
“Ash, you’re like an angel!”
“…..! What do you mean……! How could you say such an insult to Asmodeus!”
That’s his setting….
“Ah, yes, I understand.”
“Don’t answer half-heartedly.”
“I apologize, Ash-nim.”
“……Hmph!”
He turned his head sullenly, but I saw the corners of his lips rising slightly.
What an unfriendly, cute little guy.
***
It was time to close the business after almost running out of the prepared ingredients for today.
“Ash, I’ll make you a cafe mocha. Let’s rest.”
Nod. Instead of answering, Ash nodded his head and quickly sat down in front of the table. He hummed with his chin up, and when he caught me staring, his face reddened.
“What, wha-what are you listening to!”
“Huh? Nothing?”
“Then … forget it.”
“Hm, hmm, humm, next is heumm, right?”
“……! As expected, you heard it! Go away!”
“Then you don’t need a cafe mocha?”
“What … you’ve already taken out the ingredients, so you can’t throw them away.”
“Ahaha, yes, yes.”
I handed him a cup of cafe mocha with plenty of Chocolate Sauce from Hell, which Ash called an elegant and wonderful name. The moment he took a sip, the bar of light filled up.
He really likes cafe mocha. He tried to drink it with a bad expression every time, but it was obvious.
The cafe door opened when Ash was almost done emptying his cup. The long-awaited guest came.
“Ah, come on in.”
“Eonni, hello.”
“Hello, noo━”
“Don’t call her noona, you idiot!”
“Why only you can call her that, you idiot!”
“I got permission from Eonni!”
They were the twins, Joo Shinwoo and Joo Shinhee, and Ki Yoohyun.
I heard that the twins recently went to a dungeon with high difficulty. What does someone need to do when they come back from a dungeon?
“Meong (What)?”
“It’s Dungeon Detox.”
“Kyakyaoong (No, that’s not it. The dungeon isn’t even poisonous)!”
“Kkyuu!”
It’s poison. It’s not good for your health.
Not long ago, I got caught up in a dungeon again unintentionally, as someone with dungeon trauma and dungeon allergy, I’m pretty sure about what I’m talking about since I also have a recurrence of dungeon phobia.
“Waeoong….”
“Kyuu….”
I could feel the cold gazes on the back of my head.
That’s why, for Dungeon Detox, I closed the cafe a little earlier than usual and invited the twins.
Ki Yoohyun … well, I guess he just came with them as their guardian. Even if I don’t invite him, he’s a person who shows up very often.
“……!”
“……!”
The twins, who were about to enter and sit down, were startled when they found Ash. They looked at Ash with a cautious expression and widened their distance.
Ash also looked at the twins with his signature cynical eyes.
Is it because they’re at the same age? They must be shy.
“This is Ash, who has been working part-time here since last week. Ash, these are Hunter Joo Shinwoo and Joo Shinhee. Please be friendly to each other….”
“…….”
“…….”
No, it wasn’t that they’re shy. It was actually like wild water beasts being wary of each other and measuring the opponents. The moment the fight seems to begin right away and the ↗→+[Attack] is about to fly.
Joo Shinhee ran up to me and hugged my waist.
“We’re Eonni’s closest friends!”
“Yes, that’s right.”
Jo Shinwoo nodded a beat late.
“We watched anime together. Did she also allow you to call her Eonni?”
“….Cih.”
Ash, who turned his head with a sulky expression, added in a small voice. There was also a subtle, but not completely hidden, smirk on his face.
“I live with her.”
“……!”
“Really?!”
It’s true. Ash looked like he had nowhere else to sleep. When I hired him as a part-timer, I gave him a room on the back of the first floor.
As soon as I said yes, Ash and the twins started a nerve war over me again. Mieum, lying on her belly on the floor, added the observation review.
“Waeoooong (You’re so popular with kids)!”
“Ha, haha…..”
With the kids circling around me, I felt like I have entered an illusion world of Hahaverse.
‘All The Kids in My Store Like Me’, something like that…..?
“You got a part-timer.”
Ki Yoohyun slowly added more words.
“I also wanted to work part-time here. It’s a pity I don’t have the opportunity.”
No, why are you interfering? Besides, how could I use a guild’s Hunter as part-timer….
“Adults like you shouldn’t be jealous of children.”
“….Yes.”
After a long time, I was finally able to separate the twins and Ash and seat the guests in the table.
Instead of coffee, I put a bunch of magic sugar, pots, baking soda, and other ingredients. on the table instead of coffee. There is also a gas burner and a spirit lamp.
Joo Shinwoo asked with his eyes wide open.
“What are you making with this?”
“You’ll find out soon enough.”
Since the twins came to the cafe for the first time in a while, it would be better to try a new menu than the existing one. Dungeon detox requires special experience.
All of sudden, customers began to flock to the cafe, and there were quite a few new recipes. I haven’t finished making it yet because I’m exhausted every day after the cafe is closed.
Huh, in a game, isn’t there a section where the progress is suddenly fast? A section where the level goes up at once or items come in a lot. It feels like I’m in that section.
‘Cafe in My Hand.’
I glanced through the recipe list. Among the many new recipes, there happened to be a good one to enjoy together.
It’s Dalgona Coffee.
In my life before the regression, there was a time when a recipe of the same name was popular. It was a recipe that added sugar and water to instant coffee and stirred it for a very long time.
‘My hands really hurt…….’
Unlike the usual coffee-making, the drink I will be making today has a recipe that requires me to break real dalgona into coffee. I was going to make dalgona for this coffee one by one. After all, it’s fun to make dalgona.
I placed a ladle and the spirit lamp in front of the twins, one at a time. Ki Yoohyun decided to help the twins because it could be dangerous.
In the past, when this place was my grandmother’s store, I was scolded for burning a ladle while trying to make dalgona. After hitting me hard on the back, she told me that’s not how to do it. It reminded me of that time.
“Do you want to try, too, Ash?”
“….it’s fine.”
However, he replied bluntly as if he was not interested.
“Really? I have one ladle left, but there is no one to make it … Ash, can you help me?”
“Then … it can’t be helped.”
Ash quickly picked up the ladle.
Really, he’s really an unfriendly and cute guy.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Light and Salt (빛과 소금): It is one of the parables that Jesus gave when teaching the Sermon on the Mount. It is taken from the phrases “you are the light of the world” and “you are the salt of the earth.” The meaning of this parable can be seen as living like the light that illuminates the dark world and the salt that purifies the corrupt world.
Dalgona is a Korean candy made with melted sugar and baking soda. It became popular again recently because of Squid Game.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c70:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Is there a reason why you want to work part-time here? There must be vacancy elsewhere.”
However, Ash shook his head with a firm expression.
“No, there is no other place … nowhere.”
Just in time, thanks to Ash’s quick touch, I can afford to take a break for a while. I made another cup of cafe mocha that Ash enjoyed yesterday, handed it to him, and spoke carefully.

“Ash, if you said that because you were sorry for me, you don’t have to do that.”
An anxious gaze reached me.
“You were worried because I looked busy today. Ash is also kind.”
“Who-who are you calling kind as you please! How could you say such a bad thing! Are you trying to insult the Demon King, Asmodeus, who summons the twilight of the world!”
Uh, huh…..? You must be embarrassed to be praised…….
“I let you sleep here yesterday just because you looked unwell, not to make you work. You can stay here as long as you like, so don’t worry about it, just relax. Okay?”
“It’s not that, it’s that……!”
“That?”
Ash avoided my gaze with a sullen expression. What a sensitive age.
“Co.”
“Co?”
“Coffee….”
“Ah, was it delicious? I’ll make it again as much as you want.”
“It’s not that, I want to do the part-time job.”
“The part-time job … once you have these documents, you can do it.”
Ash was determined to work part-time. I briefly wrote down the necessary documents on a piece of paper.
“….sheesh.”
“Oh, Ash! Where are you going?”
Ash, who grabbed the list of documents, got up and ran outside.
Did I hurt his feelings? He’s really in a difficult age….
***
With a cold expression on his face, Ash was immersed in thought.
Coffee is the source of mana recovery. In order to continue drinking this coffee, it was necessary to infiltrate the cafe without being doubted.
Through the downloaded knowledge of the human world, he came to the conclusion that he could infiltrate the cafe with a ‘part-time job’. The situation is perfect because this person is also looking for a part-timer. 
However, there was one unexpected difficulty.
It’s the documents.
“The part-time job … once you have these documents, you can do it.”
A feast of unfamiliar words.
‘It’s a lot different from a thousand years ago.’
Thousands of years ago, if he just shot a meteor in moderation, humans would take care of him and gave him what he needed.
However, due to the lack of mana, most of his magic was sealed. Ash went out to find another way to make the documents.
At that time.
“Aaa, aaaah!”
On the street, an old man saw Ash and collapsed while screaming. It’s a man who was wearing a colorful vest over his skinny body.
A terrified pale face, a trembling body. In addition to that, his eyes filled with joy and admiration.
“Do you know me?”
“Se … se-serve, no way, are you the Demon King, Asmodeus-nim?”
He nodded.
The old man gasped and prayed in a light motion.
“Ooh, oh …. ooh! Demon King Asmodeus…..”
“You have good eyes.”
Ash, who was satisfied with the old man’s worship, smiled.
“Please! please … there is a place where my colleagues gathered. The Great Demon Lord needs a worshiper. Please accept our worship.”
“Nice.”
Finally, he met someone who treated him worthy of his power. Ash followed the old man.
Ash didn’t know, but this old man’s true identity is the head of the cult of the Demon King, Twilight.  He has been waiting for the resurrection of the Demon King for a long time and has even tried the summoning himself.
However, the summoning failed. No matter how much he waited, the Demon King did not resurrect and his colleagues left one by one.
Currently, his main activities are….
‘The Demon King Really Exists’‘Worship! The Demon King will be resurrected soon.’
It was to put up illegal posters like this all over the streets.
Once a week, he waved a picket in front of a downtown subway station, grabbed the passersby. and asked, ‘Do you believe in the Demon King?’.
He already lost his followers to other similar religions, but….
The time of hardship is over. Hodl got the victory. Hodl won the war.
“I have a job for you.”
“Yo-you absolutely may ask anything.”
The old man, who had worshiped the Demon King for a long time, instinctively noticed. He looks like a slender boy in shabby clothes, but this man is the Demon King he has been waiting for.
That cynical eyes and the cold voice. The strictness of giving orders out of the blue in front of the worshippers was certainly not from a fake.
What is his first command? Making a living sacrifice? Or a curse on humanity? The blood of the Demon King worshipper? Maybe … is it the use of stakes of forbidden curse?
However, the old man couldn’t help but be flustered by the words that followed.
“Make documents for part-time jobs.”
“Yes, I will … yes?”
“Did you not hear it? Documents.”
***
It was an hour after Ash ran out of the store when he heard he needed the documents.
“That’s enough, right?!”
As soon as he returned, Ash put down the envelope containing the documents. I looked inside and there was everything I needed, including a health card.
I looked carefully just in case, but it wasn’t a forgery. The guardian’s consent form contained the name of a child protection facility operated by a place called ‘Religious Foundation Twilight‘.
What’s going on? There must be a reason why he wanted to work part-time here.
Name: Kim AshAge: 17
The name Ash, it was his real name…….
“All right.”
It was a situation where I had to find a part-timer anyway, and I was concerned about Ash’s situation.
“……!”
He raised his head in surprise. The joy that he couldn’t hide is revealed on his face.
“Hoho … you will be swallowed up by the darkness.”
It’s good that he’s happy….? Anyway, I don’t know what’s going on, but I hope he can cheer up.
“Please take good care of me in the future.”
Tiling!
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Main Quest: Finding a Part-Timer’.Please collect the reward.][Experience: 100 EXP have been acquired.][Fame: 10 / Popularity: 10 have been acquired.][<Cafe Rieul>’s current Grade: E][Skill point owned: 1][Please choose a skill to level up.]
As soon as the quest completion notification sounded, the skill point came in.
Hmm, what skill should I raise….
After much deliberation, this is the skill I chose.
‘Cafe in My Hand.’
As the business grew rapidly, the frequency of using this skill increased tremendously. Just as there was an amazing fraud effect when I leveled up ‘The Floor is Shiny‘, I was expecting something good would happen if I level up this skill.
Cafe in My Hand (C)Details: (Lv. 2) When making drinks in the store, the level of perfection is higher.
“Heh?”
At first, I didn’t immediately notice what had changed. It just changed from ‘level of perfection is increased‘ to ‘level of perfection is higher‘.
I’ll experiment it a little later to see what the difference is…..
Then, the ringing sound rang again.
[※ Cafe in My Hand (C) Level Up Effect: When you drink coffee, you won’t get addicted to caffeine up to five cups.]
Wow, that’s awesome.
***
At the same time when Rieul was about to write an employment contract with a new part-timer.
Her cousin, Kwon Jiwoon, was banging his head on the desk.
Bang!
“…….”
“Deputy guild leader, I just heard a loud noise, is there something wrong?”
“……it’s nothing.”
“All right.”
Bang!
“Deputy guild leader?”
“Ehem, uhum, it’s okay.”
Kwon Jiwoon stood up awkwardly.
The reason why he is so troubled is, of course, his cousin. Kwon Rieul.
“Oppa, I’m awakened.”
Rieul said that she had awakened. His cousin, who still seems pretty young. It was shocking at first, but Kwon Jiwoon’s brain moved quickly.
‘Then you should join the White Silver Guild.’
It’s a a matter of course. He’s the deputy guild leader and his father, Kwon Seokmin who is currently missing, would surely agree.
Which guild you belong to is another proof of identity for a Hunter. The White Silver Guild is not a large guild, but it has a good location and is one of the important guilds in Korea. If they have Rieul as a member of the White Silver Guild, whatever she does in the future, the guild will be helpful for her.
It would be easier to fill out the application form electronically instead of on paper. He was thinking about the procedure in a rush, but Rieul cut his thoughts and drew a line.
“I’ll never say that I want to join your guild, so don’t worry.”
The words weighed on his mind.
“….Haa.”
Kwon Jiwoon slid his eyes down. An empty phone text message writing window caught his eye. He wrote a few meaningless letters and erased them again. It’s because he noticed a report on the recent trend of dungeon raids next to it.
Recently, C&L Corporation’s intervention in the raids conducted by the the White Silver Guild has been intensifying since a few weeks ago.
Even if he tries to push through the principle, the opponent is the largest guild among The Big Three. There was no way to arbitrarily take away the contribution of the raid by pushing with the quantity.
The same thing happened in all three recent dungeon raids. This is obviously intentional.
In addition, C&L approached the guild member of the White Silver Guild and offered a transfer. The guild’s main members remain the same, but some other members have already left.
If this is the case, it is clear that the power of the White Guild Silver will be weakened.
C&L was trying to absorb the White Silver Guild.
‘I don’t know how the hell I got so out of my mind.’
In this situation, would it be the right choice to bring his younger sister to the White Silver Guild? The closer he gets to his younger sister, the more they will pay attention to her.
For a moment, Kwon Jiwoon looked into the old memories of the past.
[Next]
