SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c69:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Unexpectedly, the cafe has been in a difficult situation for the past few days due to the sudden increase in customers.
However, it’s different now.
Hoho, look at this perfect preparation.
The roasted beans were also aged just right, and the sub-ingredients were swept from the Dimensional Shop. I also made a lot of Lemon Chung. I went to Grandma Kim Deokyi’s workshop and bought many take-out cups.

With this amount, there will be no problem running the store for a while.
Clothing OK, cleaning OK, machine setting OK. Well, everything is perfect. We’re ready to reopen.
In the meantime, there has been one change in the store.
“What are you doing?”
“I’m preparing to open the cafe soon.”
“……hmm.”
He has a sulky voice and a cynical expression. Children of this age are really sensitive.
I found the boy collapsed at the shop door yesterday.
Like Jina, why is everyone falling down in front of this store? Is this some kind of falling hot spot?
Anyway, I brought the boy inside. He had a pale complexion with a very thin, frail body. In addition to his uncertain attitude about what had happened, he was reluctant to report to the police.
Why? What happened?
After all the pitiful and sad talk, I decided to look into it a bit more tomorrow before deciding whether to report it or not.
Anyway, it was already late at night, so I couldn’t let such a vulnerable child out. What if he fall down again? For now, I decided to put the child to sleep in an empty room on the first floor.
“Hey, what’s your name?”
An unexpected answer came back to the careful question.
“Do you think that a mere human can be qualified to call me by name?”
Uh, huh…?
Is it something like his setting?
“It looks like you don’t want to talk about it. Still I can’t just call you with hey, you …. then I’ll give you a temporary one.”
The pale boy looked uneasy.
“Waeoooooong (I don’t think that’s a good idea)!”
“Kkyuuu!”
Mieum and Lime’s protests were ignored.
“What do you think about Bieup?”
“……!”
The boy’s face contorted. He poured out his next words in a low, quick tone.
“The infinite evil seething from the the primordial chaos, the incarnation that shared the magical powers of the Abyss. What do you think of Asmodeus, the Demon King who brings twilight to the world! It’s a name that humans can’t pronounce recklessly!”
Uh, huh…? Twilight … what? 
Is this the 8th-grader syndrome that I’ve only heard of? Is it like a black flame dragon on his left arm?
“Yeah, since I can’t pronounce it, you’re Bieup.”
“……!”
Tingling. The boy stared at me and shuddered.
“My name is Asmodeus.”
“Asmo … what? It’s too long.”
“Haaa …. cih, call me whatever you like.”
In the end, I decided to call him Ash.
It wasn’t his real name, no matter how I heard it. Since he’s of a delicate and sensitive age, I have to adapt to his worldview.
“Yes, the bathroom is over there. You have bandage on your left arm, are you hurt?”
“……! Don’t touch it. The bandage on this arm cannot be removed because the magic of the Abyss is asleep.”
“What’s that?”
“Those who doesn’t have the magical eye won’t be able to see it. It is an incarnation imprint that connects me with the being in the Abyss.”
“…….”
I see. He’s the real one. He has such a genuine cheeky expression and tone.
Yes, let’s respect Ash’s setting as an adult.
“Uh … huh, if it’s that important, I won’t touch it.”
“Haa … to be able to recognize the value of this imprint, you’re quite good for a human being. You will be swallowed up by the darkness.”
It’s a compliment … is it?
So, after putting this unusual Ash to sleep, the next morning came.
After a simple breakfast, I gave him a sweet cup of coffee and Ash drank it well. Although his expression was sulky as if it were not delicious, I was proud because the satisfaction bar above his head was honestly filling up.
“It’s time to open the cafe soon. You can stay as long as you want, so play comfortably with the kids in the back room.”
“Waeooong (Do you think we are in charge of babysitting)!”
Mieum protested as she straightened her tail.
“Kkyuuu!”
There’s also a slime that agrees next to her.
Seriously, what are you guys doing to a hurt sensitive child? Are you being territorial with a child because you’ve been here for a long time?
“Why, you’re similar in age, and you’re perfect …. ah, ouch!”
I couldn’t avoid the meow punch flying from the front because I was concerned about Ash.
Mieum is eating well, I felt like her front feet are getting heavier.
“……what are you doing?”
A cynical voice was heard again. Ash looked at me and the animals alternately with a gaze of looking at something pathetic.
“Ehem, ehem. Then, Mieum-ah, Lime-ah, please take care of him.”
“Humph.”
“…..Kyaoong!”
Ash jerked Mieum’s tail. Surprised, Mieum threw a meow punch, but Ash avoided it leisurely.
“Kkyuu! Kkyuu!”
I don’t know which side it’s rooting for, but Lime is encouraging them from the side.
See, they’re in sync.
***
As soon as the cafe opened, which was notified in advance, customers rushed in.
“One takeaway cafe latte, please.”“I’ll have two iced Americanos. That’s right, and please add a cafe mocha.”“Oh, is it a new menu? Then, please give me an Einspanner.”
I was extremely busy taking orders, making drinks, and washing dishes.
Save me…..
The procession of customers never ends…….
Where did my healing life after the regression, the one that was supposed to be a relaxed, lazy, and comfortable life, go?
Where the hell did the rumors about my coffee come from?  It’s not like I was on a broadcast or did viral marketing.
The fact that I make the coffee through my skills seems still unknown, so there is nothing dangerous at the moment other than overwork.
“This 255, 0, 0 vivid color, this size and the fluffiness! This cushion is so familiar …  It must be the limited edition of Real Red Slime Large Cushion, it’s pretty outdated custom production … where did you buy this cushion….”
“Ah, I bought it from Karrot.”
At that time, Lime bounced and leaned on the soft cushion.
“Keuhuk! Sli-slime on the cushion I sent away with tears … the meeting of the Real Red Slime and Real Red Slime Cushion! It’s an honor … can I take a picture…..”
“Yes.”
Click, click, click! She takes a lot of pictures of Lime, who’s posing around as a model.
Like her, there were slightly strange customers, but other than that, most were ordinary customers.
After taking care of a flood of orders, I took a moment to post a part-time job recruitment notice at the door. I hope that I can find a part-timer as soon as possible so that I can get out of this busy situation.
Although there are zero contacts so far…….
I don’t know if Choi Yichan is doing well. I don’t know what’s going on, but he might as well give me a phone call.
I didn’t think of him just because I needed a part-timer. It’s just … he stayed here for a few days and then disappeared, so this place felt a little empty.
When I returned to the counter after posting the recruitment notice, Ash was taking orders from customers who had gathered in a short time.
“Ash, just rest. You don’t have to do that.”
No matter how busy I am, how can I make that frail child, whom I presumed to be a runaway teenager, work for me? Even when he’s just sitting there, I felt like he was going to faint.
The reason I told Ash that it was okay to stay here today was purely from my heart.
However, Ash skillfully received the pouring orders.
“Two iced cafe lattes, one Einspanner, two vanilla lattes, and one cookie set. They came in like this.”
“Uh, wait, how much is it…….”
“15 rubies.”
Each time I made a drink, he served it quickly, and even cleaning the table perfectly.
“Ugh!”
“……? What’s wrong with you?”
“Nothing, it’s just blinding me for a moment.”
What is this incredible ability…….
With his cynical expression and a slender figure, it’s unimaginably fast and perfect movement. In an instant, the delayed orders were processed and the store was cleared.
He shook off his hand and asked suddenly.
“Are you looking for a part-timer? What should I do to do that?”
Tiling!
[A quest has occurred.]
[Main Quest: Finding a Part-TimerThe customers are rushing in like the tide. You can’t handle this popularity alone!You need help.Hiring part-timer: 0/1Rewards: Experience (100 EXP), Fame (10), Popularity (10), Skill Point 1]
As soon as Ash spoke, a new quest appeared.
I looked at Ash again. With a small and slender body, he has a cynical expression on his face, but the cheeks that gives off a youthful appearance caught my eye.
“I’m sorry….”
“What?”
“Part-time jobs are only available for people over 15 years old.”
Ash replied indifferently to the words I had said.
“How old do you think I am? I’m not that young.”
“How old are you?”
“Well, I haven’t counted properly since I was 2000.”
Ah, that’s his setting….
“Fail.”
“……!”
“65 is the retirement age.”
At the playful addition, Ash hesitated for a moment and murmured.
“I’m 17 years old.”
He appeared to be under 15 on the outside, but he was older than I thought.

Translator’s Corner:
a black flame dragon on his left arm (왼팔의 흑염룡) actual meaning: Chūnibyō. It’s from the 중2병이라도 사랑이 하고 싶어! (Chūnibyō Demo Koi ga Shitai! / Even with Eighth-Grader Syndrome, I Want to Fall in Love).  The main characters in the story are experiencing chunibyo, a mocking term for immature behavior of young teenagers in which they act out grand delusions, or pretend that they have magical powers such as those of anime characters. Chūnibyō (sometimes also spelled ‘chuunibyou’), is literally translated as “middle 2 syndrome” (middle [school] second [year] syndrome), which also goes by the short form ‘chu2’, and is often translated to English as “eight-grader syndrome”. Despite the name, it can manifest in people of all ages. 
And yes, I copy-paste those explanations from fandom wiki. I actually wanted to just write it as ‘ chunibyo’ since a lot of you guys must have been already familiar with the term, but I ended up using black dragon in case you read some korean in the future and got confused when a sudden ‘black dragon’ appeared out of nowhere.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c68:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

It’s not a Long-tailed Phoenix. It was a black, large hand that could not even be considered a human.
The hand grabbed the interpreter’s body with strength.
Crack! The interpreter died with a chilling, unpleasant sound.
“Ugh…..”

A suppressed scream came out.
The Long-tailed Phoenix is ​​not an ordinary monster, it is also called a Holy Beast that deals with the light attribute ether.
However, the box contained that large hands with grotesquely grown nails, and even the dark ether leaked out thickly from it.
At that moment everyone noticed. There is no way that such an ominous thing could be the Holy Beast, the Long-tailed Phoenix.
So … what the hell is that monster?
“Huaagh!”
Swish!
The box was completely smashed and the monster jumped out. With agility that did not match its huge body, the monster began to attack the fleeing humans. Long fingernails and teeth tore the humans to pieces.
“Uu-ugh….”
Jijon’s legs, who were trying to run away, lost their strength. Blood has already poured from the wounds scratched by the monster’s claws. The monster who tore off the man who offered Jijon a cigarette a while ago turned its head towards him.
It’s coming up to his position.
His head is numb, Jijon thought a question as he felt the blood pouring from his body. Was he going to die like this after all?
It’s a death befitting an extra. Had he known that he was going to die here, he would have contacted his mother and sister. He closed his eyes and prepared for death.
Then, someone jumped forward with a sword.
It was Choi Cedric, who was disguised as a bodyguard. Choi Cedric swung his long sword lightly to block the monster’s attack.
Klang!
The monster who lost the power battle took a few steps back.
“Are you okay?”
“Uh, yes, yes….”
“What the hell is this …. hang in there.”
Why is Choi Cedric here?
The appearance of Choi Cedric, who confronted the monster with his sword, was hopelessly cool.
He looked so different from himself, who came to this point by repeatedly making bad choices and was about to die while helping illegal things.
Choi Cedric is strong. Unlike Jijon who could not even set foot in the Hunter’s World, he’s the signature Hunter of C&L, currently ranked second in the Rankings, and an S-class.
A guy like that wouldn’t have anything to worry about, and a guy like him wouldn’t be able to understand.
Rather than being grateful for being saved, the sense of inferiority that he had swallowed raised its head.
“……!”
At that time, the monster who tried to attack Choi Cedric ran away, as if it decided that it was hard to win over him.
“Stay there!”
Choi Cedric tried to chase after the monster, but he stopped when he saw that Jijon’s wound was severe.
The order he received from CEO Lee Sein was to disguise himself as a bodyguard and steal the box that was going to be traded today.
It’s just his own speculation, but she may be thinking of fabricating this event as the work of the White Silver Guild.
“Then the trader who paid for it wouldn’t sit still, what would you do?”“I don’t care about others.”
It was a strange way of speaking.
For some reason, it felt like she knew they’re going to die by that monster….
According to Lee Sein, he should leave the wounded alone and chase the monster……
The wounds are severe even by the looks of it. At this rate, he’ll die in no time. The hesitation was brief. Choi Cedric gave up his pursuit and approached Jijon.
“Wait a minute. I’ll at least use a potion.”
He searched his inventory and pulled out a high-quality potion at random.
“That’s expensive…….”
“Is the price important now?”
As he poured the potion into the wound, he suddenly saw the injured man’s face. Those stubborn eyes and sulky expression, somehow he’s familiar with it.
“Eh, have we seen each other before?”
“……you’ve got the wrong person.”
Jijon bowed his head obliquely and avoided his gaze. However, Choi Cedric’s gaze was persistent.
“No, I definitely saw you! This guy, you’re lying because you’re afraid to be a criminal. Obviously before, so … Ah.”
Choi Cedric swallowed a sigh. He remembered where he saw Jijon.
In the C&L guild headquarters, in front of the elevator dedicated to the guild members. They belong to the same guild, but why is a Hunter from C&L here?
Didn’t she certainly say that she wouldn’t put the members of their guild in danger?
‘Noona, what on earth … what are you doing behind my back?’
Choi Cedric’s face was contorted.
***
[Lack of mana due to incomplete summoning.][Charge your mana. In case of mana depletion, the body cannot be maintained.]
The black thing protruding from the box ran down the street with its heavy body.
However, the pace was only getting slower.
Its stomach was hot as if it had swallowed a fire, and the desire for destruction rose. It wanted to pour out all its magic and devour the surroundings.
The black energy that enveloped its body gradually weakened. The body, which had run out of mana, was now having a hard time moving.
[※ Caution: Your mana is extremely insufficient.]
Originally, it was in a deep sleep. The sleep waiting for the promised day was comfortable and sweet.
However, the humans forced it to wake  up. The humans periodically injected dark ether, disturbed the sleep, and interrupted its dreams.
It wanted to kill all the hateful humans who woke it up.
“Ck….”
Its body refused to move.
[※ Urgent: Activate the body composition system. 1, 5, 10, 20 … Due to the lack of mana, the body composition task cannot be completed. Stop the operation.][Enforcement of Mana Saving Mode][Compose a temporary body.]
After the black mist that wrapped around it lifted, what was revealed was the figure of a young boy.
The unconscious boy fell to the ground. It was in front of Cafe Rieul.
And at that time, Rieul, who was roasting coffee beans, heard a thump.
“Hey, are you all right?”
When the boy woke up, there was a woman with a puzzled face in front of him. The woman looked at the boy with a worried expression and said,
“You were lying down in front of this place. Are you sick?”
The boy blinked slowly.
He felt a sense of discomfort in his body. His eyes were low enough to require him to look up at the woman, and his limbs were small and slender.
Due to the depletion of mana, it was only possible to create such a small and poor body.
“….Cih.”
The boy moved his eyes and looked around. There was a woman with no sense of crisis in front of him, and the surroundings looked like a cafe.
“Umh, you don’t have a fever….”
The woman reached out and touched the boy’s forehead.
“……!”
It’s unpleasant.
Tak. The boy immediately struck off the hand and tried to kill the woman with his magic. However, it was not possible due to the lack of mana.
[You are using Mana Saving Mode.][Annihilation of the target is impossible.][It is recommended to adjust to the surroundings for the time being.][Downloading Human World Knowledge (Basic). 1, 5, 10, 20, 50 … Completed.]
He’d rather pretend to be a normal kid for now. The boy who had judged that way, muttered in a weak voice.
“It’s not that I’m sick, I’m just dizzy for a second…….”
It was a faint voice and pitiful eyes that aroused sympathy. The woman jumped to her feet.
“I should report it to the police.”
“……No police!”
It was bothersome to get involved with more humans.
“Why? The policeman will take you home.”
“Home … I don’t want to go home.”
The woman nodded slowly as she accepted the words.
“Sit here and wait a minute.”
For a moment, he could hear a rattling sound, and then a white porcelain cup was pushed in front of him.
“……?”
Through the downloaded human world knowledge, he could see that it was called ‘coffee‘, specifically ‘cafe mocha‘.
The liquid in the glass is black. Why are you asking me to drink this? He pushed the cup away, but the woman held it firmly to the boy.
“Your body will warm up. Hurry up and drink it.”
“….Okay.”
It would be better to obey her words here. With a reluctant expression on his face, the boy tilted his cup.
The sweet taste flowed into his mouth first. Then, the heavy taste of espresso, which supports the sweetness, and the savory taste of milk.
It was incredibly delicious.
Not only that…….
“……!”
His mana has been restored.
It’s only a little, but he could feel a little bit of magic power filling in his body. That can’t be true.
The boy took another sip of the cafe mocha. It didn’t come close to the powerful mana he originally had, but he definitely gained power.
The boy hastily emptied the remaining cafe mocha.
“Uh-huh….”
When the boy emptied his cup, the woman glanced over the boy’s head and looked proud.
He didn’t like it.
He didn’t feel any special power from her. Nevertheless, the power of coffee given by this stupid woman was undeniable.
If he recovers his mana, he can kill such a woman in no time. If he can get his original body back, he will wipe out all the humans who woke him up.
To do that, he has to somehow find a way to drink more of this coffee.
“…….”
The boy was lost in thought.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c67:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Kkyuu?”
Lime bounced and cried.
Let’s review the daily life of this red slime in our house.
It often plays with Mieum, but more often than that, it usually plays alone. When Mieum is watching a television drama while tapping on her belly, it bounces around on its own, bouncing its small body.

From inside of the store to the surroundings of the Yggdrasil and to the corners of the space, it roams freely, and it occasionally makes a kyuu sound as if it was talking to itself.
“Kkyuu, kkyuuuu.”
I’m curious. What does that kyuus mean?
In such a situation, while looking for a way to communicate with slimes, I came across a video by chance. It’s a famous video that has been on the main screen of YouTube for a while.
On the screen, a green slime bounces its smooth and soft body.
━ Kyuuu, pi! Kyuuuu!
A cheerful cry is heard. The videographer pointed a small machine with a black-and-white liquid crystal at the Green Slime.
Kyuu, kyuuu, pi!
The light flashes as the machine recognizes the sound. After a while, a string appeared on the screen.
‘I feel good. I like it.’
━ Kyuuuuuu!
Again, the machine recognized the slime’s cries without missing a beat.
‘I’m a slime. I like clean water.’
This is an introduction video of a slime language translator that has become a hot topic.
The high-performance interpreter artifact, which can also interprete the slime language, was too expensive to buy even if I sold the whole store, but maybe I can buy this language translator!
I thought so and searched, but I soon ran into a wall.
[GIFT] AI Portable Slime Language Translator SlimeTALK★It’s temporarily out of stock.We’ll send you a notification when it’s in stock. [Subscribe for notifications]
They didn’t sell this slime language translator anywhere.
It turned out that they produced only a small amount for a pre-release and sold it for a limited time, but the company went bankrupt before starting the general sales. With the recent popularity of slime, many people are looking for it, but there are no items left for sale.
There was no choice but to hang a keyword notification on the Karrot market, which is a trending platform among Hunters, and wait.
It was difficult to obtain because only a few hundred were produced, but blessed are those who wait!
As time went by, the Karrot notification alarm finally rang. I made an appointment to meet and make the deal right away.
“Then, I’ll go buy the slime language translator.”
“I don’t think that’s a good idea, waeooong.”
Unexpectedly, Mieum showed a negative reaction. Before, she said it’s better not to know what Lime said. What’s the secret of Lime’s kyuu sound?
“Why?”
“Sometimes it’s good not to know, waeoong!”
“Then Mieum can translate it for me.”
Mieum said that she does not exactly understand Lime’s words. Instead, by reading the wavelength of the slime’s cries, the vague meaning can be grasped. I told her that she can just tell me the meaning, but Mieum firmly did not translate it.
“Don’t go. It’s for your own good, kyaoooo!”
“I already made an appointment on Karrot. I’ll be back!”
And at the meeting place.
The other person appeared with a large bag, as if he had several Karrot appointments.
“Slime Language Translator SlimeTALK★, is this right?”
“Yes, that’s right…….”
“Wait a minute.”
He rummaged through his bag. There were only slime goods in the bag, such as large slime cushions, slime figures, slime glasses cleaner, and slime humidifiers.
You must really like slime…..
“Here you are. As the bonus, I’ll also give you a slime cushion, a slime can badge, and a slime random figure box.”
“Yes?”
The one I bought was a palm-sized machine, but the bonuses were bigger.
“No, you don’t have to give me this much….”
“It’s okay. We still have 20 more of the same ones, so feel free to take them.”
His shoulders droop with a deep sigh.
After listening to his story, I heard that there was no more space in the container because people around him bought dozens of the same goods. The warehouse was already full and things invaded the room. It only leaves a place to lie down, so when he tried to fall asleep, he’s forced to make eye-contact with the large slime figures.
If that’s the case, there’s nothing I can do….
Anyway, I returned to the store with the language translator and the large slime cushion that I received as a bonus.
“What’s this, waeoong!”
“Kyuu!”
I threw the cushion to Mieum, who liked the soft texture, and immediately turned on the language translator.
“Lime-ah, tell me something.”
“Kkyuu, kkyuuuuu!”
The light on the slime language translator flickered and the screen soon turned on.
My heart is pounding … what did it say?
━ The incarnation of ████ will soon awaken. The dark ether has reached its critical point.
Huh? It was a difficult text that could not be guessed from that cute appearance and the cute cries. It seemed like a warning that something big would happen in the future.
“Lime-ah, what did you just mean? Can you please say it again?”
“Kkyu …… kkyuu, kkyuuu, kkyuu!”
━ 3.14159265358979…….
Huh? Is it an error? Why does the circumference rate appear?
I rocked the machine up and down. Then, the letters on the screen disappeared again. Well, there must have been a brief error. Yeah, it’s Lime’s kyuu sound, why would a circumference rate comes up?
“Kkyuuuus! Kkyuuu, kkyu!”
━ Ac, Th, Pa, U, Np, Pu, Am, Cm, Bk, Cf, Es…….
Mom, it’s saying weird things…….
Lime, you’re a science slime.
“Do you now understand the pain I went through, human! Waeooong!”
I tried a few more times, but only the scientific knowledge without context was listed, and it didn’t tell me what I was curious about.
I gave up and decided to put the slime language translator in a safe drawer. As expected, communication with this slime was too difficult for me.
***
When darkness fell, in an abandoned house near the Dungeon Gate.
Jijon looked around with a nervous expression.
‘Why did this happen?’
‘Where did it go wrong….’
He lamented inside, but it was too late.
Around Jijon, there was a group of people waiting while smoking cigarettes. They have loud voices and rough attitudes, they were engaged in a job that was not good to look at, even the equipment worn over their bodies. They giggled while bragging about trivial things, but if you look closely, you can feel the tension that cannot be hidden from their faces. They’re just pretending to be calm and bluffing.
One of them approached Jijon and held out a pack of cigarettes.
“Have a smoke too, hyung.”
“I quit smoking.”
“Gosh, you’re a poison.”
Huk. He spit cigarette smoke at his face. He patted him on the shoulder and continued his words, ignoring the frown on Jijon’s face.
“Don’t be too nervous. It’s not like you’re doing this once or twice.”
It seemed that the man was trying to convince himself rather than encouraging Jijon. The words continued.
“We all heard who was behind us. It’s C&L! The C&L! I heard that a high-ranking person in C&L takes care of us directly. Hyung is already a member of our Neo-Crown, so please don’t worry.”
Throwing burnt cigarette butts on the floor, the man glanced back at him. The moment the large wooden box caught his eye, his fingertips trembled slightly.
The cause of this strange tension is that big box. A sealed box containing the long-tailed Phoenix, a rare monster that can only be found in a special environment.
The group around Jijon are the guild members of Neo-Crown Party. Their purpose today is to hand over this rare monster to a trading partner at a high price.
However, this box gave off a strange atmosphere.
Even though it was just a box, he can feel an indescribable sinister and unpleasant aura from the box. Is there really a long-tailed Phoenix in it? It looks like there’s something much scarier in it.
The sealing of the box is perfect. The monster must have fallen into a deep sleep.
Nevertheless, he was afraid.
Damn, he shouldn’t have accepted this either.
Jijon poured out a sigh inside. He should have turned down Lee Sein’s offer at that time. No, even if he was arrested for being framed of murder, he should have reported it then.
“If you just take care of this, I will take responsibility for the rest.”
Believing the secretary’s words, Jijon came to this place today.
Still, that must be a lie. If this goes wrong, they’ll put all the blame only on himself somehow.
It felt like an invisible rope was squeezing his throat.
“Kek….”
It’s already late.
“You’re late.”
Across the darkened Dungeon Gate, the trading partner appeared.
The partner was a foreigner. Even though it was night, he covered his eyes with sunglasses, and accompanied by an interpreter and a Hunter who appeared to be a bodyguard.
Although his nationality and identity were unknown, he offered a large sum of money. They don’t care about the other person’s identity. The Neo-Crown Party simply wanted to hand over this ominous box quickly.
The trading partner muttered something, and the interpreter next to him delivered his words.
“He wants to check the item. Please open the box.”
“…….”
“…….”
The wandering gazes were crossed. No one wanted to open that box.
“What’s wrong? Is there something wrong with the item?”
“Of course not, how can you doubt us like that!”
“Don’t you know that we don’t trade based on trust alone? We can’t trade until we check the item.”
“Ck, I understand.”
It was still an unwilling response. The leader of the Neo-Crown Party spoke, pointing to one person.
“Hey, you go open it.”
“I … you mean me?”
“Then, do you mean I should open it by myself!”
In the end, the best runner approached the box. It was the moment whenhe  inserted the key into the lock and tried to turn it around.
Thud!
“Aa-aaahhh!”
“Why are you making a fuss?”
Even such a reproachful voice trembled slightly at the end.
“Hyung, there is a strange sound inside!”
Thump, Thump, Thump!
The dull vibration gradually grew stronger.
“I heard you guys are the notorious Neo-Crown Party, but you all are terrified of this thing.”
Pick, the interpreter who ridiculed them stepped forward and tried to open the unlocked box.
“Hey, why don’t you just stop…….”
“What’s wrong with you? It must have been sealed….”
Puck!
The interpreter could not even finish speaking.
The box split vertically, and a black hand popped out of it.
[Next]

MY HUNCH IN PREVIOUS CHAPTERS IS RIIIGHT. IT’S REALLY NEO-CROWN PARTY!!!
They used proper spacing in this chapter, and the world used is 파, means faction; party (or can also be mean as ‘clan’). Now I can sleep in peace.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c66:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

I was taken aback by the unexpected sudden development.
“Iyaoong (His sense of taste seems to have weakened considerably).”
“Cough, cough!”
“Rieul-ssi?”
“Ah, it’s nothing…….”
“Here, have some water.”

The coughing only stopped after I took the glass of water that Ki Yoohyun handed me and drank it.
Didn’t you just detonate a big bomb like it was nothing? Mieum’s words continued regardless of my reaction.
“Iyaooong (That’s a lot going on … that must affect his mental faculties as well).”
“What are you … ah, don’t tell me….”
Suddenly, I remembered what Mieum had said before. She said that if you sympathize too much with the Great Old One, you may lose your original self.
“Does that mean Yoohyun-ssi signed a contract with a Great Old One?”
“Waeoong, meooong (Yeah, that’s quite … no? Oh my oh my goodness … This is amazing)…..”
“Mieum-ah?”
“Nyaaaah (That’s weird. It is different from the arrangement of ██. How come at this point … Don’t tell me █████ is)……!”
[Warning: Abnormal Approach][System Error: —. —.—]
Mieum-ah, an error window popped up because of you…,
I turned my head away from Mieum, who was talking to herself, and looked over Ki Yoohyun’s head again. The satisfaction gauge is still about 98% full.
“He hardly can taste it, but the coffee is still delicious, right?”
“Kiyaoong (Of course! What do you think your skills are)!”
“….Coffee making skills?”
“Kyaoooog (Coffee made with the skill that reduces the effect of assimilation. In other words)…..”
“In other words?”
“Meooong (He can taste the coffee)!”
At that time, I felt my cheeks sting and turned my head. Ki Yoohyun alternately looked at me and Mieum, who suddenly cried. I almost became a weird person who’s talking to a cat.
“Ehem, hmm. I’m sorry.”
“It’s nothing. I was just trying to say that every time I drink the coffee made by Rieul-ssi, I feel warm.”
“…….”
Let’s imagine.
Regardless of the cause, he’s unable to sense taste.
No matter how much he eats delicious food in the world, such as chicken, pizza, and famous hotel buffet that just got delivered, it would only feel like a lump of soft food for him. A situation in which one eats for nutrition, but does not feel the joy of eating at all.
For me, it’s a tragedy that can destroy humanity.
But when he drinks the coffee here, it tastes good. Just like a paint that was painted on only one place in the achromatic world, he can only felt the bitterness, savory, and sweet sensations in this coffee.
I’m so sorry to hear that…..
No wonder he wants to drink the coffee I made every day. That must have been the reason why he showed his face often these days. Yeah, it wasn’t because he had any other meaning, it was purely because the coffee was delicious.
Regrettably, I told Ki Yoohyun that he could come for coffee anytime.
Then, my phone vibrated.
When I checked the notification, I jumped up.
“Rieul-ssi, what’s wrong?”
“The call I have been waiting for has arrived.”
That’s good. I couldn’t open the cafe tomorrow because I didn’t have any coffee beans. I can take care of my other business at this chance.
I posted a sign on the front of the door saying, “We are closed today because we’re out of ingredients.”
***
The large conference room was empty.
In the dim place where the lights went out, there was one person sitting unnoticed. She was a quiet woman with long hair up to her waist and wearing a pair of glasses.
Her name is Ju Noeul.
She put her hand on her forehead and sighed.
“Haaaaa…..”
Tiling! Then, her phone rang. Ju Noeul hastily checked her KakaoTalk.
[ <Cheongna Guild> – Hunter Han Yiseong]Hunter Ju Noeul. I’m sorry for the late reply!I’m afraid I won’t be able to attend today’s Hunter Association meeting.It’s a pity that I have to have a meal together after meeting with a senior Hunter ㅠㅠI will definitely treat you to a meal next time.
In summary, he wrote a long greeting, but he eventually missed the meeting.
Han Yiseong, who sent her a reply, is a gentleman. That unfortunate CEO of C&L didn’t even read her message at all.
Noeul closed the KakaoTalk window and murmured.
“These people are so mean…….”
Korea Hunter Association. An autonomous organization that protects the rights and interests of each private guild in Korea and promotes the development of the Hunter World through exchanges.
…. that’s what written on the website.
However, not many Hunters are aware of the existence of this Hunter Association.
‘That’s because it doesn’t have anything to do….’
Since most of the Hunter-related tasks are exclusively handled by the Dungeon Management Office, the role of the Hunter Association has been greatly reduced. The Hunters who knew about the Association also didn’t pay any attention to it was contributed to the reason as well. Most of them are even asking what this is when the Association send a notice reminding them to pay their membership fee.
However, even an Association in name only needs to operate.
She has no luck. Ju Noeul took over the position of the President of the Association this quarter because her name was caught in the lottery.
Today is the monthly regular meeting of the Korea Hunter Association. Still, no one came, either. Goodness, the humanity these days….
‘Whatever, I don’t know anymore….’
Let’s kill time and go.
Ju Noeul leaned against the chair and connected to the Hunter Channel with her phone. Then, as she looked through the new posts, she diligently commented on the slime-related post.
Ju Noeul, 29 years old. An S-class summoner. She is the guild leader of the Royal Guild, one of The Big Three guilds.
Her Hunter Channel’s nickname is Lime Love Team.
The activity of checking out the new posts on the Hunter channel quickly ended. This is because Ju Noeul was a community addict who spent most of her day on the Hunter Channel.
‘I’m thinking about going to that cafe….’
Ju Noeul recalled what happened a few days ago.
That day too, Ju Noeul was browsing the Hunter Channel in the guild room. However, all the text was already gray.
She was baited by a viral post written by a Hunter Channel’s Gonick, and went there for fun.
A unique cafe near the Dungeon Gate of the Great Dungeon Abyss. The coffee was delicious and had a strange effect, but above all….
It was the red slime that caught her eyes.
It has pure red color, not cloudy or mixed with other colors. A real red, which is rare in the slime world where grades are divided by subtle color differences. She wanted to touch it just once.
She had never seen such a slime in her long slime life.
The conference room is still empty.
“All right, I’ll go…….”
However, Ju Noeul was in despair 30 minutes later.
━ We are closed today because we’re out of ingredients. ━
“It’s too much….”
She cleansed her eyes and looked again, but the contents of the paper attached to the door did not change. The cafe, which quickly became popular in a matter of days, had already been closed.
“I want to see the rare slime….”
Just as she fell down on her knees in despair, her phone got a call. It was from a guild member of the Royal Guild.
“What’s going on…..”
━ Guild leader, I put all the items in the guild leader’s office on Karrot, so please know that.
“What! Don’t you know what those things are….”
━ What those things are? It’s all junk. Why did you buy multiple slime cushions in the same color? I’m selling all but one.
“It’s not the same color, but if you look closely, there is a difference between (255, 0, 0) and (192, 0, 0)….”
━ What’s the difference between that one and that one….
“Ah, no! I’ll clean up the guild leader’s office by myself, so please take a look at it.….”
━ You said the same thing last week. No.
“How can you do this to your family…….”
━ I don’t have a family like the guild leader!
The Royal Guild is widely known as a family guild in the Hunter World.
However, the guild members have different surnames, and the guild are mainly composed of young Hunters of similar ages. Therefore, there have been rumors circulated that the “family” means not blood ties, but things like gangsters or mafia.
‘It’s an outrageous rumor….’
The reality is simpler … it wasn’t much.
7 years ago, at a pension in Gangneung, Gangwon Province. A official meeting of the Man-game Club “Only You Fold the Bitter Server Termination” was held. Ju Noeul was the organizer of the meetup.
However, at that time, a rift broke out in the valley near the pension. It ended fine because the meetup participants, who were caught in the rift, awakened as a group and stopped the rift together.
The problem was a broadcast interview that came to cover the heroes of Gangneung.
━ Well, what kind of relationship you guys have?
They have different places of residence, different ages, different schools, and different occupations. The curious reporter’s eyes directed at them. Ju Noeul, who had a temperament, felt that it was too much to answer with, ‘It’s a club meetup of the man-game Only You Fold the Bitter Server Termination‘. It’s too much for an answer … she was embarrassed.
Yes, online family is also a family.
The value of cyber kinship is comparable to a real family!
Ju Noeul, who made such a sudden move, proudly declared.
━ We’re a family…….
The name was changed to Royal Guild in response to the opposition that they would not join even if they died if she named it ‘Only You Fold the Bitter Server Termination‘.
As it is, she established a guild with precious cyber blood relatives and worked hard enough to be considered one of the Big Three guilds.
However, seven years was cruel. Seven years is long enough time for a person to quit being a fanatic.
“Guild leader, I’m done with that man-game.”“You’re too much….”“I’m old and tired now, and I don’t have the strength to be a fan.”“Where’s the pledge of the day to collect the Platinum Royal Gorgeous Teacup Set and reclaim the first place from the server’s No. 1 user ‘R’…..”“Guild leader, stop playing such Man-game and play this God-game. If you pre-register now, you’ll get an item.”“….traitor!”
She made a cozy otaku guild, but when she came to her senses, she was the only one who was a maniac and the others were already left the field.
Furthermore, she heard the news of the server termination after that.
For several months, she wandered around as a mental vagabond in the sorrow of losing her home. Then, Ju Noeul had a fan accident again.
It’s to be a fan of slime!
Finally, she became an ultimate fangirl. Now, she thought that the only thing left in her fangirl life is to walk on the flower road, but she faced something that was too harsh even for the hardships of life. Selling her precious goods on Karrot is too cruel!
Of course, she was also too much for filling the guild building with fan merchandise.
She bought three of the same goods for actual use, storage, and promotion, and then put them in the guild’s common warehouse. She tried to put up a rainbow-colored giant slime statue at the entrance of the guild, but it was rejected….
Ju Noeul, who had been stabbed a lot, muttered pitifully.
“Once a family, forever a family. An online family is also a family…..”
━ Ah, I already got a call from Karrot. I’m hanging up.
“No, you can’t…!”
The phone call was cut off before she finished speaking, and Ju Noeul was left in despair again.

Translator’s Corner:
Gonick (고닉): A term used to refer to people who always use the same nickname at internet forum. The one who started the viral post about Rieul’s cafe is HingHangHong and their username is always the same. (If you notice it, some user always change their username, for example the one with ‘Golem’ in their username).
Karrots (당근마켓) is a popular C2C (customer to customer) platform to buy and sell new or secondhand items. 
Man-game, i’m not sure what the exact translation is but the real word is 당근 (man-gem): (literally) a messed up game.  It is a combination of the Chinese character 亡 (mang) means dying and the abbreviation for game, 겜. Man-game refers to a game that is in the process of being destroyed or has already been ruined, and it often refers to a game in which users turn their backs on the game, but due to the problems they experienced in the game. Since in order to be ruined, you have to be excited about the game first. Meanwhile God-game (갓겜) refers to the best game
Only You Fold the Bitter Server Termination: I’m actually not sure what this means lol they don’t use any spacing and the words that I can catch are the slang for ‘server termination’ and ‘fold’. At least, I’m pretty sure it’s really ‘fold’ It either refers to the poker term that means ‘to fold is to discard one’s hand and forfeit interest in the current pot’, or just something like turn back, switching up, or … idk. I don’t think it will be back again so let’s just forget about this one.
There’s a lot of slangs used in this chapter, especially the otaku and fan part, but I’m just … going … to skip the explanations. IT’S TOO MUCH T__T
ah, and if you noticed I changed “The Great Ones” to “The Great Old Ones”, and also “Stellar Wisdom Order” to “Church of Starry Wisdom”. Some of you already know the reference, but let’s just act clueless (actually, I don’t know anything about this one mythos. The reason I can translate the previous names like Rieul’s ring, flower name, and Yichan’s contractor is just pure luck lol, so I hope you understand the sudden names revision.)
and please say welcome to our new character~

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c65:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

I’ve been thinking about this for a long time, but … it seemed clear that this system did not simply make mechanical reactions.
As if reading my mind, it offered quests or rewards, and sometimes it seemed to make fun of me. There were times when it used a friendly tone and displayed text that seemed to have been scraped from a viral blog.
‘Is there really someone inside the system?’

That doesn’t make sense though, hmm.
I wondered what the intention was if this system really responded to me.  It hasn’t done any harm to me so far, but I don’t feel like it’s just helping me.
‘Anyway, it’s clear that it wants to throw me into the dungeon.’
Of course, I will never go. I immediately turned off that ominous quest window.
Rather than going to the dungeon, I decided to become a coffee slave, so I handled the accumulated orders, but it wasn’t long before I hit my limit.
The red light flickered on the system window because I ran out of stamina. In addition, the coffee beans were also bottomed out.
“I’m sorry, but we are closing our business now.”
“What? Already?”
“Here, I’ll give you ten times the ruby, so please sell me more!”
“I ran out of coffee beans. I’m sorry. We will open the business when the ingredients come in.”
“Then, give me lemonade!”
“It’s all gone, too.”
“Aaaagh!”
After sending the desperate customers outside, I didn’t even have the strength to move a finger.
I put green beans in the roaster and lit it with the power of the ring. Then, as I smelled the coffee beans being roasted, I collapsed on the table.
“Ugh….”
Since it is a small home roaster, the amount of coffee that can be roasted at once is small. Until now, it’s been fine, but when the customers flocked in earnest, it became inconvenience.
Should I buy a commercial roaster? Just in time, the last quest reward increased the amount of empty land in the space. I think it would be nice to have it installed there.
“I wish you could give me a roster instead of useless things as a quest reward….”
I muttered deliberately.
As I guessed, if there is a will in this system, please listen to my opinion and reflect it.
“You know, the roaster that turns automatically. The one that can roast a lot at once. It can be installed in the space.”
“What are you muttering to yourself, meow?”
“Kkyuuuu…..”
Next to me, Mieum and Lime looked at me with strange eyes. Hmmm, I guess you don’t understand my big meaning.
Come to think of it, I received a cafe table as a reward earlier. How do you use that?
Tiling! The moment when I tried to re-read the system notification, a new message popped up.
[Comfortable Cafe Table (★★☆☆☆) can be installed. Do you want to install it?Yes / No]
When I selected ‘Yes‘, a hazy light flashed and the cafe table changed.
The top plate was made of dark brown thick wood and had a warm atmosphere. It looked a little bit more luxurious than the original table.
[Item: Comfortable Cafe Table (★★☆☆☆)Type: FurnitureA wooden cafe table. When you sit down, you can feel a little comfortable.Note: Satisfaction +1, Comfort +1]
[Clear more quests to collect various furniture. You can upgrade your cafe.]
“Give me the roaster…….”
[Collect various furniture.][Collect various furniture.]
I see. This system listens to me, but it only hears what it wants to hear….
It was the part-timer that was more urgent than the roaster.
In fact, on the first day when the number of customers began to increase, I already posted job openings. However, even though the conditions were better than the average, there were no applicants because of the location. As soon as they heard that it was in front of Dungeon Gate, they turned it down.
“Umh….”
At that time, when I was in agony, the store door opened again. I barely got up on the table and said,
“I’m sorry. We’re out of ingredients today, so we’re closed….”
“Hey, I guess I’m late.”
The visitor was Ki Yoohyun. He was alone today, not with the twins.
Wearing a black coat, with his slightly long hair combed nicely, he smiled bitterly as if he had guessed the situation when he saw the empty store and the melancholic me.
“Yoohyun-ssi, don’t you want to work part-time at a cafe?”
“I’d like to.”
“……yes?”
“It would be an honor to work at your cafe, Rieul-ssi.”
I didn’t know he’d say that he liked it….
“Isn’t your guild banned you from doing double jobs?”
“There is no rules like that.”
Suddenly, I remembered my memories of working at a company before the regression.
At lunchtime, there were employees who left a nearby cafe and bought coffee from a distant cafe where they had to cross two railroad crossings.
Later, I found out that the part-timer at that distant was handsome. I was curious too, but I couldn’t go during lunch time because I was busy eating and sleeping.
I looked up at Ki Yoohyun and did a simulation in my head for a while.
White shining cheeks, balanced features, long arms and legs that match his long coat, and a pair of sparkling eyes that seem to tell a story just by looking at them.
If he works part-time here, the number of customers is likely to increase.
“I’m just joking. I can’t use a guild hunter as a part-timer”
“That’s unfortunate.”
“Ahaha……”
I hope you don’t look at me with such a sad expression. We’re lucky that there are only a cat and a slime who are busy playing here, because it’s a face that could be misunderstood if other people saw it.
I got up in front of the table.
“Please sit here. I’ll give you something to drink.”
“Aren’t you already closed?”
“That’s true, but … I have enough for you, Yoohyun-ssi.”
Fortunately, there were enough beans to make two cups of coffee on the bottom of the box where the beans were stored.
Since I was tired, I want to drink a sweet drink. Still, I want the finish to be clean, is there anything like that?
Ah, this is it. There happened to be a suitable recipe from the new recipes I got today.
“I’m going to make a new menu.”
“I’m looking forward to it.”
Next is the ingredients…….
The Dimensional Shop has the ingredients it needed. I bought a whipped cream made from the milk of A-class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros.
First, add sugar to the whipped cream . For this menu, it was important to make the right viscosity, neither too watery nor too hard.
When I listened to the whipping machine, it felt moderately heavy, and it was perfect when it flowed down.
Next, I poured espresso into the glass and added ice and water to make a strong iced Americano. After pouring the freshly made whipped cream on top of it, the process was over.
All right, Einspanner’s done.
[Item: Einspanner (★★★☆☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)Effect: Stamina and Energy are continuously restored for one hour. (10 points per minute)]
The thick and bitter iced Americano was covered with sticky whipped cream. The layered appearance in the glass was also pleasing to the eye.
I decided to drink this finished menu right away.
The sweet and soft cream entered my mouth first. The rich taste of milk and sugar were just sweet enough to make me feel good.
Next, the coffee flavor. The thickly brewed Americano neutralized the creamy taste, leading to a delicate change in taste.
This is the taste. It is sweet and soft, but the finish is clean.
Sipping Einspanner while sitting down on the chair gave me strength. It’s due to the effect of Einspanner, which gradually restored my almost-zero stamina and energy.
Hee, I think I’m going to live a little now….
“It’s really good.”
Ki Yoohyun also drank with a cup of Einspanner. At that moment, a beam of twinkling light rose above his head.
I was lost in thought as I watched it for a moment.
“…….”
It’s not every day, but just like today, Ki Yoohyun often came here and ordered coffee.
Considering the distance between the Cheongna Guild and the Dungeon Gate, I have a reasonable suspicion that he seems to come whenever he has a chance.
That doesn’t mean he’s doing anything special here. All he does are drinking coffee and chatting about daily life before going back.
His daily chatter is…….
“The guild members went to the lower-grade dungeon today. I didn’t go because they said I didn’t have to.”
or sad.
“I heard you went to the dungeon with Hunter Choi Cedric.”“The expression is strange. I didn’t go there, I got caught up…….”“That’s too bad. I also want to go with Rieul-ssi.”“No, I have no intention of going to the dungeon even if I am dead and come back to life.”
or unusual.
“Hunter Han Yiseong was very disappointed because he missed the new S-class. I heard his whereabouts are unknown now, do you happen to know about it?”“Well, I don’t know, hahaha…….”“It’s amazing. The new S-class, as well as the plant dungeon. Rieul-ssi is always involved in something different from the past.”“Yes? What did you just say….”“……it’s nothing.”
It looked like an interrogation.
Anyway, at first I felt like he was a regular after seeing him so many times, but it changed a little from some time ago.
Since when….
“Hm … uhm….”
“Rieul-ssi?”
“Umh….”
A sudden enlightenment flashed through my mind.
Ah, it’s from then on.
At that time, after buying the Purifying Tree from Lee Chorok’s Happy Green Life Farm, I ran into Ki Yoohyun, who was with the twins, on my way back.
I don’t know exactly how to express it, but the meaningful eyes that were looking at me and the feeling of distance that has diminished a bit….
“Rieul-ssi.”
A soft voice was heard. I was surprised at how close it was. He caught my attention so easily just by slightly tilting his head. His bright eyes turned to me, and I felt a cool touch on my hand.
“There’s powder on your hand.”
“….Ah.”
I had coffee powder on my wet hands. Ki Yoohyun picked up the tissue and gently wiped my hand.
As if that was all he had in mind, his hand quickly fell, but the distance between us was still close.
What is this? Normally, I would have thought about what else it meant to Ki Yoohyun.
Yesterday, I even asked my friend, Shin Mira, through KakaoTalk.
[Me: There’s a customer who comes to the store every day][Shin Mira: Fixed income is the best]
Yeah, that’s true.…..
All right, I shouldn’t think too much, let’s just ask.
“Yoohyun-ssi seems to like coffee very much.”
I didn’t say I’d openly ask him. Still, if I want to ask why he comes every day … this is right.
“It’s because the coffee made by Rieul-ssi is delicious.”
The coffee is actually delicious, though.
“And….”
Ki Yoohyun hesitated for a moment, blurring the end of his words. He looked like he was choosing the right words.
At that moment, Mieum, who was lying on her belly on the floor, suddenly intervened.
“Waeoong, waeoong (This man, you hardly notice the taste).”
…. What? What are you talking about?
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c64:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

When I heard the full story, it was like this.
It has been a long time since Muwon, the No. 1 in Korea’s Hunter Rankings, disappeared. The overwhelming power was compared to his quiet deeds. He’s occasionally wiping out serious rifts alone.
Someone with a past that cannot be revealed no matter how much you dig, a Hunter behind the curtain who doesn’t even bother with attention.
The influence Muwon has on the Korea’s Hunter World was enormous.

It became a problem when the number of Hunters who admire him and imitate his hard work has increased.
Even if someone becomes an A-class, instead of registering with the Dungeon Management Office, they’ll become a dark hero who’s playing hard in the shadow of Abyss. It caused quite a commotion.
There are many Hunters who try to pose as Fake Muwon for the number of views on YouTube, so the so-called Sandbag Prevention Act has been newly established.
With this brief explanation, I could guess what kind of situation he has been dealing with.
The new S-class, Choi Yichan, who announced his existence on the news after clearing the Suwon dungeon splendidly, disappeared without measuring his ranking or renewing his Hunter Registration.
An E-class on paper, but S-class on reality.
It’s only natural that Kang Hyunwoo’s powerful radar, who suffered from countless people who hid their power, was triggered. This case was immediately designated as a first-level management target and the team leader, Kang Hyunwoo, moved directly.
With the formidable administrative power of the Dungeon Management Office, Choi Yichan’s whereabouts were known, but he did not come right away because it was difficult if he approached Choi Yichan prematurely. I’ll be be hard to find an S-class who is determined to be hidden.
Instead, in order to convince Choi Yichan smoothly, a compensation plan was perfectly prepared  for renewing the Hunter Registration to S-class.
Finally, he came today to catch Choi Yichan … no, to encourage him to register.
“When did he leave?”
In the behalf of Kang Hyunwoo, who is frozen, Jina carefully asked.
“About an hour ago……?”
“Unbelievable….”
Thud!
If only they had come a day or a few hours earlier … the officials were frustrated.
The two government officials left their direct contact information and asked me to contact me when he returns.
After seeing them off with regret, I was trying to clean up the empty cups, but Mieum and Lime were playing with some paper.
“Kkyuuu!”
“Nyaaaah (Give me that, slime guy)!”
“Kkyuu, kkyuuu!”
Pakpak! The battle between Mieum, who flung her front paws, and Lime, who was chubby and dodged perfectly, continued. The result is Lime’s victory, who showed a perfect dodging technique.
“What is that?”
I approached the two animals and quickly took the paper.
“Meoooong (The human dropped it off earlier)!”
“If you find something like this, you must return it immediately … Hmm?”
The paper was a flyer looking for a person. There was a picture of a young man with an ordinary impression that he would be easily forgetten even if we run into him on the street. His name is Kim Jihoon.
I’ve never heard of this name. By the way….
“….Doesn’t he look like I’ve seen him somewhere?”
“Kkyuu!”
“How do I know that! You didn’t even take me! Kyaooo!”
Mieum turned her head to show that she’s sulking. Lime also makes a cry of sympathy next to her.
These animals are upset because I went to the farm to save the Blue Celaeno Flower alone. They can’t believe that I did such a fun thing on my own.
Is that fun? Besides, I almost died there……?
“I just wanted to see the flower of starlight, meooong!”
“Mieum, you said you didn’t want to go into the suitcase.”
“Can’t you ask the flower owner to show it to us?”
“No.”
“Kyakyaooong!”
Mieum jumped up and threw a punch. She really wants to see the flower. Still, what’s done can’t be undone.
‘I got Choi Cedric’s contact number, but let’s keep it a secret….’
“I heard it’s a medicine for his sick younger sister. How can I ask him to show me?”
“…….”
However, Mieum didn’t answer.
I glanced to her because I thought she was sulking again, but the words suddenly continued.
“That’s a strange story.”
“What?”
“The Blue Celaeno Flower blooms under the starlight of Celaeno. It is not a drug to cure a disease.”
“But the Monster Hell that swallowed the flower was revived?”
“That is because of the influence of ███ Celaeno ██! That███ regenerates monsters with magical power…..”
[Warning: Abnormal Approach]
[System Error: —. —.—]
Mieum’s voice crackled and began to drifted away, and a red warning window popped up without a fail.
This damned system window!
“Waeoong! Hurry up and level up!”
“All of a sudden?!”
However, now that I’m level 11, my status is this much.
Name: Kwon RieulClass: Cafe Owner (F)(Lv. 11)Stamina 110/110, Energy 110/110Strength: 22 (+10), Intelligence: 14, Agility: 13, Luck: 14
Although it was only a little, I’ve became stronger, but it seems that it was still not enough for Mieum’s level.
“I can’t speak because you’re weak! In order to unleash the power of me, the seventh agent who enforces the system, you, human, must be strong, meong!”
Pakpak!
After avoiding the flying front paws, I looked at Mieum. She has cereal crumbs around her mouth.
In the morning, she occupied the front of the television and watched the drama, and until five minutes ago, she played with tearing paper. Bickering with Lime is a bonus.
‘She’s having a lot of fun….?’
It was brazen to see the seventh agent completely forgetting her duty and pretending that she’s not enjoying the life of a cat.
“Nyaoong! Don’t look at me with the eyes that see me like I’m only good at talking and only playing around!”
“Ah, I got caught.”
“Kyakyakkyaoong!”
Avoiding the interference of the system, Mieum told me that the flower is not harmful.
Come to think of it, it’s not a cure, but, to be precise, a pain reliever.
‘Whatever it is, I hope she doesn’t get sick….’
Anyway, I looked at the flyer again.
“Hu-um.”
Is it just a feeling? He has a very common impression, so it’s highly likely that I misunderstood about seeing this person somewhere.
As I was about to put the flyer in the drawer, the store door suddenly opened.
Jina, who had just returned, was in front of the door. Her face was red from running and she was breathing heavily.
“Jina-ssi, what’s wrong?”
“Did I leave anything here?”
“Is this it?”
“Ah!”
Jina approached quickly and received the flyer.
“Yes, this is right. Thank you.”
“By the way, who is that?”
“This is….”
Jina bit her lip. When I looked at her, it looked like water will pouring out of her eyes at any moment. At that time, Kang Hyunwoo, who was waiting outside the door, called Jina.
“I’m not sure yet … I’ll tell you later.”
She bowed, nodded her head, and turned away.
What’s going on? Jina looked pale.
***
Choi Yichan left a note as if he was about to practice martial arts while being hit by a waterfall.
I finally decided to support him, although it’s a shame that the temporary part-timer and the person in charge of playing with the animals left.
I’m worried, but after he became an S-class, he experienced a lot of inconveniences . I don’t know what he’s trying to do, but there must be a reason why he suddenly left.
That’s what I thought, but…..
“What’s going on…….”
Life didn’t go my way. For some reason, the number of customers suddenly increased a few days ago.
[Skill: Cafe in My Hand (C) is used.Recipe: Cafe Latte]
I put the cafe latte in a takeout cup and served it to the customer. Without a moment to catch my breath, the next order came in.
“Two cups of vanilla latte, please.”
“Yes, it’s coming!”
“Can I make a group order?”
My eyes were spinning as I thought about calculating the price, making drinks, and washing the dishes.
‘Yichan-ah, please come back….’
I felt the desperate need for a part-timer now.
[You have obtained 1 Golden Draw Ticket.][You have obtained 1 Golden Draw Ticket.][You have obtained 1 Golden Draw Ticket.]
In the midst of a sudden business boom, notifications were constantly popping up in the system window.
[A quest has occurred.]
[Sub Quest: The Dream of Cafe RevivalThe first step towards an SSS-Grade Cafe.Make money by selling your menu.
Ruby: 100/100Reward: ???]
[The Dimensional Shop has been upgraded. You can purchase more various items.]
[Achievement: ‘Where Are You Looking? That’s My Afterimage.’ has been achieved. Please collect the reward.][Achievement: ‘I’m the Ruby Rich of the District.’ has been achieved. Please collect the reward.]
[Achievement: Where Are You Looking? That’s My AfterimageUnbelievable speed!You’ve processed a flood of orders at a dazzling speed.
Reward: Agility +10]
[Achievement: I’m the Ruby Rich of the DistrictAccumulated 300 rubies earned through cafe sales.Get richer and richer.Reward: Comfortable Cafe Table (★★☆☆☆)]
[You have obtained 1 Golden Draw Ticket.][You have obtained 1 Golden Draw Ticket.][You have acquired a new recipe ‘Einspanner’.][You have acquired a new recipe ‘Cafe Romano’.]
And so on……
The quest was cleared as soon as it occurred, and new recipes and golden tickets were piled up in the inventory.
However, there was no time to look into the details because customers are constantly pouring in and ordering coffee.
[Caution: Your energy has been depleted. (0/110) Status abnormalities may occur when using the skill.]
As I used my skills for a long time to make coffee, I ran out of energy. After drinking an iced Americano that eliminated energy consumption, I processed the remaining orders again.
I want to go home.
The problem is … this is my home.
In the meantime, there have been almost no customers, so it’s good that there are more customers now.
“Oh my God, I can’t believe coffee tastes like this……!”“One more cup of this, please!”
It was also true that seeing the customers happy and telling me the coffee was delicious made me feel proud.
But why the sudden increase of customers all of a sudden?
“Nyaoong (You don’t like it when there are only few customers, but when there’s a lot of customer, you also don’t like it because it’s too much. You’re really arbitrary).”
“Noisy.”
I glared at Mieum while pouring coffee into a takeout cup.
That’s the original mentality of a human. They’re sad when the business doesn’t go well, but they hate it when they’re busy.
“Waeoong (Human)…..”
“It’s not something you can say while using my Netflix ID.”
There’s no other animal here more perfectly adapted to royalty than you.
At that moment, I could hear the words of the customers who had just received their coffee.
“This is the coffee shop that has special effects, right?”“I feel like I’ve gotten stronger!”“It’s really delicious here!”
……what?
How did this coffee get rumored to have special effects? I want to run away….
Tiling!
Then, the system notification rang again.
[A quest has occurred.]
[Sub Quest: A Dungeon WalkYou’re tired of your work, go away.Let’s go around the dungeon, take care of your health, and refresh your mood.
Enter a random dungeon: 0/1Rewards: EXP (500 EXP), 100 rubies, random recipe]
I can’t say anything.
I got goosebumps at the quest that popped up as if it had read my mind.
Why is this system doing this to me?
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Sandbag is actually not an actual translation. The real used word is 힘순찐, it refers to a main character who hides their power / a person who has an atmosphere of hiding power on the outside, but is actually strong on the inside. It actually being used once when Rieul was suspecting Ki Yoohyun’s ability back in the tutorial dungeon. Back then, I just changed the word to something similiar. I didn’t expect the term to haunt me again– I can’t find a good direct translation, so in this chapter, I used sandbag. It’s a an English slang that means “to downplay one’s ability or act as though one is much less skilled in some task or activity in order to deceive and take advantage of someone/something.”
We finally reached the timeline of the prologue. I hope you enjoyed the story!
Thank you Erumwhat and Kaylen for the coffee!

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c63:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Nyaaaang (It’s such a touching story)!”
“Kitty, you have to be happy, heuk…..”
“You idiot! It’s natural to have a happy ending!”
“Who are you calling an idiot, you idiot!”

The bickering sound of the kids who were watching television brought me back to my senses.
Ey, I had a ridiculous idea. Why would a tycoon be in a place like this?
Ah, speaking of store sales, it’s still the same. How many guests came yesterday….
Anyway, there was only one customer.
He was a Hunter, but at first glance, it looked like he was doing the Hunter Channel while drinking coffee. I hope he would write a good review.
Thanks to that customer, I was able to accomplish the quest to gather 10 customers.
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Main Quest: The Sorrow of the F-Grade Cafe’.Please collect the reward.]
[Main Quest: The Sorrow of the F-Grade CafeYou’ve finally got your own cafe.But it’s still Grade F. Very few people know the existence of this cafe.Gather customers and raise the grade, let’s rise to fame.
Meet 10 customers: 10/10
Rewards: Experience (200 EXP), 1 Golden Ticket, ???]
[Experience: 200 EXP have been acquired.][You have reached Level 11.][You have obtained 1 Golden Draw Ticket.][Ether-Wiki has been updated.][The Great One is interested in you.]
[The name of <Cafe Rieul> has been passed on to many people.][Converts the acquired recognition to fame …. Completed.][The Grade of the cafe has become E.]
[The atmosphere of the cafe improves with the Grade E reward. More people pay attention to the cafe.][A new area has been opened in the space as the Grade E reward.][Name: Cafe RieulGrade: EFame: 20, Popularity: 25]
A system notification popped up, but the cumulative number of customers was 10 and the Grade was only E.
Well, what I wanted from the beginning was this kind of cafe.
I’ve saved the flower to save Choi Cedric’s sickly younger sister, and now that I don’t have to go into the dungeon, it’ll be peaceful.
“I wish it will always be this peaceful….”
Oh my goodness!
I was startled by the unintentional mumble.
I said the forbidden line. As it turns out, in a novel or manga, when the main character says something like ‘It will always be peaceful now,’  a non-peaceful event will happen.
“When I return home, I will marry my fiance.”“I’ll wash my hands when I’m done with this.”
…. they were selected as top 3 words that should never be said.
Well … It’s gonna be okay, right?
It’s going to be fine … right?
***
After the twins with puffy eyes and Ki Yoohyun went back, I checked my watch.
There was no news even though it was almost time for Choi Yichan to come.
Did something happen? Shall I make a phone call?
Ah, that’s right. Choi Yichan still has his phone deactivated.
“….Huh?”
Then, I found a note on one side of the table. It was in an inconspicuous position because it was pressed with a coffee cup.
What’s this?
The note was written by Choi Yichan. The last sentence of the thickly written message, starting with a greeting, caught my eye first.
[I realized my shortcomings.I will come back stronger.— Choi Yichan]
….. What?
***
Is this all right?
The pace, which had gradually slowed, came to a complete stop. Choi Yichan looked back several times.
The red brick cafe building has now become so small that it looks the size of a fingernail even with an S-class physical ability.
【Do you regret it?】
As he stopped to look at the cafe for a while, a voice penetrated his mind. Choi Yichan answered inwardly, leaving his gaze intact.
‘No.’
【Your expression says otherwise.】
‘Noisy.’
【You’re such a picky contractor.】
It was after returning from Dungeon in Suwon that this voice began to be heard in his head. A strange voice that asked if he needed power.
Choi Yichan ignored this voice at first.
【Contractor.】“……Kwon Ri, I’m going to run a marathon!”“Huh?! Didn’t you say that you ran 40 km earlier?”“I’m going to run 40 kilometers more!”“What?!”
He must have heard those sounds because he exercised less. It’s because he felt like a crazy person.
【Isn’t it time for you to give me an answer?】
Every time he heard that sound, he ran and ran again.
No matter how much he moved his body, he did not get tired after becoming an S-class. On the contrary, he would break a cup on daily basis because he couldn’t control his strength, so running was a perfect exercise.
【You gained power through the contract, but you ignored me. In human terms, it called ‘Eat and Run’.】“I’ll be back after doing squats!”“Yichan-ah, again?”【Contractor, you’re eating and running away.】“Huuh, huu….”【…….】
Even after becoming an S-class, the surroundings are complicated, and even the strange voice in his head bothers him.
He thought it was because he was full of energy, so he took protein and exercised again.
Then, the voice began to talk about the future.
【Next February, there will be a rift in Mt. Jirisan.】【The phoenix is ​​lost.】【That person is ill.】
From big events to the future of passersby. He stubbornly ignored the words he didn’t want to hear.
【Aren’t you curious what will happen to your friend?】“What are you saying?”
But he could no longer ignore what it said about his friend, Kwon Rieul. Moreover, the content….
……she’s going to die?
His heart thumped loudly. The image of Rieul smiling well all the time flashed through his head.
How glad he was to see her again.
It was a future he didn’t even want to think about.
“What are you talking about? If it’s nonsense, I won’t let you go.”
The black pendant on his neck heated up. Choi Yichan knows this is how this mysterious voice laughs.
After laughing for a while, he continued his talk.
【You answered that you needed power. So I gave you power.】【But, Contractor, you can’t save everything.】“Stop talking nonsense and tell me what to do.”【There are things you have to give up to save your friend.】“No, I want to save everything.”
There was no wavering in his voice. Again, the pendant heated up.
【After all, I feel like I’ve been ripped off.】“…….”【All right, Contractor, I’ll give you a mission.】
Tiling!
[Quest: The Trial of the King in Yellow Begins.]
【You will be able to obtain the power you want at the end of the Trial.】
If so, there is no choice but to do it.
In the end, Choi Yichan left a note and left Cafe Rieul. He’s a bad liar. If she looks at his face, he will definitely be caught.
“Where should I go?”
【First … Let’s go to the Abyss over there.】
The voice pointed to the huge dungeon in front of him.
【I’m the one Who is Not to be Named. Be careful and remember.】
“You’re not Voldemort.”
【…….】
【Call me The King in Yellow, █████.】
“You should have said that earlier.”
【…….】
***
Why did Choi Yichan leave all of a sudden? What is it that he realized he’s lacking?
I was shocked to see the note left by Choi Yichan. I couldn’t think of any reason for him to leave suddenly.
It was nice to have Choi Yichan during that time, now I felt lonely.
“Are you there?”
Just then, there was a knock on the door.
“Yes! Come on in.”
“Hello. My name is Kang Hyunwoo, and I’m the head of Emergency Dungeon Countermeasures Team from the Dungeon Management Office.”
“Rieul-ssi, long time no see!”
A public official in a formal suit was standing in front of the door. Next to him was Jina.
“I came here after hearing the news that the new S-class Hunter, Choi Yichan, is here. Can I see him?”
Well, he used to be here, but…….
“He just left.”
“Then when can I see him?”
“I don’t know…?”
I handed the note left by Choi Yichan to the man in front of me.
“……!”
The two officials who checked the note were in despair.
There used to be an S-class, but now there was none.
***
Page Six: The Part-Timer is a Demon King! (self-proclaimed)

“…Please drink.”
First, I made two cups of Americano for two frustrated government officials.
“This…! It’s really delicious. I can’t believe it’s the same name as black beans that only tasted bitter.”
“Right? I told you that Rieul-ssi’s coffee is delicious.”
Jina shrugged her shoulders with a proud expression.
It’s such a friendly coffee time for a moment. While drinking the Americano, the public officials’ expressions relaxed, but soon they became depressed again.
I glanced at the business card I had just received.
Hunter Kang Hyunwoo, the Head of Emergency Dungeon Countermeasures Team.
He is famous. He has the best image among Korean civil servant hunters. I remember him briefing with a stiff expression every time he appeared on the news.
‘Another piece of information is……’
It was known that his parents run a famous restaurant. I was curious, but I haven’t been able to go yet because it’s always crowded.
No, this isn’t important.
I had heard that Jina became directly under Hunter Kang Hyunwoo, but I did not expect that he would come this far on his own.
He has neatly combed hair, angular attire, modest behavior, and even though I said it was okay, he went to get the receipt and paid the coffee. He’s truly the embodiment of an FM.
His dark expression made me straighten my shoulders as well.
“Do you happen to know the contact information of Hunter Choi Yichan?”
“I know, but … you won’t be able to reach him.”
Kang Hyunwoo immediately called the number I gave him. As expected, the sound that came out was ‘No Connection….’. 
“Why did he leave?”
I have a hunch. I don’t know exactly what this is, but it sounds like a fine for negligence.
In Korea, laws related to Awakened Persons are rather strict. In particular, the boundaries for the uncontrolled forces are enormous.
Every May, “It is the month of voluntarily updating the Awakened Rankings.” and “If you update your ranking, you’ll get tax reduction benefits.”, these kind of promotional materials were posted all over the city.
However, after reawakening to S-class, Choi Yichan cut off his phone and worked part-time at this cafe.
… There were so many things that bothered me. All that remains is a single note of unknown meaning, ‘I will come back stronger‘.
If this is the case, he might have a big problem. I have to make up for it somehow.
Worried about Choi Yichan, I squeezed out a suitable answer.
“That … thinking about what true strength is … Ah, that’s it. It’s like a journey to find himself!”
“…….”
It didn’t work at all. The officials are looking at me with suspicious eyes.
Kwon Rieul has gone into chaos!
At that moment.
Flutter.
A piece of paper fell from the file that Kang Hyunwoo was holding.
Due to the bright colors and the font size of 20pt, the content caught my eye even when I didn’t purposely look at it.
Is it because of copyright issues? It’s fortunate that there is no Bono X No. It was written in a design that would have made the designer’s backbone quite tingly.
Now is the time to show off your power.~How to Prevent Suffocation~
The following benefits are provided to new Awakened Hunters of Grade A or higher who have registered as Hunters.

Housing stability support (including family members)
No worry about power control. Dedicated training facilities available
Producing souvenirs with ranking and name
Special tax incentives

Hunter Kang Hyunwoo, 24 hours consultation available(010-xxxx-xxxx / KakaoTalk <Dungeon Management Office> channel search)
…….
“Ehm, Ehem.”
Kang Hyunwoo removed the promotional material with a shy expression.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Eat and Run (먹튀): A slang term and a type of abbreviation. It is sometimes used when people got something for free and didn’t have/want to pay it.
FM = Field Manual. It refers to the person who is very strict of the rules, who does everything in the right, textbook way.
I remember reading some comments that said Choi Yichan is better because he’s not mysterious like Ki Yoohyun … now look at what you guys have done …. you jinxed him….
Ah, and I saw a lot of new names in the previous chapter’s comment section, welcome to the blog!

[News] (Hunter SCOPE) ‘Drink coffee and your stamina goes UP?’ A topic about coffee that raises one’s ability (17)

(Ellipsis)

Choi ○○○○○○ (23, Hunter): I don’t know what it is, but if you drink it, you’ll get … and then hwaa…… I do that. By the way, what that flashes just now?J○○○○ (32, Hunter): Ah … It’s the best in Korea, no, the best in the world. I’d like to invite you to America.
