***
The incident at the Happy Green Life Dungeon Farm was quickly settled.
It was a rare plant-dungeon, but it passed quietly without any news reports.  
As a consequence, just like before the regression, Lee Chorok’s farm went out of business. It’s not only because a rift broke out, but also because numerous violations were discovered during the investigation and she avoided a lot of fines. Fortunately, she was spared from being locked in the jail because they recognized her contribution of reporting immediately when the dungeon occured.
Suddenly, a large package was delivered to the cafe, and when I opened it, it was a box of apples sent by Lee Chorok’s sister. I’m sorry to trouble her with this. The apples were delicious.
“Huu … Customer-nim, I’m so sorry.”“It’s all right. I’m still alive anyway.….”“As a token of apology, please accept this!”
Lee Chorok, who’s planning to close her farm and work part-time at a fruit store in the future, handed me a seed. Most of the dungeon plants were confiscated, but luckily she was able to recover this one. Since it is a very rare seed, she said she would leave it to me, who revived the Blue Celaeno Flower.
‘Monster Hell appeared from the rare seed that you bought….’
I was nervous. I was incredibly anxious.
I tried to refuse, but the investigation found it harmless, so I eventually accepted it.
How did I do the investigation?
“Miaaaaw (Hoo, this is a pretty precious thing)!”
“…is that so?”
“Waaeoong, waeoong (this is nothing dangerous)!”
… that’s what Mieum said.
Umh, well. Let’s just believe it for now. I planted the unidentified seed in the corner of the space and forgot about it.
And, today.
“Hello.”
“Hello.”
The twins of Cheongna Guild, whom I met with Ki Yoohyun last time, came to the cafe. The purpose is, of course, to eat snacks and watch touching animations.
Two cups of warm vanilla latte. There were a lot of apples left, so I served cookies with apple jam inside. It was a sweet cookie with warm apple jam flowing when you take a bite.
“Whoaa!”
Joo Shinwoo, with his eyes wide open, bit a cookie. Next to him,  Joo Shinhee gave him a harsh scolding.
“You idiot! Did you forget what I said earlier?”
“Huk, right.”
Joo Shinwoo put the cookie down on the plate and bowed his head.
“Thank you!”
He’s so cute…..
However, instead of picking up the cookies, Joo Shinhee only wiggled her fingers. She seemed to have something to say.
“What’s the matter? Does it not suit your taste? Can I give you something else?”
“What? No! It’s not that, just…..”
“Yes?”
She wiggled her fingers again, pondered for a while, and finally opened her mouth.
“I, umh … may I call you Eonni?”
“Yes, of course.”
“Eonni … Thank you for the food.”
What should I do? She’s so cute.….
No matter what happens, I decided to make sure that those children did not change in 3 years as they did before the regression.
The twins’ eyes twinkled as they sat next to each other and drank the vanilla latte while holding the cup with both hands.
Without looking at the bar of light rising above their heads, I could tell that the drink was delicious.
[The condition has been met.Combo bonus will be generated.Combo: Children’s Menu (Vanilla Latte, Apple Jam Cookie)Effect: Perfect nutrition for children.]
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Sub Quest: Lady of the Children’s Heart’.]
The system notification that sounded with tiling is set aside for now.
Now, it was the time to watch the touching animal animation that I prepared in advance.
“Heuk, huhuhu….”
“Kkyuu….”
“Waeoooong, meow, waeooong (No, run away, meow, you can’t go there)!”
The one who became most immersed in the story was our house cat.
Sitting side by side with Mieum and Lime, I made two new cups of coffee while watching the twins who were absorbed in the TV. One cup was for Ki Yoohyun, who came as the guardian of the twins today.
“……thank you.”
He smiled and picked up the cup of coffee in front of him. The long eyelashes casted a shadow on his face, and a faint smile crept onto his white cheeks. It was an appearance that inadvertently made me exclaimed my admiration.
I’ve met this man several times already, but I can’t get used to it. Especially those dark eyes that seem to have something to say, even though he’s just looking at me…..
“Rieul-ssi.”
Oh, he really did have something to say.
“Yes?”
“You’ve been through hardships.”
“Ahaha … It was kind of like that.”
“I am glad you are safe.”
“…….”
Obviously, the case where I got caught up in Monster Hell wasn’t reported in the news. It’s not because the case is trivial. There is a possibility that other incidents may have been involved behind the distribution of the seed of Monster Hell, so the incident was not reported for information control.
He’s in the same Hunter industry, so he might have heard the information, but…….
I took a sip of coffee and looked at Ki Yoohyun again.
A striking appearance. A Hunter in the bottom of Cheongna Guild’s hierarchy. For such a thing, he has a relaxed attitude that feels daunting.
I met him for the first time because he was hiding under the wall of this store, and I have encountered him often since then.
Umh…..
If you look at him, this man is also very suspicious.
Is he actually a huge tycoon?
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c61:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Instead of answering, a cold finger touched my forehead. The scratch on my forehead, which I didn’t even know existed, was healed in the light emanating from his fingertip.
“Thank heavens. There doesn’t seem to be any serious injuries.”
“Uh, well … yes.”
“They say you can go home as soon as you file a damage report. You must be very tired even if you don’t have a trauma. Take a good rest when you get back.”

What is this weird feeling…..
I was nervous because I was afraid that he might get angry because I hid my awakening, but Kwon Jiwoon said nothing.
“……?”
Is the confession of my lifetime completely ignored? Did he pretend that he didn’t hear it?
Umh yeah, I guess he didn’t hear it because it was noisy around us. I said it again clearly.
“Kwon Jiwoon, I’m awakened now?”
“…….”
This time, he looked a little shocked.
Oh, is it because of that?
“That’s, umh, I mean, I didn’t mean to hide it, but somehow … Ah, and I’ll never say that I want to join your guild, so don’t worry.”
It’s strange. I said it with the intention not to make him worry, but Kwon Jiwoon’s expression darkened even more.
“It seems that I’m not reliable enough for you.”
The following words sounded sad.
Kwon Jiwoon grabbed my hand. All the visible wounds had all disappeared in the white light. The hand that gripped mine was trembling.
“If something happened, you should have called me.”
“I can’t connect my phone inside the dungeon.….”
Unbeknownst to me, the words of an excuse came out.
“I won’t ask you why you came to such a suspicious place, but at least you should have told me. I was suddenly informed that you got caught in a rift, and do you know how much I….”
I flinched unconsciously at the deep fear. His reaction felt strange.
I was in confusion because it was the first time I saw him acting like this, it was the time when I tried to choose an answer….
“What are you doing there … Eh.”
Choi Cedric came out of the escape gate. As he was talking to me, he saw Kwon Jiwoon in front of me and was startled.
“It can’t be … Hunter Kwon Jiwoon..…?”
“Hunter Choi Cedric. It’s been a long time.”
Kwon Jiwoon reached out his hand first and asked for a handshake. However, from the side view, the atmosphere was not very friendly.
“This is the first time we met since you said that you’d buy my guild with money if I didn’t accept the offer to join the affiliate of your company.”
Choi Cedric, have you ever done anything like that….
Indeed, it is known as a bad guild among The Big Three.
“That … due to the circumstances, at the request of the CEO-nim, I can’t help it….”
Choi Cedric, who muttered something in embarrassment, held his breath. He belatedly changed his words as if he had recalled his external concept.
“Huu, hmm! You will regret not accepting the offer then!”
Clench. The handshake ended in a bloody atmosphere.
But…..
It was a hell of a bad performance. With anxious gaze, his tone was stiff as if he were reading a book. It’s such a bad acting, but he succeeded in pretending to be an arrogant ranker, is everyone blind?
“I have work to do, so I’ll go back first. See you next time.”
There was no time to stop him. I wasn’t sure if he didn’t want to talk to Choi Cedric anymore or if he’s avoiding me. Kwon Jiwoon turned around as it was.
By the way, C&L Corporation was trying to eat Kwon Jiwoon’s guild?
‘It’s strange….’
The White Silver Guild is a small guild centered on the top ranker Healer, Kwon Jiwoon.
Naturally, no matter how top-ranked he is, a Healer cannot go around the dungeon alone. There’s also the fact that the guild leader disappeared, so the scope of activities of The White Silver Guild was narrow compared to its popularity and recognition.
This means that there is no reason for a large guild like C&L to be greedy about it.
Furthermore, according to my memory before the regression, C&L Corporation took the Healer’s professional guild, Garden of Blessing, as a subsidiary. It’s an extraordinary merger declaration of the Guild, which once had conflicts with Choi Cedric and even declared a boycott.
Maybe there was too much money to refuse.
In short, it’s not that they want to merge because they don’t have enough healers.
‘Hmmm….’
Something must have happened with Kwon Jiwoon’s guild.
Still, right now, nothing was known. I wanted to ask Choi Cedric for more details, but he made an unexpected sound, showed off his full-fledged acting skills.
“Don’t tell me that, that….”
“You mean Kwon Jiwoon?”
“Yeah! What’s your relationship with that Healer?!”
“Huh? He’s my cousin.”
Choi Cedric had a genuinely bewildered expression on his face. He covered his hand over his face and murmured to himself.
“Of all things, it was Kwon Jiwoon’s family. Then, my image is completely messed up.”
 What’s wrong with him?
After muttering to himself for a while, he raised his head.
“Still, I won’t give up….”
No, what?
“Be prepared!”
For what?
***
A hospital room with cool shade.
Choi Cedric sent out all the healers who were guarding Rona.
Also, the Healers, who were afraid of receiving his anger like the last time, left the hospital room as if they were running away.
Today, his sister was suffering from nightmares. Her cheeks are hot with tears.
“Rona-ya….”
Opening the inventory right away, Choi Cedric stopped.
He was afraid.
The Blue Celaeno Flower was his only hope to cure Rona’s disease, which had no improvement by all means. How long has he been searching for a way to make the flower blooms after he accidentally obtained the seeds?
After a lot of hard work, the flower finally came to life.
However, what if this also fails? The despair when the single hope you believed in was crushed. Choi Cedric was not confident that he could endure it.
Still, he didn’t hesitate for long. He opened his inventory and set the potted flower down by the bedside.
Blue starlight emanated from the petals. A dazzling light drifted through the shady space and filled the entire hospital room.
The groan slowly subsided and the breath became comfortable.
It was not long before Rona slowly opened her eyes.
“…..Rona-ya!”
Her face was pale and her dry hands trembled, but the girl looked straight at him. It’s been years since the last time he saw her awake like this.
“Oppa….”
“Are you conscious? Uh, that’s right, it’s me. Your brother is here.”
She reached out her hand. Choi Cedric took Rona’s hand. He felt sorry for her skinny little hand.
Rona leaned on Choi Cedric’s hand and got up. Her body, which had been lying in bed for a long time, was too heavy for even the smallest movement, and her arms trembled. Still, there is no time. Rona licked her dry lips.
“Rona-ya, lie down first. Here’s the water. Drink some water.”
“Oppa, that man, be careful….”
The latter words were mingled with rough breath and could not be heard properly.
It was the limit. Slowly, Rona fell asleep again. He called her name a few more times, but the heavy eyelids didn’t move.
However, the sleep was comfortable. There was no pain as before, and the tight breathing and softly closed eyes seemed to be dreaming of a daydream.
Now, he’s so happy that this alone brought tears to his eyes.
Choi Cedric ruffled Rona’s hair slowly. He’ll make sure that his sister will get better. Until then, just have a good dream.
When he was thinking like that, the door of the hospital room burst open. It was Aeon, the secretary of the CEO.
“……? What’s going on?”
Choi Cedric inadvertently hid Rona from the secretary’s gaze. Aeon has shown his face in this hospital room several times. But why? That faint smile made him feel uncomfortable.
“How about Miss Rona? Has she gotten any better?”
Aeon spoke in a worried tone. At those words, Choi Cedric forgot his vigilance and his heart softened a bit.
He must have been mistaken. He’s a little reluctant, but … this person has dedicated himself to the guild. What is he even thinking?
“Uhuh, thanks to this flower, she feels much better.”
“CEO Lee Sein-nim said she had something to say to you.”
“Really? Tell her I’ll be there later.”
“I think it’s urgent.”
“….Okay, I got it.”
Choi Cedric rose from the bedside with regret.
Rona is sleeping comfortably. In the meantime, he’ll be back for a little bit.
“Rona-ya, Oppa will be right back.”
After stroking his sleeping sister’s hair once, Choi Cedric left the hospital room.
After the sound of footsteps completely disappeared over the door…..
“…….”
Suddenly, there was no smile left on Aeon’s face. In the horrifying silence, he erased all his facial expressions and and his non-human gaze turned to the girl on the bed.
Then, he reached out towards the starlight flower. Without hesitation, Ion tried to crush the Blue Celaeno Flower with his hand.
Kiing—
The intangible barrier deflected Aeon’s hand. Sparks burst, followed by black smoke.
“….Cih.”
His palm was burnt black even though he only touched the barrierfor a short time. Aeon clicked his tongue and hid the darkly hand.
Well, that’s enough. It doesn’t make any difference even if you have this flower now. Wouldn’t it be just a comfort for the mind?
“You won’t be able to do anything anyway.”
Leaving those words behind, Aeon turned his body.
The door closed. The girl is asleep.
***
“Uh … CEO-nim? What did you just say?”
“Why? You can do it.”
The top floor of C&L Corporation. Rather than a Hunter Guild, it was a room decorated like a representative office of a large company.
Choi Cedric looked at the CEO, Lee Sein, who was sitting across from him.
Hair combed to one side, a luxurious suit, and a relaxed smile like a successful person.
He has known her for a long time, but maybe because it’s been a while since he has seen her, he felt particularly unfamiliar with this Lee Sein. Besides, what she just said….
“Didn’t you decide not to touch The White Silver Guild?”
“Yeah, I did.”
Smile. Lee Sein smiled. It was the same smile that he practiced several times in front of the mirror years ago while saying that he couldn’t be underestimated by other Hunters.
“It’s just that the plan has changed.”
“But if that’s the case….”
“Don’t worry. Nothing dangerous will happen. You’re just like my little brother, do you think I would let you do something dangerous?”
“…….”
“Yes, Cedric?”
The gentle, soothing tone reminded him of the old days.
They are not real siblings. However, from the time the guild was named by adding C for Choi Cedric and L for Lee Sein, they became as close as family. In the old days with Rona, the three of them lived together in a building that was so small that it could not be compared to now. The scent of the distant past stimulated his longing.
“All right, Noona.”
Choi Cedric swallowed the discomfort.
Yes, there is no way Lee Sein would give wrong directions. This uncomfortable feeling must be just an illusion.
The goal is the same as then: Making C&L the best guild. For the sake of this goal, he followed all instructions, even if it was incomprehensible. Nothing has changed.
However…..
Did you know that you didn’t even ask me a word about Rona, Noona?
[Next]

Since being here means that you’ve read korean novels, I would just assume that you already knew the basic words like oppa, noona, etc. If you don’t know about it, feel free to ask~
Oh, which one do you think look better between ‘Noona’ and ‘Nuna’? If I’m not mistaken, both is correct and acceptable.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c60:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.
Eventually, the Monster Hell, who lost its roots, lost its balance and stumbled greatly. 
Choi Cedric, who did not immediately understand what happened, admired with a surprised look.
“You have such a strong skill … That’s amazing!”
Well, I didn’t know I have such a serious cleaning skill. If I level up the skill one more time, I think I could clean the world.

Anyway, I have to use everything I can.
…….
‘The Floor is Shiny!’
I used the skill again as I moved forward. Snip. The larger roots were cut off. I walked towards the center of the Monster Hell, once again, again….
At last.
Cuckoo cuckoo!
The Monster Hell, with all its roots uprooted, fell like a carrot right before shipment.
Uh, this really works……?
***
Monster Hell, whose roots were cut and fell like a freshly plucked sweet potato stalk. Taking advantage of the moment, I shouted again.
“Go! Kongdrick!”
However, the rebellion of Monster Hell, who did not want to lose the flower, the source of its life, was also enormous. As soon as Choi Cedric approached, it stretched out its branches and roots in all directions, creating a circular prison.
In result, we were trapped in it.
He cut it with his sword and I used cleaning skill, but the branches that were cut quickly grew back. We made a gap and forced our body out, but it was the same. The branches of the tree moved slowly, and they just made a prison again and locked us up.
What is this … is this a regression? No, a loop?
The Infinite Return of Monster Hell?
Then, a good idea flashed across my mind. If only the Blue Celaeno Flower can be taken from the Monster Hell, then there is no need to continue this sluggish work because it will no longer be able to regenerate.
I opened the skill window and read the contents. There is a skill I focused on.
[The Barista’s Extraction (D)Details: (Lv.2) Extract only the desired substance from the mixed substances.]
‘It’s ridiculous … no, it’s not. According to my experience so far, it is definitely possible!’
I found a way.
A few preparations were required to try this method. First, I talked to Choi Cedric.
“There’s no end to this. Let’s take a break.”
Choi Cedric looked impatient, but he agreed that there was no end and nodded.
In the end, we decided to rest for a while while being trapped in Monster Hell. The first thing I did was make coffee.
Trickle. A sweet smell spread all around. I handed the freshly made cafe mocha to Choi Cedric.
“What is this?”
Once I gave it to him, he received it, but it seemed that he did not understand the current situation.
“Hurry up and drink.”
However, experience is quicker than verbal explanation.
The effect of cafe mocha is a 200% increase in recovery speed. It’s must-have for Choi Cedric, whose body has been burned by the digestive juices.
“……!”
Choi Cedric, who drank the cafe mocha and experienced the effect firsthand, looked at me in surprise.
“Wh-what is this? It’s healing the wounds faster than a potion!”
“It’s just coffee.”
“Besides, it feels like the smell of chocolate is dancing in my mouth! This bitterness of sweetness, it’s the taste of life!”
“No, it’s not like that….”
“This is definitely like that!”
Shivering, answering humbly, and shuddering again. It’s been awhile since I’ve played with Choi Cedric, who has a silly commentary skill installed passively as his main (S) skill.
Choi Cedric nodded with a serious expression and said.
“I see, you are….”
All I did was use my skills to make coffee, but it’s nice to hear compliments anyway.
Calling me a genius barista is a bit exaggerated though, hahaha.
“Coffee Maniac, no, Coffee Tentaku!”
“…….”
What’s going on with the lexical system of this No. 2 ranker?
After threatening Choi Cedric so that he would never call me like that again, I drank my share of vanilla latte.
All preparations are done. Now, all that’s left is to try.
“Can you give me a second?”
“What? What are you going to do?”
“You’ll find out if you leave me alone.”
“If you kill the flower….”
“No, you don’t have to worry.”
A hand that was clasped so tightly that the knuckles turned white caught my eyes. Slowly, Choi Cedric rose almost at the same time as he nodded.
Shashashak! The moment I cut off the branches that made up the prison, I threw myself forward.
I used the skill straight away without a break.
‘The Barista’s Extraction.’
[Extracting extremely difficult targets.][Extraction may fail. Do you still want to extract it?Yes / No ]
Originally, it would have failed with a high probability, but I chose ‘Yes‘ without hesitation.
Because….
[The effect of vanilla latte is being applied. When using a skill, there is a 100% chance of a critical hit for 1 time.][Crit! Unbelievable extraction succeeded.][The extraction is complete.]
The twinkling light is gone, and what’s left in my hands….
“….the Blue Celaeno Flower!”
The effect of The Barista’s Extraction (Lv.2) is to extract only the desired substance from the mixed substances. Although ‘barista’ is included in the name, there is no explanation that it should be used only for coffee.
In other words, it’s like this.
Mixed Substances = Monster Hell + Blue Celaeno FlowerDesired Substance = Blue Celaeno Flower
I thought, holding the flower in one hand.
Hey, this really works….?
“……! How can it be so easy? You, do-don’t tell me you cheated on the Grade….”
“I’m a true F-class. Hurry up and get it.”
“….Thank you.”
I felt a deep sincerity in the short words.
Choi Cedric received the Blue Celaeno Flower from me and put it in his inventory.
Tiling!
[Unbelievable Achievement: ‘Touching Monster Hell while Eating’ has been achieved. Please collect the reward.][You have defeated the boss monster ‘Monster Hell (B)’][Dungeon: Monster Hell has been cleared.][You have reached Level 10.]
I skimmed through the notification window that popped up.
I thought it was a breaking-the-balance scam, but after killing the boss, it really worked.
Now all we have to do is escape. As I headed towards the escape gate created near the body of Monster Hell, the alarm sounded again.
Tiling!
[The current space cannot be maintained due to the death of Monster Hell.][The space is forcibly destroyed … 30 seconds until it’s gone.]
Tick-tock-tick-tock….
The remaining time in the system window quickly decreased, and the dungeon collapsed from the end of the field of view. The air from the original greenhouse was mixed and ate this space.
For a moment, I admired that strange sensation. The soles of my feet began to sink.
Isn’t 30 seconds too short?!
“Aaaaahhh……!”
“Hey, be careful!”
Choi Cedric caught me as I slide. Then, he threw me towards the escape gate, telling me to get out first.
The moment I passed through the blue light of the gate.
….Huh?
The remnants of Monster Hell were wrapped around my feet, and the wind swept them up into the air. This damn monster wood minions!
My body fell to the floor.
No, I killed the boss with my breaking-the-balance fraud skills, but my future of dying here is already decided!
Fortunately, the system responded quickly on its own.
[Crisis situation! ‘The Bond of a Cup of Coffee‘ is activated.][Target: ‘Choi Yichan’ is selected.][Skill: Defense is The Best Defense (C) is used.][Defense increases by 500% for 5 minutes.]
I’ve been through this situation before.
Rolling, roll!
There is no pain in the body that has landed in the perfect falling posture.
‘The Floor is Shiny!’
The monster’s remnants wrapped around my feet were also perfectly slain. Perfect 2 Combo!
Feeling proud inside, I raised my head, and our eyes met.
“…….”
“…….”
With whom?
Kwon Jiwoon.
Why the hell is Kwon Jiwoon here? Did I see it wrong?
However, that unique silver hair, there can be no two faces in the world with such a cold atmosphere.
The destroyed greenhouse, tearful Lee Chorok, and dungeon plants with red stickers on them. All of those things didn’t even catch my eye.
He probably didn’t see it, right?
I just used a defensive skill, but it would have just looked like a fall.
I blew away the remains of the monster, but that’s just a cleaning skill….
“…….”
“…….”
No, let’s stop running away from reality.
A shock spread across Kwon Jiwoon’s expressionless face. He approached me and bit his lips as if to pick his words, but no words came out.
He saw it all!
“Uh, umh, Oppa, what brings you here……?”
Kwon Jiwoon frowned slightly.
“Here, I was informed that there was a rift in this farm.”
When a rift suddenly bursts, the Dungeon Management Office first checks the status. After that, if it is not possible to take care of it only with the Hunters belonging to the Dungeon Management Office, they’ll put a request for support from the guilds.
There are many criteria for requesting support, such as the size of the guild and the Hunter’s ability. In the case of rift that are not particularly dangerous, it’s just … it’s a turn. It’s like class duty.
Perhaps it happened to be Kwon Jiwoon’s turn today.
“Really? Hahaha, what a coincidence.”
“…….”
Silence again.
Let’s calm down. After all, I was supposed to tell him about my awakening.
I didn’t expect to bump into him like this, but now is the time to say it.
I took a few deep breaths and then moved my lips.
“Oppa, I’m awakened.”
“…….”
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c59:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“We’re planning to deploy the attack party after observing the situation inside a little more. We have Hunter Choi Cedric inside right now.”
It was meant to reassure him, but Kwon Jiwoon shook his head.
“It doesn’t matter. It’s an urgent situation, so please send them in immediately. I will go too.”
“……! I’d be reassured if Hunter-nim supported them. We’ll be ready to deploy them right away.”

“Ah … you can’t!”
Lee Chorok hastily interrupted them.
“Stand back.”
The public official pulled her back. Kwon Jiwoon looked at her with a cold stare. Goosebumps crept up the nape of her neck. Still, she moved her trembling lips.
“Monster Hell makes its cocoon and builds a barrier when it gets settled for a meal.”
“What?”
“A protective barrier has already been activated around the rift. If you forcefully break it … If the complex etheric flow is broken, they won’t be able to come out of it forever!”
Halt. The silver-haired Healer stared at Lee Chorok.
“…It’s not a natural rift. Why is there such a dangerous thing here?”
“That’s … I don’t know …… Ahaha……”
In addition to the large fine, 72 hours of Dungeon Safety Training was additionally decided.
Lee Chorok, who has now become a part-time worker at a fruit shop and a huge debtor, looked at the rift emitting blue light.
The seller told her it surely wouldn’t wake up.
The Monster Hell, gleamed extravagantly in the starlight of Blue Celaeno Flower, shone like a demon.
The prayer she repeated in her heart was a desperate earnestness.
‘Please be safe, Customer-nim.’
The sharp gaze of a Hunter, whose nickname was The Silver Wave, turned towards her. If something happens inside, she doesn’t think he’ll let her go.
‘Please come back alive soon.’
Please save me from those eyes…….
***
A plant-type monster that shoots digestive juices to dissolve living things and takes in nutrients. Its digestive fluid is stronger than hydrochloric acid, and it can even melt the outer skin of a hard-skinned monster.A very scary creature that catches its prey with its agile vines and slowly melts it.By Ether-Wiki.
Seeing the Monster Hell that appeared in front of me, I was bewildered for a very short time.
This is because there is a swordsman who ranks second here.
A speed-type dealer who penetrates into the front of the enemy with agile movements. It is a skill that no one can match among swordsmen.
His well-known nickname is….
“Go! Kongdrick!”
“….Don’t call me that.”
While saying that, Choi Cedric smiled leisurely. He came forward with a sword as tall as his height. Wait a minute, the same Munchkin line was a bonus.
Sreeng. The blade drew a circle. 
In an instant, it digs into the front of the Monster Mell and cuts it diagonally. He cut off the roots again without leaving any gaps.
Shashashak, Bang!
The Monster Hell was neatly split in two. The stem that spouted digestive juice also lost its strength and drooped.
“Done!”
Now it’s time for the escape gate to open….
“….Huh?”
Keuoooo!
The Monster Hell, which seemed to be dead, arose again. The wound from the sword healed without a trace.
That’s absurd. I’m sure it just died!
Choi Cedric fixed the sword and held it. He shouted.
“Well, it’s the same if you’re still alive. If I cut it over again, it’s over!”
Wow, that’s so reliable. The comfort of the Munchkin bus is amazing.
Choi Cedric, who ran with a bang, jumped up. His body flew through the air. A lush branch of the resurrected Monster Hell appeared in front of him, but Choi Cedric’s sword is faster.
Swiish, kaang!
The big swinging sword cut the Monster Hell clean. Then, the bursting lightning skill is thrown down.
Pooooong! A shard of wood struck by lightning. This time, I was convinced that we had succeeded.
However … a new branch sprouted from the tree stump hit by lightning and quickly resurrected.
Perhaps even Choi Cedric did not expect this to happen, he frowned and shook his head.
“It doesn’t make sense. I’ve never heard of a B-class minion resurrecting without a cooldown.”
Then, something came into my sight.
“Hey, look over there! That one!”
“Why? Don’t come out and just stay in the shield … Huh?”
A starry blue flower was hanging on the top of the branches of Monster Hell.
I wasn’t mistaken. It was the Blue Celaeno Flower that was revived with a lot of efforts.
Choi Cedric’s face hardened in an instant.
“That … No, we have to take that to Rona.”
The flower seemed to be sucked into the rift with us and it got swallowed by the Monster Hell.
Wait, let’s put our thoughts together.
The power of Blue Celaeno Flower is regeneration. Having swallowed the flower, the Monster Hell naturally continues to regenerate. In other words, in order to prevent it from regenerating, we first have to deal with the source of power, the Blue Celaeno Flower.
Yes, the conclusion. You have to pull out the flower first to get out of here.
“…….”
“…….”
Choi Cedric also came to the same conclusion as me. However, instead of eliminating the flower, he took a defensive stance.
Chiirk!
He only avoided the attack of Monster Hell that began again, and seemed to have no intention of attacking.
“Cedric, what are you doing? At this rate, it will only be resurrected again!”
He shook his head with a stiff expression. A low desperate voice was added.
“I need that flower to save our Rona. We can’t get rid of that.”
“…….”
Stand firm and defend against attacks. At first, Choi Cedric held out well. He cut the stem while avoiding the attack, and when it revived, he cut it again.
“…Kugh!”
But as time went on, his movements started to slow down a little.
“Ugh….”
The skin burned with an acrid smell. Choi Cedric does not move even though the pain must be considerable.
“Stand back.”
Choi Cedric cut down the vines that attacked me while blocking the attack of Monster Hell. Still, there is no end to this. The cut-off vine quickly grew back, and it seemed that the monster piece of wood will never give up on today’s main dish.
“Don’t tell me, are you planning to die here?”
“That’s not true. But….”
His gaze turned to the flower of the starlight in the distance. He knows. As long as the flower has already fused with the monster, it is difficult to separate it. Here, it is a rational choice to kill the boss, exit the dungeon, and retrieve the flower seed again.
I’m sure Choi Cedric knows, but….
Even if he gets hurt, he doesn’t want to give up medicine to save his sister. He can’t cut the flower that can save his sister with his own hands.
Shush!
After a moment of distraction, vines soared from the floor.
“Hyaaah!”
At that moment, Choi Cedric grabbed his sword and jumped up. It was as light a motion as flying.
He stepped on the branches of Monster Hell and took another leap. Avoiding the subsequent attack, he approached in an instant and stretched out his hand toward the Blue Celaeno Flower.
10 meters, 5 meters, 1 meter … is it working?
“….! Keus!”
Just before he could touch the flower, the Monster Hell shook its body. His hand slipped down, clutching nothing but air.
It is difficult to pull out a single flower from the tip of a huge tree that moves violently without injury. Not to mention that it’s a tree that spouts digestive juices too.
A vine wrapped around Choi Cedric’s body as he tried to make a leap again.
Swoosh, bang!
He cut it straight away, but this time, it shoots digestive juices at the spot where he’s about to land.
“Ugh….!”
His unprotected feet touched the digestive fluid sprayed on the floor. However, instead of attacking the Monster Hell, Choi Cedric took a defensive stance again.
If this is the case, there is no end. The only ending is waiting for the rescue and enduring the brunch of this monster and its minions.
I had to make a move. I nervously carried on with my thoughts.
“….All right!”
‘The Bond of a Cup of Coffee.’
[Target: ‘Choi Yichan’ has been selected.]
The S-class Choi Yi-chan’s skills will be helpful. That’s what I thought.
“…….”
“Umh…..”
I turned off the system window without using Choi Yichan’s skill. This is because all the skills that can be used were skills that strengthened original ability by multiples.
Even if you inflate a dust, it’s still a dust. With my 20 strength and +2 attack power, even if I use it multiple times, it would still be weaker than a single cut of Choi Cedric’s sword.
It’s not that Choi Cedric is weak in the first place, he isn’t actually struggling with the Monster Hell.
The cooldown of ‘The Bond of a Cup of Coffee’ is 24 hours. I have to be careful because I can only use it once.
‘Then what should I … huh?’
[The Bond of a Cup of Coffee (B)Details: (Lv.1) You can copy the skill of the person who drank the Ultimate Coffee. (00:05:00)Cooldown: 24:00:00
Available for: Choi Yichan, Kim Taewoon.]
I tried to turn off the unhelpful skill window right away, but an unfamiliar name caught my eye.
Kim Taewoon? Who was that? Was there such a person?
“…..Ah.”
That’s right, it was the name of a journalist from Hunter Scope. Too many things happened in one day that I forgot about it.
I thought it might be of some help, so I opened up the skill window.
[Views Explosion! (F)(Lv.1) You can write an article that contains information about the target.There is no guarantee that the article is necessarily true.]
[Paparazzi (E)(Lv.1) You can follow the target without being detected for a certain period of time. (01:00:00)]
………………….
………………….
It’s truly the skills of a trash journalist … It optimized for fake news production. This is why fake news is all over the world.
For a moment, I was busy complaining in my mind.
While Monster Hell was persistently attacking today’s main dish (Choi Cedric), there were the minions who were aiming for the side dish (me).
Ssssshk!
“Huaaaa!”
They’re the bug-type monsters. None of them are actually strong. However, the swarm of insects had its own visual pressure.
“Huah! Eh, F-killer!”
But there is no such thing in the inventory.
Wiiiiing~
“Go away! Aahh!”
Instead, I took out the shovel and pounded the floor, but it was not enough to fight off the swift swarm of insects.
Then….
I used my skill towards an approaching swarm of bugs that’s going to eat my flesh.
‘Aaah! The Floor is Shiny!’
Shashashak!
“….Huh?”
The amorphous ether overturned the floor, and the bugs disappeared from the surroundings in an instant.
That was not the end. The skill stretched out to make the floor completely shiny.
Keuoouooo!
The screams of Monster Hell rang out. All the roots that had fallen to the ground were cut off.
It tried to spread its roots again straight away, but not a single dust was allowed on the floor.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c58:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“What?”
“What about your family? Do you have any brothers or sisters?”
Of all things, talking about family here, he brought up the topic I don’t want to think about the most.
It was a topic for a change of atmosphere and small talk, but I don’t want to talk about it much. I blurted out my words vaguely.

“Uh … what.”
However, Choi Cedric didn’t seem to have much sense.
Seriously, the S-classes don’t have to be smart. Rather, the people around them must have been the ones who were busy reading the room.
Choi Cedric, who didn’t understand my subtlety at all, said proudly.
“Let’s stay friendly. We only have one family.”
“Gosh, you’re preaching when you’re younger than me?”
“What are you talking about? Why am I younger than you….”
I raised my hand and pointed to the S-class in front of me and myself alternately. 
“You are twenty-two. I am twenty-three.”
“What….?”
Although there is only a year difference, Choi Cedric widened his eyes as if he had not thought of the possibility that I was older. I asked sulkingly at the startled face.
“I mean, do you think other people’s families are similar?”
“That’s not it….”
“Even if it’s a family, it may or may not get along well. Still, isn’t it worse to stay friendly when the relationship is bad?”
It would be completely out of the blue to hear what he once boasted about his younger sister. Still, Choi Cedric nodded at my words with a serious expression.
“I know. I’m sure there must be some people that are better off without their families.”
… just like our representative’s family.
The murmur of words in his mouth sounded very small.
“But?”
“But it’s true that we only have one family. No matter how you come to a conclusion, you should try what you can before that. So that you won’t regret it.”
“…….”
“What’s the matter?”
“…….”
Well……
I have nothing to say because he said the right thing.
Actually, there is one thing I keep thinking about these days. It’s about Kwon Jiwoon.
If I recall how we were before the regression….
I just … I lived a life pretending I didn’t know him. Ever since I went to the guild and had a few fights.
‘That’s right, I don’t want to owe something to my Hunter’s relative.’
I’ve had such a hard time. After I left the house we lived together, I’ve just been careless. As long as we don’t bump into each other, I won’t get hurt, so I thought that was the best way.
And now, I’m back.
Originally, I was going to live as quietly as before, without bumping into each other. However, I couldn’t help but be bothered by the ridiculous misunderstanding and his weird behaviour when I came to visit him recently.
‘I can’t hide my awakening forever….’
It can’t be helped if talking openly doesn’t work. Still, before that, we have to talk to each other without hiding anything at least once.
That’s right. That’s true, but ….
If I had put the right thing into practice right away, I would have been a person who never missed the summer vacation homework. And on the last day of each vacation, I wrote a month’s worth of diary.
“Anyway! I’ll think about it after I get out of here!”
Choi Cedric, as if he agreed with me, rose straight up. After pouring the coffee left in the cup into his mouth, he deactivated the barrier. The moment he tried to get rid of the insect-like monster flying around him with one hand and move again….
Thump, Thump, Thump.
The floor began to move with a heavy sound.
A vine that rose nearby wrapped around my ankle and pulled it hard. Slowly, the body slides down the ramp.
“Aaargh!”
“Uh, hey, there!”
Swing!
Choi Cedric cut off the stem wrapped around my ankle with his sword.
What would happen if you cut off the stem while the body is hanging in the air?
Puck!
“Ugh, Ouch, Ouch.….”
Naturally, it goes straight to the floor. I almost went to the afterlife before I even met the boss.
But there was no time to complain.
There was a strong smell of grass leaves, and at the same time I felt a sense of pressure.
[Monster Hell (B) has appeared.][Monster Hell is currently starving.]
This is because the boss of the dungeon, Monster Hell, has appeared.
***
Crack!
The greenhouse glass shattered. Thick roots cut through the floor and long branches extended to the ceiling.
“Aaah, no, my greenhouse!”
And there’s a blue light flickers in the center.
[Monster Hell is blooming. Dungeon: Monster Hell is activated.][Protective barrier during mealtime in Monster Hell: When eating, do not even touch the monster before it appears. Be careful not to disturb the meal of Monster Hell.]
When Lee Chorok came to her senses, the two people who had just been here had already been sucked into the rift.
“Nonsense … it’s ridiculous.”
Lee Chorok covered her mouth with a trembling hand. When she got these seeds, she never imagined it would be like this.
A few days ago, she was at a shopping street in Cheonggyecheon that she frequented. The Cheonggye 3-ga Monster Shopping District is narrowly between legal and illegal. The main items were animal-type monsters, but there were also shops selling dungeon plants from time to time.
‘This is where the real rare items come out.’
There are even rumors that a rare long-tailed phoenix was traded here.With the eyes of a hawk, Lee Chorok searched the sale discount stands. Then, there was someone who spoke to her.
“You must be looking for dungeon plants.”“Yes? How do you know that?”
Lee Chorok looked back to the voice with wary. This is because there’s a high probability that the first person to talk to her here is a scammer.A shop in the corner. There was a person there who somehow didn’t seem alive. The eyes are expressionless, as if they had been pierced with glass eyes.
‘……!’
Lee Chorok felt reluctant and tried to back down. However, the shopkeeper’s next words stopped her.
“Don’t you remember me?”“Well, it’s the first time I’ve ever seen someone like you … Ah.”
An unfamiliar memory flashed through her mind at that moment. Suddenly, the store owner in front of her felt very familiar.
“I’ve never met … A, aa, ah! I’ve seen you before!”“Looks like you remembered me.”
Why did she forget? It was definitely a regular store that she visited several times.The shopkeeper laughed and took out a box.
“A very rare item has arrived, how about it?”
It was a seed the size of half a fist. When she put her hand on it, she could feel it the thumping from the inside.What this beat means is….
‘……!’
Lee Chorok turned pale and pulled away. Dangerous. However, the shopkeeper only smiled.
“It is the seed of Monster Hell.”“There’s a beat inside … This, this, no way…….”“Yeah, a rift, it’s integrated with a rift.”“It’s dangerous.”“It’s not possible. There’s no chance for the rift to awaken because it’s completely sealed.”
….Gulp.The seed with rift was emitting a strange light. The light is so beautiful that it’s bewitching.
Eventually, Lee Chorok purchased the seed.
It is very rare for dungeon plants and rifts to be completely integrated. Since it’s a rift and dungeon plant, the power of either side can grow, so even a slight loss of balance will cause the rift to burst. As a plant otaku, no, as a botanist, her curiosity could not turn away from the seed. 
Furthermore, the store owner’s words somehow had a power that was hard to refuse. She brought the seed and kept it well.
“You said it wouldn’t burst……!”
The moment the Blue Celaeno Flower bloomed, the seed grew at a frightening speed and a dungeon occurred.
It was disconcerting, but the rescue of the people inside came first.
When she reported it to the Dungeon Management Office, a public official hunter was dispatched shortly after.
A large plant dungeon nestled in the middle of a greenhouse. Still, with Choi Cedric inside, there will be no casualties.
However, as officials began to inspect the farm, Lee Chorok could not be relieved.
“Ma’am, where did you buy these toothed carrots?”
“That’s … in Cheonggyecheon.”
“Where’s in Cheonggyecheon? If you do not report after the transaction, you will be fined.”
“I do not know …  I don’t remember that well, ha, ha, ha….”
“Toothed carrots must wear a muzzle. Your business will be suspended for not wearing them a muzzle.”
“Haha, yes…..”
“You acquired this dungeon plant through an illegal business.”
“It’s not just a dungeon plant, it’s a Flying Spaghetti Tree! A very precious tree that tells a Neapolitan ghost story once a day….!”
“You haven’t applied for permission to handle dungeon plants or registered your business. You didn’t even pay your taxes.”
“That … I’m sorry.”
“Put it on.”
Red labels were attached here and there based on the cold-hearted public official’s judgment. ‘Foreclosure‘ in large letters.
“Aa nooo!”
Lee Chorok screamed.
Foreclosure tickets, penalty, fines, business suspension….
Even if the dungeon situation was resolved, Lee Chorok was in a position to become a part-time worker at a fruit shop.
She got a Ph.D. in Dungeon Botany, but she’s a part-timer at a fruit store!
All of her PhD classmates are frying chicken now, so it was a common career path.
While a doctor changed course to a part-time fruit shop worker, a man hurriedly ran into the broken greenhouse.
A pale face and a rough breath. It seemed that he had arrived immediately after receiving a call.
Lee Chorok was surprised to find out who the man was.
‘Kwon Jiwoon of The White Silver Guild? Why is such a tycoon here….?’
“Is the rescue going on?”
It was a cold voice that couldn’t hide the trembling. A pair of eyes filled with anxiety fluttered wildly. Kwon Jiwoon urgently asked the public official who was dispatched.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c57:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

There was only one way to escape from this place: Killing the dungeon boss of Monster Hell.
The problem was that it was difficult to find the main body of Monster Hell in this wide dungeon.
I think we’re on the right way, considering the steepness of the climb, but instead of the main body, only the stems and insects that spew digestive juices were visible.
While climbing up the thick roots for a long time, Choi Cedric tapped me.
“Hey.”

“….Why?”
“Let’s rest here for a moment.”
That’s good to hear. There happened to be an empty space on one side without bugs or sticky liquids.
As Choi Cedric used a certain skill, a translucent barrier wrapped around him. Once I entered the barrier, there was less moisture and less sour smell inside, making it easier to breathe.
I flopped down on the floor and caught my breath. When I wiped my sticky hands with the wipes I took out of my inventory, I felt like I could live a little. Perhaps because of the unique damp air, walking in the dungeon was more tiring than I thought.
As I caught my breath, I had a thought.
‘I want to drink coffee….’
If I can drink just one glass of iced Americano right now, I won’t have any other wishes.
Even if it wasn’t an Americano made with skill, I might have put a Kanu Coffee in it, so I talked to Choi Cedric  while looking through inventory.
“The outside must be in a chaotic situation by now because a dungeon suddenly appeared.”
“…….”
But there is no return answer.
“Still, since I came in with the No. 2 in the rankings, it’s not such an emergency. Where did that plant otaku got something like this from?”
“…….”
Why is there no answer?
No matter how hard I looked through the inventory, there was no Kanu.
Instead, I took out the golden ticket that I got from the last quest.
[Current number of Golden Draw Tickets owned: 1][Please pull the handle.]
I was going to save it, but should I spin it now? I might get something better if I spin it in the dungeon.
After taking a deep breath and calming my mind, it was the moment when I was about to draw with excitement.
“….He-hey.”
“Huh? Why?”
“…….”
But again, there is no answer.
Choi Cedric messed up his hair, brushed it again with his hands, sighed, murmured something in his mouth, and finally opened his mouth again.
“……I’m sorry.”
“What?”
“You know, I grabbed you by the collar.”
At a glance, he looked at me and then lowered his head again. Looking at his face, he seemed to be really sorry.
I smiled and replied.
“Never mind. You apologized before. You must have been surprised when I suddenly burned the flower.”
“Yes, that flower….! Thank you very much. I’ll pay you back for saving that flower when we go out here. Just say anything.”
I had already thought of the price I would ask him, but I asked out of curiosity.
“What can you give me?”
“Any amount of money……! No, it’s too insincere to just pay for it with money.”
My heart is pounding….!
“Right, how about joining our guild?”
“……what?”
If it’s Choi Cedric’s guild, it’s C&L Corporation.
The largest of the Big Three guilds, the three stars of the Hunter Guild. Although it was systematic, it was famous for its tight atmosphere, such as performance pressure.
Of course, I don’t have any intention of joining that guild. Do they even accept an F-class?
I stared at Choi Cedric. He has a slightly flamboyant face, but his eyes were sincere.
Sure, his guild is the best, so he seemed to believe that I would want to join the guild.
“I’m an F-class?”
He’s not prejudiced in a weird way.
“What does the Grade have to do with it? You saved the Blue Celaeno Flower that even the plant otaku couldn’t do. You’re better than the plant otaku … yes, Plant Tentaku-nim!”
“…….”
I’m not that kind of person…….
“Don’t call me that.”
“Why? Be confident. It’s not something that anyone can do. Plant Tentaku-nim!”
“…….”
Only after pleading not to use such creepy expressions did Choi Cedric stop calling me that.
“Anyway, I have no intention of joining the guild.”
“Why? If it is my recommendation, you’ll get the free pass for all the document screening, practical test, and interview.”
It’s kind of hard to say that I don’t want to join his guild because it’s tough. After a moment of contemplation, I opened my mouth.
“I am a free spirit….”
“Huh?”
“I have no intention of staying in one place. That’s why I don’t want to join the guild.”
“Yeah, then it doesn’t matter. That would be nice.”
I was only half-joking, but, unexpectedly, Choi Cedric nodded his head obediently.
“……I envy you.”
The words he added in such a way were deeply sincere.
“This is what I want. I run a cafe.”
“Ah! You’re going to open a chain store? The head office is a little difficult with my authority, but I can give you a seat in the branch office right away.”
Are all the rankers like this? I was taken aback by the sudden, ridiculously large-scale offer.
“That’s not it! I was going to ask you to come as a guest sometimes…..”
It was at that moment when I was waving my hand to convey the exact meaning.
“……!”
Tiling, the notification sounded.
[You have acquired an item. Check your inventory.]
Heck, I guess I pressed the draw button without realizing it while I was in the middle of the conversation.
I tried to do the draw with a lot of excitement. The taste of the moment you spin it! That is the charm of Gacha!
My lucky draw!
[Item: Simple Coffee Making Kit (★★★☆☆)]A portable coffee tool set that allows you to enjoy coffee anytime, anywhere.Now, enjoy coffee to your heart’s content in the dungeon.Note: New user privilege! 1 serving of coffee ingredients included.]
Soon, the regret was completely forgotten.
There was a coffee making kit in the inventory. With portable burners, moka pots and cups, enough coffee beans, and other ingredients to drink for one time.
I grumbled that I wanted coffee and something like this came out. For some reason, something useful was selected.
“Cedric, would you like some coffee?”
“Eh, now? Here? Not a buff potion, but coffee?”
“You’ll know when you drink it.”
I ignored Choi Cedric’s eyes, who was looking at me with an absurd expression. A notification popped up the moment I took the coffee making kit out of my inventory and held it in my hand.
[The condition has been met.][Skill: Dungeon Exploration After a Cup of Coffee (B) has been acquired.]
[Dungeon Exploration After a Cup of Coffee (B)Details: (Lv.1) When making drinks in the dungeon, the level of perfection is increased.]
Using my new skill, I extracted espresso with mocka pot and made iced Americano. The fresh scent was relieving the fatigue. The effect of preventing energy consumption was applied immediately.
I also handed an iced Americano to Choi Cedric. However, his eyes as he receives the cup shake anxiously.
“What’s wrong? You can’t drink bitter coffee?”
“No! Who says I can’t drink it?”
Choi Cedric snatched the cup and took a sip of coffee.
… Gulp.
He tried to make a casual face, but it didn’t last long. Seeing the astringent expression that could not be hidden, I searched the inventory while holding back my laughter.
“Do you want some sugar?”
“Hey, you should’ve told me sooner if you have that!”
I also drank an iced Americano next to Choi Cedric, who added plenty of sugar to his cup.
Insect-type monsters buzzing around the barrier, stems that shoot secretions, rocking floor … the scenery cannot be called pleasant even with empty words, but the coffee was delicious anyway.
Drinking in the dungeon is quite tasteful….
Puk!
Wiiing, pooh!
A flying insect-type monster was hit by secretions. The leaves opened wide, snatching the melting insect and swallowing it. After the unpleasant squeaking sound, only the two wings of the insect-type monster were left.
“…….”
What’s with the atmosphere…..
I lost my appetite for the Monster Hell’s Meal Live Show.
I can’t wait to get out of here. After emptying all the cups, I called Choi Cedric next to me.
“Let’s get going. I can’t wait to get out of here … huh?”
In the meantime, Choi Cedric was looking into his phone screen. There’s no connection in the dungeon, but he looks very serious.
As an excuse, I didn’t mean to look at it on purpose. The picture on the screen naturally caught my eye.
“Who is it?”
“……! Wh-what are you doing? I was so surprised. Don’t look at me like that.”
It feels unreasonable that an S-class hunter complains about being surprised by an F-class hunter.
“Sorry. I won’t look at it.”
“Ehem, hmm, if you want to see it, I can show you.”
Suddenly, the phone was pushed in front of me.
“If you look at it a lot, it will wear you out, so watch it carefully.”
Are you telling me to look or not?
There was a picture of a girl in the phone screen. Peach-colored cheeks, large eyes, and thick lips; she looks pretty cute. Is she a family? If you look closely, her eyes are similar to Choi Cedric’s eyes.
“Your younger sister?”
“Yup. But when you say it like that.”
“……?”
“Isn’t she the cutest in the world? Honestly, isn’t she an angel? She’s my sister, but how can she be so pretty? Ah! She should have been a calendar model! Should I make a calendar now? But I can’t let all the idiots see a picture of our Rona.”
He poured ut a lot of silly comments without even blinking an eye. Is it a joke? It’s too much adoration for a younger sister.
“Yes, I can make it a premium limited edition!”
No, this is 100% pure sincerity. Look at his eyes. He’s that man.
Choi Cedric’s words were not a lie, the girl in the picture was cute. She’s definitely cute, but….
Choi Cedric must be 22 years old now, but the girl in the picture looks pretty young. When I looked at it carefully, she seemed to be an elementary school student. Is she a younger sister with a big age difference?
“Your sister is really young?”
“Ah, that.”
Choi Cedric’s face, who was pouring out old bulldozer comments with an excited look, quickly casted a shadow.
“This … this is the only picture I took while she was awake.”
Ah.
Was this girl the sick family of Choi Cedric that Lee Chorok talked about?
“She’s 16 years old now.”
She has to go to high school next year. Choi Cedric added with a bitter expression. He said that his younger sister, Choi Rona, suddenly fell asleep one day and did not wake up. He mobilized all available means, including potions and healers, but there was no improvement.
Suddenly, I remembered the image of Choi Cedric before the regression, who had an attitude only for the Healers. Is this the reason he doesn’t like Healer?
It’s an unreasonable feeling, but there are moments when it’s hard to endure without blaming someone.
“But it will be alright when we go out here because you saved the Blue Celaeno Flower. With that, Rona will be comfortable.”
Choi Cedric, who forcibly shook off his depression with such words, suddenly changed the topic.
“How about you?”
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Tentaku: 십타쿠. Otaku is 오타쿠. 오 is five, while 십 is ten. Yeah, Cedric has a peculiar humor.
Kanu Coffee is another well-known coffee product by Maxim. 
Sorry for the sudden hiatus! First week of college hit me like a truck– It will be back to normal now that I finished adapting to the schedule (at least, I hope so.)

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c56:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“I’ve met a lot of people who say that. They were all scammers. How are you going to do something that even the plant otaku here couldn’t?”
“Then what if I succeed?”
“What? What nonsense….”
“What’s wrong, couldn’t it be successful? Whether I succeed or fail, you won’t lose anything, so why you don’t just let me try?”

Choi Cedric looked at me with an expression that couldn’t hide his agitation. Hope, and fear of having hope, a greater discouragement. Still, perhaps, the expectation that this time might be different.
Just by seeing that complicated expression, I could guess what Choi Cedric had to go through. A similar thing must have happened many times during that time; having expectation, being disappointed, and looking forward again.
So far, this is the widely known image of Choi Cedric. An arrogant, impudent, tough-tempered Ranker.
However, when I saw him in person, he felt more like a child.
“Okay! If you succeed, I’ll do anything for you. Money? Connections? Just say anything.”
“That’s enough. I’ll tell you what I want when I succeed.”
I have no choice but to try anyway.
After taking a deep breath, I looked back at Choi Cedric and said,
“Excuse me … can you step back a little bit?”
“Huh? Why? Can’t you save the flower when I look at it? Don’t tell me you’re trying to spy on this flower in secret?!”
“That’s not it … Well, I’m nervous because I’m close to a celebrity!”
“Seriously, why didn’t you tell me sooner? You deserve to be nervous, ok, I understand! Now, is this enough?”
I can’t believe this worked.
I approached the pot after learning that Choi Cedric had taken about five steps apart.
The petals, which were originally blue, have dried up yellow, and the stem is likely to break at any moment.
The Blue Celaeno Flower is a flower with the power of regeneration.
However, this flower was already dead from the time it was a seed. Thanks to Lee Chorok’s care, it sprouted, but it withered in the end.
So what should we do to regenerate the flower?
Regeneration presupposes death. In other words, you must die completely before you can be reborn. 
I brought Cthugha’s ring close to the flower.
Hyurr.
The fire from the ring burned the flower in an instant.
The moment white ashes fell into the flowerpot.
“What are you doing?!”
“……Huck!”
Choi Cedric rushed in and pulled me by the collar. A powerful force lifted my feet from the floor. It’s suffocating.
“Choi━ Hunter Choi Cedric, calm down and let’s talk first.”
“Aren’t I calm enough now?!”
His eyes lost in anger.
But … he’s controlling his strength. If I had been grabbed by the collar with the power of an S-class Hunter, I would have gone to the other world.
“You! Why did you burn the flower?! Don’t you know what kind of flower that is?! I’ll let you go, depending on your answer!”
“Ugh … that … cough, cough!”
“Answer me!”
I couldn’t open my mouth because I was suffocated by the tremendous power. The best thing I managed to do is pointing to the flowerpot with only the tip of my finger raised.
“Huk, Hunter Choi Cedric, look at this!”
Lee Chorok made a startled sound.
“It is not! The flower!”
“What? …..Ah.”
Choi Cedric’s eyes widened.
Thud.
He let go of the strength in his hand. If it had been a little later, I would have really passed out from lack of oxygen.
That’s why I deliberately told you to step away, but it didn’t work.
“Cough, cough! Huk, I thought I was going to die! Coughl!”
I coughed exaggeratedly on purpose. Every time I coughed, Choi Cedric’s face turned white. In terms of powder pact, I think it will be around number 13.
“I’m sorry, before … I thought you killed the flower … I’m so sorry.”
“All right, let’s look at the flower quickly.”
“Ah, yes, yes!”
A yellow-green bud sprouted over the potted plant spilled with white ashes.
The buds grew rapidly in an instant, extended the stem and leaves, and eventually bloomed a blue flower.
The blue petals with a soft light looked very mysterious.
[Item: Blue Celaeno Flower (★★★★★)A legendary flower that is said to contain the starlight of Celaeno. It has the power of regeneration.Note: Fresh.]
The contents of the status window have also changed.
“Finally, with this flower….!”
The moment when Choi Cedric, who was moved, was about to embrace the flowerpot.
Kukukung!
A heavy vibration was heard, and the soil of the pot began to soar toward the sky.
“Huh, uh….?”
A thick root that stretches out mercilessly far.
There was another plant under the Blue Celaeno Flower. The plant, which absorbed the power of the flower, began to grow wildly, destroying the greenhouse, and wrapping it around with roots.
“Aaaah, no, my greenhouse!”
“….Dodge!”
Crash!
And that blue light flickering in the middle of the plant’s roots….
It’s a rift.
Boom, boom! The branches cut through the ceiling and the roots dig up the ground.
Ah. I remember.
The reason why Lee Chorok’s farm was closed before the regression. That’s because a dungeon occurred on the farm.
There was no time to escape. I was just sucked into the dungeon.
Slurp!
The body, sucked into the rift, slid down the stem. I lost my balance and fell flat on the floor.
“Ouch…..”
The surroundings were dark and bumpy, just like the roots of a very large tree, and there was a smell of musty grass from somewhere.
The sour smell that stung my nose, the damp air, and the wriggling floor.
This was a dungeon formed inside a plant.
Very rarely, it is said that some rifts are hidden in grass or trees. It is usually safe to prevent the parent plant from bursting into a rift.
But what happens if the plant is exposed to dark ether? The plan and the rift fuse, and the plant itself becomes a dungeon.
A rift was hidden in one of the dungeon plants that Lee Chorok grew, and dark ethers were released in the greenhouse to help the plant grow.
Later, as the ether was absorbed, the plant turned into a dungeon. As a result, Happy Green Life Farm was closed.
This is the end of this business that I remember from the pre-regression.
That plant otaku is really….
However, due to the regenerative power of the Blue Celaeno Flower, the rift broke earlier than before the regression, and I was caught up in the situation.
Usually, normal dungeonized plants are not so dangerous.
The question is … what kind of plant was the basis of this dungeon…..
Tiling!
[Dungeon: You have entered Monster Hell.][Monster Hell is currently starving.]
The name of the dungeon appeared in the notification window.
Uh, monster hell……?
Wait, let’s get this straight.
An insectivorous plant that secretes digestive juices and eats flies is called Flies Hell. 
Then, monster hell is the plant that secretes digestive juices and eats monsters.
The possibility that a plant that melts monsters can melt humans is..…?
……………….
Hiss!
“Aaa, aaagh!”
The vines of the plants that stretched out forward fired secretions. The secretions spilled on the floor sizzled and melted the surroundings. I don’t think I’ll ever be okay if I get hit.
Then, the alarm rang again.
[Monster Hell is currently starving.]
“……”
“Save me!”
I tried to save a flower, but I woke up something I shouldn’t have woken up.
When I was horrified as I imagined the future me melting without a trace inside this giant plant, I heard a voice next to me.
“Hey.”
“Uh, huh, oh?”
“Why do you look like you saw a ghost? You’re not going to make any difference.”
“Huh … Choi Cedric?”
Tak, he grabbed the stem in the air and landed on the floor. Unlike me who fell down, it was a stable landing. His score is about 9.5 out of 10.
“Sheesh, it bothered me that a civilian also came in.”
There is no one else. Fortunately, Lee Chorok doesn’t seem to be getting caught up.
“Do you have any weapons or items that you can use?”
“Hmm … This?”
I took out the +2 attack shovel from my inventory and showed it to him.
“Huh? Really? Is this an item?”
He looks like he’s never seen an item like this before. He looks around the seedling shovel and admires it as if it were a strange thing. When he returned it, he said,
“You must have been very surprised, but calm down and trust me! Huahaha!”
I thought you’d laugh at me.
‘As expected….’
I added confidence to the discomfort I felt earlier.
The No. 2 ranker, Hunter Choi Cedric of C&L Corporation. Numerous personality controversies that followed the name crossed my mind.
Compared to the personality controversy, I think he’s kind….
At that time.
Crash, pugh!
“Huaaaa!”
Choi Cedric laughed when he saw me jumping back in surprise at the pouring secretion for the second time.
“Why are you screaming all of a sudden? Are you scared?”
“Hey, look at all this grass that’s spraying water. If it hits me, I’ll melt and become manure for this dungeon!”
“Oh, that one?”
Sheeng.
As he replied indifferently, he drew out his sword and swung it. Two times exactly on both sides and up and down. A sword almost the size of Choi Cedric’s, as light as a fly swatter.
Crunch!
The leaves that spit out secretions were destroyed.
“What are you afraid of?”
Chak, he returned to his previous position and put the sword around his waist. He brushes his slightly messy hair with his hand and smiles brightly. As if now is the time to admire.
What is this weird feeling….
“Wow, that’s really great. It’s so cool.”
“….Ehem, hmm!”
Even with words that didn’t contain much soul, an indescribable joy spread across Choi Cedric’s face.
“I’m glad I have Hunter Choi Cedric. I’m relieved.”
“Yes, that’s right. You only need to trust me!”
Didn’t he usually get a lot of compliments … he shrugged his shoulders and walked away.
I see. I know what this feels like.
He looks a bit like my house cat.
‘Suddenly, the No. 2 Ranker feels familiar.’
Anyway, entering this strange plant dungeon was at first bewildering, but I soon regained my composure.
Lee Chorok will protect the Blue Celaeno Flower well. All I have to do is get out of here and there’s no reason to be scared because I’m with the second most famous Hunter in Korea after Muwon.
Crack!
Slid, kaaang!
Crush!
He proceeded forward, slashing the leaves and stems that spewed out secretions.
“Huh! Over there! Behind you!”
“Where?”
Shush, bang!
In Monster Hell, there were parasitic insect-type monsters. However,  However, they died at one stroke of Choi Cedric’s sword and became manure.
Is this how it feels to ride an express bus?
Ignoring the road, he cuts off the roots and stems in front of him and proceeds. The Munchkin’s companion experience was amazing. This must be why movies where the main character just smashes everything are popular.
I also felt the refreshing procession of destruction briefly.
However, this Monster Hell dungeon was bigger than I thought. I walked on the uneven roots for a long time, but I still couldn’t see the end.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Otaku (오타쿠) is a Japanese word for people who have an obsessive interest in a specific object, mainly Japanese manga and anime fans. Sometimes, the word 오덕후 is shortened to 덕후.
Flies hell (파리지옥) is Venus Flytrap.
