SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c55:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

I put freshly squeezed salty lemon chung in a glass cup.
Next, pour carbonated water to the cup and fill it with an appropriate amount of ice. Although it’s cumbersome to make lemon chung, the process of making it to a drink is simple.
[Item: Lemonade (★★★☆☆)Status: Good (Remaining Time: 00:30:00)Effect: It purifies the mind.]

Perhaps because it was made from the fruit of a Purifying Tree, a purification-related effect came out.
However, when I held out this lemonade without lemon, the customer made a puzzled expression. Did he not expect lemonade to come out?
“Not this, you’re supposed to give me something else.”
“What?”
Was there something like that?
“This is the new menu that I was supposed to give you today.”
The customer raised his voice, as if he felt stuffy.
“Not this kind of drink! Aren’t you trading the Long-tailed Phoenix today?”
“The Long-tailed Phoenix … What is it?”
Judging by the name, it looks like a monster. Is it a rare monster?
“Don’t play innocent! You, I know you’re in touch with the smugglers!”
“What did you know? Don’t talk about scary things like smuggling! This is an ordinary cafe!”
“Why is there an ordinary cafe like this?”
………
I have nothing to say about that….
I don’t know why, but this customer seems to have a strong misunderstanding. I explained again to clear up the misunderstanding.
“That … still, this is just a cafe.”
“Then where is the Long-tailed Phoenix?”
“I’ve never seen such a monster before. There’s only a cat and a slime here.”
“Nyaooong.”
“Kkyuu!”
“…….!”
The customer suddenly distorted his face and tried to leave the store in a hurry as if he had nothing more to do.
However, I hurriedly reached out and grabbed the customer.
Where are you going? You have to drink this to complete the quest. My Golden Draw Ticket!
“Sir, it’s already made, so please drink this before you go.”
“I don’t need it!”
“Take just one sip.”
“What the hell is this drink……!”
However, as I kept strongly insisting it, the customer eventually took a lemonade cup in his hand. Gulp, he drank a sip.
Flinch. He looked at the lemonade again with a surprised expression.
Gulp, gulp….
He emptied all the remaining lemonade.
Above his head, the satisfaction gauge began to fill with light. The sparks appeared so clearly that one could guess his feeling without asking.
The sour taste, the deep sweetness, and the sparkling taste of carbonated water. Surrounded by a storm of fresh taste, the customer was very moved.
[The target loves your drink. You made a deep connection with drink.]
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Sub Quest: Satisfy The Customer’.Please collect the reward.]
[Experience: 100 EXP have been acquired.]
[You have obtained 1 Golden Draw Ticket.]
[Fame: 5 / Popularity: 10.]
[Cafe Rieul’s current grade: F]
A quest completion message rang just in time.
Done. Since the misunderstanding was cleared up, I tried to tell him to go quickly.
“I … I’ve been living my life wrong.”
Pardon?
“At first, it had its own meaning. I tried to spread my will as a hunter on the media. However, the better the view counts, the more money it makes.”
The customer’s story continued.
“From that moment on, I became a slave to Aggro. Clickbait articles, gossip, advertising articles …. I’ve become a giraegi.”
I couldn’t get my mind off the pouring feast of TMI.
In summary, this guest is Kim Taewoon of Hunter Scope. His job is writing low-level articles to earn views, in other words, he’s a trash journalist. He said that he came here while investigating the site of the smuggling of illegal monsters.
After talking to himself for a long time, the customer’s face looked very clear when he raised his head.
A pair of burdensome twinkling eyes. A comfortable expression that dispels all false desires. A smile full of good intentions
You looked very pure….
“I was wrong! That’s not true journalism!”
It’s a very different attitude than before. What is this?
I checked the status window of the lemonade again.
The rather vague expression of ‘purifies the mind‘ caught my eye. No way … did the lemonade purify the journalist’s mind?
The journalist ahjussi exclaimed with flawless, clear eyes.
“Thank you! You opened my eyes. Now I’m going to walk down the path of true journalism!”
Well, at least it’s better than continue being a giraegi, right?
“It’s … cheer up. That’s right.”
The moment when I exhorted the journalist ahjussi like that.
The cafe door opened and Ki Yoohyun appeared.
“I came here because I was worried.”
With a calm look in his eyes, he turned to the clear-eyed journalist ahjussi.
“What kind of situation is this?”
I don’t know about that either….
[Achievement: Almost Infinitely TransparentYou purified the mind of a disturbed person.His heart is now pure.His heart will never be tainted by darkness again.
Reward: Ether-Wiki Update]
Uh, this much?
It was almost at the same time as the achievement that felt so grandiose that it felt embarrassing.
“…….!”
The eyes of the journalist ahjussi who preached the path of true journalism with an impeccable face and Ki Yoohyun met.
“Huk, Yo-you are….!”
“You remember. It’s been a long time.”
A smiling lips with a soft voice.
However, the journalist’s face turned pale. Not only that, but his body began to tremble. He seemed to be afraid of Ki Yoohyun.
“I didn’t expect to see you here.”
“Today, today, by chance … it’s just a coincidence! I didn’t come here on purpose! Then, I’ll get going!”
The last words were so shaky to the point of being hard to understand. The journalist ahjussi quickly packed his bag and left the store.
I was wondering if I should keep listening to the pouring TMI, it’s a relief that I’m lucky.
“Did you know that man?”
“In the past, we had bumped into each other because of an information gathering.”
“Really?”
“Hunter Scope, which he belongs to, is a little famous. In a bad way.”
Come to think of it, I remember reading it. What is a famous Hunter’s secret private life like, and some famous guilds have big names behind them. It was a false initials article with no basis.
“I applied for a restraining order because he was so persistent.”
“Hee … what kind of information he gathered?”
“………”
“Yoohyun-ssi?”
“I’m glad Rieul-ssi is okay.”
It’s a pity that he changed the topic. Hmm, he said he came all the way here because he was worried, so should I skip it?
“But it will be fine now.”
Because the journalist has been completely purified by the power of lemonade. It was a terrifying effect.
Well … Anyway, cheer up. In that way, I wished th journalist ahjussi good luck in the future.
By the way, the Ether-Wiki has just been updated as an achievement reward.
[‘Blue Celaeno Flower‘ has been added to the Ether-Wiki.]
The update was, as expected, a way to save the Blue Celaeno Flower. The flower that Choi Cedric struggled to save.
The quests in the right place, the bizarre achievements, the Wiki updates … 
This system does not react mechanically, but it seems to have an intention.
It’s meant to annoy me.
Still, thank you for teaching me how to save the flower.
Thank you…….
《Blue Celaeno Flower》Type: Plant>Description: A legendary flower that is said to contain the starlight of Celaeno.
How to Bloom Blue Celaeno Flower: [Continue Reading]
“…….!”
I was astonished when I checked the Ether-Wiki.
This is the information I’ve been waiting for, but …. uh, is this real? Is it really okay to do it like this?
It’s not a scam, right?
***
The next day, I headed back to Happy Green Life Dungeon Farm.
Of course, the purpose is to save the Blue Celaeno Flower, but as soon as she found me, Lee Chorok was horrified.
“Cu, cu, cu … customer-nim? Wha-what did you come here for?”
“Hello. I have something to ask you today……”
“Tuesday, no refunds!”
“….Yes?”
“Even if you don’t like the Purifying Tree, I can’t give you a refund!”
“Isn’t it still refundable according to the Consumer Protection Act?”
“But … I-I have already spent all the money, so I don’t have any money to give it back to you!”
“All 50 rubies?”
Isn’t that quite a lot of money?
“That’s because I paid the overdue electricity bill and dealt with this and that….”
I looked around the farm for a while. Lee Chorok tried to cover one side in a hurry, but I had already seen it.
The appearance of the farm was quite different from when I came before. Above all, a large plant at the entrance stood out.
“What is this?”
“Ah, customer-nim! You have a god eye. This is a Flying Spaghetti Tree! It’s a very rare child, and I was lucky enough to get a bid. Once a day, it tells us a Neapolitan ghost story.”
“……how much was the bid?”
Lee Chorok carefully spread out five fingers. Well then….
“I didn’t come here to get a refund.”
“Customer-nim, please don’t refund … huh, is that so? Ugh, I was surprised. You should’ve quickly said it. I was wondering if I should sell my kidney.”
Is this place really okay?
“Then why did you come?”
“There’s a Blue Celaeno Flower.”
“Ah, yes, yes!”
“I found a way to save it.”
“Is that true?”
Lee Chorok took me to the greenhouse immediately without asking long questions.
Soil, water, temperature, nutrition … she said that the flowers did not come back to life, even though she did everything to the best of her knowledge.
Choi Cedric’s urging is getting worse day by day, and she wants to grab the straw. It must be a situation where she wants to believe what I’m saying out of the blue.
“I told you not to come in!”
Even today, Choi Cedric looked depressed in front of the flowers in the greenhouse.
“U-Uagh! Hunter Choi Cedric, don’t be so angry. We have a visitor.”
“Oh? Ah, back then … my fan?”
“I’m not a fan.”
This person and that person listen only to what they want to hear.
“As I’ve said before, I have a private life. It’s hard to ask for an autograph anywhere. … Ah, you’re not a fan? Don’t … don’t confuse people!”
His earlobes are blazing red.
“Then why are you here?”
“I know how to save the flower.”
“……! Don’t talk nonsense!”
Choi Cedric distorted his expression.
The look of embarrassment that was here until now was nowhere to be seen, and he seemed to be wary of me.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Ahjussi means  ‘Uncle’ in Korean and it’s usually used to address an older middle-aged man. I know you guys know this already, right? I wrote ahjussi as it is because journalist uncle sounds a little weird.
I’m excited because one of my favorite arc is coming 😀
Share this:TwitterFacebookLike this:Like Loading...

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c54:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

[Item: Purifying Tree (★★☆☆☆)Type: TreeIt is a good tree to purify the unclean. It has a delicate floral scent.Status: YoungTime Remaining until the fruit ripens: 6 Months]
6 months?
What, six months?
6 months is by no means a long time for a normal tree to bear fruit. But so far, Yggdrasil’s fruits and Dungeon Sugarcane have grown in just one day,  so why is this the only thing that takes six months!

The quest is just a quest, but at this rate, I can’t give the customer a new menu. Is there any way…..
Tiling!
[New entry has been updated in Ether-Wiki.]
At that moment, a system notification sounded quickly. They give me a hint after a long time, so let’s just obediently accept it.
When I accessed Ether-Wiki and checked the ‘Latest Update‘ column, I saw one new item that wasn’t there before.
《How to Promote the Growth of Crops》You want to make your crops grow faster. You are a K-gamer who is not satisfied if you do not progress quickly.  You need to skip all the letters in order to be satisfied.
[Continue Reading]
Huh, is it jus me or is there really a grudge that can be felt in the encyclopedia’s explanation?
Anyway, I calmly clicked [Continue Reading].
Hello~ This is Ether-Wiki.Today I bring you information on how to promote the growth of crops.We will deliver the necessary information to The Eligible, so please don’t forget to read it until the end.
Of course, it takes time to bear fruit!Did you know that?
But you want to finish the quest as soon as possible, right?That’s why, today!
Make special fertilizer for The Eligible who wants to grow crops quickly…….(ellipsis)
Today, we learned how to make a special fertilizer.If it was helpful, please access the Ether-Wiki. ^^
What kind of viral blogging…..
As if it had been copied from somewhere, there was only one line of information that I wanted in a feast of long and insincere texts.
That’s a relief. I can prepare it right away.
By the way, this Ether-Wiki seems to update information according to my actions. The notification pops up every time I do something.
It seems that such an explanation came out when I first logged in….
Can’tI figure out how to save the Blue Celaeno Flower through this wiki?
I remembered the image of Choi Cedric, whom I met at the farm yesterday.
As soon as I appeared, he pretended to be fine, but the expression on his face looked depressed because of the flower that was about to wither and die.
It has nothing to do with me. It’s irrelevant, but….
It bothers me that his family is sick.
If the flow goes as it has been, the system might tell me. Well, let’s do what I can first.
I left the space and took out a paper box that was stuck in the warehouse. In the meantime, a lot of the contents gathered, so the box was quite heavy.
“Kwon Ri, what are you going to do about that?”
Choi Yichan arrived just in time to move the box inside.
“Huh? Ah, I’m going to use it as fertilizer.”
“That?”
The ingredient of the fertilizer told by Ether-Wiki was the coffee grounds left over after brewing coffee. The garbage bag fell off and I was collecting it without throwing it away, and it turned out well.
“Give it to me. I’ll move it.”
Choi Yichan picked up the box and asked where to go.
However, we soon ran into a problem. The blue entrance to the space on the wall was invisible to Choi Yichan.
“Waeooong (Of course, do you think this is a place where anyone can come in)!”
“….Is that so?”
Naturally, I thought anyone could come in.
“Kiyaoong (Me, the entry to this space is only allowed to those who have been approved by the agent who runs the system)!”
“Then approve it.”
“Meoooong (That … it’s not that easy)…..”
I knew it. That’s right.
“Waeooong (Don’t look at me with eyes that say, ‘It’s useless, but I’ve done well so let’s just accept it because it’s pitiful‘)!”
“Ah, I got caught.”
“Kyagyakyaeong!”
So, I told Choi Yichan to wait and tried to lift the box.
“I’m sorry. I’m not very helpful.”
“A, that’s nonsense. You’ve already helped me so much.”
I patted his shoulder to tell him not to mind because he was helpful enough already, but Choi Yichan looked disheartened.
“At best … I thought I would be of more help to you.”
The words were swallowed in a sigh.
“What’s the matter?”
Choi Yichan shook his head sideways. His frizzy hair, reminiscent of a puppy, shook.
“I will wait here. Go.”
There doesn’t seem to be any color in the smiling face….
I told him to cheer up because it was okay again and went into the space.
Coffee grounds were gently sprinkled around the planted sapling. The soft light from the soil was absorbed by the sapling and the status window was updated.
[Item: Purifying Tree (★★☆☆☆)Type: TreeIt is a good tree to purify the unclean. It has a delicate floral scent.Status: GrowingTime Remaining until the fruit ripens: 1 Day]
Done. This is it.
The next day, safely, the lemon … Ah, no, I should call it the fruit of Purifying Tree.
It has a yellow color, a size that fits in one hand, a round shape, and a sweet scent. No matter how I look at it, it looks exactly like a lemon. Let’s call it fake lemon.
The tree grew quite large overnight, and when I picked all the ripe fake lemons, it was a considerable amount. Fake lemons piled up like a mountain in a large bowl. The inside of the store was filled with a sweet and sour scent.
I declared in a solemn voice, with a fake lemon in one hand and baking soda in the other.
“So, are you all ready?”
“Yeah, I am.”
“Nyaaa (Of course)!”
“Kkyuuu!”
A temporary part-timer (characteristic: S-class hunter) and the two others answered energetically.
I decide to make Lemon Chung with all the picked fake lemons.
If I leave it, it’ll only expire.
I need lemon syrup to make lemonade anyway, so it’s good to make a lot and drink it over and over again.
So today, we are going to deal with this mountain of fake lemons together.
It is cumbersome because of the large amount, but it is not difficult to make lemon chung. The first thing to do is to clean the fake lemon.
“See, this is how you do it.”
I soaked the fake lemon in water with baking soda and washed it with my hands. After watching me, Choi Yichan also dipped the fake lemon in water.
“Eung, like this….”
Squelch.
The fake lemon was crushed in Choi Yichan’s palm because he put too much strength.
“Ahhhhhh!”
As a result, the juice of the fake lemon flew into Choi Yichan’s eyes accurately.
“Huk, Yichan-ah, are you okay?”
“Ugh, it stings, heugh.”
“Hurry, wash it with water. Hurry.”
Thanks to his strong S-class body, he got better soon, but….
“Come on, let’s do it again. Just relax your hands and wash them gently. Gently.”
“Eung, gently….”
Squelch.
“Aaaaaah!”
………………………..
The same thing happened over and over again, and only after both eyes became bright red did Choi Yichan give up washing the lemon.
It seems that the strength is not properly controlled yet. Life isn’t easy even for an S-class.
“Haha … I’m sorry.”
With a gloomy expression, he hung down his head.
I quickly pushed his back, fearing that he might become as depressed as yesterday.
“It’s okay, you can help me with something else. Just go over there and rest, okay?”
After leaving Choi Yichan, who retires like that, the remaining labor force is….
“Waeoong, Waeoong (It smells good)!”
A cat is playing while rolling a fake lemon with its front paw.
“Kyuuuu!”
A slime that spreads its body like a membrane, swallows the fake lemon, and then spits out only the seeds.
Let’s just do it by myself…….
Now it is just one F-class cafe owner with one power and two pets.
It’s weird. I decided to live a life of working less and resting more, specifically, working two days a week and taking five days off.
Why am I washing a large amount of fake lemons after picking them up in the morning?
I felt more and more drawn into this system and quests.
‘Maybe I’m the problem….?’
After washing the fake lemon thoroughly in water mixed with baking soda, I rinsed it once with water, and the cleaning process was finished.
If it’s a bought lemon, I’ll need to wash it more, but since this is a freshly picked fruit, this should suffice.
Next, it was time to cut the fake lemon into slices. After wiping off the water, cut the top of the fake lemon and discard it, then cut it into 0.3 cm thick slices.
Choi Yichan, who was aiming for an opportunity to intervene, promptly offered to help. But…..
Puck!
He had to give up because the fake lemon was minced instead of sliced.
What, isn’t it okay because that means you can cut monsters that aren’t fake lemons well?
“I’m sorry, again…..”
“It’s okay. Can you play with Mieum and Lime for a bit?”
BGM is heard behind my back as I sliced the fake lemon.
Tadadadak!
“Unyaaaaa!”
“Kyuuu! Kyuuu!”
“Ahaha, you guys, one at a time.”
Through the window in front of me, I can see the huge stone wall of the Great Dungeon Abyss, and there’s a lively cry behind me. There’s also a tak, tak, tak sound as the lemon was cut in cutting board.
It’s so peaceful…….
Ah, just to avoid misunderstanding, I’m not saying that I hate peace.
A life of eating well, resting well, playing well, and cutting fake lemons into thin slices. It is truly a life suitable for a regressor. This F-class regressor wants to rest.
Remove the seeds from the sliced ​​fake lemon and place it in a large bowl. Then, pour sugar equal to the weight of the fake lemon and mix well. It took quite a while to finish it up to here because of the large amount.
While waiting for the sugar to melt for a while, I got a little hungry.
Well, let me try one.
I picked up a slice of fake lemon mixed with sugar and took it to my mouth.
“……!”
The first thing I tasted was a thrilling sour taste. Then, the sweetness that neutralizes the sourness filled the mouth, and the rich citrus scent cleared my head.
It is delicious to eat as it is, but it will taste even better if it is aged.
After boiling it in hot water, wiping the sterilized jar well, and then filling it with sugar-pickled fake lemon, the making of lemon chung completed.
I looked at the lemon chung jar neatly placed on the shelf. Just looking at the golden shining jar in the midday light gave me peace of mind.
Well, it’s peaceful. Really.
***
I was alone in the store that evening when I promised the regular customer a taste of the new menu.
It’s because Choi Yichan, who was here with me until now, has returned.
“Are you going now? Where are you going?”“Hahahaha! No, it’s okay! I have a place to sleep!”“What? Aren’t you still looking for a house? Where are you living now?”“The earth, the wind is with me! Don’t worry.”“Wait, don’t say anything weird. Where do you really spend your time? Yichan-ah?”“I’m going, see you tomorrow!”
But he left only a cheerful smile behind.
Is he really okay? He’s  a little strange these days….
My friend’s Hunter Grade went up and he suddenly became weird, what should I do?
I’ll question him in more detail tomorrow, anyway.
“Welcome.”
“That thing, please give me what we talked about before.”
The customer in the fishing vest showed up on time. Without saying anything else, he sat down and asked for the drink.
Did you expect it that much? Then, I have to live up to your expectations.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Lemon Chung: Chung means ‘preserved with sugar in a jar‘. Taken from (as usual) Wikipedia,  Chung/Cheong (청; 淸) is a name for various sweetened foods in the form of syrups, marmalades, and fruit preserves. In Korean cuisine, cheong is used as a tea base, as a honey-or-sugar-substitute in cooking, as a condiment, and also as an alternative medicine to treat the common cold and other minor illnesses. Originally, the word cheong (청; 淸) was used to refer to honey in Korean royal court cuisine.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c53:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

However, there was one thing that bothered me to send them like this.
“It’s night time, can we just send the children? It’s close to the store here, so let’s take them with us.”
Ki Yoohyun smiled bitterly.
“They are young, but they are hunters. The road at night is nothing for them.”

“No. They might be hunters, but they’re still children.”
The twins I had seen before the regression flashed before my eyes. The soulless eyes that seem to be disillusioned with the world bothered me.
I can’t let them change like that. I wanted to protect that lively and innocence that still remains. Children have to live a life of watching children’s animations at 5 p.m. after school and wondering about what would they eat for dinner.
As long as they become a hunter belonging to a guild, there may be difficulties to do all of that in reality, but children are still children.
“Hunter Ki Yoohyun-nim is right.”
“We can go on our own.”
“Really? That’s too bad. I was going to make you a hot vanilla latte if you stop by.”
“….Vanilla latte?”
The twins’ eyes shook wildly. They looked as if they wanted to eat.
“I’ve never had a vanilla latte. They said I can’t eat it yet because I’m young.”“Endure it, you idiot! I’ve never tried it either.”
I could hear all the whispers.
“Ah, there are butter cookies, too.”
“……!”
A few seconds to wander between desire and patience.
“……it’s all right.”
“Right. We won’t disturb you!”
Gee, patience won.
The twins walked away with a same bustling gait as they did when they appeared.
Well, it’s no big deal. Next time I see them, I’ll have to feed them sweet drinks and snacks.
***
I walked on the way back to the store side by side with Ki Yoohyun.
Around the Dungeon Gate, where buildings and cars are gradually decreasing. Only the dimly lit streetlightslights illuminated the way. The shadow lengthened and shortened as we walked.
Surprisingly, there is really nothing. It’s such a quiet place in the middle of Jung-gu, Seoul.
Strictly speaking, the Dungeon Gate of the dungeon ‘Abyss’ was not a part of Seoul City. That huge dungeon appeared by tearing and distorting the surrounding space.
Therefore, the shape of the map of Seoul changed before and after the creation of Abyss. An open space between City Hall Station and Hoehyeon Station as if both ends were pulled by hand. The place painted with a black square box is Dungeon Gate 3.
Still, since it is located in Seoul, development is made for accessibility, but the reason why there is no convenience store is clear.
The smell of air changes slightly as you walk toward the center. The color of the soil that is stepped on by the feet is also different. There was an unknown dungeon in this place.
A huge stone wall that has not been revealed what lies at the end of it. A person with a sensitive temperament feels scared just by looking at it.
‘For that matter, I didn’t have any problems….’
I slept well, ate well, played well, hmm.
As silence came, I naturally paid attention to the sound of footsteps next to me.
“…….”
Ki Yoohyun, who took my goods at his own will, remained silent for a while.
Come to think of it, it’s been a while since I met Ki Yoohyun. This is the first time since we separated in front of Grandma Kim Deokyi’s workshop the day after the fire.
The moment I was slightly distracted by the shadow on his face.
“Rieul-ssi.”
A calm call came to my ears.
“Yes?”
“You said something earlier.”
“What are you talking about?”
“Even if they’re hunters, they’re still children.”
“…Yeah.”
I turned my head and looked at him. Beyond the glasses that couldn’t hide the gorgeous face at all, the bright eyes stared at me.
“Do you really think so?”
The answer to the question came out quickly.
“I do. Just because your body is strong doesn’t mean your mind is also strong.”
20 years since the Great Dungeon appeared. Young Awakened was no longer unusual or rare. Awakening is a coincidence or fate that can happen to anyone regardless of age.
Rifts keep popping up, and the world wants a Hunter. My words may sound absurd in this situation where you have to face death if you don’t deal with rifts in time.
However, I think it is harsh for children, who are curious about dinner side dishes or watching children’s animation after school, to face monsters.
Of course, there are minimal safeguards. Awakened people under the age of 12 cannot belong to a guild and are required to be protected by the Dungeon Management Office. Even so, this is not enough.
Some children are forced by their parents. Some children mistake it for their own will. Some children enter the dungeon because they want to be praised.
The twins Joo Shinwoo and Joo Shinhee are no exception. If I remember it correctly, they’re 14 years old this year. They’re still pretty young.
What the hell happened in the past three years that changed their personality that much? Did Cheongna Guild overwork them? I didn’t think the No. 1 guy would be like that, but is he actually a vicious guild leader?
Ki Yoohyun spoke again while I was busy accusing the No. 1 ranker, whom I’ve never met, in my head.
“Rieul-ssi may be different, but … Hunters are often said to lack a bit of humanity.”
His words were understandable. The human mind is more influenced by the body than we think. The strong power, the dungeon experience, and changes in the surrounding environment are obviously damaging to the mind. 
Wait a minute, but what’s the word in the front of his sentence? Did he say that I may be different because I’m an F-class?
Ki Yoohyun’s words continued.
“The same goes for those kids. They look like that, but there is a part in their heart that is worn out and dull. Nevertheless, do you still think so?”
A cautious tone, as if to confirm an important fact. The bright eyes gazed at me.
I don’t know why he’s asking me this, but I only have one answer anyway.
“Of course, then you should treat them better. Awakening doesn’t mean you become a different being, right? That’s what adults do.”
I can’t do this. Next time I see the twins, I’m not going to just feed them snacks, but I’m going to make them watch an animation VOD for children. It should be prepared with exciting content that cannot be stopped once played.
Tiling!
Then, suddenly, a system notification sounded.
[A quest has occurred.][Sub Quest: Lady of the Children’s HeartYou value children. Let’s present good memories to the targets1.Feed snacks to the target: 0/1
1 Joo Shinwoo, Joo ShinheeReward: None.]
Unusually, it was a quest without a reward.
That’s right. It’s not because I want to be rewarded, but because I can be nice to them with pure kindness. If it can help the twins’ mental health in three years, that’s enough.
When I meet the twins again, let’s complete it. This system has always been a nuisance, but sometimes it does a good job.
Turning off the quest window, I noticed that Ki Yoohyun was still looking at me.
“What’s wrong? Were you touched by what I said?”
As an excuse, it was only a joke. I didn’t say anything special, so it’s just a light conversation to be laughed on before we moved on to another topic.
It seems that my intention was not conveyed to Ki Yoohyun at all. He was silent for a while, as if he was tracing some memory, and then he opened his mouth.
“Yes, I think so. No, that’s right. I’m touched.”
“…….”
No, this guy is really….
It was a perfect atmosphere to tackle right now. What if I suddenly become serious? Don’t you know Tiki-Taka?
I lost my words and kept my mouth shut.
“…….”
“…….”
What are we going to do with this atmosphere?
***
Fortunately, it was only a short way to the store. On the remaining road where the early winter wind was quite chilly, I walked with Ki Yoohyun while telling him about the recent situation.
There’s nothing much to say about my recent situation. I can’t tell the story of Choi Yichan, who claimed to be a temporary part-timer to avoid the annoyance around him, so all that’s left is the story of a new regular customer.
“….so I was on my way back after getting the ingredients to make lemonade.”
As I reached the front door of the store, I reached out to ask for my goods.
“Rieul-ssi, is there any chance that the guest … was he a man in his 40s wearing a fishing vest?”
“Ah, yes, that’s him.”
Ki Yoohyun was looking at the bushes across from the store.
We don’t have to talk face to face, but why do you have to look over there? What is there?
“Does he have a scar on his face?”
“Umh … come to think of it, there was a scar….”
“When did you decide to try the new menu?”
“It’s in 7 days … what’s wrong?”
“I happen to have time that day, so I’d love to try Rieul-ssi’s new menu too.”
It’s weird. I’m sure he’s smiling, but why did I feel so cold?
***
The next day.
After waking up leisurely and eating breakfast, I went into the space to find a place to plant the sapling of the Purifying Tree.
It was narrow because of Yggdrasil that occupied most of this space, but if I look carefully, I will find a place to plant a tree.
“Ah, this will do.”
I looked inside this space and found the right place. Next to the field planted with Dungeon Sugarcanes, there was a perfect empty space for planting a tree.
I squatted down, dug up the soil with a shovel, and planted the sapling. I asked a question to Mieum, who was rolling around next to me, while gently covering the soil.
“You know, when someone becomes a Hunter, do they sometimes lose their humanity?”
What I was going to ask was about what Ki Yoohyun said yesterday.
“Hunters are often said to lack a bit of humanity.”
It was a calm and subdued voice, unlike his usual loose appearance. The refined tone strangely lingered on my mind.
“There’s no such thing!”
“Really?”
“Of course, some people may have different personalities, but it’s more like revealing one’s true nature when the poor get rich, or when the people at the bottom get power.”
“You mean it depends on someone’s personality?”
“Yeah, but….”
Mieum-ah, I get anxious when you blur your words like that.
“When you make a ‘contract’ with a Great Old One, if you sympathize with the Great Old One too much, you may lose your original self as a result of that influence.”
Uh, what did you just say? Suddenly, two unfamiliar words appeared.
“Who is the Great Old One?”
“Kiyaoo! Don’t you know that, it’s common sense!”
“I think you and I have a different range of common sense.”
“Do you think the Awakeneds can just use the skills? All are empowered by the Great Old Ones! Among them, there are cases where they give more special power to a contractor through a ‘contract‘, waeeong!”
“Hmm … so, is it an incredibly strong being that gives you power? Something like the one who works behind the scene or The Holy See?”
“Sometimes they call it that, waeeong!”
It looks pretty good just from the explanation.
“Can I do that too?”
It was only a question out of mild curiosity. However, Mieum and Lime became quiet at the same time.
“…….”
“…….”
“What’s the matter….?”
For a moment, there was only silence.
“Kkyuu! kkyuuuu!”
Lime began to cry with great force.
“Uh, huh, what?”
“Kkyuuuu! kkyuu! kkyuuu!”
It bounces its body and raised the volume of the cries. However, there were no words that I could understand other than ‘Kyuuu‘.
Sorry. Lime, I don’t know what you mean.
“Kyuuuu!”
I wish I have a slime translator.….
***
After gently covering the roots with soil with a seedling shovel and pouring the water from a plastic bottle, the planting of the Purifying Tree was completed.
The sun is warm, the wind blows gently, and the soil is moist. It will grow well here.
There was some space left next to it, so I moved the tooth carrot and planted it. It’s hard to keep what I received. No, I don’t want to keep it.
“Shush, shoo, shush, shoo, shush, shush, shush.”
Mom, the carrots make strange noises and cries….
It doesn’t matter if it grows well or not.
I checked the status window of the Purifying Tree right away.
However, there was one big problem.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
The quest name, Lady of the Children’s Heart is actually not a 100% correct translation (or at least, I’m not sure). It’s 동심여선, i’m not sure what’s that supposed to mean but 동심 is children’s heart and 여선 is related to female / women, so I translated it like that to suit the story. ISTG, I spent two hours to think about this one.
However, the 동심여선 here definitely refers to the epitaph of Bang Jeonghwan, a pioneer of Korean juvenile literature and a children’s rights activist, who led the establishment of Children’s Day in Korea. That’s the phrase that was written on his tombstone, taken from the Chinese character 童心如仙, meaning ‘a child’s heart is like freshness’.
Tiki-Taka (티키타카) derives from a football term. It refers to short quick passes to move the ball down the field. In conversation, it means back and forth. The conversation going well between you two as it’s going back and forth.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c52:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

His throat was burning. Choi Cedric burst out in anger.
“Then are you saying that you guys just sucking your fingers when Rona is in pain?”
“Oh, no! How could we? We’ve been using healing skills.”
“What about now?”

“I-I have run out of mana, so I can’t use it anymore….”
Choi Cedric grabbed the Healer’s neck before he could even finish speaking.
“What? Out of mana? Say it again.”
“Uh … Ugh.”
He knocked the Healer’s body to the floor. He grabbed his head with one hand and threw him to the floor. Although he did not use any special skills, the overwhelming status of an S-class Hunter was enough to put pressure on the Healer by itself.
Bugh! His body fell like a leaf.
Regardless of the pain, Choi Cedric gave strength to his grip.
“Uh… Ugh! Ugh!”
His neck fits tightly into the palm of Cedric’s hand. The Healer, who belatedly realized that he was holding his leash, trembled like an aspen.
“You say, ‘I can’t use my skills because my mana is low’. Then, is there any reason for you to stay here?”
Sheeng.
Choi Cedric drew his sword. The moment he saw that silver blade, the Healer turned white. Cut. This man is really thinking of cutting him.
“Ah … no, no. I can use … I-I will use….”
“What are you talking about?”
When he stood up again, the Healer’s face was a mess of blood and tears. He slapped his cheek with his hand, he was so nervous that he almost fainted.
He can’t use the skill at this rate. Swish. Choi Cedric threw the healer away. In turn, he spoke while looking at another Healer, who was shaking in the corner.
“You?”
“….Hick!”
“You can’t?”
“Huk, I-I will use it! I can do it!”
The agitated Healer reached out to Choi Rona and cast a skill. The previous skill use had already exhausted her mana to the bottom and she was dizzy, but there was no other way. If she doesn’t use her skill, she’ll end up like the other healer who fell to the floor.
“Uh … ugh, uhh, heugh!”
The white light from her fingertips swam through the air. However, the light of healing disappeared without being absorbed by Choi Rona as if it were blocked by something.
“Ugh … cough, cough!”
“Continue.”
Once again. One more time….
The Healer, who reached her limit, poured out her skills until she vomited blood, but there was no change. Choi Rona still looked in pain.
Choi Cedric looked at the figure quietly.
‘Useless things.’
He always thought about it when he was injured during battle in dungeon and got treated with healing skills. They’re useless.
No matter how badly injured he was, he healed quickly when he received the healing skill. Every time he saw the cuts that were deep enough to show the bones heal and the flesh fills in, Choi Cedric felt disgusted and couldn’t stand it.
He wanted to cure his sister’s illness instead of this insignificant injury, but they couldn’t save the only person he wanted to be healed.
‘If only I have that flower….’
Blue Celaeno flower. It was the only medicine that worked for his sister’s illness.
If only that flower could be saved, at least … he would be able to take away the pain that tormented Rona.
What are you dreaming about? Would you resent me for not being able to do anything in your dreams?
He didn’t cry. Choi Cedric looked at his sister’s thin face with dry eyes.
After a while, Choi Rona’s seizures stopped. he eyelids were still tightly closed,, but the screams and convulsions died down.
It was already midnight when he left the hospital room after wiping her wet forehead in cold sweat.
As he closed the door to her room carefully so as not to make a sound, someone approached him.
“I heard you had another fight?”
“….CEO-nim.”
It was Lee Sein, the CEO of C&L Corporation.
“I don’t mean to scold you to the extent of being angry. It was a bit noisy today.”
“I’m sorry….”
Choi Cedric drooped his shoulders as if a thorn had fallen out in front of Lee Sein. A bitter smile appeared on Lee Sein’s lips.
“How is Rona?”
“She’s a little bit better now.”
“I’m sorry. I was going to come back after hearing that she had another seizure, but the meeting is only over now.”
“It’s all right. Still, if you could come and see Rona next time….”
At that time, the secretary next to her called Lee Sein. A discreet but clear voice cuts off the conversation. It was a calculated soft invasion.
“CEO-nim, it’s time to go.”
“Really? Then, I’ve got to go. Cedric, I’m sorry. Let’s talk again later.”
“….Yes.”
Without hesitation, Lee Sein turned around.
Before following her, the secretary’s gaze rested on Choi Cedric’s face for a moment. Then, a faint smile stayed on his lips before melted away like a bubble.
Choi Cedric looked at his back as he moved away.
His name is Aeon. The strange face, whose gender and age are not clear, with the eyes adorning that face as if they are embedded with glass eyes, is emotionless.
A lot has changed with the advice that that secretary gave to Lee Sein.
Originally, Choi Cedric was introverted and timid. However, after he became an S-class hunter, he had to act arrogantly in front of others because what people want is an S-class appearance that is worthy of the strongest. A weak appearance is only a good weakness to be bitten. It would have been better to be arrogant and self-righteous.
That’s why he decided to hide the existence of the sick Choi Rona from the world. A melodramatic story doesn’t suit the Rankers. No one is curious about sad stories.
In the end, Choi Cedric became famous and admired.
But….
His younger sister suffers alone in a secret hospital room where no one comes to visit, and he can’t even show his sadness in front of others.
Is this really correct?
The answer to the question he posed alone is unknown. It was a noisy night.
***
What day is it today?
So, today is the day I meet celebrities.
“Ah!”
After the commotion at the farm, I left the farm with a sapling and a bundle of miscellaneous gifts. I was walking after getting off the subway at the nearest station to the Dungeon Gate when suddenly someone made a sound of surprise.
In front of me was a girl who looked roughly in her mid-teens.
“What are you doing there … Ah!”
A boy who looked the same appeared.
Do they happen to know me? But I have no memory of meeting these kids.
The twins, who were looking at me with their eyes wide open, were embarrassed and lowered their heads.
“Uwaa! I’m sorry. I surprised you.”
“I’m sorry!”
“No, that’s fine … have we met somewhere?”
“Our guild leader … oh, no, I mistook you for someone I knew.”
“Huh, hey, Joo Shinwoo! Gu … no, Hunter-nim, where did he go?”
“No way … did we miss him?!”
“….That way!”
Hurriedly, the twins ran towards the other side of the crosswalk. They were so fast that I couldn’t even follow their moves.
Only the sound of ‘I told you to watch him carefully, you idiot!’ came in the wind. They are noisy kids.
Are they sure they’re mistaking me for someone else? I think I’ve heard their voices somewhere.….
Well, I don’t know. It was just a moment when I stepped back to go back quickly.
A long shadow cast under the orange streetlight. I inadvertently lowered my head to the starting point of the shadow and was startled.
“……what are you doing there?”
The owner of the shadow was Ki Yoohyun.
Under the bright orange light, Ki Yoohyun answered with a troubled smile.
“Ahaha … It’s been a while.”
A blind spot on the wall that is hard to see from the other side, a pair of glasses to cover that gorgeous face (for reference, they’re not helpful at covering his face at all), and a black coat.
I’m starting to understand this situation….
Hasn’t something similar happened before? As I recalled, the twins I met earlier came back.
Ki Yoohyun hid himself in the dark to avoid the lights of the street lamps.
“Yoohyun-ssi?”
But the twins were faster. Running back and forth, they surrounded Ki Yoohyun back and forth and spoke.
“Gu … no, Hunter Ki Yoohyun-nim, you are here!”
“We won’t miss you anymore! Please calmly return to the guild.”
Could it be that Ki Yoohyun, this person, was trying to slack off and playing hide and seek with these cute little children?
“……”
“Rieul-ssi, I feel your eyes sting for some reason, is it just my imagination?”
“It’s not just your imagination.”
“….”
Then, the twins talked to me.
“We’re being rude earlier. Guild …  we were looking for Hunter Ki Yoohyun-nim.”
“Pardon us!”
 Same face, same jumper.
The girl with long curly hair looked relatively proud, and the boy with a short hair had a more lively atmosphere. They’re so cute. Then, they introduced themselves.
“My name is Joo Shinhee from Cheongna Guild.”
“I’m Joo Shinwoo!”
“You can call me Kwon Rieul. Please … huh?”
“What’s wrong?”
“No, it’s nothing. It’s not….”
The twin hunters of the Cheongna Guild?
I remember. I saw them in a video before my return.
As soon as they awakened, they’re a promising prospect who was selected for the main party ‘Blue Vines’ of Cheongna Guild.
The older sister, Joo Shinhee. An archer. Her specialty is an ice pick that targets the opponent’s heart. 
The younger brother, Joo Shinwoo. A wizard. His specialty is a curse that gnaws at the opponent.
The part that left an impression more strongly than their abilities was their facial expressions.
A pale, doll-like face that has erased all the innocence and vitality one would expect from a child. The coldness in their eyes. The motion of wiping the blood off the cheek looked cruel.
I blinked slowly and looked at them again. A lively, friendly boy and girl were looking up at me.
No wonder I didn’t immediately recognize them. I couldn’t connect them with the hideous appearances in my memory.
How do these cute kids change like that? 3 years is longer than I thought….
“It looks heavy.”
Ki Yoohyun suddenly talked to me, who was shocked by the future of the twins.
“No, it’s not heavy.”
The sapling of the Purifying Tree was about two spans long, so it was light enough to be held with one hand. Other than that, there is one bag filled with miscellaneous items that Lee Chorok gave me.
“It’s too much to carry alone.”
“Huh? But it’s not a lot?”
If it was heavy in the first place, I would have put it in my inventory to bring it. I don’t want to have a toothed carrot or something in my inventory, so I just walk with it.
However, Ki Yoohyun was firm.
“You’re on your way to the store, right? It’s heavy, so I’ll carry it for you.”
Ki Yoohyun, who didn’t listen to me at all, took the sapling and bag from my hands. This person is really…..
I don’t know exactly what happened, but the twins were chasing Ki Yoohyun.
So now, you’re using me as an excuse to get out of this situation….?
“Then, I have to help Rieul-ssi, so I’ll be on my way.”
“Eek, Gu … Hunter Ki Yoohyun-nim!”
Joo Shinhee quickly tried to catch Ki Yoohyun, but Joo Shinwoo pulled her back. Then, they put their heads together and whispered in the corner.
For your information, it was loud enough for a whisper, so I could hear half of it.
“You idiot! Did you forget what the deputy guild leader said?”“What is it, you idiot!”“The reason Hunter Ki Yoohyun-nim these days….”“Ah, aah…!”
“….?”
The twins glanced at me. The gazes are very passionate.
“Then, she’s the…!”“Yeah, now you understand the situation, you idiot!”“Who are you calling an idiot, you idiot! Then uh, what should I do? Should I call her with ‘unnie’?”“No, it’s too early to call her that. So we shouldn’t … it is imperative that ‥. do you understand?”“Joo Shinwoo, you’re saying something useful.”“This is nothing.”
Nod, nod. As if they had reached a dramatic agreement, the twins stood up and greeted me with the utmost respect.
“If that’s the case, there’s nothing we can do about it.We’ll be on our way.”
They bowed and turned around without hesitation.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c51:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“……Where am I?”
Snake vines in the front and sticky spatula that large enough to swallow people in the back.
I’m lost.
A few dozen minutes of wandering around trying to find a way out….
“I failed again….”

A melancholy murmur was heard from nearby. It was the voice of a young man.
Where is that sound coming from? I walked towards the side where the sound was heard.
Thank Goodness. I thought I was stuck in a greenhouse like this, but I can find someone and ask for a way out.
A voice of lamentation continued to be heard.
“Haa …. I failed again….”
The crying voice sounded like a gloomy ghost.
“What the hell should I do? In my power … it is not enough…….”
I was able to find the owner of the voice when I turned around in the direction of a large sticky spatula.
“I … why is it always like this.….”
A man was crouching on the floor, looking into a small pot. The flower in the pot was withered. The leaves are yellow and the stems are bent, and the petals are likely to fall off if touched incorrectly.
I don’t know what’s going on, but it looks like he’s difficult to talk to. I tried to back off a little bit.
Rustling.
“……!”
The man, surprised by the sound of my footsteps, raised his head.
As his white cheeks grew redder, he spoke in a voice that couldn’t hide his embarrassment.
“Yo-you, how did you get in here? Haven’t you heard that no one is allowed to come in?”
“I didn’t know about it?”
He looks about the same age as me, but why is he talking informally from the beginning? Naturally, I became short-spoken.
“……! There, it says don’t come in.”
“But there is not?”
“What? Do you have a problem with your eyes? It clearly said no entry here! Eh?”
There was only a piece of white paper attached to the place the man pointed to. A white paper with nothing written on it.
The man took the paper and checked it. On the back, it says ‘No Entry‘.
… You put it upside down. So, obviously I can’t see it.
The bewildered man spoke again in a sulky voice.
“Ehem! Anyway, I’m busy right now, so go away.”
“I have a question … Ah.”
Pretending to be a grown-up, he flipped his hair over to reveal his forehead. However, the cheeks that were still young, the eyes without double eyelids, and the slightly raised eyes were familiar. It looked like a face I had seen somewhere, and I immediately remembered who this man was.
The No. 2 in ranking, Hunter Choi Cedric.
An S-class swordsman who is the representative Hunter of C&L Corporation, one of the Big Three guilds. It was natural that he looked familiar because he appeared in so many media outlets, contrary to the No. 1 ranker, which is almost underwater.
The last thing I remember is…….
“It’s too late for the Healer to heal now. While the swordsman catches the monster himself, what if the Hunter who only heals in the back can’t heal properly?” “Oh, tell me again. The healing can’t be done? What? I’m out of the healing range? Aren’t healers supposed to chase after me on their own? After all, you all get money thanks to our guild.”
It was a personality controversy….
It was noisy for a while because the large bomb was detonated on a live broadcast that could not be edited. The Healer professional guild ‘Garden of Blessing‘ stood up with a promise to boycott Choi Cedric.
In the end, it ended with Choi Cedric apologizing publicly, but it became controversial again, saying that the apology was not sincere.
In other words, a ranker who is known for his personality controversy as well as his skills and fame.
To see such a famous hunter here … it’s really a small world.
In the meantime, I’m stuck in the memories for a while.
“Ah, yes, yes, I see.”
“What?”
Choi Cedric suddenly ripped open the ‘No Entry‘ paper, scribbled something on the back, and held it out.
“Here! My autograph! I signed it, so go now.”
“No, I don’t need it.”
I’m not really a fan, so what’s the use of a Hunter’s autograph to me? It was also signed on the back side with tape marks.
But he seemed to interpret my words in a different way.
“What? Do you want to take a picture with me? Well … yeah, I originally can’t, but I’m in a mood today. Take this and go quickly. I am someone with a private life too.”
Click.
Without giving me a moment to say anything, he snatched my phone, took a selfie, corrected it meticulously, and returned it.
“No … not this, I was going to ask you how to get out of here.”
“……!”
Choi Cedric’s cheeks slowly flushed.
“Hey! Yo-you should’ve said that in the first place! I, I thought you were a fan who came all the way here again!”
I tried to tell him. It’s him who made a fuss.
“But what’s that flower?”
I pointed to the withered flower in the pot.
“….it’s just flowers. Now go. The exit is over there.”
For ‘just a flower’, you looked at it with a depressed expression earlier…..
“You said, my power is not enough, so what should I do?”
Choi Cedric must be a type of person who turns red quickly.
“You, you, you! You secretly listen to people talking to themselves!”
“I didn’t hear it secretly, since you were talking to yourself in front of the road I was passing through.”
“……!”
“Anyway, what’s this flower?”
In a greenhouse full of flowers that look like a human head, vines with snakes, and sticky spatulas big enough to eat humans, this flower just withers and looks quite ordinary.
However, the delicate soft blue petals somehow bothered me.
“Don’t be interested! It’s a very precious flower. It’s not something anyone can get.”
That very precious flower is dying….
It was a moment when I wanted to ask more about the flower.
“Customer-nim! Where are you in now? The sapling is ready. You didn’t come close to the dungeon spatula, did you? Customer-nim! The Dungeon Sticky Spatula is very cute, but you can be eaten if you touch it!”
“This way!”
Lee Chorok found me and approached me at a fast pace, but she was surprised to see Choi Cedric.
“Huuu, haa, Customer-nim, you are here! Here, the sapling of the Purifying Tree you purchased … Huuk, why is Hunter Choi Cedric here? … Don’t tell me you’ve done something to Customer-nim?!”
“What? How do you see me?”
“You said you’d kill me like this before.”
“…….”
Perhaps he noticed the silent contempt in my gaze, Choi Cedric hastily added.
“That’s …! It’s because you say it’s hard to save this flower……!”
“Anyway, you can’t do that. She’s my first customer in months.”
Is this place okay.….
Ringing.
Then, Choi Cedric’s phone vibrated long.
“……! I’m going.”
Choi Cedric, who was going to say something to Lee Chorok, went out of the greenhouse as soon as he checked the name on the phone screen. It seems to be an urgent call.
“Why is he here?”
“No way, gosh, Customer-nim, what happened? That Hunter is a bit nasty, has a bad temper, and has a very poor attitude, but he’s not a bad person … at least I don’t think so, and it’s not like I can’t say no … that’s it.”
Lee Chorok, who said so, looked pale as if she had recalled even a bad memory.
“It doesn’t matter what happened … what is this flower?”
“Oh, you were watching this. It’s a flower called the Blue Celaeno flower.”
As soon as I heard the name, a status window appeared in front of me.
[Item: Blue Celaeno Flower (★★★★★)A legendary flower that is said to contain the starlight of Celaeno.Note: Withered.]
5 stars…..?
I was surprised to see that the grade of an ordinary-looking flower was 5 stars.
“This flowerpot was entrusted to me by Hunter Choi Cedric.”
According to Lee Chorok, this was the case.
Blue Celaeno Flowers are not only very rare but they are also very difficult to bloom.
One day, Hunter Choi Cedric brought the seeds of this flower and asked her to make the flowers bloom at any cost. Lee Chorok accepted the job on the pride of a botanist. … Rather than that, it seemed that the money offered by Choi Cedric was too large to refuse.
“But … the ether content of the soil needs to be controlled very delicately. I’ve been trying it for months now, and it’s not working.”
“It’s such a rare flower, can it be a high-quality item material?”
“It’s not like that…….”
Lee Chorok clouded the end of the sentence. She seemed hesitant to say this. Then, she carefully added the backstory.
“Hunter Choi Cedric’s younger sister has a rare disease. It’s a disease where the flow of ether in the body gets tangled, so it’s very painful … there is currently no cure. But only this flower, the Blue Celaeno Flower, is said to the relieve pain.”
“Ah….”
That’s what happened. I felt a little sorry.
I searched the name of the flower on the Ether-Wiki to see if there was any information.
[Checking your eligibilities … Completed.][The Eligible: Verifying Kwon Rieul…..]
‘Skip.’
[No results were found for your search.]
…………..
That’s right. It’s not helpful when I really need it.
If that’s the case, I wish I could find a way.
***
Choi Cedric, who left the farm, headed straight to the headquarters of C&L Corporation, his guild.
“Hunter-nim, I will help you to verify your identity.”
“Get lost!”
Choi Cedric ignored the security guard’s restraint and went straight through the entrance. The beep beep sounds were heard, but he didn’t care.
The security guard was perplexed, but didn’t catch him.This is because there was no one here who didn’t know who he was just by looking at his face. However, with an angry expression, he simply dismissed the security warning notification.
There is no room for hasty steps. He immediately got on the private elevator and got off on the top floor.
The top floor, which was accessible to only a few people, had a bleak atmosphere.
A secret door appears when you touch a specific location on a white wall with no decorations. After confirming the Hunter license, the door opens, and you must repeat the same process after passing the connecting hallway to enter the hidden area.
As soon as he walked through the door, he could smell the medicine. The smell of disinfectant … and the smell of pain and death.
Choi Cedric approached at a quick pace and opened the innermost door.
“….Rona-ya!”
Beyond the door was a room decorated like a hospital room. On the bed was a skinny little girl asleep.
No, you can call it sleep.
The girl’s sleep is full of pain and fear, not rest and comfort. She screams in fever and pain, but her mind is trapped and she cannot wake up.
She is the only younger sister of Choi Cedric, who suffered from a rare disease three years ago and was unable to open her eyes.
And now the girl is having a seizure.
“Uh … ugh, hugh……. uh, aaaaagh! agh! ugh, hugh!”
Screams filled the room. Choi Cedric quickly ran to the bedside.
“Rona-ya! Oppa is here. It must be really hard. Rona-ya….”
But no answer is returned. The girl could only continue to let out a moan of pain.
Choi Cedric turned to the healers who were waiting next to him.
“Why don’t you treat her?”
“Well … that…….”
The healer blurted out the end of their words at the sudden question.
“As you know, even if we use healing skills, it’s …. there is no improvement.”
It was true.
The two healers in the hospital room are the best healers in Korea, with the exception of Kwon Jiwoon of the White Silver Guild. He took the blame for monopolizing the top healers and paid a huge amount to hire them.
However, it was impossible to relieve Choi Rona’s pain no matter how many healing skills they poured. This is because the rare disease rejects all skills and potions.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c50:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Choi Yichan said that while he was running, he bought some fruit at a stall. Fortunately, he had received the flyer and handed it to me.
[Happy Green Life Fruit ShopDirect Delivery/Courier Service available※ Free shipping over ₩30,000010-xxxx-xxxx]
The name is a bit unusual, but it looks like an ordinary fruit shop advertisement….
Is there such a thing as the Purifying Tree in a place like this? Let’s go and see.

I thought it was a tree growing in the dungeon, of course, because the system wanted to throw me into the dungeon whenever there was a chance, but was it actually possible to buy it at a fruit shop?
However, perhaps because the flyer was made from recycled back paper, a completely different contents were printed on the back.
I was about to take notes of the phone number and fold the flyer, but when I saw the back, I was startled.
[Happy Green Life Dungeon FarmDungeon Plant Cultivation/Sales Specialist※ Dungeon Management Office Authorized Designated Company※ a PhD in Dungeon Botany※ Dungeon Plant Experience Farm is operated.010-xxxx-xxxx]
Yes, I should go to this farm.
The moment I saw the name of the farm, I suddenly remembered something that happened before the regression.
It was a story from a TV show. It’s the story of a botanist who is fascinated by the plant ecosystem of Dungeon. After awakening, she threw everything away and only immersed herself in researching dungeon plants.
It may seem somewhat vague to say this, but the actual broadcast treated her like a ‘Martian‘ or a ‘Venusian‘.
In short, she was treated like a freak.
It wasn’t a very interesting subject, but I was sucked into it with proper trailer fishing and provocative editing and watched it until the end.
It was something like this….
[▶▶]
This is the Hunter Market’s consignment shop area where numerous items are traded.It’s crowded with hunters who want to buy items at low prices, but the Venusian is interested elsewhere.The Venusian who scanned the surroundings quickly stopped at one place.“How much is this?”What the Venusian pointed to is … a seed?
“What did you just buy?”“Dungeon arrowroot, Green Etheric Toothed Carrot Seed.”“It … Isn’t that a plant monster?”“No. They’re often mistaken for monsters, but they’re all ordinary plants.”A Venusian who calls carrots with sharp teeth an ordinary plant.
The place where she headed with the seeds of the monster is home to the Venusian.“What are you doing with these monster seeds?”“Of course I’m going to grow it.”You raise a plant monster?
The Venusian takes the frightened PD Kim to the greenhouse.“This place has the same ether, temperature, and humidity as inside the dungeon. Any dungeon plant can grow perfectly here.”It’s filled with toothed carrot and orchids with blades like razor.
“Isn’t it creepy to see them like this?”“Fufu, aren’t they cute?”“What are the benefits of growing this?”Does it have any special effect? PD Kim, who claimed that he’s not in good health due to continuous overtime work these days, is interested.“Yeah? Can’t I just grow them? They’re cute.”“Aren’t you afraid?”
A Venusian who pours etheric water into a flowerpot and takes care of them with care.One of them has finally bloomed.“I worked really hard to grow this.”Ugh, this is a flower?“It seems to resemble …. human head.”“It’s called a hair flower. Look. Isn’t it pretty? Touch it.”PD Kim carefully stretches out his hand.Kwak!“Argh! Aaaaah! It bit me!”Crack!“Argh! Let go of me! Save me!”
[▶∥]
…….
The last scene was the PD running away with his hand bitten by a flower that resembles a human head.
After that, they were criticized a lot for promoting the Dungeon Farm, and eventually, the “Secret of the Venusians” program, which introduces unique hunters, ended.
It was obvious that this Happy Green Life Dungeon Farm was on the program.
‘It’s a place where human hair flower is grown, so it’s not strange to have a Purifying Tree too.’
But I remember that this farm was closed later … it must have been a big event because it was a hot topic, but what was it?
Well, I can’t remember the reason for the closing.
Anyway, it looks like it’s still open, and I got a hint, so let’s go check it out.
***
In front of an ordinary apartment complex. Happy Green Life Fruit Shop was there.
“How much is a basket of apples here?”
“Five thousand won.”
The stall was quite crowded with customers looking to buy fruits on their way home from work. I approached the owner, who was holding fruit in a plastic bag with an indifferent look on her face, and spoke to her.
“Excuse me, where should I go to get to Happy Green Life Dungeon Farm?”
This is because there was no farm around the fruit stall. The address written on the flyer is here for sure….
“Go that way.”
The fruit shop owner pointed to a certain place. It was a bonus to see all kinds of unusual people.
As I turned my head, I saw a signboard saying ‘Farm’ in a position that seemed to be covered by bushes, next to the narrow path leading to the mountain behind.
“Ugh….”
The joy of finally finding it is for a momentarily.
As soon as I entered the trail, I could feel the hot air. In addition, toothed carrots and razor-blades orchids were grown on both sides, creating a very eerie atmosphere.
Shush, shoo, shush, shush…..
There seems to be a strange noise coming from somewhere….
If I had known it would be like this, I would have come with Choi Yichan. I regretted belatedly that I said I would go alone because I could go in vain.
I climbed up the creaking stairs and went into the farm. The stifling air was full of unique smells and questionable plants, but I didn’t feel any sign of human’s activities.
“Excuse me, is there anyone here?”
There is no answer.
“Nobody here? I’d like to buy something.”
Is there no one here? The moment I’m thinking about going back disappointed.
Dudangtang!
There was a sound of something collapsing inside, and then a person rushed out.
“Uh, yes, what’s up? I paid the electricity bill last week.. The electricity really shouldn’t be cut off, but if you could wait a few more days … are you not here to collect the electricity bill?”
“Yes, I’m looking for some saplings.”
“Huk, are you a customer? Are you a guest? A visitor other than that filthy hunter … it’s the first time in a month, no, the first time in two months? Come this way, please come this way!”
The owner of the farm was almost the same as what I saw her on the broadcast before regression.
Only the lower part of her long hair was dyed green, and she wore a green jacket over a green satin skirt over her light green shirt. She wore green horn-rimmed glasses. It’s a clear concept-specific outfit….
Obviously the name….
“My name is Lee Chorok, the owner of this place. I’m a botanist. What are you looking for?”
Yeah, it was Chorok. Even the name matches.
“We are different from similar companies. You can choose the dungeon plant that is right for you, recommended by a Ph.D. holder through a scientific method. If you trust me, I will do my best to serve you.”
The leaflet given by Lee Chorok said, “Recommendation of Dungeon Plants by Blood Type” and “Today’s Fortune UP, Lucky Color Plants by Constellation”.
It has nothing to do with science.….
But from what she just said, it seems that there have been no customers for two months, is it really okay here?
Anyway, after returning the pseudo-science flyer, I took out the leaf of the purifying that had been in the bag with the fruit.
“I’m looking for this tree.”
As soon as Lee Chorok saw the leaf, she recognized what it was.
“Ah! It’s a Purifying Tree. There is a lot of fine dust these days. As the name suggests, the Purifying Tree has the effect of purifying the air, so it is recommended as a horticultural plant for home use. Just in time, there is a sapling that’s been airlifted from the C-grade dungeon … shall I show you?”
It was an eye full of anticipation and desperate sales.
When I nodded, Lee Chorok quickly led me to the sapling.
[Item: Sapling of the Purifying Trees (★☆☆☆☆)Type: SaplingThe sapling of a young Purifying Tree. When planted, it gives off a delicate floral scent.]
The name of the status window is definitely Purifying Tree. I didn’t expect it to be so easy to find. The thought that this quest would be finished easily made me smile.
“How much is it?”
“It just so happens to be on sale! We are offering it for only 50 rubies at a special sale price.”
“….Eh.”
It’s more expensive than I thought.
I counted the rubies left in my inventory. Excluding the store sales, I spent 70 of them to buy various materials from the 100 I got from the last quest. Of those, 50 are almost all of them.
“Umh….”
Let’s go back and think about it slowly. There is no law that says you have to buy it now, and if you do well, you might be able to get it elsewhere.
“I’ll think about it more and come back.”
However, this dungeon botanist, Lee Chorok, seemed hesitant and quickly started adding options. It was formidable agility.
“Customer-nim! It’s not an easy tree to get. In some C-grade dungeons, it can only grow when the ether contained in the soil is biased towards the water attribute. It also has excellent air purification ability.”
“It’s a bit pricey though….”
“If you buy it now, we also provide an ether-fertilizer set for fast growth, a dedicated watering can, and gardening scissors as a bonus!”
“Well….”
“The first and second book of Growing Dungeon Plants that even elementary school students can understand is also included!”
On the cover with toothed carrots and hair flowers, ‘Author: Lee Chorok’ was written. It was like a self-published book.
“I’ll also give you two roots of toothed carrots! Absolutely special price! Great service!”
“No, that’s fine.”
Just the thought of a carrot with teeth gave me nightmares.
“I opened this farm with a pool of bank loans, and it’s been two months. … there was no customer but one strange hunter. They are all precious trees that I airlifted from the dungeon and raised.”
Yeah … I wouldn’t buy dungeon plants unless I had my own reasons.
“Electricity and water bills have been delayed for several months. If business doesn’t go like this … my sister, ah, she is the owner of the fruit shop in front of this farm. My sister said she would turn this place into a fruit shop.”
The fruit shop seems to be doing well.
“Ah, if this tree sapling doesn’t sell … I’ll die here alone like dust with the trees….”
An incredibly burdensome look swept over me.
The ability to erase the debt of mind was no joke. It was really hard to say ‘I’ll buy it next time‘ in front of those mournful eyes and sad TMI.
Well, it’s true that I need a Purifying Tree, and I got a lot of extra money, so I’ll just buy it.
“Then … I’ll buy it, give me this.”
“Please think of saving me, huk! Yes? Re-really? Are you buying this?”
Lee Chorok, who was squeezing tears with a sad expression, was pleased with my words.
“Huk, wait a minute. Right! While you wait, please take a look at the greenhouse.”
“No, I’m fine.”
“This way! You can look at it comfortably.”
Lee Chorok pushed me into the greenhouse of the farm and soon disappeared, saying that she will pack the sapling and miscellaneous items.
I shouted, “Please take out the carrots”, but it doesn’t seem to be heard. Basically, she seemed to have a personality that didn’t listen well to others.
A greenhouse full of strange-looking plants unfolded before my eyes.
It’s a little scary, but …. since it’s been a while, let’s take a look around.
‘If I don’t touch a human head flower, I’ll be fine.’
But I soon regretted this decision.
[Next]
