SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c49:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“……!”
The customer looked surprised for a moment, then answered with a cautious tone.
“It’s not like that.”
However, there was still nearly half of the iced Americano in the glass, and the overhead bar was not fully filled.
“If you don’t like it, I would like to offer you a different menu.”

When she asked again, the customer added an explanation.
“This menu is very delicious. It’s just that I don’t normally drink coffee.”
……Ah. A slow enlightenment flashed through my mind.
He can’t drink coffee. It was natural that this customer ordered the same menu every day. After all, coffee was the only thing on the menu.
No matter how special coffee is made with the ‘Cafe in My Hand’ skill, there is nothing that can be done about taste and constitution.
Some might say this.
“It’s because you haven’t drunk a real delicious coffee!”.
No, the taste of “real delicious coffee” is just not that person’s cup of tea.
A cafe must have a menu other than coffee for customers who can’t drink coffee. I was busy making the menu in the quest, so I didn’t think about it.
Anyway, this customer is ordering without complaints, but the light bar that only filled up to half was annoying to my eyes.
Yeah, I made up my mind. Let’s make a non-coffee menu.
“Next time … we plan to make a new menu other than coffee, you’ll be able to eat it on your next visit.”
“……!”
Perhaps because I suddenly brought up a new menu, the customer looked surprised.
“When should I come?”
Uh, when? I didn’t think about the date….
It’ll be fine in a few days. When I pointed out the appropriate date of next week, the customer nodded carefully.
As soon as a customer left the store after saying he would come that day, a system notification appeared in front of me.
[A quest has occurred.]
[Quest: Complete the non-coffee menu (0/1) begins.]
***
“Hua … Huahahahaha…..!”
As soon as he left the door of Cafe Rieul, Kim Taewoon couldn’t resist his joy and burst into laughter.
Done. It was worthwhile to go in and out of the cafe pretending to be an ordinary customer for several days.
Order the same menu several times at the same time. Finally, he got a clue to the illegal monster secret trade.
There will be a big deal in their hideout in a few days.It’s a smuggling of the rare monster, a long-tailed phoenix.
It was the news delivered by Kim Taewoon’s secret information, who had given a considerable amount of money, alcohol, and food by him.
But it was just that, and he couldn’t figure out exactly how the deal was done.
The only clue was here at Cafe Rieul. There must have been a clue here to participate in the deal.
No matter how much he looked at the situation for several days, there was no result, but Kim Taewoon did not give in. A true journalist must have his own sparkle and persistence.
He believed in his senses. That’s why he ate butter cookies and iced Americano every day.
And finally, today.
When the S-class Hunter Choi Yichan was away, the cafe owner secretly asked if the menu didn’t suit his taste for the first time.
Kim Taewoon was surprised, but soon regained his composure.
It was clear that this question was a test for the trading deal. Otherwise, then why would they suddenly ask what the menu he likes? He doesn’t like coffee, but he’s been drinking it all to avoid suspicion.
He carefully chose his words and answered calmly.
“It’s not like that.”
The cafe owner, with a surprised expression on her face, asked him to visit again.
The date she specified is …  It was the same as the date of the smuggling trade, as stated by the secret informant.
Done. He finally found a clue. If he digs this up properly, he can get a scoop.
Like that, Kim Taewoon left Cafe Rieul with a light step. without even realizing that he had made a ridiculous misunderstanding.
***
[Sub Quest: Satisfy The Customer]People have different tastes.Create a special non-coffee menu that satisfies even the customers who don’t like coffee.Deliver Non-Coffee Menu to Customer: 0/1
Rewards: Experience (100 EXP), 1 Golden Ticket, Fame (5), Popularity (10)]
When I read the new quest, it was not particularly difficult.
Hot chocolate, tea, fruit juice, etc. There are many kinds of cafe drinks other than coffee. I would be able to create one of them.
However, under the quest window, a small letter in the size of 3pt caught my eye.
“Ugh….”
[※ Note: Do not use ordinary drinks. Create a special drink according to the recipe.]
………………………
That’s right. It was obvious that this system did not allow me to be comfortable. Nothing was going to be easy.
The problem is that all the recipes I have now are coffee. There is no quest to get a new recipe. I opened the recipe window to see if there was any new information and looked around.
At that time.
[You have acquired information about a new recipe with a high level of curiosity.][You have acquired a new recipe ‘Lemonade’.]
“Huh?”
I didn’t do anything, but I suddenly got a recipe?
What kind of system is this.….
It was a bit uncomfortable because they gave me a recipe all of a sudden. But now that this notification popped up, it means that I have to make lemonade to complete the quest.
However, there were words written in the recipe details that I couldn’t understand.
[Recipe: LemonadeIngredients: Purifying Tree’s Fruit, Magic Sugar, Sparkling Water]
“……?”
Can I call a drink that doesn’t contain lemons lemonade.…?
Aside from the question of the essence of lemonade, what is a Purifying Tree? Judging from the name, it looks like a tree.
“A tree with the power to purify the unclean, meow! The fruit is very refreshing.”
“Really? Then where can we get that Purifyng Tree?”
“That … meooong……”
I shouldn’t have asked. Perhaps she felt my pitiful gaze, Mieum puffed up the hair on her tail and flew her front paws. This time, I received a good reception.
“Do you think I’m an encyclopedia! Let’s look up the encyclopedia! Meoong!”
“Encyclopedia”?
Was there something like that?
“Don’t tell me you forgot! Meooong!”
That’s right. Come to think of it, the system has an encyclopedia function. It was of little use, so I completely forgot about it.
I dodged a flying meow punch and connected to the Ether-Wiki.
[Checking your eligibilities … Completed.][The Eligible: Verifying Kwon Rieul…..]
‘Skip.’
I skipped the string that was listed in a row, and searched for the item “Fruit of Purifying Tree“.
《Fruit of the Purifying Tree》Type: Plant>FruitDescription: A fruit from the branch of a Purifying Tree that has the power to purify unclean things. It tastes sour and fresh.How to get:███ ████ ██ █…………………..
Fortunately, the item was open, but the way to get it was painted black and could not be read. Then where should I get the information? Should I just ask people around me one by one?
What’s with all these annoying quests? Should i just quit?
At the time when I was drowning in trouble, Choi Yichan returned.
“Yichan-ah, you’re a little late …. uh, what’s that?”
There was a large plastic bag in Choi Yichan’s hand, who said that he had lost all his strength by running.
“Haha … I bought it on the way here.”
When I opened it, it was fruit. It was a considerable amount because it was full of apples, pears, and bananas.
“On the way? From where?”
It’s impossible to find a fruit shop near Dungeon Gate 3, which doesn’t even have a convenience store.
“That’s, haha … it just happened.”
Hopefully he wasn’t forced to buy it…..
Anyway, there were a lot of fresh fruits, so I decided to put aside the worries about the quest and eat it right away. It was just when I was hungry, and I don’t think the answer will come out just by thinking about it.
“I will cut it.”
After taking out the plate and fruit knife, Choi Yichan first began to peel the apple. However, the attempt soon ended in failure.
“…..Ah.”
This was because the apple was broken into small pieces in Choi Yichan’s grasp. I took the knife from Choi Yichan.
“Cheer up, I’ll cut it.”
“I’m sorry, I’m…….”
“I just wanted apple juice, and that’s good.”
Choi Yichan was still having trouble controlling his strength. He’s better than before, but he still broke my coffee cup once in five times. Even an S-class hunter has many inconveniences.
He said that the progress of finding a new house to live in was very slow, as he has to find a place with strict security.
It’s me who lived alone even before the regression, so it’s nice to be able to meet friends like this every day.
I cut the apple and put it on the plate. When I tried one piece, it was well-riped, so it tasted deliciously sweet and sour. After sharing it with Mieum and Lime, we sat down together for a while and ate apples.
Sitting down like this and eating apples suddenly reminded me of the old days.
Before regression, before starting to live alone, I lived with Kwon Jiwoon. Kwon Jiwoon had not yet awakened, and we had a good relationship.
At that time, I couldn’t cut the apples, so Kwon Jiwoon used to cut them for me instead. Half of the apple, which he had cut for a while, would belong to Kwon Jiwoon.
‘There was a time like that….’
Until Kwon Jiwoon awakened.
A lot has changed since his awakening. I couldn’t adapt to the changed environment, and I thought Kwon Jiwoon, who suddenly became the leader of the guild, must had gone through a lot of things too.
As Kwon Jiwoon became busy, I naturally spent more time alone at home. When I wast left in an empty house, all kinds of negative emotions flooded in. Am I bothering my brother? Why aren’t my parents and grandmother there? Such unanswered questions rushed in.
I thought it would be better to live alone, so I decided to live alone after entering college. However, I still could not meet Kwon Jiwoon until the day of the move.
“Isn’t Kwon Jiwoon here? I am moving today.”“He’s busy right now. I’ll deliver it to him.”“But if I could just talk to him for a second…..”“Kwon Rieul-ssi, do you not understand what I’m saying? The deputy guild leader is busy.”“…..”
Time passed with only some things deviated like that … and it ended with an absurd death.
However, this time, the future has changed in many ways because of the regression. Choi Yichan, who should have been dead in the past, is eating an apple in front of me.
Then, will it be possible to change the relationship with Kwon Jiwoon?
No, let’s stop. What’s the point of thinking like this? It’s not uncommon for cousins to be estranged from each other. I just felt dull for no reason
Shall we cut a pear this time and eat it?
“Yichan-ah, would you like to eat a pear too?”
“Oh? That’s nice.”
I was rummaging through the plastic bag to choose a ripe pear, and the leaves came out from inside.
“……? What is this?”
On the surface, they are just plain green leaves.
Did the leaves get mixed in the plastic bag? I shook the leaves with my hands, and suddenly the system window popped up.
[Skill: The Barista’s Eyes (D) is used.]
[Item: Leaf of the Purifying Tree (★☆☆☆☆)Type: LeafThe leaf of the Purifying Tree. It smells good, but you can’t eat it as is.]
What? Suddenly?
“Yichan-ah.”
“Huh, what’s wrong?”
“Where did you buy this fruit?”

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c48:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

A red brick building built on a deserted road.
There was a man watching the cafe located 3 minutes away from the Dungeon Gate of the Great Dungeon Abyss.
His age is early 40’s. The recorder and camera were hidden in a vest with several pockets. There were also a cannon phone and a fake ID in his bag.
Due to frequent overtime work, the area under his eyes were dark and the beard grew jagged on his chin. There’s also a peculiar scar on his forehead.

However, only his eyes were gleaming as he looked around.
‘It must be there.’
The man’s name is Kim Taewoon. 42 years old, single. His occupation is a reporter for the weekly magazine Hunter Scope.
Hunter Scope is famous for its Hunter paparazzi, groundless rumors, and gibberish gossip. It is a weekly magazine that cannot be said to be high quality information source.
Kim Taewoon also made money by covering such frivolous rumors. He receives money and writes articles that the client wants. It’s a standard and exemplary giraegi. When it comes to money, the ethics of journalists are not taken into account.
However, not long ago, an ugly rumor came into Kim Taewoon’s ear. Some guilds smuggle special monsters from dungeons.
At that moment, his reporter’s hunch shone. This is a big deal. If he digs this properly, he can get rid of the stigma of being a yellow press journalist.
…. or he can rip off a generous sum of money by keeping his mouth shut.
The news he heard while investigating the rumors one by one was the birth of a new S-class Hunter.
Now that everyone is curious about this sacred S-class, the coverage is a race of speed. Kim Taewoon immediately began investigating Choi Yichan by all means.
And he found out that the Hunter went to and from the cafe in front of that dungeon gate every day. Paparazzi, no, it was the result of a field investigation.
‘Well, it’s worth stepping back.’
Anyway. The fact that an S-class hunter was suddenly doing a part-time job at a cafe, not doing anything else, gave off a strange smell.
S-class! There are fewer than ten S-class hunters in Korea. Whatever you do, you will make more money than that.
An S-class hunter who wants neither money nor power?
‘There can be no such thing. I’m sure he’ll do something bad in the back.’
Kim Taewoon himself is an F-class hunter. The darkness of the Hunter industry has been deeply affected him. In addition, due to his long career as a journalist, he has become a cynical person who does not believe in human goodness.
His long-forged, sharp sense of a reporter shone.
Come to think of it, there were reports that the smugglers were using cafes and shops as a hideout. There was also information that a fairly high-ranking Hunter was behind them, so they couldn’t easily dig it up. While following Choi Yichan, he once found a suspicious person. Unfortunately, he missed it.
Each piece of information seems far apart at the first glance, but when you put them side by side, they pointed to one answer.
If it’s big enough for an S-class hunter to move directly, it must be a smuggling of a rare monster, the ‘Long-tailed Phoenix‘.
Yes, that place is definitely the hangout of the smugglers.
So, Kim Taewoon was currently in the process of infiltrating Cafe Rieul.
Choi Yichan just went into the cafe. Clearly, there must be something in that place.
‘Damn it … I can’t see what’s going on inside.’
He hid himself in a close spot, but Choi Yichan can’t be seen because he was covered by an exquisite angle.
The secret camera and recorder, which are artifacts for coverage, are always useless at times like this.
“…..”
“…..”
He waited for a long time, but there was no news from inside.
Gulp.
Kim Taewoon raised his body. 
You can’t rely solely on these artifacts to catch the scoop. A journalist is a person who runs on his own feet.
‘That’s a cafe … in that case.’
It would be natural to approach it by pretending to be a customer.
Kim Taewoon approached the cafe, pretending to be an ordinary customer.
Ring. The bell hanging on the door rang to announce the arrival.
“….”
But the moment he entered, an awkward silence fell. A pair of careful eyes glanced over him.
‘Bingo.’
As expected. It looks like an ordinary cafe, but it’s fake. It’s a space with a different purpose, so they’re wary of new customer.
Sometimes a lie is more plausible than the truth. Kim Taewoon could not have guessed the truth that Rieul was only thrilled because he was the first (not an acquaintance) guest who came on the opening day.
With a natural step, he opened the door and looked through the menu.
“Ah, welcome!”
Quickly, the owner of the cafe approached the counter. She was a woman with a soft impression and a normal atmosphere.
Huh, this kind of person was involved in illegal monster smuggling in the shadows. Kim Taewoon’s eyes became sharp.
“Would you like to order?”
“Then, I’ll have this.”
Kim Taewoon pointed to any menu on the menu board.
What’s unusual is that the price is set in ruby. Maybe it’s some kind of password.
The S-class hunter, Choi Yichan, was sitting alone in a seat near the counter. Kim Taewoon looked at him carefully. After all, he intended to investigate him by pretending to be an ordinary customer.
After paying 2 rubies without hesitation and sitting down, the menu came out soon. It was an iced Americano and cookies.
He didn’t really want to eat it, but he could feel the owner’s gaze from behind.
“…..!”
When their eyes met, she turned her head and avoided. No matter how you look at it, there is a hint of doubt about this. If he doesn’t eat, he will look suspicious.
“Mmm….”
Kim Taewoon first took the butter cookie. The sweet smell of sugar and butter made his stomach hungry. Come to think of it, he skipped lunch. As if attracted by the smell, he took a bite of the cookie.
Crispy.
The cookie with plenty of sugar and butter melted softly in his mouth.
Once he ate, he couldn’t stop his hands. As the sweetness filled his mouth, he took a sip of the iced Americano. Originally, he didn’t like coffee very much, but it went well with these cookies.
One bite of a cookie, another sip of coffee.
The empty stomach filled up and the head calmed down. The migraine that had always bothered him has subsided. Feeling sad that the cookie plate was empty, he raised his head.
“……!”
Before he knew it, Choi Yichan had disappeared. He was also meticulous to leave without any noise.
‘Shh, I missed it.’
Kim Taewoon thought as he bit his tongue in frustration.
Then, he’ll have to come back tomorrow.
He couldn’t figure out which one was greater: the regret of the loss or the joy of eating these cookies again.
***
On the first day of Cafe Rieul, I was very happy.
That’s because a customer came to the cafe. It’s not someone I know, but a “real customer”.
It was a man in his 40s wearing a fishing vest and a field jumper over it. It’s obvious that he’s passing by and he’s like, “Huh? There’s a cafe here. Shall I take a short break?”. He’s that kind of customer!
As expected, thanks to the signboard, the cafe seems to have stood out.
I was excited to finally have a first customer.
“Waeoooong (When did you say that you didn’t want to work hard)?”
“That’s one thing, this is another matter.”
I don’t intend to work hard, but the fact that there are no customers in my newly opened store … it made me feel sad.
Choi Yichan, who saw a customer coming in, sneaked up and sat in a corner. I felt sorry for his unwillingness to be noticed.
Anyway, this monumental first guest ordered the ‘Iced Americano and Butter Cookie Set’ with a blunt expression on his face.
That’s right, it has a stress-reducing combo effect, so it’s a perfect menu for tired people.
The menu was quickly prepared and handed out to the customer. And, anxiously, I watched the customers eat the menu.
“…..!”
Oh, our eyes met. I quickly averted my gaze with embarrassment. I was curious about his impressions, but it’s rude to stare at the customer too much.
The customer also came to the cafe the next day.
The next day, and the next day…….
[Cumulative Sales: 12 Rubies]
Thanks to this, the sales were gradually gathering.
I was happy to have a regular customer for a while.
“Huum…..”
“Kiyaoo, why are you like this!”
“Huum…..”
I have a new problem. It’s because of the regular customer in question.
“That man, he must have a different purpose. Waeooong.”
“Kyuu!”
At Mieum’s outrageous remarks, Lime added a cry of agreement.
“Meooong, he comes at the same time every day and order the same menu. It’s suspicious!”
“Kyuu, kyuuuu!”
“Maybe he’s just a big fan of butter cookies.”
“Waeoong!”
Pakpak!
Mieum lifted her front paws and punched me. Haha, but now I can avoid it without looking. Mieum, who missed a shot in the air, said again.
“Who will come all the way to the Dungeon Gate like this every day just because he likes butter cookies! Meoong, I bet he’s coming because he has a different purpose.”
That’s true, but…….
“Different purpose, what can it be?”
“That man must be a member of the Dungeon Smuggling Organization, kiyaooo! He chose this place as a place to make a deal, avoiding other people’s eyes. But the other party he was supposed to make a deal with had already betrayed him. He comes here every day, unaware of that fact, meooong…..”
“What’s the evidence?”
“It’s the feeling of this body!”
…. I shouldn’t have asked.
No wonder she watched “Midnight Mystery Drama, The Whereabouts of the Missing Hunter” until late last night. That’s the story of the drama.
I opened the oven while thinking that I should refrain this imaginative cat from watching the drama in the future. A sweet and savory smell sprang up. Just when the freshly baked butter cookies are transferred onto the plate, there was the sound of the door opening. 
Speaking of the devil.
“Oh, welcome!”
“This one, please.”
Today, at the same time, this customer came and ordered the same menu and sat down at the same seat.
Choi Yichan broke a cup today and went out, saying he would return without  strength. The customer sneaked a look at Choi Yichan’s usual place, but without saying anything, he accepted the iced Americano and butter cookies.
As the customer took a bite of the cookie and drank the coffee, a twinkling bar appeared above his head.
The bar was filled with light …. and it stopped.
‘It’s the same today….’
This is my concern.
The bar of light that represents the satisfaction that rises above this guest’s head. It’s about 60 percent based on eye measurement. It stopped at the same level every day with only slight differences.
In other words, this customer is not completely satisfied with the menu.
Maybe the coffee doesn’t taste good?
No, it can’t be.
I had such doubts for a while, but the chances are low. Iced Americano and butter cookies are in perfect condition today.
Then what on earth is unsatisfactory about this menu?
The customer had an atmosphere that was somehow difficult to approach and had an expression of ‘don’t talk to me’. But today, I decided to be brave.
“Excuse me, sir, maybe … do you not like the menu?”
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Giraegi (기레기) is a compound word of 기자 (gija: means a journalist, reporter and editor) and 쓰레기 (tsuraegi : means a trash). It refers to a person who significantly lowers the level of journalism with false facts and exaggerated inflated articles in Korea and has a significant lack of expertise as a journalist.

— Hunter-nim! Congratulations on becoming Korea’s seventh S-class hunter!— Ah, haha …. Is that so? That … Thank you.— First, please give us your name and a brief introduction!— My name is Choi Yichan, umh … I’m 23 years old and, uh, my blood type is B.

A soft laugh spread all around. It was by no means hostile or disrespectful. In the view of the new S-class, they have no choice but to cheer no matter what he says.
In addition, from the No. 1 in the rankings, who doesn’t reveal his face, Choi Yichan’s youthful appearance will feel fresh among the S-classes who are known for their feisty personality.
— You just brought out the gate stone, did you defeat the dungeon boss? Please tell us how you got it done!— I don’t know what’s going on either. Something talked to me, something else appeared again, and somehow this happened.— It happened somehow …. you say?— Yes, so I just grabbed the monster that came out. Gate stone? The stone just came out.— ……..
It was a remark that made the reporter, who was constantly pouring out questions, bewildered for a moment.
[Breaking News] The new S-class hunter … “The Boss, I just grabbed it and it died.”
…. the same article will be published.
— Ehem, hm, Hunter Choi Yichan, now many guilds want to recruit you, is there any guild you’d like to join?— No, I’m still …. I don’t know.— Oh, you’re thinking of establishing a new guild with Hunter Choi Yichan as the main character!— Yes? It’s not like that. Umh….— The C&L Corporation and the Royal Guild have already announced their intention to recruit you.
Since he already answered appropriately, he can now refuse the interview, but Choi Yichan continued to answer with bewildered expression.
He was not accustomed to receiving attention in the first place, and he seemed to be embarrassed by the great enthusiasm at the interview site.
— Ah, breaking news! Hunter Han Yiseong of Cheongna Guild has now announced that you will be recruited regardless of the conditions.
At the bottom of the news screen, there is a big caption that reads, ‘The Big Three is willing to recruit him … what is the future of the new S-Class?’.
It’s a mess. Choi Yichan diligently got involved in the reporter’s interview.
— The guild, thank you for the recommendation, but I have something to do before that, so I won’t go into it now.— Can I ask you what’s going on?— It’s a bit personal….— Ah! Is this a secret mission?— It’s not like that, I’m, uh, trying to help a friend….— Then, you have a place to belong!— I don’t belong……
I know you’re aiming for a scoop, but it’s too harsh. At this point, I felt pity for Choi Yichan.
I stood up thinking I should put in a complaint to stop the coercive interview.
“Grandma, I’ll make you a new coffee.”
After I confirmed that he was unharmed, I was so relieved that I became thirsty. Now, I should watch the rest of the interview with a relaxed mind while drinking coffee.
I quickly made two new iced caramel macchiatos and returned to the TV.
I took a sip of strong and sweet coffee and looked at the screen again….
What happened when I took my eyes off the TV for a brief moment?
— Yes, since I belong to Cafe Rieul, I won’t be joining any guild for a while.
“Cough, cough?”
Why …. is my name coming out of there?

***
“I’m sorry….”
Choi Yichan bowed his head.
Today is the opening ceremony of “Cafe Rieul“.
There is nothing special about the opening ceremony. I just made a bunch of butter cookies after putting a flowerpot with a ribbon that Choi Yichan brought while apologizing to me a while ago.
“I’m so sorry.”
Even though I said it was okay several times, Choi Yichan apologized again.
“I didn’t mean to … they suddenly put the camera in front of me and asked, and I couldn’t figure out what it was…..”
“That’s because you’re really good.”
Choi Yichan apologized for saying in an interview a few days ago that he belonged to ‘Cafe Rieul’. It happened because he remembered the promise to help me in the midst of embarrassment.
Choi Yichan crumpled his large body into the inner seat as if he was ashamed. His long legs poked forward.
Choi Yichan, who has yet to decide which guild to enter, was, so to speak, a prey to the Hunter World.
He didn’t know how the hell did they found out, he told me he turned off his phone because he received so many unknown calls. Not only that, he left the house where he lived in a hurry because people came to his house.
I said he could stay here for a while if he had nowhere to sleep, but….
“Is it because you’re uncomfortable? You can use it separately because the first and second floors are separated.”
“No, it’s, it’s just little … I can’t do that!”
Choi Yichan firmly refused.
“Then where do you live now?”
“Don’t worry. That wide earth, life flows with the wind!”
“…..”
Are you okay…..
Instead, I decided to hire Choi Yichan as a temporary part-timer only during the daytime.
Using an S-class hunter as a part-timer …. no wonder it just opened, but it already feels like a great cafe.
Choi Yichan, who had suffered a lot for several days, had a dark circle under his eyes and a haggard expression on his face.
However, Choi Yichan has the upper hand of power. He doesn’t have to suffer from such a nuisance if he decides to.
In the vertical Hunter World, Choi Yichan, a new S-class hunter, can do everything he wants. It’s possible to cheat with power anyway. Even the No. 1 ranker blocked all coverage of himself.
However, Choi Yichan did not seem to have any intention of doing so. He looked like someone who would only use his power for the right cause….
“Are you not going to join a guild?”
If he joins a guild, the guild can solve it even if Choi Yichan does not directly respond to the interview. It would be better for Choi Yichan, who can’t say anything hateful, to have a guild.
“Yeah, that’s fine. I don’t really want to.”
“How about Cheongna Guild?”
It was a little surprising that Cheongna Guild also wanted to recruit Choi Yichan. They’re a small elite guilds that rarely hired new hunters.
Hunter Han Yiseong is a good person, and Ki Yoohyun is also …. he’s weird sometimes, but he’s a good person, so wouldn’t they suit Choi Yichan?
Still, Choi Yichan shook his head firmly to the side.
“Umh … No, not now.”
Well, it’s okay if you don’t like it.
Right now, he’s very surprised because of the series of interviews, but Choi Yichan will do well wherever he goes.
“Kiyaoong (One more time! Do it one more time)!”
“Kkyuuu, kkyuu!”
Choi Yichan held Mieum and Lime in both hands and played with them, throwing them in the air. His hand technique was amazing, as if he was juggling.
“Meoong, meooong (Ugh, I’m dizzy)…..”
“Kyuuu….”
You both seemed to be having fun.
Well, until this heat goes away … let’s say he’s a temporary part-timer who’s in charge of playing with animals.
Choi Yichan, who played with Mieum until her eyes turned pink, spoke.
“But I was surprised that Rieul was also an Awakened.”
“Ahaha….”
I revealed my awakening to Choi Yichan. Rather than trying to reveal it on purpose, it just happened. As I explained the effect of coffee jelly to Choi Yichan, who returned from the dungeon, it happened naturally. There was no reason for me to lie.
“Somehow, when I ate that coffee jelly … what…..”
“What happened inside?”
After awakening, it is very rare that the grade goes up several stages or the class changes. I’m very curious about what happened.
Choi Yichan tilted his head with an ambiguous expression.
“Uh … that … I don’t know. Something talked to me, and then something came up. How do you explain it?”
Well, I have no idea either…..
Choi Yichan gave a lengthy explanation as he traced his memory, but it was difficult to interpret the words that did not contain any proper nouns.
What is ‘that‘?
Anyway, it doesn’t matter because he’s back alive.
In fact, I was worried and anticipating that the number of customers would suddenly increase since ‘Cafe Rieul’ was mentioned in the breaking news, especially the breaking news with the highest viewership ratings.
“Is this the cafe that the new S-class hunter mentioned?”“Is it such an amazing place that even the new S-class hunter talked about it?”“Here, give me the whole menu from start to end!”“Me too! I came first!”
What if this happens? I don’t intend to work that hard…..
However, overshadowing the worries, only Grandma Kim Deokyi and Jina stopped by earlier, and the store that had just opened is quiet.
[The name of <Cafe Rieul> has been passed on to many people.][Converts the acquired recognition to fame …. Completed.][Name: Cafe RieulGrade: FFame: 5, Popularity: 0]
….. I’ve been worried to no avail.
I’m glad, but what is this sad feeling?
Naturally, there was no progress in the quest to meet 10 customers. System guy, isn’t the quest difficulty too high?
Deep in such thought, I didn’t notice that there was someone who was aiming for this place at that time.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Tteoksang (떡상) means skyrocketing / getting popular (Literal meaning: increase like a rice cake).  It is a slang word created by combining ‘떡칠 / tteokchil’ (rice cake) and ‘급상승’ (a sudden and large increase in the price or stock price of an item). The opposite word is 떡락 (Tteokrak).
Bichichan is not a typo. You know how netizen sometimes censored names (like in the previous chapter, they called Choi Cedric with ‘Choi Ce’. Here, Choi Yichan was referred as 빛이찬이. 빛 (bich) means light.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c46:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

I made this for Grandma … I was going to say that.
“Drink first.”
Gulp. The cold and sweet taste came into my mouth and I finally calmed down.
“Have you calmed down?”

“Yes, thank you … Ah! I need to watch the news.”
I went to the front of the television right away and turned it on.
All channels were reporting about Suwon’s dungeon. An anchor with a firm expression reported the dungeon in the studio, and soon the screen was connected to the live scene.
— We will connect a reporter on Suwon to check the damage situation. Reporter Choi Sera! What’s the situation at the scene?— Yes, as you can see from my side, the impact of the dungeon is quite large here. Transforming into an A-grade dark attribute dungeon, this whole area was literally devastated.
Beyond the screen was chaos. Completely collapsed buildings, injured people, hunters rushing to evacuate people, and … the entrance to the dungeon where the space appears distorted.
— The area is now closed and residents are evacuated, but the situation has literally turned into a chaos due to the occurrence of irregular shock waves.— According to the briefing by the Dungeon Management Office, many civilians, including elementary school students, were caught in the rift. Reporter Sera Choi, what’s the rescue plan?— Yes, according to the survivors, many elementary school students were caught up when the rift occurred, and a hunter entered straight away to save them. It is not yet known who the hunter is, but it is presumed to be an E-class.— An emergency rescue party is now organized, and they will start as soon as the shock wave subsides. However, as it is a high-risk dark dungeon, thorough preparation is required.
From there, the screen returned to the news studio. The anchor explained the dangers of dark attribute dungeons, but none of them came to my mind.
For a long time, I’m just staring nervously at the news screen until the anchor delivered the news with an urgent expression.
— Oh, right now! Breaking news just came in. I’ll connect you to the site right away. Reporter Choi Sera!— Yes, I just got some surprising news at the site of the dungeon in Suwon … What? That’s kind of absurd.— Calm down and tell me. What’s the situation at the scene?
Instead of answering, the camera lit the entrance to the dungeon emitting blue light.
“…..!”
Through the gap, I could see curly golden hair and familiar blue training suits.
Thank Goodness. Choi Yichan is unharmed.
At the moment of relief, the reporter shouted with an excited look from beyond the screen.
— S-class! A new S-class hunter has been born
…. Huh?
***
At the road that he happened to walk by, as soon as the rift broke out in front of his eyes, Choi Yichan jumped inside without hesitation. It was a waste of time to even think about it.
The moment he jumped into the gate, it was humid and acrid air that greeted Choi Yichan. Every time he breathed in, the unpleasant smell filled his lungs, and when he exhaled, his head ached.
His only weapon, a dagger, was taken out, but no strength went into his hand. It’s because of this unpleasant air. The black and sticky thing mixed into his breath seemed to fill his lungs and made his body heavy.
“……Ha.”
The moment he wiped the sweat off his forehead with the back of his hand and fixed the dagger again.
Kkkkieee!
An insect-type monster with a black, glossy shell appeared and attacked Choi Yichan.
Swish!
Choi Yichan rolled to the side. The grass where he had just been was cut off by the sharp front paws of the monster.
If he had been a little late, it would have been his ankle, not the grass, that was cut.
“Ugh……”
Sweat dripped down his eyes and made them sting.
He has to get his act together. If he doesn’t come to his senses, the children won’t be able to….
Swish!
Again, the monster jumped at him.
He narrowly avoided the subsequent attack and swung his arms wide. The monster’s shell cracked with an unpleasant sensation.
“Ugh….!”
He pressed down the dagger so hard that his arm trembled. After stabbing for a long time, the nucleus was finally destroyed.
“Haaa, haaa…….”
He defeated the monster at the end of a fierce battle, but his arm was wounded. The blood from the wound turned black as soon as it touched the air, giving off a strange smell.
The headache that had been tormenting him since earlier was getting worse, and now it was hard to control his body. If the monster appears again, victory will no longer be guaranteed.
He can’t even see where the children are.
He needs to find them quickly and escape…..
Leading the heavy body, Choi Yichan thought.
‘Why am I so weak?’
Choi Yichan wanted to be a hero.
When he was a child, he was caught up in a rift near his home. At the moment when he thought he was dead, a Hunter who jumped into the rift alone saved him.
He wanted to save others like the Hunter who saved him. If there was someone in need around, he helped without hesitation. However, as an ordinary human being, there were few things he could do.
That’s why he was happy when he’s awakened.
How many times have you dreamed of this moment? The moment when he can save children in the same situation as himself with his own power.
But he’s still powerless.
Choi Yichan inadvertently fiddled with the pendant hanging from his neck. He kept wearing it around his neck as he was told not to take it off his body.
If it was a gift she gave him, he would happily keep even a roadside stone 
He knows best that Rieul has no other meaning. Nevertheless, the word ‘reunion commemorative gift‘ lingered in his heart.
Choi Yichan recalled Rieul’s cafe. It still takes a lot of work, but it’s a cozy space. He promised to help her again in the future.
So…..
Rescue the children and return. He wanted to go back and drink the sweet coffee she made for him again.
Having made up his mind like that, he became hungry even though it didn’t fit the situation.
‘That’s right, what Rieul gave me….’
She told him to eat it when he enters the dungeon.
Her repeatedly asking expression bothered him, that’s why he kept it in mind.
Choi Yichan opened the bag he received from Rieul. Inside, there was a meticulously packaged black jelly and a spoon.
When he ate the jelly with the spoon, he could feel the strong coffee taste and sweetness together. It’s unique but delicious.
“Ugh…..”
After eating all the jelly, the headache got worse and his heart pounded.
The moment his trembling knees bent and touched the ground.
…. a voice was heard.
【Do you need power?】
‘Where is this voice coming from?’
It was a desolate field around, and there were no monsters or other survivors in sight yet.
Still, the voice pierced his ears clearly. No, it seems to be speaking through a sense other than hearing.
“Who … who is it? If you’re hiding, come out!”
Suddenly, Choi Yichan felt a hot sensation around his neck and reached out. A small black stone was caught in his fingertips. It was the pendant he got from Rieul.
The pendant was shining.
The black light whispered to him.
【Do you need power?】
The voice is heard again.
At first he was surprised, then he was suspicious.
Why did he hear such a strange voice? It’s been quite some time since he got caught up in the rift. Maybe he heard something nonsense in a state of extreme tension.
However, the moment he held the pendant in his hand again, his senses realized it before his thoughts.
It’s connected to the divine nature of the universe through dark ether contained in the pendant.
【Answer. So what’s your answer? The power to make your wish come true.】
As if led by the voice, Choi Yichan nodded his head.
***
I didn’t mishear.
The reporter in the news screen clearly looked at Choi Yichan and said that he was an ‘S-class hunter’.
Did Choi Yichan become an S-class? What happened to him in the dungeon that he suddenly became an S-class?
It is rare for a Hunter who has awakened once to raise the grade. Even if they do, it will only go up one level or not at all.
As expected, he would have obtained the S-class skills through the pendant and coffee jelly I gave him. Even so, is he going from E-class to S-class at once?
The children came out of the gate behind Choi Yichan. There were a few injuries, but everyone was well.
Choi Yichan took the gate stone in his hand and put it in the entrance of the dungeon that emits blue light. As the ominous blue light subsided, the entrance, which seemed to pour out monsters at any moment, calmed down.
— Woaaaaah!
At that moment, tremendous cheers and applause erupted. The scene was in a festive mood, forgetting the tension from before.
The broadcast did not continue properly due to the cheers, so the screen returned to the news studio in a hurry, but there was no difference. It was because the announcer in the studio was also in tears and gave a standing ovation.
“That’s a relief.”
“Yes, really … it’s a relief.”
The festive atmosphere is understandable. That’s because it was almost impossible for there to be no fatalities in A-grade dungeon.
Moreover, somehow, Choi Yichan even got the gate stone.
Although they are often used interchangeably, “rift” and “gate” are strictly different concepts.
First, dungeons occur with ‘rifts‘ in the real world. This rift is very unstable, sucking in objects around it, and conversely, it spit out monsters.
If you defeated the boss in the dungeon, you can get an item called ‘Gate Stone‘. If you put this item into a rift, the rift turns into a gate, and you can freely enter and exit without the risk of monsters popping out.
So, in general, when a dungeon occurs, the attack proceeds in four stages.
Rescue the victim who has been sucked into the rift.Organize an attack party and defeat the dungeon boss to obtain the gate stone.After that, Hunter enters the stabilized dungeon and proceeds with item farming and dungeon investigation.When sufficient investigation is completed, the dungeon is closed.
….. It was stated in the book I borrowed from Jina.
However, the fact that Choi Yichan came out with a gate stone means that he finished up to the second stage at once. It’s also an A-grade dark dungeon.
This was like a miracle.
The news continued. The public officials of the Dungeon Management Office ran to Choi Yichan, and what he said in an excited fast tone was just aired on the news.
After the situation calmed down a little, the interview began.
All the news, newspapers, and even the guild officials who were at the scene pointed their microphone to Choi Yichan.
Click, click, click!
— Hunter-nim! This way! Please look this way!— Can’t you see that I’ve been here since a while ago? Don’t cut in line.— What did you pay here for?— Move back, Hunter Scope!
There was a brief disturbance in the heated interview atmosphere. Everyone’s attention was focused on the first words of a new S-class hunter that was born after a long time.
Choi Yichan, who was in front of dozens of cameras and microphones, looked puzzled. He didn’t seem to understand what had happened yet.
Haha, he’s popular.
I’m glad that Choi Yichan is alive, but besides that, to become an S-class hunter…..
I felt strange, yet thrilled.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c45:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“What is this? Woah … cups?”
The bag was full of disposable paper cups and plastic cups. At a rough estimate, it looked like 500 each.
However, it wasn’t an ordinary cup. The name ‘Cafe Rieul’ stamped on the center of the cup caught my eye.
“You told me that you’re opening a cafe soon. I made it because I thought you would need a takeout cup.”

“Thank you, Grandma!”
After all, not all customers drink in the cafe. I didn’t think of a take-out customer, but it was a must-have item.
[Item: Custom Takeout Cup (★★☆☆☆) x 1000Type: Disposable CupNote: Preserve the condition of the drink. (2:00:00)]
Not only that, but it also had a good effect. The retention time of drinks made with skills is only 30 minutes. However, if I put it in this cup, I can keep the drink for a longer period of time.
“If it’s not enough, tell me anytime. I will make more for you.”
“Ahahaha … please do it then.”
500 for hot drinks, 500 for cold drinks. A total of 1000 cups. In addition, this quiet place is in front of the Great Dungeon Abyss..
The day come when I use up all these cups…..
Hm …. In about three years?
“It’s a wonderful place.”
“Haha … Thank you.”
Grandma, who looked around the cafe, admired it lightly.
In fact, it was quite crowded in the store now. On one side, I was roasting coffee in a roaster, and on the other, I was solidifying the sap of dungeon sugarcane.
Mieum and Lime, who just finished eating, even ran around the floor. Seriously, don’t run, I’m surprised.
“Kyuu, kyuuuuu!”
“Meoooong!”
Tadadak. Tong, tong, tong.
………………………………………………..
Embarrassed, I quickly turned away.
“Ah! Silly me. I haven’t even served coffee yet. Grandma, what do you like?”
“Well, then I’ll have a sweet and cool one.”
“Okay!”
Sweet and cool. I thought about it for a while while looking at the recipe list. There’s ice cream coffee, but it’s better to make a new menu.
Yeah, I’ve decided. I checked and found all the ingredients. I decided to make an iced caramel macchiato.
Cold drinks were also not much different from hot drinks in the way they were made. Add caramel syrup, ice, and cold milk, then froth the milk separately and place it on the glass. Then, pour in the espresso and sprinkle with caramel drizzles.
I handed the finished drink to Grandma.
“Grandma, here’s the iced caramel macchiato.”
“Thank you … ah.”
While taking the glass, Grandma looked out of the window.
“What’s wrong? What’s there … ah.”
The sky, which was clear in the morning, suddenly turned gray. Then, one by one, snowflakes fell from the sky and soon began to pour.
Already … the first snow?
It’s only the end of October. I thought there would be some more time until the first snow fell.
I looked up at the sky in bewilderment at the earlier-than-expected snow, and my phone vibrated loudly.
It was an ominous notification.
***
Ki Yoohyun made his way through the narrow alleyway without hesitation.
“Wait, let’s go together, guild leader!”
“He told us not to call him a guild leader outside!”
“That’s not the point now!”
There is no time. The twins Joo Shinwoo and Joo Shinhee quickly chased after Ki Yoohyun, who had already become so far away.
The surrounding area was an ordinary villa village. Although it is far from the subway station, the rent is so cheap that it becomes a neighborhood where mainly students and young office workers live.
On the road leading to similar villas, Ki Yoohyun moved his legs without hesitation.
How long did he walk? Soon, he stopped walking in front of a building.
“…..”
The twins who followed Ki Yoohyun immediately opened their mouths.
“Is the suspect here?”
“The bad guy who’s trying to kill an old lady!”
“However, a simple attempted murder would be investigated by the Dungeon Management Office. Guild leader … no, is there a reason why Hunter-nim is looking for it himself?”
“You idiot! Guild leader … no, Hunter-nim is trying to kill that bad guy himself!”
“Are you stupid? Guild leader … no, do you think that Hunter-nim is as mindless as you?”
His head was throbbing.
“….Quiet.”
At Ki Yoohyun’s words, the twins shut their mouths. He rolled his eyes and look around.
As he walked up the stairs of the deserted villa, Ki Yoohyun was lost in thought.
The incident in which Craftsman Kim Deokyi was attacked also happened in the past timeline. However, the timing was different. In the first timeline, it was a few months later, so he let his guard down.
How foolish of someone like him, who even returned to the past.
Ki Yoohyun recalled the image of Kwon Rieul, who smiled while saying that she’s okay, even though she had burns on her palm. It wouldn’t have happened if he hadn’t escorted her into the workshop.
…. So, the wound is his own responsibility.
While looking at the scene in such regret, he found a weapon dropped there.
It wasn’t an ordinary knife. Although the grade was low, it was a sword dedicated to hunters that had a good length of use. The sword’s handle was engraved with a name. It’s as if it’s there for someone to find it.
Still, no matter how stupid the criminal is, he will not be thoughtless enough to abandon a weapon with his name on it. It was highly likely that someone left it on purpose.
Furthermore, the unique ether on the weapon was weighing on his mind.
Dark, black … unpleasant ether. He had smelled something like this somewhere. Although it was a small amount, his sensitive senses did not miss it.
‘Then … the owner of this sword may not be safe already.’
The destination was the top floor.
He knocked on the door and at the same time read the etheric flow through the door, but there is no sign of activity inside. Ki Yoohyun opened the door without delay.
“Nobody’s here.”
“This … it’s like an armor.”
Joo Shinhee picked up a clothes from the messy floor. It has a colorful design reminiscent of a peacock.
“….We are a step late.”
“Did he run away?”
“The wanted will be issued soon, so it appears that he has fled.”
The room was a mess due to the daily necessities and clutter. The owner appeared to have left home in a hurry after causing the incident.
Or made it look like that.
There’s only one way. He doesn’t want to use it that much because it’s dealing with causality and everything.
Ki Yoohyun sighed lightly and looked around the small room.
“Stay away.”
“…..!”
The twins took a couple of steps back with a nervous expression. After confirming that they were far enough apart, he used the skill.
His skill name, The Power of White Light.
It is a unique skill that placed Ki Yoohyun at the top of the ranking. However, few people know exactly what skill it is. Only the fact that it deals with space was known.
It was the first time for twins who hadn’t been in the guild for a long time to actually see them.
[The Blessing of ███ ██ applies.][Skill: The Power of White Light (S) is activated.[※ Caution: Excessive intervention may be resisted by causality.]
At the next instant, the mass of the air changes. Although it was definitely the same space, the air was heavy unlike before. The twins felt as if a transparent curtain was blocking them.
Fine particles of light surrounded the entire room, and soon the extended senses began to read information.
There is only one thing. The ether buried in the sword found at the scene.
[Matching information found.]
Ki Yoohyun picked up an object that had been thrown away unnoticed in one corner of the room.
It was a small ornamental decoration that usually attached to a sword. The moment he saw the clear star shape carved in the center, Ki Yoohyun’s eyes became fierce.
“…..Guild leader?”
No matter how long time has passed, there is no way he can’t recognize this. This is the symbol of the Church of Starry Wisdom.
It’s a clear evidence that the enemy has already begun to move.
The moment the corner digs into his skin, who’s grasping the decoration tightly and forgetting about the pain….
“….Oh!”
Joo Shinwoo looked out of the villa’s window and sounded surprised.
“What’s wrong with you? … Ah.”
It snowed. The clear sky was cloudy before they knew it, and thick snowflakes fell.
“It’s a special day. The first snow is already here. It’s a bit fast.”
“Ugh, there’s going to be traffic.”
Ring. Suddenly, their phones vibrated.
[Safety Guide Notice <Dungeon Management Office>]Today at 13:17, an F-Grade rift occurred in Gwonseon-gu, Suwon.Residents in the vicinity are requested to evacuate as soon as possible, and please use the detour road as it is under two-way traffic control.]
The tension that had been around for a moment soon subsided. Grade F rifts are not uncommon, and the risk is low. The response team of the Dungeon Management Office alone will be sufficient to rescue victims and stabilize the dungeon.
But as soon as they saw the next message that came one after another, they all froze.
[Safety Guide Notice <Dungeon Management Office>]The rift in Gwonseon-gu, Suwon has been upgraded to Grade A. It’s presumed to be a dark attribute mutation dungeon.Crisis alert has been raised to “Severe”.The area is scheduled to be closed, please evacuate as soon as possible.]
“Uh, uh, what should we do?”
“A-grade attribute mutations like this …  I’ve never seen something like this before.”
“It’s a dark attribute. The location is also very bad. People … uh, what should we do?”
“Hunter Joo Shinwoo, Hunter Joo Shinhee.”
The twins, who were pale and bewildered, came to their senses at Ki Yoohyun’s call.
His dark eyes sank coldly, and there was no agitation in his expression.
The twins’ earlobes reddened at the thought that the guild leader, whom they had long admired, showed such a calm yet unsightly appearance.
“Haa, this isn’t the time to be leisurely looking for the culprit. Let’s go back to the guild right away.”
“Yes!”
Before leaving the villa, Ki Yoohyun once again grabbed the star-shaped decoration tightly.
His heart was beating wildly.
***
I picked up my phone that was constantly vibrating.
Even unlocking the phone was difficult because my fingertips were shaking. I could only check the text after sliding my hand several times.
[Safety Guide Notice <Dungeon Management Office>]A-Grade dungeon shockwave occurred in Gwonseon-gu, Suwon. The area is under lockdown. Evacuate as soon as possible.]
Several texts poured out over a short period of time all informed the crisis.
I immediately called Choi Yichan, but he didn’t pick up the call.
I knew this day would come and I imagined this moment several times, but I couldn’t calm down my nervousness.
Wait … what time is it now? What time was it when I handed the pendant to Choi Yichan yesterday?
The condition for acquiring the skill ‘The Light that Illuminates The Darkness’ is to possess the item for 24 hours. The time is close. If 24 hours hadn’t been passed yet, he wouldn’t have gotten the skill.
Inside the dungeon, the situation changes rapidly every minute and every second.
If it’s too late to acquire the skill and the same thing happens again…..
“Miss Rieul, are you okay?”
“…..”
“Miss Rieul!”
I barely raised my trembling head to the sound of Grandma calling.
Swoosh, something came into my mouth. 
When I unintentionally picked it up, it turned out to be the straw of the iced caramel macchiato.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c44:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Huh? Lime? Ah, I picked it up right in front.”
Actually, it was a slime that I bumped into in the tutorial dungeon, but I said it with a little adaptation.
“I see. I asked because I wanted to raise slime, too.”
“How about buying one?”

It was not uncommon among hunters to raise slimes as companion monsters. It’s relatively easy to tame, harmless, and it’s cute. Slime ASMR videos were also popular, and a hunter’s slime gained popularity on YouTube and even released goods.
It is also easy to get a rental. All you have to do is pay a Hunter from Tamer class and ask them to sell it.
However, Choi Yichan shook his head with an ambiguous expression.
“Umh … I’ve looked into that once.”
“Why?”
There are so many people who want to buy slime from Tamer. It’s okay to have to wait a long time. If you take out the number ticket and wait, your turn will come one day.
The problem is that the Tamers are starting to screen people. Only hunters from a large guild, famous hunters, or even the high-ranking hunters could get slimes.
Currently, Choi Yichan’s Hunter-grade is E. It was the entrance cut.
In sumarry….
“You’ve changed your mind…”
“Hahahaha…..”
Even though it’s common knowledge, it’s really disgusting that they discriminate even when it comes to buy a slime.
Choi Yichan murmured, drooping his shoulders.
“I’m afraid I need to find another job instead of Hunter.”
“Uh … why?”
“Even if I’m an Awakened, I’m just an E-class. I don’t think I can do very well….”
“….Yichan-ah.”
“Ahaha! It’s a joke, I’m kidding it! I just said it!”
Contrary to what he said, there was a sense of discouragement that could not be erased with a laughter.
I remembered being neglected in the Hunter Market. Did he go through something similar?
“Then do you want to work part-time at our store?”
It was half a joke, but Choi Yichan laughed out loud.
“Oh, great! Please let me do it.”
However, as far as I know, there is no one more suitable for a Hunter than Choi Yichan….
I mean….
It was just the time when the coffee jelly hardened. I opened the refrigerator and took out the glass. When I slightly pressed the jelly with a spoon, I felt the elasticity.
Done, It hardened well.
It would be delicious to sprinkle whipped cream or condensed milk on top, but I skipped it this time because it’s not something to eat right now.
It would be nice to eat jelly made by reducing the amount of gelatin in a cold drink. Maybe I’ll try it next time. 
[Item: Coffee Jelly (★★☆☆☆)Status: Very DarkEffect: When consumed, you develop caffeine addiction in one shot.※ Be careful with your intake.]
As soon as I entered the recipe name, the item window popped up. Done, the effect of ‘caffeine addiction at once‘ was written on it.
Among the skills that Choi Yichan has not acquired, there are two S-ranks. If he has the pendant and this coffee jelly, he can get the ‘The Light that Illuminates The Darkness (S)’ and ‘Coffee is My Strength (S)’.
The grade determined by the sum of the status and the skill grade are separate matters. However, if he gets two S-class skills, even if Choi Yichan is an E-class, he won’t be ignored like before. No matter how rude and disrespectful tamers are, they’ll sell slime to him then.
I wrapped the coffee jelly well in a bag and held it out to Choi Yichan.
“Yichan-ah, this is … later, later.”
“Yes?”
He looked at me with a friendly smile.
“Later…..”
“…..”
“Later, when you enter a dungeon.”
“Dungeon? Hey, I’m not even a member of a guild, so what…..”
“Still! You can go in there. You might suddenly get caught up in a rift. After all, it’s a dangerous world.”
“….Uh.”
“Then, when you enter a dungeon, be sure to eat this right away. It will be easy to eat because it contains a lot of sugar. If you eat it then … It’ll help you.”
I really wish he won’t go. No matter whether there is a dungeon in Suwon on a snowy day, or people are in danger because of it.
Leave such work to the Dungeon Management Office, the Big Three Guild, or stronger hunters. I hope Choi Yichan stays in a safe place.
I wanted to tell him that if it wasn’t for the system’s interference, you shouldn’t enter the dungeon even now.
But … even if I tell him what I know about the future, Choi Yichan will make the same choice. Because he has a kind and friendly personality. He wouldn’t be able to turn a blind eye to the children caught up in the dungeon.
In the end, I even returned, but all I could do was give him the pendant and this jelly.
“Okay, I got it. I will eat well.”
Again, Choi Yichan accepted the coffee jelly without asking anything.
He didn’t forget to add, “I’ll definitely come to help you next time.”.
***
[Congratulations! Signboard was installed to spread the name of the cafe.Finally, you’re ready to open a cafe.The system update will start.1, 5, 10 ……. 100% Complete.]
I was surprised by the sudden system update notification.
[Name: Cafe RieulGrade: FFame: 0, Popularity: 0]
The new window that appeared only added the status of the cafe, but there was nothing special about it.
I handed the pendant to Choi Yichan, and I’m ready to open the cafe.
I hope there will be no life crisis from now on and only good things happen. I should run a quiet cafe as my first goal.
A life of less work and more rest. I’ll be a person who doesn’t lose my focus.
I’m a little dissatisfied that the cafe grade is F, but … finally, I opened a cafe.
Then, a notification window popped up.
[A quest has occurred.]
[Quest: The Sorrow of the F-Grade Cafe Begins.]
[Main Quest: The Sorrow of the F-Grade CafeYou’ve finally got your own cafe.But it’s still Grade F. Very few people know the existence of this cafe.Gather customers and raise the grade, let’s rise to fame.Meet 10 customers: 0/10Rewards: Experience (200 EXP), 1 Golden Ticket, ???]
No, I don’t want to raise the grade?!

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c43:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Let’s calm down. It’s too early to be disappointed.
Maybe there’s a hidden effect on the skill. I tried using the skill with hope.
‘The Floor is Shiny.’
Shashashak.

A light gesture swept away the dust on the floor. Within a few minutes, the floor was clean without a  speck of dust. I could see my blank face reflected on the smooth floor.
“….Waeoong?!”
It was so clean that Mieum, who stepped on the floor, slipped.
It’s convenient. It’s useful, but when you think of hunter skills, you would think of something cooler.
“Ha….”
As I looked at the signboard and the skill window, the time has already turned into noon, and Choi Yichan came to the store.
Today, I called Choi Yichan to the store. I planned to give him the pendant as a gift with a reasonable excuse.
“Kwon Ri, hi!”
Choi Yichan was wearing light sportswear today as well. As he entered, he was surprised to see the shiny floor.
“Ow, this place is really clean.”
“Thanks … oh, would you like something to drink?”
“I would love to. Then, just like before.”
“Okay.”
However, Choi Yichan, who drank two cups of ice cream coffee in succession, found a signboard left in the corner.
“Oh! Is this your shop sign? Do you want me to put it on for you?”
“No, it’s all right. You don’t have to.”
It was a 100% sincere refusal with no lies. However, Choi Yichan accepted this as a politeness.
“Hey, is it because it’s heavy? Don’t worry about it. I’m an Awakened, this is nothing! Trust me.”
“No, it’s really all right….”
“If you hang it over there, it will look good. Right?”
“Uh, huh….”
“Wait, I’ll put it on for you in a minute.”
Eventually, Choi Yichan found nails and hammers from the warehouse and immediately began to put up the signboard in the suitable place.
Indeed, Choi Yichan was always like this even before the regression. He likes to help others, and he finished the work he was supposed to do once without any fuss. It felt strange to see Choi Yichan, who was still the same person as he was before the regression.
But now that I have the pendant, the same accident won’t be happened twice.
While Choi Yichan was putting up the sign, I also have work to do. It was making a menu that made the drinker addicted to caffeine in one shot.
‘The Bond of a Cup of Coffee.’
There was one thing that caught my attention among Choi Yichan’s skill list I checked last time.
[Coffee is My Strength (S) /Unacquired/(Lv.1) Attack power increases by 800% when in caffeine addiction※ This skill has not been acquired yet.How to acquire: Attempt to attack while intoxicated with caffeine.]
It works pretty well. It increases the attack power by 800%, so it’ll be helpful if he can get it.
The problem is that he has to be addicted to caffeine.
According to my experience so far, someone has to drink four cups of coffee to develop caffeine addiction.
However, it would be difficult to go into the dungeon and drink four cups of coffee in an emergency. What if a monster attacks while drinking the coffee?
So, I decided to find a way to become addicted to caffeine in one shot.
“Like this … can I do this?”
“What are you doing?!”
“Kkyuu?”
As I adjusted the settings of the espresso machine, Mieum and Lime leaned their heads.
“To extract a ristretto.”
“What’s that!”
Ignoring the curious animals, I adjusted the grinder settings, and then used the skill.
‘The Barista’s Extraction.’
Soon, the machine began to extract a thick ristretto.
“….There we go.”
About 15ml of thicker and heavier coffee was made. It was more concentrated as it was extracted with half the volume of espresso.
Still, this alone is not enough.
I repeated the same process a few more times, adding four shots of ristretto to the glass. And this time, ‘The Barista’s Extraction.’ was used again for this extracted coffee. It was to concentrate the ristretto once again.
Dripping. The black, sticky liquid fell into the glass. Due to the effect of the skill, the capacity was further reduced, and only half of the glass was filled.
As soon as all the undiluted liquid was put into the glass, a new status window appeared.
[Item: Dark Coffee Extract (★☆☆☆☆)It’s a very concentrated undiluted coffee.Because it’s too strong, you get caffeine addiction at once when you drink it.Be careful with your intake.]
I succeeded!
I did succeed, but … is it possible for Choi Yichan, who only likes sweet coffee, to drink this?
The undiluted liquid in the glass smelled very strong and bitter. I dipped the tip of the spoon a little and tasted it, and that alone caused the strong taste blew in my mouth.
“Mieum-ah, Lime-ah, look at this for a second.”
“What, do you need my help!”
“Kkyuu…..?”
I held out a glass of undiluted liquid to the animals.
Mieum, who sniffed it slightly, raised her hair up and flew off her front paw wildly.
“Kiyaoooo! What is that, you’re trying to kill me!”
“Kyuuuuuuuuu.”
Lime didn’t even come close at all because it smelled bad.
This should not be the case. No matter how much I wanted him to get the skill, I didn’t want to feed him something that didn’t taste good. If it’s Choi Yichan, he’ll spit it out as soon as he put it in his mouth. I need to find a way.
“I need to use it.”
I first took out the sugar I had made. Next, there was one more material needed.
‘The Dimensional Shop.’
[Dimensional Shop]Welcome! This is a shop that connects multi-dimensional gaps.The Eligibles can purchase the items they need.
Item update time: 12:00:00 left]
I opened the system window and called up the Dimension Shop.
The Dimensional Shop was updated once every 24 hours, at midnight, before that, you have to pay rubies to renew the items.
I was worried if there was no item I wanted on the list, but fortunately, I was able to find it right away without renewing it.
“I found it.”
When I paid for the ruby and accepted the item, Mieum opened her eyes wide next to me.
“What are you going to buy that for!”
“Fufu, you’ll see. This is all I need.”
“It looks like paper, meow!”
The item I bought was gelatin. I decided to make coffee jelly using this gelatin.
Jelly is tastier than the undiluted solution and is easier to eat. The making process was also easy and simple. I put cold water in a bowl first, then put gelatin and let it soak for a while.
While waiting for the gelatin, sugar was mixed into the coffee extract.
“Hmm … should I add a little more?”
I splashed in sugar without sparing it. It was because the taste of the undiluted solution was so strong that a small amount of sugar was coated. Sweetness is a measure of taste.
Stir thoroughly with a spoon and dissolve the sugar until it does not rustle.
“Are you trying to make poison!”
“Kkyuu……..?”
Next to me, Mieum and Lime looked distrustful, but I ignored them.
“Can you just have a faith in me?”
Just in time, the gelatin was properly softened by the water. I mixed gelatin in a bowl of coffee extract.
Finally, the liquid was transferred to an appropriately sized glass cup. Now, all U have to do is put this glass cup in the refrigerator to harden it.
“Kwon Ri, what are you doing?”
I put the coffee jelly in the refrigerator, and Choi Yichan just returned.
“I was making a new menu.”
“Really? I want to try it, too.”
“Yap, we still have to wait until it’s done, but … I’ll let you eat later.”
Later, after the dungeon explodes.
“I put up the signboard. Do you want to see if it’s crooked?”
“Uh, huh….”
There was a big sign on the red brick wall. I don’t know how much Choi Yichan paid attention to it. It was straight. not even a millimeter crooked.
The good news was that it wasn’t that bad when we put it on.
I didn’t feel the simple yet glamorous, familiar yet unique, classic and, modern touch. Unknowingly, I kept looking at the sign, and I felt the urge to enter the store.
Perhaps this is the effect of a signboard that attracts the customers’ attention.
Yes, when it comes to appearance or performance, it is the nature of K-gamers to choose performance. That’s how I ended my self-justification.
Well, I need to repay Choi Yichan for this.
“Yichan-ah, I can’t say it’s a reward, but … I have something for you.”
“Huh? No, no! This isn’t hard at all! Feel free to let me know if there’s anything else I can do for you. There’s no need for reward.”
“Take this.”
I handed the pendant to Choi Yichan.
It was a very awkward situation to hand over the pendant as a gift, not as anything else. In addition, the simple design, a black stone the size of a little fingernail, seemed suspicious at first glance.
However, in order to acquire the skill, it was necessary to wear this pendant for more than 24 hours. I was in the midst of contemplating what to explain if Choi Yichan felt suspicious.
“…..”
With a careful touch, he accepted the pendant. His cheeks were slightly red. He seemed shy.
Huh?
Only then did I suddenly realize that giving accessories can be seen as meaningful. I didn’t think of that because I was only focused on how to save Choi Yichan.
Furthermore, simple design is a design that is good for a gift.
No, no, no. Choi Yichan, what are you doing! When we were students, we used to look down on each other during self-study!
Choi Yichan must have felt the same way. I added an explanation in a hurry.
“Hey, there’s nothing strange about it! It happened by chance, but I thought it would suit you well! It’s some sort of reunion gift, something like that?”
The more I explain it, the more I feel like I’m screwed….
“I know. You don’t mean anything else.”
Choi Yichan hung the pendant right around his neck.
“Thank you. I like it.”
“It looks good on you. I hope you don’t take it off your body and wear it for more than a day.”
“Yes, I will do that.”
Without asking the reason, he nodded his head.
He’s my friend, but he’s so nice. Anyway, it’s not like I’m forcing him to buy a fake crystal necklace that purifies his qi.
I worried about it for a moment, but seeing the black stone fluttering around his neck gave me peace of mind.
***
While waiting for the coffee jelly to harden, Choi Yichan played with the animals inside the store. Mieum and Lime, who were bored, welcomed the new player.
The problem was that Choi Yichan’s physical strength was different from mine.
“Come on, grab this. Here.”
Choi Yichan grabbed the stalk of the dungeon sugarcane and shook it back and forth.
The leaves fluttered in front of her eyes, but Mieum, who was already exhausted, could not even raise her front feet properly.
“Meong, waeooong (I can’t do it anymore)…..”
“Kkyuuuuuu…..”
“Meoooong (This human, how can he not get tired)!”
With a pathetic cry, Mieum and Lime completely stretched out to the floor. Choi Yichan, who finally let them go, said abruptly.
“Rieul-ah, where did you get this slime from?”
[Next]
