SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c35:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Well, that’s enough.
I wasn’t that curious either. It’s best not to interfere with stories that have nothing to do with me.
I recalled the last time I worked for a company in my life; the painful memory of having to go hiking with my boss every Sunday after moderately agreeing that hiking is good for health. This is a lesson that I learned through my body.

I smiled lightly and changed the topic.
“Then, why don’t you come with Hunter Han Yiseong?”
“Uh? You mean me?”
Hunter Han Yiseong was flustered and waved his hand.
“I have an urgent matter to deal with from now on.”
“Is that so?”
“I’m sorry. Please have a good time together.”
….a good time?
I just recommended coffee, but the expression was a little strange.
Perhaps it was true that he had business to do, Hunter Han Yiseong left quickly. I thought it was an opportunity to make a new regular, but it’s a pity.
***
After Hunter Han Yiseong left, I returned to the store with Ki Yoohyun, who was left alone.
“Kids, I’m here.”
“Kkyuu!”
“Kyaooooo (Is he that human again)?!”
Mieum, who was welcoming me, or to be exact the cereal, said when she saw Ki Yoohyun, who followed me.
She’s a bit shy. Since they’ve met a few times, she’s slowly getting used to to Ki Yoohyun.
“Hello, Mieum.”
“Waeoong!”
As soon as Ki Yoohyun approached Mieum and greeted her, Mieum raised her flashy front paw and threw a meow punch.
Pakpak!
Oh, he avoided it.
Ki Yoohyun avoided all of Mieum’s front paws that flew quickly and stroked her chin gently. Mieum’s uncomfortable expression gradually softened at his tickling touch.
“Meooong…..”
What an easy cat. In the meantime, I poured cereal into Mieum’s bowl.
“I’m going to make a new menu today. Would you like to try it?”
“Ah, that’s great.”
Among the five basic cafe menus, the first menu to be made was cafe latte. It’s popular, and it’s the second most in demand basic menu after Americano.
I took out a thick porcelain cup for the cafe latte. Then, I brewed a shot of espresso and put it in.
Next, I had to heat up the milk. I took the milk out of the refrigerator. The “fresh milk” I bought at the Dimensional Shop earlier was cold. It looked very fresh and savory, as its name suggests.
“You are using unusual milk.”
“Ahaha, that’s right….”
Let’s keep it a secret that this is the milk of a Golden Triangular Rhinoceros.
‘Cafe in My Hand.’
[Recipe: You selected Café Latte]
Following the recipe’s instructions, pour milk into the milk pitcher, then dip the steam wand and activated it.
When I lowered the milk pitcher slightly, bubbles began to form. When adequate foam formed, the steam wand was locked and the milk pitcher was taken out.
Done, a velvety soft milk foam is completed. The temperature and foam of milk were just right.
After tilting the cafe latte cup at a right angle, I held the milk pitcher high in the other hand. I poured the milk in circular motions to mix it well, and when it is about 2/3 full, I placed the pitcher close to the cup.
After pouring until a white circle was formed in the middle of the coffee, I stopped and the cafe latte was finished just right.
[Item: Café Latte (★★★☆☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)Effect: 20% of maximum energy is restored.]
It has the effect of restoring energy at a ratio, not an integer. It’s quite an effect to fill up 20 percent of energy.
‘It won’t work for me….’
With my maximum energy of 100, if I drink it, only 20 will recover. However, if a person with high ability drank this coffee, it seemed that the amount of restored energy would be quite large.
‘For example….‘
I glanced across the seat.
‘This man whom I presumed to be strong.’
“What’s wrong?”
“….Nothing. Try it.”
I repeated the same process one more time to make another cup of cafe latte. I decided to make one for Ki Yoohyun and the other for me to taste. It was because I was quite curious about the taste of cafe latte made with milk that I bought on impulse.
I sat down at the table and immediately took the cup to my mouth.
“…Mmh.”
The exclamation naturally leaked out.
‘It wasn’t false advertising.‘
It was worth buying this milk using ruby. If I can buy this kind of milk easily, the system seems to be useful.
The elastic foam touched my lips first. Then, I felt a subtle sweetness. The rich taste of milk went well with coffee, and brought out the flavor even deeper.
I can’t believe that cafe latte is this delicious. I think I can drink even a few cups.
“It’s delicious. This … it’s really tasty.”
Ki Yoohyun also took a sip of the cafe latte and spoke briefly. There seemed to be no lie in his smirk.
At the same time, a golden bar appeared above his head.
I watched the golden gauge fill up above Ki Yoohyun’s head with a happy expression. The more he drinks cafe latte, the brighter it gets. The moment the bar kicked it to the end, I’ll get a message that I have made a deep connection with coffee
What?
However, no matter how long I waited, the message did not appear like it did on Choi Yichan’s case.
Why?
I frowned and glared at the gauge.
‘100% … It’s not.’
At first glance, it seems 100%, but it was different. The gauge had stopped at about 98%.
In the past, I thought it was 100% by eye measurement, but in fact, there was a slight gap.
Ki Yoohyun closed his eyes and slowly savored the taste of the cafe latte. The expression was comfortable and soft.
But….
It’s not a lie to say it’s delicious, but….
It’s not the 100% satisfactory ‘Ultimate Coffee‘.
Slowly, my fighting spirit began to rise. I want to see a full golden gauge full like when I gave the coffee to Choi Yichan.
If you are not 100% satisfied with this delicious cafe latte, what did you not like?!
I asked Ki Yoohyun, who put down the empty cup. 
“I’m actually working on a new menu. Is there anything lacking in that cafe latte?”
“No, it tastes great. It’s the first time I’ve ever had such a delicious coffee.”
Still, the gauge didn’t move a bit at 98%.
“Yoohyun-ssi, what’s your favorite drink?”
“Yes? Well, I drink everything well.”
“Umh….”
The word ‘drink everything well‘ also meant that he has no special preference. It is the opposite of Choi Yichan, who only likes sweet drinks. Rather, it would be easier to find the ‘Ultimate Coffee’ for someone with a clear preference like Choi Yichan.
The limitation of the skill ‘The Bond of a Cup of Coffee’ is to copy the skill of ‘The person who drank the Ultimate Coffee‘. In other words, in order to copy their skill, the person has to drink their favorite coffee.
So, in front of this man, whom I presumed to be secretly strong, I wondered what Ki Yoohyun’s skill would be. Maybe he has a very strong skill, so I might be able to copy and use it.
No, it’s too early to be discouraged. I’ve only made the first of the five basic cafe menus.
The next menu will definitely have a different reaction. It was unacceptable that this cafe latte was only 98% satisfactory.
I decided to make the next menu right away.
Next was cappuccino. Cappuccino is similar to cafe latte in that the milk is added to the shot of espresso, but the ratio of milk foam was different.
‘Cafe in My Hand.’
[Recipe: You selected Cappuccino.]
First I took out a smaller porcelain cup and then poured in the espresso. After that, I heated the milk again.
However, this time, the bubbles were enriched by injecting air longer than before. After scooping up the milk foam with a wide spoon, pouring it over the espresso, and pouring the remaining milk into the cup, it was finally done.
A golden circle of coffee appeared on the rim of the cup. Finally, when I sprinkled cinnamon powder, the status window appeared.
[Item: Cappuccino (★★★☆☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)Effect: 20% of maximum stamina is restored.]
This time, it was the effect of recovering stamina at a ratio.
This effect didn’t help me much either, but the coffee was still delicious. The rich milk foam was light and soft.
“How about this one?”
I looked at Ki Yoohyun with a pounding heart.
However, the gauge over his head stopped at exactly 98% this time as well. No matter how long I waited, the gauge didn’t seem to move.
“Thank you for the drink … is there anything wrong?”
“Umh….”
I forgot to answer Ki Yoohyun’s question and was lost in thought.
Was it a problem that it wasn’t a sweet drink?
Everyone likes sweetness. Even if it is bad for the body, the sweet taste is still sold well. 
Even that cat alone likes Chex Choco the most among many cereals.
“Kiyaoong (Why are you looking at me all of a sudden)!”
After removing Mieum, who was trying to attack me with her front paws, from the scene, I took out the ingredients I bought from the Dimensional Shop from the cupboard.
It’s chocolate sauce.
[Item: Chocolate Sauce from Hell (★★☆☆☆)A sauce made from the black fruit of the hell dungeonIts bittersweet taste can be used for mocha coffee as well as various desserts.Choose the number one premium brand’s chocolate sauce.]
Although the description was somewhat like a sloppy flyer, the smell of the bottle was very thick and sweet.
For the third menu, I decided to make Cafe Mocha. Since the chocolate sauce has a sweet taste, I thought that I would be able to get 100% satisfaction this time.
First, I put chocolate sauce in a cup and poured the espresso. Stir with a teaspoon to dissolve the sauce well, then pour the steam milk, and it was done.
It was time for him to taste again.
The image of Ki Yoohyun taking a sip of cafe mocha looked like a slow-motion scene from a movie.
Even though he was just picking up a cup of coffee and bringing it to his mouth, it felt like he was filming a commercial. His sparking eyes were filled with expressions.
No, it wasn’t the time to stare at his face and lose my mind.
The important thing is … satisfaction.
After slowly savoring the cafe mocha, Ki Yoohyun put down his coffee cup. He said something, but I couldn’t hear him. I was all focused on his head.
The gage above his head gleamed brightly. When I saw the beautiful light, I felt baseless confidence that it would work out this time.
But … the brilliant light stopped exactly at 98%.
98% again?!
[Next]


 Translator’s Corner:
I changed the ‘Health‘ from the status window to ‘Stamina‘. Stamina seemed to be better-suited because it’s not like they’ll die like a game character when the health point is 0 anyway.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c34:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

[Achievement: Find The Best ComboThe best coffee is the best dessert.You’ve earned a combo bonus with the right combination.Reward: System Update]
The notification window flickered in front of me.
I was half asleep and stared at the window blankly.

Yesterday, I failed to get information about the dark etheric item, and I even remembered opening the thick Dungeon Ecology Encyclopedia again.
And….
……
I must have fallen asleep.
“Ugh….”
I slept in an uncomfortable position and my neck was sore. As I stretched, there was a crackling sound in my neck.
I achieved an achievement, but a day has already passed. Why now?
Isn’t your system too slow? The notification quickly appear when you asked me to do something bothersome, it’s a sabotage to only post a reward notification late.
[Sorry for the inconvenience caused by the service delay.]
Eh, yes….
The tone of the system is slightly different from usual.
It was questionable, but it was not an important situation. I chose to receive the reward while rubbing the back of my stiff neck.
[Finally, you are The Eligible who is ready to grow as a Cafe Owner.The system update will start.1, 5, 10 … 100% Complete.The Dimensional Shop feature has been unlocked.]
Uhm? What’s this?
“You have finally unlocked that feature! Meow!”
Mieum intervened as I blinked at the notification window with my half-asleep head.
“What is The Dimensional Shop?”
“It is a store that transcends dimensions, specially prepared by the great system ██ ███. You can buy things that are not easily available through the system.”
“Hmm….”
“Waeongh!”
Mieum jumped up with her front paws and punched me.
“The response is lukewarm! React more enthusiastically!”
“Wow. Whoa. Whoa.”
“There’s no soul in it!”
“But right now, I don’t have anything I really want….”
Pakpak. Mieum’s front paw hit my back again. I paused as I set Mieum, who was rushing at me wildly, aside.
Wait, it’s an item that I can’t get easily?
This shop feature at this timing, maybe there’s a dark etheric item there.
System guy, you’re helpful sometimes. I’ve only been complaining all this time, and I’m feeling a little sorry.
My sleepiness ran away. I tried this new feature right away.
‘The Dimensional Shop.’
[Dimensional Shop]Welcome! This is a shop that connects multi-dimensional gaps.The Eligibles can purchase the items they need.Item update time: 24:00:00 left]
I checked the item list while passing through the exciting description.
“Umh, 1 ruby for a fresh milk…?”
[Fresh Milk: 1 RubySavory Whipped Cream: 2 RubiesChocolate Sauce: 5 RubiesCinnamon Powder: 3 Rubies………………………….]
But, let alone a dark etheric item, there were only ingredients for food and coffee drinks.
Is it an item that I can’t get easily?
“Why do you only have these?”
Pakpakpak! Mieum threw her front paw at me again, but this time I turned my body aside to avoid it.
“What do you mean ‘only‘? We’ve selected the right items for the right person!”
“….this?”
“Kiyaoooo, what would be the right item for a cafe owner? Isn’t that a drink ingredient?”
But they sell milk at the supermarket, too.
I lost interest and tried to close the shop window.
[Super Special Rapid News] ♨HOT♨ tea/won/clothing/top/store § new user special. special. three. days.100% discount on immediate purchase ※No eat-and-run ※☞New stock every day☜New itemsVarious rare / rare / ITEM coming soon § taste § quantity § yes § affection §Direct entry ☞E.N.T.E.R☜CLICK
…………………………….
It is a business that is so desperate that it brings tears to my eyes.
Yeah, well, if you say that … I checked the detailed screen of the item.
[Item: Fresh Milk (★★☆☆☆)Milk obtained from a rare A-class Golden Triangular Rhinoceros.A rich taste different from ordinary milk.It makes the quality of the drink better.]
Other items were similar. Each of them was accompanied by an explanation that it improves the quality of the drink.
There are rubies I got from the quest last time, so I’ll buy some. First of all, milk is essential, and…..
The ingredients piled up like a mountain on the table.
[20 rubies have been paid.]
Heck, I came to realize that I’ve overspent.
Even if I regretted it, 20 rubies were already changed to ingredients. No matter how much I look at the screen, I can’t see the refund button.
Isn’t this a rogue shop….
I blamed myself at first, but being able to purchase cafe ingredients through the system was a pretty convenient feature. If the quality of the drink gets better, it means that it has a better effect.
Yes. I bought them all because I needed them. I quickly finished rationalizing.
[Main Quest: The Path of The Barista (2)You’re a confident barista now.Increase the sales menu by completing the cafe’s five basic menus (café latte, cappuccino, cafe mocha, vanilla latte, and caramel macchiato).Complete the 5 basic cafe menus: 0/5][Rewards: Experience (200 EXP), Random Recipe, ???]
Since I bought the ingredients, I decided to do the five drink quest that I had postponed.
It’s too boring to endlessly go through the Dungeon Management Encyclopedia. As you move your hands, you may come up with a good idea to find the item.
I paid attention to the ‘???’ in the quest reward column.
Just as The Dimensional Shop has been updated without notice, there must still be hidden parts in the system. The quest could be an unexpected hint, and there was a possibility that ??? might be a good item.
Yes, rather than holding onto a book and thinking about it, let’s start with what I can do.
I hate to work hard, but finding a way to save Choi Yichan is an exception.
Once this problem is solved, I should run the cafe really leisurely.
There are a lot of coffee beans and other ingredients, so there is no need to enter the dungeon anymore. It was a step forward to the opening of a relaxed and free-spirited cafe.
Before that….
“Give, give me food! Waeeung!”
“Kkyuu!”
Mieum cried as she scratched the empty cereal bowl. When Mieum cried, Lime just cried along.
“Human, I’m hungry!”
“Kyuuu!”
“Yes, yes….”
I couldn’t resist Mieum’s whining, so I looked in the cupboard, but all of the cereal had run out.
My neck is sore because I fell asleep on a book. It’s a bit far, but I decided to go to the convenience store to buy something to eat.
“I’ll be right back, so wait for me.”
“Give me food! Waeoong!”
“Kkyu!”
I was kicked out at the behest of the animals.
I don’t want much. I only wish there is one convenience store in front of the Dungeon Gate. This is probably the only place in downtown Seoul that doesn’t have a convenience store. If possible, I want a chicken restaurant too.
I took a step with these vain thoughts.
It’s late October. The chilly morning air felt pleasant.
I was on my way back from the convenience store where I walked for a long time to buy cereal and gimbap for me to eat.
I stood looking at the endlessly upward stone wall of the Great Dungeon Abyss while stretching my body. My sore shoulder has eased a little.
At that moment, I could feel the presence of people in the vicinity.
‘Who is it?’
I turned to the side of the sound.
The owners of the voices were Ki Yoohyun and Han Yiseong.
I thought about greeting them, but the two were talking in a serious mood. The wind made me hide. I wanted to avoid them, but I have to pass the road in front of them to get back to the store.
I didn’t mean to eavesdrop. Do I have to make some noise?
But here,
‘Uhum, hmm, it’s been a while.‘
Wouldn’t it be incredibly awkward if I sneak out while doing it? Anyone who sees it will think it’s suspicious
I was thinking about how to appear as unobtrusive as possible, but I heard the sound of words. It was an unusual atmosphere.
“Is it them again? You’re making a nuisance for yourself.”
“The possibility that the denomination was involved….”
“The denomination was destroyed at that time….”
“The remnant is still alive….”
“We’ll find it within today … how do you find it? … I’ll hand it over to the Management Office….”
“Take care of it right away….”
Take care? Deal with what?
I couldn’t hear all the words afterwards, but the meaning of the word ‘take care of it‘ was quite eerie. It was never an atmosphere to talk about garbage disposal or automatic bank transfers.
“…..”
It was already too late to appear naturally. Should I step back for now? I could take a detour.
Gulp, it was the moment when I swallowed dry saliva and took a step back….
Pop!
“U-Uagh!”
The concrete brick wall where I was hiding burst. The hard bricks were turned to powder in an instant.
If I had taken two more steps to the side, it would have been my head, not the brick, that had exploded.
“Who is it?”
A cold voice was heard overhead.
“….Hick.”
I shut my mouth. I was so startled that I hiccuped. Neither sitting down nor standing, I leaned out of the wall in an awkward position.
I could feel the frozen gaze looking down at me. Ki Yoohyun said in a slightly dumbfounded voice.
“What are you doing here?”
“Hiccup, Hic … Hick.”
No words come out because of  the hiccups. I tried to hold my breath, but the hiccups kept tormenting me. I covered my mouth with one hand and pointed in the direction of the store with the other.
“….Yes?”
“Uh, hick.”
It’s right in front of my store, so what do you mean with what are you doing here! Instead of proper words, it came out as hiccups.
However, the atmosphere has not improved at all. The sharp eyes stared at me.
Let’s be still, the skill I can use at times like these….
‘Smile.’
[Running the ‘Smile‘ Skill.]
The corners of my mouth drew a gentle arc and gave a perfect business smile.
“….”
“….”
But still static. I don’t know if it works or not. One more time.
‘Smile.’
[Running the ‘Smile‘ Skill.]
Slowly, Ki Yoohyun softened his expression.
With just a little smile, the atmosphere changed drastically. The well-stretched eyes drew a gentle curve, and the morning sunlit eyelashes cast a shadow.
His face was so beautiful that it was hard to make eye contact. It was really scary just now.
“I’m sorry, I surprised you.”
Maybe you weren’t trying to surprise me, but to blow my head off? I had such doubts, but I accepted his apology for now.
“Uh, uhm. It’s okay. Be careful in the future.”
At that time, Han Yiseong, who alternately looked at Ki Yoohyun and me with a cautious expression, bowed his head and said hello.
“Haha, it’s been a while….”
It was our first meeting since the Cave Black Bear appeared, so it had been quite a while since I met Hunter Han Yiseong.
“Did you have anything to do here?”
Ki Yoohyun smiled softly.
“That’s right, I was just about to stop by the cafe later.”
I think you just explicitly avoided to answer my question.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c33:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“What were you doing there?”
“Kyuu! Kyuuuuuuu.”
Hardly, Lime moved its body and said something.
Umh I have no idea … I should have brought Mieum, who understands Lime’s words well. I don’t know how she can interpret “kkyuu“.

“Isn’t there such a thing as a slime translator?”“There is, but….”“But?”“Sometimes it’s good not to know, waeeong!”
Why, what is it? What’s the secret behind that whisper? I’m looking for a slime translator. let’s give it a try….
“Kkyu, kkyuu.”
Lime called me, who was in a different thought for a moment. Then, while bouncing its body, it pointed to a certain place.
“That thing?”
“Kkyuuu!”
In the direction Lime pointed out, there was a branch with more fruit than the other branches.
The color is deep. The fruit was so ripe that it looked like it was going to fall off at any moment. Do you want to eat that fruit?
“Do you want to eat that?”
“Kyu … kyuu!”
“Okay. I’ll pick it for you.”
I reached for the branch. However, I couldn’t pick the fruit well because it’s hard to reach.
“Um, just a little more….”
I leaned in the direction of the branch and clung to the tree trunk. As soon as I picked the fruit, my hands slipped.
“….!”
Then, as my foot tripped over the roots that rose above the ground, my body lost its balance.
Uh, wait. Was there a slope like this here?
A steep slope was hidden in a corner of this space surrounded by a thick foggy forest. It’s really exquisitely hidden away from the outside.
Of all things, my body rolled towards it.
“Kyuuuuuu!”
Surprised Lime chased me, but a slime without a hand couldn’t catch me.
The moment I chewed my lips tightly in anticipation of the pain that would follow, the surroundings stopped. It felt like time has stopped.
And then, the system window appeared.
Tiling!
[You made a deep connection with coffee]
[Skill: The Bond of a Cup of Coffee (B) has been acquired.]
[Crisis situation! ‘The Bond of a Cup of Coffee‘ is activated.][Skill Lv.1: Activation time 00:05:00 / Cooldown 24:00:00][Target: ‘Choi Yichan’ is selected.]
What?
Surprised, the system window appeared again in front of me.
[Caution! It’s a skill that consumes a lot of energy.][Skill: Defense is The Best Defense (C) is used.][Defense increases by 500% for 5 minutes.]
The surroundings, where time seemed to have stopped, moved again.
I was falling off the slope, and the ground was already close.
Ugh, it’s crashing!
But just before hitting the ground, my body curled up and took a perfect fall posture.
I’ve never learned anything like this, but my body moved naturally, as if I had known it from the beginning.
Bang!
“Eugh, aaa….”
I was startled when I got up, rubbing the hard part with my hand.
“…Uh?”
It doesn’t hurt.
There was a tremendous sound just now, but I didn’t feel any pain. I thought I would break some bones, but my body was fine. What’s going on here?
“Kyuuuuuu…..”
From the top of the slope, Lime bounced down. Worried about me, it circled around.
Touching Lime’s soft body for a moment, I finally calmed down and checked the system message that just appeared.
It definitely said that I had acquired a new skill.
‘Skill.’
There was an unfamiliar skill in the skill window. I opened the detail screen right away.
[The Bond of a Cup of Coffee (B)Details: (Lv.1) You can copy the skill of the person who drank the Ultimate Coffee. (00:05:00)Cooldown: 24:00:00Available for: Choi Yichan.]
I can copy the target’s skills?
I’ve never heard of a skill with such a huge effect.
Copying, reflecting, and nullifying a skill are fraudulent skills that only the main characters of a fantasy novel can acquire.
If you write something like “I can copy other people’s skills” on the Hunter Channel, your post will be deleted immediately after receiving malicious comments asking if you learned about Hunter from a web novel.
Even taking into account that the limit of the ultimate coffee drinkers is unclear, and the cooldown is 24 hours, it was still unbelievable that it was only a B-grade skill.
Wait a minute, I got a strange notification when I asked Choi Yichan to drink the Ice Cream Coffee.
[The target loves your coffee.You made a deep connection with coffee.]
The message meant that his skill could be copied.
Then, wouldn’t it be possible to copy more targets if I let multiple hunters drink my coffee?
Huh, what if I can copy the S-grade skill and use it?
“Awesome….”
The golden future of ‘Skill Copying Honey Bee‘ seemed to unfold before my eyes.
Wait, it’s not yet the time to be ambitious.
First, let’s check Choi Yichan’s skills. Maybe it will give me a hint to avoid the tragedy that was set for him in the future.
‘The Bond of a Cup of Coffee.’
I immediately tried the skill again.
[You can’t use the skill because the cooldown has not passed.Time Remaining until unlocked 23:50:16][Caution! It is a skill that consumes a lot of energy. If the remaining energy is less than 10, a status abnormality will occur.][Target: ‘Choi Yichan’ can be selected.]
Due to the cooldown, it was impossible to use it, but I could see the skills that can be copied.
A feast of letters continued.
[Double Slasher (F)(Lv.1) With a certain probability (0.05%), the attack occurs twice during a normal attack.]
[Push (E)(Lv.1) Constant probability (0.1%) to push the enemy when defending.]
There are only two ambiguous combat skills with poor probability. I don’t think there’s anything special….
Eh. There was a hidden next page on the skill list. When I turned the page, the red letter ‘Unacquired‘ flickered.
[Defense is The Best Defense (C) /Unacquired/(Lv.1) Defense increases by 500% for 5 minutes.※ This skill has not been acquired yet.How to acquire: Successfully defend 100 times with a shield.]
[A Deadly Blow (A) /Unacquired/The next attack has a 100% chance to inflict a critical hit.※ This skill has not been acquired yet.How to acquire: Attack monsters 200 times with a weapon.]
[Coffee is My Strength (S) /Unacquired/(Lv.1) Attack power increases by 800% when in caffeine addiction※ This skill has not been acquired yet.How to acquire: Attempt to attack while intoxicated with caffeine.]
[The Light that Illuminates The Darkness (S) /Unacquired/(Lv.1) Nullifies dark attribute damage for 1 hour.※ This skill has not been acquired yet.How to acquire: Carry a dark etheric item for 24 hours.]
Choi Yichan has not yet mastered most of the skills. However, once he gets it, it’s unbelievable that he’s an E-class hunter.
Below the description of the skill, there were even kind instructions on how to acquire it.
I paid attention to the last of them, ‘The Light that Illuminates The Darkness‘.
Nullifying dark attribute damage?
Wait, wait…..
The dungeon that Choi Yichan jumped into before the regression was a dark attribute dungeon.
So, in other words, skill acquisition = nullify dark damage = survival?
“….”
My heart thumped loudly.
When there was hope that Choi Yichan could come back alive using this, I couldn’t control my joy.
However, on the other hand, I also had these doubts.
The information was given out of the blue. Why is the system giving me the information I need? Maybe it’s up to something.
No, but as long as Choi Yichan can survive, it doesn’t matter whether it’s up to something or not.
The skill grade is also an S-grade, and they kindly taught me how to get it. First of all, I need to help Choi Yichan to acquire the skill.
The question is, where do you get the dark etheric item?
“Kyuuuu, kyuu….?”
Lime called me when I didn’t move while looking at the system window. I think it thinks I’m hurt somewhere.
“Oh, I’m fine. I’m not hurt.”
“Kyuu!”
Fortunately, the way up was quickly found. There was a pedestal to step on the slope.
I returned to the cafe, fed coffee beans to Lime, and put my body on a chair. I took my phone out of my pocket and accessed the Hunter Channel.
I entered several related keywords such as ‘dark ether‘, ‘dark item‘, and ‘dark etheric item‘ into the channel search box.
However, there are not many search results. Even so, all of them looked like this.
[Chatting] Day 15 of Dark Farming Prayer (0)[Chatting] It’s a dark item; (1)[Chatting] Amazing dark ore … or I thought it was (2)[Issue] Beware of buying dark etheric items!!! (325)[Chatting] Isn’t it an urban legend?;; (0)[Chatting] Day 99 of Dark Farming Prayer (0)
“Uh….”
I have a feeling that it’s going to be hard to get.
I don’t know exactly what the dark etheric item is, but it was almost like a fantasy item. It must be difficult to obtain easily in the Hunter Market.
I posted on the Hunter Channel as my last resort.
After a while, a comment notification sounded. I quickly connected to the Hunter Channel on my phone.
***
[Chatting] I’m looking for a dark etheric item. (2)
Upvotes: 0 / Downvotes: 0
***
Writer: F-class Cafe Owner
I’m looking for a dark etheric item.Any grade, any type, it’s fine as long as it’s dark.If you sell it, please contact me.
***
— Haster: [Link] Look for it here.
└ Healer Wanted: It’s a phishing site on this comment link. Don’t click.
……………………………………………………
I calmly deleted the post.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c32:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Today, I met Jina for the first time since the incident where the Cave Black Bear appeared.
It was reported that the Hunters of the Dungeon Management Office, the people who were late in responding the last case, were all replaced. In addition, Jina was recognized for her quick work, so her affiliation was changed. From Hunter’s Assistant to the Emergency Dungeon Countermeasures Team, directly under Hunter Kang Hyunwoo. Hunter Kang Hyunwoo is so famous that I have even heard of his name. He is a role model for the public officials. Since she is directly under such a popular person, it is practically a promotion.
Still, now that she works almost exclusively at the main office, she doesn’t come to the Dungeon Gate often. Until now, I only contacted her through KakaoTalk, but I’ve been curious about something, so I invited her today after a long time.

However, Jina’s face was dark.
I thought she would feel better now because she’s done with Hunter’s Assistance…..
Deep dark circles, bloodshot eyes, and a sigh that flowed out unconsciously. It was about the same as when she first collapsed in front of this store.
“Jina-ssi, are you okay?”
“Ah … no. I’m fine.”
You don’t look fine….
“Are you busy with work?”
“It’s not like that, but I’m just a little worried about something….”
I quickly sat Jina in the chair. Then, I grabbed Lime, who was stuck in front of the oven, and placed it on her lap.
I thought that if she touched the chewy body, she would feel a little more comfortable. This slime’s body was addictive, the more you rubbed it, the more you want to rub it.
As expected, when she touched Lime, she couldn’t resist and began to fiddle it.
Rub, rub, rub….
After fiddling with Lime for a while, Jina opened her mouth.
“The truth is, my mother’s son is a Hunter.”
“Your mother’s son?”
“I mean my brother.”
“Ah….”
“A few years ago, he strangely changed his name and left home. And then he made an accident!”
Rub, rub, rub….
Perhaps she recalled a bad memory, the hand that touched Lime became rough.
“But he suddenly called me some time ago and boasted that he was going join a famous guild. After this, he will not be ignored in the future.”
Jina shook her head. It seems that the person she called oppa was quite a troublemaker.
“I hope he doesn’t get into trouble because it’s a famous guild or something. Hunters are really….!”
Jina, who let out a heavy sigh with a complaint, suddenly paused.
“Ah, I’m sorry. Rieul-ssi is a hunter, too.”
“Ahahaha….”
I told Jina that I had awakened. To be precise, she learned it naturally. It happened because I inquired about shop repair issues and tax issues.
Jina’s older brother was a hunter, too … I wondered if I would have a chance to meet him one day.
“But Rieul-ssi doesn’t seem like a hunter.”
“Is that so?”
“Oh! Uh, look, I mean, it’s not a bad thing! In a good way!”
Jina was taken aback and added an afterthought.
“Meooong, meoong (Isn’t it because you are weak)?”
I ignored Mieum.
It was a compliment that felt incredibly sincere as it passed by.
“But this place smells good? Umh… is it the smell of butter and sugar?”
Ding!
The cookies just happened to be all baked in the oven.
“I was working on a new menu. Would you like to try it?”
“That’s so nice!”
I opened the oven and checked the cookies. A savory smell sprang up. It is well baked golden-brown cookies. The shape did not spread or crumble, and it was shaped like a round rose.
[Item: Butter Cookie (★★★☆☆)A golden brown buttered cookie.Your coffee’s best friend.Beware of similar products.]
Is it because I didn’t use the ‘Cafe in My Hand’ skill? The butter cookies have a status window, but no other effects are attached.
Of course, even without that effect, the dessert is great on its own.
“Waeeong yum?!”
“Be careful because it’s hot … ah, it’s already too late.”
Mieum, who was aiming for a cookie, straightened her hair. She seems surprised by the heat of the freshly baked cookies.
I prepared the coffee while I transferred the cookies to a plate and cooled them down. I’ll eat it with freshly baked hot cookies, so a cold coffee would be nice.
I made two iced Americanos and sat across the table.
The afternoon sun shining through the window was warm. It was a perfect time to enjoy a cold coffee.
I took a bite of the butter cookie first. The soft, not crumbly cookie melted down with a fragrant smell in my mouth.
This time, I took a sip of iced Americano.
Take another bite of the cookie, another sip of coffee….
As expected, I was right.
It means that Americano and cookies went very well together. Sweet and bitter. Coffee after a sweet dessert. It was a fantastic harmony.
“What do you think?”
Eating sweets relieves stress. Jina, who ate the butter cookies and drink her iced Americano, exclaimed.
“It’s really tasty!”
The golden gauge above the head also showed Jina’s satisfaction.
Tiling!
At that time, a system notification that I saw for the first time appeared in front of me.
[The condition has been met.Combo bonus will be generated.Combo: Afternoon Snack (Iced Americano, Butter Cookies)Effect: Reduces stress.]
Ah, it really reduced the stress.
Perhaps thanks to the combo bonus, Jina looked more comfortable as if she had relieved some worries about her family.
After distributing the cookies to Mieum and Lime, I sat at the table, enjoyed the coffee and cookies, and brought up what I wanted to ask Jina.
“Jina-ssi, do you know about higher-attribute dungeons?”
“Yes?”
Sparkle. Jina’s eyes lit up.
“Rieul-ssi, you’re interested in dungeon, too!”
Umh, it’s not really like that….
But Jina opened her mouth with an excited expression.
Dungeons, hunters, and monsters have become common in this world, but not many people are interested in the dungeon itself. They only care about how to get rare items and how to clear the dungeon quickly. How the dungeon works and what the ecology is is out of interest.
“It’s really stupid.”
… Jina let out a sigh,
“The dungeon is an unknown land where undiscovered mysteries lie!”
As she said that, Jina’s face overflowed with life that was different from just now.
She entered the Dungeon Management Office because she liked dungeons. It was true love.
It was true that there was little information about the dungeon itself. So, it was even harder to find the information I was looking for.
I tried to find out about the dungeon where Choi Yichan was involved in the pre-regression past. If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles. Gathering information about the dungeon may lead to new ways to avoid the future.
However, the only thing I remember is the keyword ‘higher attribute dungeon’. It was difficult to find information about the dungeon with only this vague memory.
I also checked the Ether-Wiki, but….
[Ether-Wiki]
[Welcome to the encyclopedia of the dimensions cultivated by The Eligible.]
‘Higher attribute dungeon.’
[No results were found for your search.Gather more information to make your encyclopedia more meaningful.]
“….”
The system didn’t help either.
As soon as I hit the wall,  I eventually decided to ask the person who was most interested in dungeons I knew; Jina.
“You know that there is such a thing as an ‘attribute dungeon’ among dungeons, right?”
“Yes.”
I’m actually hearing it for the first time now. But that’s not the point, so let’s move on.
Literally, it means a dungeon in which certain attribute appears strongly.
“Fire, wind, ice and poison are the most representative. If you don’t have the right armor or potion, you get attribute damage. If a particular ether becomes too strong in this attribute dungeon….”
“What will happen?”
“It transforms into a higher attribute dungeon.”
Jina continued her explanation.
“There are two high-level attributes: light and darkness. However, high-level dungeons are 100% dark attribute.”
“Why is that?”
“The light attribute only occurs when the dark ether is purified in a special way. Purification is impossible by human power. So, theoretically it exists, but has never been observed in practice.”
“I see….”
“And dark dungeons are very dangerous because they inflict dark damage to hunters. They could lose their life.”
“…”
According to Jina’s words, the dungeon in which Choi Yichan was involved before the regression would also be a dark dungeon … because they said the F-class dungeon has been transformed into a high-attribute dungeon.
Then, it would be nice to have an item that can block the dark attribute.
“Is there any way to nullify the dark damage?”
“Yes?”
Jina’s face turned pale.
“Huh, are you thinking of going into the dark dungeon? No, it’s not a place for a non-combat hunter!”
I waved my hand in surprise.
“No, I don’t mean to go in. I’m just curious.”
After reconfirming that I really had no intention of entering the dark dungeon, Jina continued.
“Well, the dark dungeon has not occurred in several years, so the related items are rare.”
“I see….”
“Even the amount of stocks has disappeared as a result of hoarding in illegal guilds. The main office is cracking down on it, but they’re so secretive that it’s hard to catch.”
“An illegal guild?”
The word I never heard before came out.
“It means a private guild that is not registered in the Dungeon Management Office. No, you can’t even call them guilds!”
Jina raised her voice as if she suddenly got angry.
As a result, Mieum, who was putting her front paws on the cookies on the plate, was surprised and took off her front paws. I pretended not to notice the cookie crumbs around her mouth.
“They do all kinds of vicious things, including smuggling and tax evasion. In particular, the guild called the Shin-Crown Party is given special caution.”
“Is it a dangerous guild?”
“It was there before the Dungeon Management Office was established.”
“That means….”
“That means it’s very wicked!”
Jina looked at me for support. I nodded at the force of it.
The current Dungeon Management Office was established 10 years ago. Prior to that, an institution called the Awakening Center was in charge of Hunter-related work.
However, there were many problems such as corruption and collusion, so it is said that the hunter world at the time was like a lawless zone. Slavery contracts, item smuggling, exploitation … all conceivable heinous things happened.
Back then, an F-class water body like me would have been rolled into a dungeon as a porter or ore slave. Well, I’m glad it’s gone now.
It was said that a guild called the Crown Party, which committed all sorts of illegal activities at that time, was active again under the name of the Shin-Crown Party.
After talking up to that point, Jina took out a thick book from her bag. It was a hard cover that was too thick to hold with one hand.
“I didn’t know that Rieul-ssi was interested in dungeons! Please refer to this Dungeon Ecology Encyclopedia for more detailed information. I will lend you this.”
“….Do you usually carry such a thick book?”
“Even though there are some ebooks, it’s easier to find what you’re looking for when you flip them by hand.”
Buk!
When I put the book down on the table, the sound was very heavy.
“….It’s also good for self-defense.”
Jina said that it’s okay to read it slowly and return it later, then she left the one-hit instrument … no, she left the Dungeon Ecology Encyclopedia with me.
Now that I’ve got it, I’ll give it a try. Maybe I can get some information….
“Then it goes back. Meooong.”
“Kyuu … kyuuuu!”
“Uh, heem….”
Huk, I fell asleep.
It was a book with a tremendous sleep effect.
***
My shoulders were stiff from falling asleep on the table. While rubbing my shoulders, I noticed that that Lime was missing again.
“Uh, where did Lime go?”
“Meoong (It went to the space).”
“What are you doing there….”
Is it taking a nap inside?
I went into the space beyond the wall to bring Lime out.
Yggdrasil, still with thick branches and lush leaves, greeted me. There were so many branches that even though I picked a lot of coffee fruits, it didn’t seem to have shrunk at all.
“Lime-ah, where are you?”
“Kyuu, kyuuuu!”
Lime was crying in the small space behind Yggdrasil.

Translator’s Corner:
If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles (지피지기면 백전백승). it’s a popular quote from Sun Tzu.
I’m actually not sure what should the cult’s name be translated tbh. It’s 신크라운파라 (sinkeuraunpara / sin keu ra un pa ra). I think the correct way to read it would be 신 크라운 파라, 신 is God, 크라운 is Crown, and 파라 is … idk, is it blue? and their previous name is 크라운파라 (just delete the Shin).
but God-Crown Blue doesn’t make sense as a name … and I don’t want to call it ‘God’ because it doesn’t suit the organization, so I keep it as Shin-Crown for now … and for the para … I wrote it as ‘Party’ because it’s close to ‘para’ and looks like a proper guild name. 
Well, now that I think about it, the Shin-Crown probably should be “Neo-Crown” or “New Crown”. Because, for example, 신국민주의 (shingugminjuui) is neo-nationalism / new nationalism. And considering they added the “Shin” part when re-establishing the guild, it makes sense to name it ‘New’, but what on earth is ‘para / 파라’ … I don’t think blue is the correct answer….
Huh. I don’t know, You guys can give me suggestion if you find a better name …

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c31:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

It was so cleanly smashed. The shards of glass were the size of a fingernail.
Choi Yichan, who turned white, shook his head in embarrassment.
“Uwaaa, I’m sorry! I was just trying to put it down a little.”
Choi Yichan panicked and tried to clean the shattered glass with his hands, but the more he touched it, the more the glass pieces shattered. If he did it a few more times, I thought the glass would return to the sand.

First, I calmed down Choi Yichan.
“Calm down. This is fine.”
“Hua, I’m sorry. I’m really sorry. I didn’t mean to do this….”
Choi Yichan repeatedly apologized even though I said it was okay. While I was cleaning the glass, he got flustered and opened his mouth carefully.
“Actually, I haven’t been able to control my strength since my awakening, so it’s like this sometimes.”
“Aha. I heard that happens.”
When awakened, status such as strength and agility rises overnight. That’s why it takes time to learn how to control the strength properly.
For your information, it had nothing to do with me, whose status was not high at all even as an Awakened person. Should I say I’m glad I didn’t break a cup, or should I say it’s a pity….
“I exercise every morning to control my strength.”
“Exercise? What do you do?”
Come to think of it, he was jogging when we met in front of the White Silver Guild.
“Umh, let’s see … First, I do 100 squats, 100 planks, and 100 burpees every morning, then I run a full marathon, then I repeat squats, planks, and burpees again, and then….”
“….What?”
“But today, I only did half of my usual routine because I came here, so I guess it happened because I was a little less tired.”
“I see….”
I moved a little farther away from Choi Yichan.
If I add up all the workouts I’ve done since I was born, I think it would be less than his daily workout. When I was a high school student, I used to be the first to get tired and drop out of physical education classes.
Not only that, but those wide shoulders and hard muscles greatly changed the impression. He used to be like a small puppy, but now he’s like a big dog….
Choi Yichan, who was carefully eating the freshly made ice cream coffee, asked abruptly.
“By the way, what is the name of this cafe?”
“Ah, that….”
I was greatly embarrassed.
“Why? You haven’t decided yet?”
“No, it’s not like that … it’s just….”
After a moment of hesitation, I finally answered in a mosquito-like voice.
“Cafe Ri….”
“Uh, what?”
“Cafe Rieul….”
The name of the cafe is very important.
I struggled to name it in a very strict, significant, and serious manner.
However, all the names that come to mind were not met the condition.
 ‘Dungeon Cafe‘ doesn’t seem like the right name either. ‘Cafe Abyss‘, umh, it seems like a name for a place that will go bankrupt soon. ‘Dungeon Gate Cafe‘, uh…..
This is the level of my creativity. I should have kept up with learning that fosters creativity when I was young.
After much deliberation, I asked the two animals.
“Hey, is there a name that’s colorful and simple, memorable, but not too flashy, and moderately unique and familiar?”“Put my name on it!”“Kyuuuuuuu….?”
They didn’t help at all though.
I thought about it all day, but I couldn’t think of a good name, so I decided to give it my name.
When I thought about putting my name on the signboard, I was embarrassed because it seemed too self-conscious.
“Kiyaoong (Cafe Mieum is more suitable)!”
Let’s ignore the cat who is interfering with my decision.
“Really? That’s cool!”
Choi Yichan did not think it was strange at all. Thank you. It’s a little comforting.
“Then how are you these days? Since you’ve awakened … are you going to join a guild?”
While we were having a small talk, I carefully brought up the main topic. He smiled awkwardly and shook his head.
“Haha, no, I’m an E-class. It must be difficult to find a guild that will accept me.”
I’m sorry for Choi Yichan, but I felt relieved for a while.
“Still, I’ve awakened. If there is someone in need, I want to help.”
“…”
With a grin, Choi Yichan tapped me on the shoulder.
“Tell me if you need anything. I’ll come to help. It’s hard enough because I have a lot of power left over.”
“Uh? Really? Then, next time … I’ll ask you next time. Will you really come?”
I said with a feeling of grasping at straws.
The dungeon, where Choi Yichan was involved before my return, broke out in Suwon, Gyeonggi-do. Seoul, especially Gangbuk, is quite far from there. So, at least this place will be safe for him.
I was terrified to think that I might not see him again when winter approached and it snowed.
“Ah, of course. I will come right away when you call me, so please call me.”
Choi Yichan smiled broadly. He gave me that promise and left the cafe.
***
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Sub-Quest: The Ultimate Coffee’.Please collect the reward.][Skill point owned: 1][Please choose a skill to level up.]
After Choi Yichan left, the quest completion notification popped up and the skill points came in. It seems that the quest was accomplished by giving Choi Yichan an ice cream coffee earlier.
So what on earth is The Ultimate….
The question remained, but it wasn’t important.
I leveled up the Barista Skill by using skill point with excitement.
[The Barista’s Extraction (D)Details: (Lv.2) Extract only the desired substance from the mixed substances.]
“Huhuhu….”
As expected, I was right.
If I use this skill, I will be able to make sugar without bothering with trimmed the stems, squeezed the sap, filtered out the residue, boiled, boiled, boiled, and boiled again steps.
There is no reason to waste time. I took the stalks of the dungeon sugarcane that I had cut beforehand. I used the skill immediately before the deluded Mieum attacked the fluttering leaves
‘The Barista’s Extraction.’
[The extraction is complete.]
With the glittering light, the stalk of the dungeon sugarcane disappeared and only the sap remained.
Dark brown with a moderately sticky texture, and this sweet smell that comes out of it. When I dipped it a little and tasted it, I could feel the deep sweetness.
We have succeeded!
“Meow, it smells good!”
“Kkyuuuu!”
Since the sap extraction was successful, the remaining process was simple. I poured the sap into a square bowl and placed it on a well-ventilated window. After feeding the cat and slime, I ate dinner, and when I came back, it hardened just right.
The sap that had turned into hard caramel was cut into squares with a knife. When I put the square lump in a blender and grind it, it soon turned into fine granules of sugar.
[Item: Magic Sugar (★★☆☆☆)Natural sugar made by hardening the sap of Dungeon Sugarcane.It’s sweet, but it’s good for your body. No matter how much you eat, don’t worry about blood sugar.Maybe you can get a special effect depending on the recipe?]
Sugar has many uses. But before that, there was something I wanted to make first.
***
The next day, I called the cat and slime in front of me and asked with a solemn expression.
“If there is one thing missing about this cafe, what would it be?”
Mieum and Lime had a lukewarm response.
“Kyuu….?”
“What are you talking about all of a sudden, meong.”
“Tell me. What is the shortcoming of this cafe, which is about to officially open now?”
Mieum, who was lying down on her stomach for a while, raised her front paws up.
“Mascot?”
“Kyuuu.”
“Of course, there should be a cute animal mascot.”
“….not that.”
“Interior?”
“Kyuuu.”
“No. It’s not that, think carefully.”
I shook my head. Mieum raised her front paws, proudly said that this time is the correct answer.
“Customer!”
“Kyuuu, Kyuuuuuuuu!”
Next to her, Lime violently bounced its body as sign of agreement.
“….”
That’s what you guys thought about the shortcoming of this cafe? … I am a little hurt.
Giving up on asking these animals for the correct answer, I put the plastic bag in my hand on the table. Then, I took out the stuff inside one by one.
Eggs, butter, and flour. They were all just bought from the supermarket.
And I put the magic sugar that I finished yesterday next to it.
“What this cafe lacks … It’s a dessert.”
As expected, cafes should have dessert menus as well as drinks.
Americano is delicious, it’s surprisingly delicious, but …  I felt a little disappointed. If there is dessert here, it’ll be perfect.
Sweet dessert and fragrant Americano. The taste of Americano gives a refreshing finish to the soft sweetness. Needless to say, it’s a fantastic combination.
So, after finishing the sugar, I decided to make a dessert to eat with the coffee.
“….”
I waited for a while, but the system did not respond. It’s a right time to launch a completely new quest….
I was a little puzzled because it was different from the time when the notification rang to the point of raising my annoyance. After the obsession phase, is it neglecting me now? I was skeptical that it was only in the beginning that the rewards were generously poured and then slightly reduced.
Well, anyway. The menu I’m going to make today is butter cookies.
The ingredients are simple and relatively easy, so it is a recipe that I can make. The soft texture that melts softly will go very well with coffee.
First, leave the butter at room temperature, put it in a bowl, and whisk it. Next, add sugar and mix it until there’s no crunching sound. Add eggs and flour to creamy butter in order, then mix it to complete the dough.
“It’s done … wait, Kwon Mieum, stop!”
“Why?!”
Mieum tried to taste the dough by dipping it with her front feet. I can’t let my guard down with this cat.
She tried to pretend she didn’t do anything wrong, but the yellow dough on her front feet was an undeniable evidence.
While separating Mieum from the bowl, it was Lime’s turn in aiming for the dough this time. Dungdung, dungdung. The bowl that hit Lime’s elastic body shook unsteadily.
“….Huk!”
That’s a relief. I caught it by a hair’s breadth. I almost fell on the floor.
“No, you have to bake it before you can eat it.”
“Kkyuu….”
“No kkyuu!”
I quarantined the two animals that were only disturbing. Then, I started to squeeze the dough into a circle on an oven plate.
“Ugh….”
It was difficult at first, but soon I was able to knead the dough into a suitable shape.
Next, the oven was preheated and the dough was put in. It was a small home oven, but it was big enough to bake a plate of cookies.
Soon, the cookies were baked golden in the oven, and the fragrant smell spread throughout the store. Unable to wait for the cookies to be fully cooked, Mieum and Lime stuck together and looked into the oven.
Then, I heard a knock on the door.
I looked at the clock and it was just on time. I didn’t realize that so much time had already passed because I was so absorbed in baking the butter cookies.
“Come on in.”
“Hello.”
The long-awaited guest, Jina, entered the cafe.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c30:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Come in first.”
I decided to tell Choi Yichan honestly about my return and the planned future.
Returning from the future to the past … I was worried that no one would believe such an absurd story, but Choi Yichan’s life is the most important thing.
By the way.
“Yichan-ah, I have something to tell you.”

“Huh? What is it?”
“It’s … soon ██ will ██…..”
What?
I tried to say ‘Suwon‘, but my voice didn’t come out.
“On ██, ████ ████ is….”
Again. I tried a few more times, but it was the same.
Words such as Suwon, Dungeon, and Mutation could not be spoken at all, and it was useless to say it in a roundabout way. Any attempt to tell anything about the future was blocked.
[System Error: —. —.—]
[System Error: —. —.—]
“Meooow (It’s the intervention of causality).”
Seeing me in confusion, Mieum spoke to me.
“What? What is that?”
“Waeong, waeoong, waeong (The system prevents pre-regression facts from intervening in the present, because it is a memory that currently does not exist and will only happen in the future).”
“But it’s okay when I told Mieum about it before, right?”
“Kyaooong (Because I’m not part of the time axis).”
“How can you do that!”
In other words, it is impossible to directly tell Choi Yichan what will happen in the future.
I felt afraid and displeased that the system could even shut my mouth.
“Kwon Ri, what’s wrong?”
After I didn’t say anything for a while, Choi Yichan called me worriedly.
“Uh, yeah, that’s it.”
I looked up at Choi Yichan.
The body wrapped in the blue sweatshirt looks very strong. I could see the tight muscles that would never come out without proper exercise.
Is it possible to be so different just by awakening? I’ve awakened, too, but I didn’t change at all on the outside.
It’s been about 2 years since the last time I’ve met Choi Yichan, and in reality, it’s been about 5 years if I include the time before I returned. He was incredibly unfamiliar.
“It’s just a little … You’ve changed a lot.”
“Huh? Me? Oh! My face is a bit tanned, right?”
No, not that….
However, his simple and bright personality, his tendency to worry about others, and his inability to turn away from those in need, has not changed at all.
If this is the case, the same thing will happen again….
No, it’s not. It’s too early to give up. I have to find a way to change the future, even if I don’t say it directly.
Yes, talking with Choi Yichan might give me a hint. I struggled to swallow my discouragement.
“Kiyaaoong (Is that man your friend)!”
Mieum, who was lying on her belly on the floor, cried when she saw Choi Yichan’s long shadow.
“Meooong (Unlike you, he looks sincere).”
Instead of answering, I mumbled, pointing to a black stain on the floor.
“There is some ink here.”
“Waeuung….”
Mieum, startled, rolled her eyes.
I didn’t say anything, but she sneaked to the corner and raised her front paws. I guess she’s reflecting on herself. Yeah, you should be a little sorry.
It was really hard to clean the store with Mieum’s footprints all over it. Even after brushing and wiping with a mop, there was no end.
I even thought about using the cleaning skill I had forgotten.
The Floor is Shiny (E)Details: (Lv. 1) Cleaning toilets can be done quickly.
This ‘the floor is shiny‘ really only applied to the bathroom. I had no choice but to wipe the floor and walls of the store myself.
Wait, then if I level up my skill, can I use it anywhere else besides the bathroom?
Well, I’ll figure this out next time….
At that time, Choi Yichan came back after looking around the store.
“Wow, you have a cat, too. It’s cute.”
Choi Yichan gently tickled Mieum’s chin. Mieum looked at him, and slowly lowered her front paws and placed her chin on Choi Yichan’s palm, making a squeaky sound.
She let it slide because she felt sorry for him.
Come to think of it, where’s Lime? Normally, it’d stick next to Mieum.
“Meooong (it went to the space)….”
Really? What’s the matter? Let’s put off showing off Lime next time.
I spoke as I turned to the espresso machine.
“Sit down. I’ll make you something to drink.”
“Ooooh.”
Choi Yichan looked at me with expectant eyes.
I have not yet made the basic five menu of cafes ordered by the system, but I decided to make a different menu today.
Since I met Choi Yichan for the first time in a long time, I wanted to make a drink that suits his taste rather than to finish the quest.
To sum up this guy’s taste in one word, he liked sweetness the best. There have even been times when he poured coffee mix over ice cream and ate it.
The menu I’m going to make today is similar to that, but a little different. I decided to make it sweeter than the common affogato.
I took out two glasses, filled each with ice, and used the skill. The espresso was extracted and poured onto the ice one by one. After the espresso on the ice cooled down, I poured milk into the glass and added vanilla syrup.
The last thing to put in is this. I opened the refrigerator next to me and took out the vanilla ice cream I bought from the supermarket yesterday. It was two flavors of vanilla ice cream wrapped in paper. It was a little expensive, but I’m glad I bought it with a big heart.
I put two yellow-flavored ice creams in Choi Yihan’s share and two blue-flavored ice creams in mine.
It’s like adding vanilla ice cream to the vanilla latte, so the sweetness will be very strong.  It was finished after I sprinkled chocolate powder on top of the ice cream.
I held out the glass to Choi Yichan.
“Okay, it’s done. Try it.”
“Woah, it looks delicious. Thank you for the drink.”
I also had a glass in my hand.
I took a bite of ice cream with a spoon, then mixed it with coffee and drank it. The fragrant vanilla scent and deep sweetness were mixed in the mouth in a balanced way.
After slowly savoring the taste, I watched Choi Yichan. He had just tasted the coffee, too.
“Is it good?”
“….”
“Choi Yichan?”
“…..”
There is no answer.
Instead, a long bar appeared above Choi Yichan’s head, and the golden gauge began to fill up.
Soon, the gauge filled up to the end, and the effect of exploding sparks appeared.
Well, it must be delicious. I took another sip of the drink again.
The softness of the milk and the rich taste of espresso wrapped the sweet vanilla ice cream. The sweetness seems to wash away the fatigue left in my body.
However, since I made it without following the recipe of the ‘Cafe in My Hand’ skill, there seems to be no additional effect.
The status window doesn’t appear even when I look at the drink…
Tiling! A familiar sound rang out.
[Congratulations! You developed a new recipe on your own.You can register this drink in your own recipe. Please register the name.Name: ]
Did the system have this feature?
After thinking for a while, I entered the name ‘Ice Cream Coffee’. Then, a new status window appeared.
[Item: Ice Cream Coffee (★★☆☆☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)Effect: Your body will get cold.]
Wow, it’s possible to register a menu like this.
After emptying all of my glass, I asked Choi Yichan, who was still silent.
“Yichan-ah, what do you think?”
“….”
… Gulp.
I don’t know that he’s really focused on drinking. Instead an answer, the golden gauge exploded again and a notification popped out.
[The target loves your coffee.You made a deep connection with coffee.]
Heum, heum.
I don’t know what that means, but it’s delicious, right?
Will they give me something? Achievement? Or is the quest completed?
However, no matter how long I waited, no new notifications popped up.
Uh, is this the end? This is the right mood to give me something really good!
Isn’t it natural to say, ‘Now that you made a deep connection with coffee, you should receive a reward‘? According to the pattern so far, I thought the system would give me a golden ticket.
Did they just raise the standards? Did they only compliment me that it was that good now?
I feel like the reward is getting worse and worse….
I remembered a game where the system was pretty generous when I was a beginner, but when I leveled up to a certain extent, the reward was reduced like a ghost and they started charging. You’re going to screw it up if the system is like this!
I grumbled in my mind that the system was going to go bankrupt while saving user rewards.
“Gulp, gulp, gulp … huaaa, ah!”
In the meantime, Choi Yichan ate all the ice cream in the glass and gulped down the remaining coffee.
After drinking every last drop, he looks at the bottom of the glass as if it were a pity.
I picked up a tissue and handed it to Choi Yichan. Choi Yichan, who roughly wiped the cream off his mouth, looked at me. Those eyes were filled with joy.
“This is so delicious!”
A voice full of pure joy.
“That’s a relief. Haha, thank you.”
“Oh, it tastes like …. paaah, then it becomes soft.”
What does that mean….
But his sincerity was fully conveyed. Even without looking at the gauge above his head, I could feel it just with his expression and eyes.
“I’ve never had anything like this before. It’s so delicious!”
I was overjoyed with Choi Yichan’s intense reaction.
All the coffee I made so far has been well received. Even the first coffee mix tasted special.
But this is a menu that I came up with to suit Choi Yichan’s taste. Seeing a close person happy made me feel a different sense of pride.
I took the ice cream out of the refrigerator again and asked.
“Do you want me to make you one more?”
“Oh, good!”
Krak.
It was the moment when Choi Yichan put the empty glass down on the table.
It wasn’t a rough move, but the thick glass cup was shattered into pieces.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c29:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

After returned to the past, I was immediately distracted by my own problems, so I couldn’t even think of it. No, maybe I was deliberately trying not to think about it.
Even before my regression, Choi Yichan had awakened as a Hunter. He was an E-class defensive hunter.
All my friends and I congratulated Choi Yichan. It’s generally not a high grade, but Hunter is Hunter. They’re rare, and not everyone can become an Awakened.

There was no one better suited to be a Hunter than Choi Yichan, who likes to help others. Back then, we giggled and teased him about what if he would soon become famous and we’ll only see him on TV.
We really didn’t get to see each other again.
A rift occurs near an elementary school in Suwon, Gyeonggi-do. Choi Yichan, who was nearby, voluntarily jumped into the dungeon to prevent the children from getting caught up.
That was his first and last dungeon trip.
The dungeon that was initially identified as an F-class dungeon unexpectedly transformed into a higher-level attribute dungeon, and Choi Yichan died without even using his strength properly due to the powerful attribute attack.
The three letters of his name was found at the end of the list of fatalities in the Breaking News.
That was it. No bodies were found.
After that day, Choi Yichan’s story was taboo among my friends. Not only that, but we stopped talking about Hunter completely.
No matter how great Hunter is, Choi Yichan died in the end. We didn’t know how to accept the death of a close person.
“Kwon Ri, are you sick? You don’t look good.”
The remark brought me to my senses. I lifted my head.
A sun-tanned face was looking anxiously at me.
He’s still alive.
It’s only a memory before the regression, and the present Choi Yichan is still safe.
The tremor finally stopped when I repeated it in my mind.
“No, I’m okay….”
“Ah, I’ll call you later. Let’s eat together sometime.”
“Uh, hey, wait a minute!”
I called, but Choi Yichan only waved his hand and continued his run. Soon, his back became as small as a fingernail.
He’s still alive.
But soon….
My heart was beating wildly.
I have never thought deeply about the meaning of regression. I just thought I was lucky to have come back from death, and I was focused on living a different life from the past.
However, that was not all.
This is what it meant to be back in the past. I can meet someone who I will never see again.
Perhaps … I might be able to change the future.
The wind was cold. I stared at his back as he moved away and turned around.
***
“I’m home.”
Flutter.
When I returned to the store and opened the door, a piece of paper fluttered in the wind fell over my head.
Uh, what is this?
When I picked it up, it was a tissue. A tissue with Mieum’s feet stamped in the middle. The tissue  stamped with the footprints must have been blown away.
I put the tissue in my pocket, and one flew away again.
Flutter, flutter, flutter….
The endless pouring of tissues were all stamped with footprints.
“….”
I had an ominous feeling. I hurriedly entered the store and looked around.
A mountain of tissue was piled up on the floor and on the table. Not only that, but they also left footprints on the floor and the walls.
“Mieum-ah, Lime-ah, where are you?”
I wandered around looking for the animals that caused the accident. Soon, a thin cry was heard from the warehouse inside.
Bang. I slammed the door open and looked inside.
The cat, who was obsessed with stamping the floor with its paws for a long time, and the slime who had been encouraging it were startled.
“Mieum?”
“Waeung…….” 
“Lime?” 
“Kkyuu…….”
The two animals kept their heads down as if they were ashamed.
“You must have had a lot of fun stamping….”
I’m glad she got her liveliness back. My head ached at the thought of wiping out all those ink stains.
Raising animals is really hard….
***
Kwon Jiwoon lifted his head as he felt his head throb.
Time passed, and the evening was near. There was still work to be done, but stiff fatigue weighed on his body.
“…Haa.”
The image of him rubbing his fingertips around his eyes looks very delicate. After his awakening, his hair turned to silver and it created an atmosphere like a cold winter breeze.
Kwon Jiwoon picked up the document he had left on his desk.
He already knows the content even without reading it. There will be no difference between the documents he has already received several times and this one.
The document was about the guild leader of White Silver Guild. In other words, it was the result of a search for Kwon Rieul’s uncle and Kwon Jiwoon’s father.
There are no results.
His father entered a dungeon a few years ago and never returned. Normally, you’d think he was killed in the dungeon. Hunter’s death in the dungeon has happened many times since the birth of dungeons, monsters, and Awakeners in the world.
However, Kwon Jiwoon did not think his father was dead.
It’s not just because it’s hard to accept reality. It’s because there was something suspicious about the day his father went missing.
That’s the reason why he’s still not giving up and continuing the search.
“….”
Kwon Jiwoon looked into his status window. Red mark blinks in the notification indicator.
[Your mana has run out.][Debuff: All stats are reduced by 70%.]
He overused his skills today to treat the hunters who were injured in a rift a few days ago. When he’s about to run out of mana, he drank potion, and again, and again….
After repeating this process several times, his status were lowered to the bottom due to a debuff caused by mana depletion.
Ever since his father disappeared, the White Silver Guild has been Kwon Jiwoon’s responsibility.
He never took that responsibility too seriously. However, when his status were in such a mess, a sense of helplessness that could not be swallowed all rose.
There are about 30 minutes left until the next schedule. It’s not that new letters would pop out of the paperwork just by staring at it. The throbbing in his head only got worse.
Kwon Jiwoon put the document down on the desk and leaned back on his chair. He thought he should take a break for a while.
At that moment, a silver thermos in the corner of the desk caught his eye. His cousin, Kwon Rieul, left this thermos behind.
‘She said she made coffee.’
Kwon Jiwoon hesitated for a moment, then reached out for the thermos.
‘Even though I said I didn’t need it.’
While muttering like that, he did not throw it away and took the large thermos in his hand instead. The headaches were tormenting him endlessly.
Still, Kwon Jiwoon was against setting up a cafe in front of the Dungeon Gate.
The Great Dungeon Abyss.
One day, it suddenly appeared in the middle of the city. The monsters, the Awakeners, and the system … it’s an unknown dungeon that brought it all together.
Kwon Jiwoon felt a sense of urgency when he saw the endlessly stretched up wall. It’s an absurd expression, but at one point he felt like it was alive.
It’s a space that has always been quiet for now, but no one knows what will happen in the future. What if something dangerous happens in front of the dungeon gate?
Even so, he couldn’t stop Kwon Rieul because it was the first thing she wanted to do.
With a complicated mind, Kwon Jiwoon thought of his only cousin.
Since his awakening as a healer, a rare class, Kwon Jiwoon has received a lot of attention.
Korea’s first A-class healer with strong healing skills. It was natural that the expectations were high.
However, not all the attention was positive. It would have been better if they’re undermining or criticizing his abilities.
The attention was also drawn to his family instead. Doubts and accusations about the missing father, and….
Not only paparazzi, but there’s also people who approach his only cousin for solicitation purposes.
In the end, Kwon Jiwoon thought it would be better to keep a distance to protect his younger sister.
Although it may seem calm on the outside, the current Hunter World is a vicious battlefield. His desire for his younger sister to keep a distance from this ferocious community also played a part.
But now, a Hunter is approaching Rieul. Besides, his smile is very suspicious.
“….Ha.”
As expected, he should persuade her to move the cafe to the 1st floor of the guild. It seemed to be more reassuring to keep her nearby.
The headache got worse and worse. He didn’t feel like drinking coffee, but he didn’t want to throw away what she had brought for the first time in a long time. He opened the thermos.
As soon as he opened the lid, he could smell the sweet scent of coffee. A scent resembling a fragrant nut seemed to wrap around him warmly.
“….!”
Forgetting that he didn’t want to drink coffee, Kwon Jiwoon immediately poured the coffee into a cup.
The dark brown water was warm as if it had just brewed. The warmth in his hands melted the tense tension. Even though he only took a sip, the aroma and savory taste of the coffee filled his mouth.
As soon as he came to his senses, he emptied the entire cup, and poured another cup out of regret.
Then, he realized that his head didn’t hurt. The headache that had been plagued him all day as a side effect of mana depletion was completely gone.
‘Status.’
The debuff on the status window was also released and returned to normal.
What’s going on? It’s the first time a debuff has been lifted so quickly. For what reason….
Is it a coincidence?
Kwon Jiwoon cut off the idea of stretching out branches.
What’s the reason? The coffee his sister made for him was delicious, so he felt at ease.
He felt not only fatigue, but also the heavy worry and anxiety that had always been on the side of his head washed away. It was the first time since his awakening that he felt so at peace.
As the anxiety that had been weighing him down all the time was relieved, it felt like Rieul’s work was no big deal.
“There’s no need to be so impatient.”
He also put aside his decision to have Rieul move her cafe right away.
Let’s wait a little longer.
Kwon Jiwoon put down the empty cup. Only the coffee scent remained and lingered around him.
***
“It’s here? This place is very hollow.”
“It’s a store left by my deceased grandmother.”
“It’s very, uh, elegant, uh … it’s quiet and the atmosphere is nice!”
At my words, Choi Yichan demonstrated a tallulah.
He must have squeezed the best possible words after seeing the only old building on a desolate road.
When he heard that I had set up a cafe, Choi Yichan said he wanted to come and play. I said yes right away.
Perhaps by meeting and talking to him, I could figure out a way to change the future.
Choi Yichan got caught up in the dungeon on the day when the first snow fell across the country. I don’t remember the exact date, but it’s clear that the breaking news came out while I was watching the weather news.
It’s late October now. There is a little time until the snowy season.
In the meantime, if I trace my memory, maybe….
Maybe I can find a way to change the future.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Tallulah (탈룰라를) is an internet meme derived from a scene from the movie Cool Runnings. It refers to a situation when somebody speaks ill of something, but then suddenly changes their mind and praises the same thing just moments later to rectify the situation. It’s called talullah because in the movie,  they’re discussing how to name their sleigh, Person A suggests the name “tallulah”. and then Person B immediately says it sounds like a whore’s name. When A tells that it’s his mother’s name, B says it’s a wonderful name.
Happy the first day of August! Thank you so much for everyone who left likes and comments in the past month. Oh, also for everyone who gave this novel a rating and/or review on NU, I appreciated it a lot! I translated this novel because I like the story and want more people to be able to read it, so it’s nice to know that other people like the story too, it gives me motivation to keep translating 😀
