SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c28:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Park Heeyoung. She’s a senior hunter in the White Silver Guild and a B-class tanker, she was Kwon Jiwoon’s shield.
Park Heeyoung devoted herself to protecting healer Kwon Jiwoon, and tried to stop everything that stood on his way, both inside and outside the dungeon.
For example … me, an ordinary relative who can’t be of any help to him.

“Kwon Rieul-ssi, do you not understand the current situation? Hunter Kwon Jiwoon is the best healer in Korea. It means he doesn’t have time to pay attention to these little things.”“But I still have to give this to him….”“Give it to me. I’ll give it to him.”“Please tell my brother to contact me.”“Stop whining. He’ll call you when he has time.”
Being treated like this, naturally, the number of my visits to the guild decreased. Well, Kwon Jiwoon didn’t contact me either, so Park Heeyoung must be right.
I was glad she wasn’t here in my last visit before, but I was unlucky this time.
Sure enough, Park Heeyoung frowned at me again this time. She also has a knack for showing her hatred just by her face.
“What happened this time?”
No, I didn’t want to come either.
“Don’t you know that Hunters are busy because a rift appeared a few days ago? The deputy guild leader has a schedule today, so he’s not available.”
Kwon Jiwoon called me, so I was angry because I was treated as an uninvited guest. I, too, did not hide my displeasure and spoke straight away.
“It’s a family affair, so what does Hunter Park Heeyoung have to do with it? Whether we meet or not, I will take care of it.”
“He’s not here right now.”
“Don’t you know that I came here because he asked me to come? I won’t come voluntarily because I don’t want to see Park Heeyoung-ssi.”
“Kwon Rieul-ssi!”
Perhaps because of the loud noise, the door of the guild leader’s room opened. Kwon Jiwoon found me and asked with a puzzled expression.
“Kwon Rieul, if you’re here, why don’t you come in? What is Hunter Park Heeyoung doing here?”
Park Heeyoung, who had stiffened, immediately put on a troubled expression. Huh, right. It’s a lie that he’s not here.
“I … Miss Rieul visited, so I was going to show her around.”
She’s truly a snake. It was amazing to see her speaking in a polite and kind manner unlike before.
“Why are you giving tour here? Didn’t you say you have an appointment today?”
“It … it’s changed all of a sudden….”
“Well, that’s enough. I’ll hear you later. Kwon Rieul, come in.”
I looked at Park Heeyoung sternly once and followed Kwon Jiwoon into his office room.
***
Something was strange.
I don’t know exactly what it is, but the atmosphere was totally strange.
As I sat down on the sofa in the reception room, the staff brought tea and sweets. Chewing on the crunchy cookies, I waited for Kwon Jiwoon to bring the words up.
“….?”
But he didn’t speak at all. As I lifted my head in the unexpected silence, I saw Kwon Jiwoon licking his lips.
Kwon Jiwoon opened his mouth only after I ate two more tasteless cookies on the plate.
“How are you these days?”
“Uh, what….”
I blurted out the end of the sentence awkwardly. It felt very awkward to hear that unsuitable greeting. In this case, the sweets I just ate seem to be on top.
“Were you surprised before? Is there no pain? If it hurts anywhere, don’t hold back and tell me right away.”
“Uh, I’m fine.”
I thought he was going to say, ‘I heard you’ve awakened‘.
Kwon Jiwoon continued beating around the bush for a while longer.
“Rieul-ah, you’re 23 years old this year.”
“Uh….”
“It’s already been more than three years since we’ve lived separately.”
“….”
He’s not a relative that I met on some holiday … if I left it alone, all sorts of personal stories would come out. It would be better to just be criticized first than to keep hearing this.
“What are you trying to say?”
“You are the opposite of a Hunter.”
“What?”
I doubted my ears for a moment at the random remark, but Kwon Jiwoon had a serious expression on his face.
“It’s not something for me to say, but they are arrogant, selfish, and live in their own way. I don’t want you to get involved with people like that.”
“Uh … I don’t really like Hunter either.”
I just accidentally became an Awakened.
“Yeah, you thought well. Kwon Rieul, you’re an adult now, but … it’s still too early for that.”
What on earth are you talking about? How can it be too early to be an Awakened? This is a world where many people are awakened when they’re still in elementary school. I was puzzled.
However, Kwon Jiwoon was lost in thought by himself, and he suddenly said something else.
“After all, I was not in favor of opening a cafe in such a place. Why don’t you come to the first floor of our guild now? It would be much better than that place.”
“….what?”
After all, this was the purpose.
I hate it.
Although I suddenly awakened, entered the dungeon, and rolled in an unexpected direction, I am still preparing to open my cafe little by little.
Furthermore, if I placed my cafe on the first floor of this guild, I have to keep meeting people like Park Heeyoung. It seems that Park Heeyoung is being annoying to me for Kwon Jiwoon’s sake.
I didn’t want to keep confirming that I was a burden to Kwon Jiwoon. I wanted to spend my time leisurely while running a cafe, but I didn’t intend to do it with Kwon Jiwoon’s money.
The feeling of being denied of all my efforts in the past made me feel depressed in an instant.
I was expecting him to talk about something different this time because he called me after a long time and asked me how I was doing. Something more like a family story.
I can’t do this.
“I’ll take care of it. Did you call me just to say that?”
I got up abruptly to show him that I didn’t want to listen any more, but Kwon Jiwoon grabbed me. Perhaps he still has something to say, he spoke out urgently and quickly.
“I met Hunter Han Yiseong and I heard everything.”
“So what?”
“A hunter from his guild is making romantic advances to you.”
“…Huh?”
Are you talking about Ki Yoohyun?
“He said that person comes to your store every day. If you don’t like it, say no. I’ll never let him approach you.”
Only then did I realize that Kwon Jiwoon had a ridiculous misunderstanding.
Romantic advances … what?
I thought I heard it wrong at first.
“Don’t tell me … are you talking about Yoohyun-ssi?”
“Calling him by his first name … have you already become that close to him?”
“If I don’t call people by their first names, then what should I call them….”
Hey, you there, obviously I can’t call him that way.
So, this is it.
It wasn’t that he found out about my awakening, but he misunderstood that Ki Yoohyun was approaching me with a different meaning.
I’m glad he didn’t find out about the awakening, but….
I shook my head with a disgusted expression.
“Are you crazy? It’s not like that. Don’t talk nonsense.”
Ki Yoohyun has come to the store for coffee a few times recently.
But he’s really coming for the coffee.
Although he was strangely friendly, he smiled broadly as if he was moved every time he drank coffee.
“Then it’s not true?”
“Of course it’s not.”
I don’t know what Hunter Han Yiseong said that led to such an absurd misunderstanding.
“Well, it was kind of strange.”
“I know right?”
For a moment, I thought I was lucky that the misunderstanding was resolved.
“Because that kind of bum doesn’t suit you.”
Huh … what?
I was surprised to hear Kwon Jiwoon’s sudden acceleration.
From an objective point of view, isn’t Ki Yoohyun so handsome that it becomes burdensome?
“Wait, then what kind of person would suit me?”
“If it’s a Hunter, first … he must be strong.”
“To what extent?”
“To the point where he won’t lose to anyone.”
“……”
“But it’s not good to believe in your own strength and run wild just because you are strong. He has to be someone who does his part quietly.”
“……”
What? Did you watch a movie about a hero in the dark yesterday?
More than that, there is only one person in Korea who meets that condition, isn’t it?
Umh, let’s respect his taste….
Feeling a little drained, I took out the thermos I had brought. I brought it with me just in case I got caught, but it’s hard to take it back.
Since I brought it all the way here, I wanted to give it to him and leave.
“Don’t say anything weird and drink this.”
“What is this?”
“This is the coffee I made.”
“You said you made coffee? It’s all right, you can take it back.”
“If you don’t need it, you can just throw it away.”
“….I don’t mean that.”
With a complicated expression, Kwon Jiwoon received the thermos. Still, it didn’t seem he will throw it away.
There is really nothing to say now. I left the guild leader’s room straight away.
***
It was the time when I came out of the White Silver Guild,
Bugh.
My body slumped against the hard object. While walking without looking straight ahead, I bumped into a person coming from the opposite side.
“Ugh, I’m sorry.”
I bowed my head and tried to continue my steps, but I was blocked.
“Kwon Ri?”
“Yes?”
Let’s raise my head, in a word … there was an athletic man standing in front of me.
Curly golden hair, sun-tanned skin, and thick, firm-looking arms. The man seemed to know me, but I couldn’t remember where I had seen such a man.
A man wearing only a thin sweatshirt even though it’s cold today. I smiled and pretended to know him.
“Can’t you recognize me?”
It was only after hearing that voice that a name came to mind.
“Uh, maybe… … Choi Yichan?”
“Yes, that’s right! I didn’t know we’d meet here. It’s been a long time!”
I was very confused and looked at him blankly.
Choi Yichan is my high school friend. We used to buy snacks together at the cafeteria.
‘He was very small back then….’
Back then, he was often targeted by bullying due to his small stature and docile personality.
His eyes are much higher than mine now. Now I need to look up to see his face. His shoulders are broad and his arms look muscular, making his body looks sturdy.
Therefore, it was not unreasonable not to recognize him immediately.
“Ah! Wait a minute.”
While talking, Choi Yichan rushed to somewhere.
He picked up an old lady’s luggage across the crossing. Then, a person pulling a stroller, a person with difficulty walking, a child who almost fell at the crosswalk….
It took a long time for him to finally come back to me.
It’s really Choi Yichan. That guy has always been the kind of person who couldn’t let go of someone in difficulty.
But if I remember correctly, Choi Yichan would have been serving in the military by now.
And after he was discharged….
Suddenly, my heart began to pound loudly. The memory I had buried consciously seemed to reveal itself in my head.
After being discharged from the army, I’m sure….
“Oh! Haven’t you heard the story yet?”
Choi Yichan smiled brightly.
“Story? What story?”
“I heard Shin Mira told you about it.”
I took my phone out of my pocket. In the meantime, Shin Mira sent me the answer through KakaoTalk.
[Shin Mira: Who do you mean whoㅡㅡ][Shin Mira: It’s Choi Yichan.][Shin Mira: Choi Yichan awakened and was discharged immediately. He said he’d like to see you next time.]
“Awakened…?”
“Heh, so I was discharged from the army not too long time ago. Haha.”
….you’re still alive.
I swallowed the thought that came to my mind.
For an instant, as if the fog had been lifted, I remembered the buried memory.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
“She’s truly a snake” actually the term used by Rieul is 능구렁이 (red spotted snake). It’s a metaphor for  a sneaky person who is sly and plays tricks cautiously without arousing suspicion orbeing noticed easily
“Bum“, the original word is 쭉정이, it means a useless person who does not fulfill his/her duty properly. I can’t find an english word that matched it perfectly and the dictionary translated it as ‘Bum’, so let’s just take it.
I really like Kwon Jiwoon the most in this story because I had a great time translating this chapter :’D

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c27:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Meooong! What are you talking about?”
I opened the skill window. The skills I’ve acquired so far have appeared all over the place. All of them are small skills, but there were some that could help now.
[The Barista’s Extraction (D)Details: (Lv.1) Extract espresso from ground coffee beans.]
Sugarcane is not ground coffee, but extracting the sap from the stem is also extraction.

Don’t I have nothing to lose, anyway? Let’s try it. I used the skill while holding the dungeon sugarcane stalk in my hand.
‘The Barista’s Extraction.’
[Unable to extract due to low skill level][Extraction may fail. Do you still want to extract it? Yes / No ]
Instead of the skill being used immediately, a warning window appeared. I chose ‘yes‘ without hesitation.
[The level is too low, three times the energy is used.][Use energy. 85/100]
The skill was used with a feeling of a slight loss of strength.
[The extraction is complete.]
The dungeon sugarcane stalk disappeared, but what was left in my hands was not sugar. It was just a black, gooey mass that smelled musty.
The cat and slime ran away from me quickly, saying it smelled bad. On top of that, this squishy and sticky feeling was very uncomfortable. Ugh, I think the smell will remain even if I wash my hands.
[Item: Failed Dungeon Sugarcane Sap (☆☆☆☆☆)The sap of dungeon sugarcane that failed to extract.It’s useless for anything.Please separate and dispose food waste in food waste bags.]
Is it just me who feels the subtle sneer in the system message?
But it’s too early to be disappointed. When I used the skill, it clearly said, ‘the skill level is low, so it cannot be extracted‘. It does not mean ‘the item is not subject to skill application’ or ‘there is no effect’.
In other words, it means that I can extract sugar by raising the skill level. But until now, my skill level has not risen even when I complete the quest.
“Mieum-ah, how to raise my skill level?”
“You don’t even know that? If you have a skill point, invest it … kyaaang! Go away!”
Mieum, who ran away quickly because of the bad smell, straightened her hair up.
Skill point. I think I heard it somewhere recently.
Oh, there it is. This is it. I thought it would be cumbersome before, but now there was something I was looking for in the quest window that had been neglected.
[Sub Quest: The Ultimate CoffeeMake a deep connection with your true friend with the ultimate coffee.
Delivering the Ultimate Coffee: 0/1
Reward: Skill Point 1]
However, the explanation of the quest window was quite vague.
What is the ultimate coffee? Can’t I do it with my labor-intensive Americano? What is a deep connection with a true friend?
Please write a clear words for the system. If you use this kind of vague expression in the game system, you’ll get a lot of complaints. These complaints were poured out, but the system didn’t even listen.
Tiling!
Oh, there’s a new notification. You’re trying to give me a hint.….
[The Ultimate Coffee … because that’s the ‘ultimate’.]
… Are you kidding me?
***
I decided to find a way to finish the quest later, and I returned to the store after packing some dungeon sugarcane for practice.
While looking for a suitable box to store the sugarcane in, Mieum suddenly ran towards it.
Pabk!
“Huh?!”
While supporting her body by standing on her back foot, she quickly swung her front foot. The leaves of the sugarcane fluttered and shook after being punched.
“Mieum, why are you doing this?”
“Eheum, it’s nothing.”
How suspicious….
I grabbed the stem of the sugarcane and gently shook the leaves in front of Mieum.
Mieum, who was pretending to be decent and refused to look at this side, swung her front paws again. She jumps up and down, aiming for leaves that are likely to be caught but still cannot be caught.
The cat, who was absorbed in playing for a long time and belatedly came to her senses, made an excuse.
“That … it’s shaking in front of my eyes, so I can’t help it.”
I felt betrayed. You didn’t even look at the toys I bought you, but this … did you like this? How great is that….
I sympathized with the heart of a cat owner who raised a cat who plays with only a small piece of tissue, leaving behind expensive toys.
Eh, I don’t know. Anyway, as long as it’s fun.
I gently waved the sugarcane stalk in front of Mieum. Pakpak!
Then, as soon as the front paws were about to touch it, I quickly removed the stem. After repeating it a few times, Mieum got angry.
“Kyaooo! This great agent wouldn’t catch a thing like that! Do it again!”
“My arm is starting to hurt….”
“Do it again!”
Pakpak!
“What is an agent in the first place?”
Pakpak!
“What! You don’t know that too? On behalf of the system’s will, the great….”
“But Mieum doesn’t do anything for me.”
“Waeoong?!”
Mieum looked at me in shock. The leaves of sugarcane ripped off on her claws fluttered to the floor.
Still, it’s true that all this cat has ever done was eat, sleep, watch television and roll around. Even Lime does a better job by peeling the coffee fruits.
Even when I almost became a monster’s snack, she went somewhere else by herself.  She said she was scolded by the system, so I didn’t say anything.
“Waeuuung….”
With a sullen cry, Mieum lowered her head.
“Why don’t I want to help? As an agent who serves the great ██, I am trying to pass on the knowledge of ██.”
[System Error: —. —.—]
Another error window popped up, probably because of what Mieum just said.
“But there’s not much I can tell you yet. Due to the system limitations … to avoid ████’s gaze … I can’t even peel a single fruit, and I’m useless….”
Uh, what should I do … this response was unexpected. I was just trying to tease her a little bit….
I feel like I’ve become a vicious human being who asks cats to pay for their meals.
“Mi-Mieum. Come on, this.”
I waved the sugarcane stalk again, but Mieum just bowed her head and muttered melancholy.
“There’s nothing I can do … I’m just eating….”
“No, Mieum explained a lot in the beginning. You also taught me how to use skills.”
“It’s only the first time. Now, don’t you already know how to do it well? Waeung….”
I vigorously shook the sugarcane in front of her eyes, but Mieum continued shoveling without even realizing it.
She was good at shoveling….
Next to her, Lime comforted her by rubbed its body. However, the effect was insignificant.
“Right! Do you want a snack? Are you hungry?”
When you’re depressed, eating sweets is the best. I took out the box of chocolate checks I had saved and waved it in front of her.
What should I do? This doesn’t work either.
This time, I scratched Mieum’s chin.
“Meoong….”
Despite the sound of a drowsy cry, Mieum did not regain her liveliness at all.
As a last resort, I brought several of the store’s square tissue papers and ink pads for painting. I pressed Mieum’s front foot on the ink pad and stamped it on the tissue.
“Our Mieum’s footprints are pretty. Oh, should I put your foot stamp on the store tissue? It must be popular because it is cute. Right?”
“…”
Oh, it worked a little bit. She tried to hide it, but I could see Mieum’s mouth twitching. I stamped her foot on the tissue again.
Then, the phone in my pocket rang.
I entrusted Mieum to Lime and checked my phone. It was KakaoTalk from my friend, Mira.
[Shin Mira: Rieul, do you hear the talk?][Shin Mira: Did you hear that he became a hunter??][Me: Who is he?]
She still has a habit of forgetting the most important subject.
Who the hell is it? When I looked back on my past memories, I couldn’t immediately think of the Awakened people around me. Awakened isn’t that common….
Aside from the out of the blue content, Shin Mira dit not respond to my KakaoTalk for a long time. It seems that she has been called away while playing a game.
I was curious, but I put my phone back in my pocket. Time is running out. I really don’t want to go, but … I have a business today.
“I’m going out for a while.”
“Kkyu.”
“Waeong…….”
Two animals saw me off in a weak voice.
***
I filled the thermos that I obtained from the golden draw with hot Americano.
[Item: Americano (★★★☆☆)]Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)Effect: Nullifies the debuff. (01:00:00)]
The time remaining in the status window does not decrease. After confirming that the thermal effect worked properly, I took the thermos and left the store.
The destination is the White Silver Guild.
Yes, today was the day I promised to meet Kwon Jiwoon.
The reason why I prepared the coffee is simple. If Kwon Jiwoon says he knows that I’ve awakened, I’ll try to show him that my skill is to make this kind of coffee.
If I say that I’m not going to be a Hunter … that I’m just going to run a cafe, at least … it won’t bother him. I felt my steps were heavy.
I took the subway and got off in front of Central Guild Station. I only need to walk a little to see the building of the White Silver Guild.
When I came before, I didn’t feel it because it was right after I returned, but the White Silver Guild also has an atmosphere that it was a difficult place to access. There’s not a single speck of dust in the entrance.
As the name suggests, I entered the entrance of the white and shiny building with a slightly restless feeling and headed towards the information desk.
“We will help you verify your identity … ah, Kwon Rieul-nim. He is waiting upstairs.”
It’s comfortable to pass it right away just with my face, but I can’t get used to this cold atmosphere.
I got on the elevator and got off the top floor and was about to head to the guild master’s office, but a person came out from the other side.
“….Ew.”
I checked who it was and frowned subconsciously. I can’t believe I’m meeting Park Heeyoung and not anyone else.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Morning release (it’s early morning in my place) because I want to see our dear cousin soon.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c26:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

He was waiting for the elevator after taking the visitor’s card when people stormed out of the next elevator.
The most notable person is Choi Cedric, the 2nd ranker. Judging by the familiar face next to him, the others are also the top rankers in grades A to B.
Jijon sneaked away from their eyes. This is because he was discouraged by their splendid appearances. Even so, they didn’t even glance at him.
Once, he too could be among them.

Five years ago, Jijon, who was awakened as a C-class, was scouted by C&L Corporation. Being able to be a part of such a large guild, he  signed the contract without even reading the contract properly, thinking that he could also become a celebrity.
However, a few months later, he was cut off due to a minor problem and transferred to a subcontractor’s guild … no, he was demoted.
Since then, Jijon’s life has become very difficult. No matter how risky the dungeon was, the subcontracted guild could hardly make any money. Even if he collected a lot of ether ore, I had to pay most of it to the original office.
So, he was just trying to get a little extra income by participating in the tutorial dungeon for beginners.
He didn’t know there would be a dungeon mutation!
Jijon, who ran away in front of the giant slime, spat out all the rubies he received from the bus fare and apologized. However, the beginners did not forgive him, and even the guild cut him off, saying that he had disgraced the guild’s reputation with bus scams.
And yesterday, he even got a call from the C&L guild leader.
Why him? He had already been cut off from the guild, are they going to sue him?
Jijon shuddered as he recalled the infamous C&L legal team.
Then, the elevator stopped on the top floor and the door opened.
“I’ve been waiting. This way, please.”
The secretary, who was standing in front of the elevator, greeted Jijon.
‘….a woman or a man?’
The secretary was very beautiful. Long eyelashes cast a shadow over the pale cheeks. The clear features were impressive enough to be unforgettable at a glance.
However, the unique mysterious atmosphere made gender and age seem ambiguous. It gives off a realistic, yet unrealistic feeling.
“The guild leader will be here soon.”
The secretary took Jijon to the reception room inside and gave serve him a cup of tea.
A few minutes after sitting on a sofa that felt rather uncomfortable because it was so fluffy, the door opened again.
“You’re here.”
“Ah, yes, umh, hello.”
Jijon jumped up and bowed his head. The opponent beckoned him lightly to sit down.
The CEO of C&L Corporation, Lee Sein.
Her ability as a hunter is not very strong. She was only ranked 88th in the top 100. However, she was a talented person who developed C&L Corporation, which started as a small guild, into a Big Three guild. Even now, she’s also a businessman who was still not satisfied and led aggressive investment and business expansion. 
There is even a myth that the hunter chosen by Lee Sein will rise to the top.
‘Why would such a person….’
“Hunter Kim Jihoon.”
“Please call me Jijon.”
“Hunter Kim Jihoon.”
“Y-Yes.”
Frightened, Jijon bowed his head.
“You don’t have a guild you belong to right now, do you?”
“….That’s right.”
It was Lee Sein who demoted him to a subcontractor’s guild, and who pressured them to cut him off from the guild, but he couldn’t say that.
“Your mother is a single-parent, and your younger sister is a civil servant? It’s a good job. They have steady income. If I hadn’t established this guild, I would have taken the civil service exam.”
Creepy. He got goosebumps.
It’s been several years since he left his house to become Jijon in the Hunter world. He did not contact his sister at all. However, Lee Sein already knows his younger sister’s whereabouts.
“Uh … may I know for what purpose did you call me?”
“There is one dealer-damager spot left in our guild’s 2nd attack team. How about it? You know we’re the best in the industry.”
…Gulp.
Suddenly, his eyes widened at the big offer.
Even if it is the second team, it is not a subcontract, but a direct attack team. He, who used to be in the third team, knew well how difficult it was to get positioned there. Sometimes, low-grade dungeons are accompanied by Choi Cedric, the second ranker.
Jijon imagined a dazzling future; the image of himself being part of the group he just met in front of the elevator.
Jijon’s name is placed next to Choi Cedric, who’s ranked 2nd in the country. The supreme sword technique he developed will be widely known. Then, his dark past of running away from the giant slime will soon be forgotten.
Lee Sein offered a contract to Jijon, who could not hide his excitement.
B: Hunter Jijon (real name: Kim Jihoon)
Even after he took a second look, his name was clearly there. His heart began to pound.
“Of course, with the condition that Hunter Jijon cooperates well.”
“If you ask me to cooperate, what….”
“What happened in the tutorial dungeon?”
“Ah, yes, I understand.”
“I heard that the hunter who defeated the dungeon boss was not revealed? Do you know who they are?”
“I don’t know who it is, but … I’ve seen it.”
Jijon remembered the man he met in the tutorial dungeon. He felt a terrifying power from him. If someone had killed the boss, it would have been that man.
Lee Sein smiled broadly. She even poured tea directly into Jijon’s cup in a friendly manner.
“First of all, tell me what happened in the tutorial dungeon. Everything.”
***
After Ki Yoohyun went back, I headed for the space beyond the wall.
Yggdrasil, who was still growing luxuriantly, greeted me. The coffee fruits that hung on the branches did not shrink even after being picked. On the vinyl sheet, Lime’s peeled green beans were drying well.
‘I don’t think much has changed….’
“It’s over there!”
“Kkyuu!”
In one corner of this space, there was a place where the thick fog had been lifted. As I got closer, a notification window popped up.
[You can open a new area. Would you like to open it?Yes / No ]
Whoosh.
When “yes” was chosen, the fog was completely cleared and a new empty land appeared.
“As you progress through the quest, more and more areas will open and you will be able to obtain various things, kyaooong!”
Mieum explained from the side.
“Then what do you use this area for?”
“That … we should find out from now on.”
“You don’t know much….”
“Waeeong!”
I looked at the newly opened area after dodging the flying meow punch.
It’s just empty land, and there doesn’t seem to be anything special about it….
The ground was covered with soft soil instead of grass. The fine soil without weeds or gravel looked like a good field to grow crops.
I checked the empty land in front of me.
[Place: Abundant FieldHave a weekend farm in your front yard.Feel free to grow crops.]
I was just going to open a cafe, but now even farming was added to the list?
Ah, yeah. I wished I could plant the dungeon sugarcane here.
I took out the dungeon sugarcane that I had left in my inventory. After getting it from the tutorial dungeon, there was no place to plant it, so I kept it in my inventory.
Over the course of a few days, the leaves and stems dried up and all that remained was seeds.
After digging holes in the field at intervals of 20cm with a seedling shovel, the seeds were planted. Then, the seeds were well covered with soil, and water was sprinkled over the field.
Planting all the seeds took a lot longer than I thought. It was even boring because it was a simple repetitive task. Ugh, my back hurts … I wish there was an easier way to do it.
Anyway, when I finished planting seeds, a notification window popped up.
[Crop: Seeds of Dungeon Sugarcane (★☆☆☆☆)After a day of watering, it will grow into Dungeon Sugarcane.Let’s grow them with love.Time Remaining: 1 Day]
It didn’t take long until it was fully grown because it was a crop obtained from dungeon. It’s a good solution for a quick-tempered person.
Well, I’m glad I didn’t have to wait that long. OK, let’s check the rest the next day.
***
The next day, as soon as I opened my eyes, I roughly had breakfast and went into the space. It was because I was worried about the condition of the Dungeon Sugarcane.
Back when I planted the tree of Yggdrasil, it was withered, contrary to the information that it would grow in a day. Hopefully, the same situation won’t be happened twice.
“Meoong … aren’t you in too much of a hurry?”
“Come quickly.”
Fortunately, what greeted me was the densely grown dungeon sugarcane. Its height was about my waist, and the stem resembled bamboo, but was a little thinner.
[Crop: Dungeon Sugar Cane (★☆☆☆☆)A grass commonly found in dungeons. The sap of the stem tastes sweet.Note: Ingredients for Magic Sugar.]
Umh, it grew well.
According to the system’s description, the sap from the stem is the ingredient of sugar….
I tried cutting off some stalks of sugarcane. Unlike the hard outer skin, the soft inner flesh was revealed when the skin was peeled off. I pressed the insides of the flesh with my fingertips and gently licked the flowing sap with my tongue.
At that moment, I felt a strong sweetness on my tongue.
“….Ah.”
Even though it is surprisingly sweet and rich in flavor, it has a clean finish. I didn’t think my mouth would get dry even if I ate this sap.
It tastes very good, but …. how do you make sugar from this?
I looked at Lime, who was sitting next to me. It ate the coffee fruit, so I was wondering if it could eat this stem as well.
“……kkyuu?”
I held out a stalk of sugarcane to Lime, but….
“Kkyus … kkyuuus!”
It drew an X while bouncing its body on the ground. I couldn’t understand it words, but I felt it was angry, saying something like ‘how can you ask me to eat something like that?’. I’m sorry….
This method doesn’t work. Is there any way….
Tiling.
Then a familiar alarm rang.
[Search for the item you are curious about. Access now ☜]
A sudden notification like this means that the Wiki has the information about how to make the  sugar. Since there was no other way, I simply accessed the Wiki as the system told me to.
‘Ether-Wiki.’
[Checking your eligibilities … Completed.][The Eligible: Verifying Kwon Rieul…..]
‘Skip.’
When I skipped the text in front of me, a screen full of black squares appeared. There is still very little to read.
After selecting ‘Dungeon Sugarcane’ from among the few items, the page opened immediately.
《Dungeon Sugarcane》Type: Plant > CropDescription: A crop that grows in some dungeons with temperate climates. You can make magic sugar by processing the sap of the stem.How to make Magic Sugar: [Continue Reading]
“Uh, what is this….?”
“What’s wrong?”
“This is….”
There are too many letters!
As soon as I selected ‘Continue Reading‘, a feast of letters unfolded before my eyes. It was so long that there was no end in sight.
I skimmed the contents, trimmed the stems, squeezed the sap, filtered out the residue, boiled, boiled, boiled, and boiled again … (latter part) it’s something like that.
This is not it. It’s troublesome, complicated, cumbersome, and annoying just by looking at it. I had no intention of doing this long process myself.
Wait, what about this?
“I got a good idea.”

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c25:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Is that the reason why Kwon Jiwoon, who is a close person to me, suddenly sent such a text message?
I tried not to think about the case, but there was only one conclusion that came to mind.
I think the fact that I’ve awakened got caught.

I thought Jiwoon might notice because I registered as an Awakened person in the Dungeon Management Office, went to Hunter Market, and I also joined the tutorial dungeon.
“Don’t show any interest in Hunters or anything like that, and just stay as a normal person.”
The cold words came to mind.
He wish I didn’t bother him, how would he react if he found out that I have awakened?
Ugh….
It felt like my heart was being squeezed tight.
“Rieul-ssi?”
“….It’s nothing.”
First, let’s think about it tomorrow, and for now, let’s focus on making coffee.
‘Cafe in my hand.’
After extracting the espresso, I made an Americano using my skill. As soon as the espresso was poured into the hot water, the fragrant smell gently enveloped the surroundings.
However, after making the coffee, there were not many beans left.
After all, the roaster is small, so it decreases quickly. 
I took the green beans out of the box, put them in the roaster, and ignited them with the ring.
Hwuurr, red flames began to heat up the roaster.
“Uh … what did you just do?”
Ki Yoohyun, who was watching the scene, asked.
“Yes? Ah, what Yoohyun-ssi said was right. This ring is a really good item.”
“Ah, yes….”
Even though he said it was right, he looked shaken.
“If you light a fire with the ability of this ring, it’s great for flavoring the coffee.”
Even the degree of roasting could be adjusted automatically when lighting the fire. If the beans made from the fruits of Yggdrasil are lightly roasted, they will have a floral scent and strong acidity, and when roasted strongly, the smell of nuts and savory taste became stronger.
The exquisite taste change is fantastic and, as long as I didn’t get addicted to caffeine, I thought I could drink several cups of it all day.
I bought a filial piety item at a low price.
“You’re using Cthugha’s ring as a gas burner…..”
“What?”
“Nothing. It’s … I’m glad you’re using it well.”
The answer is bland.
I handed out the finished cup of hot Americano to Ki Yoohyun.
“Anyway, have a drink.”
Ki Yoohyun received the cup of coffee and took a sip.
I watched the scene with with a pounding heart. This is because it is the first time to show the taste of Americano to others.
This Americano is truly labor-intensive coffee made with my own labor. I was very curious about how other people would feel about the taste.
… Gulp.
After drinking the Americano, Ki Yoohyun’s expression softened a little. Then, suddenly, a long bar sign appeared over Ki Yoohyun’s head. The more he drank coffee, the more golden gauge filled up until it’s almost 100% full.
It even has a sparkling effect.
What is that?
“Yaooong (It’s a sign of satisfaction, the more satisfied they are with the coffee, the higher it goes).”
“There was no such thing when I made coffee mix, right?”
“Meong (New features are available when you’re leveled up).”
Ah, I was level 5. That’s why I can see that now.
“Waoooong (the higher the level, the more abilities)….”
I pretended I didn’t hear anything.
She was trying to sneak me into the dungeon. Who knows what will come back.
After drinking all the coffee, Ki Yoohyun put down the coffee cup.
“What do you think?”
The golden gauge above his head had already given me the answer, but I asked with anticipation.
“It’s very delicious.”
“Really?”
“It seems bitter, but not too bitter, and although it is thick, it is soft on the throat. I’ve tried many coffees, but I’ve never tasted anything like this before. What’s more, drinking this makes my body feel lighter.”
I also thought the Americano was delicious, but I was excited by the rave reviews that exceeded my expectations.
It was not empty words, considering the almost full golden bar.
Ki Yoohyun emptied all the remaining Americano and asked.
“What’s the price of this Americano?”
“Uh … The price?”
“Since it’s a cafe, aren’t you trying to sell it? If it tastes like this, I want to order it as much as I want.”
“That’s true, but….”
Actually, I haven’t decided yet.
Until now, I did not receive any money because I had made a lot of coffee mix to fill the number of quests.
Today, too, I just invited Ki Yoohyun to taste the coffee.
But I’ll get paid if I open a cafe later.
Still, it was harder to decide the price than I thought.
I think it’s too cheap to follow the normal Americano price. However, it seemed that it would not sell if I set the price blindly.
Besides, I have only two animals to discuss with.
“You have to get 1 million won, kiya!”“Kkyuu, kkyuu.”
Neither was very helpful.
Tiling!
Then, a familiar alarm rang. I looked at the translucent window that appeared in front of me.
[The menu is ready to be sold.][Please set the price.][Americano: 0 Ruby]
The cursor was blinking over the number 0 and it was possible to designate a number.
However, the unit is ruby.
Heh, why didn’t I think of this?
Yeah, it’s a cafe that mainly caters to Hunters anyway, so it’d be better to get the money in rubies. Hunters always carry rubies, and the price will be less objectionable.
If you say ₩100,000,  it feels expensive, but if you say 1 ruby, it doesn’t feel very expensive. That’s why the price of paid items in the game is displayed in ‘diamond’ or ‘jewel’ rather than cash.
If you draw a card for ₩100,000, you’ll fell the reality, but if you draw it with 100 jewels, it seems like a jackpot.
When I selected the number 0, the text ‘Recommended Price: 1 Ruby‘ appeared. I entered 1 as recommended by the system for now.
[The price has been set.]
“I’m going to get the money in ruby. It’s 1 ruby.”
At that moment, the alarm rang again.
[A quest has occurred.]
[Main Quest: The Path of The Barista (2)You’re a confident barista now.Increase the sales menu by completing the cafe’s five basic menus (café latte, cappuccino, cafe mocha, vanilla latte, and caramel macchiato).Complete the 5 basic cafe menus: 0/5][Rewards: Experience (200 EXP), Random Recipe, ???]

[Sub Quest: The Ultimate CoffeeMake a deep connection with your true friend with the ultimate coffee.Delivering the Ultimate Coffee: 0/1Reward: Skill Point 1]
I skipped all the notifications that seemed to make me do something annoying just by looking at their names.
Then one last notification popped up.
[Achievement: ‘First Key’ has been achieved. Please collect the reward.][Achievement: First KeyCongratulations.You have obtained the first key.]
However, the name of the achievement was strange.
The first person to drink the coffee I made was Kim Jina. After that, James also drank it, so Ki Yoohyun was the third.
Why is he called the first? What is the ‘key’?
The notification window felt uncomfortable because there were only short words and no detailed explanations. Although there’s no reason to refuse the reward….
‘Collect reward.’
[Achievement Reward: A new area has been opened in the space.]
Huh … an unexpected reward has arrived.
***

Jijon looked up.
The building in front of him was very colorful and large. If you make a building with a desire to show off your money, it will look like this.
It is said that the sculptures modeled after the Great Dungeon Abyss placed at the entrance alone are worth several billions won.
C&L street No. 1, Seocho District, Seoul. In other words, it’s in front of C&L Corporation’s headquarters.
A few days ago, the unfortunate C-class Hunter Jijon, who was expelled from his guild and had his Hunter Channel ID suspended, headed towards the entrance.
“What brings you here?”
As soon as he passed the entrance, a security guard in a suit approached him and asked fiercely.
A security guard is not something to be trifled with. The security team consisted of at least D-class or higher hunters, and they were given equipment that could temporarily nullify skills.
Jijon tried not to show signs of nervousness and began to talk.
“Ah, I … I have an appointment today.”
“What’s your name?”
“It’s Jijon.”
“….yes?”
Five years ago, after awakening, Jijon abandoned his original name.
His real name was so common and ordinary that there were three people with the same name in his school alone, so it was like an ‘ordinary person’ name.
His alias was given with the great intention of becoming the supreme leader of the Hunter World. He worked under this name anytime, anywhere.
However, the security guard in front of him only looked at him with a look of what-nonsense-are-you-talking-about. Shrinking Jijon quickly put his real name on his mouth.
“….I’m Kim Jihoon.”
“Yes, it has been confirmed. Take the elevator at the end of the right corner. You have to take this visitor’s card to open the door.”
He got the visitor’s card and headed inside.
He never thought he’d be here again….

Translator’s Corner:
Iron rice bowl (철밥통): ‘iron rice bowl’ means ‘a strong and unbreakable rice bowl made of iron‘, and it is interpreted as a metaphor for a job with low risk of dismissal and stable employment. Copied from Wikipedia,  “Iron rice bowl” is a Chinese term used to refer to an occupation with guaranteed job security, as well as steady income and benefits. The Chinese term can be compared to the similar (but not identical) English concept of a “job for life“. Traditionally, people considered to have such positions include military personnel, members of the civil service, as well as employees of various state-owned enterprises (through the mechanism of the work unit).
Thank you, Wikipedia.
I changed CNL to C&L. I actually like CNL better, but … this name is important.
Oh, I also changed “receive reward” to “collect reward”. Now I think “collect” is more suitable because it’s not like she can rejected the reward.
I know the netizen-talks probably bored you, but don’t skip it. It’s kinda significant for the later plot.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c24:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“The day has finally come….”
After three days of roasting, I was finally able to get my hands on well-aged coffee beans. 
I’m glad I have a ring that I bought at Hunter Market. Thanks to the ring, I’ve avoided the sabotage of the evil system.
I opened the box and checked the condition of the coffee beans inside.

[Green Beans (★★★☆☆)Status: MatureBeans aged after roasting.It is aged properly and is suitable for making coffee.]
“It’s well-aged, meong.”
“Kkyuu.”
I didn’t want to do DIY like this. Is this what a farmer feels like when he cooks rice with his own rice?
When I saw the vivid brown color of the ‘real_end_last_final_beans’, I felt proud.
I wondered what it would taste like, so I decided to try making coffee right away. Having obtained the beans, the next process was relatively simple. First, I decided to try the skill I got last time.
‘The Barista’s Extraction.’
As soon as I used the skill, the method of extracting espresso came to my mind, and my hands moved naturally. 
First, I ground the coffee beans with a grinder. Finely ground coffee beans were placed in a portafilter and tamped by pressing firmly with a stamp. When the properly set machine was operated, espresso was soon extracted.
… Gulp.
The rich smell of coffee made my mouth water.
After putting hot water in a coffee cup, pouring the espresso and mixing it, the Americano was finally completed.
[Item: Americano (★★★☆☆)]Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)Effect: Nullifies the debuff. (01:00:00)]
“I just wanted this cup of coffee….”
Tears seemed to come to my eyes when I remembered the hard work I had done to make Americano. Debuff invalidation, the effectiveness is fraudulent.
This time, I put eight ice cubes and cold water in a glass and poured espresso. I like it hot, but I also wanted to drink iced Americano.
Stir slightly to mix it well and it was done.
[Item: Iced Americano (★★★☆☆)Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)Effect: Using skill does not consume energy. (01:00:00)]
The effect of Iced Americano also seemed quite useful. Wouldn’t it be helpful when using advanced skills that consume a lot of energy?
‘I don’t know if that day will come….’
“Hurry up and drink it!”
“Kkyuuuu.”
As I looked into the Americano’s status window quietly, a cat and slime, who were impatient, rushed me.
So, let’s drink these two precious cups of coffee made by my hard work.
First, I took a sip of hot Americano. The soft yet deep taste warmly wrapped the body. My stiff body  and mind gradually relaxed.
Next, Iced Americano. This time, a fresh taste poured into my mouth. It was refreshingly cold, yet the finish was clean.
As soon as the glass was completely emptied, the quest completion notification rang.
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Main Quest: The Path of The Barista (1)’.Please collect the reward.]
[Experience: 200 EXP have been acquired.][100 rubies have been acquired.][You have acquired the new recipes: the basic 5 menus of the cafe recipes.]
The satisfaction of being rewarded. The joy of finally making the coffee. A high level of concentration that suppresses serenity.
“….Right now.”
“What are you talking about all of a sudden?!”
“….Kkyuu?”
I selected the Golden Draw Tickets from the last quest in my inventory. 
A perfect state of mindlessness. This moment was the right time to draw.
[Current number of Golden Draw Tickets owned: 3][Please pull the handle.]
I pulled the handle of the translucent drawing box that appeared in front of me. At the end of the hologram, where the capsules were quickly mixed, what came out was a white capsule.
[Agility status increases by 1.][You have acquired 1 Ruby.]
There’s only one chance left.
“Whoa, ha….”
“Hmmm, golden items don’t come out so easily.”
Ignoring Meeum’s criticism, I immediately pulled the handle.
“Done!”
I have succeeded! A golden capsule came out with a splendid effect different from before.
[You have acquired an item. Check your inventory.]
[Item: Stainless Steel Thermos (★★★★☆☆)It maintains the temperature of the beverage for a long time.Capacity: 700ml]
Inside the inventory was a thermos that was commonly used.
Just a thermos. It wasn’t a good item at all, and I was disappointed for a moment, but as I read the description, a certain possibility crossed my mind.
Maybe….
“What’s wrong with you? No matter how disappointed you are, you shouldn’t give up….”
“Wait a minute!
“Waeeong?!”
I immediately made another cup of Americano and put it in the thermos. Then, I checked the status window.
[Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)]
[Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:30:00)]
………………………….
The time remaining did not decrease while the coffee was kept in the thermos. With this thermos, it was possible to drink the coffee in good condition even far away from the store.
It’s a good item even if it doesn’t look like one, right?
I was thrilled by the joy of winning the draw, and for a moment, my phone rang. At first glance, it was a text message.
What is it? There’s no reason for me to get a text message.
Normally, I would have skipped over it because it was just an advertisement text, but why do I feel so anxious?
… Gulp.
Eh, it’s probably just my feeling.
The heart-pounding is probably because of the caffeine, and the chills on the back of my neck are … yes, it’s probably because I drank Iced Americano earlier.
I unlocked my phone and checked the text. The person who sent the text message unexpectedly was Kwon Jiwoon.
[Rieul-ah, how’s the store doing?][Come to the guild when you have time. Let’s talk ^^]
A heterogeneous speech. A smiling emoticon that feels more uncomfortable than the text.
Boom, it felt like my heart was going to drop.
***
The next day.
I was looking at the text left by Kwon Jiwoon on my phone again.
Ugh. Just reading the short sentence stings my stomach.
Kwon Jiwoon doesn’t call me this way. He had his guild member to deliver our business, but he didn’t welcome me to the guild.
Besides, what’s with the emoticon “^^”?
Ugh….
Ki Yoohyun came to the store when I caught this bitterness several times.
I contacted him to offer him a nice cup of coffee, as I promised before. The phone connection isn’t available in the dungeon, so I was going to wait patiently because he might be late.
Surprisingly, Ki Yoohyun arrived at the store in about 20 minutes after leaving a text message.
Isn’t it quite far from the Cheongna Guild building here?
However, Ki Yoohyun, who knocked on the door with a bright smile on his shiny face, looked very relaxed.
“Ki Yoohyun-ssi, don’t you go to the dungeon?”
Anyway, it’s true that I promised to let him drink the new coffee. I asked that question while putting the coffee beans in the grinder.
“Haha, the guild members feel pressured if I go with them.”
Does it mean that if an unskilled hunter joins a party, it will be a burden because of the loss of power?
“And the deputy guild leader Han Yiseong also told me to go early.”
“…is that so?”
“Yeah, he’s not that kind of person, I wonder what kind of wind was blowing….”
According to Ki Yoohyun, Hunter Han Yiseong sent him to go right away when he said he had something to do at this store.
I heard that each guild is busy because there was a C-class instance dungeon occured recently. From what I’ve heard, it seems like they don’t want to take Ki Yoohyun to the dungeon.
In the Hunter world, survival of the fittest was natural, but I still felt sorry for him.
Even though the main party of Cheongna Guild is famous, they don’t even run dungeons together.
I thought this guy was pretty strong when I saw him before.
Oh, and by the way.
While making a hot Americano, I suddenly brought up the issue that concerned me these days.
“What does it mean when someone suddenly does something that they have never done before?”
“Did something happen?”
Ki Yoohyun was watching Lime walking around. When asked where I brought this pet slime, I replied that I picked it up nearby. Well, I’m not lying. I picked it up from the inventory.
“No, I just want to know in general sense.”
In fact, Kwon Jiwoon’s text kept bothering me while making coffee.
At first, I wondered if I had read it wrong or if it was a spam text message with the same name and number as Kwon Jiwoon.
However, the denial of reality had no effect. No matter how much I looked at it, it’s true that the text was from Kwon Jiwoon.
I decided to visit the guild a few days later, but I couldn’t guess what was going on.
“I don’t know. Usually….”
“Usually?”
Avoiding Ki Yoohyun’s touch, Lime bounced back.
“They’re going to die.”
“Ah, that’s not it.”
Kwon Jiwoon is the best healer in Korea. He was in pretty good health even before my regression. I don’t think he suddenly changed because of illness.
Ki Yoohyun glanced at me with a slightly startled expression and spoke again.
“Did there ever be an event that could change their mind? For example….”
“For example?”
“It’s a regression or something like that.”
I felt like my heart was going to drop.
Ki Yoohyun was still admiring Lime’s translucent body. He turned his head obliquely, so I couldn’t see what expression he was making.
“Well, it’s just an example. Twenty years have passed since the system created the Awakened, but no regressors have ever been observed … so far.”
“That … that’s true. Ahaha….”
Speaking of regression all of a sudden, I was surprised to think if you knew about my regression.
Why are you making your answer so meaningful? You surprised people.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c23:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

I wondered where it went back then, but it must have come into the inventory along with the sugarcane.
What should I do, do I have to take it back to the dungeon?
“Meow! Did you catch a rare red slime?”
Surprised at the sight of slime, Mieum raised her fur.

“I didn’t catch it … but is it rare?”
“Red slime is the only type of slime that is not poisonous to the body. That’s why they don’t get along with other slimes, and they are also easily attacked by high-ranking monsters, so the number has decreased a lot.”
“Umh….”
Hearing that, it was a bit cruel to take it back to the dungeon.
Should I raise it? There were quite a few cases where slime was kept as a pet. It was mainly a slime tamed by Hunters in the tamer class.
Although this red slime is not tamed, it is calm….
A system window appeared in front of me while I was thinking.
[Red Slime can be appointed as an agent. Would you like to appoint it?Yes / No ]
You’re saying I can raise this slime, right?
“Would you like to stay here?”
“Kkyuuu.”
The slime bounced up and down. Yes, I have a cat who eats cereal and loves drama, and I also have a slime now.
[Please name the agent.Enter a name: ]
A name….
Umh … Rieul, Mieum, since it’s the second addition the family … it’s Bieup.
“How about Bieup?”
The slime suddenly started bouncing its body from side to side violently. Perhaps that alone was not enough, so it drew an X on the floor while bouncing all over the place. It was a clear sign of rejection.
“….Do you hate it that much?”
I’m a little hurt. What’s wrong with Bieup? It means my dongsaeng, this older sister is sad. I thought it was perfect….
However, the slime continued to grumble and object. I had no choice but to give it another name.
“Um, then … since it’s similar to jelly, do you like Jelly?”
“Kkyuuu!”
It refused this name too. It’s a very tricky slime.
“Because you resemble a rubber ball, Tangtang?”
“….”
I felt a cold gaze. A cool silence fell around so that I could know the answer without looking at slime’s gestures.
“I don’t think it likes the name.”
Don’t be like this. Mieum, not you too.
In addition, as soon as I said the other names I thought of such as Red, Pearl, and Chubby, the slime instantly rejected it.
‘Don’t tell me … am I the problem?’
Am I not talented in naming animals?
In the end, half-desperate, I came up with a name that came to mind.
“Because you’re a slime, how about Lime?”
“Kkyuu.”
Finally, the slime gave a positive answer. Judging by the light gestures bouncing back and forth, it seems to like the name quite a bit.
Suddenly, a new member of the family named Lime appeared.
“Kkyuu, kkyuuu.”
Lime spun around me. Its translucent and bouncy body looked soft and pleasant to the touch. I think I can touch the red slime since it’s not poisonous. I want to touch it once.
“Can I touch you?”
“Kkyuu.”
When I gently pressed my index finger on its body,e I felt a soft yet elastic touch. It has a unique texture that, although slightly viscous, did not stick to my hands.
Rub, rub, rub….
Rub, rub, rub….
Haha, I almost lost my mind for a moment. It’s an incredibly addictive touch. At this rate, I thought I could stay like this for hours.
But what should I feed it?
I don’t know if it had a mouth because it was originally in the form of a round jelly. It cried kkyuu, but it was unclear whether the sound was even coming out of its mouth.
“Lime, what do you eat?”
“Kkyuuuu.”
Lime bounced its body and pointed to the coffee fruit on the open branch of Yggdrasil.
“Uh … are you eating this?”
“Kkyuu.”
I picked a coffee fruit and gave it to Lime. Lime took the coffee fruit with its mushy body and swallowed it, then immediately spat out the seed.
Seed … in other word, green coffee beans.
Wait, then, is it possible for Lime to eat only the flesh of the fruit and leave the seeds?
“Lime, can you eat all of that too?”
“Kkyuu.”
Lime, who somewhat answered in a proud tone, approached the place where the coffee fruit was abandoned. It spread its body as wide as a membrane, covering the coffee berries on the vinyl sheet like a wave.
Tuk, Tuk.
The seeds began to fall on the vinyl sheet. It took less than a few minutes for all the flesh of the coffee fruits to disappear and only the seeds remained. It was much more than a person and a cat has been managed to finish just now.
Lime returned with a slower movement than before because it was full. Behind the slime, I saw a mountain of seeds.
So the situation right now is….
Me + Mieum < Lime ?
I felt a little bit of shame, but….
Anyway, the work was done in one shot. God, I have a really nice new family member.
[Green Beans (★☆☆☆☆)Status: DryThe flesh-removed seed of the coffee fruit.You need to dry it well in the sun to make good coffee.
Time Remaining: 3 days]
***
It took three days for the green beans to completely dry. 
What I did for those three days….
“Haaaaa…..”
I just played.
For some reason, the system didn’t bother me, and there was nothing else I could do but wait right now.
What do you do when you have free time like this? Exercise? Self-improvement? No, of course I’m just fooling around as much as I want.
It’s been three days since I’ve been immersed in all the mundane things in the world.
Today, I woke up late again, lay on the bed, and accessed the Hunter Channel on my cell phone.
[Issue] Let’s make a public discussion about Hunter Jijon. (413)[News] Tutorial Dungeon—Special Hard Attack Hunter Unknown (133)[Notice] Notification of sanctions against ill-mannered user ‘Jijon’[Chatting] Is <Hunter Market> normally this unkind? ㅠㅠ (57)
The world is also peaceful today.
I couldn’t see anything special, so I skimmed through the text and got up because I was hungry.
Looking at the clock, it was 1:00 p.m. It was time for the green beans to be dry.
When I went down to the first floor after washing up, Mieum and Lime were talking about something. The two of them have become close, now they used to hang out together and play with each other well.
As I got closer, I heard Mieum’s clear voice.
“Waeeeongh, do you understand!”
“Kkyuuu….”
“The bowl is here, the toilet is over there, and the drinks are in the refrigerator. What is missing comes out when you urge the human to clean up.”
“Kkyu.”
I thought she wanted to explained the location of the item because she came in first.
“No, the TV is on the second floor. By the way, you have to watch KBS at 7:30.”
“Kkyuuu…..”
“No. Watch the rerun. Kyaoong!”
They started arguing over the TV channel.
‘Both of you look happy….’
Leaving the two who kept arguing, I went into the space and checked the coffee beans.
[Green Beans (★★★☆☆)Status: DryThe flesh-removed seed of the coffee fruit.It dries well and is suitable for making coffee after roasting.]
After three days, the well-dried green beans had a shape that looked exactly like the coffee beans I knew. The long journey had finally come to an end.
I immediately brought my green beans back and prepared to roast them.
Fortunately, there was a roaster in the store. However, it was not a commercial product used in a professional roastery cafe, but a household product that was roasted on a gas fire.
Originally, I was planning to buy roasted coffee beans and use them.
‘I was planning to do it, but how did this happen…..’
If it wasn’t for the system’s quest rewards and the special effects of coffee, I would have just prepared to open an ordinary cafe.
I heated the roaster on a gas fire, and then the dried green beans in the wire mesh. This roaster was bought for home roasting as a hobby a long time ago, but it was left unused. 
Thank you, the past me.
Without this, I would have had to wait another few days to order and receive the roaster.
Of course, at that time, I would never have imagined that I would be roasting coffee made from the fruits of Yggdrasil.
As the temperature rose and the wire mesh went round and round, the beans began to roast. Now it going to smell fragrant and crack….
What?
Why is there no change?
The gas fire is definitely on and the roaster is at normal temperature. However, the coffee inside was not roasted at all.
And this pattern….
I had an ominous hunch. Somehow I have a hunch that something very troublesome will happen.
‘Ether-Wiki.’
After skipping all the texts that appear in front of me, I opened the roasting information page.
There’s nothing particularly strange about it….
I quickly scanned the roasting information with my eyes, and at the end, my eyes caught the small letters.
The letters written in 3pt were invisible unless you open your eyes wide.
[*Note: Roasting must be done with etheric fire. Please be careful as it does not roast on a regular gas fire.]
Etheric fire? It’s a very ominous word.
My eyes met Mieum, who was sitting on her stomach in the corner and watching the roaster turn.
“Meoong….”
As if she had something to say, she cried a little and looked into my eyes.
Isn’t this pattern too much? 
No wonder it’s been quiet for the past few days without a bothersome notification, was it for this moment?
The feeling of betrayal was immense. It seems that this system is trying to send me to a dangerous place with such a repeated pattern.
I won’t. I won’t do anything about it. How am I supposed to bring the fire?
It was then, 
Suddenly, the red stone in the ring I was wearing began to glow. It’s the same ring I got from the old lady in Hunter Market.
“Uh, why is this….”
Hwuur.
Another dark red flame from the gas fire moved to the lower part of the roaster. The roaster on fire spun round and round.
Oh, it’s working.
Soon, the roaster began to smell fragrant.

Translator’s Corner:
Dongsaeng is younger brother/sister. I assumed that you must have already known this if you read KR webnovel … it’s a gender-neutral term, so … no, I won’t guess the slime’s gender. Does slime even supposed to have a gender?
I already explained about the name before. After Rieul and Mieum, there’s Bieup. 리을 (ㄹ), 미음 (ㅁ), and then 비읍 (ㅂ).
Rubber / bouncy ball is 탱탱볼 (taengtaengbol), so it’s Tangtang.
Let’s just hope that Our MC’s future husband has better naming-sense :’D

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c22:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Klang.
“Uh, I’m going to sleep more … uh, huh?
I opened my eyes because of the loud sound. I jumped to my feet in case something has happened again, but the sound came from none other than the television.
“…”
Mieum, who would normally scratch the floor for food as soon as I woke up, was calm.

It turned out that she was currently obsessed with the TV. On television, a daily drama rerun was in the air, and the actor entered the door with a bang, making a loud noise.
After returning from the tutorial dungeon yesterday, I immediately watered the branch. And after filling my stomach with the leftover gimbap, I fell asleep quickly.
Now, I have a throbbing headache and a backache from sleeping that much. There was nothing I had done other than walking around in the dungeon, but I must have been unexpectedly tired.
Right now, I have to go check if the branch has grown well. This time, it must have taken root properly without withering.
But even after I washed up and came out from the bathroom, Mieum remained seated. I’ve never seen this cat so quiet.
“Mieum-ah, let’s go see the branch.”
“…”
“Mieum, aren’t you hungry? Would you like some food?”
“…”
“Mieum, is it that fun?”
“Waeeong, this is a very important scene right now. It is about to be revealed that the villain swapped the heroine’s child. The abandoned child awakened as the youngest hunter and was adopted by a wealthy family, but he can’t remember his mother due to amnesia. He almost met his mother in the last episode, but his path was crossed by the villain’s scheme….”
“Ah, yeah….”
Mieum-ah, I’m glad you’re happy….
Somehow, I ended up listening to the entire story from the beginning to the end of the drama. It was only after the last scene and the next episode’s trailer was finished that Mieum stood up.
“Do you like that drama?”
“Kyaoong! I just happened to see it.”
“The next episode will air at two o’clock in the afternoon.”
“Who said I’d watch … it’s two o’clock in the afternoon.”
What an easy cat to understand.
I came down to the first floor with Mieum and headed to the space. But as soon as I passed through the blue door of the wall, I hit my head with something.
“Ugh.”
What the hell did I bump into? I rubbed my sore forehead with my palm and lifted my head.
“….Ah.”
It was a large branch that hit my head.
No, a tree. The branch was the size of my body.
The tree was the size of my body, and the trunk was so thick that I couldn’t hug it all even with my arms wide open. Each branch bore a reddish-brown fruit.
A tree big enough to fill this space greeted me.
Although it was written in the status window that it would grow in one day, I didn’t expect it to grow this big overnight.
If we can grow trees in this way, I think the global warming problem can be solved quickly.
“…”
It’s a little, no, quite absurd, but….
Anyway, it’s time to make coffee.
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Sub Quest: Our Blue River and Green Mountain’.Please collect the reward.][You have obtained 3 Golden Draw Tickets.]
The moment I checked the Branch of Yggdrasil, which had grown large, a quest completion notification rang.
The name of the quest was strange, I guess it was because it was a tree that grew this big.
A shiny golden draw ticket entered my inventory. I wanted to draw right away, but I left it as it is for now. This is because drawing must be done with a reverent heart.
“It’s the first time I’ve heard of such thing, meoong.”
Mieum, who heard my words, said that it was nonsense.
“It was a stormy night….”
“What are you talking about all of a sudden?!”
“I was approaching the number one spot in the game rankings that day.”
“It has nothing to do with the storm!”
Pak, the front paws flew to me.
Ranked No. 1 as a F2P player. It was a very difficult and lonely road.
From selling personal information to viewing advertisements and grinding … I collected free goods by doing all I could do.
A precious cafe raised by my infinite labor.
However, I was not able to take the first place because I failed to get the ‘Platinum Royal Gorgeous Teacup Set‘ until the end.
Should I give up like this? At that moment of despair, I accidentally pressed the draw button.
With that said, you can guess the ending. At that time, I pulled out a set of the platinum teacups and eventually won first place.
“….this has taught me something.”
“What is that, meooong!”
“The draw must be done in a state of mindlessness. In addition….”
“In addition?”
“If you spin it until it comes out, it’s 100% guaranteed.”
“….”
I felt a bit of a crisis as a human being because I got cold stare from a cat.
Anyway, I tried to turn off the notification window, but I heard a ringing sound again.
[Achievement: ‘Guardian of the World Tree‘ has been achieved. Reward will be applied.]
[Achievement: Guardian of the World TreeThe World Tree, Yggdrasil, has been saved safely.The World Tree expresses its gratitude to you.Reward: Strength +10.]
The new achievement notification made me feel better.
It’s not necessarily because of the reward. To be called ‘Guardian of the World Tree’ is somehow cool. I felt like I had done a great job.
What’s more, the reward is pretty good because my strength is increased by 10.
In the tutorial dungeon, Ki Yoohyun defeated the boss that caused me to reach level 5 at once, but because of the staggering rise, I still have only 10 strength.
Now I have 20 in the strength status. It’s doubled thanks to the achievement. How strong have I become?
I rolled up my sleeve, exposed my forearm, and tightened my arm. However, no matter how hard I tried, there was no muscle.
Mieum, who could not bear seeing me like that, murmured from the side.
“That’s not how it works.”
“….is that so?”
…. I received a cold stare from the cat twice today.
After lowering my sleeves in shame, I approached the tree and picked a piece of fruit from the open branches. It has a round shape that resembles a cherry, a reddish skin, and even this unique smell … when I took a bite, it tasted sour and sweet.
It’s really a coffee fruit.
It has a huge name, ‘World Tree Yggdrasil‘, but it’s a coffee tree. I’m not sure if it’s an insignificant thing or not.
So now I have to make coffee from this fruit….
‘Ether-Wiki.’
[Checking your eligibilities … Completed.][The Eligible: Kwon Rieul has been verified…..]
‘Skip.’
I skipped the feast of letters that were listed in a row without any regrets and opened the ‘How to Make Coffee Beans’ section. 
《How to Make Coffee Beans》Type: Food, Beverage>CoffeeDescription: Describes how to make coffee beans from fresh Yggdrasil fruit.
How to: 1) After washing the harvested fruits with water, remove the flesh and leave only the seeds.2) Dry the seeds well in the sun.3) Complete in about three days.
That’s easy, right?
Related Topics: Roasting
The explanation was simpler than I thought.
It doesn’t look as easy as it seems, but … let’s try just a little bit.
I went back to the store and picked the fruits in a bucket of moderate size. The bucket full of fruits was heavier than I thought, but it was easy to lift thanks to the increased strength status.
Ah, maybe that’s how it works?
Do I have to do a lot of work from now on?
Eh, no way….
However, considering the bucket full of fruits and the rest of the process, I think that is correct. Is it the mercy of Yggdrasil, The World Tree, for me to die because of this?
Next, the fruit was washed in the sink to filter out impurities. Then I returned to this space with the vinyl sheet I found in the warehouse.
“Huk, huuk….”
In a corner of this space surrounded by a dense forest, where the branches did not reach, a vinyl sheet was laid in places where the sunlight was reflected and the fruits were poured on it.
The heavy fruit was twice as heavy because it was wet, and sweats began to form on my forehead.
Now it’s time to separate the seeds from these fruits.
But how?
I read the Ether-Wiki again, but there was no detailed explanation except for the phrase ‘remove the flesh‘. 
First, I decided to try peeling the flesh by hand. When I pressed it with my fingertips and gently peeled it off, only the green seeds inside came out.
All right, I can do it this way.
“Waeooong….”
Mieum also helped peel the coffee fruit with her claws. Perhaps thanks to its jagged claws, she is quite good at peeling fruit.
However, doing it by hand has a limit. Even after the two of us peeled off the fruits for a long time, it didn’t seem that the remaining fruits would shrink at all.
I wonder if I can finish this today. As I focused on the small fruit in a bent position, my back and waist also hurt.
It’s so hard to drink an Americano….
“This isn’t it….”
“Kiyaooong! What are you talking about all of a sudden?”
Something felt wrong.
Where did it go wrong? This isn’t it.
… Why am I working so hard?
I returned, quit my company, and decided to open a cafe here. It’s a life where I can work less and rest more. In terms of time, I decided to work two days a week and take five days off a week.
No, I almost lost my original intention because I was tempted by that wicked system.
To seduce an innocent cafe owner with a golden draw ticket….
‘Scary system guy….‘
If it’s a system, shouldn’t there be a way to solve it all at once instead of doing it manually?
When I searched on my phone, I found a machine that automatically peeled off the flesh.
‘Oh, I wish I had a machine like that.’
However, it is difficult to obtain it in Korea, which is not a coffee producing country, and there is no place to put it. Besides, I want to open a cafe, not a coffee farm.
Still, I did not have the energy to remove the remaining flesh by hand.
“Let’s take a break for now.”
I sat moderately on the trunk of the Yggdrasil’s tree. The cool breeze cooled the sweat a little.
Oh, come to think of it, I brought sugarcane from the tutorial dungeon. Is there a place to plant it?
I opened my inventory and tried to take out the sugarcane from the dungeon.
But … there was a red ball in the inventory that I saw for the first time.
Huh, did I put this in there?
After awakened and got an inventory, I put this and that because it was convenient. Wet tissue, band-aid, hand cream, leftover coins and receipts, earphones, and so on … but I don’t remember putting a ball like this.
I took the red ball out of my inventory. As soon as I took it out, the ball got bigger and landed on the floor.
“Kkyuu.”
I heard a familiar cry.
“Kkyuu, Kkyuuu.”
A translucent body resembling red glittering jelly, and this cry. Even the bouncing motion of the body elastically.
It was the red slime I met in the tutorial dungeon.

Translator’s Corner:
Back in the earlier chapter, it was already stated that Rieul’s status are on the average. I’d like to point out that it’s the average of ordinary people, since F-class isn’t much different from an ordinary people, not Hunters. Hunter is supposed to be far superior than ordinary people. That’s why Ki Yoohyun would naturally judge that she’s weak━because it’s true. 
Oh, and F2P shorts for Free-to-play. As a F2P player, Rieul played the game without spending any money. It must be a familiar term if you play games like the popular Gensh*n Impact.
And here’s our cutie slime.
