SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c21:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

The slime caught in the net completely melted and rained down through the blue lights of the exit gate.
[You have defeated the boss monster ‘Iridescent Giant Slime’][Tutorial Dungeon—Special Hard has been cleared.][You have reached Level 5.]
Almost at the same time as the notification appeared in front of my eyes, a blue light surrounded me.

“I’m back….”
It was night inside the dungeon, so I couldn’t know the exact flow of time, but half a day passed and it was evening when I stepped out of the gate. The sunset dyed the stone walls of the Great Dungeon red.
“We cleared it somehow.”
I took off my windshield and was breathing hard, but Ki Yoohyun didn’t look tired at all. We ran together, but why am I like this? As expected, is it lack of exercise?
In any case, the purpose has been achieved.
“Thank you for today.”
“I … thank you for coming with me.”
“Come to the store in a few days. I’ll make you a nice cup of coffee.”
Wait, 10 million won.
Ah, no, it just popped out of my head. Wait for me, Americano.
And on the way back to the store after saying goodbye to Ki Yoohyun, I realized that I had forgotten something important.
Ah, I didn’t eat the gimbap.
***
Dukduk.
The room was just as quiet as when Ki Yoohyun came out.
After checking once again to see if there was anyone through the window, Ki Yoohyun carefully put his body in.
Just when he was about to silence the sound of his footsteps and sat on the chair inside, the door suddenly opened.
“Guild leader, where have you been!”
“A-ahem, what’s going on, Hunter Han Yiseong. I’ve been staying still like this.”
“Take the leaf off your shoulder and speak again.”
Ki Yoohyun hurriedly took his hand to his shoulder and tried to shake off the evidence of going out. However, there was not a single dust on his shoulder, let alone a leaf.
“It’s a lie.”
…. He got caught.
“Don’t make excuses. I knew you were out.”
Knowing that Han Yiseong had already been convinced, Ki Yoohyun shrugged his shoulders.
“….The twins are all on fire.”
Han Yiseong, the deputy guild leader of Cheongna Guild and the one who’s in charge of external affairs, used to have a headache because of the guild leader who often disappears whenever he takes his eyes off him.
No matter how much external affairs Han Yiseong is in charge of, there are cases where approval from the guild leader is required.
However, it was impossible to keep an eye on Ki Yoohyun all day while he was busy with his original job.
So, instead, he put the twins Joo Shinwoo and Joo Shinhee as watchmen. The twins, who joined the guild relatively recently as A-class hunters, admire Ki Yoohyun and have no urgent missions right now. They’re the most suitable watchdogs.
“Follow him like a leech.”
“Yes!”
“Just trust us.”
He believed in the twins who nod with their bright eyes.
Still, Ki Yoohyun disappeared again, avoiding the eyes of the twins who kept following him. The twins couldn’t say anything harsh to him because he’s the guild leader they admired so much, even though it’s okay to be more strict with the guild leader who keeps slacking off.
Again today, the twins ran and confessed that the guild leader had disappeared.
In the end, Han Yiseong got involved again. Although he is ten years older than Ki Yoohyun, they had known each other before the establishment of the guild, and he was the closest person to Ki Yoohyun in the guild.
However, by the time Han Yiseong found Ki Yoohyun, he had already entered the tutorial dungeon.
“….Do you know how hard it was to control the area around the tutorial dungeon?”
“I had no choice because no one in our guild would go with me.”
“You call that a reason? Do you have a conscience or not?”
Han Yiseong touched his forehead.
The current guild leader and the No. 1 Hunter. That fact alone is difficult enough, but he suddenly asked to go to the tutorial dungeon for beginners. What would the others Hunters think when they heard that?
If it’s a company, it’s like the boss suddenly calls out and makes you a cup of coffee….
“Are you having a hard time these days?”“Still, Director Kim has a very nice personality. I really like Director Kim.”
It’s like saying the same thing.
“Maybe the guild leader … is he going to cut me off? I was late in using my skills before, I’m not helping….”“Does it mean that my level is only suitable for the tutorial dungeon?”“Uhuk, I’m sorry. I’ll listen carefully to the tutorials and come back!”
If that’s the guild leader’s will, then I will retire. It was also Han Yiseong’s job to calm the guild members who said they would lock themselves up in a certain mountain for training.
“….does it bother you that much?”
Han Yiseong, who had been complaining for a while, changed his tone. The reprimand for the guild leader, who disappears frequently, was enough. However, he was curious about why he went to a tutorial dungeon for beginners.
Up until now, Ki Yoohyun had never been interested in anything, and he seemed not to be interested in anyone.
Then, he suddenly showed interest in something. There is only one reason that he can guess.
“….It’s not like that.”
However, Ki Yoohyun shook his head with an ambiguous expression.
“I heard everything from the twins. You visited the cafe in front of the Dungeon Gate a few days ago.”
“There’s really no secret in this guild.”
“You said there was no abnormal reactions.”
“That’s true.”
Han Yiseong recalled the owner of the cafe at Dungeon Gate 3rd Street, which Ki Yoohyun is paying attention to. He met her when the monster appeared there, but there was no particular impression.
Isn’t it enough to remember that she has a soft and innocent impression? She didn’t look suspicious enough for Ki Yoohyun to care.
“If you have any doubts, I will attach a person.”
“No, don’t do that.”
Ki Yoohyun immediately blocked Han Yiseong. He spoke repeatedly in a strong tone.
“Never, don’t approach her until I tell you otherwise.”
Ki Yoohyun was deep in thought.
Cthugha’s Ring. It’s the first masterpiece that the craftsman Kim Deokyi released after 10 years. Just by holding it in your hand, you can summon the God of another world, Cthugha, so it’s worth calling.
Originally, no matter how advanced a craftsman was, it was an item that humans could not create, but Kim Deokyi miraculously succeeded in making it.
The one and only thing in the world. That ring is unique.
In the pre-regression past he remembers, Cthugha’s ring fell into the hands of the enemy.  This is because the craftsman was deceived by the enemy and handed over the goods.
Ki Yoohyun knew that the craftsman, Kim Deokyi, was secretly visiting Hunter Market that day. So, he went to meet her.
He wasn’t trying to get the ring. It was an unnecessary item for him who had already made a contract with another God. He was just trying to warn her to beware of those who seek the ring.
However, when Ki Yoohyun arrived, the craftsman had already left, and the ring had fallen into Kwon Rieul’s hands.
“You bought a good item.”“What?”
That ridiculous look. She didn’t even seem to know what Cthugha’s ring was.
It’s not known why the craftsman hid her identity and opened a consignment shop in Hunter Market, or why she handed over the ring to her. It’s no use to ponder about someone who originally has a mischievous personality.
But since Kwon Rieul became the owner of the ring, he needed to know about her. Ki Yoohyun came up with a suitable excuse and entered the tutorial dungeon with Kwon Rieul, and used his skill.
‘Abyssal Gaze.’
The Abyssal Gaze was a skill to read a Hunter’s information. He can’t read opponents stronger than him, but at least in Korea, there is no such person.
Depending on the result, he even decided to get rid of her straight away from the tutorial dungeon.
By the way.
Name: Kwon RieulClass: ██ ██ (F) (Lv. 2)Stamina 100/100, Energy 100/100Strength: 8, Intelligence: 12, Agility: 9, Luck: 12Achievements: ¾ÆÁÖ °·ÂÇÑ ±â´ÉÀ» °¡Áø ÇÁ Î±× ¡¹Ö ¾……———END———
Judging by her low status, Kwon Rieul’s statement as a non-combatant is probably true. However, the class was block-processed and the letters were broken, so it could not be read properly.
It was the first time a result like this appeared.
James’ survival, Cthugha’s ring, skill error….
Is this all a coincidence?
No way. Ki Yoohyun doesn’t believe in coincidence. All the signs, and his senses, were directed at Kwon Rieul. She’s obviously hiding something.
So is this a positive or negative variable? He’ll have to wait and see.
‘I’ll have to keep an eye on her from now on.’
If he becomes sure that it’s a risk factor later, it is not too late to remove it then.
But….
“I’ll make you a nice cup of coffee.”
Those words were expected in a pure sense.
Meanwhile, Han Yiseong was thinking of a completely different idea when he watched Ki Yoohyun.
‘Did I just point out the wrong place?’
He thought that Ki Yoohyun was concerned about the cafe in front of the dungeon gate only because there was something suspicious about it. But, instead of putting a watch on it, he ordered to ‘never approach her‘.
Furthermore, he has been thinking to himself just now and even gave a faint smile.
It’s like….
Come to think of it, the cafe owner and Ki Yoohyun are about the same age. 25-year-old Ki Yoohyun and 23-year-old Kwon Rieul. A young man and woman, only two years apart.
The melancholy impression of her chestnut brown hair must be attractive.
When he removed the prejudice that one side was Ki Yoohyun, the No. 1 S-class hunter, there was no better picture than this.
‘I didn’t notice!’
Han Yiseong, someone who has been married for 5 years and a fan of We Got Married, looked at Ki Yoohyun with affectionate eyes.
Ki Yoohyun was awakened and became a Hunter when he was 13 years old. The first and strongest S-class.
The process has never been smooth. The hardships ran through his mind.
When Ki Yoohyun was 15, Han Yiseong founded a guild and entrusted the guild leader position to Ki Yoohyun.
It was not that Han Yiseong had great ambitions.
The boy at the time seemed to have no interest in anything. He needed no one and didn’t care about anyone. There was only darkness in the silent eyes that stared at him.
It was an appropriate image for the strongest S-class hunter, but if left alone, it seemed like the boy would soon die somewhere.
For that reason, he created a guild. Because the boy needed a place where he could take a breathe and put his trust.
Gradually, Ki Yoohyun regained his smile and seemed to feel relaxed.
…. that’s what it looked like.
Even so, Han Yiseong knew. There was no change from the time he looked at the remains of the expressionless face monster. There is something terrifying inside that people like him can’t even imagine.
But now Ki Yoohyun showed the most lively figure of himself that Han Yiseong has ever seen. His black eyes are gleaming with light.
Indeed, it has already been five years since Ki Yoohyun became an adult.
The boy with black sunken eyes is really old enough to look elsewhere now.
“Guild leader, do you have any intention of revealing your identity?”
Feeling the weightlessness of the years, Han Yiseong asked. Ki Yoohyun slowly shook his head.
“No … not yet.”
Well, they haven’t even become close yet. If he reveals his identity this early, the other person will feel burdened.
‘As you said, I will never disturb you, so fighting.’
Having made such an absurd misunderstanding, Han Yiseong decided to watch Ki Yoohyun with warm eyes.
[Next]

Oh … and, which one do you like more between ‘Ultimate Gate‘ and ‘Ultimate Door‘? I used “gate” before because it seems more suitable for a hunterverse story like this, but lately I got tempted by the word “door” too.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c20:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“…Haa. Rieul-ssi, please stay away in a safe place for a while. It will be over in a minute.”
Ki Yoohyun let out a light sigh and pointed to the back of the tree.
“Will you be fine by yourself? Even the C-class Hunter’s attack just now didn’t work.”
“It’s all right.”

“Okay, then.”
Without asking twice, I quickly ran towards the place Ki Yoohyun was pointing. Even if I’m with him, a +2 attack shovel won’t help. This non-combatant will hide quietly.
Ki Yoohyun seemed to be making some gestures while looking at the giant slime. Then a net of light fell from the sky and covered the giant slime. The net began to bind the slime to prevent it from bouncing.
Even with such skill, Ki Yoohyun doesn’t seem to be struggling at all.
As expected, this guy is pretty strong….
“…Eh?”
As soon as I touched the ground while watching the scene in front of my eyes, my body fell down.
The problem was that it was difficult to see the ground because of the darkness around. There was a steep slope behind the tree.
“….Rieul-ssi!”
I tumbled down the slope.
“Ugh, Ouch…..”
How much I tumbled? when I came to my senses, there was no place that didn’t hurt. The surrounding area was covered with bushes, and it was impossible to see where it was originally.
“Yoohyun-ssi!”
I called, but there was no answer.
[Party: Kwon Rieul, Ki Yoohyun]
Only the party window showed that Ki Yoohyun was still in the dungeon. It looks like it doesn’t come with communication or GPS functions, so I can’t find his location.
Should I rip this bracelet?
I saw the paper bracelet I received from the entrance. They said that if I tear it up in a crisis, they will come to my aid.
I haven’t got the ethereal water yet, but….
“Kkyuuuuu……”
Then, as I was about to tear the bracelet, a red slime appeared in front of me.
“Aaargh!”
I was startled and swung my (attack: 2) shovel wildly.
But the slime circled around me without attacking me or running away. Not only that, it kept bouncing its body in one direction.
This strange behavior seems to be trying to tell me something.
“Uh … do you want me to follow you?”
“Kkyuu.”
The slime replied. It kept bouncing in front of me.
Can I follow it?
If I follow it, it will probably say ‘Ta-da, you’ve fallen into a trap‘ and then maybe slimes will be pouring around me.
Ugh, I think I’ll lose if I fight it.
I hesitated for a while, but eventually I decided to follow this slime.
In any case, I was separated from Ki Yoohyun and I did not know the way. It’s not like there’s any other way around. This slime in front of me is not showing aggression.
Well, hesitating at times like this doesn’t fit the situation. I’ll follow it and if I think it’s going to be dangerous, I’ll rip the bracelet.
It was dark all around, but it wasn’t difficult to follow the slime with a flash of light.
It was sunset until a while ago, but suddenly it became dark. It made me realize that this is really a different space. Moreover, the red moon in the sky radiated a magical light.
But that bright red moon … it looks like it’s looking at me.
Eh, it’s probably just my imagination.
How can the moon look at me? It doesn’t even have eyes.
Haha, ha….
It’s just my imagination … right?
“Kkyuu.”
After walking behind the slime for a while, I heard the sound of running water from somewhere. After about 5 more minutes in the direction of the sound, a small river appeared through the bushes.
That’s a relief. I was wondering if I should go back without getting the water.
I took out the plastic bottle I had put in my inventory and filled it with river water. The water shimmered softly in the plastic bottle.
Tiling!
[Item: Ethereal Water (★★☆☆☆)Water rich in ether. It helps the growth of plants.]
The name that appeared in the system window was also clearly ethereal water.
I filled up one extra water bottle and put it in the inventory. Heavy plastic bottles are safe to carry because I have inventory.
It must have been quite heavy to walk with this plastic bottle in hand. It’s good to be awakened like this.
Great. The purpose has been achieved. Now, let’s tear the bracelet and call someone.
There was no way to find Ki Yoohyun in this wide dungeon, and my legs started to hurt.
“Kkyuu, kkyuu.”
However, the slime kept bouncing around me and squealing.
“…Eung? What?”
“Kkyuuuu!”
It would be nice to have an interpreter artifact that translates slime words. I felt stuffy because all I could hear was “Kyuuuu“.
However, the appearance of slime was quite desperate to ignore.
Why, isn’t there a story like this?
The dog ​​suddenly dug in the ground with its front paw, and when I dug the spot with a shovel, I found a lost item. The dog barked and was noisy in the middle of the night, so I came out and found out that the house was on fire.
I tend to believe such a story. When an animal tries to tell you something, you should never ignore it.
I don’t know if this slime can be considered an animal, but….
Perhaps feeling frustrated because it couldn’t communicate, the slime turned toward the bushes and circled around one point. There was some kind of long grass growing there.
“Are you talking about this grass?”
“Kkyuu.”
The slime bounced its body. It looks like I got it right.
On the surface, it’s just plain grass, and it looks a little bit like rice plant….
As soon as I touched the leaf with my hand, a familiar alarm rang.
[The condition has been met.][Skill: The Barista’s Eyes (D) has been acquired.]
[The Barista’s Eyes (D)Details: (Lv.1) You can find the ingredients.]
Suddenly, I have a new skill.
Woah, looking at the description, that’s a pretty good skill. As expected, it was good to listen to the animal (?).
There is a grass pointed at by the slime right in front of me, so let’s try the skill.
‘The Barista’s Eyes.’
Immediately, item information appeared in front of me.
[Item: Dungeon Sugar Cane (★☆☆☆☆)Type: PlantA grass commonly found in dungeons. The sap of the stem tastes sweet.Note: Ingredients for magic sugar.]
[‘Dungeon Sugarcane‘ has been added to the Ether-Wiki.]
The word ‘sugar’ caught my eye at once in the notification window. With ‘magic’ in front of it, it must not be ordinary sugar. Maybe it will give some effect like the coffee mix….
‘Can I take it?’
I think it would be useful if I could make sugar. Once I take it, I’ll figure out how to do it later.
I gently scooped the dungeon sugarcane with a shovel and put it in my inventory. It’s a crappy weapon with 2 attack power, but it was all useful in this case. Since it’s actually a seedling shovel, it’s perfect for digging soil.
I was crouching down in the dark and digging up dungeon sugarcane. Because I was so focused on my work, I didn’t even notice that something was approaching.
Tuk.
“Aaah!”
“Rieul-ssi, are you okay?”
“Huk, ah, yes!”
When I turned my head, there was Ki Yoohyun with a worried look.
Ah, I was surprised. I thought something had appeared.
I was embarrassed to scream for nothing. I shook my knees and got up.
“I couldn’t see you at the drop point, so I went looking for you. Did you get hurt?”
“No, I rolled down, but I’m fine.”
Even though I said it was okay, Ki Yoohyun looked at me with his deer-like eyes.
Ugh, the guilt was no joke when I received the concerned gaze of the handsome man. I was a little sorry that I made him worry for nothing because I was chasing after a slime.
“Then shall we go?”
“Yes, wait a minute … eh.”
Uh, where did that red slime go?
I wanted to thank it because I got my new skill. Maybe it ran away in surprise when it saw Ki Yoohyun. No matter how much I looked at the bushes, I could not see the shiny round body.
‘I wish we could meet again.’
I left the bushes behind with a slight regret.
After that, I was able to go around the dungeon without much trouble.
Slimes appeared a few times, but Ki Yoohyun melted them all, and I only need to eat the experience points. It felt like I was playing a game with auto-battle turned because the slimes have already been melted even before it came into view.
After walking along the road for a while, I saw the exit.
The exit was in the form of a disk that leaked blue light, similar to the entrance. You’ll be able to exit the dungeon if you get on that disk.
I have achieved my goal, and now I hurried to the exit with a desire to go home quickly.
Then I heard the rumbling sound of the ground behind me.
No way, it can’t be….
I believe it won’t be such a cliche development that a boss monster appears and the party falls into crisis when it’s just around the corner of the exit. Maybe it’s just that the ground is shaking a little….?
[Boss Monster: An Iridescent Giant Slime (???) has appeared.]
Gee, the system notification shattered my hopes.
Almost at the same time as the notification window, a slime appeared on the far side of the bushes.
Maybe because it’s a boss monster, the slime that appeared this time was rainbow-colored and huge. The translucent jelly-shaped body shining in its colorful brilliance was quite intimidating, it looked incredibly strong.
It seems that Ki Yoohyun is stronger than I thought, but … is it possible to kill that slime too? I thought it would be unreasonable to face the boss alone.
It’s not even just Hard. It’s a Special. Special. I am not good at English, but I know what special means.
Fortunately, the giant slime was still far away, and the exit was close.
I looked up at Ki Yoohyun, who was standing next to me. Perhaps Ki Yoohyun was also thinking the same thing as me, as he smiled with a refreshing expression.
We spoke almost simultaneously.
“Shall we run?”
“Let’s run.”
No matter who came first, we started running towards the exit. I was out of breath because I usually didn’t exercise.
“Huuh, Huu….”
I think I’ll be there soon….
No, what slime is that fast? Is it a rubber ball?
A rainbow-colored slime was approaching quickly, bouncing its body. I couldn’t have imagined that such a large body could be bounced like a rubber ball.
The slime was getting closer and closer, there was no time for me to admire it. I ran as fast as I could, looking ahead.
This is the first time I have run like this since my high school physical education exam. And then….
‘It was so hard, I drank milk and vomited….’
Heugh, I almost saw the phantasmagoria. No, now is not the time to think about that.
The moment our feet barely touched the disc, the slime caught up with us.
As I shrank in anticipation of the ensuing attack, a net of light unfolded and covered the slime.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c19:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

He was equipped with equipment that looked expensive, but in a word …  he looked like a peacock.
After him, there were four hunters in relatively modest outfits. It was a rather unusual party composition.
“If you’re going to keep dragging your feet, we’ll go first.”

Even though we didn’t answer, the peacock squeezed in. The public official pushed him away, denied his interruption, but he was stubborn.
Eh, let’s just avoid him.
The public official seemed in trouble, so I just told him to send the peacock first. The official bowed to me and checked the papers with a tired look.
“Yes, I will check the entry of the Supreme Party.”
A familiar word came into my ears.
An old-fashioned name that might have been used about 10 years ago. I think I’ve heard such stupid words lately. Where was it….
“Huahahaha! I don’t need explanations like that. Just trust this supreme leader, we’ll clear the tutorial in no time. Newbies, let’s go quickly.”
That’s right, the person nicknamed ‘Ji-jon‘!
He is the owner of that bus recruitment post on the Hunter Channel. A vicious hunter who demanded 100 rubies from an F-class.
“Wow, bad luck….”
I said while watching Jijon and his party disappearing beyond the dungeon gate.
“To be campaigning like that when you’re a C-class, your head would hit the ceiling when you’re an S-class hunter.”
However, Ki Yoohyun shook his head with an ambiguous expression.
“Um … I don’t think so. It’s a matter of personal character. S-class is not necessarily arrogant….”
It’s weird. There are less than 10 S-class hunters in Korea, so why is this man desperately making excuses?
Anyway, it’s our turn again.
The dungeon entry process was very simple. Ki Yoohyun and I stood on the disc, and the official operated the gate.
A blue light covered me, and when I opened my eyes, I was in a field.
Tiling!
[Welcome to the Great Dungeon AbyssA tutorial is currently in progress.I wish all the best for beginners.]
[Cthugha rejoices over your visit.]
Uh, what was that just now?
But before I could properly check it, the notification disappeared.
I took my eyes off the system notification and looked around slowly. 
The first thing that caught my eye was the sky dyed red in the sunset. A gentle breeze swayed through the sparsely growing reeds and shrubs. The remnants of a half-collapsed building could be seen in the distance, but it had an unusual style as if it were somewhere in a foreign country.
Rather than inside the dungeon, it seems that we are in a certain historical site.
“This is inside the Abyss?”
The sky, the wind, and the sunlight felt real. Only the slightly damp air felt a little odd.
However, unlike me, Ki Yoohyun didn’t look surprised at all. It even seemed like he was familiar to the place as he leisurely looked around and measured the direction.
“The Abyss is not a real tower, but a place where the space overlaps. It’s not just a single building, but rather it can be said that each of these different spaces are connected. On the other floors, there are the sea and snowy fields.”
“Wow … have you been there?”
“No. That … I heard about it. From someone who has been there.”
Ki Yoohyun was embarrassed and corrected it. He knew it in detail, so I thought he’d been there before.
“I don’t see anyone else.”
“Each party would have fallen to a different place. The starting point and the goal point are different for each person, so you won’t have to run into each other. Come on, let’s go.”
Ki Yoohyun began to walk in one direction. I asked, hurriedly following him.
“Uh, do you know the way?”
“It’s … It’s just a feeling.”
Indeed, there is no map or anything, so we have no choice but to go somewhere.
By the way, it was an unbelievable scenery in the dungeon. The reeds and trees all look real. There was no time to feel bored as I looked around with a curious mind.
After walking in the field for about ten minutes, a green lump that looked like a jelly appeared in front of me. At the same time, the system alarm rang.
[Green Slime (F) for Beginners has appeared.]
Slime is different from the cave black bear that attacked the store recently. It had no sharp teeth or claws, and its translucent and smooth body trembled softly.
In short, it looks cute.
“Kyuuu….”
Even the sound of slime is cute. It was the moment when I subconsciously took a step closer to take a closer look,
The slime’s round body spread like a membrane in an instant and tried to attack me.
“Uwah!”
I stepped back in surprise, and there was a flash of light. When I opened my eyes, the slime had melted away.
“Huh?”
What was it just now? He didn’t cast spells for magic skills, and he didn’t even show hand gestures for offensive skills.
[Party Member: Ki Yoohyun has defeated the Green Slime for Beginners (F).][You have gained 10 EXP.]
Only the notification window that appeared in front of me with a ring sound, informed me that Ki Yoohyun had just killed it.
“Rieul-ssi, are you okay?”
“Yeah, I’m okay … Did Yoohyun-ssi kill it?”
I asked Ki Yoohyun with a suspicious look.
I had thought about it a while ago, but after entering the dungeon, my suspicions grew stronger.
This person … is he strong?
With a relaxed attitude, he was melting the slime in an instant.
It was a suspicious situation, but Ki Yoohyun answered with a shy expression, saying that he was also surprised.
“Hahaha … because it is for beginners, the difficulty must have been set to easy.”
Does he not know that he’s strong yet? A breathless power that I’ve only heard of? Or is this actually a haha bus?
Did I enter the world of “I am too strong as a rookie hunter” without realizing it? Was he actually a possessed person?
Either way….
‘I have to stay close to him.’
If Ki Yoohyun becomes famous in the future, I’ll post something like, “I cleared the the tutorial dungeon with Ki Yoohyun“. I will put a sign on the store saying “It’s the coffee that Ki Yoohyun drank” and sell coffee for hundreds of thousands of won. 
‘Hehehe.’
“Rieul-ssi.”
Ki Yoohyun spoke to me, who fell into a snobbish thought for a moment.
“Ah, yes, yes?!”
“Be careful. Slime is not such a dangerous monster, but … it’s better not to touch it.”
“Do they have any poison?”
“Your skin swells and itches when you touch it.”
“Ugh….”
That’s a big deal. I have to be careful.
Colorful slime continued to appear along the way. Ki Yoohyun easily killed various slimes such as green, blue, and yellow slimes. The melted slime was absorbed into the ground and disappeared. 
Because of that, the system notifications were popping up one after another in front of my eyes.
[You have gained 10 EXP.]
[You have gained 10 EXP.]
[You have gained 10 EXP.]
…………………………………
I’m in the state of doing nothing, but still gaining the experience points.
This is a bit … isn’t this such a good benefit?
At this rate, I think I can level up without lifting a hand. Is this enough to just enter the dungeon?
As I walked while my partner was melting the slime, I came across a fork covered with bushes. Then, I heard the sound of running water nearby.
Heugh, I was distracted by the free experience and almost forgot my original purpose.
“Yoohyun-ssi, please wait….”
The moment I was going to reveal my original purpose for entering the dungeon….
“Wuahahaha! The Supreme swordsmanship!”
The peacock that appeared from the other side … no, Jijon swung the sword in his hand.
Behind him, there were still four beginners with tired faces.
Jijon swept away the slimes around him and shouted in a loud voice.
“If you get caught in this supreme swordsmanship, you’ll get one shot! WUAHAHA.”
Oh my gosh, the skill name is also bad….
And why are you screaming when you use your skill?
I glanced at Ki Yoohyun.
“You said we won’t run into the others.”
“We’re out of luck.”
“This is the hunting ground of the supreme leader! The little ones are just getting in the way, so get them out quickly.”
I had a foreboding that it would be annoying to run into that guy among many hunters. I was about to ignore it and slowly move forward, but … something happened.
Kuuuung, Kuuuung.
My body trembled at the suddent vibrations of the ground. What, did an earthquake happen?
Ki Yoohyun also looked surprised at this unexpected situation.
Soon, a system notification window appeared in front of me.
[Warning!Tutorial dungeon is a special dungeon designed to help beginners grow.Please use the dungeon with a difficulty level that suits you.]
[The difficulty of the tutorial dungeon changes due to the appearance of a strong player.Tutorial Dungeon―Special Hard mode starts.Defeat stronger monsters and get more experience.]
What the hell does this mean?
As I read the notification window in disbelief, I heard laughter next to me.
“O’my my … wuahahaha!”
It was Jijon.
“I’m sorry about this. I was just trying to help you beginners … but it looks like I’m too strong to come in here. The difficulty of the dungeon went up because of me, I’m sorry.”
I don’t think so.
I don’t know exactly what the situation is, but I have a strong feeling that it wasn’t him.
At that moment, the sun in the western sky disappeared and darkness descended as if time was fast-forwarding.
And as the red moon in the middle of the sky emitted an ominous light, it was obvious that an unusual change had occurred.
Thump, Thump, Thump-.
The moment when the regular pounding of the ground stopped….
[Dungeon difficulty increased. A Giant Slime for Experts (???) has appeared.]
The giant slime came toward us, bouncing its whole body.
The body, which appeared from the bushes, seemed to be over 5 meters tall. The body glowed fluorescent green in the dark. I think it’ll be real bad my your skin if I touch it.
Jijon stepped forward to bite back at the bizarre sight.
“Huahaha! Don’t worry. Even if it’s a giant, it’s still a slime. This supreme leader will be able to get rid of it.”
Oh, he was pretty cool now.
“Hiyaaah …. Supreme Swordsmanship!”
Jijon swung the sword in his hand.
However, the giant slime bounced the sword lightly. The wind blew the sword out of his hand.
Still, Jijon did not give in.
“Eugh … It’s pretty solid. But I still have this skill. Ultimate … The Supreme Iron Fang!”
The moment he shouted “Hiyaaah” a tremendous amount of power was condensed into the his fist. Jijon jumped sharply and swung his fist towards the giant slime.
Tung-.
However, Jijon’s fist could not penetrate the smooth body of the giant slime.
Jijon’s body, which bounced off with a bang, rolled on the floor.
“….Ugh.”
Jijon, who got up with a moan, glared at the giant slime with a determined expression.
Then, he ran away.
“Huh?”
It was so fast. I soon couldn’t see his back.
“Leader … wait, let’s go together!”
When Jijon, the leader of the party, ran away, a group of bewildered beginners followed him.
In an instant, only Ki Yoohyun, the giant slime, and I were left here.
The giant slime bounced off its body with a flash of light.
…. it seems to say that it’s our turn next.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
I think I forgot to mention it before, Jijon (지존) means supreme / the best. It is out-dated expression. It comes from Chinese character (至尊) and was used as an honorific title for a king in the past. Well, you probably still see it being used in martial arts novel. That’s why the MC thought his skill name is ridiculous.
… and guys, please stop jinxing the MC in the comments T__T

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c18:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

This time, Ki Yoohyun dressed in an inconspicuous outfit, an ordinary coat without a guild mark. Furthermore, he was alone.
A doubt flashed across my mind when I saw the outfit.
Is he slacking off again?
“Are you slacking off again?”

Oh, the thought just came out of my mouth.
“Well, it’s sort of like that.”
“You’d better go somewhere else. They told me to leave because the VVIP is coming.”
Over Ki Yoohyun’s shoulder, I could see the Hunter Market’s staff was looking this way.
Despite his restless attitude, he did not approach this way easily. It’s a completely different attitude from the overbearing appearance earlier. What’s wrong with him?
Well, it’s none of my business. I looked away from them.
“…Take care.”
I hope you slack off safely.
I nodded and tried to step aside, but Ki Yoohyun blocked my way.
I turned to the other side. However, Ki Yoohyun also followed me to the other side.
“Do you have anything to say to me?”
“You bought a good item.”
“What?”
Are you talking about this shovel and miscellaneous item set?
However, what Ki Yoohyun pointed to with his finger was the ring I just received from the old lady.
“Do you want me to tell you a secret?”
“….I don’t.”
I don’t remember having a relationship that close enough to share secrets with this man. Moreover, I had a foreboding that it would be troublesome to hear the word ‘secret‘ all of sudden.
I’m not going to tell you my secret, and I’m not curious about your secret, so I hope you go on your way.
However, Ki Yoohyun continued to speak at his own will. I guess he’s not good at listening to people.
“The VVIP, the one scheduled to visit today, is Hunter Kim Deokyi, an A-class craftsman. It’s the first time in ten years since she went into hiding for skill training. In order to buy the items from the craftsman master that finally will appear on the market for the first time in a long time, there is a fierce battle under each guild’s purchasing department. The master’s items are worth calling.”
“….Hee.”
“I came here because I heard that the craftsman master is visiting today, but it’s already too late.”
Ki Yoohyun dropped his shoulders slightly as if he was regretting it.
It’s already late, I guess he came while I was arguing at the consignment shop.
“Oh, one more. There is a rumor that the item that the master craftsman released this time is the only one. It is a unique item that can’t be found again in the world.”
It was an interesting story, but that was it.
It was an item that a craftsman who had disappeared for 10 years made for the first time in a long time, so I also wanted to take a look at it at least once.
Still, if it is that rare, it would be sold at a price that I can’t even dream of with 50 rubies, so somehow it felt like it was a story of a different world. The day will not come when I can look at the craftsman’s items.
I have finished my business, so I decided to leave Hunter Market and go back to the store.
But Ki Yoohyun kept following me. He was walking five steps behind me, but I couldn’t pretend that I didn’t know it.
I sighed and looked back.
“Why do you keep following me?”
“….Ah.”
Ki Yoohyun’s eyes widened.
Did you think that I wouldn’t know after following me so clearly? It was amazing.
“I don’t have any strange intention. So … I also have business to do at the dungeon gate….”
“Ah, is that so….”
When I turned around and started walking again, Ki Yoohyun followed me closely and talked to me.
“By the way, Rieul-ssi, you’re awakened.”
Only registered Awakened person could enter the Hunter Market. I pondered for a moment and answered half-heartedly.
“Well, it’s something like that.”
“Then are you participating in the tutorial dungeon?”
“Yeah, I am.”
To be honest, I was only thinking of getting the water, but I nodded my head.
Ki Yoohyun continued to talk, regardless of my dry attitude.
“I am about to participate in the tutorial dungeon too, can I go with you?”
Before I knew it, I came up to the side and looked at Ki Yoohyun who was standing there.
With his big eyes, his tall body looks weak.
The cold Hunter Channel’s party recruiting posts came to mind. Was this man also rejected several times while trying to find a party?
“Yoohyun-ssi is a member of the Cheongna Guild. Don’t you have anyone in the guild to go with you?”
“Ahahaha … Everyone said no because they’re busy.”
They’re cold-hearted, too.
Usually, the same guild members organize a party, but no matter how weak Ki Yoohyun seems, it’s too much that they don’t even organize a party for him. The Big Three guilds are great, but they are too cold-hearted to its guild members.
Except for the fact that I was an Awakened, I didn’t tell this man anything about my class or job. This man seemed desperate enough to even hold onto someone like me.
“Therefore … If Rieul-ssi is okay with it, I want to have a party with you.”
“But I’m a non-combatant, so I won’t be much help.”
“It doesn’t matter. As long as you come with me.”
“I might get in the way.”
“That’s all right.”
Ki Yoohyun persuaded me by saying that he’ll do his best to help me.
Listening to his story, apparently he applied for a two-person party, but the hunter who was originally going to go with him broke his promise.
“You can cancel it and apply again.”
“That … Haha, the fees are outrageous….”
Oh, my….
Faced with Ki Yoohyun’s pleading eyes, I unknowingly nodded my head.
He’s a little suspicious, but….
Since I couldn’t buy the stealth cloak I wanted, I’m in a difficult situation too, so I thought it would be nice to have a party member.
“Well … Let’s go together, then.”
“Really? Thank you!”
Ki Yoohyun smiled brightly. He looked genuinely happy.
“And I have one more request.”
“What is it?”
“I’d like to drink the coffee you gave me before one more time. It was really delicious.”
“It’s all gone.”
I guess he wasn’t lying about the coffee tasted delicious, Ki Yoohyun was noticeably disappointed.
Still, now I’m thinking of making an Americano.
“I’ll make a new coffee instead, so I’ll let you drink it then.”
***
The next day, my eyes opened wide before the alarm went off. I went to bed early yesterday, but I was restless.
It felt like a waste of time, so I dug into the blanket again, but once I woke up, my mind was filled with nothing but fuss.
Eventually, I decided to just get up early. I came down to the first floor after taking care of the sound of footsteps so that Mieum, who was sleeping by the bed, did not wake up.
The appearance of  Abyss could be seen through the large window on the first floor. The dungeon that soared endlessly toward the sky boasted an overwhelming majesty.
How many floors are there?
Even now, several guilds are conducting raids for item farming or training, but the identity of that dungeon remains unknown.
There are many speculations that there are very strong monsters up there, that you can become a God if you finish the last floor, or that it will lead to another world.
Today, I am going over there. Once again, I felt a little nervous.
I quickly took a shower and changed my clothes. I still have plenty of time until the time I agreed to meet with Ki Yoohyun, but there was work to be done before departure.
“What’s all this?”
About two hours later, Mieum woke up and asked as she came down the stairs.
“Waeeooong, it smells strange.”
“It’s not a strange smell, it’s the smell of sesame oil.”
“Why does it smell like sesame oil!”
Perhaps because she hated the savory smell, Mieum raised her fur upright and groaned.
I didn’t pay her any attention because was absorbed in what I was doing. I wrapped the gimbap.
“Ugh, it exploded. What should I do?”
The waist of the gimbap burst because too much filling was added. I have no choice but to eat this for breakfast.
I laid the seaweed again, put the rice on top, and put the filling ingredients inside. This time, I was able to cut gimbap in just the right size. I lined up the line in the lunch box and packed the gimbap.
“Mieum-ah, would you like to eat gimbap too?”
“Waeoong….”
My eyes stung. Mieum looked at me in amazement.
However, although there are individual differences, the tutorial dungeon takes half a day. Even if I come back as soon as possible, it must already be afternoon.
That’s why I need a lunch box, and if it’s a packed box, gimbap is the national rule.
After filling my stomach with the bursting kimbap, it was time to leave. I poured a generous amount of cereal into Mieum’s bowl and packed my bag.
There was nothing special about it. The inventory contains a 1-liter water bottle for the ethereal water and a set of low-grade items purchased from Hunter Market.
I don’t know if it will help, but I also brought the seedling shovel and wore the low-grade windshield for beginner. Even having a defense of 2 would be better than nothing.
Finally, after packing the gimbap, I felt a little excited because it felt like I will go on a picnic.
“Then, Mieum-ah, take good care of the house.”
“….Meow.”
Mieum, who was eating her breakfast with her head stuck in a bowl, nodded and greeted me. I locked the door and set out for the dungeon.
After walking for about three minutes, I arrived at the dungeon gate of Abyss.
It’s just around the corner, but this is the first time I’m at the Dungeon Gate. It’s not a tourist destination, so there was no reason to come.
In front of a large tower-shaped dungeon, there was a disk that sparkled with blue light.
Unlike usual, the area was crowded with rookie hunters trying to enter the tutorial dungeon.
We were supposed to meet here….
I wandered around the Dungeon Gate trying to find Ki Yoohyun. If I knew this would happen, I would have asked for his contact information.
“Ah, that’s him!”
Fortunately, I was able to find Ki Yoohyun without difficulty because he’s taller than the others.
When I shouted out loud, Ki Yoohyun also found me immediately and came closer.
“Rieul-ssi, hello.”
Ki Yoohyun was dressed in a simple outfit with a black coat on the outside. It was in contrast to the fact that the hunters around us were equipped with full-fledged equipment. Among his neat clothes, only the silver watch, the only accessory, stood out.
“You don’t have any other weapons?”
“Ahaha … the weapon I usually use is currently in a broken state.”
I’m nervous….
Well, since it’s a tutorial, it’ll be fine.
[You have a party.Party Member: Kwon Rieul, Ki YoohyunEXP distribution method: Equal distribution.]
The moment I received the party scroll that Ki Yoohyun gave me, a system notification popped up in front of my eyes. It was written that if you kill a monster while forming a party, the experience points are distributed to both.
“Then shall we go?”
We had no reason to stay long at the entrance. Ki Yoohyun and I immediately lined up in front of the dungeon gate. Fortunately, the line got shorter and it was our turn.
“Kwon Rieul and Ki Yoohyun, it’s your party, right?
“Yes.”
“Here’s your tutorial bracelet.”
A public official guarding the dungeon gate put a paper bracelet on my arm. It looks like a wristband usually used for entering a concert hall.
“If you tear this bracelet in a crisis, the Hunter who was waiting inside the dungeon will come to help you. If you think it’s dangerous, use it right away.”
The public official continued his explanation with a tired expression.
The tutorial dungeon is a quest dungeon for training rookie hunters, and the difficulty of the monsters inside is adjusted according to the hunter’s abilities. In this way, it is unlikely that anything dangerous will happen, but in case of an emergency, you should always ask for help.
As the explanations on how to find a way inside and how to clear the dungeon were almost finished, a loud noise was heard from behind.
“Let’s hurry up. I’m going to burst and die if I need to wait a little longer. Such explanations are not something that even newbies want to hear.”
When I turned around, a Hunter in a splendid outfit was standing in a crooked posture.
[Next]

I’m worried for the MC … what if she meet a good-looking scammer smh T__T

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c17:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

I was thinking of buying a cloak with stealth effect for 50 rubies.
This is because, of course, I have no intention to fight the monsters with only a paper-like F-class body. At the most, it was a waste of the ruby ​​I earned, but after completing the quest, I can resell the item.
I couldn’t bring Mieum because I didn’t know if it’s allowed to bring my cat to Hunter Market, and there was also no carrier for transportation.
The unfamiliar Hunter Market . I was a little anxious because there was no talking cat next to me.

No, there is no room for weak thoughts.
I made up my mind and entered the entrance on the first floor of Hunter Market.
“Welcome. How may I help you?”
Compared to the shiny exterior, the inside was more customer-friendly than I expected. However, the lobby was empty, probably because it’s during the time when there were few customers. The staff near the entrance greeted me with a friendly smile and a bright voice.
“Uh,  I’d like to buy some equipment. Where should I go?”
“Is this your first visit? Then, please fill out this registration card first. Oh, you can sit on that sofa over there and fill it out comfortably. Do you need to borrow your pen?”
But the kindness ended as soon as I submitted my registration card.
The eyes of the staff stayed on the Hunter’s grade column of the registration card for a long time, and in the next moment, the face of the staff was colder than ice and frostier than winter.
“Ex … excuse me?”
“The VVIP is scheduled to visit today, so all the staff are busy. You have to wait a little bit.”
Then the staff pointed to the farmost room. Are you telling me to go over there?
“There are things that are right for you.”
The staff left me behind and went into the staff room behind me. I called, but she doesn’t even look back.
That’s right. Among Hunters, they treated grades like a gangster. The winner has a monopoly. In other words, the strongest is the best.
Yes, I am patient person with good humanity who entered the inhuman world of the Hunter world. I will endure it. Since I don’t have anything urgent to do, I decided to pass the time by looking at the items.
I headed towards the far end of the room pointed to by the staff.
I was wondering if it was a small room, but the room was quite spacious and decorated with a sophisticated interior. Again, no one else was visible except me, and various equipment and items were displayed in a glass showcase with a security device.
“Umh, the price….”
Judging from the attitude of the staff, it must have been the area where the lowest-grade items were collected, but all of them were exorbitantly priced.
The cheapest items such as a shirt that increases defense by 10 and a ring that increases dodge rate by 10% also started with 100 rubies. I was a little worried about whether it would be possible to buy the stealth cloak that I wanted for 50 rubies in here.
“Umh….”
I looked at all the items in the showcase, but the staff showed no sign of returning. No matter what they said about VVIP or something, it’s a bit harsh. How long do I have to wait?
Then, a commotion was heard from the other side of the hallway.
When I poked my head out of the door and looked around, the Hunter Market’s staff was yelling at someone. Their voice was so loud that it could be heard by everyone on the other side.
What’s going on?
The sound was coming from the consignment shop area.
A consignment shop refers to a shop where hunters in the production field sell items directly after paying a certain fee to the Hunter Market. They mainly sold miscellaneous items that were made to train their crafting skills, but most of them were not good enough to be officially sold at Hunter Market.
However, even if it is a miscellaneous item, it is helpful enough for low-grade hunters. Above all, the price was cheap, so it was a favorite area for poor hunters.
I also tried to buy a cloak at the consignment shop at first. However, the consignment shop area was empty due to an interior repair.
No, now that I see it, there was only one consignment shop in the far corner.
A loud noise was heard there.
‘Is there a fight?’
The staff showed no sign of coming here, and I was curious because of boredom. I approached them with the intention of seeing what happened.
“I have already told you not to open business here.”
It was such a loud voice that it hurt my ears.
A Hunter Market staff shouted at the consignment shop in the corner. The owner of the shop was a wrinkled old lady. The old lady shrugged her shoulders under the pressure of the staff.
“Didn’t you hear the order to empty the shop because a VVIP is scheduled to visit today? Please clean it up quickly.”
“But … here’s the consignment shop permit … I’m properly authorized.”
The old lady unzipped the bag at her waist and took out a crumpled permit. It was definitely an official permit with the seal of Hunter Market.
However, the staff did not blink an eye when he saw the permit.
“We will refund the price of the permit. If you don’t clean it up quickly, I’ll call the guards.”
The old lady flinched at the staff’s stiff attitude. She was intimidated on her own, the large staff standing in front of the skinny and short old lady.
It was a pitiful appearance that awakened the Confucian girl inside me, but the staff was tough.
“B-but it’s an useful item for the tutorial dungeon …  I have to sell it before the tutorial dungeon, but if you tell me to leave now….”
“Haha, what did you say?”
The staff laughed out loud.
“VVIP is coming. Who do you think would buy such a sloppy item? Do you think they will give you any attention? Guard!”
The staff beckoned the guards of Hunter Marker. It seemed as if the approaching guards would push and drag that weak-looking old lady at any moment.
“Wait, wait a minute!”
Without realizing it, I shouted and interrupted.
Because the old lady in the consignment shop reminded me of my late grandmother.
No, if it were my grandmother….
“What nonsense are you talking about? Open your eyes and see. Here, can’t you see it has the word  ‘Business Permit’? I’ve already paid for it, but you want me to leave? It looks ridiculous because it’s old lady’s money. I’ll take care of it whether it’s sold or not, so don’t worry. What’s wrong with me lying down in my shop? Go out!”
… she would have said that. She wasn’t the type to lose anywhere.
Anyway.
“Sir, why are you like this?”
First of all, the way I spoke was polite, but my eyes were full of curse.
‘It was that F-class from earlier. Ha, it’s crazy today. A wanderer will quietly watch and then go home.‘
It seems like the staff would say that. I continued without giving in.
“I was going to buy it.”
“What?”
“Grandma, how much is the item?”
I glanced at the bundles of items placed on the shelves of the consignment shop. It caught my eye that the price tag said ‘all for 50 rubies‘.
Thank God. I did my best. I didn’t have to step back because I didn’t have enough money. People have pride.
I took out 50 rubies from the inventory and placed them on the shelf.
“Here’s 50 rubies.”
“Oh, student, you don’t have to.”
“No. I was just in need of that item. Hurry up and take it. You don’t have to stay in a place where they kick people out at their own will.”
Then I took the set of items handed to me by the old lady and turned around.
I strode out of the Hunter Market, bumping the shoulders of the staffs and guards. I didn’t look back at all, as if I would never come back to a store that ignores customers like this.
After 20 steps like that, I crouched down on the floor and pulled my hair out.
“Ugh….”
I did it.
I didn’t mean to buy this….
I was just going to get some water from the dungeon, so I was just going to buy an inexpensive cloak….
I checked the item set that I received without looking properly.
[Low-Grade Windshield for Beginner (★☆☆☆☆)Type: ArmorDefense: 2Note: It is good to wear during the changing season.]
[Low-Grade Shovel for Beginner (★☆☆☆☆)Type: WeaponAttack: 2Note: Useful for digging. Farmer’s friend.]
[Low-Grade Item Set for Beginner (★☆☆☆☆)Type: ConsumablesIncluding bandages, bands, flares, smoke bombs, herbs.]
….
No, that’s not it. Let’s not regret it.
Although it is completely different from the item I was going to buy, I used 50 rubies and returned to square one, but the Confucian girl inside me shouted. This is the right way!
You don’t do that to a grandma. Ha.
I was about to go back after finishing my mind, but the old lady called me from behind.
“Student, wait a minute.”
“Ah, yes, what’s wrong?”
The grandmother I saw up close had a slightly different impression than before.
I thought she looked fragile earlier, because her face was wrinkled and her hair was white, but somehow I felt an atmosphere that was not easily approachable.
There was a kind smile on her lips, but her eyes were sharp and her posture was flawless.
“I forgot this.”
“Yes?”
It was a ring that the old lady gave out. A red stone was embedded in the monotonous gold ring.
“Take it. I’m selling this too, but I forgot to give it to you.”
“It’s fine. You don’t have to give it to me….”
“This ring should be in the hands of the right person. It looks like the student suits it.”
“Ah, yes….”
I received the ring on surprise.
What is this?
At first glance, it looked like an ordinary ring. Does it have any special abilities? I checked the detail window of the ring.
[Cthugha’s RingType: AccessoriesEffect: Unusable.]
However, the description of the item was very concise. The name is listed, but the level and ability are unknown. The effect is also unknown and cannot be used.
Is it a failure of crafting skills?
Still, I liked the ring shape because it was pretty. As soon as I got it, I put the ring on my hand. At least I should wear it.
“As expected, it looks good on you.”
“Uh, thank you … Grandma?”
I was about to say goodbye, but the old lady had already left first.
When I saw her back, I remembered my grandmother again, and my anger soared at the tyranny of Hunter Market.
Yeah, well done.
This is not the time to be discouraged by this accident. Now that the situation became like this, I’ll make an Americano and earn 100 rubies.
I don’t know who the hell the VVIP is, but we’ll see.
I couldn’t see straight ahead because I was burning up my motivation. As I was about to leave , I bumped into a person who was coming in front of me.
“Ugh, I’m sorry … huh?”
Tall, deep dark eyes covered with thick rimmed glasses, and a shiny face.
It was someone I had met.
Right, it’s the master of slacking off.
Ki Yoohyun, who made eye contact with me, smiled brightly. He looked even more handsome when he smiled with his handsome face.
“I didn’t expect to see you here again.”
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Confucian girl (유교 걸 / yu gyeo geol): a conservative (polite, kid) woman. It’s a slang that using pun words because as you can see, the hangul is similiar to the english word “You Go Girl”
크투가, translated as Cthugha, probably refers to one of The Great Old Ones, a great spirit god (elemental?) who reigns over all fire and lightning spirits. You can google it, it’s a fictional deity in the Cthulhu Mythos.
It seems that our MC really has the power of fantasy MC SJHDJSAKL

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c16:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Before the screen moved on to the next news, my phone vibrated.
[Shin Mira: Rieul, what are you doing?]
[Shin Mira: Why is there no chat lately? Are you working overtime?]
[Shin Mira: That’s right, right, you said that you resigned. Wow, I’m really envious ㅠㅠ]

It was KakaoTalk from my high school friend, Shin Mira. Come to think of it, I even told her about the news of my resignation, but I wasn’t able to contact her for a while because I’ve awakened and experienced some crazy things lately.
“Human, you have friends.”
What does this cat think of me?
I like to be lazy, but I still have friends. Although I only reported my survival through KakaoTalk.
It’s been a long time since we met because the last time was before my regression.
[Me: Yep. I really recommend resignation, it’s good for your health]
[Me: See you when you’re less busy]
[Shin Mira: OKOK~]
After replying to the Kakaotalk, I washed up and lay on the bed.
Tomorrow, the branch will bear fruit. I’m glad I didn’t have to wait long.
I fell asleep with that thought.
***
“It didn’t grow at all?”
The next morning, when I went to check the branch, I was surprised.
Far from bearing any fruit, the Yggdrasil’s branch had withered more than yesterday. The green leaves even turned yellow at the tips.
Flutter.
Ah, the leaf fell off.
It seems that the rest of the leaves will fall off if they withered a little more.
“You said it grows quickly in one night.”
I protested, but the system’s message was silent.
Yesterday, you put up a notification pretending to be pitiful to the point where my eyes hurt, but are you  pretending not to know anything now?
Instead, Mieum said in a small voice.
“The branch lost a lot of strength while left outdoors. So it seems that ordinary water cannot make the tree grows. Waeoong….”
“Then what water should I use?”
The description in the Ether-Wiki was ‘fresh water’. Can’t I use tap water? Should I buy Evian and pour it over?
“You need water with a high ether concentration.”
“Where can I find it?”
Mieum didn’t answer right away and stared at me.
Ah. Now I know what happens when this cat makes a face like this. Obviously, she’s trying to make me do something incredibly cumbersome.
Stop, you don’t have to answer. I’ll pretend I didn’t hear it.
“If you scoop up ethereal water from the dungeon and pour it in, it will survive.”
I covered my ears.
“I can’t hear anything. I can’t hear anything….”
“Participate in the tutorial dungeon.”
“All of a sudden?!”
“There is a river in the tutorial dungeon on the first floor of Abyss. You can get the water from there.”
I knew it.
I feel like I keep getting involved. It was clear that Mieum and the system were working hard to get me into the dungeon.
I should have noticed it from the moment it kept saying that it was easy and that it would give me a reward.
This is it. A story in which the main character of an RPG game who was only going to run an errand in a neighboring town, eventually gets caught up in a troublesome task and fights the Demon King.
Yeah, I don’t want it. If the system is an RPG game, my role is like the innkeeper of the starter village who sees off the main character.
I was just trying to water the branch. I refused to play the story of entering the dungeon after getting caught up in troublesome work.
“I really can’t hear it. Ahaha, Mieum, I can’t hear you at all.”
“Meooong!”
Mieum jumped up with her back feet and threw a meow punch. The cat’s forefoot attack is quite painful.
‘I’m going to put her in the bath soon.’
I vowed revenge in my heart.
“Waeoong! You look like you’re up to something!”
Like a ghost, she noticed my thoughts, and Mieum jumped up and rushed to my lap. The movement of jumping, which did not go well with her heavy figure, was quick. As I staggered at the heavy attack, the hand that covered my ear fell off.
Tiling, Tiling.
Then a clear sound effect pierced my ears. The system, which had been silent until now, opened a notification window.
[A quest has occurred]
I don’t fall for this trick anymore.
This innkeeper is busy today because she has to go exchange the 5 million won. I don’t have time to check things like quests.
However, the system arbitrarily pushed the quest details screen.
[Sub-Quest: Our Blue River and Green MountainOh dear, the precious branch is on the verge of drying up due to lack of ether.Let’s make the branch green again by giving them water flowing with ether.
Required Items: 1 liter of ethereal waterPour ethereal water on the branch 0/1
Reward: 3 Golden Draw Tickets]
Uh, Golden Draw Ticket?
Is it a lucky draw?
The worst civilization ever created by the mankind. The draw that makes you dream in vain and brings despair at the extreme odds of 0.1% or 0.5%.
“…”
Uh, I almost fell for it.
It’s because of my old habit of not being able to stand just by looking at the drawing.
No, it’s not. I won’t do it. I’m not doing it.
***
The intersection in front of Exit 2 of the bustling Apgujeong Hunter Market Station.
In Seoul, where land is famous for being expensive, I saw a flashing sign of the Hunter Market Apgujeong branch. The large exterior of the building and the sophisticated interior seemed to be shouting, ‘go away, foolish rookie’.
In the afternoon, I came to this Hunter Market as scheduled.
However, only the destination is the same. The today’s purpose is completely different. It was not to exchange 5 million won, but to purchase items to enter the dungeon.
“Ha….”
I really had no intention of doing the quest.
It’s true that there wasn’t….
The problem is I’m weak-minded person.
The branch withered as if it was going to die at any moment, and I felt like I had to finish the quest once I started it.
They even give me tickets for the golden draw.
It’s not that I fell for the golden ticket.
I just felt sorry for the dying branches. It sounds unconvincing, but it’s true.
Of course, I had no intention of jumping into the dungeon recklessly, and initially made my own plan.
It is said that ethereal water can be collected from the river on the first floor of Abyss, where the tutorial dungeon will be held.
So, wouldn’t it be okay if I had a party with the Hunter participating in the tutorial and just went in to fetch the water? Or I can pay them money and ask them to bring me some water.
With that in mind, I entered the party matching service on the tutorial dungeon application site.
It was an intermediary site for hunters who wanted to join a party. Wizards, healers, assistants, and others who had difficulty clearing dungeons by themselves used this to form parties and participate.
After skipping all the long explanations, I entered my personal information in the application box, but an error appeared with a beep.
“Huh? What’s wrong with it?”
/System Error/Service only available for E-class Combat Hunter or higher, and D-class non-Combat Hunter or higher.(Please contact us separately for the following grades. matching@dungeon.go.kr)
How can a F-class live with this shame!
I know what ‘contact separately‘ means at times like this. If you ask, they will say that it is difficult to form a party because of the low grade.
‘Hunter-nim’s grade is a bit … it is difficult to participate with a Hunter of the desired grade.’
They’ll just give you an answer like this.
I had no choice but to look for recruitment posts from the Hunter Community.
But….
[Recruitment] Tutor-Party Member Wanted, special treatment for E-class or higher healers
[Recruitment] Those who will join the Tuto Dungeon!! Starting from D-class
[Chatting It’s a bit difficult for F-class to apply for party recruitment postings;
[Recruitment] Looking for 4 person for Tutor-Party, class is irrelevant (E-class declined)
No matter how hard I tried to find it….
[Recruitment] Tutor’s Dream Bus Ride
Oh, this would be fine. I don’t have to force myself to find a party to enter, I just need to stick on a strong hunter like a dust and then get the water.
I clicked on the post with that in mind.
***
[Recruitment] Tutor’s Dream Bus Ride
Upvotes: 13 / Downvotes: 1
***
Writer: Jijon
Party Leader C-class Level 20 InspectionLevel Authentication AvailablePossessing a full set of C-class inspection equipmentKnowing the strategy of guaranteed quick clear
Low-level non-combat hunters are also welcome ^^This supreme leader is responsible and I will make sure that even a low-level newbie can clear the tutorial dungeon ^^Everyone knows that tutorial dungeons are important for early level up, right?Don’t hit each other and choose a really capable hunter in advance ^^There are only three seats left, so if you are interested, please send me a message as soon as possible.
※Caution※No bus fare nego—You keep asking me to negotiate, but I’m offering you the lowest price.I don’t reply to inquiries.
——Bus Fares——D-class 10 rubiesE-class 30 rubiesF-class 100 rubies
***
What, you charged 100 rubies for a F-class? 10 million won?
Have you ever seen such a vicious hunter? Even the nickname “Ji-jon” is ridiculous. I pressed the downvotes button and closed the window.
[Recruitment] F-classes go around together
Yes, it would be better to form a party with similar awakening classes than to be placed on top by a strong hunter.
***
[Recruitment] F-classes go around together
Upvotes: 5 / Downvotes: 0
***
Writer: F-class
Hello ^^It’s hard to find a party for new hunters who have awakened to F-class ㅠㅠYou can beat the tutorial with plenty of ease if you get together with the F-classes~!!We are looking for F-class hunters to go with us.I’m a ranged attack mage, so I’m recruiting for a defensive or swordsman class.If you’re not in combat class … I’m sorry ^^;;;;And you know that it is manners to match the equipment with at least an E-class item set, right?Please send me a message~!!!
***
Yes, you’re sorry….
After being rejected many times like this, the anger slowly rose in my heart. Obviously, I feel bad if I keep getting rejected even if it’s for a place I don’t want to go.
If I talk to Kwon Jiwoon, he’ll surely get me some ethereal water, but….
“Don’t show any interest in Hunters or anything like that, and just stay as a normal person.”
When I remembered those words, I couldn’t open my mouth.
We are not close, and I’ve already bothered him with the black bear incident last time. I haven’t even told him that I have awakened yet.
So, I will somehow go into the dungeon alone and finish the quest. Who knows for sure that I wouldn’t be able to do it!
“Miaaaaw? What’s wrong with you, human? Your eyes are scary.”
“Mieum, don’t stop me.”
“Waeooong?”
That’s why I came to this Hunter Market Apgujeong branch.
[Next]

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c15:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Even so, it’s already late afternoon. The thought of visiting the Dungeon Management Office right now and going to the crowded Apgujeong area was a bit annoying.
I decided to go to the Hunter Market tomorrow and put the 50 rubies in my inventory.
Next was the new skill.

[The Barista’s Extraction (D)
Details: (Lv.1) Extract espresso from ground coffee beans.]
To make an Americano, I have to extract espresso from ground coffee beans. Is it the skill for that?
The problem was that Americano recipe. Unlike in the case of coffee mix, when I selected the recipe, the details appeared, and the content was….
[Recipe: Americano
Ingredients: Dried Fruit of Yggdrasil, hot water.]
There was an incomprehensible word written from the first line.
Yeah? Is not a normal coffee bean powder? Perhaps it’s the name of a bean type like Yirgacheffe or Kenya AA? There must be a bean called Yggdrasil.
“Wait a minute … Yggdrasil?”
I remember hearing a similar word recently. Where was it? Yggdrasil, Yggdrasil….
“Isn’t it that tree?”
Then, Mieum pointed to one side of the table.
On the table, there was a branch that was recently obtained as an achievement’s reward. I took it out to imitate the natural interior I saw on Instagram. Come to think of it, I think the name was like that.
I thought it was just for interior decoration, but it turned out to be useful.
However, the Branch of Yggdrasil has only a few green leaves with no fruit at all. How do I get the fruit?
At that time, a new notification window appeared in front of me.
[Congratulations.The Eligible who has completed the tutorial quest, you have obtained the right to access the Ether-Wiki.Ether-Wiki is an encyclopedia completed with user contributions.Gather as much information as possible to fill in the contents of the Ether-Wiki.
Access Now ☜]
What is this?
I tried to turn off the notification window, but it didn’t turn off. Not only that, but the ‘Access Now’ part started flashing. It was like asking me to access it now.
Should I press it or not? While I was hesitating, the contents of the system message changed.
[Please log in ( ˃̣̣̥᷄⌓˂̣̣̥᷅ )]
[Are you really not going to log in? ( ._.)]
Why … why are you suddenly acting like a pitiful being?
[Ether-Wiki is waiting for the right person] ｡ﾟ(ﾟ´Д｀ﾟ)ﾟ｡)
A burdensome emoticon put pressure on me in the dazzling notification window. It’s like I’ve become a bad person. I feel like I’ve become a bad person.
Eventually I picked up the white flag and accessed the wiki.
[Checking your eligibilities … Completed.][The Eligible: Kwon Rieul has been verified.]
[Ether-Wiki][Welcome to the encyclopedia of the dimension cultivated by The Eligible.]
[Information collection rate: 0.05%]
[Viewable Items: ██ ███ ███…..]
Eh, what is this.
Below the brief description, almost all of them were black blocks and could not be read. It is a feast of black squares.
I was expecting it to have some great features, but it doesn’t seem very useful. Sheesh, why did you ask me to see this?
I was trying to turn off the wiki right away, but the system notification popped up again.
[You can see more information by completing quests and collecting information.]
No, it’s fine….
I’m not going to see it, so I hope you just leave me alone.
“Mieum, is there any way to turn off system notifications?”
“What are you talking about? Of course not!”
It’s a system that doesn’t have any ‘no notifications‘ feature. So, does that mean that I have no choice but to keep seeing this message?
[Search for the item you are curious about.]
If you say it like that….
I reluctantly typed ‘Fruit of Yggdrasil’ on the wiki screen that appeared in front of me. The page soon opened to see if this item was among 0.05 percent of the information.
《The Fruit of Yggdrasil》Type: Plant>FruitDescription: A fruit that grows on the branches of Yggdrasil, the World Tree. You can make coffee beans by peeling off the pulp and drying it.
How to get:1) Plant the branches of Yggdrasil in the soil flowing with ether.2) Give them fresh water.3) If you check it after one night, the roots will fall and the fruit will open.4) Harvest the fruits.
It’s really easy, right?
Related Topics: How to Make Coffee Beans
To be honest, the first feeling I had after reading the item’s information is….
‘It’s annoying.’
It was too much. I need to plant and water that branch to get the fruits, not the coffee. I had a strong foreboding that it would be extremely troublesome to make coffee again with the fruit.
It was annoying enough to make 100 cups of coffee mix.
I don’t want to work hard. I was curious about the Americano recipe, but the curiousty was not enough to make me harvest the fruits on my own.
I have already received 5 million won, so do I need to work harder on the quest? I just want to relax. It’s possible to run a cafe with ordinary coffee.
Last time, I got involved in the system by accident, but my initial plan was just an ordinary cafe.
To be precise, run an ordinary cafe, work less, and rest a lot.
As if laughing at my resolution, a sound effect rang out right away.
[A quest has occurred]
[Quest: Start making Americano (0/1).]
No, I won’t. I just want to relax now.
Well, I might be tempted to do it after a couple more months of idleness, but not now. Go back.
[Check the quest.]
[Check the quest.]
[Are you really not going to check? ㅠ~ㅠ]
This system now seems to have decided to stimulate my conscience with a pitiful concept. A pitifully pleading message kept flashing before my eyes.
Yeah, I got it. Let’s open it. Even though I opened it, it doesn’t necessarily mean I have to do it.
I opened the blinking quest window in front of me.
[Main Quest: The Path of The Barista (1)Congratulations.Now you are ready to start your career as a barista.Whoever conquers Americano, conquers the cafe.
Making Americano: 0/1
Rewards: Experience (200 EXP), 100 rubies, Random Recipe]
It doesn’t necessarily mean I have to do it.
It’s not.
It’s really not, but….
If I exchange 100 rubies, I can get 10 million won. The moment I did the calculation, many things that could be done with 10 million won flashed through my head. 5 million won is a lot of money, but with 15 million won, wouldn’t my future be more secure?
“Uh…”
Was I this easy?
I felt a little ashamed, but the temptation of 10 million won was more than enough to throw my pride in a trash can.
‘Ah, I don’t know. I’ll give it a try.’
I valiantly grabbed the branch on the table. Okay, all I have to do is plant this and wait overnight.
However, a strange word stood out in Ether-Wiki.
It is the part where the Branch of Yggdrasil must be planted in the “soil flowing with ether”.
What’s that soil flowing with ether? Does that mean not on a plain land?
“Mieum, where is the soil flowing with ether?”
“That’s a common sense. Don’t you know that too, kyaooo!”
“I think you and I have a slightly different range of common sense.”
“Heung, I’ll give you a special explanation. A soil flowing with ether, an etheric soil, of course means the soil inside a dungeon.”
….what?
When I heard the word dungeon, I immediately tried to throw away the branch.
“Why are you so surprised? Isn’t there an etheric soil nearby?”
“Where is that?”
Suddenly, Mieum got up and walked inside. The place where Mieum headed was in front of the wall inside the first floor of the store.
That is, the door that leads to the space where I first discovered Mieum.
I was deliberately pretending not to see it!
“If you plant the tree in the soil inside and water it, it will take root.”
“Is there anywhere else?”
“You can go to the dungeon, meow.”
“…”
Still, this space would be better than a dungeon.
Now, no strange voice could be heard, and instead of the suspicious red light, it was emitting an ordinary blue light. There is no sign of danger.
Yeah, it’s not a big deal.
After I finally calmed myself down, I followed Mieum and entered the blue gate.
Inside the gate, nothing has changed frrom my last visit. The blue sky with floating round clouds, the warm sunlight, and a broad forest of green lawns. If it’s not due to the fact that it’s a space, it would be a comfortable and peaceful scenery that makes me want to pack a lunch box and have a picnic.
I guess I was worried for nothing. After seeing the peaceful scenery, I was relieved and found a suitable land for planting the tree branch.
There happened to be a place where the sun was shining and the soil was soft. I didn’t have a shovel, so I dug up the soil by hand and inserted the branch. And when I poured the water from the water bottle I brought with me, the process was over.
The withered leaves seemed to be slightly alive. It’s just a night away.
By the time I finished my work, it was already dinner time.
I left this space immediately, had a moderate dinner, and came up to the room on the second floor.
It was not spacious, but there was enough room to stay with a bed and furniture.
Outside the window, I can see the endless walls of Abyss.
It’s not Riverview or Ocean View. It’s Dungeon View. Still, it’s good that I don’t need to spend money on rent.
The only inconvenient things are the convenience store is far away, and I also cannot order delivery food.
It was still too early to go to sleep, so I turned on the TV.
— Hello, I’m Sera, the reporter of ‘Hunter TV Live‘ who delivers today’s Hunter news the fastest! We received a news that the Tutorial Dungeon, which had been postponed, would be resumed soon. What do you think about it?
— Yes, it’s been delayed by a week due to the last week’s monster attack. The Hunter Community has high expectations for this year’s rookie hunters.
— Tutorial Dungeons are very helpful for the growth of low-level hunters. The famous Hunter Kang Hyunwoo also cleared the Tutorial Dungeon at 1st place!
— They are still accepting additional recruitment. Hunters who awakened this year, thank you for your participation.
— Okay, the next news….
Hunter TV was in the middle of explaining the Tutorial Dungeon.
It was a story that had nothing to do with me. I’m a F-class Cafe Owner. If you’re not a combat hunter, you don’t have to participate in the tutorial dungeon.
Of course, I have no desire to participate at all, not even a little, not this much. What can a Cafe Owner get from the dungeon?
[Next]
