SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c14:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

The moment he collected the light nets scattered around the cafe building,
“Aaaah, where have you been?”
“I didn’t expect you to be here.”
People who were chasing Ki Yoohyun found him from afar and ran to him.

They were a male and female, a pair of twins, who wore identical jumpers. They stood next to each of his sides in case Ki Yoohyun ran away again.
“Do you know how many times we need to find the guild leader?”
“The deputy guild leader ordered us to bring the guild leader!”
“I must have told you not to call me guild leader outside.”
The twins turned pale and bowed their heads in unison. They looked so nervous, preparing to be scolded again.
Their names are Joo Shinwoo and Joo Shinhee.
Although it had only been a few months since they’ve awakened, they were talented enough as hunters to join the Cheongna Guild’s first-tier party.
They took on the role of accompanying the guild leader today.
They said it was an important role, but it was nerve-wracking. Both of them were in trouble because of the guild leader who quickly disappeared. They only found him after wandering around for a long time.
Korea’s first and strongest S-class. The man who was widely known under the name ‘Muwon‘.
In fact, the first time they met him, he was kind and had a gentle smile, but they still felt a sense of intimidation that was difficult to deal with. It’s still the same for now.  He didn’t get angry at all, but they got goosebumps in their spine.
“How was it?”
Among the twins, Joo Shinhee, a woman, asked while glancing at the cafe behind her.
“There was nothing strange. I don’t feel the ether reaction either.”
“But … didn’t you go to check it out because there’s something that bothered you?”
“Yeah, I did.”
Ki Yoohyun looked at the red brick building in the distance and thought for a moment.
He already looked inside, but he felt nothing strange. To the extent that it seems intentional.
If there is something strange, rather than the cafe … is it that woman?
Ki Yoohyun recalled her dark chestnut hair and surprised eyes.
“This outfit.”
“Yes.”
Ki Yoohyun injected a small amount of ether into the end of the coat. A blue vine mark appeared and disappeared.
“Is it possible for a non-Awakened person to see the mark?”
“No, of course not. It’s a mark that only reacts to ether.”
Joo Shinwoo said so and shook his head.
“Did you have any problems?”
“No, I’m just curious.”
“It’s a guild uniform. Activating the mark and verifying it are things that only the Awakened can do.”
But how did she recognize it? Is she a Hunter?
It may be reasonable to think so … still, doubts remained.
There was no ether in the woman. On the surface, she was like an ordinary person.
Could it be that she hid her power in front of him?
That’s absurd.
The thought gave him goosebumps.
From the moment he signed a contract with the God of Another World, The Great One, Ki Yoohyun was able to freely sense and manipulate the ether of space.
If she can hide her power in front of him….
It will never be at the level of an ordinary hunter. Even the sloppy appearance may be a disguise.
Besides, this watch.
Ki Yoohyun rolled up his sleeve and looked down at his wrist.
Inside the dial of the silver watch that wrapped around his wrist, there were letters engraved with a special technique.
Ki Yoohyun (S Class)
Rank No.1
The Hunter Certificate, specially produced for S-class hunters, has a different design according to the ranking of each hunter.
In the case of Ki Yoohyun, this silver watch showed letters indicating his ranking and special mark when ether was injected.
However, few people know that the proof of the No. 1 ranking is in the form of a watch. Even within the guild, there were only a few people who have this knowledge.
How did the woman know about his watch?
Ki Yoohyun recalled the memories of the past, or perhaps the future.
He returned to the past from the future three years later. However, it was impossible to know how this happened, since he regressed to the past.
The future in three years. Ki Yoohyun gathered the top hunters of each guild to form a team.
This is because the cult that worships demons has succeeded in resurrecting the demon ████.
The top floor of the great dungeon Abyss, the worst demon who slept beyond the Ultimate Gate. The abyss that brings an end to the world upon its resurrection.
Ki Yoohyun thought he’s perfectly prepared. He gathered reliable and strong colleagues, and after being equipped with sufficient equipment, they took on the challenge. It was enough to say that the mankind has done all it can.
But his party was defeated on the last floor.
When he arrived in front of the Ultimate Gate, where the demon was sleeping, he heard a voice in his head. It sounds like a system message, but much lower … it was an eerie voice.
【The key is not ready.】
【You are not yet qualified to open the gate.】
Then, the moment he met the demon’s eyes, instead of the pain that he had expected, an eerie sensation covered his body.
His memory ends here. He soon lost consciousness and when he opened his eyes, he was back to three years ago.
Once again, the opportunity was given.
While he was gathering his strength to prepare for the decisive battle three years later, something different from the past he remembers happened.
The death of an American hunter, James Jack Smith.
In this second life, just like the first, James was attacked by a monster.
This time, however, he survived.
Clearly, the future that should flow in the same way from his memory has changed.
‘Why did the future change?’
When he felt such a question, something different from the first life caught his eye. It was a small cafe located right in front of the desolate dungeon gate.
Obviously it wasn’t there in his first life. If there’s any secret, it must be there.
Today, when he visited to solve the question, there was only an ordinary cafe owner in the store.
Ki Yoohyun recalled a woman with a soft impression he had just met.
‘Should I take care of her?’
If it interferes with the future, he was going to deal with it whatever it was.
He couldn’t repeat the failure of the first round.
‘No, let’s wait and see.’
There are some doubts, but it is too early for him to judge that the woman is suspicious.
Ki Yoohyun quietly shook his head.
‘Anyway … I’ll have to keep an eye on her.’
As he looked at the small red brick building, he concluded.
“But is there any rumors about me?”
“Rumors?”
“For example….”
“It’s true. There were also rumors that he hid his identity because he was ugly, but that doesn’t seem to be the case….”
That voice rang in his ears.
“Nothing. Let’s go back.”
He was quite concerned about what the cafe owner said, but it was not time to reveal his identity yet.
Instead, Ki Yoohyun recalled the coffee he had drank a while ago.
He thought it was a plain coffee mix, but it wasn’t. The sweetness and softness were in perfect balance, and the savory coffee aroma calmed his mind. Moreover, after drinking the coffee, there was a warm energy in his body.
If possible….
‘I want to drink it again.’
***
At last.
Finally, this moment has come.
“Whoaaaaaaahaha……”
“You look like a villain when you laugh like that.”
Ignoring Mieum’s comment, I looked at the flashing system notification in front of my eyes.
I wondered if there was a problem because the system suddenly stopped working, but it seems to be fine now.
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Tutorial Quest: Coffee is My Dream’.
Please collect the reward.]
I selected the [Collect Reward] button clearly shown below.
[Experience: 100 EXP have been acquired.]
[You have reached Level 2.]
[50 rubies have been acquired.]
[Skill: The Barista’s Extraction (D) has been acquired.]
[You have acquired a new recipe ‘Americano’.]
Along with the sound effect, the the excellent messages from the system appeared in front of my eyes.
With excitement, I checked the contents one by one.
First, level. At first, the status was poor, but I might get stronger if I level up.
Name: Kwon Rieul
Class: Cafe Owner (F) (Lv. 2)
Stamina 100/100, Energy 100/100
Strength: 8, Intelligence: 12 (+1), Agility: 9, Luck: 12
“…”
Such expectations were shattered as soon as I checked the status screen.
I must have read the number wrong. I rubbed my eyes and read it again, but nothing has changed. The reward for the level-up was an +1 increase in intelligence.
“Wow, it’s really a lot.”
I spoke sarcastically in a soulless voice. It was amazing. It was clear that this system didn’t want my status to get stronger.
“Congratulations on leveling up, meoong.”
“Just laugh at me….”
“You’re so weak, ahahaha.”
“I can’t believe you’re really laughing at me.”
“What do you want me to do, meooooong!”
Mieum raised her fur and swung a cat punch.
“Cheer up. You’re a precious person with talent that can’t be judged by a mere status. You can comfort me by saying that.”
Without answering, Mieum yawned and sat on the bread-shaped floor. She ignored me.
Well, that’s fine. I’m not hurt. After all, the thing I was looking forward to the most is not leveling up, but the precious 5 million won.
I smiled at the 50 red rubies in the inventory. Of course, it was not a real gem, but a good used in Hunter Market.
Wait, come to think of it, how do I turn this ruby into cash?
I ran into a problem I hadn’t thought of before.
It’s not like I can go to a convenience store and pay with this ruby. What I need is cash, not Hunter’s supplies.
“Don’t you even know that? Just go to the Hunter Market, register, and exchange the money!”
“Do I have to go?”
It’s annoying. Still, Mieum shook her head.
“Ahem, open your ears and listen, Level 2 Human.”
Why do I feel insulted?
Anyway, according to the explanation given by the proud Mieum, it was like this.
Hunter supplies are usually expensive. A low-grade potion set was about a month’s salary, so a high-grade item is really sold at an extraordinary price that ordinary people can’t even dream of.
In order to prevent the money from flowing recklessly into the market and rising the prices, restrictions were placed on Ruby’s currency exchange.
When you exchange more than 100 million won, you have to report it in advance and get permission … it had nothing to do with me who’s only trying to exchange only 5 million won, but I still have to visit the market and register in person.
“Our Mieum is also smart.”
“This is common sense!”
When I scratched her chin, Mieum, whose nose was raised, made a snoring sound.
What an easy cat.
The nearest Hunter Market was a branch in Apgujeong.
In addition, in order to use the Hunter Market, it was necessary to register as an Awakened person at the Dungeon Management Office.
Phew, I can’t help it. I should register myself as an Awakened.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c13:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“I apologize. I’ll release your hand, but please keep your voice as low as possible … can you?”
I nodded. Then, the man slowly lifted his hand from my mouth.
“People … mmph, hmmp!”
“Haha … Actually, I’m being chased right now. If you let me hide for a moment, I’ll let you go.”

Wow, it couldn’t be more suspicious. Is there any reason to hide on the wall in front of this store in broad daylight and avoid people?
A spy? Or a criminal?
“I’m not a criminal.”
Did you read my mind?
“I think it’s harder to not know when all your thoughts are revealed on your face like that.”
It was a perfect poker face, he was a quick-witted man.
“Anyway, you know what I mean, right?”
I nodded, again.
Of course, I was going to kick him out as soon as he took his hand off….
….until I realised one thing.
While my mouth was closed with his palm, I naturally took a closer look into the man’s face. 
Although his face is covered by thick glasses, the face line is quite fine. His eyebrows fell well, and his long eyelashes cast a shadow over his dark, twinkling eyes. His skin, which I had initially thought was pale, up close was a lively milky color.
In short, this man is … handsome. It was enough to say that he’s pretty.
My reasoning told me I need to scream right away, but my emotions blocked it.
Do you know how hard it is to see a handsome man in real life? That’s enough to brag to a friend through KakaoTalk for an hour when I happen to meet a man like this on the street.
I hate getting involved in troublesome things.
He didn’t seem like a criminal, but he was being chased, and for some reason, the man was like a bunch of troublesome things.
This is my motto after I returned from death, “Let’s avoid troublesome things“.
It’s a motto that I just set up a while ago, nevertheless….
I really need to kick him out, but I need to….
Slowly, the man removed his hand from my mouth. His eyes met mine.
It was an incredible beauty.
“….come inside for now.”
In the end, it was the emotional side that won.
Yes, a person doesn’t have to live so rationally every time.
***
“Mieum, a guest has arrived.”
“Meooong (what are you talking about all of a sudden)?”
“There is such a thing.”
The man came in and sat down at an empty seat in front of the table. He was an intriguingly flawless man.
I posed a question to such a man.
“So, why was someone from Cheongna Guild hiding there?”
To avoid misunderstanding, I didn’t just bring him in because of the man’s rare and shiny appearance.
This is because when he blocked my mouth, after his appearance, I also noticed a mark engraved on the collar of the man’s coat. 
Hearing my words, the man stopped moving. I could feel him looking at me with careful eyes.
“Why are you surprised? On your clothes … that’s the logo of Cheongna, right?”
I pointed to the blue embroidery on the coat. The blue vine shape was definitely the logo of Cheongna Guild.
The guild you belong to is the most reliable proof of your identity. This is because the guild is responsible for managing and supervising its hunters. Minor disputes were dealt with as soon as they were reported to their guild.
In other words, he is a man with a solid identity.
“You recognize it. This … I just put anything on and went out.”
“What, is it an impersonation?”
I sneakily grabbed my cell phone in my pocket. Impersonating a Hunter Guild is a felony. If it was an impersonation, I was planning to report it to the police immediately.
“Ah, that’s right. Right. It’s not an impersonation.”
The bewildered man waved his hand and introduced himself.
“My name is Ki Yoohyun. As you said, I’m a Hunter from the Cheongna Guild.”
“Then why were you hiding there?”
“That … haha, there are several reasons. Since there are so many people looking for me, let’s say I just tried to avoid them for a moment….”
In a word, he’s currently slacking off.
I stared at Ki Yoohyun. Compared to his sparkling appearance, he is dressed in a modest way and looks somewhat shabby. I can’t imagine him killing monsters in the dungeon with such a wretched appearance. 
Yeah, I get it. He might be a hunter from Cheongna, but he’s a very weak hunter who ranked last. 
Moreover, the low-ranking hunter has its own difficulties. He will have to take on chores and be abused by high-ranking hunters, and he must have a lot of trouble. 
Even though they are Hunters, not all Hunters are the same. 
As I was once a corporate slave, Ki Yoohyun’s situation was clearly portrayed. 
In such a situation, you might just want to hide from people’s eyes. When I felt like I was going to die from sleepiness, I used to go to the bathroom and locked myself there.
While I felt sorry for him, Ki Yoohyun looked around the store and talked to me. 
“I didn’t know there was a cafe in this place.”
“…”
“…”
Only silence continued.
If it’s a natural and social flow of conversation, I’d offer a cup of coffee here.
‘That’s right. Can I get you a cup of coffee?’
‘Oh, you don’t have to worry about it.‘
‘No. I should treat you some coffee.‘
‘Thank you. I’ll drink it well.’
Like this.
But I just returned from the hotel to the store this morning. Naturally, the refrigerator is empty as it has just been repaired.
The only thing here now was the 100th coffee mix that I was going to drink before.
Should I give him this?
But the 100th coffee was meant to be savored as I celebrated the completion of the quest!
It’s not just a waste of coffee mix. I’m not such a petty person. However, it was sad that I could not fully enjoy this historical moment ahead of the completion of the quest.
It’s like having the boss mob’s HP cut down to 99%, but losing the last hit.
“…”
Ki Yoohyun looked at me with a sparkling face.
It was a sad look asking me to give a cup of coffee to poor low-ranking Hunter who had been struggling with chores for a while.
He may have just stared at me, but when I saw his finely stretched eyes and deep eyes, my mind made up such a story at will.
Ugh, those eyes are unbearable. Isn’t that beautiful enough to be called a Gyeonggukji? 
“Meooong (But the scale is too small for Gyeonggukji)?”
“Be quiet, Mieum-ah.”
I glared at Mieum.
Even if it’s not a country, it’s enough to tilt this store.
“Um, Umh, I only have coffee mix right now … have a drink.”
“Oh, you don’t have to worry … thank you for the drink.”
For my sociability, the last coffee mix left my hand.
Ki Yoohyun received the paper cup and took a sip.
“This … It’s incredibly delicious.”
The grin from his mouth was lifted, and he took another sip with a slightly surprised expression.
“It’s really tasty.”
It has cooled a bit, but it is still a 4-star coffee mix that has [Status: Good]. I was a little proud to see him enjoying it. Ki Yoohyun quickly emptied the paper cup.
Now it’s time for the quest completion notification to appear….
What?
It’s strange. Even after waiting for a long time, the notification that the quest was completed did not appear.
Is it lagging? Is there lagging in the system? Was it connected to the internet?
Frustrated, I hurriedly opened the quest window.
‘Quest.’
It didn’t open.
‘Quest.’
Still nothing.
‘Open the quest window!’
“Is there something wrong?”
As I stared at the air without saying a word, Ki Yoohyun spoke to me.
“Mm, hmmm. It’s nothing. For a moment, I think there’s a bug.”
Let’s think about it later. The fact that I have awakened is a secret that I have not revealed to anyone yet. I want to avoid being considered as a strange person who looks into the air and mutters to herself.
“More than that, I have a question….”
I changed the subject by saying anything out of embarrassment.
“Ki Yoohyun-ssi … ah, right! Have you ever seen the real guild leader of Cheongna?”
“….yes?”
Oh, my. I said too much.
The words came out of my mouth out of bewilderment, but it’s true that I’m curious about that.
The guild leader of Cheongna is Muwon, the mysterious No. 1 Hunter. 
The first and best S-class Hunter. A hunter who never came down after ascending to the top of the tower. There are only rumors floating around about him.
He is completely the protagonist of a fantasy novel. It is natural for people to ask questions.
“He has been hiding his identity. If you belong to Cheongna, I was wondering if you’ve ever seen him.”
The question was not asked in anticipation of an answer. Even if they were members of the same guild, the likelihood that this person at the bottom would have met such an important person would be low.
However, instead of answering, Ki Yoohyun said something out of the blue with a complex expression.
“You seem to be very interested in our guild leader.”
“Umh … no.”
“Then why do you ask?”
“It’s interesting that he just keeps hiding his identity. See, if it were me, I would be bragging about being the number one right here and there.”
“That … is that so?”
“It’s true. There were also rumors that he hid his identity because he was ugly, but that doesn’t seem to be the case….”
“…”
In an instant, Ki Yoohyun’s eyes, which twinkled like a deer, shook greatly.
Still, this is a pretty popular rumor.
How much media exposure was there for Kwon Jiwoon alone? He said that it would be cumbersome to refuse numerous requests for coverage and appearances on broadcasts one by one.
Furthermore, the Dungeon Management Office used to promote the top rankers for publicity in the name of reassuring the public.
Choi Cedric, a member of C&L Corporation, who is currently ranked second, is the same. He has appeared in public service advertisements, magazines, and broadcasting, plus his merchandise  products are enormous.
Therefore, there is a rumor that there is a reason why the No. 1 ranker hides his identity. Well, most of them seem to have been made up out of inferiority complex.
“If I were him, I’d pretend to check the time, pull up my sleeves and show them my number one wristwatch.”
“Ahahaha….”
Ki Yoohyun slightly covered his watch as he pulled on his sleeve. I don’t know why he cares when I talked about the wristwatch, which can be used as a proof of identity for the No. 1 ranker and S-class Hunter.
“I’m afraid I don’t know. I’ve never met him.”
“Is that so….”
In fact, Ki Yoohyun looks like a bottom-ranker, so there’s no way he would know such a top secret. I also asked a random person out of curiosity.
At that moment, Ki Yoohyun suddenly leaned under the table.
“Uh, what’s wrong?”
Soon after, I heard the same sound of words that I heard earlier outside the window.
“Where the hell is he hiding?”
“Hurry up and come out!”
“That way! Isn’t he hiding there?”
It was a great reaction speed. You really have to be this fast to be a slacker.
In my mind, I named Ki Yoohyun as the master of slacking off.
Ki Yoohyun crawled under the table and approached the opposite window.
“I’ll see you next time.”
As soon as Ki Yoohyun disappeared beyond the window, a system notification window appeared in front of me.
[Congratulations! You have completed ‘Tutorial Quest: Coffee is My Dream’.
Please receive the reward.]
Looks like the lag has finally been fixed.
***
A small cafe located at Dungeon Gate 3, 16th Street.
After walking without hesitation until the store became smaller, Ki Yoohyun took off his thick-rimmed glasses.
The grin has long been erased from his lips.
As he brushed away his disheveled hair, the hunter with the clumsy and clueless impression from earlier was no longer there. Rather, the black eyes that were exposed under the long eyelashes contained a cold light.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
Gyeonggukji: It’s from 경국지색, a four-character idiom that means “a beauty that will tilt the country”. In the past, usually there’s a woman of great beauty that was given the title “경국지색” by the public, since she’s a very beautiful woman for whom the king neglects the nation’s affairs, risking the fate of the country.
and there are a lot of Korean names, why it’s a Yoohyun again. I’m weak for Yoohyuns T__T

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c12:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

James returned home after sending me message that we should carry out our promise to be pen pals.
For the rest of the time, I rolled around watching TV on my bed.
A life of idleness with nothing to do … is really great. Some people might say that playing all-day is boring, but that doesn’t apply to me. The more I play, the more I want to play, so I think I can play forever.

Three days later, today, I received a call from Jina that the shop had been repaired. The leisurely hotel life was inevitably over. I left the hotel and returned to the store.
But … the store was unfamiliar. Is this really my store?
There was no dust on the floor and everything from the wallpaper to the furniture inside was changed into new ones. Even the coffee machine and various household appliances were neatly organized.
I can’t believe they repaired it to this extent … being attacked by monsters is a worthwhile experience.
No, kidding. It’s a joke. I took it back. A word becomes a seed. I don’t want to go through it again no matter how much I’ll gain from it.
Among them, the newly set table was so sophisticated that it seemed to be something that will be used by a popular cafe on Instagram.
I took out the Branch of Yggdrasil from my inventory and placed it on the table. The green leaves added a natural atmosphere to the interior.
‘This branch was really an interior item.’
What should I do? It would be a problem if the number of customers suddenly increases if this place is rumored to be a a cafe with pretty interior.
While I was excited with this vague delusion, the missing Mieum secretly appeared from the inside of the store.
“Mieum, where have you been?!”
“I was called for a while.”
“Where?”
“That … The system called me.”
It’s somewhat suspicious. She said she helped me because she was an agent of the system, but she’s not making excuses after running away alone when a monster appeared.
“What did you say back then?”
“…..Meow.”
Mieum played a different tune.
“Why, you said something about the cursed apostle.”
“Meooong, I’m hungry.”
I wanted to push more, but I stopped because Mieum looked dull.
Well, anyway, the monster died and she came back safely, so it shouldn’t be a big deal.
Now, I really hope nothing happens. It’s my wish, I hope it’s quiet and peaceful until I open a proper cafe.
***
Even so, in the end, my wish didn’t come true.
“….Ah.”
It was because the moment I was about to drink the last cup of my 100 cups of coffee mix, I made eye contact with a suspicious person.
***

In a flash, a black shadow disappeared through the window.
“Mi, Mieum, that!”
“Meow?”
I didn’t see it wrong, did I? I’m sure I saw someone standing by the window.
Contrary to my fuss, Mieum just lay on her stomach and scratched the floor as if she had not seen anything.
I got goosebumps.
In fact, while resting at the hotel, I was in a state similiar to arkoudaphobia. I was surprised to see a polar bear documentary on TV, my heart pounded when I saw a large teddy bear in a souvenir shop, and my heart raced just by looking at the bear emoticon on KakaoTalk.
I almost died. That’s how much the aftereffects were in this world.
Maybe the monster appeared again….
No, it’s not. That’s impossible. Let’s calm down. Who could be that unlucky. Yeah, I must have mistakenly seen the leaves flying in the wind.
“It’s especially windy today.”
“Kya? What are you talking about? Isn’t the weather nice?”
It’s the wind … right?
“Uh….”
“What’s wrong with you?”
“Uugh….”
“Go to the bathroom if you are in a hurry.”
“That’s not it!”
As expected, I can’t do this. After contemplating, I put down the last cup of coffee mix.
I can’t just leave a nauseous feeling at this historic moment ahead of the quest completion.
It’s probably not a leaf that’s flying in the wind, but it’s definitely nothing!
I’ll check it quickly, then I can receive 5 million won with a refreshing heart.
I opened the door and went out to the front yard. Even if it was a yard, it didn’t take long to look around because there was only a small space between the wall and the store.
‘No one’s here, right?’
I tried to get into the road with peace of mind.
Squash.
‘Squashy?‘
I felt an unfamiliar touch my her feet. what? The moment my feet slammed on the floor again, a short scream was heard from below.
When I looked over there, there was a man curled up under the wall, hiding. He opened his mouth, pointing to his foot trampled by my left foot.
“Ouch, ouch … excuse me, could you put your foot away please…..”
“Ahhhhhh!”
It’s a person. A person has appeared.
Wait, a person? Whew, I thought it was a monster. Why is anyone in this place and making me confused?
“Sssh, look, if you can keep your voice down for a moment….”
Hiding on the wall was a man with disheveled hair and thick-rimmed glasses covering his face. His face was pale, but he’s smiling.
My grandmother used to say this. Beware of the man who smiles at the first meeting.
Actually, she never said that.
In any case, he was suspicious even at a glance.
“Who … who are you?!”
“So, please lower your voice….”
“Don’t tell me … are you a peddler?”
“That’s not true, but….”
Then, there was a movement over the wall. There seemed to be several people running this way from over there.
The man covered my mouth with his hand and hid himself against the wall.
“I don’t read newspapers. The water pipes are fine. There’s a lot of toothpaste … huufp?!”
“Shh, be quiet.”
“Ugh, mmph, mmph, hmmmp (What is this, you crazy bastard)!”
“Wait a minute, like this.”
“Ugh (Let go of me)!”
I struggled, but the man did not release his hand.
“Where did he go?”
“Go over there!”
“Once you get caught, I really won’t let you go!”
After a while, the sound of words faded away. It was not until the people were completely out of sight that the man finally got up.

Translator’s Corner:
Here comes the dictionary.

Real life player kill / 현피는 (Hyeon-pi): It is a slang term that combines “현실 (hyeon-sil)” the Korean word for reality, and “player kill.” It occurs when an online debate or argument leads to physical fight in real life. Hyeon-pi in the dungeon probably means that the guild was banned because they’re fighting in the dungeon over an internet’s arguments.
A word becomes a seed (말이 씨가 될라): It is a proverb that means “things can happen as you say, so don’t say something recklessly“. 말 is what we talk, 씨 is seed (they sound really similar). When you put seed on the ground and give them some water, it becomes bigger and you can get some fruits from it. This way, your talk can become a seed and you will reap the fruit of it.
Aggro (어그로):: abbreviation of Aggravation used in korea. It means a meaningless behavior or talk just to take others’ attention. The english slang similiar to this would be trolls.
Don’t feed the trolls (병먹금, short for 병신에게 먹이 금지): an internet slang meaning “to ignore mean persons/idiots”. Some people engage in Aggro, a behavior in which they are being disrespectful in order to bring the attention to themselves. You should just 병먹금 these people.
Kongline (콩라인): a group of people who are always second and have never been the first.
Explanatory worm (설명충): a person who boringly explains things that they know well.
Arkoudaphobia = the fear of bears.

Oh, and HunCha is short for Hunter Channel. ISTG I spent 15 minutes thinking about this one, before I remembered that the forum was named ‘Hunter Channel’. 
And will it be fine if I just write the korean suffix (things like -ssi, -ya, -nim, -ah, etc.) just the way it is? There’s a limit of what can be translated to English, and using ‘Sir’ and ‘Miss’ is uncomfortable when this is a modern story with korean name.
I hope the netizen talks are understandable enough for you. I already tried my best with that amount of internet slangs, but I guess the result is still in poor quality … in the meantime, there will be no updayes for 2 or 3 days because I need to recover from all these internet slangs.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c11:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Fortunately, James drank all the coffee mix without spitting it out.
As soon as the paper cup was empty, I blinked at Kwon Jiwoon. He quickly used his healing skill.
I watched anxiously as the healing light was absorbed into James’ body.
Please.
I muttered to myself several times.

“Cough, cough!”
James coughed and opened his eyes. The dark complexion gradually returned to normal.
Thank Goodness. He’s alive now.
“Ugh … This is.…?”
“Are you awake?”
He hadn’t fully woken up yet, but they said he was fine now that he had regained consciousness.
“What did you feed him earlier?”
After James was taken to the hospital, Hunter Han Yiseong asked me. He must be wondering what kind of drink that successfully helped the healing process.
“That….”
I didn’t mean to keep it a secret forever. I’ve awakened, but I’m still hesitant to reveal that my coffee has such an effect.
Even though I didn’t know much about Hunter, I knew that ‘Cafe in My Hand‘ was a pretty good skill because Mieum said that I am the only one who can give an effect to coffee like this.
Still, my body is an F-class.
It is burdensome to get the attention if I informed others about this skill of mine now.
My goal is always to be a cafe owner in a quiet place.
I know how much attention Kwon Jiwoon suffered after awakened as a healer. Reporters came to the school we attended. Such a situation is no use for me.
I’ll have to tell Kwon Jiwoon about my awakening and skills one day, but….
Anyway, that one day is not now. Let’s think about it later.
“Ah, that … it’s a potion entrusted to me by Hunter James.”
My conscience was slightly pricked because I answered with a lie.
Fortunately, Hunter Han Yiseong believed me without any doubt. Rather than the fact that he drank the coffee mix, it’s more likely that James was drinking a potion to dispel the curse.
After being treated for my wound, I finally realized what had happened. It was the first time that a person almost died in front of my eyes. I tried to calm myself, but I couldn’t stop shaking.
“Ha …. Huu…..”
I took a deep breath to calm my pounding chest.
I’m still survived.
Not dead.  James and I, who died in the hand of monsters in the past before my regression. Both of us are still alive now.
Did I somehow change one future?
At that moment of relief, a notification window appeared in front of me.
[Achievement: ‘Avoiding the First Death Crisis‘ has been achieved. Please collect the reward.]
What?
What is this? I’ve achieved something?
“Kwon Rieul, what’s wrong?”
Kwon Jiwoon asked when I only stared into the air with a stiff expression after receiving the treatment.
“No, I’m just a little … I guess it’s because I’m tired.”
“Are you sure you don’t want to be hospitalized?”
“It’s okay. I just got treated.”
Kwon Jiwoon gently stepped down only after I said that I’m okay, there’s no pain, and everything’s fine five more times. In the meantime, I moved to an inconspicuous corner and opened the detail screen.
[Achievement: Avoiding the First Death CrisisCongratulations.You safely escaped the danger of death.Let’s value life.
Reward: Branch of Yggdrasil x1]
It was something uncomfortable. 
First of all, the expression “First Death Crisis” bothered me.
First? Does that mean there’s a second and third one? I don’t even want to think about going through something like this again. What’s with all these ominous words?
Moreover, it’s the first time I’ve ever heard of the thing that was written as the reward.
Yggdrasil? I searched on my phone to see if it was an expensive item I didn’t know about, but only unrelated game items came up.
I couldn’t see where Mieum had gone to ask what this was.
In any case, I can’t get the reward in this place where other people are present, so let’s find out later.
I turned off the notification window, got up, and looked around.
I wanted to thank the Hunter who came to help earlier. However, no matter how much I looked around, the Hunter was nowhere to be seen. I thought I’d be able to find it quickly because I stood in a high place.
Shall I ask Hunter Han Yiseong?
Then, Jina found me and rushed to me.
“Miss Rieul, are you okay? I’m sorry, this happened while I was out alone.”
“Don’t be sorry. I’m glad miss Jina is safe.”
I was sincere. If Jina had been attacked by the cave black bear, she might have been seriously injured.
“I was going to come earlier….”
Jina lowered her gaze with a dark expression on her face.
As soon as a C-class flame raccoon appeared, Jina requested support from a hunter of the Dungeon Management Office.
However, the hunters of the Dungeon Management Office were late with various excuses. C-class flame raccoons are not strong monsters from hunter’s point of view. They said that it would not pay much, so they pushed each other to go instead.
It was amazing. It’s like they can’t go because they’re dying.
Fortunately, Cheongna Guild supported us in time. It answered my question, but I felt mixed up.
This is because it reminded me of my time in the company before the regression, I was stuck between people who always put something off as if it’s not their business. I took it here and they told me to go over there, and when I took it over there, they told me to take it here.
In the end, the grown-ups were fighting over who filled the printer with paper.
Can’t you just take care of the work during that time?
Hunters had that kind of person too.
Anyway, the inside of the store, which was damaged because of the monster, would be repaired by the Dungeon Management Office and they even compensated me.
Perhaps because there are so many things like this, the procedure was simple, and all I had to do was sign a simple document and it was over.
“Let’s talk about the details later and take a good rest today.”
Furthermore, they even booked me a pretty expensive hotel as a temporary accommodation.
Kwon Jiwoon told me to come to his house if I had nowhere to go, but I chose the hotel. It was because I thought it would be better to be alone to properly check the rewards in the system notification window.
There’s no reason to see Kwon Jiwoon’s face at home. Even though Kwon Jiwoon was the one who suggested that, it would not have been sincere.
It’s also a secret that I wanted to sleep in a hotel more. They said the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. The luxurious breakfast buffet that I saw every time I blogged in my life before I returned to the past.
With excitement, I searched for breakfast buffet postings on my phone.
Wow, the cereal section also has a lot of variety. Mieum will like it.
“Mieum!”
But Mieum was nowhere to be found.
Come to think of it, I haven’t seen her since she said something strange when she saw the monster earlier. Even if I didn’t call her, she was always sitting at my feet and scratching the floor for food.
Where did she go?
She didn’t run away by herself  just because she was afraid, did she? I believe that Mieum is not such a disrespectful cat.
I don’t mind being alone because the monsters were already dead, but….
Mieum, you didn’t go with me. I already called. There’s nothing else to complain later.
***
[Tutorial Quest: Coffee is My DreamA thousand miles starts with one step.Let’s learn to use the skill, starting with the simplest coffee.Brew 100 cups of Coffee Mix: 99/100
Rewards: Experience (100 EXP), 50 rubies, Americano recipe, ???]
I checked the quest screen with a cup of coffee mix in my hand. The clearly marked number ’99’ caught my eye.
Finally, it’s the last.
The last cup of the long tutorial quest is in my hands. If I drink this one cup, I will finally finish the 100 cups of coffee mix.
Since this ini the very first tutorial quest given to me, the system must have been ruined quickly if it’s a modern game. These days, gamers leave quickly if they don’t give them a big scoop from the beginning.
That’s why I hope the reward item ‘???’ is a good one.
As I was holding this last coffee mix in my hand, I was reminded of the past few days.
I was just trying to make 100 cups of coffee mix, but too many things happened. In retrospect, the feeling is entirely new.
First of all, the hotel I stayed in while the store was being repaired was an expensive place, so it was comfortable. It’s very comfortable, but … the problem was that there was no breakfast buffet. A few days ago, rifts occurred nearby and the hotel restaurant was destroyed.
My buffet!
Nothing really works on my favor. Instead, the hotel offered other food, but I still wanted to eat the buffet.
I poured out curses about dungeons and monsters inwardly.
If I had been a hunter as strong as Muwon, I would have gone into all kinds of dungeons and wiped them all out. If you’re the S-class hunter who ranks first in the country, you won’t be afraid of dungeons or anything.
And as you walk around wearing clothes with big names on it, you can secretly say this to everyone you meet on the street, ‘Why? Do I look like the No. 1 hunter in Korea and the guild leader of Cheongna Guild?’.
I would buy a triangle kimbap at a convenience store and took out my Hunter ID card, pretending it was a mistake. Just thinking about it makes me feel good.
How does it feel to be a hunter that the entire nation is curious about?
So, it means that I was bored at the hotel to the extent that I thought of such nonsense.
I took out the ‘Branch of Yggdrasil‘ I got as a reward for the achievement, but I couldn’t figure out its purpose because it was just a wooden stick with leaves. It was quite fresh.
[Item: Branch of Yggdrasil (★★★★☆)A branch cut from Yggdrasil, The World Tree. It’s perfect for natural interiors.Type: Tree BranchNote: Water only once a week.]
There were only useless contents on the detail screen. It’s perfect for the interior, so you want me to hang a tree branch like this in my house?
In the end, I left the tree branch in the inventory.
There was a lot of talk about the monster appearing on the Internet, but there was no special content because the damage was not great.

Translator’s Corner: 
맥모골, I translated it as Macmogol is the brand of the instant coffee mix that Rieul wrote for James in the previous chapter. It’s a product from a real well-known korean coffee brand, Maxim. If you don’t know about it, Maxim is really famous in South Korea. Their brand ambassadors are consisted of big names like Lee Nayoung, Kim Yuna, Wonbin, IU, Shin Min Ah, Park Seojoon, Gong Yoo, etc.
맥모골 is a nickname for Maxim’s Mocha Gold Mild Coffee Mix, the best-selling (I’m pretty sure it’s also the number one) instant coffee in South Korea. 

Oh, and since Han Yiseong is currently leading the poll of the previous chapter, I’ll use it for now. I’ll wait for a week to see the final result.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c10:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Are you alright?” 
It was a tall man who entered the entrance. His long, disheveled hair covered his forehead. Due to the fact that he also wore glasses, his face was not clearly visible. However, the sign in his chest clearly caught my eye, it’s a sign that indicated he’s a Hunter.
It’s a Hunter.
I can live now.

With a sense of relief, the image of James who was on the verge of losing his consciousness caught my eye.
“The injured … there is an injured person here!”
“Let’s move him out. There will be other people coming soon.”
Perhaps it was because he was a strong hunter, he carried the large James on his back and took him outside.
There was a chaotic mess outside. Ambulances arrived in a row, news reporters came with their cameras, and there are also several officials who clean up the surroundings.
According to what the officials who were cleaning up the remains of monsters around me said, the situation was like this:
When a rift is not processed in time, the monster pops out of the rift is called a “Dungeon Break”. Monsters that endlessly pour out and attack humans are simply a disaster. The dungeon break that occurred 15 years ago destroyed a city.
But what if the dungeon break didn’t happen in a single rift, but in the great dungeon Abyss?
If monsters pour out of an infinite dungeon that has not yet been completely attacked….
It’s a contingency emergency, of course.
A few days ago, the hunters who were looking around this area because of an anonymous report were nervous.
‘That must be the report I made…’
It is said that the monsters that suddenly poured out became ashes and disappeared. It’s the same as when the cave black bear died.
No way, was it done by the strange voice I heard earlier?
I don’t know for sure yet, but it’s a fortunate thing among the misfortunes.
Even in the midst of embarrassment, the hunters were busy moving to rectify the situation.
“There’s an injured person!”
“Hurry up and lay him down here!”
The surroundings quickly became busy as the Hunters, who appeared all of a sudden, examined James’ wounds and checked the broken store.
It was then that I noticed something. I got surprised when I recognized the jumpers the Hunters wore. There was a large blue thread written ‘Cheongna’ on it.
Why is Cheongna Guild here?
Cheongna Guild was one of the top three guilds in Korea, the so-called Big Three Guilds.
However, unlike the corporate guild “C&L Corporation” and the family guild “Royal Guild” that are also the part of the Big Three, the details of this guild were veiled.
First, there was not much external activity. They rarely appeared on TV shows, and their activities were all about silently raiding the dungeons.
A small guild with little external activity. It is the opposite of C&L, the guild that gained popularity with various businesses.
However, no one doubts that Cheongna Guild is one of the Big Three.
This is because it shows the best attack efficiency with the minimum number of people.
So far, there are zero deaths have been reported during their attacks.
The guild members’ grades are on average B+ or higher. No. 1 in rift treatment efficiency. The 1st place in the attack progress of the great dungeon Abyss.
Among them, the seven hunters who belong to the main party called “Blue Vine” were especially famous. This is because each member faithfully performed their role.
Any hunter who has ever thought of things like ‘I wish the Tanker had done their job properly‘, ‘Did you doze off when you’re supposed to do the healing?’, ‘Look at the damage, does the Dealer fall asleep?’ would know about this; how precious are party members who can do their job well, and how difficult it is to meet them.
In short, a place where strong people gather and work hard together. Even among hunters, it is almost like a fantasy Munchkin guild.
And the person who leads Cheongna Guild is….
The number one Hunter in Korea, the guild leader is Muwon.
Currently, the person who took the first place of the ranking is unknown in name, age, and address. So, instead of his name, he was called Muwon, the title registered on the Hunter’s Register.
Not to mention high school graduation photos, something like SNS post that was written before becoming a hunter stated ‘I have to be the best.’, ‘Kekekeke … the darkness encroaches on my body.‘ is rare in an era when all such writings are easily stolen.
Not that there were no attempts to uncover his identity, but they all ended in failure.
The hunter paparazzi newspaper ‘Hunter Scope’, which was particularly obsessed with him, even posted an apology on the main page of their site, stating that they would never cover the paparazzi of ‘Muwon‘ again.
Various rumors were circulating, things like that he actually had a dirty personality, the real ‘Muwon’ was dead and that the person who replaces him now is a fake, he is a virtual hunter, or that he is actually the final weapon made by a secret organization … there’s a lot of nonsense like that but none of them has credibility.
Maintaining this level of mysticism raises the question of whether he is really strong.
However, after Muwon cleared the A-grade dungeon alone, the noisy sound completely disappeared. It was a dungeon that the first-team party of C&L gave up on. Without Muwon, Korea would have suffered great damage.
And the video showing ‘Muwon’s skill use’ had hundreds of millions of views despite the poor quality….
In short, he is an incredibly strong hunter, the best of the best in Korea.
However, for some reason, he rarely shows up, the No. 1 ranker stayed in the shadows.
At least, the deputy guild leader of Cheongna Guild showed his face on the media.
I’m sure the name is … what was his name? I’ve heard of it before. My heart felt sorry for the name that I couldn’t think of.
“You’re Miss Kwon Rieul, right?”
“Yes?”
When I turned my head, there was a good-looking man in front of me.
“My name is Han Yiseong. I am the deputy leader of the Cheongna Guild.”
That’s right. Han Yi Seong. I remembered. Yeah, that’s the name.
I think he’s in his mid-30s? Lastly, he looks a little younger than when I saw him on the news. He wore a suit and tie, which gave him a more office-like atmosphere than a hunter.
He’s so famous, given that I’ve even seen him on the news, but how does this person know me? I’ve never even been on the news.
“Do you know me?”
“Aren’t you the cousin of Kwon Jiwoon from the White Silver Guild?”
“Ah.”
He knew Kwon Jiwoon. Indeed, it was not strange to say that they were an acquaintance because both of them are hunters.
Hunter Han Yiseong said with a bitter smile on his sociable face.
“I heard a lot about you. You are very different from Hunter Kwon Jiwoon.”
I’ve heard that a lot.
Compared to Kwon Jiwoon’s striking appearance, I have a common impression.
If you put us side by side, you’ll get the impression that one is an important person and the other is a Person A. If it’s an RPG game, it’s like a novice village innkeeper who sees off the main character hero’s party.
The family of a famous hunter is usually treated like that. Although I have awakened, I am an F-class owner cafe, so I am just like a normal person.
Naturally, the answer I gave was stiff.
“Because we don’t look similiar?”
“No, it’s not about looks, Hunter Kwon Jiwoon….”
Han Yiseong, who was waving his hand in surprise, blurted out the end of his words as he couldn’t choose the right word.
“….Rieul.”
At that time, Kwon Jiwoon appeared through the people around him.
Perhaps he was surprised to see me in a mess, drenched in blood, his dark eyes sank deeper. Why is Kwon Jiwoon here?
Oh, it was an emergency, so they must have called him as a healer.
“Did you get hurt? That’s why I told you to stop working in a place like this….”
“….”
A heavy sigh followed.
“Come here, I will treat you.”
“I’m okay.”
“Kwon Rieul.”
But all the blood on me was from James, and all I got was just a scratch. I continued, pointing to James lying on the cot.
“James, more than me … Look at that Hunter first. He got hurt a lot.”
As Kwon Jiwoon approached, the medical staff who was monitoring James’ condition made a place for him.
James was still unconscious. Although the first aid was already given, the arm that was bitten by the cave black bear was deeply dug, and the blood did not stop flowing, so his clothes were soaked.
Kwon Jiwoon immediately used his skill, and the twinkling light from his fingertips was absorbed into James’ body.
Slowly, the bleeding stops and the flesh reattaches. It is an amazing skill effect whenever I look at it.
Even so, James still showed no sign of opening his eyes. No, it seemed to get worse. His face is ashy and his lips are dark. In addition, Kwon Jiwoon’s expression became serious.
“Why … what’s wrong? Is it too much?”
“This … this might be difficult.”
Kwon Jiwoon, the 12th-ranked hunter, is the nation’s best healer. His skill ‘Light of Healing‘ is a powerful healer skill that can heal even the worst wounds with just a breath.
When he said skeptical words like that, I was terrified. If James were to die….
No, let’s not think about it. Why die? He needs to survive.
Hunter Han Yiseong, who was watching from the side, spoke to me.
“Miss Rieul, what kind of monster attacked you?”
“Ah, that …. it was said that it was an A-class Cave Black Bear.”
As soon as he heard my words, Hunter Han Yiseong’s face darkened.
“Why is that here?”
“What’s wrong with it?”
“A-Class Cave Black Bear is a monster that only rarely occurs in dungeons that are originally grade B or higher. There are only a handful of them that have been observed in 20 years.”
But the monster is already dead, so why does he look like this? Why hasn’t James opened his eyes yet?
“The claws of the Cave Black Bear are cursed. It’s the opposite of a healing skill.”
“The trauma has healed, but the part that has been engulfed by the curse is reducing the effectiveness of the Healing Light. In order to be completely healed, the curse must first be lifted….”
“There is currently no hunter in Korea who can lift the A-class curse.”
Hunter Han Yiseong let out a low sigh, and Kwon Jiwoon lowered his eyes bitterly.
What, why are you two making such faces? Don’t tell me there’s really no other way….
“Then, James….”
Kwon Jiwoon put his hand on my shoulder. The deep disappointment he felt has been transmitted to me as well.
“…Kwon Rieul, where are you going?”
Is there any way?
I ran into the store with a feeling of grasping at straws.
Before the monster appeared, James drank two cups of coffee mix. The effect is a 100% increase in recovery speed.
If I let him drink up to the third cup, the recovery effect may be stronger.
It may be a silly idea, but it may work. I had no choice but to hold on to such hope.
The inside of the store was a mess with debris and broken tables.
I quickly found what I needed inside.
Fortunately, the electrical pot was not broken. The coffee mix bags, paper cups and teaspoons were also crushed but still remained usable. I immediately used the skill while boiling water.
‘Cafe in My Hand.’
I was in a hurry. I quickly poured the coffee mix into a paper cup.
[High concentration increases the perfection of the drink.][Item: Coffee Mix (★★★★★)][Status: Perfect….]
Without even having time to check the system notification to make sure it was done properly, I grabbed the paper cup and ran to James.
“Kwon Rieul, that?”
“Let me try it once.”
Kwon Jiwoon didn’t stop me.
Rather than expecting it to work, it seemed like he was just concerned about my mind.
It’s hard to feed a person who has collapsed with hot coffee mix. I waited for the coffee to cool down moderately, then grabbed his nose and poured it into his mouth.
…. Gulp.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
You can google “what is munchkin in RPG” if you want to get a detailed explanation of munchkin, but if you don’t want to do that, you can be a simple person like me who simplified the term as “munchkin = ridiculously OP”.
I changed the translation of 청라 from Cheongra to Cheongna. I used Cheongra in the first chapter because I was thinking about Blue Dragon (청룡 / Cheongryong), and the guild’s name might be similiar. But when I googled it, Cheongna got used more oftenly than Cheongra as a place’s name even though it has same hangul. Idk you guys can tell which one you like more between Cheongra and Cheongna. I’m still thinking if the name is supposed to be translated to Blue-something. Cheong (청) is Blue (or Green, if that’s what you choose to believe), but I’m not sure about the 라.
Oh, and please give this a vote too. As usual, the ‘u’ or ‘eo’ in Korean name is such a pain to decide.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c9:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Run … run away!”
I shouted sharply, but James didn’t move.
He just glanced back at the monster and waved his hand.
“Keeek!”
A fierce wind blew and the next moment, the flame raccoon split in two. The situation was over in a flash. James smiled leisurely at Jina and even reassured me.

“Don’t worry. I can defeat this monster.”
Thank Goodness.
I was afraid that a large-scale dungeon break would explode, but it must have been just one monster.
Unlike in the past, the crisis can be avoided. My heart finally calmed down when I saw the raccoon completely double-sliced.
Jina was away for a while to contact the main office, and James asked me.
“Tell me where I can buy this fantastic coffee.”
“Yes? If you come any time, I will serve you coffee.”
“I will return home in three days. I don’t want to go back home when I think that I can’t taste this perfect taste again. Please let me know.”
This is just an instant coffee produced by mainstream brand. The coffee mix that is sold in most supermarkets in Korea.
I just brewed it using the ‘Cafe in My Hand‘ skill.
Still, I was overwhelmed with James’s enthusiasm and stopped my honest answer.
“When you go to the supermarket, they sell coffee in bags like this. Yeah? Ah, I’ll write down the brand name and the address here, so if you ask the staff….”
I wrote down the supermarket address and the instant coffee brand’s name in a neat paper and handed it over to James.
But at that very moment….
Puk.
Monster’s claws pierced James’ chest.
Segek.
Blood spattered with a creepy sound as if something was being crushed.
Its large mouth opened wide and sharp teeth bit James’ arm.
Drip, drip. The blood that flows down mixed with the monster’s saliva.
Uh? What is this?
My brain isn’t working properly.
I’m scared. My body trembled with instinctive fear and I couldn’t even move properly.
Big mouth and sharp teeth. The monster that appeared now was not like a C-class Flame Raccoon.
It’s much bigger….
“Ugh, Heukh, Euhuk … Ugh!”
 James groaned and covered the wound with his hand. However, it was not enough to stop the pouring blood. Even at a glance, the wound just now was fatal.
“Run away. I will stop this monster.”
James, who staggered up, used his skill.
“Keeeeek!”
The monster that was cut by the blade wind screamed. Is it working?
However, even after the gust of wind stopped, the monster was still intact.
“Ugh….”
‘It’s disgusting….’
The monster I saw right in front of me resembled a bear. However, it was just so big and scary that it could not be compared to an ordinary bear.
The fur seemed as hard as steel, and the head reached the ceiling of the store. There were horns on the monster’s head and it seemed like a hole would be drilled in the ceiling.
[A Cave Black Bear (A) has appeared.]
It’s an A-class?
The late system notification delivered disappointing information.
“Keuuung!”
While screaming, the cave black bear swung its front paws.
Crack! The table, cut in half by sharp claws, fell sideways, and blocking our path.
I could hide behind the table, but it was only a matter of time before I died. If the monster hits an old wooden table twice, it will become powder.
James’ wounds were fatal at first glance.
I wasn’t confident of running away from that monster’s attack with James. No, it’s the same even if I was alone. No matter how I get out, the monster will come after me and tear me apart.
Ugh, it really hurts to be torn by a monster’s claws. Since I am speaking from experience, you can believe this claim. It’s an experience I never want to go through twice
“….!”
Crunch.
The heavy front paws tore the table like a piece of paper. Now it was time for the monster to tear me apart with just two steps.
Am I going to die again? In vain like this?
A few days’ events that I experienced after returning from the future ran through my head.
It was a second life that was too short.
The fate of dying in the monster’s hands doesn’t change, did regression just change the place of death?
Such pessimistic thoughts dominated my mind.
“Ugh….!”
The moment I foresee the pain that will follow and close my eyes tightly, a translucent barrier surrounded by light appeared in front of me. It was James’ skill.
I was relieved for a while, but when the cave black bear pounded the barrier, it began to crack little by little.
When the barrier did not break at once, the monster hit it with its horns this time.
Bang!
The barrier shook as if it were about to break.
“Unbelievable….”
James muttered with a look of despair. The pain seemed considerable. His face was pale, and his biting lips were almost purple.
He murmured in a harsh voice, perhaps determined to let only me run away.
“Run away. I cannot move.”
Even so, it hurts my conscience to leave the dying hunter alone and there is no way to escape in the first place.
“Mieum, is there any way? Mieum!”
I called out Mieum with the feeling of grabbing the last straw.
Agent of the system …  it’s because she said she’s not an ordinary cat.
“Meooong (Why is that here….)”
“Mieum?”
“….”
But Mieum didn’t answer.
She just groaned at the cave black bear with her fur raised. I was hoping for a secret skill that could solve this situation, but there seems to be no other way.
You said you were an agent! You said you weren’t an ordinary cat!
“Why is that thing here … that’s not like a C-class Flame Raccoon! It’s a cursed apostle who now submits to a sealed higher being.”
Mieum?
“Hey, can’t you just tell me in words I know?”
I have no idea what you mean by being a higher being or an apostle.
It’s a completely fantasy world.
And right now, right before being torn by the monster’s claws, it was not an appropriate situation to talk about it.
“The cave black bear is not an ordinary monster. A long time ago ██ made ████….”
“Mieum?”
Again. I couldn’t hear some of Mieum’s words. Furthermore, a red system window blinked in front of my eyes.
[Warning: Abnormal Approach]
[System Error: —. —.—]
[System Error: —. —.—]
Mieum and the system window, the things I gained through awakening, were of no help in this crisis situation.
I’m glad Jina isn’t here. At least one person could have run away. I hope she wouldn’t be too surprised when she found out later.
The moment when I’m ready for my second death.
There was a twinkling red light on the inner wall.
A red light was leaking from the door leading to the space.
Was it originally that color? It used to be blue.
No, it wasn’t the time to think about it. Let’s go into that space first. Monsters won’t be able to get there, so let’s hang in there until another hunter comes to rescue us.
“….”
The thought of what to do calmed me down.
It’s too early to die. I’ve regressed, but I haven’t even completed the tutorial quest yet!
“Get up at once.”
“Leave me and run away.”
“Hurry up. We need to move before the barrier collapses.”
I put my arm under James’ armpit and got up. My legs trembled at the heavy weight of his body.
In the meantime, James’ face was getting worse every minute by minute. I was terrified that he might die like this.
No, there is still time. He can survive if he enters the space through the door. I somehow managed to support his large body and move inward.
It’s just a little further. Just a little bit….
Brak!
Just a few steps away, the barrier that had been close to the ground completely shattered with a bursting sound.
Ooooooh!
The cave black bear screamed and ran towards me.
There was a red-lighted door right in front of me, but it’s already too late. It would be faster for the cave black bear to tear me apart than for me to jump through the door.
“Ugh….”
Mieum said something at my feet, but I couldn’t afford to answer. I just pray that this death will be less painful.
“….Uh?”
The cave black bear that was running at us paused and hardened. Then it faltered back. It still drooled and showed its teeth, but there was no sign that it would be rushing foward.
What’s wrong with it?
The cave black bear seemed to be afraid of something. It looked at me, or to be exact, the wall behind us with terrified eyes.
A gate on the wall that emits red light.
Suddenly, I felt a tremendous pressure from beyond the wall. My heart is pounding at an unknown sensation.
There’s something. It’s something sinister.
I couldn’t figure it out, but the primal fear that knowing there was something terrifying took over my body. I was sweating profusely without realizing it.
But what the hell is in there? When I met Mieum, there was only a cozy lawn under the blue sky. I was embarrassed by the unfamiliar space itself, but there was no sign of danger.
Then, a voice came into my head.
[There’s someone who doesn’t know the subject and installs it in my ██.]
System message? No, it’s different. It sounds like the system message, but much lower … it was a deep voice.
I had goosebumps. It seems like James didn’t hear anything because he gave no respond.
Am I the only one who heard it?
Maybe I … should I go to the hospital?
[Go back, apostle. This is my ██, there is nowhere for you to set foot.]
It seemed like someone laughed.
An extremely rough laugh.
Almost at the same time as the voice stopped, a flash of light flashed.
Thud!
The cave black bear fell down.
“….”
“….”
The cave black bear turned into ashes and disappeared. The place where there was a huge body now only filled with soot and dust.
What happened?
It happened so quickly that I couldn’t understand the situation well. All of sudden, the monster disappeared. Is it really dead?
My head was filled with only doubts, then suddenly I heard a man’s soft voice from the entrance.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c8:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Mieum also sighed when she saw the system error window.
“I can’t seem to tell you right now. Anyway, if a monster suddenly popped out of the gate, it’s very likely that it was afraid of something and ran away.”
“What something?”
“That is something I don’t know for sure. It could be a higher-grade monster.”

Hearing Mieum’s words, I became more confident.
“Mieum, let’s run away.”“Miaong?”
But trying to run away alone hurts my conscience.
I can go to a sauna for one night to avoid monsters, but what if Jina gets caught up in the accident? I, who have personally died, know very well how powerless ordinary people are in front of monsters.
However, I doubt that other people will believe me if I say, ‘A monster will appear in three days!‘.  I can’t even answer if they asked how I found out.
Is there any other way?
***
“You look more suspicious in that outfit.”Mieum sighed when she saw me.“But this is the only way.”I headed out valiantly.
I wore a baseball cap, sunglasses, a mask, and a jumper that did not reveal my body shape.
It’s the perfect bank robbery fashion. It seems like If I go to the bank, I will be taken to the police station before I can pass through the entrance.
It looked very suspicious to me, but in order not to reveal my identity, it is only safe to wear a disguise like this.
Dressed as a bank robber, I headed to a nearby public phone booth. My intention was to make an anonymous report.
It was hard to see, but after wandering for a long time, I finally found a payphone booth. After checking once more to make sure there was no one around, I dialed the Dungeon Management Office’s emergency call number.
— Yes, it’s Dungeon Management Office. How may I help you?
“I, I would like to make a report.”
— Yes, what is your name?
“My name is Kwon Ri….”
Huk, I almost answered with my real name casually.
This is because of my habit of answering automatically when someone asks for my name. Since I was a child, I lived a life of raising my hand and answering when they called my attendance number.
No way. In my effort to cover up the fact that I regressed, I am even wearing bank robbery fashion and trying to report it anonymously right now. I hurriedly changed my words.
“Kim … My name is Kim Kwonri.”
The name is a little weird, but it can’t be helped.
— Yes, Kim Kwonri, what brings you to call us?
“There … there’s a magnetic field response near the Abyss, Dungeon Gate 3.”
— Magnetic field response?
A magnetic field response refers to a phenomenon in which the magnetic field becomes abnormal near the dungeon. 
Why the compass does not spin or the magnet doesn’t work properly? There was a theory that when the compass became strange, rifts or monsters would pop out there.
Predicting the occurrence of dungeons was the aspiration of many people. That’s why this theory of magnetic field anomaly has received quite a lot of support.
Of course, a few years later, it turns out that it is just a myth and pseudo-science without any basis.
I felt like a delusional person who said that they will die if they sleep with the fan on, but let’s insist.
“I hear strange noises … Ah, anyway, every time I pass by, there is a gloomy vibe.”
I repeatedly insisted that the area around the Abyss Dungeon Gate is suspicious.
After insisting, the agent said that they would strengthen the patrol around the area.
In the past, there were many casualties due to A-grade rifts that occurred when they ignored the report because they thought it was a false report. Since then, dungeon-related reports had to be dealt with unconditionally.
In other words, I’m relieved now.
Even before the regression, it was originally said that it was not a high-risk monster that could harm people, so if the Hunters patrol in time, it would not be such a big damage if a monster appeared.
I was relieved at last.
Yes, leave the monsters to the hunter and I will stick to the role of a civilian who safely evacuates in advance.
***
The next day, I was drinking my daily coffee mix while looking for a place to sleep on my phone.
The scheduled date for the monster to appear is tomorrow. I decided to leave the store overnight and sleep somewhere else safely.
When I left the company, I terminated the contract for the house I lived in before, and I couldn’t go to the sauna with a cat. When looking for a hotel that allows animals, the price is slightly higher.
‘Now….’
Reserve it? Or not?
Wow, the bed looks fluffy and there is a bathtub with bubbles. The food looks delicious too.
Still, this price is a bit expensive for one night’s sleep….
[ Brew 100 cups of Coffee Mix: 90/100 ]
I checked the quest screen.
There was not much left until the number of quests were all filled. I’m going to have 5 million won soon, so this should be fine.
Eh, I don’t know, let’s just pay.
Just as I was about to press the payment button on the cell phone screen, the door opened with a click.
Uh, who is it? It’s not time for Jina to come yet.
A foreign man was standing at the entrance of the store. His bright red curly hair and piercings were very colorful. What stood out the most was the large embroidered mark on his chest.
“What is that?”
“Meow (You don’t even know that! It’s the American Hunter Association logo).”
How am I supposed to know that?
But what about America? Why is an American Hunter here?
What should I do? I haven’t even thought about English since I took the TOEIC test a few years ago.
Hello, how are you, may I help you? The advanced English was long gone in my head.
The man opened his mouth. Contrary to my concerns, what I heard was Korean.
“What are you doing here?”
“Yes?”
“Oh, this is a very unusual place.”
Every time the man spoke, the shape of his mouth and the sound were slightly off. It was as if the voice was coming from somewhere else.
“Waaeng, Meoong (Author, he’s using an interpreter artifact).”
Mieum whispered beside me.
“Isn’t it a little awkward?”
“Meong (He uses the cheap ones).”
“Ah….”
I heard that the interpreter artifact with good performance can even communicate easily with monsters. Of course it’s expensive.
This man must have used a cheap one, judging from the tone of speech translated.
“But who are you….”
I don’t remember ever knowing someone like this in the past.
Then Jina opened the door and appeared.
“Sir Hunter, you have to go that way, not this way!”
Jina looked very tired saying that.
“Oh, Jina, what brings you here?”
“Hello, I was showing Sir Hunter around this area. The tutorial dungeon is tomorrow, but he wants to take a look at it in advance. This is James Jack Smith, a Hunter from America.”
“I am called Kwon Rieul.”
Wait a minute, so this is the American hunter who died before my regression?
I was surprised for a moment, but I calmed down as I remembered that tomorrow was the day when the monster popped out. Yeah, I’m sure nothing will happen today.
“And a report came in, so today and tomorrow, the hunters are going to patrol this area.”
“Really?”
I’m relieved that the report went in properly. It was embarrassing to babble about magnetic field response, but it was worth it.
Then, this American hunter won’t die.
Reassured, I took out a new bag of coffee mix.
“Since you’re here, take a break. I was about to make coffee.”
“Ah, should I?”
Jina sat across from the table. I quickly poured the coffee mix into a paper cup and poured water into it.
[Item: Coffee Mix (★★★☆☆)
Status: Very Good (Time Remaining: 00:10:00)
Effect: Recovery speed is increased by 100%.]
Now it’s possible to brew it without looking at the window anymore.
I also gave James a cup of coffee, but he did not accept it and frowned.
“What is this?”
“Try it. It’s coffee.”
“This is not coffee.”
What? This guy?“I don’t drink instant coffee like this.”
I recommended it again, but James still refused.
Ignoring coffee mix … I have seen an American full of such prejudice today.
‘Smile.’
Gradually, his obstinacy made it difficult to maintain a sociable smile. Instead of forcing myself to smile, I just used my skill.
The tip of the lips drew a soft arc line, creating a perfect business smile.
[Activating the ‘Smile‘ skill.]
[Lv. 1. Effect: Smiling makes you feel better. This improves the mood of the subject.]
[The cast subject’s favorability increases.]
What? Didn’t it make me feel better?
The seemingly useless ‘Smile‘ had an unexpected effect. Perhaps thanks to ‘Smile‘, James’ frowned expression has softened a little.
“Hmm, come to think of it, it smells good….”
“Right?”
“But this is not a real coffee.”
‘Hold on …. Smile.’
“Try it at least once.”
[Skill: Running Smile.]
“Hmm, if you say so, I’ll drink it just once.”
Gulp.
After taking a sip of the coffee mix, James widened his eyes.
“This taste….!”
Another sip.
“This coffee is really great. Oh, it’s fantastic. I’ve never had this kind of coffee before.”
“Right?”
Jina said proudly and emptied her coffee mix. James also looked disappointed after drinking all the coffee in the paper cup at once.
I quickly got fresh water in the electric pot.
“Would you like another cup?”
“Thank you for your kindness.”
James, who quickly emptied the second cup, said.
“I never expected to meet such an outstanding barista in a place like this.”
“Ahahaha..…”
I’m not that kind of person.
And why is Jina nodding her head along?
“I’d like to invite you to America.”
Pardon?
“If you come, I’d like to show you the Grand Canyon. No, that’s not enough. Let me show you the dungeons of the United States.”
“No, I’m fine. It’s really okay, really.”
The dungeons in Korea are terrible enough, but now you’re asking me to visit the dungeons in the US?
James went on about inviting me to America. It’s an unbelievable affinity since we just met.
Hopefully this … is it the effect of Smile?
It seems like I would be stepping on American soil without realizing it if I used it three times. It’s a more dangerous skill than I thought, so I should be careful.
Instead of going to the Grand Canyon, I decided to do pen pals instead, and that finally calmed down James.
“I, I, there….”
“Miss Rieul, what’s wrong? …. Ugh!”
A monster ran into the store.
It resembled a raccoon, but it was much bigger. It red eyes and horns were extremely hideous, it almost seemed like it would run over here and tear me apart at any moment.
[The Flame Raccoon (C) has appeared.]
“Meoooong (It’s a C-class animal-type monster. It’s a nasty bastard that shoots fire when you get close)!”
Mieum, who was sitting on my lap, whispered.
Why?
I’m sure it’s supposed to be tomorrow for the monster appears!
It’s a day early!
[Next]
