SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c7:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

‘I think I’ll find out if I drink it one more time.’
The next day, Jina headed to the cafe right away.
Was it really true that she drank coffee in a cafe in this area? Her memory was blurred because she was dazed back then.
Contrary to Jina’s worries, the cafe from yesterday was still standing there.

‘It wasn’t a dream….’
There’s no signage yet.
However, the cleanly cleaned building stood out from afar. The retro-style red brick building has been carefully cared for by the owner.
An old but cozy space, with the smell of sweet coffee flew from somewhere. Jina slipped inside, attracted by the smell of coffee.
“Meooow!”
A calico cat sitting on the bread-shaped cushion cried when it saw Jina. It was a cat with plump flesh and a soft belly.
‘I want to touch it once.’
Jina inadvertently tried to stroke the cat’s belly.
“Kiyaooong!”
The cat screamed and dodged her hand. The creature got up, then it turned around and went inside.
“Mieum, what’s wrong?”
The cafe owner she met yesterday came out with a cereal box in her hand and found Jina.
“Jina, did you go home safely yesterday?”
“Ah, yes, I did!”
The cafe owner poured cereal into the bowl and put it in front of the cat. The cat began to chew and devour the cereal.
‘Do cats eat cereal?’
Still, that’s not what matters right now. Jina mustered up the courage to speak.
“Umh, the coffee you gave me yesterday….”
“Oh, would you like a drink?”
Rieul quickly made a coffee mix and handed it to Jina. The warmth of the paper cup gently wrapped Jina’s hands. Jina couldn’t delay it any longer and took a sip straight away.
… Gulp.
One more sip.
The sweetness, rich taste of milk, and bitter coffee scent formed a golden ratio in her mouth.
And the moment she emptied the cup….
As her head felt refreshed, her body began to overflow with energy. Her shoulders were also light, and she felt better with an unknown sense of happiness.
As expected, this coffee. This coffee gave Jina strength.
“Really … it really tastes great! How can coffee taste like this? Besides, I just drank a cup of coffee, but my head feels refreshed and my body is full of energy! Oh my gosh, this is the first time I’ve had coffee like this.”
Rieul was listening to Jina with a smile.
Jina, who belatedly came to her senses, felt embarrassed because she was talking too much alone. She coughed a little and continued.
“Please, tell me where I can buy it!”
“It’s just a coffee mix.”
“But … it’s so delicious and it’s also pretty effective! Do you have any special tricks?”
“There’s no special tricks, but …  If you come, I’ll brew you some, so come often.”
… are you an angel?
Later, Jina recalled the incident like this.
That day, she met an angel who protects office workers.
A few years later, it was included in the interview when Jina took the head position of the Dungeon Management Office.
***
“Thank you. It’s so delicious today.”
Jina bowed her head as she received a cup of coffee mix. I also looked satisfied at the quest window in front of me.
[Tutorial Quest: Coffee is My Dream
A thousand miles starts with one step.
Let’s learn to use the skill, starting with the simplest coffee.
Brew 100 cups of Coffee Mix: 79/100 ]
As soon as Jina finished her coffee, the number changed to 80.
Finally, 80.
Thanks to Jina, who comes to drink coffee every day, the number of quests has been filled up a lot.
At this rate, we will be able to complete the quest in a few days. When I thought of receiving 5 million won, I naturally smiled.
“….Meoooow. (You’re drooling).”
I wiped my chin in surprise at the whisper of Mieum, but it was clean. I glared at Mieum.
“By the way, Mieum, you’re able to do ventriloquism?”
Clearly, her mouth was making a cat cry, but I heard her voice in my head.
“Waaeong, Waaeooooong (Ventriloquism! Don’t compare it to something like that! This is the ability to communicate directly with a special wavelength)!”
“But why are you crying?”
It’s like telepathy. Then there’s no need to make a cat sound, right?
“Meoong (That … because I’m not used to it yet….).”
“That….“
Anyway.
Of course, 5 million won is important, but I also wanted to get an Americano recipe quickly.
When it comes to Caffè Americano, it’s the drink menu that Koreans love the most. It is also the most popular menu in cafes, so it will be essential to learn Americano in order to open a cafe in the future.
Above all, this coffee mix is delicious, but I wanted to try a different menu.
“Ha, I think I will live.”
The newly brewed coffee mix was also emptied at once.
Her complexion was better than before, but she was still working late. Even now, it is already evening, but after drinking only coffee, she said she will go to the great dungeon “Abyss“.
Is there something going on in Abyss?
“Ah, that….”
Jina answered my question with a dark complexion.
“There will be a Tutorial Dungeon soon. Since it’s a tutorial, it won’t be dangerous, but a veteran hunter will join in.”
“Is that so?”
Gathering and educating the newly awakened hunters that year is called a ‘Tutorial Dungeon‘.
Even if it was an education, it was not a class, but a real dungeon attack in a practical form, and it is usually conducted on the first floor of Abyss.
“But everyone hates to do it….”
That’s understandable. There aren’t many senior hunters who want to go to the tutorial rather than dungeons with advanced rewards.
Because of that, Jina, an ordinary person, said she was busy with preparations.
“Besides, this time around, a Hunter from the United States also decided to visit, so I’m in a rush. Still, thanks to the coffee that Miss Rieul gives me, I feel energized.”
“…”
“Miss Rieul?”
There’s a small chance that a forgotten memory comes up like a single thread.
Hearing Jina’s words, I suddenly remembered the incident before I returned to the past.
At that time, the news was only talking about it all day, so why did I forget about such a big deal?
During the tutorial dungeon before my regression, a monster suddenly popped out of the dungeon.
The level was average enough for an experienced hunter to deal with it, but they couldn’t get rid of the monster right away because it appeared in the middle of tutorial dungeon.
A Dungeon Break occurs.
A monster that left the gate attacked a nearby private house, and just in time, an American hunter who was visiting Korea died.
And the place where the monster attacked….
‘Dungeon Gate 3 Street.’
Uh? Right in front of this store?
Could it be that this cafe is the nearby private house they mentioned?
“Miss Rieul, are you okay? Are you sick?”
Jina looked at me worriedly.
Let’s calm down. Huuu, haaa …. Huuu, haaaa…..
I can’t remember the date of the incident. There might still be a lot of time left.
“Ah, it’s nothing. When is the tutorial?”
“It’s in three days later.”
There’s not much time left!
***
After Jina left, I put my hand on my forehead and fell into agony. What should I do if a monster appears in front of me in three days?
In my last life, I was getting caught in a rift, and now I am destined to face the monster that appears in my front yard in this life? I guess I had to do the exorcism first before preparing to open a cafe.
‘Should I run away?’
Although I have awakened, I am an F-class cafe owner with no combat skills. If I run into a monster, I must get killed in an instant.
Just because you know what’s going to happen doesn’t mean you know how to fix it.
Yes, it is best to avoid danger.Let’s run away.
“What’s wrong with you?”
As I made a serious expression, Mieum, who was lying on the floor, raised her head and looked at me.
Mieum does not know that I have returned from the future.
Can I tell her? Wouldn’t she think it’s an absurd story?
I hesitated for a moment but decided to speak. There are talking cats, though, and returning from the future to the past may not be a big deal.
“Actually, I….”
I roughly told Mieum about the past. After living as a company slave and getting caught up in a rift, I returned to three years ago, and, according to my memory,  a monster will come to this area three days later.
Mieum listened to my regression story like it wasn’t a big deal and said something unexpected.
“Welp. It’s weird. It’s unusual for a monster to pop out of that gate.”
“Really?”
“The original system of Abyss is ███ ████….”
“What?”
I couldn’t hear Mieum’s voice well as if it were noisy. She raised her fur as if she felt uncomfortable, and spoke again.
“Meeeong! Oh my, listen correctly. Abyss is ████ ████ ██….”
I couldn’t understand only the important words as if it was intervened by someone.
What is it?
Furthermore, a system window suddenly appeared in front of my eyes.
[System Error: —. —.—]
[System Error: —. —.—]
[System Error: —. —.—]
The window flickered in red and did not disappear.
I have opened the system window several times, but this is the first time something like this happened. Somehow, it felt kind of creepy.
[Next]


Translator’s Note:
“Dialogue in italic” : Rieul speaks to Mieum via their telepathy
‘Dialogue in italic‘ : Rieul’s thoughts, internal monologue to herself.
“(Cat noise translation)” : what Mieum said to Rieul via their telepathy.
They didn’t explain it in detail for now, so let’s treat it like it’s a telepathy.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c6:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

As a desperate measure, I installed a vending machine in front of the store.
To be precise, it is a vending machine that operates manually. The plastic box has a single button on it, but nothing inside.
On the front, a large sign was written with “Free coffee” and “Enjoy your meal“. When a customer pressed the button, I was going to quickly make a coffee mix and put it on the table.
But so far, not a single person has pressed the button.

Not a single person!
Yesterday, only some Hunter Guild employees passed by this place. I watched nervously as they found the (manual) coffee vending machine.
“Oh, free coffee! Do you want to try it?
“Never mind. All of those things are given by phone pal as bait.”
“Oh really?”
“They’re trying to convince you to buy a 2 million won phone on a 36-month installment plan for a cup of coffee mix.”
“Hul.”
No, it’s not an action done by phone pal. My phone is 3 years old, and I feel like it’s 6 years old already because of the regression.
I don’t sell phones, so can you just have a cup of coffee?
‘If I said that, would it be suspicious?’
“Meooooong. What kind of words are that!”
Instead, after they left, I posted a large sign in front of the (manual) coffee vending machine that read “Not a phone pal.”
However, there was no one passing by in front of the store again.
It was one day when I was doing the quest sluggishly.
In the meantime, the store has become quite plausible. The cleaning was finished, and the coffee machine worked without any problems. The old but cozy interior reminded me of my grandmother’s old days.
At least I won’t be misunderstood as a phone pal anymore.
But the only recipes I have is Coffee Mix….
… Gulp.
I drank the last coffee mix of the day. When I poured everything into my mouth, a quest notification popped up.
[Brew 100 cups of Coffee Mix: 25/100]
There is still a long way to go until 100 cups.
The coffee mix is very delicious, this fantastic sweet and soft taste is fantastic, but  …. now I want to drink another menu.
“You don’t have to be in such a hurry.”
said Mieum, who sprawled over a fluffy cushion. Maybe she liked the cushion because I heard a loud groan.
“Didn’t you say you wanted to rest? Sometimes it’s important to relax. Meow.”
I heard another sermon from the cat.
Surely I want a life where I work less and rest a lot. That’s the reason why I want to open a cafe here. There is no such thing as a desire to work hard.
But….
[Brew 100 cups of Coffee Mix: 25/100]
The quest window flickered in front of me.
I can’t even complete the tutorial quest at once. This soul of the impatient K-gamer cried. How dare I fall asleep leaving behind a quest that I haven’t finished yet?!
No, of course I don’t. Even if I close my eyes and lie down, it’s normal for me to think, ‘Oh, I need to level up at a time like this!’.
I was in the middle of thinking that.
Bang! Dang! Tangtang!
“Myaaoo. What’s going on?”
Suddenly a loud noise came from outside. Surprised Mieum jumped up from the cushion and raised her fur. What the hell is going on?
It was already time when darkness fell all around. There was only one cat next to me that was busy licking cereal crumbs a moment ago.
I was scared, but I looked outside carefully.
Someone was lying in front of the store.
“Ugh … Heuk, Ugh….”
I also heard this mysterious groan. Should I ignore it and report it to the police?
No, wait … is it a person?
A person who also looks very tired and exhausted.
As soon as I saw that tired figure, a certain thought ran through my head.
It’s a perfect subject tto test my coffee.
Moreover, the clothes she was wearing were familiar to my  eyes. It is the uniform of the Dungeon Management Official for general public officials. What is this, a government employee who’s tired of working overtime?
It was worth knowing the situation. Before returning to the past, after suffering from overtime work, I saw that outfit the most on my way home on the last train.
“Hey, are you okay?”
“Ugh….”
“Come inside for a second.”
“It’s fine … I just fell down because I was exhausted. I’m going to…..”
“No, take a break for a minute. Okay?”
She refused and I almost half-forced the person who was about to go into the chair.
“Thank you….”
As I expected, she was a general public official of the Dungeon Management. In other words, among civil servants working in dungeon management, she’s an ordinary people, not Hunters.
Dungeon management sounds good, but the reality is that it is a tough position to clean up the mess of civil servant hunters. To put it in another way,  it’s the civil servants’ hell and civil servants’ graves. What was the retirement rate within a year….
The public official, who introduced herself as Kim Jina, widened her eyes at how hard she had suffered. I used to be like that. I felt pity because it reminded me of myself before the regression.
‘Cafe in My Hand.’
I made a cup of coffee mix. It has the effect of speeding up the recovery, so I hoped this poor official would drink and feel refreshed.
“Have a drink.”
“Oh, you even gave me coffee. Thank you.”
Jina took the paper cup and gulped it down. The tired expression became a little more relaxed. At that moment, I naturally smiled when I saw the number in the quest windows go up.
“Would you like another cup?”
“No, I can’t be so much trouble.….” 
“It’s just a coffee mix, huh. Here, have some more.”
Another cup, one more….
When I made her drink three cups in a row, Jina’s face seemed to have been relieved of fatigue.
I bowed my head and looked at the back that was leaving.
“Meooong, why do you look like that?”
“There is such a thing.”
“What is that!”
“It’s something that only humans can understand.”
“Waeeong!”
I  had a thought while avoiding Mieum’s front paws.
‘I wish she would come again.’
Of course, it’s important to fill in the number of quests. Before that, I was worried when I saw that staggering step….
Umh, is this what you call a bonding between a public servant and a (former) corporate slave?
***
“As expected, I knew my daughter could do it.”
It was good when she passed the civil service exam after a year.
Her mother was thrilled as if Jina had become a genius. She had a hard time trying to stop her mother from hanging a placard in the neighborhood. If she didn’t do it, placards saying ‘Kim Jina passed the civil service exam‘ would have been hung all over the neighborhood.
Kim Jina has been interested in dungeon since she was young. An unknown treasure trove, this mysterious space given by the ‘system‘. There was no better place than this to ignite her enthusiasm for learning.
Because of this, she applied for the Dungeon Management Office, that everyone else said was difficult. Although the interview pass rate was low, Jina memorized the Dungeon Management Regulations and the ecological survey report of the great dungeon Abyss. She passed right away.
Finally, she achieved her dream to work at Dungeon Management Office.
However, what unfolded before Jina’s eyes was hell. She realized with her own body why the Dungeon Management Office is called the hell and grave of civil servants. 
It wasn’t just a matter of having a lot of workload. If she had been busy with dungeon management and research, Jina would have been happy. The joy of doing what she loves must have been greater than the hardship felt by her body.
But Jina’s main job is to assist the Hunter belonging to the Dungeon Management Office.
The word “assist” sounds good to hear, but what it actually meant was to please and serve.
All of the Hunters were overbearing and arbitrary, but the civil servant Hunters were even worse.
Although they received a high salary that could not be compared with Jina, they were often annoyed when they were told what they were supposed to do.
It was normal that they couldn’t be contacted during working hours since ignoring ordinary people like her is their daily routine. They even made her do small errands.
When she coordinated those hunters to plan a dungeon attack, it was also common for a fight to happen.
How can I work with someone who hasn’t awakened…..!
The fantasy of the Dungeon Management Office was thrown into the trash can on the third day of work, and within a week of work, Jina became a Hunter hater.
She only wanted to resign, but when she remembered her mother’s happy face when she passed her exam, she couldn’t help it.
“As expected, my daughter, your mother knew you’d make it.”
‘Mom, if your daughter stays like this … I think she’s going to break that Hunter’s head.’
Even that day, Jina was trudging toward her house late at night.
This is because the Hunter in charge handed over the preparation of the tutorial dungeon to Jina. He said simple management tasks are not his business or something like that. Of course, it was nonsense, but Jina had no power.
‘What’s the big deal about a civil servant who can’t get into the Hunter Guild because his grade isn’t good enough? If you were a capable hunter, no, even if you were a D-class, you can go to the Hunter Guild, yet you’re here and asked me to do what you called a simple management task? You’re just trying to eat it raw!’ 
She wanted to shoot him like this, but she couldn’t even say a word in front of him. She had a timid personality, and even though he was an E-class Hunter, he was strong and scary.
Finally, she was on the way home after finishing all the work that was delayed until late. Suddenly, her body staggered as she stepped on the stone that was rolling on the road.
“Ugh….”
She really want to quit. She wish she could hit that hunter before resigning.
She didn’t have the strength to get up, so she slumped down on the road and a yellow light flashed in front of her.
At first, Jina thought she was dreaming. Finally, after being overworked, did she start to hallucinate?
Perhaps she died from overwork, and this is the entrance to the underworld.
First of all, even though it’s a downtown in Seoul, there can’t be a store with such a warm atmosphere on Dungeon Gate 3rd Street.
However, a calm voice called out to Jina, who had fallen.
“Hey, are you okay?”
A woman with a brooding atmosphere was looking worriedly at Jina. She said she was the owner of the cafe in this corner.
Somehow, she went inside as the cafe owner led her and received a cup of coffee to drink.
The coffee mix, which she doesn’t usually drink, was surprisingly delicious. The sweet taste and soft scent seemed to melt her heart, so she ended up drinking three cups.
After drinking coffee and complaining for a while, the stress was relieved a little.
‘Yeah, it’ll be fine tomorrow.  No matter what happens, it’s not my fault!’
Thinking so, Jina returned home with a lighter step.
Even so, in the next morning.
Uh … ? I woke up?
Normally, it would take five alarms to wake her up, but she woke up at once. Moreover, what is this power that springs up naturally?
The chronic fatigue that had always bothered Jina was completely gone.
She had no headache, and her body was as light as flying. It’s been a long time since she has felt this sense.
“How did this happen?”
Suddenly, Jina thought of the coffee mix she drank yesterday.
It’s a ridiculous idea, but … perhaps it’s the power of the coffee.
[Next]


Translator’s note:
Phone pal (폰팔이) is a term that referes to unscrupulous and illegal cell phone vendors, it’s closely related term to frauds and various controversial atrocities.
eat raw is to produce results without having to struggle or put any efforts. It’s like you’re eating something (raw) without cooking it first.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c5:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

“Really? How?”
“Do you know who I am?”
I looked at Mieum. Shiny tricolor fur, pricked ears with long whiskers, and round feet with pink paw.
“You’re a cat.”

However, it seems that the answer was not what she wanted. A meow punch flew right away.
“Not an ordinary cat! I am the seventh agent to enforce the system.”
“Wow, that’s great. You’re so cool.”
“Do you understand now?”
“You’re really cool. It’s amazing. Woah.”
In fact, I didn’t know what she meant, so I praised her without putting any soul in it.
When I scratch her chin gently, her expression becomes drowsy. She is undoubtedly a cat.
“Ahem.”“Mieum knows all the difficult words. Great.”“Meoooong! You’re making fun of me!”I got caught.
I had to give the cat another bowl of cereal to soothe it.Mieum spoke again, with her belly bulging and cereal crumbs attached to her mouth.
“Anyway, I’m here to help you. If you complete the quest given by the system, you will receive a good reward.”
“Huh? Quest?”
Was there something like that?
When I heard those words, there was a quest mark on one side of the status window indeed. I opened the quest window.
[Tutorial Quest: Coffee is My Dream
A thousand miles starts with one step.
Let’s learn to use the skill, starting with the simplest coffee.
Brew 100 cups of Coffee Mix: 0/100
Rewards: Experience (100 EXP), 50 rubies, Americano recipe, ???]
Uh, brew coffee mix? That mixed coffee? Instant coffee?
I didn’t want to.
I can’t believe I have to make another 100 cups of coffee mix that I’ve drank when I was at work.
I turned my eyes to the reward item with an unwilling expression. Items other than experience points, rubies, and recipes were displayed as ‘???’ and were not visible.
I understand the experience, and Ruby is the money used in Hunter Market. However, I was a regular citizen just now, so I don’t know how much 50 rubies are in Hunter Market.
“How much is 50 rubies?”
“It is 100,000 won per ruby.”
I tried multiplication in my head. The currency is ₩100,000  for 1 ruby, then if it’s 50 rubies … ₩5,000,000.
5 million won?
Suddenly, my eyes lit up and my enthusiasm surged.
I have enough money in my bank account to cover my living expenses for the time being, but it was never enough.
I can’t believe I can earn 5 million won from 100 cups of coffee mix.
By simple calculation, it would be ₩50,000 won. Even if you sell coffee in front of the Big Three guilds, it would be impossible to make such a profit.
In a word, it’s a great gain.
I immediately searched the warehouse and found what I needed. Fortunately, I was able to find an electric pot, a paper cup, and a few leftover coffee mixes at the bottom of the box.
I was about to make coffee with the intention of fulfilling the quest conditions right away, but Mieum stopped me.
“Wait, don’t brew as it is, use your skill to brew it.”
“Huh? Use my skill?”
She must be talking about the skill called ‘Cafe in My Hand‘.
Still, the coffee mix is finished by just pouring hot water. Do I really need to brew while using skill?
“Just try it, meow.”
Yes, this quest has 5 million won at stake. If it’s for 5 million won, it’s something I need to follow.
‘Cafe in My Hand.’
I chose coffee mix from the recipe list that appeared in the translucent hologram window. A subtle glow shone in the order of the recipe. The hand moved naturally along the light.
“Okay, it’s done.”
“Take a look at the coffee.”
“Huh? It’s just a coffee mix.”
First, as Mieum said, I stared at the mixed coffee. Then, the status window of the coffee mix appeared in front of my eyes.
[Recipe: Coffee Mix is complete.]
[Item: Coffee Mix (★★★☆☆)
Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:03:00)
Effect: Recovery speed is increased by 100% (01:00:00)]
“Uh, this is….”
There was a peculiar phrase below the description of the 3-stars coffee mix.
“If you create it using your skill, you can give the drink a special effect. That is the real power of your skill.”
It’s not a potion, but I can give an effect to coffee, that’s….
“….I’ve never heard of something like this.”
“Why! Of course you’ve never heard of it! You’re the only one who can do it.”
In conclusion, that’s a pretty good skill? I thought about that for a while.
[Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:02:59)]
[Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:02:58)]
[Status: Good (Time Remaining: 00:02:57)]
………………
The remaining time in the status window was gradually decreasing.
It’s a waste to leave it in bad shape even though I made it at the best. I took a paper cup to my mouth before the coffee got cold.
Oh, was a coffee mix this delicious…?
The bitter coffee flavor and the sweetness blended softly in the mouth. Even the last drop made me feel regretful, and the moment I put it all in my mouth, a notification sounded.
[Brew 100 cups of Coffee Mix: 1/100]
The notification reminded me of the cafe management game I used to play.
The gameplay was consisted of catching monsters and obtaining ingredients, making money by making menus according to the recipe, and using that money to get new recipes. The players also can decorate the store and hire part-timers, it was quite fun.
I didn’t get paid for it, but I worked really hard and got to the top of the rankings.
However, I was hacked and eventually gave up the game. I was left in shock when my precious character greets me in an empty shop wearing only underwear.
“What’s wrong with you? You look like you’re cursing in your head.”
“….Nothing.”
For a moment, I prayed that the hacker got a future full of misfortunes.
Anyway, what this system does was reminiscent of cafe management games a lot. Hunters say the system is similar to a game, is it like this?
Complete the quest, get the next quest, and each time you get a ruby, that is, cash.
I know, I understand.
I know, I know.I know how it feels.Since it’s already 5 million won from the first quest, the amount will go up further for the next quest. Then….
This, won’t this make me rich soon?
I felt my heart pounding as I imagined the golden future.
All right, brewing 100 cups of coffee mix is nothing. I’ll hurry up and get 5 million won, get the next quest and get rich.
“Huahahaha….”
First of all, I decided to use all 10 bags of coffee mix I found in the warehouse.
‘Cafe in My Hand!’
‘Cafe in My Hand!’
When I poured mix coffee into a paper cup, Mieum intervened next to me.
“It would be better not to make that much.”
“Why? It’s good to finish the quest quickly.”
Without listening to Mieum’s warning, I poured hot water at the moment when the golden light flashed.
However, things didn’t go the way I expected.
***
My heart thumped and my head throbbed. I rolled the blanket over to the top of my head, but no sleep came, and my mind was clear.
I stared at the contents of the notification window in front of me.
[Status Abnormality: Caffeine Addiction
You drank too much caffeine.
Let’s use coffee wisely.
Time Remaining until release 02:58:34]
[Time Remaining until release 02:58:33]
………
[Time Remaining until release 02:58:21]
Save me.
***
Three days passed after meeting Mieum at my grandmother’s shop and awakened.
I opened the quest window and checked the contents.
[Tutorial Quest: Coffee is My Dream
A thousand miles starts with one step.
Let’s learn to use the skill, starting with the simplest coffee.
Brew 100 cups of Coffee Mix: 10/100
Rewards: Experience (100 EXP), 50 rubies, Americano recipe, ???]
Unlike my ambition to complete the quest immediately and receive 5 million won, the progress on the quest was slow. The cause is terrible caffeine addiction.
“Ha….”
This system counted the number of completion times after drinking the mix coffee, not the moment it was brewed. In other words, I need to drink 100 cups to clear it.
‘It’s a bit much, but I drink it all at once.’
Thinking so, I drank all ten coffee mix on the first day. And I put them in my mouth one by one.
One cup, two cups, three cups….
Nothing happened until the third cup. It just tastes sweet and restores my energy. But it was the very moment I drank the fourth cup….
“….Cough, Cough?!”
I spit out the coffee in my mouth in a strange feeling.
[Status Abnormality: Caffeine Addiction has occurred.]
Ugh, what is this? My stomach hurt, my head was pounding, and my hands were shaking. As I sat down on the chair in agony, Mieum gave me a sharp scolding.
“You’re addicted to caffeine. That’s why I told you not to make a lot.”“Ugh … You should have told me.”“I did, but you didn’t listen.”“Ugh….”
I have nothing to say.
Caffeine addiction was no joke. I couldn’t even move my body due to the throbbing pain, and I couldn’t sleep.
In the end, I had no choice but to sleep motionlessly until the abnormality was resolved five hours later.
“Ugh….”
In other words, drinking more than three cups of coffee a day caused an abnormality. I don’t want to go through such a terrible thing again. It is an absolute specification.
The problem was that it will take a long time to complete the quest because I could only drink up to three cups a day. It takes about a month to fill 100 cups, three cups a day with simple calculations.
Do I have to drink only coffee mix for a month?
When I was playing game, I skipped not only the story but also the skill production and pursued quick play. It is unbearable to drag the tutorial quest for a month. This soul of a K-gamer is boiling.
I even thought about buying a recovery pill to get rid of my caffeine addiction. But when I asked Kwon Jiwoon….
“A cure for status abnormalities? Of course, there is something like that. The price? Hmm … These days, the price has gone down a little, so a bottle costs about 1 million won.”
This is the answer that I received.
“Kwon Rieul, what’s wrong? Do you need it?”
“N-no, I don’t. I’m just curious. I’ll call you later.”
“You’re not in any trouble, are you? If anything happens, tell me right away.”
“Ahaha … it’s really nothing.”
I’m doing this to get a quest reward of 5 million won, I can’t drink recovery potion worth 1 million won.
Moreover, the effect of the skill ‘Cafe in My Hand‘ is ‘when making drinks in the store, the level of perfection is increased‘. In other words, if I leave this store, the skill is invalid and the retention time is also short. It’s difficult to give the coffee to people far away.
All that was left was for someone to come to this store and drink the coffee mix I made.
Dungeon Gate 3 in front of the great dungeon where no one passes by, this cafe is at its 16th street!
[Next]


Translator’s Note:
I changed my mind. I’ll just use ‘Coffee Mix’ from now on.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c4:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.
I was perplexed by the awakening notification window that suddenly appeared in front of me, but I soon regained my composure and cheered.
Awakening, I have awakened!!!

Awakening is a general term for the phenomenon of manifesting the superpowers to become a hunter.
The exact conditions of awakening are unknown. Some say that they’re awakened while lying down at home, while others awaken when they have a life-threatening crisis or when they do something.
Anyway, the important thing is that if you awaken, you can earn a lot of money with that ability.
Of course, I didn’t intend to enter the dungeon and fight monsters just because I had awakened. I was never going to enter a dungeon on my own feet.
All Hunters are awakened, but not all the people that have awakened are Hunters. There are endless ways to earn money just by the fact that you have awakened without having to fight monsters in the dungeon yourself.
In particular, if you are an item maker, you could earn a lot of money just by making items in the guild.
It’s something that I finally experienced after regression. I can’t believe such a good thing happened!
A cafe owner who hid her powers. A lone awakener who runs a cafe in front of the dungeon against the stark hunter world.
It’s cool just to think about it. I am immersed in pink dreams, imagining a future where I work less and earn more as an awakened person, until Mieum said in a solemn voice.
“Calm down and check your status. Meow.”
The cat nagged me.
But what’s wrong with such a trivial thing when I have awakened? I could listen to as many nags as I wanted. I’m an awakened person.
‘Status.’
I looked up at the status window with excitement. A translucent window appeared just by thinking inwardly while looking at the empty space in front of me.
But….
Name: Rieul
Class: Cafe Owner (F)
Stamina 100/100, Energy 100/100
Strength: 8, Intelligence: 11, Agility: 9, Luck: 12
“What is thiiiiiiiis…….”
Actually there was nothing really surprising about it.
The average adult status for the general population was 10. In other words, strength and agility were below average, and intelligence and luck were slightly higher than average, but even so, they were at the level of ordinary people.
The problem lies on the other part. Even if it’s a lousy F-class body, what’s with the “Class: Cafe Owner”?
I said that I wanted to be a cafe owner who hid her strength, but I didn’t mean I just want to be a cafe owner. Great.
“Isn’t that too much?”
I grabbed my head and screamed, while Mieum patted me with her round front paws next to me.
“Calm down, I’m hungry. Give me some food.”
“Are you telling me to calm down now? At the most, the awakened ability is nothing, and I am trapped in such a strange place! I also didn’t come here on my own will. How do i get out … Wait, Mieum, where are you going?”
Without listening to me, Mieum turned her body around and started walking. When I rushed to follow after Mieum, a door appeared in the air where there was nothing until just now. Mieum swung her front foot at me.
“If you’re not coming, I’ll leave you behind.”
“Coming, let’s go together for a second!”
As soon as we passed through the door, a flash of light wrapped around us and returned us to the store. It wasn’t a dream, as there was still a door leaking blue light on the wall.
“Meooow. I slept for a long time and I am hungry. Do you have anything to eat?”
Mieum, sitting in the shape of a bread under the table as if it were her own house, cried out and asked.
I was also getting hungry after cleaning all day.
However, although this is a downtown in Seoul, it is in front of the great dungeon Abyss. There are no restaurants or convenience stores nearby, so it will take an hour to get something to eat. Even if I tried to order delivery, Dungeon Gate 3 was a delivery exclusion area.
“What?”
When I said that there was nothing to eat, Mieum pricked her ears and gave a surprised expression.
“This eligible person is going to starve me to death!”
“What’s on earth is eligible person?”
“Food! I can’t talk because I’m hungry.”
Mieum said she wouldn’t say anything if I didn’t give her food, and lay her stomach on the floor.
It’s pretty cute, I can’t stand it.
I don’t know if she was trying to make a stern face, but the cat sitting in the shape of a bread and crying for food was cute no matter how I look for it.
Fortunately, I found a box of cereal in the warehouse on the first floor. I was a little worried because the expiration date was erased on the box, but I don’t think it will cause me death. I decided to fill my stomach with this.
Too bad there’s no milk. I found a suitable bowl and poured the cereal for Mieum.
“Hmm, you want me to eat this crap?”
“If you don’t like it, give it back.”
I tried to clear the bowl of cereal. Then, Mi-eum hurriedly clung to my hand with her front feet.
“No, this body will give it a special taste.”
“You say it’s a crap?”
“Hey, it’s crap, but I’ll put up with this especially this time.”
Contrary to what she said, Mieum buried her head in the bowl and ate all the cereal in an instant.
“Mumumumummu … do you have any more of this?”
I wonder how deeply she put her head in the bowl, the cereal crumbs were clinging to Mieum’s face.
“…Come on.”
I poured more cereal into the bowl.
While Mieum rustled and ate the cereal, I checked the status window once again.
Maybe I was flustered earlier and misread the numbers. For example, I read a number with a zero removed. Yeah, how can you get such a terrible stats when you’ve been awakened?
“Whoa, haaa….”
Let’s calm down. I should read the numbers correctly this time.
I looked at the screen with such hope.
Class: Cafe Owner (F)
Stamina 100/100, Energy 100/100
Strength: 8, Intelligence: 11, Agility: 9, Luck: 12
Nothing has changed. I shook my head and muttered.
“I’ve awakened up to this point, but I didn’t know it would be this lame.….”
“You chose it yourself, why.”
Mieum interrupted from the side.
After eating two bowls or cereal, the full cat groaned. It was after she licked up the cereal crumbs on her front paws.
“Wait, I chose it?”
“Your awakening ability is an ability formed based on the system’s test results.”
“Test? I’ve never done anything like that … huh, it the psychological test from before?
“Mrrrrrrrrrraw!”
Mieum cried sharply as her hair stood up. She swung her front paws and threw her fists at me.
“Psychological test! It is a traditional test to confirm the awakening ability suitable for the eligible person!”
‘Isn’t that a psychological test?‘ I thought, but I had to listen to Mieum for more explanations, so I comforted her.
“Mieum, good girl.”
“Do you think I’m an ordinary cat! …… Meow.”
When I gently scratched the bottom of her chin with my hand, Mieum looked drowsy. As I fiddled more, a groaning sound leaked out. Then she explained in an arrogant voice.
There is a special energy called ‘ether‘ in the world.
I’ve heard of Ether. Hunter supplies and weapons all contained ether, and the more ether is contained, the more expensive it is.
And the awakened person can store this ether in their body and use the skill. In other words, only those with ether affinity can gain awakening.
Nevertheless, there was an exception.
“What is that?”
The Awakener chosen by the system is called The Eligible. They are very rare, and they are given special abilities directly by the system.
Mieum said I was the right person.
It sounds like a really great explanation, but … what are the stats I actually got? Mieum added to me who was disappointed.
“You got the ability according to the choice of Kwon Rieul.”
“What?”
So, the strange question that appeared on TV earlier was the process of choosing my awakening ability.
If I had known that was the case, I wouldn’t have answered like that. I would have responded like an enterprising, passionate, experienced rookie just like I did when I wrote my cover letter.
“No, do it again! I’ll choose again, so let’s do it again!”
I grabbed the TV and shook it. However, the screen doesn’t turn on again. As a last resort, I pounded the back of the TV, but only my hand hurt.
Mieum, who looked at me as if I was something pathetic, spoke again.
“Ttsutsutsu, it has already been decided and cannot be changed. Please check your skills.”
“…Skill?”
“Yeah, didn’t the notification that you got the skill popped up earlier? The exclusive skill granted by the system is the real ability of the Awakened.”
That’s right, I didn’t see it closely earlier, but three skills appeared. The status looks like this, but the skills can be good.
There were many hunters who made a living using them because their status had good skills even at the level of ordinary people. Apparently, there were hunters abroad who were F-class, but famous for their A-class skills.
I opened the skill window with anticipation. Three skills appeared in a translucent window, there were Cafe in My Hand (C), The Floor is Shiny (E), and Smile (C). I clicked the detailed description one by one.
Cafe in My Hand (C)Details: (Lv. 1) When making drinks in the store, the level of perfection is increased. Reserved Recipes: Mixed Coffee
The Floor is Shiny (E)Details: (Lv. 1) Cleaning toilets can be done quickly. 
Smile (C)Details: (Lv. 1) Smiling makes you feel better. 
Is this really the end?
Why is it like this … Unknowingly, I let out a sigh.
I don’t have any of those common self-healing or supporting skills!
I’m planning to open a cafe, so the ‘Cafe in My Hand‘ skill is fine. However, even if it’s a beverage making skill, the only recipe available is mixed coffee.
Additionally I received skill in cleaning the bathroom. What is the advantage of using skills to quickly clean the bathroom?
The last one is the Smile skill, so where can I use this? Maybe it has some hidden power?
‘…Smile.’
I tried the smile skill.
Smile.
The tip of the lips is pulled naturally and a soft arc line is drawn. It’s the perfect business smile.
“…”
And that was the end.
Just smile and it’s over. I didn’t feel any better.
I have all these useless skills.
Damn, the price of being too honest with the test was bitter.
Hello, my daily easy life … that’s what I wanted to do. Awakening doesn’t seem to achieve it that easily.
“Don’t worry. There’s a way.”
Mieum patted the frustrated me with her front paw and started to speak.
[Next]


Translator’s Corner:
I actually still don’t know the gender for the cat … because even the endearment being used is gender-neutral. I’ll assume it as a female for now.
Oh, and I changed “qualified” to “eligible” because The Eligible sounds better 😀

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c3:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

The letters passed quickly as if the screen was fast-forwarded.
I tend to skip the whole story even when I play games. I don’t know what it is, but it didn’t seem like a big deal. It has nothing to do with me.
Soon the letters were skipped and a new screen appeared, and this time there was an input window.


[Name:
Age:
Blood type: ]

Are you asking me to enter the answers? I can ignore it, but I was a little curious about what would come out.
‘My name is Kwon Rieul, my age is … I was 26 years old before I returned to the past, so I am 23 years old. My blood type is O….’
I entered the answer by pressing the button on the television screen.
This strange television question continued.

[Which of the following is the most important thing for you?]









Money
Honor
Power
Rest










The answer, obviously, is number four.
Sure, money is important, but what’s the use making money then dying without spending it? After all, money is also needed for number four.
I didn’t realize that until I died.
At least, I wanted to spend this life leisurely. I’m going to take the route of the work-life balance that I’ve only been hearing about.

[What do you usually do on your day off?]









Doing self-improvement
Exercising
Socializing
Resting










I chose number four again this time.
When I had a day off, I was busy just making up for my lack of sleep.
Self-development? Exercising? At the most, the exercise equipment I ordered was tucked away in the closet without even opening the delivery box. Socializing? With only a few friends, I sporadically reported my survival through KakaoTalk.
[You overslept on your day off, but your friend called you to meet them. What will you do?]










Go out to meet the friend.


Ask them to meet next time and continue sleeping.










The answer is undoubtedly number two. It’s so important to oversleep.
A few more silly questions followed. I don’t know the intention of this question, but I chose the answer that I want to rest, relax, and play at all costs. It’s like a psychological test.
[The test is over] [Check the results]
Finally, the last message appeared on the black screen, and a door suddenly appeared on the wall behind it.
When I was cleaning a while ago, it was definitely a wall with nothing.
‘Are you telling me to go in there?’
… Gulp.
Even a bluish light leaked from the door. The strange aura, which looks different from the store’s fluorescent lights, resembled a dungeon gate.
‘It’s not like a dungeon, is it?’
In my previous life, I’ve only entered a dungeon once when I was caught in a rift. And the result was death.
If there is a dungeon beyond this door, I never want to enter it. I cannot die again after only a few days have passed since I returned. Moreover, being stabbed in the stomach by a monster was extremely painful. It’s an experience I don’t want to repeat.
I stepped back slowly in front of the door.
But at that moment.
[We are waiting for a visit from the eligible person. Please open the door and check the result.]
A beeping sound came from the television along with the message.
What’s more suspicious, the more I stepped backwards, the louder the sound became, and  I still could hear it even when I covered my ears.
I shouted, shaking my head with my ears closed.
“Oh, I’m not going! I will not going in!”
I have dungeon trauma, and I am allergic to dungeon, and I am suffering from dungeon phobia. No, you can call it anything. I didn’t want to go in there regardless.
[We are waiting for a visit from the eligible person. Please open the door and check the result.]
This time, I heard the voice directly in my head. I was horrified by the strange feeling.
What’s beyond that door that keeps telling me to come in?
“Should I report it to the Dungeon Management Office?”
There were several  emergency call numbers to urgently report a dungeon. Yes, it is best to leave the dungeon to the Hunter.
However, as soon as I tried to take my cell phone out of my pocket, the floor vibrated with a woooh sound.
“….Whoaaa!”
I dropped my phone because of that, and it quickly went into a gap out of reach.
There was still a door emitting a bluish light in front of me.
As if entering the door was the only answer given to me.
Er, I don’t know anymore. It’s a place where my grandmother used to live, so it’s probably not something dangerous.
It was scary, but I honestly wondered what the outcome of this strange test was.
All right, once I open the door, and if I think a monster will come out, I’ll run away quickly. I will just take a peek. If I don’t think it’s safe, I’ll head out.
Determined to do so, I closed my eyes tightly, opened the door, and went inside.
As soon as I opened the door, a bluish light wrapped around me and the landscape changed.
“Uh?”
Only the cold air touched my hand that was holding the doorknob. The door that had been here a while ago was gone.
Huh, I’m trapped.
It was impossible to head out because there was no door.
That strange television must have tricked me! After all, I should have reported it right away without opening the door … but who would have thought that the door would disappear altogether!
“Aaargh, let me out! Save me!”
[We have confirmed the visit of the eligible person. Creating an agent.]
I screamed, but all I could hear was a calm voice.
Wait, where does this sound come from in the first place?
Only then did I look around slowly, a little genuinely.
The place I entered was a lawn surrounded by forest. It was about twenty steps wide from end to end, and the dense forest was covered with thick fog and could not be seen.
Even though it was past 7 in the evening., the blue sky and bright sunlight showed me that this place was a space.
It was a peaceful atmosphere compared to an usual dungeon full of tension. A gentle breeze blew from somewhere.
Isn’t this a dungeon?
In general, there were many indoor forms of dungeons that occurred in rifts, such as caves and tombs. I’ve heard that sometimes there are structures that are uniquely exposed to the outdoors, but I’ve never heard of a dungeon with the sun floating in the blue sky like this.
Still, that’s not the point. I had to find a way out wherever I was.
I looked at the lawn to see if there was a hidden door, and that’s when I noticed that there was a small flower bush here. There was a cat on a flat stone by the bush.
The cat with tricolored fur was taking a nap on the stone. The fur was smooth and the body ,with plenty of flesh, looked soft.
Did the chat come through that door like me? As soon as I approached it carefully not to wake them up, I heard a voice in my head again.
[I’ve been waiting for your visit. Please name the agent.]
What is an agent? Maybe this cat?
“….Name it? Are you asking me?”
I asked that, but there was no answer. Instead, a guide window appeared in front of me.
[Enter a name:  ]
It was this mysterious message that called me here. Anyway, I guess I’ll have to do what this message tells me to get out of here. With that in mind, I put my hand on my forehead and started contemplating the name.
It’s a name for the cat….
Name for a cat … name for  cat … cat, meow….
“Meong?”
After all, this is the only right name for a cat. However, the system rejected it with a beep sound.
[Agent rejects this name.]
“What’s wrong with Meong?”
It’s a traditional cat’s name.
[This is an agent for you. Please think about it seriously.]
[Enter a name: ]
I was incredibly serious.
I reluctantly thought of the name again, but couldn’t come up with a good name. In the first place, I was a person with no sense of naming. Butterfly … no, it’s a little out of place. Dumplings? nope, it’s really bad. It has three types of hair color, three colors, umm …. well…..
Then a name crossed my mind.
How about Mieum?
My name, Kwon Rieul, was given to me by my grandmother. 
The meaning is literally Rieul. Giyeok, Nieun, Digeut, then Rieul. The name was given because I was my grandmother’s fourth grandchildren, but I don’t know why my older cousins aren’t Giyeok, Nieun, and Digeut, yet I’m the only one who’s Rieul.
Originally, they were going to register my birth as ‘Kwon D’, but the civil service official rejected it and my name became ‘Rieul’.
I don’t even know your name or face, but thank you. You saved my name. The justice and duty of the civil service was there. I bowed my head in the direction that the community center was likely to be.
Anyway, I thought the name Mieum would be good because it was a cat I found in this space of the store that my grandmother left me. It literally means Mieum after Giyeok, Nieun, Digeut, and Rieul. The word M.
“….Mieum?”
I was terrified that the tricky notification message would reject me again, but I couldn’t hear anything anymore. Did it pass? Instead, Mieum opened her eyes in front of me.
“….Meooong!”
The cat continued to stretch. The fur wiggled softly, and the round-tipped tail soared upward. The chin was round and the belly with plenty of flesh looked soft.
It’s a cute.
I forgot that I had been looking for the exit door just a while ago, and casually approached Mieum then reached out my hand. Can I touch your stomach? I was about to pat her plump belly with my fingers.
Tak.
Mieum, who slapped my hand with her front paw, looked at me with squinted eyes and said,
“Uh-huh, don’t touch me carelessly.”
I got scolded by a cat.
“Eh?”
I turned my head in doubt at what I had just heard. Who just said that? but there was still only me and Mieum here.
“I told you so.”
“You’re a cat. You can talk?”
“Meow, do you think I’m an ordinary cat? I was waiting for an eligible person to visit me as an agent running the system. I thought I was going to die waiting for you. Anyway, put your hand up here.”
Mieum held out her round front paws. I don’t know what you’re talking about, but I wanted to touch the pink jelly on her front paw, so I held out my hand as I was told.
At that moment, a translucent window appeared in front of me with a tingling sound.
[Checking the eligibilities … Completed. The system has been activated.]
[Ability is granted according to the test result.]
[Class: Awakened as a Cafe Owner (F).]
[Skill: Cafe in my Hand (C) has been acquired.]
[Skill: The Floor is Shiny (E) has been acquired.]
[Skill: Smile (C) has been acquired.]
[Achievement: Became a Beginner Cafe Owner.]
[Quest: Start 100 cups of Mixed Coffee (0/100)]
Huuh?
I think … I am awakened now.
[Next]



Translator’s Corner:
About the name, Rieul is the fourth consonant in Korean alphabets (Hangul) and Mieum is the fifth. The order is giyeok (기역), nieun (니은), digeut (디귿) dieut, rieul (리을), then mieum (미음). In English, it would be like naming your children A B C D E.
Mixed coffee is instant coffee. In South Korea, instant coffee commonly comes pre-mixed with non-dairy creamer and sugar that’s why it is called “coffee mix”.  I want to keep the coffee in the end of sentence so I’ll write it as mixed coffee.

SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon_t.c2:
Translated by cabinfourtranslations.

Page One: A hundred cups of instant coffee
When I died, the resentment came.

If I had known I would die like this, I would have ordered chicken yesterday.
I’ll try the hotel buffet that I’ve only seen through blog posts every day.
I should have used my annual leave and go to a trip.
I should’ve stopped working overtime.
I should’ve quit the company……!
It was really unfair to die in vain after working from morning to night every day.
Huh? I felt something strange after grumbling to myself for a long time.
I’m dead, so why is my consciousness this clear?
This cozy and soft feeling wrapped around my body was like the bed blanket in my room.
Perhaps you will see flashing memories like a phantasmagoria the moment you die. Does a phantasmagoria mean that you can feel the texture so vividly?
Furthermore, I couldn’t sleep because the cell phone alarm rang loudly next to me. I waited for the phantasmagoria to end quickly and lose consciousness, but my mind became clearer and clearer.
“Oh, it’s noisy….”
I finally woke up at the sound of the alarm. I could see the bed, the desk, and the messy interior of the room.
I, I went back to the time before I died.
***
It is said that it is the age of the Hunter.
Hunter, a capable man who exerts transcendent power through ‘awakening’, first appeared in the world 20 and 3 years ago.
And they defeated monsters pouring out of dungeons from all over the world and restored peace to mankind.
The world raved about these saviors.
Children envied Hunter more than celebrities and sports stars. The largest Hunter Guild, called the Big 3, has a market capitalization that exceeds any large corporations, and every move of the top ranked hunters is in the news every day.
If you become a hunter, you can earn a lot of money and fame.
Many people dreamed of becoming a hunter instead winning a lottery, and the educational institution established by the state to systematically train hunters recorded a competition rate of thousands to one.
However, it has nothing to do with me.
I am not awakened, nor am I knowledgeable about hunters or dungeons.
[The veiled A-grade dungeon attacker – Big 3 Guild remains silent]
[The salary  of attacking a dungeon is a billion won?]
[Preparing for retirement with the legendary item farming!]
Those articles didn’t interest me at all. I don’t care who attacks the dungeon. I have to go to work!
The company that I worked for from morning to night was a place where I can earn  monthly salary.
Overtime pay? Of course there’s no such thing. No meal. No annual leave. No weekend pay. I repeated this life of working overtime every day and barely getting on the last train to go home.
I was unlucky that day. On that day, I was working overtime and on my way to catch the last train.
By the way.
“Ugh, Aaaargh!”
“It’s a Dungeon! Someone, report it to the Dungeon Management Office!”
“Miss! Be careful!”
In front of the subway station, a rift, or a hole in the space that leads to a dungeon, suddenly appeared.
When dungeons occur, the Dungeon Management Office blocks the general public from entering, and then cooperates with each guild to attack the dungeon. This is because if the dungeon boss is not defeated within the time limit, a dungeon break will occur and monsters will pour out from within.
It is common for dungeons to appear like this, so people evacuated in unison and contacted the authority.
The problem is that the rift happened at my feet. When I noticed it, my feet was already stepped on the rift. I was sucked into the dungeon.
I don’t remember exactly what happened in the dungeon. It might have erased from my memory because I was terrified. It was certain that I was chased by monsters and ran away.
Anyway, I entered the dungeonas a normal person and died at the hands of a monster. I remember vividly the eerie feeling when the monster’s front foot stabbed me.
Dungeon death on the way back home from the company. I can’t believe there’s such an unfair life. I grumbled that I could not close my eyes in peace because of anger. Grumbled is a mild expression, in fact I poured out numerous abusive language.
But when I opened my eyes, I was on the bed in my room. I went back to three years ago.
“Eh?”
At first I thought I was dreaming, then I was happy, and finally I was skeptical with this situation.
Why did I come back to life? I’ve never heard of someone coming back to the past after being killed by a monster in a dungeon. It also goes back to three years ago.
What does this mean? Is there anything I need to do in this second life?
Eh, I don’t know.
Nevertheless, it’s a great gain. Maybe the Dungeon took pity on my miserable life and gave me one more chance.
Anyway, I decided to live my second life differently.
Bye to a life full of slavery suffocated by overtime work!
Goodbye. I throw away all the shackles and restraints of this world and go for freedom!
***
It took less than a few days to resign and organize my luggage.
Perhaps it was regrettable that the slave escaped, the boss tried to prevent me, but I left without even listening his words. I had survived to the fullest, but I couldn’t devote my youth to a black company like this.
The next place I headed was The White Silver Guild.
When I opened the door of the guild chief’s room, I saw Kwon Jiwoon looking through the documents.
It finally hit me. I’m really back in the past.
I called him with a warm welcome.
“Oppa, long time no see.”
“What?”
Kwon Jiwoon looked at me with eyes like he has seen a ghost.
“What’s going on all of a sudden? Did you have an accident?”
What? Did you notice that I have returned? Don’t you think it’s the same as usual? Do I have any marks on my face?
“Ah … No, nothing happened?”
“I was wondering why you suddenly giving me goosebumps. You never call me that.”
My affectionate heart broke in an instant.
Yeah. I never did. That sarcastic tone made me realize that I had returned to the past.
After my parents died when I was young, I lived with my uncle, and I grew up with my cousin Kwon Jiwoon.
We live separately now, but we stayed in the same house until we were 20. As there are no other siblings, we’re like each other’s only family.
It sounds like we’re pretty close to each other, but in reality, we’re not. Rather, our relationship was close to awkwardness.
Kwon Jiwon is the deputy guild leader of The White Silver Guild and an A-class healer. His alias is Eunrang.
He’s a healer who ranked 12th in the country and he often appears on television. Due to his striking appearance, he is also often featured in Hunter magazine. It was all thanks to Kwon Jiwoon’s fame that The White Silver Guild, which is smaller than the Big Three, was widely known. In addition, since my uncle, the guild leader, went missing a few years ago, he has been acting as the guild leader.
As such, Kwon Jiwoon was insanely busy. No matter how close I was  to him when when we were young, I had no choice but to feel distant from him as an ordinary person.
“Don’t show any interest in Hunters or anything like that, and just stay as a normal person.”
It was what Kwon Jiwoon often said when we met occasionally. Did he think I’d ask him a favor?
That’s why I got a job right away to show that I was doing well, but I didn’t know it would be such a black company.
‘Now that I think about it, it was pointless….’
I watched Kwon Jiwoon sitting across from the drawing room.
Kwon Jiwoon looked a little younger than I remember. I’m 23 years old now, so he’s … he must be 25 years old.
Due to the influence of the healer skill, the hair that turned silver was very conspicuous. Although he has a colorful appearance, his expression is cold, and his eyes are slightly dark. He looked tired.
“I heard you quit your job.”
He asked me after I looked at his face but didn’t say anything for a while. Maybe someone from the guild has told him the news.
“Let me know if anything happens.”
As if  he were tired, Kwon Jiwoon sighed softly.
There is no reason to go around in circles with boring greetings. I got straight to the point.
“It’s not like that, but there’s something I want to do after I quit the company.”
“What is it?”
“I’m going to open a cafe.”
Even though I said that, I thought Kwon Jiwoon would naturally oppose it.
What is it like to be self-employment? It’s said that 100 people start and 99 people fail. In particular, jobs such as cafes with low entry barriers were often go bankrupt if they were set up without thorough preparation. If it’s Kwon Jiwoon, there’s more than enough reason to go against it.
However, there was a reason that I wanted to open a cafe and nothing else.
How to persuade him? As I was thinking about such things, Kwon Jiwoon made an unexpected statement.
“Sure? There’s an empty spot on the first floor of our guild building. Let’s open a cafe there.”
“…Huh? No, there….”
“Why? You don’t like it? I can start emptying it tomorrow.”
On the first floor of The Silver White Guild headquarters, it was a downtown area among the bustling streets, it was a place famous for high land prices in Seoul now.
This area where ₩50,000 is an average price for a bowl of soup is a place where no matter how much coffee you sell, you cannot afford the rent. Usually there was a bank for hunters or a store that sold expensive hunter supplies.
“Oh, you don’t have to worry about the rent. I have no intention of taking money from you.”
Kwon Jiwoon added as he guessed that it was the money that caused me to panic.
I waved my hand in a hurry. I’m not advertising that I’m a cousin of the deputy guild leader, and it’s burdensome to open a store in that location. We’re not that close, so I don’t know why he’s suddenly making such a proposal.
Furthermore, I already had a certain place in my plan.
“No, I’ve already decided the location.”
“Really? Where is it?”
“It’s on the No. 16 Dungeon Gate 3 Street, Jung-gu, Seoul.”
“Huh? That place is….”
Kwon Jiwoon frowned at the address I told him.
“It is in front of the great dungeon?”
“Yes, I’m going to open a cafe in front of the dungeon.”
I declared with a wide smile.
***
No. 16 Dungeon Gate 3 Street, Jung-gu, Seoul
In other words, it was an address that pointed to the entrance of the great Dungeon, Abyss, in Jung-gu, Seoul.
Twenty years ago, this space appeared in the middle of Seoul and a large dungeon appeared.
This tower-shaped dungeon continued endlessly high, unlike the instance dungeon that was created from rifts. If you attack one floor, a gate that leads to the next floor appears.
And in front of this dungeon was also the place where the cafe run by my late grandmother was located. Of course, back then, it wasn’t a questionable address called ‘Dungeon Gate 3 Street’, but an ordinary shopping street.
The surroundings were all demolished, and even though it wasa  downtown Seoul, there was only a lonely silence there.
That’s why no one is going to live in front of a dungeon, with uncertainty that something will happen. Unless that person is like my grandmother.
After the appearance of the great dungeon Abyss, the surrounding shops received government compensation and demolished their buildings, but my grandmother remained there. She kept her shop until the day she passed away, despite her children stopped her because it was dangerous.
It was the reason why I decided to open my cafe there.
When I was young, whenever I went to my grandmother’s cafe after school, she always made me a cup of hot coffee. The sweet taste and cozy space was definitely a precious memory.
In the past life, I left my grandmother’s cafe empty because I was busy working at a company. The fact was weighed on my mind, and I wanted to restore it to the comfortable space it used to be.
In fact, there is also a realistic reason that it does not cost much money.
Although it was old, the building of my grandmother’s store remained intact. I’m thinking of living on the second floor of the store, so I don’t need to pay not only the store rent, but also my living rent. It’s the perfect place to open a cafe with a small amount of money.
The last reason is that there are no people and it is a quiet place.
After opening a cafe, why am I looking for a place where there are no people?
That’s right. I’m returned at best condition, but of course I don’t have any intention to work hard.
Most of all, I wanted to rest. In a cozy and comfortable cafe, just like when my grandmother was there.
I don’t need to have many customers. It is enough to sell coffee to hunters who sometimes want to enter the dungeon.
A life where you work less and rest more. My goal is YOLO life.
***
After cleaning up my living room, I headed to my grandmother’s cafe.
The abandoned building was very old. I couldn’t see where the sign had gone, and there was a creaking sound every time a door was opened.
There was a lot of preparation that I need to do before the cafe can be opened.
The first step is cleaning.
It took a whole day to sweep and wipe the dust inside. It was difficult, but I felt much more comfortable than when I was working at the company.
As I got tired, I naturally gravitated towards coffee, but right now there was only instant coffee. I looked around as I drank coffee mix in a paper cup.
“What is this?”
But there was a square television in a small room inside the store. Was it used by my grandmother?
Out of curiosity, I looked around. However, there was no company mark on where it was made, and there was no power button.
“…Whoa!”
At that time, the lights turned on and letters appeared on the screen.
……………………..
[Checking your eligibilities]
[We’ve confirmed that you’re eligible]]
[You have finally come, the child who inherited the blood of the right person. I am the one in charge of the system, have been waiting for you…..]
I don’t know what you mean. It’s too long. I pressed [SKIP].
[Next]

I hope you enjoy the story. This is a little bit different from the ones that I did before. The gaming slang is giving me a headache.
